Rìfuu yì ɗi Yeesus Kiris man à Davit, man à Abiraham ɗi ri fɛlɛ: 
Abiraham à yalà Isag, Isag à yay Yakɔɓ, Yakɔɓ à yay lɛ, rì Zyuda rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓii; 
Zyuda à yay lɛ rì Farɛs rì Zara ɓɛɛ̀ Tamaar, Farɛs à yay Ɛsirɔm, Ɛsirɔm à yay Aram; 
Aram à yay Aminadaɓ, Aminadaɓ à yay Naasɔn, Naasɔn à yay Salmɔn 
Salmɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Rahaɓ ɓɛ yay Boas, Boas ɓɛɛ̀ Rut ɓɛ yay Oɓɛɛɗ, Oɓɛɛɗ à yay Isayii. 
Isayii à yay rìfòm ɗi lɛ Davit; rìfòm ɗi lɛ Davit ɗi yay Salomɔŋ ɓɛɛ̀ gili Ùrì; 
Salomɔŋ à yay Roɓwam, Roɓwam à yay Aɓya, Aɓya à yay Asa; 
Asa à yay Yosafat, Yosafat à yay Zyoram, Zyoram à yay Ozyas; 
Ozyas à yay Zyoatam, Zyoatam à yay Akas, Akas à yay Ezekyas; 
Ezekyas à yay Manase, Manase à yay Amɔn, Amɔn à yay Yozyas. 
Yozyas à yay lɛ, rì Yekonyas rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓii, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ kɛngà rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl a Baɓilon. 
Ajɛ̀m ì rìkɛ̀n ɗi rì Isirayɛl ɗiǹ a Baɓilon nnɛ Yekonyas à yali Salatyɛl; Salatyɛl à yay Zoroɓaɓɛl; 
Zoroɓaɓɛl à yay Aɓyud, Aɓyud à yay Elyakim, Elyakim à yay Azɔɔr; 
Azɔɔr à yay Saɗɔg, Saɗɔg à yay Akim, Akim à yay Elyud. 
Elyud à yay Eleyazaar, Eleyazaar à yay Mataŋ, Mataŋ à yay Yakɔɓ; 
Yakɔɓ à yay Yoosɛɓ à yii Marii ànɛ à yalà Yeesus ànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ Kiris. 
À tumɛ̀n ɓi Abiraham à kpaŋ ɓi Davit gbàà yi ɓum yi ri yɛɛlɔɔ ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì yiniǹ; à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi Davit à kpaŋ ɓi rìkɛ̀n ɗi rì Isirayɛl a Baɓilon, gbàà yi ɓum ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì yiniǹ; à tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ à kpaŋ ɓi rìyalɛ̀n ɗi Kiris, gbàà yi ɓum ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì yiniǹ.
Rìyalɛ̀n ɗi Yeesus Kiris ɗi ɓaghà fɛlɛ: Marii à jɛɛ à ɓaghà di à mɛ gherɛn Yoosɛɓ lɛ, ɓɛ ɓiì wɔlɛɛ. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka wɔlɛn ɓi, nni Marii, à tekà ɗyem rì ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Yoosɛɓ à kìlɔnì kii, à ɓaghà syeesyee à mum; nni yɛ̀ɛ à kɔngà ɓi lɛ a ghani Marii ɓidan, fɔɔnnɛ à fèkà lɛ a caɗ nyi lɛ ɗyɔ̀ɔ̀ŋ kɛ̀ɛ̀ gom. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà di à ti rì fèg ànɛn, innɛ Ŋwaàfìtom a Kan à rèsɛ̀ngà nyi a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Yoosɛɓ, man à Davit, kɔ̀ɔ risi riteɗ ɗi Marii à giɓ wɔɔ̀, ɓisuulɛ ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n Ki Nghay wɛɛ nkìi lɛ a teɗ ɗyem ɗi àrì rì ɗyɔ. 
À ɓiì yalì man à baŋì, ù ki ròò nyi ɗii lɛ Yeesus, lɛ nnyɛɛ ɓiì kòri kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ɓi ɓìɓe ɓyaa.
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi kilɛ̀ngà lɛ kɛɛ ɓa ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Kan à kpaaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ: 
Ghɛna! Gɔ̀n ì giɓ ìnɛ ì ka yi ɓi ɓɛbaŋì ì ɓiì terì ɗyem, ì yay man à baŋì, ɓɛ roò nyi ɗii lɛ Emanuɛl; ɗii ɗìn ɗi ri azi lɛ: Bɛ̀ll rì ɓìsi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yoosɛɓ à ghèmɓɛ̀ngà ɓi fìlo, à kì loŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à kpaaghà nyi, à teɗ giy a mɛɛ mii. 
Kìɓan kifog, à yighà ɓi nyi kitòn zɛy à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à yalà man à baŋì, Yoosɛɓ à ròò lɛ Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yalɛ̀ngà a Bɛtilɛhɛm ɓi ziì Zyude, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Eroodɛ à ɓaghà rìfòm, nni ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ Pɛsɛ̀ngày ɓi jàŋ ìnɛ ŋ̀wos a kpagii, ɓɛ yuiy a Yorisalɛm 
ɓɛ tɔg lɛ: Rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɗi ɗi n-yalɛɛ fɛ ɗi ri fe? Tìi ǹghɛɛ fyɛy fi man ànɛ̀n a rìkpagìì ɗi ŋwos di fyɛɛ̀ lònlòm, fɔɔnnɛ tì yùu yì fɛ lɛ, ti ɓɔgsi nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗi lɛ Eroodɛ ɗi wokà kìɓan kiǹ, ki ɓuùsì nyi ǹto, ki ɓuùsì girig ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à taŋzɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ̀cèm rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ à tɔg ɓɔ jàŋ inɛ Kiris à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì yalɛɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓàg nyi lɛ: A Bɛtilɛhɛm ɓi ziì Zyude, lɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a kàngà lɛ:
Wɔ̀ Bɛtilɛhɛm, ɓi kìden ki zi ki a Zyuda, ù yin loo maa bàn à zɛy rì zɛy ɓi nyìinyìm à bàn yi a Zyuda, lɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ ìnnɛ rìfòm ɗi ɗi ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ̀sii kilɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀ ki lɛ Isirayɛl, ɗi ɓiì kpaŋìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Eroodɛ à reŋìghà min ɓɛyiì-ɓìɓan ɓɛǹ a dwìɗ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ konag nyi kì kpaà fin innɛ fyɛy fiǹ fi tumɛ̀ngà rìlòm. 
Nni à romgà min ɓɔ a Bɛtilɛhɛm, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna kì kaà jàŋ inɛ man ànɛ̀n à rì lɛ tiɓ-tiɓ, i ɓì ghɛɛ nyi, ɓì yù mɛ̀ kì wogsii lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ ǹkɛǹ girig nyi kì ɓɔgsii.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi rìfòm ɗi kpaaghà ɓɔ ɓìn, nni ɓɛ kɛngà, ɓɛ ki sìgmɛn lɛ, fyɛy fi ɓɛ remzìghày a rìkpagìì ɗi ŋwos, fi ti ɓɔ ɓiì syòŋsyoŋi bee, a kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ fi kɛngà kì rɛlii ɓi jàŋ inɛ man ànɛ̀n à ɓaghà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà fyɛy fiǹ, ɓɛ wokà kìnyàà lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, ɓɛ ghɛn man à m̀ɓwɛɗ rì Marii à jɛɛ, ɓɛ ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì man ànɛ̀n. Ɓɛ fumì min mɛtɛ̀g maa, ɓɛ fa nyi lɛ; rì gol rì àŋsaŋ rì miìr. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn Bɛ̀ll à kalìghà ɓɔ a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sugti yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sukà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa ɓi bee ìdɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ sug, nni ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à rèsɛ̀ngà Yoosɛɓ a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, ù teɗ lɛ rì maa man ànɛ, rì jɛɛ, ù ghɛŋi rì ɓɔ a Egiɓtɛn, u ki kɔ̀ri wɔɔ, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì kalii lɛ, u sugtiì, ɓisuulɛ Eroodɛ à ɓiì kaakaa man ànɛ, lɛ a wey. 
Nni Yoosɛɓ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à teɗ lɛ rì maa man ànɛ̀n rì jɛɛ, ɓɛ ghɛŋì lɔŋ ri ìru wìn a Egiɓtɛn. 
À kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à wughà, lɛ kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à kpaaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗegii man wɛm̀ lɛ a kpaŋdɛn a Egiɓtɛn.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à ghɛngà lɛ, ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ m̀pwàa nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à wokà bim lɛɛ̀gwey, à ki rom ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì cuusii ɓɔn ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Bɛtilɛhɛm à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓɔn ɓɛ bèg yiɓɛɛ̀rɛn à sɛn, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ reɓkà nyi, cààmɛ̀n ki fyɛy fi tumɛ̀ngà rìlòm. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ roozìghà rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Zyeremii ɗi lɛ: 
Ɓɛ ǹwooghiì di ɓìkiŋ ɓi riì a Rama, rì mɛ̀kɛɛ̀gh, rì ɓìɓààsì, Rasyɛl nnyɛɛ rènɗen ɓɔn ɓii, kɛ̀ɛ gherɛn lɛ mum a fɔɔ̀si nyi ǹɗem ɓisuulɛ, ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛ mɛ cùù.
Yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à wughà, nni ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à rèsɛ̀ngà Yoosɛɓ a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀ a Egiɓtɛn; 
à kpaa nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u teɗ lɛ rì man ànɛ rì jɛɛ, u sugti rì ɓɔ ɓi ziì Isirayɛl, lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kaakàghà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey man ànɛ, ɓɛ mɛ cùù. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yoosɛɓ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à teɗ lɛ rì man ànɛ̀n rì jɛɛ, ɓɛ sug ɓi zi ì Isirayɛl. 
Kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ Yoosɛɓ à wokà lɛ, Arikelawus yɛɛ ǹteri ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu seŋi ànɛ lɛ Eroodɛ ɓi ziì Zyude, nni à risìghà lɛ a kɛǹ kì kɔ̀rii wɔɔ. Bɛ̀ll à reɓ nyi a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀ lɛ a kɛǹ kì kɔ̀rii a Galile. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Naazarɛt, lɛ kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ lokà kì kalii lɛ: Ɓɛ regii gɛ nyi lɛ muu Naazarɛt.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à peeghày ɓi-reɓ wu a Zyude, à kakàlì ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
À kpaakpààghà ɓum lɛ: Lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna mɛ̀rem lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ti jàŋbog. 
Zyaŋ yɛɛ rì ŋwaànɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à ɓugà yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a làalamɓɛ̀n yì ɓi-reɓ lɛ: Pègsɛɛna bee yi Kan, ɓì rɛsàg yɔ lɛ saaɗ.
Zyaŋ à waatɛ̀ngà kìlàà ki ɓɛ toŋi rì nyùŋ yi syàmo, à sìnɛ̀n kànɗa à gòò ì nyàm ɓi kìɓon; à ɗiɗìghà lɛ, rì ɓìtàtàɗ, rì mɔ̀ɔ mɛ ilòò mɛ ɓɛ Pisii yì ɓi cog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Yorisalɛm, rì ɓɛ ɓi ziì Zyude bimiɗ, rì ɓɛ ɓi kòdò bimiɗ ànɛ à wuɓsɛɛ Zyuridɛŋ, ɓɛ yuyùghà a lɔ̀ŋkii; 
ɓɛ kpakpàg ɓìɓe ɓyaa, Zyaŋ à ki ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓɔ ɓi ǹsyòm wu lɛ Zyuridɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ à ghɛngà di Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ri Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ̀ yùyuiy a lɔ̀ŋkii lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaɓti ɓɔ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mini ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ pisɛɛ ɓìgòm ɓɛ! Ghɛn yɛɛ reɓi mìni lɛ ɓi ghɛŋi rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ɗi tiì? 
Kikiina min ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ resi lɛ ɓì mɛ lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn mɛrèm. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi fèg lɛ, lɔŋ rìkpaa ɗi lɛ, Abiraham à rì seŋi wìs ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. Ǹkalii mìni lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ à ghaasì gɔ̀g yi ɓɔn ɓɛ Abiraham. 
Fìseŋ fyɛɛ ti gì kɔmiɗ lɛ fìnɔ̀ŋziyɛn a gaŋ yi ɓite. Fɔɔnnɛ kìte kicèm ki kaa wum ɓi ɓiɗùn ɓi syeesyee, ɓɛ ɓiì rengii kɔ ɓɛ woǹ ɓi ɗuù. 
Mɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓàaɓaɓtì mìni rì mɛ̀nig lɛ ɓì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛ̀rem, kìɓan kifog roànɛ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m à cee mɛ̀ ɓi-tèɗ; nyii ri mìni ɓiì ɓàɓtii lɛ rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, rì ɗuu. Mɛ̀ ǹkpaŋi gì ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ ǹsɔ̀ŋì nyi gòò ɓi mɛ̀kòò. 
À rìì rì mɛ̀tɛŋkɛlɛ mii ɓi càg, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓiì fyɔnì kìbog kii à foŋ gèŋ i cag-cag ɓi ɓìkàɗ; wɔ̀lɛ à tɔ̀n ɓìkoroɗ ɓi ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗimi.
Nni Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Galile à yù ɓi Zyuridɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ lɛ a ɓaɓti nyi. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Zyaŋ à ɓèngà nyi kì ɓàɓtii à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ yaa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ǹ-yù a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ lɛ u ɓaɓti mɛ̀, nni lannɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ ki yuù yì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Gherɛn lɛ kɛɛ kilɛn fɔlɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ tì roòzì ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll a tɔtɔ̀g. Fɔɔnnɛ Zyaŋ à ki ɓunɛ̀ngà min. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà Yeesus, à kpaŋ yì ɓi mɛ̀nig, nni ɗyoo ɗi nɛmɓɛ̀ngà à ghɛn di Nghay à Bɛ̀ll a sɛnsɛn yi yɛ̀ɛ kuùkuù, à yùyùy nyi ɓi nyoo. 
Nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghày ɓi ɗyoo ì kpaa lɛ: Roànɛ à rì Man wɛm̀ ànɛ ǹkeesii, ɓi nyi nnɛ ǹfogà ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɛ̀m bimiɗ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ Ǹghay à kèngɛ̀ rì Yeesus ɓi-reɓ lɛ Satàn a feèghrɛn nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghagsighà ɓɛ̀ŋwos mɛtin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ wɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ ɗi com, nni zày ì kɔ̀ngà nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹfèèghrɛ̀n-ɓum à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀ngà nyi jàŋbog, à kpaa nyi lɛ: I ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll kali gɔ̀g yi, yɛɛ ghay ɓìɗilàg.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Àa ɓìɗilàg ɓyɔ rì ɓyɔ ɓyɛɛ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ mum a ghɛɓ, lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ bimiɗ ìnɛ ì kpaŋiì ɓi ŋwɔm wu Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni Satàn a tekà nyi, à kɛ̀n ɗì nyi ɓi bàn ìnɛ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn, à ɓɔgsì nyi ɓi fìran fi naà-Bɛ̀ll aɗyòò, 
à kpaa nyi lɛ: I ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll lɛla ɓi zi, lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì kpaà ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom lɛ, ɓɛɛ yu wɔ̀ kì lɛ̀ŋlɛŋi ɓi ɓyàg ɓyaa, lɛ kɔ̀ɔ tuusi ikòò ɓi gɔ̀g.
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ki ri girig kì kànɛn lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèèghrɛn Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ Satàn a tɛ̀gtìghà Yeesus lɛ leg à kɛ̀n ɗì nyi ɓi coo dòn aɗyoo à rèsi nyi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓìcèm, rì rìkem ɗi ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓiǹ. 
À ki kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà ɓyom ɓi ɓìcèm di ù ɓaagh mɛ̀ mɛ̀ɗu asu, ù ɓɔgsì mɛ̀. 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Satàn, pɛ̀sɛn mɛ̀ ɓi mis! Lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔgsii Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀, lɔŋ nyi cɛ̀ncii nnɛ ù kì kìsay. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Satàn à caɗkà min Yeesus. Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ yu nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kikì nyi tìtom.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà lɛ, ɓɛ mɓani Zyaŋ, ɓɛ piìg ɓi naà-zày, nni à kɛ̀ngà a Galile. 
À pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Naazarɛt, à kɛ̀n kì kɔ̀rii a Kapɛrinawum ànɛ à rì jàŋbog rì rìɓày à kìkòn, ɓi kìden ki zi ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Zaɓulon ri ɓɛ Nɛftalii. 
A kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, a roòzi rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à kpaaghà lɛ:
Ziì Zaɓulon rì ì Nɛftalii, jaŋ yi yi ri ɓi bèn ì rìɓày, nsoò lɛ cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ, Galile à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ a yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n! 
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki ɓaghà kìkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi birìm, ki ǹghɛɛ coo kitɛɛtɛ̀n; fɔɔnnɛ kìtɛɛtɛn ki ǹlòmi a ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ǹɗì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓi birìm ì rìwu ɓi ɗùm. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà rìkpaakpàà ɗi ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, à kakàlì ɓum lɛ: Lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna mɛ̀rem, lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ti jàŋbog. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ɓi bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Galile nni à ghɛngà rìgeni ɗi lɛ rì Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛ ǹɗegì lɛ Pyɛɛri rì Andire à geni di ɓɛɛ pìpig dam ɓi rìɓày lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀pììgh-dam. 
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀tiina mɛ̀, di ǹki lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀syoŋì-ɓum. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaskà kì naŋì dam yaa, ɓɛ nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà tì beèbɛ̀y, nni à ghɛɛdìghà tì rìgeni ɗìdɛŋ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn, lɛ rì Zyag rì Zyaŋ ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede. Ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi kìkɔm rì Zeɓede à seŋi wàà, ɓɛ ki pèeghpegsɛ̀n dam yaa, nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaskà kì rinii lɛ rì dam yaa, rì seŋi wàà, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi.
Yeesus à rerènìghà ziì Galile bimiɗ di a rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à lààlàmɓɛ̀n Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll. À wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì tìroɓ rì ɓìlɛm mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Rìkem ɗii ɗi saaghà jàŋbimiɗ a Sirii, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yuyùghày nyi lɛ, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ roròɓkà tìroɓ mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu rì, ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà rìkɛŋ bee lɛ bee, ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, rì ɓɛ̀roɓì kìtìs, rì ɓìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀, Yeesus à ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì ɓɔ. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi pɛsɛ̀ngày lɛ, rì a Galile, rì a bàn ǹtɛ̀ɗ, rì a Yorisalɛm, rì a Zyude, ri cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ, ɓi nɔɔ̀tì nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓìn, nni à ɓɔkà ɓi dòn aɗyoo à kɔ̀rì ɓi zi, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyɛɛ̀tɛ̀n nyi a nyòò. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìrèsàg à kpaa lɛ:
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii lɛ ɓɛ ri nyìighnyìg, ɓi mɛ̀ghay maa ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ri ɓisu wàà.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ri fɔɔsi ɓɔ mɛ̀rem.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri mɛ̀rem lɛ fyòoog, lɛ zi ì ri wooghrɛn ri ɓɔ.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì coo zày lɛ, di saaɗ áa ɓaa, lɛ ɓɛ ɓiì wurii.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wokì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog nyìighnyìg, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ri wog ɓɔ nyìighnyìg.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri mɛ̀rem mɛ̀tɛnɛn, lɛ ɓɛ ri ghɛn Bɛ̀ll.
Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki lɛ, fyòoog a ɓa ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, lɛ ɓɛ ri reŋi ɓɔ lɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll.
Mààgh rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tuutulɛ̀n rì mɛ̀tɔɓ ɓisuu saaɗ, à rìren ɗi ɓiɓan, ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ri ɓìsu wàà.
Yiina lɛ, ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀mààgh di ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ sɛɛsɛmgì mìni, ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀ɓ mìni, ɓɛ ki renɗen mini ɓìɓan ɓi nyoo zàɓ yi aɗyoo yìcèm ɓìsu wɛ̀m. 
Nyàànyaana, ɓì ki sànsam ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀lèɓ min mɛ aɗyoo mɛ teghɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ kighà ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ lokà kì yùu rì mìni.
Mìni yɛɛ rì kìkòn ki ɓi ziinɛ, nni i kìkòn ki mɛ rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ̀ti, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ɓiì kìi lɛ kɛɛ yɛɛ̀ti? Ki rɔɓi lɔŋ lɛ, ɓɛɛ sòɓ kɔ ɓidan, ɓum ɓɛɛ nyɔɔ̀ kɔ rì mɛ̀kòò. 
Mìni yɛɛ ri kìtɛɛtɛn kì ɓi ziinɛ. Bàn ìnɛ ì rì ǹtoŋɛn ɓi dòn aɗyoo ì yin lɛ, ì nyamzɛ̀n. 
Ɓaà ki ròòsi ɓi lamɓà lɛ ɓɛɛ kuɓsi nyi a kìbɔkɔ̀ zi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rɔ̀ɔ̀sag lamɓà lɛ ɓɛɛ saghi nyi ɓi kìrɛsì ki lamɓà aɗyoo, fɔɔnnɛ à kpeŋzì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi naa. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Kìtɛɛtɛn kin ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì lòmi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ, i ɓɛ ghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee, ɓi ɓi kìkì ɓɛ kemzì Tààta wìn anɛ à rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi fèg lɛ ǹ-yùghà lɛ n-yogsi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll, nsoò lɛ, rìrèsàg ɗi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ǹ-yùghà ɓi lɛ ǹ-yogsì ɓyɔ, ǹ-yùghà lɔŋ lɛ, ǹɗoòzi ɓìɓan ɓi miì. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki yɛ̀ɛ ɗyoo rì zi ɓi ri ɓiì ɓaɓaa nsoò maa com àdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna àa pɛ̀sɛn ɓi, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi miì ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ. 
Nni ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì sɛɛtii kibog ki ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi, nsoò lɛ à rèsàg ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ sɛɛti ɓyɔ, nnyɛɛ ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ maa ŋwaàzɛy ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo, kìɓan kifog roànɛ à ɓiì ɓèŋi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓiǹ, à ki rèsag ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ ɓyɔ yɛɛ ɓiì ɓaà gìn i mum ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo. 
Lɛ ǹkalii mìni lɛ; I ɓì kìi bi Bɛ̀ll mɛ̀wog a cee lèg ànɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg, ɓyàa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo.
Ɓi wokà lɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ wey mum. Ŋwaànɛ à woli mum, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ yɔm̀ nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ: ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì woògh bim ri geni, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ yɔm̀ nyi. Ŋwaànɛ à sɛmi geni lɛ kìdùŋdùŋ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ yɔm nyi ɓi sànèdìrɛŋ. Roànɛ à ɓiì reŋii geni lɛ kìyèg, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nni cààmɛ̀n ki ù kɛ̀ɛ kì ɓɔgsii Bɛ̀ll rì kìtuwe ɓi rìkùna, nnɛ ù yitii lɛ goni àdɛŋ à rì wɔ̀ rì bim, 
ka càra kìtuwe kɔɔ foo ɓi ŋwɔŋì wu rikùna ɓi ka pègsɛn yi kìɓan ki lɛ rì wɔ̀ rì goni, di fɔɔnnɛ u sugtiì min ki faà rìfa ɗyɔɔ. 
Wooghrɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɛ̀ mum wɔɔ̀ à kìɓan di ɓi kaka ɓi bee ì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, kɛ̀ɛ̀ fɔlɔɔ, di à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓum, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓum ɓɛ ghagsì wɔ̀ rì ɓɛ̀sujàà, ù ki ghay lɛ ù ɗiŋii naà-zày. 
Ǹkalii wɔ̀ ɓi saaɗ lɛ, wàa kpaŋ ɓì naà-zày ìnɛn di ɓɛɛ ka tɔtɔg wɔ nsoò siisì bog ànɛ u leɓ.
Ɓì wokà lɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kì fisɔ̀mɔ̀g. 
Kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, i mum à fiɓii giɓ à fèg lɛ a kɔrì rì nyi, ŋwàanɛ̀n a yi lɛ à mɛ kì fisɔ̀mɔ̀g rì giɓ anɛ̀n ɓi ǹɗem wii ɓi ɗùm. 
I ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi weèlem ɗi ri lɛ ɗi kɛɓtì wɔ̀ fìɓàg, sɔgha ɗyɔ, u mag̀ ɗyɔ fìràɓ; ɓisuulɛ, ki ri kìrɔɔ lɛ u ɗimzi kìkàɓ kɔɔ kifog à cee lɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ bimiɗ u kɛǹ ɓi ɗuu. 
I càg kɔɔ ki weèlem ki ri lɛ ki kɛɓtì wɔ̀ fìɓàg, rena kɔ u mag̀ kɔ fìràɓ; lɛ ki ri kìrɔɔ lɛ u ɗimzi kìkàɓ kɔɔ kifog à cee lɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ bimiɗ u kɛǹ ɓi ɗuu.
Ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: I mum à nàɓi giɓ wiì à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ nyi kì faà kaàtà ànɛ à rèsii lɛ ɓɛ mɛ ghasɛ̀n. 
Kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ; ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì nàɓi giɓ wiì, di ki yin lɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à kìi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, di à foŋi nyi ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ, a ghày ǹkìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, nni ŋwaànɛ à ki wɔli giɓ anɛ ɓɛ naɓi fɔlɔɔ, à kìi girig fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g.
Ɓì wokà tì lɛ ɓɛ kalìghà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kànɛn bɛ̀ɗ yi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu, kìɓan kifog, ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì roozii ɓìɓan ɓi ù kàagh Kan ù kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ lɛ ù ɓiì kìi. 
Kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ; kɛ̀ ɓi kànag gi bɛ̀ɗ, nsoò rì ɗyoo ɓisuulɛ wɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kɔ̀kɔrii, 
nsoò rì zi lɛ miì nnɛ à rɛrɛsii mɛ̀kòò mii, nsoò rì Yorisalɛm, lɛ nnyɛɛ ri bàn ì rìfòm ɗigwey. 
Kɔ̀ɔ ki kànɛn girig bɛ̀ɗ ri ǹto wɔɔ ɓisuulɛ ù yin lɛ ù puɓsì nsoò lɛ ù fiìzì fyòŋ nsoò fìfog. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, i ɓì kpaa lɛ, ɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓa lɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀, i ɓì kpaa lɛ àg, ki ɓa loŋ lɛ àg, lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yimbog yi yi ɓiì wòŋwoŋi ti foo, yi riì yɛ̀ɛ Satàn.
Ɓì wokà lɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: I ù tùsi mum ɗis ɓɛ tus girig wɔ̀ ɗis; i ù ɓɛɛgh mum ɗin, ɓɛ ɓɛg girig wɔ̀ ɗin. 
Kìɓan kìfog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi pɛ̀ɛ̀zi mum kìɓe ki à kìi mìni; ì ŋwaà ɓoogh wɔ̀ rìɓɛn ɓi rìtam ɗi weèlem, lɛgsi tì nyi ɗimbog lɛ a ɓog miì. 
I ŋwaà sɔmɛɛ wɔ̀ lɛ a ɓatɛn bùɓi yɔ̀ɔ̀, càra nyi a teɗ lɛ ɗì rìga wɔ̀ɔ̀ miì. 
I ŋwaàdɛŋ à kàŋi wɔ̀ lɛ ù kɛɛghi kilòmɛɛ̀tìrɛ̀ bog rì ǹtɛ̀g, kìya ɓɛ̀kilòmɛɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀g wiǹ ɓɛɛ̀ nyi. 
I ŋwaà lɔni wɔ̀ com, faa nyi kɔ̀; kɔ̀ɔ ki yem mum ɓɔ̀ra di à tɔɔgh wɔ̀ ɓɔ̀ra.
Ɓi wokà lɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Keesi ŋwaànɛ à wubsɛɛ wɔ̀, ù ɓèèzɛ̀n bènàbena wɔɔ̀. 
Kìɓan kìfog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, keesiina ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓin, ɓì màŋ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ cɛ̀ncɛm mini, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n mìni, ɓì kì ɓɔ kìrɔɔ, ɓì ki ɓɔ̀ŋzag Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ yeeyeèsì mìni, ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀ɓ mìni, 
di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɔn ɓɛ Seŋi wìn anɛ à rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓì ɗùm, lɛ nyii ti à lòmzàg ŋwos wii ɓisuu ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum, rì ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ syeesyee, à ki nɔsag ti bwey ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, rì ɓisuu ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ. 
I ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ keesag mini ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓì keesii ɓɔrìɓɔ, mɛ̀lèɓ aɗi mɛɛ̀mɛ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ɓoŋɓòŋ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll? Nsoò ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg girig fɔlɔɔ. 
I ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɔrìɓɔ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì tògsàg, di ɓi ka ki bi kiɓan ki nyɔ̀n; lɛ nsoò ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg girig fɔlɔɔ. 
Ɓaana min ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ ɓum lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta wìn anɛ à rì aɗyoo nyii ri.
Konaaghna lɛ, kìsay ki ɓi kìki Bɛ̀ll kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ɓi rèeresɛ̀n ɓi mis mɛ ɓum, di ɓì ɓiì ki mɛ̀mi mɛlèɓ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi wìn anɛ à rì aɗyòò.
Cààmɛ̀n ki u fafa ŋwaà nyìighnyìg com, kɔ̀ɔ ɓog ǹkeŋ lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ wɔ̀, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm, ìghèy ɓi ɗùm ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg, ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, rì ɓi ɓìɓàà lɛ ɓɛɛ sɛsɛg ɓɔ. Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, mɛ̀lèɓ maa mɛɛ ri lɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki u fafa ŋwaà nyìighnyìg com, càg kɔɔ ki kimɛŋ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki yiì com ki càg ki weèlem ki faa; 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìfa ɗyɔɔ ɗi ɓiì ɓaà a rìnyam; nni Seŋi wɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ à ti à ghɛngì ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam, à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì lèɓi.
Cààmɛ̀n ki ɓi kìki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi ki yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg rìɓɔŋzàg ɗi Bɛ̀ll mɛ̀rɛy, ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, rì ɓi bèn yi ɓiɓàà lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ seèsee ɓɔ. Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ; ɓɛ ti rì mɛ̀lèɓ maa yɛɛ lɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i ù ti ɓiì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh Bɛ̀ll, ɗiŋi ɓi kìden kɔɔ ki naa, u sim̀ ìsuunaa, di u ɓɔŋzag Seŋi wɔ̀ɔ̀ anɛ àrì ɓi jàŋ inɛ a rìnyam ìnɛ̀n, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Tààta wɔ̀ɔ̀ anɛ à ti à ghɛngì ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì lèɓi.
I ɓi ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋzàg Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ ɓi ràŋzi ki kpaakpàà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg. Lɛ ɓɔɔ̀ fèki lɛ, i ɓɛ ciɓtaagh rìkpaakpàà, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓàg bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yàà. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi pisɛn ɓɔ ɓi kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ kiǹ, ɓisuulɛ Seŋi wìn a yii com kìcèm ki ɓi kɔ̀nkɔ̀n, di ɓì ka tɔg gi ɓi nyi kɔ.
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh Bɛ̀ll fɛlɛ: Tààta wìs ànɛ à rì aɗyoo
ɗii ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ ɓa kìcèlì, rìlàmì ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ yu, rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ kilɛn ɓi ziinɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɗyɛɛ̀ kìikilɛ̀n aɗyòò.
Faa ɓìsi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓìsi ɓi ŋwos a gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Cenɛn ɓìsi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓɛn ɓi tì mɛ kì, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi girig tì mɛ cenɛn ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ kighà ɓìsi kìɓe.
Kɔ̀ɔ gherɛn lɛ, ti kpi ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn ɓi ɗùm, lɔŋ pisi ɓìsi ɓi kìɓe, lɛ rìlàmì, rì ìtèɗ, rì rìkem ɓi ri ɓyom ɓyɔɔ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n
Lɛ i ɓì cenɛɛ ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓɛ kii mìni Seŋi wìn anɛ aɗyoo à cenɛ̀n girig mìni; 
kìɓan kifog, ì ɓì cenɛɛ ɓi ɓum kìɓe ki ɓɛ kii mìni. Seŋi wìn àa cenɛn ɓi mini, girig ɓìɓe ɓin.
Cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì rì ɓi kìcèlì ki ɓiɗilàg kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ɓi wowog bim, yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ kagàg mɛ̀su lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yi lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓi kìcèlì ki ɓiɗilàg. Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓɛ ti rì mɛ̀lèɓ maa. 
Kìɓan kifog, cààmɛ̀n ki ù cèlii ɓìɗilàg, foŋɗɛn tìrààree ɓi ǹto, ù ki sòò ìsu wɔɔ 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ wàa rèsi ɓi ɓum lɛ ù rì ɓi kìcèlì ki ɓiɗilàg, lɔŋ Soŋi ànɛ à rì a rìnyam cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ ri ɓiì ghɛɛ̀. Nni Soŋi ànɛ à ti à ghɛngì ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì lèɓi rikì ɗiǹ.
Kɛ̀ ɓi saasaɓtàg ìkum win fɛ ɓi ziinɛ jàŋ inɛ Zyèɗ rì geègee ɓi ti ɓi yogsàg wɔ, nsoò lɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ̀wiiwìì ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓɛkì naa, ɓɛ yii wɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ saɓtaaghna ìkum win ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm lɛ wɔɔ nnɛ Zyèɗ rì geègee ɓi yin lɛ ɓi yogsì wɔ, nsoò ɓɛ̀wiiwìì ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɓɛg jàŋ wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ yiì wɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ, jàŋ inɛ ìkum wɔɔ wu ri wɔɔ nnɛ ǹɗem wɔɔ wu ri ɓiì ɓaà girig.
Ɗis ɗyɛɛ ri lamɓà ànɛ ɓi nyoo ì mum; i ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi ri lɛ syeesyee, nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ bimiɗ ì ɓa lɛ kperèèŋ; 
kìɓan kifog i ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗi yin lɛ syeesyee, nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ bimiɗ ì ɓiì ɓaà ɓi birìm. Nni i kìtɛɛtɛn ki ki ri ɓi wɔ ki ti birìm, birìm ìnɛn ì rì ɓiì tèghɛɛ ì cee.
Mum à yin lɛ à say ɓɛ̀masà ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓisuulɛ, à rì ɓiì ɓèèzɛɛ bog, à keesì roàmbog; nsoò lɛ à ràrɛ̀n rì bogtɛ̀n, à sɛɛtì roàmbog. Ɓì yin lɛ ɓì say lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni cààmɛ̀n kìfog.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkpaa mìni lɛ: mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki ɓiɗilàg ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ mɛmɛni ɓyɛɓ ɓin nsoò lɛ ɓisuu ɓilàà ɓi ɓyɛɛ lɔg nyoo yìn; mɛ̀ɛ nti cɛɓ ki cee ɓìɗilàg, nyoo ì cee ɓìlàà yèè? 
Ghɛɛna ɓà tììlì ti aɗyoo ti ti ri lɛ, tyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ say dɛm, tyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ saŋ ɓiɗilàg, tyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki nyam com rì com ɓi zarò, wɔ̀lɛ Seŋi wìn anɛ à rì aɗyoo à ti à falàg tyɔ ɓìɗilàg. Ɓì yii ɓì nya lɛ rìɓa ɗin ɗi cee ɗi tììlì tiǹ lɛ vɔ̀ɔ̀m? 
Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛ ri lɛ à ràɓsì cɛɓ kii nsoò lɛsàg, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ à ɓiisɛɛ kì ghɛ̀ghɛrii nɗem aɗyoo?
Nni mɛ̀rem min mɛɛ̀ cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm rì kìɓan ki nwaà lɛ cɛ? Fiɓiina yɛ̀ɛ ɓyaaɓi ɓi ɓi dɛm ɓi ti ɓi tɔɓkì, ɓyaaɓi ɓi ti ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ say, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki tìŋ ɓìlàà; 
kìɓan kifog, ǹkalii mìni lɛ, nsoò Salomɔŋ nyimiɗ ɓi rìkem ɗii ɗicèm, à waatɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓilàà ɓi rɔɔtɛn yɛ̀ɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓyaaɓi ɓiǹ. 
I Bɛ̀ll à ti à rɛ̀gì ɓyaaɓi ɓi ɓi dɛm fɔlɔɔ, ɓyaaɓi ɓi ɓi ri lɛ, gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓi ɓa wɔɔ, rìduri ɓɛ pig ɓyɔ ɓi ɗuu, lannɛ à ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi lɛ à waasii ɓi mini ɓìlàà, mìni ɓumɓɛ maa rìgherɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓɛ? 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛ̀ghɛri min mɛrem aɗyoo di ɓi kpaakpaa lɛ: Tì rì ɓiì ɗiì cɛ, tì nɔ cɛ, nsoò lɛ, cɛ tì rì ɓà ɓiì waatɛɛ yɔ? 
Ɓyom ɓìn, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii bi Bɛ̀ll ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ raŋzàg ɓyɔ kì kaakaa, wɔ̀lɛ Seŋi wìn anɛ à rì aɗyoo à yii lɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà rì ɓyɔ. 
Looghna kì kaà kìlɔ̀ŋ kii rì saaɗ wìì, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ri mìni ɓiì sagtɛɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛ̀ri ǹɗem aɗyoo rì rìduri, lɛ rìduri a ɓiì yùu ri ɓìɓan ɓii; ŋ̀wos bimiɗ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì ntɔɓ wìì.
Kɛ̀ ɓi yɔ̀mgi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓaa yɔ̀m ɓi girig mìni. 
Lɛ lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yɔ̀mi ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog innɛ ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì yɔ̀mi; vèg ìnɛ ɓì ti ɓì fèkì ɓum miì, yɛɛ̀nɛ ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì fèegh miì. 
Lannɛ kìfɛfɛy ki ki ri goni ɓi ɗis kɛɛ̀ki ù ghɛɛ, kɔ̀ɔ ghɛn nwɔ̀g wu wɔ̀ ɓi ɗis? 
Nsoò lɛ, lannɛ ù rì lɛ ù kpaa goni lɛ: Kìya m̀pisi wɔ̀ kìfɛfɛy ki ki ri wɔ̀ ɓi ɗis, kɔm̀ lɛ ǹwɔ̀g wu ri ɓi ɗiŋkɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀ ŋwaà fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ka logha kì pisii ǹwɔ̀g wu wɔ̀ ɓi ɗis di Fɔɔnnɛ u konag kì ghɛɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ u pisi kìfɛfɛy ki ki ri ɓi ɗis ɗi goni.
Kɛ̀ ɓi falag bu ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri kìcèlì, kɛ̀ ɓi ki teki tìcaka tin ɓi pìg ɓɔn ɓɛ jèè tyɔ, lɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ nyɔ̀ɔ̀ghì tyɔ rì mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn yi lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaski mìni.
Lonina fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì faà, kaana fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓiì tanɛɛ, ɓooghna naa fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri mìni yɔ̀ ɓiì nɛmì. 
Ɓisuulɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à lɔni, nnɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ falàg. Roànɛ à kaa, nnyɛɛ ti à ghɛngì, ŋwaànɛ à ɓoogh naa, nnɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ nɛmgì yɔ̀. 
Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛ ri lɛ à fa man wiì kìɗun ki gɔ̀g di a lɔni nyi ɓìɗilàg? 
Nsoò lɛ à fa nyi kìɗyòs di à lɔni nyi kìzɛn? 
I mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓeɓtɛɛ mɛ̀rem ɓɛ, ɓì yii rìfa ɗi ɓɔn ɓin ɓyom ɓi syeesyee, lannɛ Seŋi wìn anɛ à rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm yɛɛ ri ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ɛ fa ɓyom ɓi syeesyee a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lɔni nyi ɓyɔ.
Com kìcèm ki ɓi kɔ̀ngi lɛ di ɓum ɓaa kìi mìni, mìni girig, kìlaaghna ɓɔ kɔ, lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìrèsàg ɗi ɓiɗɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis rì ɗi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɗi ri. 
Ɗiŋiina ɓisuunaa wu wu ri lɛ sɔgsɔ̀ɔ̀g ɓisuulɛ ìsuunaa wu wu ri wù fùùghrɛn, rì bee inɛ ì rì ǹgbɛ̀ŋɛn ɓyɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀zì mum a rìɗyaŋ. Nni ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ̀ ki fyeefyee miì. 
Kìɓan kifog ìsuunaa wu a cɛɓ, rì bee inɛ a cɛɓ, ɓi ri lɛ Sɔgsɔ̀ɔ̀g, nni ɓum lɛsàg ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ tanàg bee inɛ̀n.
Konaaghna rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ yulàg mìni a nyoo ɓɛ̀pàmɓɛn gòò ì jɔ̀ɔ̀, wɔ̀lɛ wɔɔ ɓiɗùm, ɓɛ ɓa ɓìmonɗo ɓi ɓaaɓanɛ̀n. 
Ɓì rì ɓɔ ɓiì yiì ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì maa; ɓaà kɛs bi gas ɓi kìtwìɗ ki keŋ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki kɛs dii ɓi ǹɗyèm wu riwòm. 
Syeesyee à kìte bimiɗ à ti à wumgì ɓìɗùn ɓi syeesyee; kìɓeɓtàg ki kite ki wumgì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɗùn. 
Syeesyee à kìte a yin lɛ à ɓa rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɗùn, fɔɔnnɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki kite ki yin girig lɛ ki ɓa rì ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓiɗùn. 
Kìte kicèm ki kaa wum ɓi ɓiɗùn ɓì syeesyee, kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri ɓiì reni, ɓɛ woǹ ɓi ɗuu. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɗùn ɓyaa, ɓyɛɛ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓi yi rìkuu ɗi ɓum ɗi ɓɛ ri.
Àa ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ rereŋi mɛ lɛ: Kan, Kan ɓɛɛ ri ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò, lɔŋ roànɛ à kìi rìkɔ̀n ɗi Tààta wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, nnyɛɛ ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ wɔɔ. 
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ri kpaa gɛ mɛ̀ ɓi ŋ̀wos anɛ̀n lɛ: Kan, Kan àa ɓi ɗii ɗyɔɔ nnɛ tì kpaàkpàŋzìghà ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll? Àa rì ɗii ɗyɔɔ nnɛ tì nànàɓkà ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay? Ti kìkìghà ɓi nya dàm yi ɓiɓan lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɗii ɗyɔɔ? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkalii gɛ ɓɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ, ǹka yighà ɓi mini nsoò ŋwos bog, pɛ̀sɛɛna mɛ̀ ɓi mis, mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìɓe ɓɛ!
Nni fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à woogh ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpaa ɓi, à ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɓyɔ à ɓiì pisɛɛ ŋwaà ɗyomzɛ̀n ànɛ à togà mɛɛ mii ɓi rìɓan aɗyòò. 
Yɛ̀ɛ bwey ì nɔghà, ɓɛ̀poɓɓo ɓɛ ɓɛngì, bɛ̀ɓ ì fɛɓsì, ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi roŋɗɛ̀n ɓi mɛɛ mɛǹ, mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpìlag, lɛ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ toŋɛn ɓi rìɓan. 
Kìɓan kifog mum ǹcèm ànɛ à woogh ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpaa ɓi, kɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɓyɔ, à pisɛɛ kìdùŋdùŋ ki mum ki ki togà mɛɛ ɓi sɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ bwey ì nɔghà, ɓɛ̀poɓɓo ɓɛ ɓɛngì, bɛ̀ɓ ì fɛɓsì, ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi yu kì roŋɗɛɛ ɓi mɛɛ mɛn, nni mɛ kpilàkà mɛ ki wààrɛn syeesyee à rìwààrɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì ɓii ɓiǹ, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ kuuràkà rìkuu ɗii ɗi rirèsàg ɗiǹ; 
ɓisuulɛ, rìrèsàg ɗii ɗi ɓaghà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, nyii rèrèsàkà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ faa ìtèɗ lɛ a reèrèsàg ɓum.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à sɛngày ɓi dòn, ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi. 
Nni kukwiy adɛŋ à yùghà nyi a nyoo, à ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi di a kakali lɛ: Kan, ì ki kɔni wɔ̀, ù ri lɛ ù kì lɛ, mɓa ti lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à nàmgà càg, à kòm ŋwaànɛ̀n à kpaa lɛ: Ki kɔni mɛ̀, ɓaya lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀. Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì wɔ̀ni kwiy wiì lɔŋ wɔɔ foo. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèg ki ɓùŋi mum kìɓan ki, kɛ̀na lɔŋ, u resɛn yɛ̀ɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, u ki fa rifa ɗi Moyis à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ falag di mum à wɔ̀ni kwiy, di rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ resi ɓɔ lɛ, ù mɛ wɔ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà a Kapɛrinawum nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà àdɛŋ à yùghà nyi a nyoo 
à yɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg, à kpaa lɛ: Kan! ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ a nɔ̀nɔŋii a mɛɛ, kɛ̀ɛ bee inɛ lɛ a pɛsɛn aɗyòò; a ki wowog rikɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zi nyi lɛ: Ǹɗi ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ nyi kì ɓoò. 
Ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan! ǹkpaŋi ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ, ù ɗiŋì ɓi naa yɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog, kali lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ŋwɔm yɔ̀riyɔ̀, di ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ a wɔǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ, màànɛ ǹɗì ànɛ, ǹɗì ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lamii mɛ̀, ǹki ɓa girig rì ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ mɛ̀ ǹlàmii; i nkalii àdɛŋ lɛ, kɛ̀na, à kɛ̀n, ǹkalì roàmbog lɛ, yuiy, à yùy, nsoò ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀, i nkpaa nyi lɛ kìya rìkuu ɗi kiɓan ɗi, à kì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà ɓìtòkì ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n à tòòghrɛ̀ngà ɓiǹ à kuughràg, à kpaa ɓumɓɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ǹka tanɛn ɓi coo righerɛ̀n ɗi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ nsoò a Isirayɛl. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ pɛ̀sɛɛ gɛy lɛ rì a rìkpagìì ɗi ŋwos rì a rìnɔ̀ŋɗàg ɗi ŋwos, ɓɛ yu kì kɔ̀rii ɓi teɓèrè ǹɗaŋ ri Abiraham rì Isag rì Yakɔɓ, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ kɔrì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓɛ tyɔɔ gɛ ɓi birìm ìnɛ ɓidan, wɔɔ nnɛ ɓum ɓɛ rèerèèdɛɛ gɛ, di ɓɛɛ̀ ŋàaŋaàdì min. 
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà ànɛn lɛ: Kɛ̀na, kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ wàa gherɛɛ lɛ ki ri lɛ ki kilɛ̀n. Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ nnɛ ǹkìì-kìsay a ŋwaànɛ̀n à wɔ̀ngà.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà min a mɛɛ mɛ Pyɛɛri a tanɛ̀n jɛɛ gili Pyɛɛri di à nɔ̀nɔŋii lɛ à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kòmgà ǹcìli Pyɛɛri ànɛn ɓi càg, rìɓa ɗi à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g ɗi leèg. Fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à kàà ɓɔ ɓìɗilàg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, ɓɛ yuiy nyi rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey, fɔɔnnɛ à nàɓkà ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɛroroɓ mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
À kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, a roozi kìɓan ki ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à kpaaghà lɛ: À tekà ɓìlɛm ɓi tì ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ, à ki tɛ̀g ti tiroɓ tis.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà di kìtuu ki ɓum ki mɛ kɔ̀mzɛn nyi nni à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna adɛŋ à yùghà nyi à nyoo, a kpaa lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii jàŋbimiɗ ìnɛ ù kɛ̀ɛ. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓìbina ɓi ri rì mɛ̀kuɓi, tììlì ti aɗyoo rì ɓìlaa, wɔ̀lɛ Man à mum à yin ɗi jàŋ inɛ a fɔɔ̀sag. 
Nni roàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓɛyilàg ɓii a kpaatìghà nyi lɛ: Kan! ka càra mɛ̀, mɓay kì ɓòmi tààta wɛ̀m. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀ u caɗ ɓìloŋ ɓyɛɛ ɓom̀ ɓìloŋ ɓyaa.
Yeesus à ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ coo bɛ̀ɓ ì tumɛ̀ngà rìfɛɓsì ɓi rìɓày rì ìtèɗ lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓìkus ɓi sigtɛ̀ngà kìkɔm, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà ɓi fìlo. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngà nyi jàŋbog ɓɛ ghemzì nyi, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ghɛɓsi ɓìsi, Kan tì cuu yɛɛ lɛ̀. 
Nyii kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi rirìsì? Mìni ɓum ɓɛ maa rìgherɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓɛ! Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà min aɗyoo à fwààdɛ̀n lɛ rì bɛ̀ɓ rì rìɓày, jàŋ i sugtì kì maarɛɛ lɛ fyòoog. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuughràkà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ tɔɔghrɛ̀n lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi mum adi ɗyɛɛ rì lɛ, ɗi nsoò bɛ̀ɓ nsoò rìɓày ɓyɛɛ̀ kìki mɛwog?
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kɛngà kì kpaŋì cɛcɛɗ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Gadara, nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, ɓɛ kpagày ɓi dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ yu kìtuusɛɛ ri nyi. Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn ki nyɛngà lèg ànɛ, mum àa ǹti kɛ̀ɛ ghɛɛsi lɛ a fyeè ɓi bee inɛ̀n. 
Nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìfwànfwàn jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Wɔ̀ Man a Bɛ̀ll, ki rì Wɔ̀ la ri ɓìsi? Ù yùu yì fɛ lɛ, u fa ɓìsi ǹtɔɓ di cààmɛ̀n ki ka ghɛɛ̀sɛn ɓi? 
Coo kituu ki jèè ki ɓaghà ɓiì ɗiɗii yi ɓyaaɓi fɛlɛ kìpàs. 
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Yeesus di ɓyɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: I ki kɔni wɔ̀ lɛ u naɓ ɓìsi, roma ɓìsi ɓi kìtuu ki jèè ki. 
Yeesus à kpaa ɓyɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna! Fɔɔnnɛ ɓi kpagà ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓi kɛǹ kì ɗiŋii ɓi jèè. Nni kìtuu ki jèè kiǹ ki pwaŋighày ɓi dòn aɗyoo, ki suurɛ̀n ɓi rìɓày kìcèm, jèè, yiǹ yi cuu mɛ̀nig. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋgà jèè yin ɓɛ ghɛŋighà, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɓi bàn lɛ ɓɛɛ kali ɓum kìɓan kiǹ, à ɓiisɛ̀n kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛǹ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay. 
Nni bàn bimiɗ ì kɛ̀ɛ̀ghrɛ̀ngày lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ Yeesus; lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi, nni ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàkà nyi lɛ, a pɛsɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa.
Yeesus à ɓɔkà kìkɔm, à syàà rìɓày à kɛ̀n ɓi bàn yìì . 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yughày nyi rì kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kì nɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn ɓi kon. Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ, nni à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Man wɛm̀ kɔ̀ɔ risi, com ki yin, ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓì cenɛn. 
Ɓisuu rìkpaa ɗìn nnɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ fekà ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ a feefengì Bɛ̀ll. 
Yeesus à yighà ɓɛ̀fèg ɓaa, nni à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi rì rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓɛfèg ɓi mɛ̀rem min? 
Kìɓan aɗi kɛɛ yeesɛɛ fòò? Rìkpaa ɗi lɛ ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn gìn, ɗi lɛ pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo u kɛɛ̀ghi? 
Nni ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓi yi lɛ, Man à mum à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à cenɛ̀n ɓum ɓìɓe fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, Yeesus à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀ u sug a mɛɛ mɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à sug a mɛɛ mii. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gwìy ì ɓum ì ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ìris wu ɓan yɔ̀, ì ki kemzi Bɛ̀ll lɛ, à mɛ fa ɓum rìkuu ɗi itèɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɗiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo à tumɛ̀n ɗìghaàgh, fɔɔnnɛ à ghɛngà ŋwaàdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Matyoo di à kɔ̀kɔrii jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ m̀peeghì làmpoŋ̀, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀. Matyoo à pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo, a nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi. 
Yeesus à ɗiɗìghà ɓìɗilàg a mɛɛ mɛ Matyoo; ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ yughà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɗiyɛn ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus, rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii. 
Yɛɛ̀ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ tɔg ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ǹɗèsàg wìn a ɗiɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà rìkpaa ɗyaa ɗiǹ, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓiì roroɓi, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa zày rì dɔgtà, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg rì zày yìì. 
Kɛ̀ɛna kì yilaagh azi anɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ: Ǹkeesii ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg à cee ɓìfùna ɓi ɓìtuwe. Lɛ, ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki reŋii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, ǹ-yùghà lɔŋ ki reŋii ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ yughày Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓìsi rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ tì ti tì cèlàg ɓìɗilàg ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓidɛŋ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cèli? 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀reŋiyɛn a tìcàɓ ti riwɛy ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì rìnɗemikɛŋɛn, cààmɛ̀n ki ŋwaà-rìwɛy à kaka ǹɗaŋ rì ɓɔ. Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛɛ pisi ŋwaà-rìwɛy ɓi nyìinyìm wàà ki tiì. Cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri ɓiì cèlii ɓiɗilàg miì. 
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à teɗ Zyònà ì kìlàà ki nyɔn lɛ a raɗki kìtùg ki kilàà miì, ɓisuulɛ, Zyònà ì nyɔn ì rì ɓiì tùnii kilàà ki kitùg, ɗyas ɗi teghɛ̀n tì. 
Ɓaa ki foŋ ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìtùg ɓi ɓiren, i ù kìi fɔlɔɔ, ɓìren ɓi wulàg, mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ɗyɛɛrɛn, ɓìren ɓyɔmiɗ ɓi ki ɗyaŋ. Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fogi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìren ɓi nyɔn; fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi finɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di a ka tòtog fɔlɔɔ ri ɓɔ, nni rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɗiɗɛŋ ɗi yughày ɗi ɓag nyi mɛ̀ɗu asu, ɗi kpaa lɛ: Gɔ̀n yɛ̀m ì wii yì lɔŋ ɓigomìnɛ, nni yu, u saagh yɔ̀ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo di yɛ̀ɛ ghemɓɛn. 
Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii.
Nni giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ à roròɓkà fìroɓ fi lɛ bwaɓ yɛɛ kpaŋkpaŋ nyi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, di fìroɓ fìn fi ti bèg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì yiɓɛɛ̀, à yùghày Yeesus ajɛ̀m, à kòm rìkeɓ ɗii ɗi kilàà. 
À fèfèkà ɓi nɗem wii lɛ: I m̀mànɛɛ kì kòmi nsoò kìlàà kii, di ǹwɔ̀ni. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngày, à ghɛn giɓ anɛ̀n, à kpaa lɛ: Iyà kɔ̀ɔ risi, com ki yin, rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi wɔɔ̀zii wɔ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à ghàskà kì wɔ̀ni.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagà a mɛɛ mɛ rifòm ɗiǹ à tanɛ̀n di ɓɛ̀rɔŋì-zàro ɓɛ ti wɔɔ, di gwìy ì ti lɛ nyìnì-nyìnì, ɓi riwù, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: 
Ghaaghraaghnà, mutyàà giɓ anɛ, à wii ɓì, à rì yɛɛri ɓi fìlo, nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìwɔ̀wɛ̀y. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n ì panìghà, nni à ɗiŋighà ɓi naa, à ɓan mutyàà giɓ anɛ à wughà ànɛn ɓi càg; mutyàà giɓ a pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo. 
Fɔɔnnɛ gom ì kìɓan kiǹ ì sààghà ɓi kilànà ki zi kiǹ kìcèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà rì rìghaàgh, nni ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi, ɓɛ laàlàmɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Man à Davit, wogha ɓìsi nyìighnyìg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà a mɛɛ, nni ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngày nyi a nyoo, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì gherɛɛ nya lɛ ǹɗì lɛ m̀ɓoo mìni? Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Kan, tì ghèrɛɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kòmgà min ɓɔ ɓi mis à kpaa lɛ: Kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓyàa gherɛɛ lɛ ki ri lɛ ki kilɛ̀n. 
Nni mis maa mɛ ŋwarɛ̀ngà, Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀n min ɓɔ syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsɛ̀n à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi fèg ki kìi lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ a yi kìɓan ki. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagày foo, ɓɛ tum rìsààtì ɗi ɗii ɗi Yeesus kòdò ànɛn bimiɗ. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛngà, ɓɛ yu tì Yeesus ɗì ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, nyi mùm-mùm. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à nàɓkà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn, mùm-mùm anɛ̀n à tòòghrɛ̀n; gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ i kuuràkà, ì kpaa lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi kiɓan ɗi fɛlɛ ɗi ka ghɛnɛ̀ngà ɓi a Isirayɛl cààmɛ̀n kidɛŋ. 
Kìɓan kifòg Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɔɔ kpaakpààghà lɛ: Yeesus a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu rifòm ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà lɛ rì ɓi bàn yìcèm rì ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ̀cèm di a rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yaa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à kakàlì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì tìròɓ, rì ɓìlɛm mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum, nni nyìighnyìg ì kìghà nyì rì ɓyɔ, lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ fɔlɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ ɓi nyoo fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi yi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kalìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Mɛ̀saŋ mɛ ri mɛ̀ tèghɛn, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛsàg. 
Ɓɔ̀ŋzaaghna min ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀saŋ lɛ a rom yì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓi dɛm yiì ì mɛ̀saŋ.
Nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à fa ɓɔ ìtèɗ wu ɓɛɛ kiki lɛ, ɓɛ nanàɓ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, ɓɛ wɔɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zì tìroɓ rì ɓìlɛm mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Mii mɛ ɓumɓɛ à romgà ɓɛǹ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ mɛ ri lɛ: Ǹtonto, Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ Pyɛɛri rì Andire à geni; Zyag, man à Zeɓede rì geni ànɛ lɛ Zyaŋ; 
Filiɓ rì Batelemi, Tomas, rì Matyoo à ǹterì làmpoŋ̀. Zyag à man à Alfe rì Tadee 
Simɔn ànɛ àa ǹti à cakàg rì kìlòŋ kii, rì Zyudas Iskariyot, ŋwaànɛ à kàɓkà Yeesus.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ Yeesus à romgà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à siitàg ɓɔ lɛ:
Kɛ̀ ɓi kɛ̀n a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɗiŋi ɓi bàn yi a Samari, kɛ̀ɛna lɔŋ a ɓɔni jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ ɓɛ ɗimgà. 
Kɛ̀nkɛnina di ɓi kakali ɓum bee bimiɗ lɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki mɛ yù ɓɔ jàŋbog. 
Wɔ̀ɔ̀ziina ɓɛ̀roroɓ, ɓì ghèèghèmzì ɓìloŋ, ɓì kì lɛ ɓɛ̀kukwiy ɓɛɛ ɓa ti lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yàà, ɓi ki nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghày; Yɛ̀ɛ ɓì làagh ɓi itèɗ wiǹ, ghɛɓsiina girig ɓum, kɛ̀ ɓi tɔg ɓɔ com. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi teɗ nsoò gol, nsoò mɔ̀ɔ̀ni lɛ ɓi sɔy ɓi ɓɛ̀ɓàm; 
kɛ̀ ɓi ki teɗ nsoò ɓɛ̀ɓàm ɓɛ rikɛ̀ɛ̀, nsoò buɓi yiɓɛɛ̀, nsoò gòò, nsoò kìgeŋ, ɓisuulɛ ǹkìì-kìsay a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ fa nyi ɓìɗilàg ɓii. 
Ɓi bàn bimiɗ, rì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓì kpaŋi wɔɔ, tɔɔghna ǹkòo ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ à ghàɓ mìni à rì wɔɔ, kɔ̀riina yɛ̀ɛ ŋ̀waànɛ̀n à kpaŋ cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì ɓiì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n. 
I ɓì ti ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi naa ì mum, kaliina lɛ: Fyòoog a ɓa rì mìni. 
I ɓumɓɛ ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n ɓɛ ghaɓi mìni, fyòoog ànɛ ɓi rìì ɗì nyi à ɓa ɓi ɓɔ, wɔ̀lɛ ì ɓɛ ghaɓi ɓi mini, fyòoog wìn a sugtìì mìni ɓi nyòò. 
I ɓɛ ɓeni mìni kì ghàɓi, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ ɓeni kì woògh ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kpaakpàà, kpaŋina ɓi naa nsoò lɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓeni mìni ìnɛ̀n wɔɔ, ɓi kwiɗ kùrùɓu ànɛ mìni ɓi mɛ̀kòò. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓumɓɛ a Sɔdɔm rì Gɔmɔɔr ɓɛ ri ɓaa gɛ tì rì ziŋ à cee ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn.
Nni mɛ̀ ǹɗomi lɔŋ mini yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔni jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìmonɗo, fɔɔnnɛ ɓaana rì ɗyomzɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ nyoo, ɓì ki ɓa ri mɛ̀rem mɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kuùkuù. 
Konaaghna rì ɓum ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ri mìni ɓi naa yi ɓɛyɔ̀m, ɓɛ ki ɓog mini kìtòn ɓi naa yaa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. 
Ɓi rì ɓiì rɛlii mɛkpaà ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà, rì mɛ mɛfòm ɓisu wɛ̀m lɛ di ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛɛzì kiɓan kɛm̀ lɛ rì ɓi mis maa rì ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kifog, i ɓɛ ɓani mìni, mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n rì com ki ɓì rì lɛ ɓì kpaa, nsoò lɛ lannɛ ɓì ɓiì pɛ̀sii ɓitòkì; ɓìɓan ɓi ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpaà ɓi ri mìni ɓiì ɓɔghìì ɓi mɛ̀rem ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ àa mìniì ɓɔmiɗ yɛɛ ɓiì tòtoogh, lɔŋ Nghay à Seŋi wìn nnyɛɛ ri ɓiì tòtoogh ɓi mɛ̀rem min.
Ki ri ɓa lɛ, mum à tɔ̀kɛ̀n geni lɛ ɓɛɛ wey, seŋi à tɔ̀kɛ̀n man, ɓɔn ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ̀yalì ɓaa, ɓɛ ki cuusi ɓɔ. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri ɓèèzɛn mini ɓisuu ɗii ɗyɛ̀m; wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à sììrɛɛ à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n nnyɛɛ ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ cɛɓ. 
I ɓɛ kii mìni ǹtɔɓ ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ, ɓì ghɛŋì ɓi bàn ìmbòg; ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓyàa pumzɛn ɓi bàn yi a Isirayɛl yìcèm di Man à mum à ka yuiy ɓi.
Mutyàà cilag a cee ɓi ǹɗèsàg wìì, ǹkìì-kìsay kɛ̀ɛ ki cee masà wìì. 
Kɛɛ tɔtɔg lɔŋ lɛ, n-yilàg a kpaŋ̀ ɓi ǹɗɛli wu ǹɗèsàg wìì, ǹkìì-kìsay girig, à kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wu masà wìì; i ɓɛ mɛ ròò ŋwaàmɛɛ ɗii lɛ: Bɛlzeɓul, ɓɛ ɓiì ròo ɓum ɓii mii mɛ mɛ ɓeɓtaagh mɛ cee fɔlɔɔ.
Kɛ̀ ɓi risi ɓɔ, ɓisuulɛ kìɓan kidɛŋ ki a rìnyam kaa rɔ̀ɓ ɓi lɛ, ki kpagii ɓi dan, nsoò dwìɗ idɛŋ yàa rɔ̀ɓ ɓi lɛ ì yilɛɛ ɓi. 
Nni com ki mɛ̀ ǹkɔ̀ŋdɛɛ mìni ɓi birìm, kaliina kɔ rì ŋ̀wos, ki ǹŋwɔ̀ŋii mìni ɓi-reè, làmɓɛɛna kɔ ɓi bwèy aɗyòò. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi risi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ i ɓɛ woli mɛ̀mùù, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti ri bee ìnɛ ɓɛɛ wey ǹghay; risiina lɔŋ roànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, à wey lɛ, rì mɛ̀mùù rì ǹghay ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kàɓ nya ɓɛ̀fyas ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn ɓi dolà bog? Nni nsoò fyas bog à ti kɛ̀ɛ kpì zi di Seŋi wìn a gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ à kpi. 
Nsoò tyòŋ ti mìni ɓi ǹto, ti ri tìɓàlɛn ticèm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ ɓi risi com, lɛ rìɓa ɗi mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni ɗi cee com ki ɓɛ̀fyas lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ tɔn. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓi gwìy ì ɓum, mɛ̀ ngherɛɛ gɛ girig nyi ɓi mis mɛ Tààta wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyòò. 
Kìɓan kifog ì ŋwaà roòzɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓi gwìy ì ɓum, mɛ̀ ǹɗoòzɛɛ gɛ girig nyi ɓi mis mɛ Tààta wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyòò
Kɛ̀ ɓi fèg lɛ, ǹ-yùghà lɛ ǹfa fyòoog ɓi ziinɛ; ǹ-yùghà ɓì lɛ ǹfa fyòoog, ǹ-yùghà lɔŋ lɛ, m̀ɓigtì wɛ̀y. 
Lɛ ǹ-yùghà kì naŋì gasɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì man rì seŋi, rì ɓi yìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì man à giɓ rì jɛɛ, rì ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì gili man rì kèegh wìì. 
Ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɛ mum ɓɛ ɓiì ɓaà ɓum ɓɔm̀ ɓɛ ɓi naa yìì. 
I ŋwaà keesii ɓi mɛ à cee lèg ànɛ à keesii lɛ rì seŋi, rì jɛɛ, à yin lɛ à ɓa mum wɛm̀. Roànɛ à ɓiì keessii dɛlì yìì nsoò lɛ gɔ̀n yìì à cee lèg ànɛ à keesii mɛ̀, à yin lɛ à ɓa mum wɛm̀. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓèni kì tɛ̀ɛgh kɔrɔs wìì, à ki ɓèn mɛ kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii, à yin mum wɛm̀. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kàmɛɛ rì cɛɓ kii nnyɛɛ ri kɔ ɓiì mɛ̀mi, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à ɗimzii cɛɓ kii lɛ mɛ̀, à rì kɔ ɓiì ghɛɛ̀dii.
Ŋwaànɛ à ghàɓi mìni, à ghàɓi mɛ̀; i ŋwaà ki ghàɓi mɛ̀ di à ghàɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀. 
I ŋwaà ghàɓi ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, à rì ɓiì terì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ti ɓɛ tekì; nni ŋwaànɛ à ki ghàɓi ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓisuulɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, à rì ɓiì terì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛɛ̀ tekì. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì faà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔɓti ɓɛ nsoò gìras ì mɛ̀nig mɛ kèeŋkèeŋ ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ ǹ-yilàg wɛm̀ àa mɛ̀m ɓi mɛlèɓ mii.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà kì siitaagh ɓɛyilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì siitaagh nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, à kɛ̀n kì rèsaagh ɓum, à ki kakali Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ɓi bàn yi wɔɔ.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à ɓaghà ɓi naà-zày, à wokà di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali ɓiɓan ɓi Kiris à kìkìghà, nni à romgà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi kì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ: 
Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri nya roànɛ ɓìsii yii lɛ à ɓiì yùu giǹ, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì kì ɓoŋɓoŋi adɛŋ? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna kì kpaà Zyaŋ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kìi lɛ, ɓì wog ɓì ki ghɛn. 
Ɓyɛɛ ri lɛ, ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀nɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ̀kukwiy ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zɛ̀n kìɓaà lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yàà, ɓɛ̀lɔlɔg ɓɛ woòghwòòghrɛ̀n, ɓìloŋ ɓi gheèghèmɓɛ̀n, Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à ki kaakalɛ̀n a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri nyìighnyìg. 
Mààgh rì ŋwaànɛ àa kɛ̀ɓtɛn ɓi fiɓàg ɓisu wɛ̀m.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à romgày ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kɛngà, Yeesus à tumɛ̀n rìtɔtɔ̀g ɗi ɓum mɛ̀tɔɔ̀tɔɔgh ɓi kìɓan ki Zyaŋ, nwèe: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì kɛ̀ngà kì fifiɓii ɓi-reɓ? Kìsyòŋ ki bɛ̀ɓ yɛ̀ɛ nyɛ̀ɛnyɛŋzì gìn? 
Nni cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì kɛ̀ngà min ki ghɛɛ̀? Ŋwaànɛ à waatàkà ɓyoo ɓilàà giǹ? Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ waatàg ɓìlàà ɓi syeesyee, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɔràg ɓi mɛɛ mɛ mɛfòm. 
Nni cɛ ɓì kɛ̀ngà min ki kìi? Ɓì kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan? Ɛ̀ɛ̀, ǹkalii mìni lɛ: Ŋwaàncèm à cee gì rìɓa ɗi ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Lɛ nnyɛɛ rì roànɛ ɓɛ kangà kìɓan kii lɛ: Mum wɛm̀ à fìtom innɛ ǹɗomi wɔ̀ lɛ beèbɛ̀y, lɛ a log wɔ̀ kì pegsɛɛ bee.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yalɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗùm ɗi giɓ, ŋwaànɛ à cee Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à ka ɓaghà ɓi. Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiisɛɛ kì ɓaà lɛsàg ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo, à cee nyi. 
À tumɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Zyaŋ Bàɓtis à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ rùurunɛ̀n kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo nni ɓɛ̀tèteɗ ɓɛɛ ni ràgɛn ɗi kɔ. 
Ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ̀cèm rì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓɛ kalìghà kìɓan ki ki seesee kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll à kpaŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Zyaŋ à yùghà. 
I ɓì rì lɛ ɓi wog rìkpaa ɗyɛ̀m, Zyaŋ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ri Eli ànɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùtii. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, à wog.
Ǹɗì lɛ ǹfèg ɓà ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ɗì rìkuu ɗi mum a ɗi? Ɓɛ ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔrii ɓi ǹlɛmɓog, ɓɛ rerèŋì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ:
Tì mɛ kì lɛ, tì kɛɛ̀gh mìni mɛ̀ɓàlì rì zàro, kɛ̀ ɓi ɗyen, tì ki kɛɛgh mini tyem ti riwù, kɛ̀ ɓi rèn. 
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ à yùghà, à kì lɛ; kɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓiɗilàg, kɛ̀ɛ ki nɔ mɛrɔ̀g nnyaa ànɛn à rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay. 
Man à Mum à yù, à kìkì lɛ, à ɗiɗì ɓìɗilàg, à ki nɔnɔ mɛrɔ̀g, nnyaa ànɛn à rì lɛ, ànɛ̀n ǹɗiì-com, ànɛn ǹnɔɔ̀-mɛ̀rɔ̀g, à ki ɓa ti righan ɗi ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe. Kìɓan kifog ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ti ɗi ghɛnàg lɛ ɗi ri lɛ saaɗ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɗi kiì.
Nni Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà rìfwààdɛ̀n ɗi bàn yi à kìghà dàm wɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ ɓɛ kɔngà ɓi lɛ, ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem. 
Nyìighnyìg rì wɔ̀ Korazɛŋ, nyìighnyìg rì wɔ̀ Bɛdsayida, ɓisuulɛ, i dàm yi yi kilɛ̀ngà a lɔŋkin yɛɛ kilɛn fɔlɔɔ ɓi bàn yi lɛ, rì Tiir rì Sidɔŋ, di ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem fìɗyàɓ, ɓɛ waatɛ̀n mɛ̀kùtì, ɓɛ Siŋɗɛ̀n kìɓu. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll kìɓan ki, ɓumɓɛ a Tiir rì ɓɛ a Sidɔŋ ki nyɛni gɛ ɓi à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ kiŋkìn. 
Nni wɔ̀ Kapɛrinawum, u fèki nya lɛ, ù rì ɓiì ɓɔɔ̀gh aɗyoo? Èe èe, ɓɛ ri lɔŋ wɔ ɓiì sɛɛ̀dii à kpaŋ a nywɛ̀y, lɛ ì dàm yi yi kìlɛ̀ngà a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ yɛɛ kilɛn fɔlɔɔ à Sɔdɔm di bàn ìnɛn ì kaka lɛ rì ɓɛ̀gɛɛnɛ-ànkan miì. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ, ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, kìɓan ki ɓumɓɛ a Sɔdɔm ki nyɛni gɛ ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓumɓɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ.
Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, Yeesus à pɛ̀sìghà ɓìtòkì à kpaa lɛ: Tààta, wàànɛ ù lamii lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi, ǹfaa wɔ̀ ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ ù nyamgàkà ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan rì ɓum ɓɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓi, ù rèsì ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg ɓyɔ. 
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Tààta, ǹtògsaagh wɔ̀, lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ɓaghà syeesyee wɔ̀ɔ̀ à fèg. 
Seŋi wɛ̀m à faghà mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓicèm; ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓi Man i ki yin lɛ Seŋi, ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛɛ ki yi Seŋi i ki yin lɛ Man, ǹsòò lɛ ŋwaànɛ ki kɔni Man lɛ a resi nyi Seŋì. 
Yùuna a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ, ɓì rì ɓɛ fɔlɛn, mɛ̀tɛ̀g mɛ ki rìriɗ mini, ǹfa mìni rìfɔɔsɛ̀n. 
Foŋɗɛɛna ɓi kìɓèg kɛm̀, ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɓìɓan ɓi nɗèrèsì, ɓisuulɛ, nɗem wɛ̀m wuri lɛ fyòoog, wu ki ɓa ti wu sɛɛ̀dɛn ɓi zi, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ghay min mɛ̀ ri ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ rìfɔɔsɛ̀n. 
Lɛ kìɓèg kɛm̀ ki yeesɛɛ bi, ǹtɛ̀g wɛm̀ wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki rìɗ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi dɛmi nyas  ŋwosi Saɓàt, nni zày ì kɔ̀ngà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìsòsòrì ɗi nyas di ɓɛɛ̀ ɗiɗì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ, ù ghɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki com ki ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ mum a ki ŋwosi Saɓàt? 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì ɓàlà ɓi com ki Davit à kìghà di zày ì kɔ̀ni lɛ rì nyi rì ɓum ɓii? 
À ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum, ɓɛ ɗi bìrɛs yi ɓɛ faghà ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi ki ɗiì bìrɛs yiǹ lɛ, ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ kpaaghi lɛ: Lɔŋ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ cɛ̀ncaa ɓɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ yɔ kì ɗiì. 
Ǹsoò lɛ, ɓì ɓàlà ɓi ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis lɛ ŋwosi Saɓàt, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓèŋ kicèlì ki Saɓàt, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa rì bɛ̀lɛn ɓi kìɓan kiǹ? 
Nni mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, com ki ki cee naà-Bɛ̀ll, ki ri fɛ̀. 
I ɓyàa yii azi anɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓɛ kangà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkeesii nɗem wu nyìighnyìg, à cee ɓìfùna ɓi ɓituwe, di ɓi yin lɛ ɓi fa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, zɔɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ Man à mum yɛɛ lamii Saɓàt.
Yɛ̀ɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo, à kɛ̀n ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ri kìɓɔmà ki càg; nni ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ nya lɛ ɓɛɛ wɔɔ̀zi mum ŋwosi Saɓàt? Ɓɛ tɔkà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, di ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn nyi. 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛ ri lɛ à kì lɛ, i à rì rì jɔ̀ɔ̀ yìì bog, nnɛ ì kpìi ɓi rìɓee ŋwosì Saɓàt, à rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ɛ ɗiŋi ɓi rìɓee ɗiǹ lɛ a sɔŋi yɔ̀? 
Ǹtoò mum wu kɛŋi wu cee jɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ vɔ̀ɔ̀m; fɔɔnnɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ki mum kìrɔɔ ŋwosi Saɓàt. 
Yeesus à kpaa min ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓɔmà ki càg lɛ: Nàma càg. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à nàm; càg kii kiǹ ki sugtì lɛ syeesyee yɛ̀ɛ kim̀bog.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kpagà, ɓɛ kɛǹ dwìɗ lɛ ɓɛɛ kaà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey Yeesus. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n à ghaàgh. Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
À rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓumɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kì lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yi nyi. 
A kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ a roozi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à kàngà lɛ:
Ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ ànɛ ǹɗɔ̀tɛ̀ngà innɛ̀n, nyi nnɛ ǹkeesàg, kìnyàà kɛm̀ kìcèm ki ri ɓi nyi. Ǹɗì ɓiì foŋì Nghay wɛ̀m ɓi nyi, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à ɓiì kpaa ɓìlɔ̀ŋ saaɗ wɛ̀m. 
Àa kaa ɓi mum kìɓan, kɛ̀ɛ rɔŋ kikiŋ, mum kɛ̀ɛ ki wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì ɓi kìɓàà 
Àa ɓun ɓi kisyòŋ ki ki ti kì tuŋiyɛn, kɛ̀ɛ ki ɗimzi filàà fi fyɛɛ̀ ka syoosyòò, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à rì ɓiì lègsii ki kìi lɛ, saaɗ a yagsag. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi saghii gɛ ǹtyweeyi waa ɓi ɗii ɗìì.
Nni ɓɛ yughày Yeesus rì ɗyaŋɗyàŋ àdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, àncèm tì mùm-mùm, Yeesus à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi nyi ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kìghà lɛ, à tòòghrɛ̀n, à ki ghɛnɛn. 
Gwìy inɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ ì kuughràkà lɛɛ̀gwey, ì tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n lɛ: Ki rì lɛ ki ɓa lɛ à rì, Man à Davit gìn? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ a nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul ànɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yìghà lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fèfèg, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki ɓumɓɛ miì ɓɛ ramzɛɛ wɛ̀y ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ki ti ki lekì; bàn bimiɗ nsoò lɛ naa ì ɓum ìnɛ ɓumɓɛ miì ɓɛ ramzɛɛ wɛ̀y ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ì yin lɛ ì kɛ̀n asu ì ghɛghɛ̀ɓ. 
I Satàn a nàɓi Satàn, di à ramzɛɛ wɛ̀y ri nyimìɗ yɛɛ lɔɔ, nni lannɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ki rì min ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu ki ɓaɓà? 
I mɛ̀ɛ ǹki nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛlzeɓul, ɓɔn ɓin ɓɔɔ nànaɓ ɓyɔ rì ìtèɗ wu ghɛn? Kìɓan ki kɛɛ̀ki ɓɔn ɓin ɓɛɛ ri yɔ̀mi gɛ mìni ɓɔmiɗ. 
Kìɓan kìfog, i ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ɛ nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll, fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki mɛ kpaŋ a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi naa ì tèteɗ à mum, à sàŋ ìkum wu roànɛ̀n di ki yin lɛ, àa loogh nyi kì kàŋi bɛn, wɔ̀lɛ i à mɛ kàŋ nyi, bɛn, à rì lɛ à sàŋ ɓyom ɓi ɓi naa ì ŋwaànɛ̀n. 
Ŋwaànɛ à yin ɓi gàm yɛ̀m, à rì mɛ̀ gàm-cɛcɛɗ, ŋwaànɛ à ki taŋzɛɛ ɓi nɗaŋ rì mɛ̀, a tyàatyaŋzì.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ɓɛ ɓiì cenɛɛ ɓum lɛ rì ɓìɓe ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kiì, ɗì tìfena ti ɓɛ fengii Bɛ̀ll; kìɓan kifog, ì ɓɛ feni Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ cenɛ̀n ɓɔ kìɓan kiǹ. 
I ŋwaà tòogh Man à mum kìɓe, ɓɛ cenɛ̀n nyi, kìɓan kifog ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì tòogh Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kìɓe nsoò ɓi cɛɓ ki gɛɛ̀nɛ, nsoò ɓi cɛɓ ki ki riì, ɓaa cenɛn ɓi nyi kìɓan kiǹ.
I ɓì kpaa lɛ kìte ki rɔɔtɛɛ, di ɓìɗùn ɓi kite kiǹ ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ; ì ɓì kpaa lɛ, ki ɓeɓtɛɛ di kìte kiǹ ki ɓeɓtaagh ɓìɗùn, lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ yilag lɛ kìte ki rɔɔtɛɛ nsoò lɛ ki ɓeɓtɛɛ, ɓi ɓìɗùn ɓi ki wumi. 
Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì pìsɛɛ ɓìgòm ɓɛ! lannɛ ɓi rì lɛ ɓì kalì syeesyee à kìɓan, di mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi ɓeɓtɛɛ fɛlɛ? Lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi roni mum ǹɗem ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ŋwɔm wu ti wu kpaaghì. 
Syeesyee à mum à ti à sɔ̀ŋɗàg yì ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ ɓiɓan, ɓi buŋ yìì i ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee; kìɓeɓtàg ki mum kɔɔ sɔŋdàg yì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan, ɓi buŋ yìì i ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn. 
Ǹkalii mìni lɛ: Ŋ̀wosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓum ɓɛ ɓiì rèsii ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓìɓan ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu. 
Lɛ ɓìtòkì ɓyɔɔ ɓyɛɛ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ u kpaŋ ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, nsoò lɛ u kpi ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛɗɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ pɛsìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓɛ tɔg Yeesus lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn ɓisi lɛ, ù ki dàm, ti ghɛǹ. 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ ìnɛ, ì rì lɛ, yɔ̀ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum, ì ki falɛn ɓi tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g yɛ̀ɛ tɔɔgh kìrèmzɛnà? Ɓaa rèsi ti ɓi mini kìrèmzɛnà kìdɛŋ ì ki yin lɛ kìrèmzɛnà ki ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Zyonas. 
Ɓisuulɛ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyonas à lalà mɛ̀ru mɛ̀ra rì ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛraa ɓi ɗùm ɗi coo kìzɛn, fɔɔnnɛ Man à mum à ɓiì ghagsii girig mɛ̀ru mɛraa rì ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛraa ɓi zi ɓiɗùm. 
Ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓumɓɛ a Niniivɛ ɓɛ rɛlii gɛ ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓi gbàà ì ɓum ìnɛ, ɓɛ ki fa ɓumɓɛ ɓi gbàà ìnɛ bɛ̀lɛn, lɛ ɓɔɔ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi Zyonas à kpaaghà ɓɔ. Nni ŋwaànɛ à cee Zyonas yɛɛ ri lɛ fɛ. 
Ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, rìfòm ɗi giɓ ɗi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kidɛŋ ki duŋzi, ɗi rɛlii gɛ ǹɗaŋ ri gbàà ì ɓum ìnɛ, ɗi ki fa yɔ̀ rinàn, ɓisuulɛ ɗyɔɔ pɛsɛ̀ngày fìràɓ lɛ ɗyɛɛ yu kìwoògh ɓìtòkì ɓi Salomɔŋ ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì ronɛn ri ɗyomzɛ̀n, Nni ŋwaànɛ à cee Salomɔŋ yɛɛ ri lɛ fɛ.
Cààmɛ̀n ki kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki pɛsɛɛ ɓi mum, ki kɛǹ kì kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi jaŋ yi yi ri rì kìwomi, ɓi rìkaakàà ɗi jàŋ i rìfɔɔsɛ̀n, kìɓan kìfog, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ki ri min ɓiì kpaà lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì sugtii ɓi naa yɛ̀m ìnɛ mɛ̀ɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì miì; yɛ̀ɛ ki sugtii ki tanɛ̀n yɔ̀ zɛy, ǹfyɔnɛn, ì ki ɓa ti ri mɛ̀rɛ̀ŋ. 
Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn ki kɛǹ yì kì terì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛ̀ghay ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓi nyɛni ɓi cee kɔ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓi ɗiŋì ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n ɓi kɔrì miì. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìsyɔn ɗi ŋwaànɛ̀n ɗiǹ ɗi ri ɓiì ɓeɓtɛɛ ɗi cee rìɓa ɗii ɗi ǹtonto; com kìn kɛɛ ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ a ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓi ɓi gbàà ì ɓum ìnɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di a ka tòtog ri gwìy ì ɓum, nni jɛɛ wìì rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ rɛlìghày ɓi dan, ɓɛ kaakàà lɛ di ɓaa tòòghrɛɛ rì nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Gaa rì ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛ rì fɛnii ɓi dan ɓɛ ki kaakaa lɛ, di ɓaa tòòghrɛɛ rì wɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà ŋwaànɛ à kpaaghà nyi ànɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ri jɛɛ wɛ̀m, ɓɛ̀ghɛn ɓɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m? 
Fɔɔnnɛ à nàmgà càg ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa lɛ: Jɛɛ wɛ̀m rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à kìi rìkɔ̀n ɗi Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ a rì aɗyoo, nnyɛɛ ri geni wɛ̀m à baŋì, nyi geni wɛ̀m à giɓ, nyi jɛɛ wɛ̀m.
Ŋwos anɛ̀n, Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a mɛɛ, à kɛ̀n kì kɔ̀rii ɓi bèn ì rìɓày. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓyoo ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi taŋzɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, lèg ànɛ lɛ nyii ɓɔkà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi kìkɔm, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ rɛlìì ɓi bèn ì rìɓày. 
A kurɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi dàɗkì à kpaakpàà ɓɔ lɛ:
Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ kì mìsi boo ì ɓyom ɓi dɛm; nni yɛ̀ɛ à mìmìskà, gàɓ ì boo ìdɛŋ ì kpì ɓi bee aɗyoo, tììlì ti yu ti ɗi yɔ̀ bimiɗ. 
Gàɓ ìmbog ì kpì ɓi tìcɔg jàŋ inɛ zi i ɓìɓkà ɓi, ì ghàs kì ròo ɓisuulɛ zi i fɔmgà ɓi ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos à kpagày, à ɗigsì ɓyom ɓi ɓi roòghà ɓiǹ, mɛ̀ɗyèm mɛ womdàg lɛ ɓi ɓaghà ɓi ri gàŋ. 
Gàɓ ì boo ìmbog ì kpìghà ɓi ɓìkàrag; ɓìkàrag ɓi tɔɓ, ɓi laatàg boo ìnɛ̀n, ì wu. 
Fɔɔnnɛ boo ìdɛŋ ì kɛ̀ngà kì kpìi ɓi syeesyee à zi. Yɛ̀ɛ ì rɔ̀ɔ̀ghà, ì tɔɔ, ì kì lɛ, ǹɗyèm wu, wu wum ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ, wumbog ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛraa, wudɛŋ ɓìɗùn rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, à wog.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tyondɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ u tòtog ri ɓɔ ɓi dàɗkì? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ntòtog ri ɓɔ ɓi dàɗkì lɛ mìniìɓɛ ki ri kì fayɛn lɛ ɓi yi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ɓi ɓi ri ɓìnyamɛn, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg wàa, ki yin ɓɔ kì fayɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ yi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓyom innɛ ɓɛ ɓiì fatii lɛ a ɓa rì ɓyɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ com, innɛ ɓɛ ɓiì ɓàtɛɛ maa gàɓ ànɛ à rì rì nyi. 
Azi anɛ ǹtòtog ri ɓɔ ɓi dàɗkì innɛ̀n lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɛ nsoò ɓaa seesèè ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn, nsoò ɓaa wowòg, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wog, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi. 
Fɔlɔɔ a rì ɓiì roòzii kìɓan ki Ezayii à kpaŋzìghà yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓì ɓiì konaagh ki ramì mɛ̀reè lɛ syeesyee lɛ ɓi wog, wɔ̀lɛ ɓyàa ki wog ɓi com, ɓì konag ki zyɛ̀ɛ̀dii mis lɛ ɓi ghɛǹ, wɔ̀lɛ ɓyàa ki ghɛn ɓi. 
Ɓisuulɛ nɗem wu ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki wu kɛsii tì ɓi, lɛ ɓɛ nkìi lɛ, ɓɛ simgì mɛ̀ree maa, ɓɛ ki ɓuusi mis maa lɛ, mis maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛɛ̀di, mɛ̀reè maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wog ti, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi kìɓan, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn mɛrem lɛ ǹwɔɔ̀zi ɓɔ.
Wɔ̀lɛ mìnii ri rì ɓɛ̀mààgh lɛ, mis min mɛɛ ghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n, mɛ̀reè min mɛ woòghwòòghrɛ̀n. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓum ɓɛ saaɗ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì zày ìnɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛn ɓìɓan ɓi mìnii seesee ɓi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓi, ɓɔ tì rì zày ìnɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɓiɓan ɓi mìnii wowog ɓi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓi.
Nni wooghna min azi ànɛ ɓi dàɗkì ì m̀mìsì boo ì ɓyom. 
I ŋwaà woogh di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali kìɓan ki kilɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò, à rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ɛ yi com ki ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà: Ghèghey à mum à yù kì pisii boo ìnɛ ɓaa mìsi ɓi nɗem wu ŋwaànɛ̀n; ŋwaànɛ̀n à rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ boo ìnɛ ì kpìghà ɓi bee aɗyoo. 
Roànɛ à ghàɓkà boo ì ɓyom ɓi tìcɔg, nnyɛɛ rì roànɛ à ti lɛ, i à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, à ghàs yɔ̀ ki ghàɓi ri kìnyàà; 
kìɓan kìfog jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓag gàŋ ɓi ǹɗem wìì; i à ɓèŋi yɔ̀ ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, i mɛ̀tɔɓ rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓi ghɛnɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkii ɓisuu jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, lɔŋ lɛ à kɛ̀ɓtɛɛ fìɓàg. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ghaɓkà boo ì ɓyom ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìkàrag yɛɛ ri roànɛ à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, kìɓan kifog, cɛɛ̀-ǹɗem à cɛɓ ki ɓi ziinɛ, ɗì rìyɛ̀y ɗi ikum ɓi laatàg jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, ɓi ki lɛ, yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wum ɓiɗùn. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ghàɓkà boo ɓi syeesyee à zi à rì ŋwaànɛ à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, à ki wog com ki ì kpaa; ŋwaànɛ̀n a ti à wumgì ɓìɗùn fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ boo ìnɛ ì kìi lɛ ǹɗyèm wu, wu fa ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ, wumbog ɓìɗùn mɛ̀tin mɛraa, wudɛŋ ɓìɗùn rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ. 
Nni Yeesus à teɗtìghà ɓɔ dàɗkì ìdɛŋ à kpaa lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki pisɛɛ rì ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à mis̀kà syeesyee à boo ì ɓyom ɓi dɛm yiì. 
Wɔ̀lɛ bènàbena wiì à yùghày di ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓi fìlo, à mìs kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi ɓi dɛm i gèŋ ìnɛ̀n, a ghaàgh. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gèŋ inɛ̀n ì rɔ̀ɔ̀ghà, ì tɔɔ, ì fogì ɓìsaa, kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi kì roò girig. 
Nni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓɛ yughà nyi kì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ: Tààta, ɓìsiì fèki nya lɛ boo ì syeesyee yɛ̀ɛnnɛ wɔ̀ɔ m̀mìsì ɓi dɛm yɔɔ̀, nni kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi kɔɔ ɓaa yì fe? 
Nni à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Bènàbena wɛm̀ àdɛŋ yɛɛ ǹkìi kìsay kiǹ; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ i ki kɔni wɔ̀, ti rì lɛ ti kɛ̀n kì rùɓii kiɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi kiǹ. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Àg, mɛ̀ ǹgherɛɛ ɓi; lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì rì ɓiì rùruɓii caaɓi kiǹ, ɓì rì lɛ, ɓì rùɓ lɛ rì gèŋ miì. 
Càrina lɛ rì gèŋ rì caaɓi kiǹ ɓyɛɛ tɔɔ̀ nɗaŋ, ɓi cààmɛ̀n à mɛ̀saŋ nnɛ ǹɗì ɓiì kalii ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛ, ɓɛɛ ka rùɓi kiɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi kiǹ, ɓɛ kagi kɔ ɓi ɓìɓiŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n min gèŋ ɓi zarò yɛ̀m.
Nni Yeesus à teɗtìghà ɓɔ dàɗkì ìdɛŋ à kpaa lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ zàm ì mùtarìdɛ̀ ìnɛ mum à tekà, à ɓɛ̀y ɓi dɛm yiì. 
Zàm ìnɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓisɛɛ kì ɓaà lɛsàg ɓi boo yi ɓite yicèm, kìɓan kifog, i ì mɛ ròò ì ceeghì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi dɛm, ì ghay kìte ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ tììlì ti aɗyoo tyɛɛ yuyu kì toŋtoŋi ɓilaa ɓi myaɓ mii.
Yeesus à teɗtì tì ɓɔ dàɗkì ìdɛŋ lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ nwìɗ ànɛ giɓ a teri, à foŋ ɓi ɓɛ̀kilò ɓɛ̀ fàriǹ ɓɛraa lɛ di fàriǹ ànɛ̀n bimiɗ a nurɛ̀n. 
Yeesus à kakàlìghà gwìy ì ɓum ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi dàɗkì; àa ǹti kɛ̀ɛ kpaa ɓɔ kìɓan kìdɛŋ à rɔ̀ɓ lɛ à teri ɓi ɓɔ dàɗkì, 
lɛ a roozi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì pinii ŋwɔm ǹtòòghrɛ̀n ɓi dàɗkì, ǹki wogsi ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ɓaghà a rìnyam à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ zi i kpìghà.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à càɗkà gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n, à ɗiŋì ɓi naa. Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Rèsi ɓìsi azi anɛ ɓi dàɗkì ì boo ì kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi ki ki ɓaghà ɓi dɛm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à mìskà syeesyee à boo yɛɛ ri Man à mum. 
Ziinɛ yɛ̀ɛ ri dɛm inɛ̀n; syeesyee à boo à rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wooghrɛɛ rì kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo; boo ì kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi ì rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ wooghrɛɛ rì Ghèghey à mum. 
Bènàbena anɛ à mìskà kìɓeɓtàg ki boo yɛɛ rì Satàn; mɛ̀saŋ mɛɛ ri rìlèg ɗi zi, ɓɛ̀saŋì-mɛ̀saŋ ɓɛɛ ri ɓum ɓɛ titòm. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ruɓkì kìɓeɓtàg ki caaɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ pig kɔ ɓi ɗuu, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ɓiì ɓaà ŋwosi rilèg ɗi zi. 
Man à mum à romigɛy ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom lɛ ɓɛɛ pisi lɛ, rì ɓyom ɓi kɛ̀ɛkɛɓtìyɛ̀n ɓum fìɓàg, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii. 
Ɓɛ pig lɛ, rì ɓyom ɓìn, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛǹ ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ kì ɗùù; jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ rèèreedɛɛ gɛ, di ɓɛɛ̀ ŋàaŋaàdì min. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ saaɗ ɓɛ lònlomi gɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìsaa ki ŋwos, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Seŋi wàà. Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à wog.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki pisɛɛ tì rì ìkum wu wu ri wù nyamɛn ɓi dɛm ìdɛŋ. I ŋwaà ghɛɛ wɔ à konàg tì wɔ kì nyamì, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓiì woògh kìnyàà à kɛ̀n à kàɓkì ɓyom ɓii ɓicem, à ki làg dɛm inɛ̀n.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki pisɛɛ tì rì ǹkìì-dùne ànɛ a kaakaa ticaka ti syeesyee. 
I à tanɛɛ fìcaka fi fi ri fì kɛŋɛn lɛɛ̀gwey, à kɛ̀n kì kàɓkii ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm, à làg fyɔ.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ri tì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ dam ìnɛ ɓɛ piigh ɓi rìɓày, ì koŋìì ɓìzɛn mɛ̀kuu lɛ mɛ̀kuu. 
I dam ìnɛ̀n ì mɛ ron, ɓɛ syoŋ yì yɔ̀ a cɛɗ ɓɛ kɔrì min ɓi rìɓɔ̀ngì ɗi ɓìzɛn ɓi syeesyee di ɓɛɛ foŋfoŋ ɓyɔ ɓi ɓìkàɗ, ɓɛ mag ɓi ɓeɓtakɛn. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ɓaa gɛ ɓi rìlèg ɗi zi; ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ yùu gɛ kì ghasii ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum rì ɓum ɓɛ saaɗ; 
ɓɛ pig ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓì ɓum ɓiǹ ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ ki ɗuu jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ reèrèèdɛɛ gɛ di ɓɛɛ̀ ŋàaŋaàdì min.
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì woogh ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm? Ɓɔɔ pɛɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ tì woogh. 
Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗèsì-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna bimiɗ ànɛ à mɛ yilag ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo, à rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàmɛɛ, ànɛ à ti à sɔ̀ŋɗag yì ɓɛ̀nyɔɔnyɔn ɓɛ ɓyom, rì tìɗyàɓ ti ɓyom, ɓi jàŋ inɛ ìkum wii wu ri wu nyamɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà ɓɔ kì tekii dàɗkì yiǹ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà wɔɔ. 
À kɛ̀ngà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii à ki tumɛn ɓum rìrèèrèsàg ɓi naa yaa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n; rìrèsì ɗii ɗi kìghà lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kuùghrag, ɓɛ ki tɔɔghtɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n lɛ: Ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi, rì ìtèɗ wu kìkiyɛn dàm miì, ɓi riì nyi fe? 
Àa man à kaminɗà yɛɛ ri lɛ? Jɛɛ à yin ɗii lɛ Marii? Ɓɛ̀geni mii lɛ: Zyag rì Yoosɛɓ rì Simɔn rì Zyuudɛ? 
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ yin fɛ rì ɓìsi? Nni fe nnɛ nyii riì min ri ɓìɓan ɓi ɓìcèm?
A ɓaghà com ki kɛɛ kɛɓti ɓɔ fìɓàg; fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛɛ̀ sɛɛtag lɔŋ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ, rì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, rì ɓi naa yìì i ɓum. 
Yeesus à kìghà ɓi dàm wɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, Eroodɛ ànɛ à ɓaghà gɔmìnà a Galile à wokà di ɓɛɛ ɓùŋɓuŋ Yeesus, à ki kpaa ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii lɛ: 
Zyaŋ Bàɓtis yɛɛ ri, à ghèmɓɛɛ yì a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à rì miì rì ìtèɗ wu kìkiyɛn dàm.
Lɛ Eroodɛ à reɓsìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ Zyaŋ ɓɛ kaŋ̀ bɛn ri mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi ɓɛ pìg ɓi naà-zày ɓisuu kiɓan ki Eroɗyaadɛ à gili Filiɓ à gèni wìì. 
Lɛ Zyaŋ à kpaakpààghà Eroodɛ lɛ: Kighɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ ù teɗ Eroɗyaadɛ lɛ a ɓa giɓ wɔɔ̀. 
Ki kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà Eroodɛ lɛ a wey Zyaŋ kìɓan kifog à rirìsìghà gwìy ì ɓum, lɛ ɓum ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà lɛ Zyaŋ à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓi kìsɔ̀g ki gòn i rìyalɛ̀n ɗi Eroodɛ, gɔ̀n ì Eroɗyaadɛ ì ɗyengà rìdɛlì ɓi mis mɛ ɓumɓɛ à reŋɗɛ̀ngà ɓi kìsɔ̀g kiǹ, ki rɔɔ Eroodɛ 
lèg ànɛ lɛ, à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ lɛ nyii ri ɓiì faà mutyàà gɔ̀n ànɛn com kìcèm ki à tɔɔgh nyì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ jɛɛ gɔ̀n ìnɛn à reɓsàkà yɔ̀ nnɛ ì kpaaghà Eroodɛ lɛ: Kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn mɛ lɛ, u fa mɛ̀ ǹto wu Zyaŋ Bàɓtis lɔŋ fɛ ɓi taasà. 
Rìfòm ɗi wokà bim, kìɓan kifog ɗi tɔg lɛ ɓɛɛ fa gɔ̀n ìnɛn ǹto wu Zyaŋ, ɓisuulɛ ɗi ɓaghà di ɗi mɛ kànɛn bɛ̀ɗ, rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɗi reŋìghà ɓɛǹ; 
ɗi rom min lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì reni Zyaŋ ǹto ɓi naà-zày. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yughày rì ǹto wu Zyaŋ ɓi taasà, ɓɛ fa rì gɔ̀n ìnɛn, yɔ̀ɔ̀ kɛ̀n kì faà rì jɛɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ yughà kì terì kìloŋ kii, ɓɛ ɓom̀; ɓɛ ki kɛ̀n ki kpaà Yeesus ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n ɓi kìkɔm, à kɛ̀n kìpàs ɓi kìlɛŋ ki jàŋ. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀n yì ɓi bàn, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tàg nyi wɔɔ ri mɛ̀kòò. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagày ɓi kìkɔm, à ghɛn coo gwìy ì ɓum, nyìighnyìg ì kì nyi rì ɓumɓɛ̀n, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɛlɛnlɛm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi gwìy ìnɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀n nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ cee, jàŋ inɛ ì ki ɓa kilɛŋ ki jàŋ, kali ɓumɓɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì làagh ɓyom ɓi ɗiyɛn ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ. 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ghɛɓsii ɓì com lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaaghràg, mìniìɓɔmiɗ, faana ɓɔ ɓìɗilàg. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Tì rì lɔŋ fɛ lɛ, rì bìrɛs yitaǹ, rì ɓìzɛn ɓiɓɛɛ̀. 
Yeesus lɛ: Yùunay mɛ̀ fɛ rì ɓyom ɓìn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ kɔri ɓi ɓyaaɓì; à teɗ min bìrɛs yi kitaǹ rì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀rɛn ki ɓìzɛn, à ɓegsì mis aɗyoo, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛkì min bìrɛs, à fa rì ɓɛ̀yilàg, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kaɓsì gwìy ìnɛn. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɗighà, ɓɛ wuràg, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓadàkà lɛ rì ɓìɓɛghà ɓi bìrɛs rì ɓìzɛn, ɓɛ roòzì ɓìkàɗ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗìghà ɓyom ɓìn ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ, kɔ̀ɔ ɓày ɓɛyìɓ rì ɓɔɓtì.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn Yeesus à kìghà lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛɛ teɗ kìkɔm, ɓɛɛ lolog cɛcɛɗ kimbog, cààmɛ̀n ki nyiì ka gheeghesɛ̀n ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ sukì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà di à mɛ ghesɛn ɓɔ, ɓɛ sukì nyii ɓɔg ɓi dòn aɗyoo lɛ a ɓɔŋzag wɔɔ kipàs, ìru wu fin di à rì lɔŋ wɔɔ cɛ̀ncii.
Kìkɔm ki ɓaghà di ki mɛ ràɓsɛn ri bèn ì rìɓày gàɓ, ɓikus ɓi riɓày ɓi yeèyèèsì kɔ, ɓisuulɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì susùkày ɓɔ ɓi nyòò. 
Di ɓyom ɓi duri ɓi tiì, nnɛ Yeesus à yùyùghày ɓɔ a nyoo, di a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi ɓi rìɓày aɗyòò. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngày nyi fɔlɔɔ di a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi ɓi mɛ̀nig, ɓɛ risì, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaakpàà lɛ nyɔ̀ɛ̀y yɛ̀ɛ rì; ɓɛ rɔŋɗɔ̀ŋ ɓìkiŋ lɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ghàs ɓɔ kì kalii lɛ: Kɔ̀riina lɛ fyòoog, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri, kɛ̀ ɓi risi. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Kan, i ki ri saaɗ lɛ, wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri, gherɛn lɛ, nkɛɛ̀ghiì ɓi mɛ̀nig, n-yu wɔ̀ a nyòò. 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Yuiy! Pyɛɛri à kpaŋ ɓi kìkɔm, à tumɛ̀n rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ghì ɓi mɛ̀nig lɛ a kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà lɛ bɛ̀ɓ yɛ̀ɛ fɛɛfɛɓsì rì ìtèɗ nnɛ à risìghà; yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà lɛ, à ti ɓiì sɛnsɛni ɓi mɛ̀nig lɛ fyɔ̀ɔ̀ɓ, à nyàm jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Kan, ghɛɓsi mɛ̀. 
Yeesus à ghàs ki nàmi càg, à ɓan nyi, à ki kpaa nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ mum à maa rìgherɛ̀n lɛsàg ànɛ, wàa teri nyoey lɛ cɛ? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔm, bɛ̀ɓ ì maarɛ̀n. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi kìkɔm ɓɛ ɓakà Yeesus mɛ̀ɗu asu ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù rì lɔŋ Man à Bɛ̀ll a tààkaà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ratɛ̀ngà kì syàa riɓày ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaŋì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Zyenezarɛt. 
Ɓum ɓɛ wɔɔ ɓɛ remìghà Yeesus, ɓɛ pɛsì ɓum, ɓɛ romgì ɓi ɓɛ̀kòdò ɓɛ wɔɔ jàŋbog, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yughày nyi rì ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛ wɔɔ mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓɛ ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà nyi lɛ, a gherɛn lɛ, ɓɛɛ kom̀ nsoò rìkeɓ ɗii ɗi kilàà; nni ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ komgà rìkeɓ ɗii ɗi kilàà, ɓɛ wɔ̀ngàkà.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ yu yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: 
Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓumɓɛ abɛ̀y; lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sòò ɓyàg di ɓɛ ti ɓiì ɗiì ɓìɗilàg? 
Nni à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni yòg? Ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi yooyogsàg ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓi nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì lɔŋ ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓin? 
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll a kalag lɛ: Nyaasi soŋi ɓɛɛ̀ gaa, nni ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì cɛ̀mi seŋi nsoò lɛ jɛɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ wey nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog mìnii ti ɓì kpaaghì lɛ: I ŋwaà kalii seŋi, nsoò lɛ jɛɛ lɛ, gàɓ ì com ìnɛ màa rì lɛ ǹghɛɓsì wɔ̀ rì yɔ̀, yɛɛ̀nnɛ ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔgsii Bɛ̀ll miì, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti nyi kìɓan ki ǹkaŋdɛ̀n lɛ a nyaàsi seŋi nsoò lɛ jɛɛ. 
Rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi resii lɛ, ɓì ti ɓì tùùzàg jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓi nɔɔ̀ti ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓin. 
Mìni ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, Ezayii à konàkà lɔŋ ki rèsii kiɓan kin, yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ:
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki kɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì mɛ̀ ɓi ɓɛ̀ɓeeɓee ɓɛ ŋwɔ̀m, kìɓan kìfog mɛ̀rem maa mɛ ɓa mɛ̀ fìràɓ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì mɛ̀, ɗi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu, ɓisuulɛ dɔgtɛ̀n yi ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi ɓum, yi ri lɔŋ ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓum. 
Yeesus à reŋìghà gwìy ì ɓum lɛ yɛ̀ɛ yu nyi a nyòò, à kpaa yɔ̀ lɛ: 
Ramina mɛ̀reè, ɓi wog; àa com ki ki kɛɛ̀ mum ɓi ŋwɔm kɛɛ ri lɛ ki foŋ nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyoo, lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì kpaŋiì nyi ɓi ŋwɔm yɛ̀ɛri lɛ ì foŋ nyi kìsyeg ɓi nyòò.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ yughà nyi jàŋbog, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù yii ɓi lɛ kìɓan ki ù kpaa yì kiǹ ki kɛɓtii Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ fìɓàg yɛ̀ɛ ɓaa woogh kɔ? 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ɓɛ rì ɓiì rùɓi kite kicèm ki Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyoo à ɓɛ̀là ɓi. 
Càrina ɓɔ; ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓanɓan ɓɛro ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓi kìgeŋ; i ɗyaŋɗyàŋ à ɓanɓani roɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓi kìgeŋ ɓɛ ri ɓiì kpìi ɓi rìɓee ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Rèsi ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ dàɗkì ìnɛn, ìrì azi. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Mìnii ri girig kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n? 
Ɓi woogh ɓi lɛ i com ki ɗiŋii mum ɓi ŋwɔm, ki kɛǹ ɓi ɗùm, ki ki kpaŋ ɓi dan? 
Wɔ̀lɛ com ki ki kpaŋiì ɓi ŋwɔm wu mum, ki pɛsɛɛ yì nyi ɓi ǹɗem, com kiǹ kɛɛ ti ki fogì mum kìsyeg ɓi nyòò. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛyitì, ri fèg à rìwey ɗi mum, rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì cɛɓ ki sààsaa, ri wii, rì rìsasààgh ɗi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi nyoo, rì tìfena ti Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ti ɓi pɛsàg yì ɓi nɗem wu mum. 
Ɓyom ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ foŋfoŋ mum kìsyeg ɓi nyoo ɓyɛɛ ri lɔ̀ɔ̀; wɔ̀lɛ rìɗi ɗi mum a ɗii ɓìɗilàg kɛ̀ɛ sòò ɓyàg, ɗi yin nyi ɓiì foŋfoŋi kisyeg ɓi nyòò.
Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, à kɛ̀n ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki jàŋbog ri bàn yi lɛ, rì Tiir rì Sidɔŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ a Kanaaŋ ànɛ ɓi kòdò ànɛn, à yughày, à kpaa Yeesus jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Kan, wogha mɛ̀ nyìighnyìg, wɔ̀ Man à Davit; kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kɛɛ̀ yeeyeèsì gɔ̀n yɛ̀m rì ìtèɗ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à mìnɛ̀n giɓ anɛ̀n; ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀n nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Nàɓa giɓ anɛ, ɓisuulɛ a nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tìì ɓìsi ajɛ̀m rì kìyoòyòò. 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: A ɓɔni jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ ɓɛ ɗimgà ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, nnɛ ɓɛ romgày mɛ̀. 
Kìɓan kìfog giɓ anɛ̀n à yùghà nyi kì ɓaàgh mɛ̀ɗu asu di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Kan, yu ɓà mɛ kì ghɛɓsii. 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ki rɔɔtɛɛ ɓi lɛ, ŋwaa teɗ ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓɔɓti, a fa ɓyɔ rì ɓɔni bu. 
Giɓ anɛ̀n à kpaa lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ Kan, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɔni bu ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɗilàg bubùɓ yi yɛɛ̀ rààraa a teɓèrè à ɓum ɓaa zi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà min giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: Wɔ̀ giɓ anɛ, rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi teghɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey, nni kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ri. Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ gɔ̀n yìì i ghàskà kì wɔ̀ni.
Nni Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, à nàrì bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Galile, à ɓɔg ɓi dòn aɗyoo, à kɔ̀rì ɓi zi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi yughày nyi a nyoo, lɛ rì ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛ̀m, rì ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ, rì ɓɛ̀mùm-mùm, rì ɓìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀, rì ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛdɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓɛ foŋ nyi ɓumɓɛ̀n asu, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zag ɓɔ. 
Gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n ì kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà di ki ti lɛ, ɓɛ̀mùm-mùm ɓɛ totòg, ɓìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓi wɔnwɔ̀n ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀rɛy, ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀nɛ̀n. Nni ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìkeèkèmzì ɗi Bɛ̀ll à Isirayɛl.
Nni Yeesus à reŋighà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Nyìighnyìg ì kìi mɛ̀ rì gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ru mɛɛ ti lɛ mɛraa, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rì fɛ rì mɛ̀. Kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi. Ki kɔni ɓi mɛ lɛ ncaɗ ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ zày, lɛ àdɛŋ à rì ɓiì ki kpìi ɓi bee. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Lannɛ tì rì lɛ tì kì lɛ ti tanɛn bìrɛs fɛ, ɓi kìlɛŋ ki jàŋ ki, lèg ànɛ gɛmum ànɛ à tèghɛɛ ànɛ, à rì lɛ à ɗi à wurì? 
Yeesus à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì rì foo ri bìrɛs yaŋ? Ɓɛ ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓìrɛs taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓɔɔ ɓìzɛn. 
Yeesus à kalì min gwìy ìnɛ̀n lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kɔri ɓi zi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à tekà bìrɛs yi kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, rì ɓìzɛn ɓìn, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛkì yɔ, à fa rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kaɓsì yɔ rì gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɗighà ɓɛ wuràg, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɛkà ɓìɓɛghà ɓi ɓi rɔ̀ɓtàkà ɓi ɓìkàɗ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ pisa. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗighà ɓyom ɓìn, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin, kɔ̀ɔ ɓày lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ rì ɓɔɓtì.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghesɛ̀ngà ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ suki, fɔɔnnɛ nyii ɓɔkà ɓi kìkɔ̀m, à kɛ̀n ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Magadaŋ.
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛ yughày yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus lɛ ɓɛɛ feèghrɛn nyi. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ, a ki dàm ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ resi ɓɔ lɛ ìtèɗ wii wu riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì rì làg lɛ, i cɛŋkò ki kpaŋi ɓì kpaa lɛ, ɗyoo ɗi ɓiì rɔɔtɛɛ, lɛ ɗi ri lɛ bɔŋbɔ̀rɔɔŋ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i rì ɓiì tanì, ɓì kpaa lɛ, bwey ì ɓiì nɔɔ̀ gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓisuulɛ, ɗyoo ɗi ri rìɓàŋ ɗyɔ tì birìm; ɓì yii rìrèmì ɗi riɓa ɗi yɛ̀ɛ ɗyoo ɗi ri ɓi mis, kìɓan kifog, kɛ̀ ɓi yi rirèmì ɗi ɓirèmzɛnà ɓi ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi. 
Gbàà ì ɓum ì gɛɛ̀nɛ ìnɛ ì rì lɛ yɔ̀ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum, ì ki keesi tisɔ̀mɔ̀g, yɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg kìrèmzɛnà; ɓaa rèsi ɓi yɔ̀ kìrèmzɛnà kidɛŋ, i ki yin lɛ, ki Zyonas. Fɔɔnnɛ à càɗkà ɓɔ, à ghaàgh.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ syaàsyààghà cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɗimzɛ̀ngà rìteɗ ɗi bìrɛs. 
Yeesus a kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Konaaghna syeesyee à rìkonàg rì nwìɗ a Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì à Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ fefèkà ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ: Ɓaà yi ɓi à kpaa fɔlɔɔ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ tyàa teriì ɓi bìrɛs. 
Yeesus à yighà com ki ɓɛ fefèkà kiǹ, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi fèfeg ɓi mɛ̀rem min lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓyàa teriì ɓi bìrɛs innɛ ǹkpaa fɔlɔɔ, mìni ɓum ɓɛ maa rìgherɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓɛ? 
Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ɓì ka konag ɓi ki woògh? Ɓi yitii tì ɓi kitaǹ ki bìrɛs ki ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ ɓɛ nɗii, rì bàlì ì ɓìkàɗ ɓi bìrɛs ɓi ɓìi ǹtɛ̀ɛgh di ì mɛ rɔ̀ɓtàg? 
Nsoò lɛ kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki bìrɛs ki ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin ɓɛ nɗii, rì bàlì ì ɓìkàɗ ɓi ɓìi ǹtɛ̀ɛgh di ì mɛ rɔ̀ɓtàg? 
Nni lannɛ ɓì woogh ɓi lɛ, àa kìɓan ki bìrɛs kɛɛ̀ki màa kpaà? Konaaghna rì nwìɗ a Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ wokà min lɛ, àa nwìɗ anɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fogi ɓi bìrɛs lɛ yɛ̀ɛ nurɛn innɛ a kalàg lɛ ɓɛɛ konag rì nyi, lɔŋ dɔgtɛ̀n ìnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ rèrèsì yɛɛ̀nɛ a kalag lɛ ɓɛɛ konag rì yɔ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagà ɓi kòdò ànɛ à ɓaghà jàŋbog rì bàn ì Sezare ìnɛ a Filiɓ, nni à tɔkà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kpaaghi ɓaà lɛ, mɛ̀ Man à mum mɛ̀ ǹɗì ghɛn? 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓakà lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ, ù rì Zyaŋ Bàɓtis, ɓɛmbog lɛ, Eli, ɓɛdɛŋ tì lɛ, Zyeremii nsoò lɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan adɛŋ. 
Yeesus à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni yòg? Ɓi kalag lɛ mɛ̀ nɗi ghɛn? 
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à ɓàg lɛ: U rì Kiris, Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem. 
Nni Yeesus à teɗtìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀, a kpaa nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ Simɔn, man à Zyonas, ù rì m̀màŋɛn, ɓisuulɛ, àa mum à mɛ̀mùù rì bwaɓ yɛɛ resii wɔ̀ kìɓan kiǹ, lɔŋ Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm nnyɛɛ resii wɔ̀ kɔ. 
Nni mɛ̀ ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ, ù rì gɔ̀g, nni mɛ̀ m̀ɓiì toŋì kìseŋi kɛ̀m ɓi gɔ̀g ìnɛ̀n aɗyòò. Fɔɔnnɛ ìtèɗ wu riwù waa ɓa ɓi ri bee ì ǹkìyɛn com ɗì kìseŋi kìn. 
Nɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà tìɗìɓà ti ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò, fɔɔnnɛ com ki ù kàŋi fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri kàŋ aɗyòò, ki ù fumii fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri fùmi aɗyòò. 
Nni à rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà min ɓɛyilàg syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kali ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ nyii ri Kiris.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Yeesus à tumɛ̀ngà rìkakàlì ɗi ɓɛyilàg ɓii lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, a kɛǹ a Yorisalɛm, a ghɛǹ mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna. Ɓɛ ri wey nyi, à ki ghèmɓɛn ɓi ŋwos a kìraa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à tekà nyi a dwìɗ à tumɛ̀n nyi rìreɓ di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Kan, Bɛ̀ll àa gherɛn ɓi; com kidɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ kiǹ kaa kì ɓi wɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog Yeesus à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngày à kpaa Pyɛɛri lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m Satàn, u kìki lɛ, u kɛɓti mɛ̀ fìɓàg, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀yitì mɔɔ mɛ yin mɛyitì mɛ Bɛ̀ll, mɛ ri lɔŋ mɛyitì mɛ ɓum.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: I ki kɔ̀ni mum lɛ a nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì roòzɛɛ nyimiɗ, à tɛ̀g kɔrɔs wìì, à ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a kamɛn rì cɛɓ kii, a rì kɔ ɓiì ɗimzii; wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì ɗimzii cɛɓ kii lɛ mɛ̀, nnyɛɛ ri kɔ ɓiì tanɛɛ ti. 
Nni ki ghɛɓsii mum cɛ lɛ a fɔǹ ziinɛ bimiɗ, di à ɗimzii cɛɓ kii? Cɛ ŋwaà rì lɛ à làg cɛɓ kii ri kɔ? 
Lɛ Man à mum à ɓiì yùu ɓi rìkem ɗi Seŋi rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom, nni fɔɔnnɛ à ɓiì lèɓi mum ǹcèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkì ɗii ɗi ri. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri fɛ, ɓaa cuu ɓi, di ɓɛ ka ghɛn ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Man à mum a yùyuiy ɓi rìlàmì ɗii.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru taàfog, Yeesus à tekà lɛ rì Pyɛɛri, rì Zyaag rì Zyaaŋ à geni à kɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ kìpàs ɓi coo dòn aɗyòò. 
À lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà ɓɔ ɓi mis dɛŋ, ìsu wii wu lonlòm yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, ɓìlàà ɓii ɓi pupùɓ lɛ syàŋ-syàŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìtɛɛtɛn. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghɛn di Moyis rì Eli ɓɛ ti ɓiì tòtoogh rì nyi. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Kan, ki ri kìrɔɔ di, tì kɔ̀rii fɛ; i ki kɔni wɔ̀, ǹɗì ɓiì toŋì ɓìlaa fɛ ɓiraa lɛ kìfog ɓisu wɔɔ, kìfog ɓisuu Moyis, kìfog ɓisuu Eli. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà di a ka tòtog fɔlɔɔ nni coo kikwìɗ ki lònlomɛn ki sìgtɛ̀ngà ɓɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì tòòghrɛ̀ngày ɓi kìkwìɗ kiǹ, ì kpaa lɛ: Roànɛ à rì Man wɛm̀ à nɗem , ɓi nyi innɛ ǹfogà ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɛ̀m bimiɗ, wooghna nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kpìlàg ɓi zi guɓùg, ɓɛ ruusì mɛ̀su ɓi zi, lɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ rì ìtèɗ. 
Nni Yeesus à tyòŋdɛ̀ngày ɓɔ a nyoo, à ǹyɛ̀ŋ ɓɔ, à kpaa lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛɛna aɗyòò, kɛ̀ ɓi risi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsìghà mɛ̀su aɗyòò, ɓɛ ghɛn lɔŋ Yeesus cɛ̀ncii.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ sɛnsɛ̀ngày dòn, Yeesus à rɔ̀gsɛ̀n ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ ɓi fèg ki kpaa ŋwaàdɛŋ kìɓan ki ɓì ghɛɛ kìn à kpaŋ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Man à mum à ri ghèmɓɛn yi a ɓìloŋ. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tɔkà nyi ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛɛ kalag min lɛ, Eli à ka ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ yì kì yùu? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ Eli à rì ɓiì yùu lɛ a pɛɛ̀zi kì rɛsaagh ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Kìɓan kifog, ǹkalii mìni lɛ, Eli à yùghà wɔ̀lɛ ɓum ɓɛ yitìghà ɓì nyi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kighà rì nyi yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔngà ɓɔ. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ yighà min lɛ, kìɓan ki Zyaŋ Bàɓtis kɛɛ̀ki à kpaaghà ɓɔ.
