Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà jàŋbog rì gwìy ì ɓum, ŋwaàdɛŋ à yù kì kpìi Yeesus asu, rì mɛ̀ɗu, à kpaa lɛ: 
Kan, wogha man wɛm̀ nyìighnyìg, a roròɓ kitìs, ki ki yeeyeèsì nyi lɛɛ̀gwey; à ti à kpìlàg ɓi ɗuu, nsoò lɛ ɓi mɛ̀nig. 
Màa yùu yì rì nyi a ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ, nni àa yaagh ɓɔ rìwɔ̀ɔ̀zì. 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ, ɓì rì lɛ, mìni kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, mìni ɓìɗyoŋi ɓi ɓum; ǹɗi ɓiì kɔ̀rii ǹɗaŋ ri mìni, ǹki cenɛn mìni ǹkpaŋ fin? Yùunay mɛ̀ fɛ rì mutyàànɛn. 
Nni Yeesus à fwààdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, ki kpaŋ ɓi mutyàànɛ̀n, à ghàs kì wɔ̀ni lɔŋ wɔɔ foo.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ tɔg nyi a dwìɗ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kiǹ kaa yaagh ɓìsi rìnàɓ? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Kaa yaagh mìni rìnàɓ lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi tɔɔ ɓì; ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ; i ɓyàa rì ɗì rìgherɛ̀n ɗìtèghɛn yɛ̀ɛ zàm ì doŋ, di ɓì rì lɛ, i ɓì kpaa dòn ìnɛ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn fɛ kɛ̀na fɛnii, ì pɛ̀sɛ̀n; di com ki yin lɛ ki yag mìni. 
Kìɓan kifog, lɔŋ bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɗì kìcèlì ki ɓiɗilàg ɓyɛɛ ti ɓi kilàg lɛ, rìkuu ɗi kiɓeɓtàg ki nghay ɗìn ɗyɛɛ kpaŋ̀.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rerènìghà ziinɛ a Galile, Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ ɓiì kàɓi Man à mum rì ɓum; 
ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wey nyi, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ŋwos a kìraa, à ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ. Kìɓan kiǹ ki faghà ɓɛ̀yilàg bim ɓi nɗem lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Kapɛrinawum, ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ ànɛ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ tɔkà Pyɛɛri lɛ: Nɗèsàg wìn à tì kɛ̀ɛ pee làmpoŋ̀ ànɛ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll? 
Pyɛɛri à ɓàg lɛ: À ti à peeghì. Nni yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa, fɔɔnnɛ à lokà kì tòòghrɛɛ à kpaa lɛ: Simɔn! Wɔ̀ɔ̀ ghɛɛ la? Mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ti mɛ tɔkì ɓɛ̀ghɛn làmpoŋ̀? Ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ gìn ɓɛ̀kèn? 
Pyɛɛri à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ tɔkì. Yeesus à ɓàg Pyɛɛri lɛ: Fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ, ɓɔn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓaà pee ɓi. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ yughà Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ cee min ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò? 
Nni Yeesus à reŋìghày maa ŋwɔɓti à rɛsì ɓɔ nyi ɓi nyìinyìm, 
à kpaa lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, i ɓì koɓsɛɛ ɓi lɛ ɓi ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg, ɓyàa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì sɛɛdii nyimiɗ ɓi zi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ maa mutyàànɛ, nnyɛɛ ri ɓiì ceè ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. 
Fɔɔnnɛ i mum à ghàɓi maa ŋwɔɓti yɛ̀ɛ ànɛ ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m di mɛ̀ nnɛ à ghàɓi. 
Kìɓan kifog, ì ŋwaà kɛ̀ɓtii kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓɛ fìɓàg, ki ɓa tì kìrɔɔ ɓisu wii lɛ, ɓɛɛ kaŋ̀ nyi coo gɔ̀g ì kìpɛn ɓi kìmììgh, ɓɛɛ ɓimzi nyi ɓi rìɓày. 
Nyìighnyìg rì ziinɛ lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi kɛ̀ɛkɛɓtìyɛ̀n ɓum tìɓàg ɓi ri miì. Tìɓàg ti yin lɛ ti taŋ̀, kìɓan kìfog, nyìighnyìg rì ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɓtii romum fìɓàg. 
I càg kɔɔ nsoò lɛ ìkòò wɔɔ ɓyɛɛ ti ɓi kɛɓtàg wɔ̀ fìɓàg, rena ɓyɔ, u mag ɓyɔ fìràɓ; lɛ ki ri wɔ̀ kìrɔɔ lɛ u ghɛǹ cɛɓ rì càg kifòg, nsoò lɛ ìkòò wufòg, à cee lɛ u kɛǹ ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ɓyàg ɓyɔɔ ɓìcèm, nsoò lɛ rì mɛ̀kòò mɔɔ mɛcèm. 
I ɗis ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ ti ɗi kɛɓtàg wɔ̀ fìɓàg, sɔgha ɗyɔ, u mag ɗyɔ fìràɓ, lɛ ki rì wɔ̀ kìrɔɔ lɛ, u ghɛn cɛɓ di ù rì ɗis ɗìfog à cee lɛ u kɛǹ ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ rì mis mɔɔ mɛcèm.
Kɔ̀riina ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi sɛɛti kibog ki ɓi ɓɔɓti ɓɛ. Lɛ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓaa ɓɛ rɛrɛlii cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi mis mɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyòò. 
Lɛ Man à mum à yùghà ki ghɛɓsii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗimgà.
Mìnii ghɛɛ là? I ŋwaà rì ɗì jɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ, nnɛ ì ɗimi bog, à yin nya lɛ à càɗ jɔ̀ɔ̀ yimbog mɛ̀tin mɛnin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì taànìn, à ka kɛ̀n kì kaà ìnɛ yàa ɗimi? 
I à tanɛɛ tì yɔ̀, ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, à ɓiì woògh kìrɔɔ rì jɔ̀ɔ̀ ìnɛn à cee yi mɛtin mɛnin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì taànìn yi yaa rɔ̀ɓi. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Seŋi wìn ànɛ à rì aɗyoo, à kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔɓti ɓɛ kɛɛ taŋ̀.
I goni à kìi kìɓe, kɛ̀na, u reɓ nyi a mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; i à woogh deɓ yɔɔ, di ù rùnɛɛ nyi. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, i à ɓèni kì woògh deɓ yɔɔ, ù reŋì tì mum bog nsoò lɛ ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, lɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ kpaàrɛn di ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ri ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ nsoò lɛ ɓɛraa. 
I à ɓèèdii tì ɓɔ kì woògh, ù kalì kìɓan kiǹ ɓi nyìinyìm à kìseŋi. I à rɔ̀ɓtii kɛ̀ɛ wog rikpaa ɗi kiseŋi, tera nyi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à yin ǹgherɛ̀n nsoò lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹterì-làmpoŋ̀. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ; com kìcèm ki ɓì ɓiì kàŋi fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ ri kɔ ɓiì kàŋi aɗyòò, fɔɔnnɛ kìcèm ki ɓì ɓiì fùmii fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ ri kɔ ɓiì fùmii aɗyòò.
Ǹkalii tì mìni saaɗ à rìkalì lɛ; i ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ wooghrɛɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg Tààta wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyoo com kidɛŋ, à rì ɓɔ kɔ ɓiì faà. 
Ɓisuulɛ, jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ nsoò lɛ ɓɛraa ɓɛ taŋzɛɛ ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà ɓi nyìinyìm wàà.
Nni Pyɛɛri à tyòŋdɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì cenɛɛ geni wɛ̀m di à kìi mɛ̀ kìɓe gɛ̀n yaŋ? Ǹɗì lɛ ǹcenɛ̀n nyi lɔŋ gɛ̀n taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹkalii ɓi wɔ lɛ lɔŋ gɛ̀n taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀; ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ; gɛ̀n mɛtin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ à kpaŋ, fɔlɔɔ gɛ̀n taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗidɛŋ ɗi ɗi kɔngà lɛ ɗyɛɛ fiɓi ɓɛ̀pon ɓɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ ɓaghà nyi rì ɓɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à tumɛ̀ngà bàlì, nni ɓɛ yughà nyi rì ǹkìì-kìsay adɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà nyi rì pon a bàlìì ɓɛ̀mìlìyɔŋ. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà ɓi ri bee inɛ lɛ à lèɓ pon anɛ̀n, nni masà wìì a kìsay a reɓsighà lɛ ɓɛɛ kaɓ lɛ, rì nyi, rì giy, rì ɓɔn ɓii, rì ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm ɓisuu pon anɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n à kpìghà ɓi zi à ɓag rìfòm mɛ̀ɗu asu, à kpaa lɛ: Masà ka cenɛn mɛ̀, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì lèɓi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n mɛ̀cèm. 
Nyìighnyìg ì kìghà masà anɛ̀n ɗì ǹkìì-kìsay wiì, fɔɔnnɛ à cenɛ̀ngà nyi pon wiì, à càɗ nyi lɛ a kɛǹ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n à kpagà, à tuusɛ̀n ɗì reŋkàŋ wìì adɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà nyi rì pon a hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ. Nni à sɛngà ɓi roànɛ̀n, à ɓan nyi a ɓɛ̀ɓoŋ di a kakali lɛ: Lèɓa mɛ̀ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀m. 
Reŋkàŋ wìì anɛ̀n à kpìghà nyi a mɛ̀kòò, à yɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg di a kakali lɛ: Ka cenɛn mɛ̀, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì peè. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n à gherɛ̀ngà ɓi rikalì ɗi reŋkàŋ wìì ɗiǹ. Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà nyi kì pìigh ɓi naà-zày, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ roànɛ̀n à lèɓkà pon ànɛ̀n. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ki kɛŋ ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaà masà wàà, com kìcèm ki ki ghaghìghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ masà wàà a romgà lɛ ɓɛɛ regiì nyi ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ nkìì-kìsay anɛ ù rì rì rìgɛn; mɛ̀ɛ ǹcenɛɛ wɔ̀ pon wɔɔ̀ bimiɗ yɛ̀ɛ ùu mɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mɛ̀ lɛ, ǹcenɛn wɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀ɔ n-yin lɛ ù wog roŋkàŋ nyìighnyìg yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ mɛ̀ɛ ǹwoogh wɔ̀ nyìighnyìg? 
Nni masà wìì a wokà bim, à kpaa ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ foŋ nyi ɓi naà-zày, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à ɓiì lègsii ki peè pon wiì. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Tààta wɛ̀m ànɛ à rì aɗyoo à rì mìni ɓiì kìi di mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni à cenɛɛ ɓi geni wìì ri nɗem wii wucèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Galile à kɛ̀n ɓi kìden ki zi ki a Zyude ki ki ri cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum lɛɛ̀gwɛy ɓi nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi wɔɔ, à ki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓyɔ. 
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kɛngà nyi jàŋbog rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ puri nyi càg ɓi ɗùm. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi kpaa nya lɛ mum àrì lɛ à nàɓ giɓ wiì nsoò ɓi ǹtoo-kiɓan aɗi? 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ɓi ka ɓalà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: A rìtumɛ̀n Ǹkìì-ɓyom ɓìcèm à kìghà lɛ rì giɓ rì baŋì, 
à ki kpaa lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki baŋì ì rì ɓiì càriì lɛ rì seŋi rì jɛɛ, ì ràrɛ̀n ɓɛɛ giy, kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum ki ghay com kìfog. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ yiìdi ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ tì com kìfog. Mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi min ki ghasii com ki Bɛ̀ll à ràri. 
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ Moyis à kalìghà min lɛ, ɓɛɛ falag giɓ kaàtà à gasɛ̀n di ɓɛ ti nyi ɓiì nàɓi? 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Moyis à gherɛ̀ngà lɛ, ɓi naɓkag ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓin, ɓisuulɛ ɓì tèri mɛ̀rem. Wɔ̀lɛ a rìtumɛ̀n, ki ɓaghà ɓì fɔlɔɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì nàɓi giɓ wiì, di ki yin lɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à kìi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, i à wɔɔtii giɓ adɛŋ, di à kìi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: I fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìɓa ɗi baŋì ɗi ɓɛɛ gil ɗi ri, ki ɓa min kirɔɔ lɛ, mum kɛ̀ɛ wɛy giɓ. 
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ wog rìkpaa ɗiǹ, i ki cee ɓi lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ki ri kì fayɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɗyɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ri wɔɔ, ɓɛ ri myɛg à tumɛ̀n ɓi mùm mɛ ɓɛ̀jɛɛ ɓaa, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓa lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kii ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog, ɓɛ ghaasì ɓɔmiɗ myɛg ɓisuu kilɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. Ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ à wog, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh.
Nni ɓum ɓɛ yughày Yeesus rì ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg, lɛ a saagh ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, à ki ɓɔŋzi Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wàà, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ nyɛɛdɛ̀ngà ɓumɓɛ̀n. 
Yeesus à kpaa lɛ: Càrina ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg, kɛ̀ ɓi règ ɓɔ rìyù ɗi a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò ki ri ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓaghà lɛ, à mɛ saaghrag ɓɔ ɓyàɓ ɓi nyoo, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n à ghaàgh.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ kɛngà Yeesus a nyoo à tɔg nyi lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg! cɛ ki syeesyee kɛɛ̀ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kiì ɓi ɗi lɛ mɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ù tɔɔgh mɛ̀ lɛ nɗeɓ wɔ̀ kìɓan ki syeesyee? Syeesyee à mum à rì lɔŋ bogtɛ̀n. Uù kɔ̀ni lɛ u ghɛǹ cɛɓ, ɓèŋa ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna; ŋwaànɛ̀n à tɔg lɛ: Ɓi be? 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ wey mum, kɔ̀ɔ kì fisɔ̀mɔ̀g, kɔ̀ɔ yii com ki mum, kɔ̀ɔ pwàà mum kìɓan ɓi nyoo; 
ù nyaasì soŋi ɓɛɛ̀ gaa, ù ki keesi romum ànɛ wɔ̀ jàŋbog yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ. 
Dɛlì ì mum ìnɛ̀n ì kpaa Yeesus lɛ: M̀mɛ ɓèŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓiǹ ɓìcèm nni cɛ kidɛŋ kɛɛ̀ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì kì kiì? 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Uù kɔ̀ni lɛ ù ɓa syeesyee à mum lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, kɛ̀na, u kaɓ ɓyom ɓyɔɔ ɓìcèm u kaɓsi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha fɔɔnnɛ ù ɓiì ɓa rì ìkum aɗyòò. Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn u yu u nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ dɛlì ìnɛn ì wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni ì ghaghìghà rì bim, ɓisuulɛ ì ɓaghà rì ìkum lɛɛ̀gwey.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Nkalii mìni saaɗ lɛ, ki ri kìtèetèɗ ki kiɓan lɛ guŋgum a ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. 
Ǹkalii tì mìni lɛ, ki ri lɛ fɛnfɛn lɛ syàmoo a ɗiŋi ɓi ɗyas ɗi bààtà à cee lɛ guŋgum a ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kuuràg lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ri min lɛ à ghɛn cɛɓ? 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ ki yin ɓi rìkì ɗi ɓum, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, com ki lɛ ki yaaghrɛ̀n rìkì ki yin.
Nni Pyɛɛri à tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀ à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Ghɛna lɛ, ɓìsii rinìghày ɓyom ɓìcèm tì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì wɔ̀, mɛ̀lèɓ mis mɛ rì ɓaa gɛ cɛ? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, yɛɛ Man à mum à kɔ̀rii gɛ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì wu rikem, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi sugtii gɛ ɓɛ̀nyɔɔnyɔn ɓɛ ɓyom, mìni ɓɛ ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà mɛ̀, ɓì kɔ̀rii gɛ girig ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ rilàmì ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì mɛɓɛɛ̀, lɛ ɓi yɔm̀ mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ Isirayɛl ntɛ̀ɗ ɗì mɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rinìghày mɛɛ mii, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛbaŋì rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ, nsoò seŋi, nsoò jɛɛ, nsoò giy, nsoò ɓɔn, nsoò zi yii, à rì ɓiì fɔ̀ni ɓyom ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓi cee ɓiǹ, gɛ̀n hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ, à ki fɔ̀ɔ̀di cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Kìgwey kì ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà asu ki ɓaa gɛ ajɛ̀m; kìgwey ki ɓi ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ajɛ̀m; ki ghay ɓum ɓɛ beèbɛ̀y.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò ki pisɛɛ rì ŋwaàdɛm adɛŋ, ànɛ à pongà kì kaà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kìsay ɓi dɛm yiì. 
Nni à wooghrɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓumɓɛ à tekà ɓi kìsay lɛ, à rì ɓɔ ɓiì peeghii dolà bog ɓi bimiɗ à ŋwos. Fɔɔnnɛ à romgà min ɓɔ a dɛm yiì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ taànìn à kpagà, nni à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà kì kaatii ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, à ghɛn ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ di ɓɛ rɛrɛrii ɓi kìɓàà, kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì. 
À kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna kì salì ɓi dɛm yɛm̀, ǹɗi mìni ɓiì lèɓi yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛǹ ɓi dɛm. Nni ŋwaàdɛm anɛ̀n à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà kì kaà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓi cààmɛ̀n à toroɓ, rì cààmɛ̀n à mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa, à rom ɓɔ a dɛm yiì, à kàg lɔŋ ɓɔ mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ à kàkà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog. 
Di mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛtaǹ à cɛŋkò à ti jàŋbog nni à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìtìghà kì kaà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛdɛŋ, à tanɛ̀n ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ di ɓɛ rɛrɛrii girig ɓi kìɓàà, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì ghagsii bimiɗ à ŋwos fɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi say? 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Mum àa reŋii ɓi ɓisi lɛ ti ki nyi kìsay. Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna girig kìsalì ɓi dɛm yɛm̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, ŋwaàdɛm a kpaa ŋwaànɛ àa m̀ɓègì ìkum wii lɛ: Regi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ̀cèm, u fa ɓɔ mɛ̀lèɓ maa, ù tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓɛ̀roɓɛ siitòn, ù siitɛ̀n ɓi ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ǹtonto. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà kìsay mɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛtaǹ à cɛŋkò ɓɛ yughà, ɓɛ peeghi ɓɔ dolà, dolà. 
Yɛɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à lokà kì terì ɓɛ yughà lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ mɛ̀lèɓ maa, ɓɛ fekì lɛ, mɛ̀lèɓ maa mɛ ri ɓiì ceè mɛ ɓɛro ɓɛmbog; kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ falàkà lɔŋ ɓɔ dolà, dolà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tekàkà dolà ìnɛn, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìŋɔ̀ŋɔ̀ŋì ɗi ŋwaàdɛm, 
ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓaa siitɛɛ yì ɓɛ, ɓɔɔ sali lɔŋ hawò bog, wɔ̀ɔ̀ ki pee ɓɔ com kìfog rì ɓìsi ɓɛ tyàa cenɛɛ lɛ, rì kìfɔli, rì rìtɔ̀n ɓi bimiɗ à ŋwos! 
Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàkà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ lɛ: Reŋkàŋ! Ǹkìi ɓì wɔ kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹɗèm. Mɛ̀ɛ ǹti, tyàa wooghrɛɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì peè dolà? 
Wɔ̀ɔ̀ tera ɓà loò mɛ̀lèɓ mɔɔ, u ghaàgh wɔ̀ com kɔɔ. Mɛ̀ yɛɛ kɔni lɛ m̀peè ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ àa siitɛɛ kì yùu lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ m̀pee wɔ̀. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓì nya lɛ, ǹki rì ìkum wɛ̀m yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔni mɛ̀? Gìn ki ɓeɓi wɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗɔɔtɛɛ nɗem? 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓum ɓɛ siitòn ɓɛ ɓiì ɓaà ɓum ɓɛ beèbɛ̀y, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ beèbɛ̀y ɓɛ ghay ɓum ɓɛ siitòn.
Di Yeesus à ti lɛ a ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm, à tekà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ a dwìɗ, à kpaa ɓɔ di ɓɛ ti ɓi bee lɛ: 
Tì ɓɔɔgh yɛɛ lɛ a Yorisalɛm, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ɓiì faà Man à mum rì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, ɓɛ ren lɛ, ɓɛɛ wey nyi 
ɓɛ ki rì nyi ɓiì kàɓi ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ ki lɛ ɓɛ fengì nyi, ɓɛ ɓog nyi kìtòn, ɓɛ ki kpan nyi ɓi kɔrɔs; kìɓan kifog, à ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ ɓi ŋwos a kìraa.
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede à tyòŋdɛ̀ngà Yeesus a nyoo ri ɓɔn ɓii, à ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi lɛ a tɔg nyi kìɓan. 
Yeesus à tɔg nyi lɛ: La yɛɛ ri? Giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Gherɛn lɛ kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ kɛm̀ ki ɓɔɓti ki kɛɛ ki lɛ roànɛ à kɔ̀rì wɔ̀ ɓi weèlem, roàmbog à kɔ̀rì wɔ̀ ɓi kìmɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ ù rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ. 
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì lɛ: Ɓi yii ɓi com ki ɓi tɔtɔg mɛ kìn. Ɓì rì lɛ ɓì cenɛ̀n lɛ ɓi nɔ ɓeŋ ànɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ɓiì nɔɔ̀? Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Tì rì lɛ tì nɔ. 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ ɓì rì ɓiì nɔɔ̀ ɓeŋ wɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog àa mɛ̀ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kalii ghɛn yɛɛ rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kɔ̀rii ɓi weèlem nsoò lɛ ɓi kìmɛŋ; mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛǹ mɛ ri mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓumɓɛ Tààta à pègsɛ̀ngà mɔ ɓisu wàà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛmbog ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ wog bim ri kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede. 
Nni Yeesus à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi yii lɛ, mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓilɔ̀ŋ mɛ ti mɛ pyèngì ɓum mis ɗì ǹcììzɛ̀n; ɓɛ̀rɛli-asu ɓaa ɓɛ lamɓàg ɓɔ, ɓɛ ceesàg gin mɔ̀ɔ. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà fɔlɔɔ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, kìɓan kifog, ŋwaànɛ ki kɔni lɛ a ɓa nlàmì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ǹkìì-kìsay a ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ ki ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓa mìni ǹɗɛlì ànɛ asu, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ǹkpàn wiǹ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Man à mum à yùghà ɓi ziinɛ, àa lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kiki nyi ɓìsay, à yùghà lɔŋ lɛ, a say ɓum, à ki fa cɛɓ kii lɛ, a kweɗ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey.
Yɛɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛngày a Zyeriko, coo kìtuu ki ɓum ki nɔɔ̀tìghà Yeesus. 
Nni ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn ɓɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rìghà ɓi ŋwɔŋì wu bee, ɓɛ wokà lɛ Yeesus yɛɛ ri ɓi rìghaàgh, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò lɛ: Wɔ̀ Man a Davit, wogha ɓà ɓisi nyiìghnyìg Kan. 
Gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛn ì kpɔmdɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ maàrɛn, kìɓan kifog ɓɔɔ teŋzì tì jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò ɓɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: Wɔ̀ Man à Davit wogha ɓà ɓisi nyìighnyìg Kan! 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à rɛlìghà, à regì ɓɔ, à tɔg lɛ: Ɓì kɔ̀ngi lɛ, ǹki mìni cɛ? 
Ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyaŋ ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Kan, ti kɔ̀ngi lɛ, ti ghɛnɛ̀n. 
Nni Yeesus à wokà ɓɔ nyìighnyìg, à kòm mis maa, ɓɛ ghas kì ghɛnɛɛ, ɓɛ ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti jàŋbog rì Yorisalɛm, di ɓaa kpaŋ a Bɛtfazee, nunùg rì dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlìvyee, Yeesus à romgà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛɓɛɛ̀. 
À kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki riì mìni kinii asu, ɓì ɓiì ghàsi ki tanɛɛ jɛɛ à jàɗki, rì man ɓɛ̀ suŋɛn, ɓi fumiì yɔ, ɓi yu mɛ̀ rì yɔ. 
I ŋwaà tɔɔgh mìni com, ɓi ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan yɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi lɛ ti kɛǹ nyi rì yɔ, fɔɔnnɛ à rì mìni ɓiì càri lɛ, ɓi yuiy rì yɔ.
Wɔ̀lɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki kilɛ̀ngà lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a kalìghà lɛ: 
Kaliina gɔ̀n ì giɓ inɛ a Siyon lɛ: Ghɛna yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗyɔɔ ɗi yuu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, rì coo risɛɛ̀dɛ̀n ɗi nɗem, ɗi ɓɔg yì ɓi jɛɛ à jàɗki, rì ɓi kìɓɔɔ̀ghɓɔɔgh ki jàɗki, man à jàɗki.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kɛngà, ɓɛ ki lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sugtìghày lɛ: rì jɛɛ à jàɗki rì man wiì, ɓɛ ghay ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓi jàɗki yìn, ɓɛ kɔɔ̀sì Yeesus miì aɗyòò. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi ghaghàlà ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓi bee; ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ rendèn yì maŋ mɛ mɛtɛn di ɓɛɛ̀ ɓwààɓwaa ɓi bee. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi ɓi syoŋsyòŋgà Yeesus bee rì ɓi ɓi nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghày nyi ajɛ̀m ɓi kpaàkpàgsɛ̀ngà lɛ, Ozana! Rìkem ɗyɛ ɓa rì Man à Davit, Bɛ̀ll a maŋ̀ roànɛ à yùu yì ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan; Ozana, rìkem ɗyɛ ɓa rì Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà a Yorisalɛm, ban bimiɗ ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà ɓum ɓɛ tɔtɔg lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi mum aɗi ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ? 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓìn ɓi ɓaàg lɛ: Yeesus nnyɛɛ ri; à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ a Naazarɛt ɓi ziì Galile.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à nàɓ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ kakàɓkà ɓyom rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ lalàkà ɓyom ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à tyɔkì lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀teɓèrè ɓɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ceècènɗìghà ɓum mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, rì mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kakàɓkà ɓɛ̀kuùkuù. 
À ki kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Naa yɛ̀m ì rì ɓiì ɓaa naa ì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, kìɓan kifog mìnii ghaasii yɔ̀ naa ì ɓɛ̀wiiwìì.
Ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyaŋ rì ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm ɓɛ yughà nyi jàŋbog, ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ wokà bim yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà dàm yi à kìghà, rì yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg ɓɛ kpaàkpàgsɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Ozana, rìkem ɗyɛ ɓa rì Man à Davit. 
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Ù woogh com ki ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà? Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀! mìnii ka ɓalà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Ù tekà rìkem ɓi ŋwɔm wu ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg, ri a ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛ kaka ɓi mɛlì?
Yeesus à càɗkà ɓɔ, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi bàn, à kɛ̀n kì lalì a Bɛtanii.
Yɛ̀ɛ à suùsùgtìghà ɓi bàn ɗì sariwa, nni zày ì kɔ̀ngà nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ghɛngà ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee ɓi bee, à kɛ̀n wɔɔ; kìɓan kifog, à tanɛ̀n wɔ tyɛn ɗì tyɛn, à kpaa rì fìgyee ànɛn lɛ: Wàa wumdii gɛ ɓi kiɗùn nsoò kìfog. Lɔŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee wu ghaskà kì wiì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kuuràg; ɓɛ tɔg lɛ: Lannɛ ǹɗyèm wu fìgyee wu wu wii fɛlɛ cààmɛ̀n kɛ̀ kɛɛ ghaagh? 
Yeesus à bàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ lɛ, i ɓì rì rì rìgherɛ̀n, ɓì ki ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ nyoey ɓi nɗem, ɓì rì lɛ, ɓì kì kìɓan ki ǹkìi fìgyee ànɛ ki, ɓì ki ɓa ti kɔm̀ rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, i ɓì kpaa dòn ìnɛ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ pɛsɛn yɛ̀ɛ kɛǹ kì kpìi ɓi rìɓày, ki kilɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ. 
Com kìcèm ki ɓì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh rì rìgherɛ̀n ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓi ɓiì ɓaà rì kɔ.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, nni yɛ̀ɛ à rèèrèsàkà ɓum ɓìɓan, nni ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ yughà nyi kì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ: U kìki ɓiɓan ɓi rì ìtèɗ wu ghɛn? Ghɛn yɛɛ ki faa wɔ̀ ìtèɗ wiǹ? Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹtɔg ɓà girig mìni ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wufog, i ɓì ɓàagh mɛ̀ wɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaa min mini jàŋ inɛ ìtèɗ wu nkìki ɓiɓan miì wu riì mɛ̀. 
Bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ ì ɓaghà nya kìɓan ki Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ fekà gìn ì ɓaghà kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛɛ fekà? Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ fiɓìghà ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wiǹ wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: I tì ɓàagh nyi lɛ bàɓtis ìnɛ̀n ì ɓaghà kìɓan ki Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ fekày, à rì ɓìsi ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ, nni ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì gherɛ̀ngà ɓi yɔ̀? 
I tì ki ɓàagh lɛ: Ì rì kìɓan kì ɓum ɓɛɛ fekà, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì risii gwìy ìnɛ, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ gherɛɛ lɛ Zyaŋ à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓakà Yeesus lɛ: Ɓìsii yii ɓi ǹkòo bàɓtis ìnɛ̀n ì ɓaghà rìfèg ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ǹkòo rìfèg ɗi ɓum. Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ girig mɛ̀ ǹkpaa ɓi mini ɓi-tèɗ aɗi nnɛ nkìki ɓiɓan ɓi.
Mìnii ghɛɛ kìɓan ki là? Lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀dɛlì ɓii ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, nni à reŋìghà roàntonto, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Man, kɛ̀na mɛ̀ kìsay a dɛm gɛɛ̀nɛ. 
Man à ɓàg lɛ: Ǹ-yin ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni. Wɔ̀lɛ ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, à ghɛngà rìnàn ɗii à ki kɛ̀n a dɛm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à reŋìghà man à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀, à rom girig nyi a dɛm yɛ̀ɛ à romgà roàntonto, ŋwɔɓti à ɓàg lɛ: Tààta, ǹɗì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ki kɛ̀n. 
Nni ɓi kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓɔɓti kiǹ, roàbe yɛɛ kighà rìkɔ̀n ɗi seŋì? Ɓum ɓɛ Yeesus à tekà dàɗkì ìnɛn ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Man à ǹtonto yɛɛ kighà rìkɔ̀n ɗi seŋì. Yeesus à ki kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ riɓàmɓà ɓɛ loogh gɛ kì kpaŋì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll rì mìni. 
Ɓisuulɛ, Zyaŋ à yùghà a lɔ̀ŋkin, à rèsì mìni bee ì saaɗ, kɛ̀ ɓi gherɛn nyi, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ riɓàmɓà ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi. Nni nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓì ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà ɓi mɛrem lɛ ɓi gherɛn nyi.
Wooghna dàɗkì idɛŋ yɛ̀ɛnɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ salà dɛm yiì, à ɓɛ̀y viìnyɛ̀ miì, à cèŋzɛ̀n dɛm inɛ̀n rì gari, à kì wayɗ ɓi dɛm inɛ̀n, à ki toŋ ɓyoo mɛɛ wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ à faghà yɔ̀ ɓi rɛŋtì rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, à kɛ̀n rìkɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ viìnyɛ̀ ì ɓàgà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛs, nni à pɛ̀sìghà ɓum, à rom yì a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ à càɗkà dɛm rì ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ rom gàɓ yìì i ɓìɗilàg. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ɓangàkà ɓumɓɛ a romgày ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ ki lɛ, ɓɛ ɓog roànɛ kìtòn, ɓɛ wey roàmbog, ɓɛ ki rogi roàkìraa gɔ̀g. 
Nni ŋwaàdɛm a pɛ̀sìghày tì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ ɓɛ ceeghà ɓɛ ǹtonto ɓi bàlì, à romdì lɔŋ ɓɔ a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ a dɛm, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ki tì rì ɓumɓɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ka kìghà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛ ǹtonto. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à siitɛ̀ngà min ki pɛ̀sii man wiì, à rom nyi a ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ, rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì nìŋi man wiì. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ ɓɛ mɛɛ ghɛngày man à ŋwaànɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaa wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Nnyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì rɔ̀ɓi ri dɛm i seŋì, yùuna ti wey nyi, di fɔɔnnɛ dɛm yɛ̀ɛ woòghrɛn rì ɓìsi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓangà min man ànɛ̀n, ɓɛ pig nyi jɛ̀m ì gari, ɓɛ wey. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛm a rì ɓiì yùu, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki à rì ɓiì kìi ri ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ à reɓsɛ̀ngà dɛm ɓɛǹ rì ɓɔ? 
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà Yeesus lɛ: À ɓiì cuusii ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓiǹ kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìrɔ̀ɓ, à ki teɗ dɛm yiì, à fa yɔ̀ ɓi rɛntì rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ rì nyi ɓiì falaagh gàɓ yìì i ɓìɗilàg di bèg ì kpaŋi. 
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi ka ɓalà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓɛ̀toŋì-mɛɛ ɓɛ makà, yɛ̀ɛ ki ghalà gɔ̀g ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ konag kì lèmi ǹtɔn à mɛɛ? Kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓaghày yɛ̀ɛ Kan, ki ki rì dàm ì kìɓan inɛ ì kìlɛɛ ɓìsi ɓi mis.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkalii mìni lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì pisii kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɓɛ fa kɔ rì kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki ri ɓiì wumì ɓìɗùn ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì kpìi ɓi gɔ̀g ìnɛ, à ɓiì ɓumɓuni miì, ŋwaànɛ ì kpìi ɓi nyoo, ì turì nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ wokà dàɗkì yin, nnɛ ɓɛ yighà min lɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kaakààghà bee inɛ ɓɛɛ ɓan nyi; wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ rirìsìghà ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi ɓi ɓaghà wɔɔ, lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà lɛ Yeesus à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Yeesus à tòòghrɛ̀ngà tì rì ɓɔ ɓi dàɗkì à kpaa lɛ:
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò ki pisɛɛ rì rìfòm ɗidɛŋ ɗi ɗi reŋɗɛ̀ngà kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓi rìwɛy ɗi dɛlì yìì. 
Rìfòm ɗiǹ ɗi romgà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛ ɓɛɛ reŋiì ɓumɓɛ à reŋìghà a kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ kiǹ, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɔngà ɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ yu. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à romdìghà tì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛdɛŋ à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kaliina ɓumɓɛ mɛ̀ɛ nɗeŋii lɛ: M̀mɛ lamgi gɛcom; ɓɛ̀sanìnya ɓɛ̀m, rì ɓìtuwe ɓyɛm̀ ɓi fɔmɛn ɓi ti ɓì wolɛn, ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ti ɓì pègsɛn, yùuna kìsɛ̀nɛ̀. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓumɓɛ à reŋɗɛ̀ngà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ sɛɛtìghà nɗeèghreŋi wii ɓɛ ghaaghràg. Roànɛ à kɛ̀n a dɛm yiì, roàmbog à kɛ̀n nyi dùne. 
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ sɛn ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ rifòm, ɓɛ ɓog ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki cuusi ɓɔ. 
Nni rìfòm ɗi wokà bim, ɗi rom ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓii ɓɛ cuusì ɓɛ̀wolì-ɓum ɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ ki ɗigsi bàn yàà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ rìfòm ɗi kpaaghà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii lɛ: Ɓyom ɓi kisɛ̀nɛ̀ ɓi ti ɓì pègsɛn, wɔ̀lɛ àa ɓumɓɛ mɛ̀ɛ nɗeŋii, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ mɛ̀ɛ ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì reŋii. 
Nni kɛ̀ɛna ɓi mɛ̀tanag mɛ ɓiɓàà, ɓi reŋiì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓì tanɛɛ wɔɔ, ɓɛɛ yu kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ kɛm̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ saàtɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓìɓàà, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngày, lɛ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum, rì ɓum ɓɛ syeesyee; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ rongà ɓi naa ì kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ lɛ pisa.
Yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗi ɗiŋìghày ɓi naa lɛ ɗyɛɛ ghɛǹ ɓɛ̀kèn, nni ɗi ghɛngà ŋwaàdɛŋ wɔɔ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìlàà ki riwɛy. 
Ɗi tɔg ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m! Lannɛ wàa kìi lɛ u ɗiŋiì fɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìlàà ki riwɛy? Ŋwaànɛ̀n à rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki a kpaà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ rìfòm ɗi kpaaghà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii lɛ: Kàŋina mɛ̀ ŋwaànɛ lɛ, rì mɛ̀kòò rì ɓyàg, ɓi pig nyi ɓi birìm ìnɛ ɓi dan, jàŋ ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓiì rèereèdɛ̀n ɓɛ ŋaàŋààdì min. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀reŋiyɛn, kìɓan kifog, lɛsàg ɓɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kɛngà dwìɗ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ ìghèy wu ɓɛɛ wɔɔ̀si Yeesus ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi nyimiɗ a kalii.
Nni ɓɛ romgà ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ waa rì ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Eroodɛ, lɛ ɓɛɛ kali Yeesus lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, tì yii lɔŋ lɛ ù rì ŋwaànɛ a kpaakpaa saaɗ, à ki rèresi ɓum bee inɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ risi bimiɗ à mum, ɓisuulɛ, ù yin ɓiì seesee riɓa ɗi mum. 
Wɔ̀ɔ̀ kali ɓà ɓisì, nkòo ɓi rìghɛn ɗyɔɔ, ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ lɛ ti peeghi làmpoŋ̀ rì Kaaza? 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà lɛ ɓɛ purii nyi càg yɛɛri ɓi ɗùm, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm ɓɛ! Ɓi fèeghfeèghrɛ̀n mɛ̀ lɛ cɛ? 
Rèsiina mɛ̀ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ peeghì làmpoŋ̀ miì; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ceesìghà nyi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ firaŋ̀. 
À tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Kìfèèghrɛnà ki, rì ɗii ɗi, ghɛn yɛɛ ri rì ɓyɔ? 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Kaaza yɛɛ ri rì ɓyɔ. Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ɓɔ lɛ: Pɛ̀ɛ̀ziina lɔŋ ɓyom ɓi Kaaza ɗì Kaaza, ɓì pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɗì Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà rìɓàg ɗiǹ, nni ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ caɗ Yeesus, ɓɛ ghaaghràg.
Ŋwos ancèm ànɛn, Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpaaghi lɛ, com kidɛŋ ki yin lɛ, rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, ɓɛ yughày Yeesus a nyoo, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: 
Nɗèsàg! Moyis à kalìghà lɛ, i ŋwaà wii, kɛ̀ɛ càɗ man, geni à baŋì à teɗ ǹkpɔɓ wii, à yay ɓɔn ɗì wɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi geni ànɛ à wii. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsii ǹɗì fɛ rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹɗì ɓi rìgeni ɗyaa, ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, baŋì rì baŋì. Roànsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn a wɔlɛ̀ngà, à ki wu; yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà ɓi ri man, nni à càɗkà ǹkpɔɓ wii ri geni. 
Fɔɔnnɛ geni à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a wughà, kɛ̀ɛ̀ man roàkìraa gìrig; à kɛ̀n kì kpaŋì ɓi roà kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Ajɛ̀m ì kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn, nnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à wughà girig. 
Nni ŋwosi righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, giɓ anɛ̀n a ɓaa gɛ gili ghɛ̀n anɛ ɓi kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn? Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀yii ɓii? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi pwààrɛɛ; ɓisuulɛ ɓi kìi lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi wog ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓì kànɛn, kɛ̀ ɓi ki yi itèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll. 
Lɛ ŋwosi righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓilòŋ, ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓaa wɔɔti ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ, ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wɔɔti ɓɛbaŋì; ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaa gɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri aɗyòò. 
Ɓi kìɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, ɓì ɓàlà ɓi kiɓan ki Bɛ̀ll à kalìghà mìni lɛ: 
Ǹɗì Bɛ̀ll à Abiraham, Bɛ̀ll à Isag rì Bɛ̀ll à Yakɔɓ? Bɛ̀ll à yin Bɛ̀ll à ɓìloŋ à rì Bɛ̀ll à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ rì cem. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gwìy ì ɓum ì wòkà ɓìtòkì ɓi Yeesus ɓiǹ, rìrèsì ɗii ɗi komgà ɓɔ mɛ̀rem.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà di ɓɛ mɛ wog lɛ, Yeesus àa sìmi Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ŋwɔm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ, ki ki ɓaghà coo ǹ-yiì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, ki yughà ki fèèghrɛɛ Yeesus rì ntɔɔ̀tɔɔgh lɛ: 
Ǹɗèsàg, ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓì Bɛ̀ll ɓìcèm, kibe kɛɛ cee? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki kɛɛ kalag lɛ: Keesi Kan Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀, rì ǹɗem wɔɔ wucèm, rì ǹghay wɔɔ wucèm, rì mɛ̀yitì mɔɔ mɛcèm. 
Kɛɛ ri kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki asu, ki ki cee ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓimbog ɓìcèm. 
Ki kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ki pisɛɛ kiǹ ki ri lɛ: Keesi romum ànɛ wɔ̀ jàŋbog yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ. 
Ɓi kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓidɔ̀gsɛna kiǹ, nnɛ rìrèsàg ɗi Moyis ɗìcèm, rì mɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, mɛ sasaghii.
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn, Yeesus à tɔkà ɓɔ ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh lɛ: 
Mìnii kpaaghi la ɓi kìɓan ki Kiris? À rì man à ghɛn? Ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: À rì man à Davit. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Nni lannɛ Davit à reŋìghà nyi lɛ Kan, di Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll à faa nyi ɗyomzɛ̀n, yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: 
Kan àa ǹkpaa Kan wɛ̀m lɛ: Kɔ̀ri mɛ̀ fɛ ɓi weèlem, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì foŋì ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɔɔ a mɛ̀kòò mɔɔ zi.
Nni i Davit à mɛ regi nyi lɛ Kan, lannɛ à rì lɛ à ɓa tì man à Davit? 
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à ɓàg nyi ntɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wiǹ à ɓaghà ɓi. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓi ŋwos anɛ̀n ŋwaàdɛŋ à ghɛɛsìghà tì ɓi lɛ a tɔg nyi ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kalìghà gwìy ì ɓum rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: 
Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ri Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ, ɓɛ ri ri ǹtɛ̀g wulɛ, ɓɛɛ resag ɓum ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ɓì wog, ɓì ki ɓèŋ ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kpaa mìni; kìɓan kifog, kɛ̀ ɓi nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛkìkìì maa, ɓisuulɛ, ɓɔɔ̀ kakali ri ŋwɔm, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kì com ki ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kagì ɓìrìirìɗ ɓi mɛtɛ̀g di ɓɛɛ̀ tɛ̀ɛghtɛgsì ɓumkifog, ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ gherɛn lɛ di ɓaa nyɛ̀ŋi mɛ̀tɛ̀g mɛǹ nsoò rì man à càg. 
Ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì ɓi ri lɔŋ lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ ghɛn bɔ; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ sinàg ɓɛ̀kànɗa ɓɛ pògpòg ɓi mɛ̀to rì ɓi ɓyàg, ɓɛ ki ràɓsag mɛkeɓ maa mɛ ɓìlàà. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ asu, di ɓɛ kɛɛ kìsɛ̀nɛ̀, ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓɛ kɔràg ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ǹtonto. 
Ki kɔngì girig ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ toòtògsì ɓɔ rì coo nyaasɛ̀n ɓi gwìy, ɓɛ ki rereŋi ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀rèsàg. 
Wɔ̀lɛ mìnii ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki gherɛɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ rereŋi mìni lɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg ɓisuulɛ, ɓì rì lɔŋ ri ǹɗèsàg bog, miniìcèm ɓì ki ɓa ti ɓi rìgeni. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi reŋi ŋwaàdɛŋ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ lɛ tààta wìn, ɓisuulɛ, ɓì rì lɔŋ Seŋi bog lɛ roànɛ à rì aɗyòò. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ki gherɛn lɛ, ɓɛɛ reŋi mìni lɛ, ɓɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì ɓisuulɛ ɓì rì lɔŋ ri ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀sì wìn bog nnyɛɛ ri lɛ Kiris. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì ɓaà ǹɗɛlì-asù ɓi nɗaŋ win, a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ǹkìì-kìsay wiǹ. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì ɓiì ɓɔgsii nyimiɗ, ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì sɛɛ̀dii; roànɛ à sɛɛ̀dii nyimiɗ ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì nyi.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓì ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ɓisuulɛ ɓi ghegheg ɓum lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò; mìniìɓɔmiɗ kɛ̀ ɓi ɗiŋi miì, kɛ̀ ɓi ki gherɛn lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi miì, ɓɛɛ ɗiŋì. [ 
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm ɓisuulɛ ɓi pùupumzì mɛɛ mɛ mɛkpɔɓ, ɓì kìkì ɓyoo bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ feki lɛ, ɓì rì ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ ɓum; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì rì ɓiì terì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi deɓ.]
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ɓisuulɛ ɓi rereni jàŋ lɛ, ri ɓi rìɓày rì ɓi zi ì zɛy lɛ ɓi syoŋ mum ànɛ ɗiŋi ɓi nɗaŋ win nsoò bogtɛ̀n. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ki syòŋi mum lɔɔ, ɓì kì lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n a ɓa ŋwaànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, à cee mìni ɓi kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹɗem.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ: mìni rì tìɗyaŋ, ɓi ki kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì ɓɛ̀ro ɓum. Ɓì ti ɓì kpaaghì lɛ: I ŋwaà kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ri naà-Bɛ̀ll, di à kìi ɓi com, wɔ̀lɛ i ŋwaà kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ri gol ìnɛ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, fɔlɔɔ a rèsì lɛ, à rì ǹsììrɛn ɗi kìɓan ki à kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ miì. 
Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ: mìni lɛ dùŋdùŋ, ɓì ki ɓa ti rì tìɗyaŋ, rì gol rì naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìkì lɛ gol yɛ̀ɛ ɓa kìcèlì, cɛ kɛɛ cee kimbog? 
Ɓì ti ɓì kalàg tì lɛ, i ŋwaà kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ɗi rìkùna, di à kìi ɓì com; kìɓan kifog, i ŋwaà kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ri kìtuwe ki ɓɛ saghii ɓi rìkùna di à rì ǹsììrɛn ɓi kìɓan ki à kpaa. 
Mìni ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ɓɛ! Rì com ki ŋwaà faa ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, rì rìkùna ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ kìki lɛ com kiŋcèm kɛɛ ɓa kìcèlì, cɛ kɛɛ cee kimbog? 
I ŋwaà kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ɗì rìkùna, di à kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ɗì rìkùna ɗyɔmiɗ, rì com kìcèm ki ki sasaghii miì aɗyòò. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ rì naà-Bɛ̀ll, di à kìi lɛ, à kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ rì naà-Bɛ̀ll yɔ̀miɗ, à ki kànɛn ɗi roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni Ŋwaànɛ à kànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ɗi ɗyoo, à kìi lɛ, à kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll, à ki kànɛn ti rì roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wiǹ.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ɓisuulɛ ɓì ti ɓì falàg gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɓi dɛm fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìzòò rì bààzì, rì gèg, ɓì sɛɛtì ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ: rì saaɗ, rì nɗem wu nyìighnyìg, ɗì rìroòzì ɗi mɛkàg, kɔm̀ lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓìǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi, kɛ̀ɛ ki sɛɛti ɓimbog. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, mìni rì tìɗyaŋ, ɓì ki kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì ɓɛ̀ro ɓum, ɓì ti ɓì cakì mɛ̀rɔ̀g min lɛ ɓi pisi fìnyuŋnyuŋ fi fi ri miì lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi mìn fyɔ, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ghaàgh fɛ, ɓì mìn syam à bimiɗ.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm, ìghèy ɓì ɗùm, ɓisuulɛ ɓi sòòsoo lɛ, rì jɛ̀m ì ɓɛ̀ɓeŋ rì jɛ̀m ì ɓɛ̀taasà, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓi ri ɓì rònɛn ɓi ɗùm lɛ, rì wii, rì kìnɔli ki ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan. 
Wɔ̀ Fàrìzyɛŋ ànɛ à rì rì tìɗyaŋ! ka logha kì sòo ɗùm ɗi ɓèŋ, rì ɗùm ɗi taasà, di fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀m yɛ̀ɛ ɓa girig ǹtɛnɛn.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm, ìghèy ɓi ɗùm! Lɛ ɓì rì yɛ̀ɛ zɔ̀ŋ yi yi ri yì puɓsiyɛn, yi rɔɔtàg ɓi dan, kɔm̀ lɛ, yì ri yi ronɛn ɓi ɗùm lɛ, rì ɓìwoɓ ɓi ɓilòŋ, rì tìfin mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìnii ri girig ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ ɓum ɓi rìseèsèèrɛ̀n kìɓan kifog wɔɔ ɓi ɗùm, ɓì rì ɓɛ̀ ronɛn lɛ, rì mɛ̀ghèy rì kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ.
Nyìighnyìg rì mìni ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓì ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, ɓisuulɛ ɓi kìki ɓisyeesyee ɓi zɔ̀ŋ ɓisuu ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓì ki rɛ̀ŋɗɛŋ zɔ̀ŋ yi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi saaɗ, 
ɓì ki kakali lɛ: I tì ɓa ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛ sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà miì, di tì ɗiŋìghà ɓi dàŋ rì ɓɔ, lɛ ti yogsi bwaɓ yi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ: mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wowòlà ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Nni kɛ̀ɛna min asu, ɓi wɔmɓɛn kìsay ki ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ghɛlɛ̀ngà. 
Nyoo yi lɛ mìni, ɓìgòm ɓi lɛ mìni ɓì! lannɛ ɓì ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓi ghɛ̀ɓ rìkɛ̀n ɗi ɓi ɗuu ɗi fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀? 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗì mìni ɓiì romiì lɛ: rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì ɓum ɓɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n, rì ɓɛ̀yiì-ɓìɓan; ɓì ɓiì kìi lɛ: ɓì wey ɓɛ̀roɓɛ, ɓì ghɛ̀rì ɓɔ ɓi ɓɛ̀kɔrɔs, ɓi ɓog ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓi kìtòn ɓi naa yin yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓì ki kìki ti ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ǹtɔɓ lɛ i ɓì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ, ɓì cee ɓi ìmbog. 
Lɛ di bwaɓ yi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaà wowèy fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ kiì, yɛɛ kɛǹ mìni ɓi ǹto; à tumɛ̀n ɓi bwaɓ yi Aɓɛl ànɛ à ɓaghà saaɗ à mum à kpaŋ ɓi bwaɓ yi Zakarii ànɛ à ɓaghà man à Berekya, innɛ ɓì wolà ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì naà-Bɛ̀ll, rì rìkùna. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓin ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, ɓi ri siŋ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓi gbàà ìnɛ.
Yorisalɛm! Yorisalɛm! wàànɛ u kìki lɛ: Ù cuùcùùsì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ù ki roorogì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romiì a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ gɔ̀g, m̀mɛ kaa bee inɛ ǹtaŋzɛn ɓɔn ɓɔɔ, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɛɛ à zag a taŋzag ɓɔn a mɛ̀keɓ mii-zi, bɔ̀ɓ, lɛ bɔ̀ɓ wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀n mini fɔlɔɔ. 
Nni yiina lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì rinii mɛɛ min zɛy kɛ̀ɛ̀ com. 
Nni ǹkalii mìni lɛ: ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ nsoò ŋwos bog, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ɓiì kalii lɛ: Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa rì roànɛ à yùu yì ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll à tumɛ̀n rìghaàgh, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ yughày nyì a nyoo lɛ ɓɛɛ kali nyi lɛ, a ghɛǹ kisay ki ɓum ɓɛ kighà ɓi rìtoŋ ɗi naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Aa ɓì ghɛɛ kìtoŋ kiǹ kìcèm yɛ̀ɛ ki ri? Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: mɛɛ mɛ, mɛ ri ɓiì wààrɛɛ mɛcèm, nsoò gɔ̀g bog yàa ɓa ti ɓi ǹsasaghiyɛn ɓi ìdɛŋ aɗyoo ɓi jàŋ ìnɛ.
Nni à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlìvyee, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ yu nyi kìtɔɔ̀gh a dwìɗ lɛ: Kali ɓìsi fin innɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ù ki fa ɓisi kìrèmzɛnà ki ɓi rìsugtìì ɗyɔɔ, rì rìlèg ɗi zi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì konàg lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ yègsi mini. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓiì yùu ri ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì syoŋi ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ɓì rì ɓiì woògh di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀y mɛ mɛɛ̀ ɗùuɗuùrɛ̀n, rì mɛ mɛɛ̀ pèeghpegsɛ̀n yì, konaaghna lɛ, ìris wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓan mini, ɓisuulɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ fɔlɔɔ; nni àa rìlèg ɗi zi ɗyɛɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà lɔɔ. 
Ki ɓiì ɓaà lɛ: ɓumɓɛ ɓì tum a zi anɛ ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ ɓi tum àmbog; ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ ram wɛ̀y ri ɓɛ ɓi kimbog; fɔɔnnɛ zày ì ɓiì kìi jàŋ jàŋ, zi ì ki nyɛ̀ɛnyɛŋɗɛ̀n lɛ rì foo ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n, rì foo ì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n. 
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓa lɔŋ ritumɛ̀n ɗi rikɛŋ ɗi ɓi riyay. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì ɓangii, ɓɛ ki lɛ ɓi woòg mɛ̀tɔɓ, ɓɛ weeyì mìni, ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ri mìni ɓiì ɓèèzɛɛ ɓisu wɛ̀m. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiì kɛ̀ɓtii ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey fiɓàg, ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀kɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki ɓigti bènà ɓi nyìinyìm wàà. 
Ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ri ɓiì yùu lɛɛgwey, ɓɛ syoŋ ɓum kìtuu. 
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey a ri fɔy, ɓisuulɛ kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ ki ri ɓa di ki mɛ ɓyɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì sììrɛɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n, à ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ cɛɓ. 
Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ànɛ, à ɓiì kalɛɛ zi bimiɗ, lɛ kìɓan ki Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n kɛɛ yilɛn ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ rìsugtɛ̀n ɗi zi ɗi ri ɓa. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓiì kìkii ɓiɓe ɓi ɓi ri koŋnyoo ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì rì kìcèlì yɛɛ Daniyɛl à kpaaghà, ŋwaànɛ a ɓàɓay ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii ɗyomzɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓa a Zyude, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛŋii ɓi dòn aɗyòò; 
ŋwaànɛ à ri ɓa ɓi mɛɛ aɗyòò, kɛ̀ɛ sɛɛdiì tì lɛ a teɗ ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri nyi ɓi naa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ri ɓa ɓi dɛm, kɛ̀ɛ sugti a mɛɛ lɛ a teɗ kìlàà kii. 
Nyìighnyìg rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛ rì ɓa ri mem, rì ɓɛ̀gɛɓyɛ̀y ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n. 
Ɓɔ̀ŋzaaghna Bɛ̀ll lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓi ghɛŋi, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa cààmɛ̀n à bùmà nsoò lɛ ŋwosi Saɓàt. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ ǹtɔɓ wu wu ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ wu ɓiì tèghɛɛ wu cee mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀cèm mɛ maa ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀nɛ̀n à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ zi i kìlɛ̀ngà, à kpaŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, fɔɔnnɛ ǹtɔɓ wu kpaŋdiyɛn yɛ̀ɛ wiǹ waa ghɛnɛɛ gɛ tì ɓi. 
I mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa kìden, di nsoò mum bog à yin lɛ à ghɛɓ; wɔ̀lɛ ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀rɔ̀tɛn nnɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n maa finɛn ɓi. 
Nni i mum à kalii min mini lɛ: Kiris à rì fɛ, nsoò lɛ, à rì fɛnii, kɛ̀ ɓì wog. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀kiris ɓɛ ɓɛpwàà, rì ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓiì yùu, ɓɛ kikì ɓyoo dàm rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ, i kaa rì lɛ ki kilɛ̀n, di ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ syoŋ̀ nsoò ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn. 
Kɛɛ̀ki ǹloogh mìni kì wogsii lɔɔ.
I ɓɛ kalii mìni lɛ: Ghɛɛna, à rì fɛnii ɓi-reɓ, kɛ̀ ɓi kɛ̀n wɔɔ, nsoò ɓɛ kpaa mìni lɛ, à rì nyamzɛn fɛnii, kɛ̀ ɓi wog. 
Ɓisuulɛ, rìyù ɗi Man à mum ɗi ri ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàŋwàɗ ànɛ à ti lɛ, i à ŋwàriì a rìpɛ̀sàg ɗi ŋwos, kìtɛɛtɛn kii ki kpaŋ a rìnɔ̀ŋɗàg ɗì ŋwos.
Jàŋ ìnɛ kiloŋ ki com ki nɔnɔŋii yɛɛ̀nɛ tìgheèghèè ti ri ɓiì sùùrɛɛ wɔɔ.
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛru ɓìn, kisaa ki ŋwos ki ri ɓiì ghàsi ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ birìm, ŋwii kɛ̀ɛ lòmdi, tyɔɛy ti kɔɔ̀kɔ̀sɛ̀n yì aɗyòò di tyɛɛ̀ kpìkpì; mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓi ɗyoo mɛ nyɛŋɗɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìfèèghrɛnà ki Man à mum ki ɓiì resɛɛ yi aɗyòò, mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ɓiì seeghkɛɛ mɛ ki ghɛn di Man à mum a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyòò ɓi ɓìkwìɗ, ǹɗonɛn rì coo ìtèɗ, rì coo rikèm. 
À romi gɛ ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom rì ɗyam ɗigwey, ɓi mɛ̀fon mɛ zi mɛnin, lɛ ɓɛɛ taŋzɛn ɓum ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ ɓɔ̀nɛn ɓi zi bimiɗ rì ɓi ɓɛ̀tum ɓɛ zi ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Terina kìfèèghrɛnà ɓi fìgyee: cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓɛ ghɛɛ di myaɓ mɛɛ̀ wòowomzɛ̀n, tyɛn ti tɔtɔ̀ɓ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ yilàg lɛ: Kìlòm ki yùu. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni girig ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì lɛ: Man à mum à ti jàŋbog ɗì rìyù di ɓì ghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm. 
Nkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, bɔ̀ɓ i ɓum ìnɛ, yàa lèg ɓi bimiɗ, di ɓìɓan ɓi ɓìcèm ɓi kaka kɛ̀ɛ̀ kì kìlɛɛ. 
Ɗyoo rì zi ɓi ri ɓiì ghaghii, kìɓan kifog ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓyaa ghaagh ɓi.
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓi kìɓan ki gòn, nsoò lɛ cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓì; nsoò ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ aɗyòò, nsoò Man, lɔŋ Tààta cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ yii. 
Kìɓan ki ki kìlɛ̀ngà ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Nowe, kɛɛ ri kìlɛn ɓi rìsugtìì ɗi Man à mum. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ mɛ ghaghìghà, di don ì ka tumɛn ɓi, ɓum ɓɛ kikìghà lɛ, ɓɛ ɗiɗi, ɓɛ nɔnɔ, ɓɛ wɔwɛ̀y ɓɛ̀yiɓ, ɓɛ ki fafa ɓɛgɔ̀n a mɛ̀wɛy, à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ Nowe à ɗiŋìghà ɓi kìkɔm, 
ǹɗem wu kɛsìghà ɓi ɓɔ ri kìɓan kidɛŋ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ don i yùghà, ì teɗ ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛcèm; folɔɔ nnɛ ki ri ɓa ɓi rìsugtìì ɗi Man à mum. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ki rì ɓa lɛ: i ɓum ɓɛ ri a dɛm ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ teɗ bog, ɓɛ caɗ àmbog. 
Nsoò lɛ i ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ri ɓi rìwɔ̀g ɗi ɓyom ɓi gɔ̀g ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ teɗ bog ɓɛ caɗ bog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kɔ̀riina cem, lɛ ɓi yii ɓi fin ìnnɛ masà wìn a rì ɓiì yùu. 
Nni yiina lɛ, i ŋwaàmɛɛ àa ti à yilàg cààmɛ̀n ki wiiwìì à rì lɛ à yù nyi ki yii ɓyom miì rì ìru, di à rì lɛ à kɔ̀rì cem, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓɛg nyi mɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni girig, kɔ̀riina cem, lɛ Man à mum à ɓiì yùu ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ ki ɓì yii ɓi lɛ, à ri ɓiì kpaŋì miì.
Nkìì-kìsay anɛ à rì lɛ: nyi rì mɛ̀wog, nyi rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, nnyɛɛ rì ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ masà wìì a ɓɔgsìghà rìfòm ɗi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛmbog, lɛ a falag ɓɔ ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Mààgh rì ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n di masà wìì a sughiì à tanɛ̀n nyi di a kìki kisay kiǹ. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, masà wìì à rì ɓiì reɓsɛɛ ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm rì nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog, i à rì kìɓeɓtàg ki ǹkìì-kìsay, nnɛ à fèegh wɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ nyimiɗ lɛ, masà wɛ̀m àa sug yi ɓi lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, 
à tumɛ̀n rìkwiy ɗi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛmbog, à kì lɛ: à ɗi, à nɔ, bas rì ɓɛ̀nɔɔ̀-mɛ̀rɔ̀g. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ masà à ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ̀n à rì ɓiì peetɛɛ yi ŋwos nyimiɗ anɛ à ɓoŋɓoŋi ɓi nyi, rì ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki nyii yii ɓi lɛ masà wìì a rì lɛ à kpaŋ. 
Masa wìì a rì nyi ɓiì pàkii mpàkakɛn , à ki foŋ nyi ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓum ɓɛ fyɛɛ̀fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm, jàŋ ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓiì rèereèdɛ̀n ɓɛ ŋaàŋààdì min.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyòò ki pisɛɛ rì ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ tekà ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓaa lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì ɓoŋì ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ a wɔlɛ̀n. 
Kìtaǹ ki ɓi ɓɔ ki ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n, kìtaǹ kimbog rì ɗyomzɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓɛ tekà ɓɛ̀lamɓà, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teɗ kàràsin, 
wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓɛ tekà lɛ: rì ɓɛ̀lamɓà, rì kàràsin ɓi ɓɛ̀kɔliba. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ŋ̀waà rìwɛy à lɛ̀mzìghày, ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛǹ ɓɛ cuu tìlo di ɓɛ mɛ fɔy. 
Yɛ̀ɛ nyìinyìm à-ru à kpagà, nni ɓɛ wokày jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ǹwɔlì innɛ, kpaŋinay ɓi kɛǹ nyi kì ɓoŋì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ kìntɛ̀ɗ ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà aɗyòò, ɓɛ roòsàg ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓaa. 
Nni ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛ: Faana ɓìsi kàràsin, ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓis ɓɛ ti ɓiì ɗimii. 
Ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg ɓɔ lɛ: Èe èe, gàɓ ì kàràsin ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀n lɛ, rì ɓìsi, rì mìni ì yin, ɓì rì ɓiì ɓàŋi ki kɛ̀ɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kàkàɓ, lɛ ɓì lag yì ànkìn wɔɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ kɛngà kì làagh kàràsin, ǹwɔlì à rɔ̀ɓ kì kpaŋì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà jàŋbog, ɓɛ ɗiŋì rì nyi ɓi kìkpanà ki riwɛy; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rogà ìsuunaa. 
Ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n bɛmbog ɓɛ yughày girig di cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ ghaàgh, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Kan, ŋ̀wàra ɓìsi naa. 
Nni ǹwɔlì à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓì mini.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii cem, lɛ ɓì yii ɓì gòn nsoò cààmɛn.
Kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo ki ɓaa gɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à reŋìghà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii, di à ti ɓiì kɛɛ rikɛ̀ɛ̀, à reɓsɛ̀n ìkum wii ri ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kìghà lɛ: à fa roànɛ tìraŋ̀ tìtaǹ, roànɛ tìraŋ̀ tiɓɛɛ̀, roàmbog fìraŋ̀ fìfog; à faghà mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì ìtèɗ wii, à kɛ̀n min rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗii. 
Nni ǹkìì-kìsay ànɛ ɓɛ faghà tìraŋ̀ titaǹ à ghàskà kì tumɛɛ dùne rì tyɔ à fɔ̀n tìraŋ̀ tidɛŋ titaǹ. 
Roànɛ ɓɛ faghà tìraŋ̀ tiɓɛɛ̀, à kì girig dùne, à fɔ̀ɔ̀dì tidɛŋ tiɓɛɛ̀. 
Roànɛ ɓɛ faghà fìraŋ̀ fìfog à kɛ̀ngà, à tim zi, à ɓòm mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ masà wìì miì. 
Di ki mɛ finɛn lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ masà à ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛǹ à kɛ̀ngà rìkɛ̀ɛ̀, nni à sukày, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ resi nyi kìsay ki ɓɛ rɔɓkà kì kìi ri mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. 
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ ɓɛ faghà tìraŋ̀ titaǹ à yughày rì tìraŋ̀ tidɛŋ titaǹ miì aɗyòò, à kpaa lɛ: Masà, ù faghà mɛ̀ tìraŋ̀ titaǹ nni tidɛŋ tyɛɛ̀ti titaǹ ti mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗɔ̀ɓi kì yaasii. 
Masà wìì a kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ki rɔɔtɛɛ; ù rì syeesyee à ǹkìì-kìsay, wɔ̀ tì ǹkìì-kìsay a ǹtyweeyi. Yɛ̀ɛ ù rèsii mɛ̀ lɛ, ù rì ŋwaà-ǹtyweeyi ɓi ɓyom ɓisàg, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì rɛsii ǹlàmì ɓi ɓyom ɓigwey; ɗiŋi ɓi kìnyàà ki masà wɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ ɓɛ faghà tìraŋ̀ tiɓɛɛ̀ à yughày girig, à kpaa lɛ: Masà, ù faghà mɛ̀ tìraŋ̀ tìɓɛɛ̀, nni tidɛŋ ti mɛ̀ɛ n-yaasii tyɛɛ̀ti tiɓɛɛ̀. 
Masà wìì a kpaa nyi lɛ: Ki rɔɔtɛɛ; ù rì syeesyee à ǹkìì-kìsay, wɔ̀ tì ǹkìì-kìsay a ǹtyweeyi; yɛ̀ɛ ù rèsii mɛ̀ lɛ, ù rì ŋwaà-ntyweeyi ɓi ɓyom ɓisàg, ǹɗi wɔ̀ ɓiì rɛsii ǹlàmì ɓi ɓyom ɓigwey fɔɔnnɛ, ɗiŋi ɓi kìnyàà ki masà wɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ ɓɛ faghà fìraŋ̀ fìfog, à tyòŋdɛ̀ngày min à kpaa lɛ: Masà, ǹ-yighà lɛ ù tèri mum yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, lɛ ù ti ù kɛ̀ngì kìɓùmii ɓyom ɓi dɛm inɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à sali, ù ki sagi ɓiɗilàg ɓi jàŋ inɛ ù mìskà ɓi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹrisìghà, ǹkɛ̀n kì ɓòmi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɔɔ ɓi zi, nni, tera mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɔɔ mɛɛ̀mɛ. 
Masà wìì a ɓàg nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ, ù kìi lɛ ù ɓeɓtɛ̀n ǹɗem, ù ki ɓa ɓɔɓwɛɗ! Ù yighà lɛ ǹti ǹkɛ̀ngi kìɓùmì ɓi dɛm inɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ sali, ǹki sagi ɓiɗilàg ɓi jàŋ inɛ m̀ɓɛ̀là ɓi. 
Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà min ki nyamì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀m a baŋ̀; di yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹsughii di mɛ̀ɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ mɔ kì terì di mɛ mɛ yay. 
Ɓatɛɛna nyi fìraŋ̀ fiǹ, ɓi fa fyɔ rì ŋwaà tìraŋ̀ ntɛ̀ɗ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓyom innɛ ɓɛ ɓiì fatii lɛ à ɓa rì ɓyɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, kìɓan kifog, ŋwaànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ com, ɓɛ ɓatɛ̀n maa gàɓ ànɛ à rì rì nyi. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkìì-kìsay a kɛ̀ɛ̀ gɛɓsɛ̀n ànɛn, pìighna nyi ɓi birìm ìnɛ ɓi dan, jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri rèereèdɛ̀n ɓɛ ŋaàŋààdì min.
Yɛ̀ɛ Man à mum à rì ɓiì yùu, ɓì rìgwey ɗii, ǹɗaŋ ri ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ̀cèm, à ɓiì kɔ̀rii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì wu rikem. 
Ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓi kunì nyi asu; à ghasì ɓum gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì-ɓìtuwe a ghasag lɛ, rì bwiy yi ɓɛ̀yiɓ, rì ɓìpiì; 
à ɓiì rɛsii bwiy ɓi weèlem, ɓìpiì ɓi kìmɛŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ rìfòm ɗi ɓiì kalii ɓɛroɓɛ ɓi weèlem ɓɛ̀n lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m à màgà, yùunay, ɓi teɗ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ pegsɛ̀ngà ɓìsu win, à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɗyoo rì zi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà. 
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ zày ì kɔ̀ngà mɛ̀, ɓì faghà mɛ̀ ɓìɗilàg, kìnɔli ki ki mɛ̀, ɓì fa mɛ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛnɔyɛn; m̀ɓaghà ǹken, ɓì ghàɓ mɛ̀ a mɛɛ min. 
M̀ɓaghà nyoozɛy, ɓì waasì mɛ̀ ɓìlàà, m̀ɓaghà roròɓ, ɓì yù mɛ̀ kì ghɛɛ̀. Mɛ̀ ɓi naà-zày, ɓì yù mɛ̀ kì tògsii. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ saaɗ ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛ̀ɛ̀zii gɛ nyi lɛ: Kan, fin innɛ tì ghɛngà wɔ̀ di zày yɛ̀ɛ kɔ̀nkɔn wɔ tì ki fa wɔ ɓìɗilàg? Nsoò lɛ di kìnɔli kɛɛ̀ kìki wɔ, tì ki fa wɔ mɛ̀nig mɛnɔyɛ̀n? 
Fin innɛ tì ghɛngà wɔ̀ di ù rì ǹkèn, tì ki ghàɓ wɔ a mɛɛ mis? Nsoò lɛ di ù rì nyoozɛy, tì ki waasi wɔ ɓìlàà? 
Fin innɛ ù ɓaghà ɓi cem, nsoò lɛ ɓi naà-zày, tì ki yù wɔ kì ghɛɛ̀? 
Nni rìfòm ɗi pɛɛ̀zii gɛ ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓì kìghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m fɔlɔɔ, mɛ̀ innɛ ɓi kìghà lɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ rìfòm ɗi kalii gɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìmɛŋ kii lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀cɛ̀mɛn, pɛ̀sɛɛna mɛ̀ ɓi mis; ɓi kɛǹ ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɗi ɓɛ pegsɛ̀ngà ɓisuu Satàn, ɗì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titòm. 
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ zày ì kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà mɛ̀, ɓi faghà ɓi mɛ ɓìɗilàg; kìnɔli ki kikì mɛ̀ kɛ ɓi fa mɛ mɛ̀nig mɛnɔyɛ̀n; 
m̀ɓaghà ǹkèn, kɛ̀ ɓi ghàɓ mɛ a mɛɛ min; mɛ̀ nyoozɛy, kɛ̀ ɓi fa mɛ ɓìlàà; ǹɗoròɓkà, mɛ̀ tì ɓi naà-zày, kɛ̀ ɓi yù mɛ kì ghɛɛ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓàagh gɛ girig nyi lɛ: Kan, fin innɛ tì ghɛngà wɔ̀ di zày yɛ̀ɛ kɔ̀nkɔn wɔ, nsoò lɛ di kìnɔli kɛɛ̀ kìki wɔ, nsoò lɛ di ù rì ǹkèn, nsoò lɛ nyoozɛy, nsoò lɛ roròɓ, nsoò lɛ ɓi naà-zày, tì ki rɔ̀ɓ tyɛ̀ ki ghɛɓsi wɔ? 
Nni rìfòm ɗi pɛɛ̀zii gɛ ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓi ɓèngà kì kìi kibog ki ɓi ɓɔɔɓɔɓti ɓɛ fɔlɔɔ, mɛ̀ nnɛ ɓì ɓèngà kì kìi lɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ teri gɛ deɓ yi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, wɔ̀lɛ ɓum ɓɛ saaɗ ɓɔɔ teɗ cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, nni à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ:
Ɓì yii lɛ, Paskà à rɔ̀ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ ɓiì ki kàɓi Man à mum lɛ ɓɛɛ kpan nyi ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyòò.
Nni ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà ɓi ǹlɛmɓog wu ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ànɛ lɛ Kayif, 
ɓɛ teɗ ǹɗɛli lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ Yeesus ɓi ghèy, ɓɛɛ wey. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ kakàlìghà lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kìlɛn ɓi nyìinyìm à tìcàɓ, di ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ ri ɓiì woògh bim ɓɛ ki kìyoòyòò.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà a Bɛtanii ɓi naa ì Simɔn ànɛ a ɓaghà kukwiy, 
giɓ adɛŋ à yùghà nyi a nyoo, rì ɓeŋ ànɛ a ɓaghà ǹsoɓɛn ɗi gɔ̀g ì ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim, ɓeŋ ànɛn a ɓaghà ǹɗònɛn ri ɓìsyeesyee ɓi tirààre ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì kɛŋɛn; giɓ anɛ̀n à sùùrì Yeesus tìrààre tìn ɓi ǹto di a kaka à ɗiɗì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ, ki ɓeɓ ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ki ghɛɓsii cɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ yoòyògsì ɓyom fɛlɛ? 
Ɓaa rì lɛ ɓɛ kaɓ tìrààre tìn dune ǹkɛŋɛn lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ fa mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi yeeyeèsì giɓ anɛ lɛ la? À kìi syeesyee à kìɓan ɓisu wɛ̀m 
lɛ ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ màa ɓa ɓi ri mìni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. 
Yɛ̀ɛ àa sùùrii mɛ̀ tìrààre tìn ɓi nyoo, àa pegsɛɛ rìɓòm ɗi ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ɓòmi. 
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ à kaakàlɛɛ gɛ ɓi ziinɛ ǹcèm, ɓɛ kpaakpaa gɛ kìɓan ki giɓ anɛ à kìi ki, ɓɛ yiìyìtàg nyi miì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyudas Iskariyot, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à kɛ̀ngà a ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey 
à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì faà di ǹfaa mìni nyi? Nni ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ peeghà nyi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni tìraŋ̀ rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ. 
À tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, Zyudas à kaakààghà syeesyee à cààmɛ̀n ànɛ a fa ɓɔ Yeesus.
Ŋwos a ǹtonto ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ nkìlaagh bìrɛs kɛ̀ɛ̀ nwìɗ miì, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ yughà nyi kì tɔɔ̀gh lɛ: Fe nnɛ u kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ti kɛǹ wɔ̀ kì pègsɛɛ ɓiɗilàg ɓi Paskà? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna ɓi bàn yɛ̀ɛ tɛɛnɛ, ɓi kpaa nyi lɛ, ǹɗèsàg a kalag lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n kii ki ti jàŋbog, nni a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ nnɛ nyii ɓiì ɗiì Paskà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ki lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki pègsɛn ɓiɗilàg ɓi Paskà.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, Yeesus à kɔ̀rì ɓi ɓìɗilàg rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ɓyom, nni Yeesus à kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ri mɛ̀ ɓiì kàɓi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓɛ samgàkà lɛɛ̀gwey, mum ǹcèm à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan, mɛ̀ nya gìn? 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ tyàa pùùsɛɛ càg ɓɛɛ̀ nyi taasà bog yɛɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì kàɓi. 
Man à mum à ɓiì wiì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kangà lɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìwiì, kìɓan kifog nyìighnyìg rì ŋwaànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì kàɓi! Ki ɓaghà kìrɔɔ ɓisuu ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ kɛ̀ɛ yalɛn. 
Nni Zyudas ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi kìtɔ̀kɔ̀ kiǹ, à tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀, à kpaa lɛ: Raɓì, mɛ̀ nya gìn? Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Wàa kpaà.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà, fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tekà bìrɛs, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ɓɛg min yɔ̀, à fa ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Terina, ɓi ɗi, nyoo yɛ̀m yɛ̀ɛ lɛ. 
Nni à teetìghà ɓeŋ, à mɛ̀rɔ̀g à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à ceesi nyi rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Nɔɔna ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm 
ɓisuulɛ bwaɓ yɛm̀ yɛɛ ri, bwaɓ yi ɓi rìràrɛ̀n ɗi rì Bɛ̀ll, yi yi ri ɓiì kpaŋì ɓisuu ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓisuu ricenɛ̀n ɗi ɓiɓe. 
Nni mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, à tumɛ̀n gɛɛ̀nɛ, màa nɔti ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ viìnyɛ̀, à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ tì nɔtii gɛ nyɔɔnyɔn à rìnɔ lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì mìni ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Seŋi wɛ̀m.
Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ mɛ ghàɓ tyem ti ɓɛsam̀ fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkà min ɓi dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlìvyee.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ: Ɓi-ru wu gɛɛ̀nɛ, ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà fìɓàg ɓisu win ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì wolì m̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀, jɔ̀ɔ̀ yii yicèm yi saàtɛ̀n. 
Kìɓan kifog, ajɛ̀m ì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗyɛm̀ ǹɗì ɓiì loògh kì kɛ̀ɛ ri mìni a Galile. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹsoò wàa rì fìɓàg ɓisuu ɓisi ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, wàa ɓa ɓi fiɓàg ɓisu wɛ̀m. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ǹkalii wɔ̀ ɓi saaɗ lɛ, ɓi-ru wɔm̀ wu, ù rì mɛ̀ ɓiì roòzɛɛ gɛ̀n yiraa, di ǹlem à zag a ka rɔŋ ɓi. 
Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Ǹsòò ki kpaŋi lɛ ǹwu ɓɛɛ wɔ̀ ǹɗaŋ, màa roòzɛn ɓi wɔ. Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kpaaghà girig fɔlɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓi jàŋ ɗii lɛ Gɛsemane, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kɔ̀riina fɛ, mɛ̀ ǹka kɛ̀ɛ kìɓɔ̀ŋzaagh fɛnii. 
Nni à tekà lɛ rì Pyɛɛri, rì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede, à tumɛ̀n rìwog ɗi ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn, ɗì ìris. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà min ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹɗì rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn wu wu ri lɛ wu wey mɛ̀, nni rɔ̀ɓina fɛ, ɓi kɔri cem nɗaŋ, ri mɛ̀. 
Nni à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà asu lɛsàg, à kpì ɓi zi guɓùg, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì lɛ: Tààta wɛ̀m i bee yàa rì lɛ ì ɓa, lɛ ɓeŋ ànɛ a raɓsɛn mɛ̀, nsoò fɔlɔɔ, kɔ̀ɔ kì rikɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀, lɔŋ rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi kìya. 
Nni à sugtighày a ɓɛ̀yilàg, à tanɛ̀n di ɓaa cuu tilò, fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà Pyɛɛri lɛ: Ɓi yin yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ɓì cenɛ̀n lɛ ɓi kɔri cem ɗi mɛ̀ bimiɗ à hawò? 
Kɔ̀riina cem, ɓì ki ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi tanɛn ri mɛ̀fèèghrɛn; lɛ ǹghay wu mum wu ri rì ìtèɗ, kìɓan kifog, nyoo ì mɛ̀mùù ì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ. 
Ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀, à ràɓsɛ̀ngà tì ɓɛ̀yilàg, à ɓɔ̀ŋzàg lɛ: Tààta wɛ̀m, i ki ri lɔŋ lɛ ɓeŋ ànɛ àa pɛ̀sɛn ɓi di nnɔɔ ɓi nyi, rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗyɛɛ kilɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à sugtìghày a ɓɛ̀yilàg à tanɛ̀n tì ɓɔ ɓi fìlo, lɛ fìlo fì ɓaghà ɓɔ ɓi mis. 
Nni à cààtìghà ɓɔ, à ràɓsɛ̀n tì, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ɓi gɛ̀n i kìraa, à ɓììtì lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓi à lokà kì kpaa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à sugtìghày a ɓɛ̀yilàg, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mìnii ri lɔŋ ɓi fìlo, ɓì fɔɔ̀fɔ̀ɔ̀sɛ̀n? Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ, ɓɛɛ fa Man à mum rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe kɛɛ kpaŋi lɛ. 
Pɛ̀sɛɛna aɗyoo ti kɛǹ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ a kàkaɓ mɛ à tiì.
Yeesus à kaka à kpaakpàà fɔlɔɔ, nni Zyudas ànɛ à ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à ghàskà kì kpaŋì. A ɓaghày rì coo kituu ki ɓum ki ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ romgày; ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yughày lɛ rì gàfàg, rì ɓìgeŋ. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kàɓkà nyi à faghà ɓɔ kìrèmzɛnà à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ ɓì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di ǹlɔ̀ri, ɓì yi lɛ nnyɛɛ ri, ɓì ɓan. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyudas à ghàskà kì tyòŋdɛɛ Yeesus a nyoo, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Raɓì, ǹtògsii wɔ̀, à ki lɔ̀ɗ nyi. 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m! Kìya com ki wàa yùu kì kìi. Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yuiy min, ɓɛ sɛn ɓi Yeesus, ɓɛ ɓan. 
Kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì Yeesus, ki nimɓɛ̀ngà, ki sɔŋìì gàfàg ɓi ɗyaŋ, ki kpɛɛ̀ ǹkìì-kìsay a ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey, ìreè wu lɛy. 
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀ɛ̀zi gàfàg yɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɗyaŋ, lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ teri gàfàg, ɓɛ ɓiì wiì lɛ gàfàg. 
Ù yii ɓi lɛ, ǹɗì lɛ, i ǹtɔɔgh Tààta wɛ̀m lɛ, a ghɛɓsi mɛ̀, à rì lɛ à rom yì mɛ̀ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓigomìnɛ ɓìtuu lɛ ɓìtuu. 
Lannɛ rìkalì ɗi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri min ɓiì ronì? Lɛ kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll a kalag lɛ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ fɔɔlɔɔ. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà rì kìtuu ki ɓum kìn lɛ: Ɓì ghɛɛ mɛ̀ lɛ ǹɗì zyaàzyaa, nni ɓì yùu yì lɛ rì gàfàg rì ɓìgeŋ lɛ ɓi ɓaǹ mɛ̀? Kɔm̀ lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ǹɗèèrèsàg ɓum, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɓaǹ mɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi kilɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ lɛ di ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kangà ɓyɛɛ roǹ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ rinìghà nyi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ ghɛŋɗàg.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓangà Yeesus ɓɛ kɛngà rì nyi yɛ̀ɛ ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ lɛ Kayif; wɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà. 
Pyɛɛri à nɔɔnɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà nyi fìràɓ fìràɓ, à kpaŋ ɓi ǹlɛmɓog wu ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey, à ɗiŋì à kɔ̀rì ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ, à ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ ki ri ɓiì Syɔnì. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi sànèdìrɛŋ, ɓɛ kaakààghà kìɓan ki ɓɛpwàà ki ɓɛɛ tiri Yeesus ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓi kiɓan ki ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ kpaa, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ rɛlìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ feg kìpwaà Yeesus ɓìɓan ɓi nyòò, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bee; fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ siitɛ̀ngày kì yùu ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n àa ǹkpaa lɛ: Ǹɗì lɛ ǹwàà naà-Bɛ̀ll, ǹki pɛ̀ɛ̀zi yɔ̀ ki toŋì ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛraa. 
Nni ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey a pɛ̀sɛǹgà aɗyòò à tɔg Yeesus lɛ: Kìɓan ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kpaa ki ɓɛ raɗ rì wɔ̀ yòg, ù yin ɗi com ki ɓàghɛn ɓɔ? 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à maamààghà lɔŋ. Nni ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à tɔgtìghà nyi lɛ: Ɓi ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cencem ǹtɔɔgh lɛ ù kali ɓìsi ù ki kànɛn bɛ̀ɗ ǹkòo wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris Man à Bɛ̀ll 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Wàa kpaà. Nni ǹki kpaatii mìni lɛ, à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì ri ghɛn Man à mum di à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm, ɓì ki ghɛɛ̀di nyi di a yùyuiy aɗyoo ɓi ɓìkwìɗ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à wokà bim, à ghàskì ɓìlàà ɓi à ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ ɓi nyoo, à ki kpaa lɛ: Ɓì woogh ɓi yɛ̀ɛ à fengii Bɛ̀ll, tì yin lɛ tì kaatì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛdɛŋ, lɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì woogh tìfena ti à fengii Bɛ̀ll, nni ɓì kpaa la? 
Ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: À ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tuughàkà Yeesus tìtyɛɛ̀ ɓisu, ɓɛ ki rogi nyi ɓìkam; ɓɛro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ɓoɓog nyi mɛ̀ɓɛn di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: 
Mèsii, rèmi ŋwaànɛ à ɓoogh wɔ̀, u kali ɓìsi.
Wɔ̀lɛ Pyɛɛri à kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà ɓi ǹlɛm̀ɓog fɔɔnnɛ giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkìì-kìsay à yughày nyi à nyoo, a kpaa lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ ǹɗì gìrìg ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Yeesus ànɛ a Galile. 
Kìɓan kìfog Pyɛɛri à roòzɛ̀ngà kìɓan kiǹ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à kpaa lɛ: Ǹ-yii ɓi com ki u kɔ̀nkɔn kiǹ lɛ u kpaà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀nkɛni a rìɗigì ɗi gari, giɓ adɛŋ à ghɛn nyi, à kpaa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛ: ŋwaànɛ àa ǹɗì ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à roòzɛ̀ngà tì nyi, à kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ, à kpaa lɛ: Ǹ-yii ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n. 
Yɛ̀ɛ maa cààmɛ̀n à ghaghìghà, nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngày ɓɛ kpaa Pyɛɛri lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ, ù rì kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓisuulɛ, rìtòtòg ɗyɔɔ ɗi resii fɔlɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à tumɛ̀ngà rìkààkànàg ɗi bɛ̀ɗ, di a kpaakpaa lɛ, i m̀pwàa, Bɛ̀ll à cɛ̀m mɛ̀; ǹ-yii ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n. Ǹlem à zag a ghaàgh kì rɔŋì ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à yìtìghà min yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ, ù rì mɛ̀ ɓiì roòzɛɛ gɛ̀n yiraa, di ǹlem à zag à ka rɔŋ ɓi; fɔɔnnɛ à kpagà gari à rèn à sìgtàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ̀cèm rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n kìtɔ̀kɔ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey Yeesus. 
Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ kàŋ nyi bɛn, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi yɛ̀ɛ gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ Pilat.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas ànɛ à kàɓkà Yeesus à ghɛngà lɛ, ɓɛ reni lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, ǹɗem wii wu fa nyi bɛ̀lɛn, à lemgì rìkì ɗii à ki sugtiì kì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii tiraŋ̀ rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ti ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ faghà nyi, 
à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkìi kìɓe lɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹkàɓi bwaɓ yi ŋwaànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓe; nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Kìɓan kis ki yin miì, wɔ̀ nnɛ ki seesee. 
Zyudas à ɗyɛɛghà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à kpaŋ à kɛ̀n kì sùrɛɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ ɓadɛ̀ngà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n ɓɛ ki kpaa lɛ: Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, ti teɗ rìkuu ɗi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɗiǹ, ti ɓutɛn ɓi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, lɛ mɛ rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ bwaɓ. 
Ɓɛ nyolɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ yɔɔsì ŋwɔm wufog lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ laàg kìden ki zi miì rì ǹ-yèŋì-fyòò, kɛɛ ɓa dɛm i zɔ̀ŋ ì ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ ɓum. 
Kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ roòghà dɛm inɛ̀n lɛ dɛm i bwaɓ à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ànɛ lɛ Zyeremii à kpaaghà ì rongà; lɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓɛ tekà tìraŋ̀ rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, bàlì ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ìnɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ rengà ɓi ǹto wìì, 
ɓɛ ki fa mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n ɓi rìkòòsɛ̀n ɗi dɛm i ǹ-yèŋì-fyòò, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à siŋdɛ̀ngà mɛ̀.
Yeesus à rɛlìghà ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓi mis mɛ gɔmìnà; gɔmìnà à tɔg nyi lɛ: Ù rì nya rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n? Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ kpaa. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, à ɓàkà ɓi com cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓɛ raràɗ rì nyi. 
Nni Pilat à tɔkà min lɛ: Ù woogh ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kpaa ɓi ɓɛ ràɗ rì wɔ̀? 
Yeesus à mìnɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, gɔmìnà à kuuràg lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ɓi tìcàɓ ti Paskà tìcèm, gɔmìnà àa ǹti à càɗkì kìmbùŋ kìfog, ki ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ tɔɔgh lɛ, a caɗ. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓum lɛ̀ɛgwey ɓɛ yìghà, à ɓaghà kìmbùŋ ɗii lɛ: Ɓaraɓas. 
Nni Pilat à tɔkà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ taŋzɛn lɛ: Ghɛn innɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ncaɗ mìni, Ɓaraɓas gìn Yeesus ànɛ à rì ɗii lɛ Kiris? 
Pilat à tɔkà fɔlɔɔ lɛ à yighà lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ, ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀ngà Yeesus ɓi ǹɗemi-yàaka aɗyoo. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pilat à ɓaghà di à kaka ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, nni gil a romgày mum lɛ a kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ ghàɓ gaa ìnɛ ɓi saaɗ à mum ànɛ̀n, lɛ ɓi-ru wu gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm ɓyaa yeesii mɛ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓisu wìì. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ toosìghà gɛmum ànɛ à ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg Pilat lɛ a caɗ Ɓaraɓas, Yeesus ìnnɛ ɓɛɛ wey. 
Nni gɔmìnà à tòòghrɛ̀ngà, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum ki, ghɛn innɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ncaɗ? Ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ɓaraɓas. 
Pilat à tɔgtì ɓɔ lɛ: Nghas̀ min la ri Yeesus ànɛ à rì ɗii lɛ Kiris? Ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ɓɛɛ kpaǹ nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. 
Gɔmìnà à tɔgtì lɛ: Kìɓeɓtàg ki kiɓan aɗi kɛɛ̀ki à kìi? Ɓɛ syaadì tì rì ìtèɗ lɛ: Ɓɛɛ kpaǹ nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pilat à ghɛngà lɛ, mɛ̀tɔɔ̀gtɔɔgh mii mɛ ghɛɓsii ɓi com, kìɓan kifog kìyoòyòò kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛn asu ǹkɛ̀nkɛnɛn, nni à tekà mɛ̀nig, à sògtɛ̀n ɓyàg ɓi mis mɛ gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ, à kpaa lɛ: Ǹ-yin lɛ, ǹteɗ kìɓɛ̀kɛ ki ɓi bwaɓ yi saaɗ à mum ànɛ, kìɓan kii ki seesee lɔŋ mini. 
Nni kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki ɓakà lɛ: Bwaɓ yii yɛɛ kɛǹ ɓìsi ɓi ǹto, lɛ rì ɓìsi rì ɓɔn ɓis.
Fɔɔnnɛ à càɗkà min ɓɔ Ɓaraɓas, à reɓsì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓog Yeesus ɓi kìtòn, à fa min ɓɔ nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi kì kpanì ɓi kɔrɔs.
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ gɔmìnà ɓɛ kɛngà rì Yeesus ɓi naa ì gɔmìnà, ǹɗaŋ waa wucèm wu kɔmzɛ̀n nyi. 
Ɓɛ sɔŋì Yeesus ɓìlàà, ɓɛ waasì nyi rìga à mɓàŋ lɛ pɔɔŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ togà tàm à ɓìlɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ waasì nyi ɓi ǹto, ɓɛ teɗ kìsyòŋ, ɓɛ fa nyi ɓi càg ki weèlem, ɓɛ ɓag min nyi mɛ̀ɗu asu, ɓɛ feèfèngì nyi ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Tì tògsii wɔ̀ rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tuutùùghà nyi tìtyɛɛ̀, ɓɛ teɗ kìsyòŋ, ɓɛ ɓoòɓòkì nyi ɓi ǹto. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ fengi nyi fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓɛ sɔŋìghà nyi rìga ànɛ ɓɛ waasìghà nyi, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì nyì kì waasii ɓilàà ɓii, ɓɛ kɛǹ min ɗi nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ kpan ɓi kɔrɔs.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpaŋkpàŋgày ɓi naa ì gɔmìnà, nni ɓɛ tuusɛ̀ngà rì ŋwaànɛ a Sirɛn ɗii lɛ Simɔn, ɓɛ kaŋ̀ nyi lɛ a tɛg kɔrɔs à Yeesus. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà ɓi jàŋ inɛ lɛ Gɔlgɔta, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, jàŋ i kìtɛtɛg ki ǹto, 
nni ɓɛ faghà nyi mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ɓɛ ɓigà rì com ki lòlolɛn lɛ a nɔ; yɛ̀ɛ à ɓoɓtìghà mɔ, à ɓèn kìnɔɔ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpangà nyi ɓi kɔrɔs, nnì ɓɛ ɓokà ǹtɔ̀ŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ kaɓɓɛn ɓìlàà ɓii. Ki kilɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓɛ kaɓɓɛ̀ngà ɓìlàà ɓyɛm̀, ɓɛ ɓog ǹtɔ̀ŋ ɓi jɔmpàs wɛ̀m. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɔrìghà wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓeŋɓeŋ nyi. 
Ɓɛ kangà ǹtoo-kiɓan wu ɓɛ wolà nyi miì, ɓi kìɓoŋ ɓɛ foŋ nyi kɔ a ǹto; azi anɛ ɓɛ wolà nyi miì à ɓaghà lɛ: Roànɛ nnyɛɛ ri Yeesus, rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ kpangà ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ǹɗaŋ ɗi Yeesus; roànɛ nyi ɓi weèlem, roànɛ ɓi kìmɛŋ.
Ɓɛ̀ghaàgh-bee ɓɛ feèfèngàkà nyi, di ɓɛɛ̀ ghegheri ɗi mɛ̀to. 
Ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Wàànɛ u kalag lɛ, ù rì lɛ ù wààghì naà-Bɛ̀ll, ù ki pɛ̀ɛ̀zi yɔ̀ kitoŋì ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛraa, ghɛɓsi min wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, i ù yii lɛ ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, sɛnay ɓi kɔrɔs ànɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ wɔwɔ̀là girig nyi di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: 
Àa ǹghɛɛghɛ̀ɓsì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri bee inɛ, a ghɛɓsi nyimiɗ, à rì rìfòm ɗi Isirayɛl, nni a sɛn yì ɓi kɔrɔs di ti gherɛn nyi. 
À faghà ǹtyweeyi wii ri Bɛ̀ll, à kpaa lɛ nyii rì Man à Bɛ̀ll; nni ti ghɛǹ min ǹkòo Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ, à gherɛ̀n lɛ a ghɛɓsi nyi ɓigomìnɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa ɓɛ ɓɛ kpangà ǹɗaŋ ɗi nyi, ɓɛ sɛɛ̀sɛ̀mgìghà girig nyi.
Birìm ì sigtɛ̀ngà zi bimiɗ, à tumɛ̀n toroɓ, à kpaŋ mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa. 
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa à ɓaghà di à ti jàŋbog, nni Yeesus à nyàmgà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: <<Eli Eli, lama saɓagtani!>> Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ: Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m, Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m, wàa rinii mɛ̀ lɛ cɛ? 
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛ wokà com ki Yeesus à kpaaghà, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: A rereŋi Eli. 
Lɔŋ wɔɔ foo, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ ki kɛngày kì terì dɛ̀ɓ rì mɛ̀ree, ki ɓam̀ yɔ̀ ɓi kìsyòŋ, ki nɔg ɓi ɓìkpaakpam ɓi mɛrɔ̀g, ki nam̀ Yeesus lɛ à nɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Ka càra, ti ghɛǹ ǹkòo Eli à rì nyi ɓiì yùu kighɛɓsii.
Yeesus à nyàmdìghà tì jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò, à maasì min.
Fɔɔnnɛ coo kilàà kì ki ɓaghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ki lanìghà ɓìlànà ɓiɓɛɛ̀, à tumɛ̀n yì aɗyòò, à kpaŋ azi; zi i nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n, mɛ̀ɓan mɛ lanlàn. 
Zɔ̀ŋ yi ŋwarɛ̀ngà, ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ɓɛ cuughà ɓi ghemɓɛ̀ngà, 
ɓi kpagìì ɓi zɔ̀ŋ, ɓi ɗiŋì ɓi bàn ìnɛ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn; ajɛ̀m ì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi Yeesus ɓi ki rèsɛ̀ngà a kìgwey ki ɓum. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà, rì ɓumɓɛ à ɓaghà ɓiì ɓèŋɓeŋi Yeesus rì ɓɔ ɓɛ ghɛngà di zi i nyɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ, ɓɛghɛɛdi ɓìɓan ɓimbog ɓi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà ɓiǹ, nni ɓɛ risìghà lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Yeesus àa ǹɗì Man à Bɛ̀ll a tààkaà.
Ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛ̀ɛgwey, ɓɛ rɛlìghày fìràɓ, ɓɛ seesèè yì; ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus à tumɛ̀n a Galile, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsì nyi tìtom. 
Marii Madelɛn rì Marii à jɛɛ Zyag ɓɛɛ Yoosɛɓ, ri jɛɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi bàlì ì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, guŋgum a mum àdɛŋ ànɛ a Arimate ɗii lɛ Yoosɛɓ, à yùghày, lɛ nyi girig à ɓaghà ǹ-yilàg à Yeesus. 
Nni à kɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ Pilat, à lɔn nyi kìloŋ ki Yeesus, Pilat à kpaa lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi kɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yoosɛɓ à tekà kìloŋ kiǹ à lɔg kɔ rì aloyà à nyɔn 
à kɛ̀n min kɔ kìnɔ̀ŋzii ɓi zɔ̀ŋ ì nyɔn ìnɛ ɓɛ soɓkà nyi ɓi rìɓan; fɔɔnnɛ à ɓiŋzìghà coo gɔ̀g ɓi ŋwɔm wu zɔ̀ŋ, à sìm yɔ̀ miì, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n à ghaàgh. 
Marii Madelɛn, rì Marii àmbog ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ̀kɔ̀kɔriyɛn yi ɓɛg àmbog, ɓɛ pɛ̀ɛ̀zìì mis rì zɔ̀ŋ.
Ɓi duri tana, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ɓi ŋwos anɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkà gòn inɛ ɓɛ m̀ɓuŋàg Saɓàt miì, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓakà ǹɗaŋ, ɓɛ kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Pilat 
ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Gɔmìnà àgwey, tì yitii lɛ pwààpwaà à mum ànɛ̀n àa ǹkpaa di à kaka cem lɛ: Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa, ǹɗì ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ yi a ɓìloŋ. 
Kali min, ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ zɔ̀ŋ à kpaŋ mɛ̀ru mɛraa kɛ̀ɛ̀ fɔlɔɔ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ri ɓiì yùu ki fyaasii kiloŋ kii lɛ ɓɛɛ tumɛn rìkpaakpàà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ lɛ: Àa ghèmɓɛɛ. Rìkuu ɗi pwàà ɗiǹ ɗi ɓiì ɓeɓtɛɛ ɗi cee ɗi ǹtonto. 
Pilat à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛna, ɓi woŋzi ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rì lɛ ɓɛ, ɓèŋ zɔ̀ŋ lɛ syeesyee. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà min, ɓɛ konàg kì rɔ̀mi gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓi ŋwɔm wu zɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ki rɛsi ɓɛsujàà wɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ yɔ̀.
Ɓi jɛ̀m ì Saɓàt, ŋwosi sɔnɗi lɛ ɓuɓ, Marii Madelɛn rì Marii àmbog ɓɛ kɛngà kì ghɛɛ̀ zɔ̀ŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ sigmɛ̀ngà di zi i mɛ nyɛ̀ŋɗɛn ri ìtèɗ, lɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à sɛngày, à yù kì ɓiŋzii gɔ̀g, à kɔ̀rì miì aɗyòò. 
Ŋwaàfìtom àǹcèm à lònlòmgà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋ̀wàaŋ̀wàɗ, kìlàà kii ki pupuɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ dɛ̀ɓ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ risìghà ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìnììghnìŋdɛ̀n lɛ kpàg-kpàg-kpàg, ɓɛ rɔɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìloŋ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a tòòghrɛ̀ngà, à kpaa ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi risi, lɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɛ ɓi kaakaa Yeesus ànɛ ɓɛ ǹkpani ɓì kɔrɔs. 
À yiìdi fɛ, àa ghèmɓɛɛ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà, yùunay, ɓi ghɛǹ jàŋ inɛ àa nɗì ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn. 
Nni kɛ̀ɛna lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, ɓi kpaà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ, àa ghèmɓɛɛ a ɓìloŋ, à loloogh rì mìni a Galile, wɔɔ nnɛ ɓì rì nyi ɓiì ghɛɛ̀; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki maà rì lɛ ǹkpaà mìni.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà a zɔ̀ŋ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, mɛ̀rem mɛ̀ronɛn lɛ: rì ìris, rì coo kinyàà, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n rì mɛ̀ree.
Lɔŋ wɔɔ foo, nni Yeesus à ghàskà ki yùu ki tulɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹtògsii mìni! Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tyoŋdɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ ɓaǹ nyi ɓi mɛ̀kòò, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì nyi. 
Yeesus à kpaa min ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi risi; kɛ̀ɛna kì kpaà ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Galile, wɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ghɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ kaka ɓi bee, nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓɛsujàà ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋgà zɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ sugtìghày ɓi bàn, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey com kìcèm ki ki kilɛ̀ngà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ taŋzɛ̀n, ɓɛ tokì, nni ɓɛ faghà ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛǹ ɓyoo mɔ̀ɔ̀ni; 
ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghagsii ɓɔlɛ lɛ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓaa yùu kì fyaasii kiloŋ kii ri ìru, di ɓìsii ri ɓi fìlo. 
Nni i gɔmìnà à woogh kìɓan kiǹ, tì yii yɛ̀ɛ tì ri kpaa nyi ɓi ɗi lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa ri kìɓan. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ tekà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, ɓɛ ki lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ reɓkàkà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à sààghà ɓi nyìinyìm à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kintɛ̀ɗ rì bog ɓɛ kɛngà a Galile ɓi dòn ìnɛ Yeesus à reɓkà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ wɔɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì nyi, kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì nyoey ɓi nɗem. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tyòŋdɛ̀ngày, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓaa fa mɛ ìtèɗ wucèm lɛ rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓiɗùm, rì ɓi ziinɛ. 
Kɛ̀ɛna! ɓi ki lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛm, ɓì ɓàɓtì ɓɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Seŋi, rì Man, rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay; 
ɓì rèsàg ɓɔ rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi nsiŋdɛ̀ngà mìni; ɓì ki yi lɛ, ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà nɗaŋ ri mìni ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm à kpaŋ ɓi rìlèg ɗi zi.
Rìtumɛ̀n ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus Kiris Man à Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi kaàtà à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii lɛ: Ghɛna, ǹɗomi wɔ̀ mum Wɛm̀ à fìtom beèbɛ̀y, lɛ a pegsɛn wɔ̀ bee.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ìrì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a làalamɓɛ̀n yì ɓi-reɓ lɛ: pègsɛɛna bee yi Kan ɓi rɛsàg yɔ lɛ saaɗ.
Nni Zyaŋ à peeghày ɓi-reɓ, à ɓààɓàɓtì ɓum à ki làalamɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓum, ɓɛɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ̀ ɓaɓtɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn mìni ɓìɓe ɓyaa. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziì Zyude, rì ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày di ɓɛɛ̀ yùyuiy a lɔ̀ŋkii, nyii ki ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓɔ ɓi ǹsyòm wulɛ Zyuridɛŋ, di ɓɛ mɛ kpàki ɓiɓe ɓyaa. 
Zyaŋ à ɓaghà ri kìlàà ki ɓɛ tiŋi ri nyùŋ yi syàmoo, à ŋirɛ̀n kànɗa à gòò ɓi kìɓon, à ki ɗiɗi lɛ, rì ɓìtàtàɗ, rì mɔ̀ɔ mɛ ilòò wu ɓɛ pisii yì ɓi cog. 
A kakàlìghà ɓum lɛ: Roànɛ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, à cee mɛ̀ ɓi-tèɗ, ǹkpaŋi ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ ǹlaŋi, ǹfùmì mɛ̀ɗig mii mɛ gòò. 
Mɛ̀, m̀bàɓtii mìni rì mɛ̀nig, kìɓan kifog nyii ri mìni ɓiì ɓàɓtii ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày.
Lɔŋ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, Yeesus à pɛsɛngày a Naazarɛt, ɓi kiden ki zi ki a Galile à yùy, Zyaŋ à ki ɓàɓti nyi ɓi Zyuridɛŋ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaŋkpàŋgày ɓi mɛ̀nig, nni à ghɛngà di ɗyoo ɗi nɛmɓɛɛ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛnsɛ̀n yì nyi ɓi nyoo fɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kuùkuù. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ i ki ɓɔ̀ɓ yi aɗyoo lɛ: Ù ri Man wɛm̀ à ǹɗem, ɓi wɔ̀ nnɛ ǹfoŋi kìnyàà kɛm̀ kìcèm. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, nni Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à ghàskà kì tinii Yeesus lɛ a kɛǹ ɓi-reɓ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ghagsighà mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi-reɓ wiǹ, Satàn a fèèghrɛ̀n nyi wɔɔ. À ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà wɔɔ ri nyàm yi ɓi cog, wɔ̀lɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kikìghà nyi tìtom.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ ɓan Zyaŋ, Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà a Galile, à kakàlì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll. 
À kpaakpààghà ɓum lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki mɛ tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛn yi; lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna mɛ̀rem, ɓi gherɛn Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi ǹwɔŋì wu riɓày ànɛ a Galile, nni à ghɛngà ɓɛ̀-Simɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Andire à geni di ɓɛɛ̀ pìpig dam ɓi rìɓày, lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀pììgh-dam. 
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀tiina mɛ̀, di ǹki lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀syòŋì-ɓum. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaskà kì càri dam yaa, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà tì asu lɛsàg, nni à ghɛngà Zyag, man à Zeɓede ɓɛɛ Zyaŋ à geni; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi rìpègsɛ̀n ɗi dam yaa ɓi kìkɔm ɓiɗùm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ghaskà ɓɔ ki reŋii, ɓɛ̀roɓɛǹ ɓɛ rinì Zeɓede à seŋi wàà ɓi kìkɔm, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì nyi.
Nni ɓɛ kɛngà a Kapɛrinawum, Yeesus à ɗiŋì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ŋwosi Saɓàt; à tumɛ̀n rìrèsàg ɗi ɓum. 
Ɓum ɓɛ kuuràkà rìrèsàg ɗii, ɓisuulɛ ɗi ɓaghà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; rìrèsàg ɗii ɗi ɓaghà ɗi ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ faa ìtèɗ wulɛ a reèrèsàg ɓum. 
Ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay à ɓaghà kɔmiɗ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì ɓumɓɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à syangà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ki rì wɔ̀ la ri ɓìsi, Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt! wàa yùu yì fɛ lɛ u cuùsi ɓìsi? Mɛ̀ ǹkonaagh ki yiì rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi ù rì; wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri roànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ romiì wɔ̀. 
Nni Yeesus à fwààdɛ̀ngà kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn, à kpaa kɔ lɛ: Maarɛn foo, ù ki pɛ̀sɛn ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay kìn ki narìghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ saɗ-sààɗ, ki kpaŋ ɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n di kɛɛ̀ syansyàn jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyòò. 
Ìris wu ɓangà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ ɓɛ tɔɔ̀ghtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ ri kɔmiɗ lɛ! wooghna nyɔɔnyɔn à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ a rèresi ri ìtèɗ wu rilàmì; a kɔ̀ɔkɔmɛ̀n lɛ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay miì, ɓi ki kìki nyi mɛ̀wog' 
Fɔɔnnɛ rìkem ɗi Yeesus ɗi ghaskà ki sàa ɓi ziì Galile bimiɗ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagày ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ kɛngà rì ɓɛ̀-Zyag ɓɛɛ Zyaŋ a mɛɛ mɛ ɓɛ̀-Simɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Andire. 
Jɛɛ gili Simɔn à ɓaghà kìnɔ̀ŋnɔ̀ŋ lɛ à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fyɛɗmɛ̀ngà kìkpaà Yeesus fìroɓ fi giɓ anɛ̀n. 
Yeesus à tyòŋdɛ̀n nyi jàŋbog, à ɓan nyi ɓi càg, à pɛ̀sì nyi aɗyòò; rìɓa ɗi à ɓaghà lɛ tɔ̀gtɔ̀g ɗi leg, à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìkàà ɗi ɓiɗilàg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛ̀ɛŋkò ki kpagà, ɗi ŋwos a mɛ cèŋ, nni ɓɛ yughày Yeesus lɛ, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ roròɓkà, ri ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ kunìghà asuunaa. 
Yeesus à wɔ̀ɔ̀zì ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ roròɓkà tìroɓ mɛ̀kuu lɛ mɛ̀kuu; à nàɓ girig ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey, wɔ̀lɛ, à faghà ɓi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓyɛɛ toòghrɛn, lɛ ɓi yighà nyi lɛ syeesyee. 
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i ɓaghà di ì ti jàŋbog ɗì rìtan, wɔ̀lɛ di birìm ì kaka lɛɛ̀gwey, Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo à kpaŋ ɓi dan, à kɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ wuɓsɛ̀ngà ɓi, à tumɛ̀n rì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Simɔn, ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìkaa kìɓan ɗi kìɓan. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg wɔ. 
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ti kɛǹ jàŋ idɛŋ ɓi ɓɔɔ bàn ɓɛ ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ fɛ̀, nkalì girig Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll wɔɔ, lɛ ɓisuu kisay kiǹ innɛ màa kpaŋiì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà di a rereni ziì Galile à kakàlì Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n à ki nànaɓ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay.
Kukwiy adɛŋ à yùghà Yeesus a nyoo, à kpì nyi asu rì mɛ̀ɗu, à yɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg à kpaa lɛ: I ki kɔni wɔ̀, ù rì lɛ ù kì lɛ m̀ɓa ti lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m. 
Fɔɔnnɛ nyìighnyìg ì kìghà Yeesus rì ŋwaànɛ̀n, à nàm càg à kòm nyi, à kpaa lɛ: Ki kɔni mɛ̀, ɓaya lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nni kwiy a ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghaskà kì kùrɛɛ, nyoo yìì i sugtì lɛ syeesyee. 
Yeesus à ɓaghà lɛ, à mɛ rɔgsag nyi syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsàg, à ghàs nyi kì càri lɛ a kɛǹ. 
À kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèg mum kì ɓùŋi kiɓan ki; kɛ̀na lɔŋ ki rèsɛɛ ɓi mis mɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, u ki fa rifa ɗi Moyis à kpaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ falag ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ kɛɛ ɓa ɓɔ kìrèmzɛna ki lɛ ù mɛ wɔ̀n. 
Kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɛ̀ngà, nni à tumɛ̀ngà rìlààlàmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓɔlɛ à kìɓan kiǹ, à sààsààtì nyi lèg ànɛ lɛ Yeesus à ɓatìghà ɓi lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ɓi mɛ̀tàna. Wɔ̀lɛ àa ǹti à kɔ̀ràg ɓi ɓɛ̀kòdò ɓɛ ɓɛ lɛŋzɛɛ rì bàn, rì jàŋ yi ɓum ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ ɓi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ pɛɛ̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓɛ̀tum ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ yuyù nyi kì ghɛnghɛni.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghìghà, nni Yeesus à sugtìghà a Kapɛrinawum; yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ wokà lɛ, à rì a mɛɛ, 
ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ lɛ, kìtuɓi ki ɓatìghà ɓi nsoò asuunaa; fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni ɓum ɓɛniǹ ɓɛ tɛkày kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓi kon ɓɛ yuiy nyi rì kɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, ɓɛ kɛǹ rì kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛsaaɗ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus lɛ gùl ì ghekà bee; nni ɓɛ pinìghà fìran ɓi jàŋ inɛ Yeesus à rɛrɛ̀lìghà, ɓɛ rɔŋzìì min ŋwaànɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ ɓi kon wiì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ, nni à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Man wɛm̀, ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn. 
Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛ kɔ̀kɔriyɛn, ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓi mɛ̀rem maa lɛ: 
Lannɛ ŋwaànɛ a tòtog fɛlɛ? A feefengì Bɛ̀ll. Ghɛn adɛŋ yɛɛ ri lɛ à cenɛ̀n mum ɓìɓe, i ki yin lɛ Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii! 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghàskà kì yiì kìɓan ki ɓɛ fefèkà, nni à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì rì rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛyitì mɛǹ ɓi nɗem? 
Kìɓan aɗi kɛɛ yeesɛɛ foo? Rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaa kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ lɛ ɓìɓe ɓyɔɔ ɓi ti ɓìcenɛn gìn, rìkpaa ɗi ǹkpaà kɔ lɛ, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀ u kɛǹ? 
Nni ɓi ɗi lɛ, ɓi yi lɛ Man à mum à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ a cenɛ̀n mum ɓìɓe fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, 
Yeesus à kpaaghà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ kiǹ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀, u sug. 
Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo, à teɗ kon wiì à kpaŋ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ seesèè, kìɓan ki wey ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ rìtɔŋ; ɓɛ keèkèmzì Bɛ̀ll di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Tì ka ghɛngà ɓi rikuu ɗi kiɓan yɛ̀ɛ ɗi.
Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà tì ɓi bèn ì rìɓày, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yuyùy nyi a nyoo, nyii ki rèresi ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà, nni à ghɛngà Levi man à Alfe, di à kɔ̀kɔrii jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ m̀peghì làmpoŋ̀, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀, Levi à pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɗiɗìghà ɓìɗilàg ɓi naa ì Levi, ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ yughà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi riɗi ɗi ɓyom ǹɗaŋ ri nyi rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ nnɔ̀ɔ̀tàg nyi ɓìtuu ɓìtuu. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi di a ɗiɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìbe, nni ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ǹɗèsàg wìn a ɗiɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀terì-làmpoŋ̀, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh wiǹ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓiì roroɓi, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɛɛ ɓa ri zày ì dɔgtà, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg rì zày ìnɛn. Mɛ̀ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki reŋii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛsaaɗ, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ǹ-yùghà kì reŋii.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ nti ɓɛ celàg ɓìɗilàg; nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ yughà ki tɔɔgh Yeesus lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ celàg ɓìɗilàg ɓyaàmɛ̀n ɓidɛŋ, ɓɛnkɔɔ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cèli! 
Nni Yeesus à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ghan mɛ ŋwaànɛ à wɔlɛɛ mɛ ri nya lɛ mɛ celì ɓìɗilàg di ǹwɔlì à kaka nɗaŋ ri ɓɔ! Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ǹwɔlì à kaka nɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ celì ɓìɗilàg. 
Wɔ̀lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛɛ pisi ǹwɔlì ɓi nyìinyìm wàà ki tiì, cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ ri min ɓiì cèlii ɓiɗilàg. 
Ŋwaà yin lɛ à teɗ zyònà ì kìlàà ki nyɔn lɛ a raɗ ɗyas ɗi kitùg ki kilàà miì, ɓisuulɛ zyònà ì kìlàà ì nyɔn ì rì ɓìì tùnii kitùg ki kilàà, ɗyas ɗìn ɗi teghɛ̀n tì. 
Ɓaà ki foŋ ɓi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìtùg ɓi ɓiren, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ri ɓiì weeyii ɓiren, mɛ̀rɔ̀g rì ɓìren ɓi ɗyaŋ ɓìcèm. Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fogi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ nyɔn ɓi ɓìren ɓi nyɔ̀n.
Ŋwosi Saɓàt àdɛŋ, Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà ɓi dɛmi nyas. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghaghàghìyà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìsòsòrì ɗi nyas.
