Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à gherɛɛ ɓi lɔŋ lɛ mɛ̀, à gherɛɛ girig roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀. 
I mum à ghɛɛ mɛ̀, di à ghɛɛ roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀. 
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ziinɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìtɛɛtɛn, lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ɓi birìm. 
I mum à woogh ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀, kɛ̀ɛ ɓèŋ ɓyɔ, àa mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri nyi ɓiì faà bɛ̀lɛn, lɛ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki faà ziinɛ bɛ̀lɛn, ǹ-yùghà lɔŋ lɛ nghɛɓsi yɔ̀. 
Nni ŋwaànɛ à ɓèni mɛ̀, kɛ̀ɛ ghàɓ ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀, à rì rì ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì renì kìɓan kii. Ɓìɓan ɓi ǹkalìghà ɓyɛɛ ri ren kiɓan kii ɓi siitòn a ŋwos. 
Lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpàà, ɓi yin ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, lɔŋ Tààta nyimiɗ anɛ à romgày mɛ̀, nnyɛɛ siŋdɛ̀ngà mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpaà, rì ɓi ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsaagh ɓum. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yii lɛ ǹsiŋdɛn wii wu ri cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Nni ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpàà, mɛ̀ɛ nkpaakpaa lɔŋ ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à kalìghà mɛ̀ lɛ ǹkpaà.
Di tìcàɓ ti Paskà ti kakay, Yeesus à yighà lɛ cààmɛ̀n kii ki lɛ a pɛsɛn ɓi ziinɛ a kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi ki kpaŋi. À keesìghà ɓum ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà fɛ ɓi ziinɛ; nni à keesìghà ɓɔ, à kpaŋ a sugtag.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà, di Satàn à mɛ ɗiŋzi Zyudas à man à Simɔn, fèg ànɛ lɛ a tɔkɛn Yeesus ɓi nɗem, 
Yeesus à yighà lɛ Seŋi à faghà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyàg ɓii, à ki yi lɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, nni wɔɔ nnɛ à yùu kì sugtii, 
fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à sɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n ɓìlàà, à teɗ sànjà, à sìnɛ̀n ɓi kìɓon. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à sùùrìghà mɛ̀nig ɓi taasà, à tumɛ̀n ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii rìsòò ɗi mɛkòò di a tɔ̀tɔsi mɔ rì sànjà ànɛ à ɗyeɓɓɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ kànɗa. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn Pyɛɛri, Simɔn à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan! Lɔŋ wɔ̀ yɛɛ soò mɛ̀ mɛ̀kòo? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ, ù yii ɓi azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki nkìki ki, wɔ̀lɛ ù rì nyi ɓiì siitɛɛ ki yiì ajɛ̀m. 
Pyɛɛri à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓɛ̀pwàà! wàa sòò ɓi mɛ mɛ̀kòò nsoò ŋwos bog. Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I ǹsòo ɓi wɔ mɛ̀kòò, wàa ɓa ɓi ri gàɓ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀. 
Simɔn à kpaa min nyi lɛ: Kan, kɔ̀ɔ sòò lɔŋ mɛ mɛ̀kòò mɔ rì mɔ, u soò mɛ̀ girig lɛ, rì ɓyàg, rì ǹto. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à mɛ wùɓɓɛ̀n, à yin lɛ ɓɛ wuɓsì tì nyi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ mɛ̀kòò mii mɛɛ̀mɛ ɓɛ soò, lɛ nyoo yìì bimiɗ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn. Nni, mìnii ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, wɔ̀lɛ, àa mìniìcèm. 
Yeesus à yighà ŋwaànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì tɔ̀kɛɛ, kɛɛ̀ki à kpaaghà miì lɛ: Ɓì yin ɓɛtɛnɛn ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà kìsòo mɛkòò, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀n kì waatɛɛ ɓilàà, nni à sugtìghà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi zi, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki ǹkìi mìni kìn? 
Ɓì ti ɓì regì mɛ̀ lɛ ǹɗèsàg, ɓì regì tì mɛ̀ lɛ Kan, ɓì ki ti ɓì kpaaghì miì lɛ ǹɗì ǹɗèsàg, mɛ̀ tì Kan. 
Nni i màànɛ ǹɗì Kan, mɛ̀ ǹɗèsàg ǹsòo mìni mɛ̀kòò, mìni girig, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sòòraagh mɛkòò mìni rì mìni. 
Lɛ ǹfaa mìni kìfèèghrɛnà lɛ di mìni girig ɓi kilag yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹkìi yì mìni. 
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ: ǹkìì-kìsay adɛŋ à cee ɓi masà wìì; ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom kɛ̀ɛ ki cee ŋwaànɛ à romi nyi. 
I ɓì yii ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, di ɓì rì ɓɛ̀mààghmaagh, nni kɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg lɛ ɓi ki ɓyɔ̀.
Àa ɓisuu miniìcèm nnɛ ǹkpaa kìɓan kiǹ. Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ngà wɔ̀lɛ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ: Roànɛ ti ɗiɗi bìrɛs yɛ̀m ɓɛɛ̀ nyi à ghali mɛ̀ ŋaŋ-ŋaŋ ɓi nyoo, yɛ̀ɛ roǹ. 
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔ ɓigomìnɛ di ki ka kilɛn ɓi, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ɓì gherɛ̀n lɛ Mɛ̀ ǹɗì roànɛ ǹɗì. 
Ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, i mum à ghàɓi mum wɛm̀ à fìtom, di mɛ̀ nnɛ à ghàɓi, i mum à ki ghàɓi mɛ̀, di à ghàɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Yeesus à ɓaghà lɛ, à mɛ kpaa fɔlɔɔ nni nɗem wu ɓuùsɛ̀ngà nyi ɓi ɗùm, à kalì lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ri mɛ̀ ɓiì kàɓi. 
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ pɛɓsɛ̀n ɓɔmiɗ a mɛ̀su, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi ghɛn innɛ à kpaakpààghà. 
Kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ki àa nkeesàg ki kɔkɔ̀rìghà nyi jàŋbog. 
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à tòòghrɛ̀n ɗì ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n ɗì càg lɛ, a tɔg nyi ghɛn innɛ a kpaaghì. 
Nni ǹ-yilàg àncèm à loŋmɛ̀ngà Yeesus ɓi-reè, à kpaa lɛ: Kan ghɛn innɛ u kalàg? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Lɔŋ roànɛ m̀ɓiì nɔ̀ɔgh bìrɛs ǹfa rì nyi nnɛ nkalàg. Nni à nɔ̀kà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs à fa rì Zyudas à man à Simɔn Iskariyot. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ghàɓkà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs kiǹ, Satàn a ɗiŋì nyi ɓi nɗem. Yeesus à kalì nyi lɛ: Com ki u ɓeɓeg lɛ u ki, kìya kɔ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ. 
Ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ɓìɗilàg ɓiǹ, à yighà ɓi ɓisuucɛ nnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi fɔ̀lɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ fefèkà lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas àa nti à ɓègì ɓàm à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nnɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà nyi lɛ a lag ɓyom ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓɔ ɓisuu ticàɓ, nsoò lɛ a fa ɓɛ̀soghàsogha com. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ghàɓkà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs, à ghàs kì kpaŋì. Ìru wu ɓaghà di wu mɛ fìn.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ɓaghà di à mɛ kpaŋ ɓi dan, nni Yeesus à kalìghà lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ, Man à mum à mɛ kem, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ kem girig ɓi nyi. 
I Bɛ̀ll à mɛ kem ɓi nyi, cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg Bɛ̀ll à rì girig nyi ɓiì kemzii ɓi nyimiɗ.
Ɓɔn ɓɛm, ǹkaka tì rì mìni ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n. Ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kaà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkalìghà rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ: Jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì yù wɔɔ. Ǹkpaa girig mìni fɔlɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ. 
Ǹfaa mìni kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn lɛ: Kɔ̀nɛɛna. Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹkeesìghà mìni, mìni girig, kɔ̀nɛɛnà. 
I ɓì kɔ̀nɛɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri ɓiì yiì lɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛm.
Nni Simɔn Pyɛɛri à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Kan fennɛ ù rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ? Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ, ù yin lɛ ù nɔ̀ɔ̀tì mɛ̀ wɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ; kìɓan kifog ù ri nɔ̀ɔ̀tii gɛ mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m. 
Pyɛɛri à kpaa nyi lɛ: Lɛ cɛ nnɛ ǹ-yin lɛ ǹnɔ̀ɔ̀tì wɔ̀ ɓigomìnɛ? Ǹɗì m̀pègsɛn lɛ nɗimzi cɛɓ kɛ̀m ɓisu wɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ù ɓiì ɗimzii cɛɓ kɔɔ ɓisu wɛ̀m ɛ̀ɛ? Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, ù rì mɛ̀ ɓiì roòzɛɛ gɛ̀n yiraa di ǹlem à zag a ka rɔŋ ɓi.
Mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓùùsɛn, gherɛɛna Bɛ̀ll, ɓì gherɛ̀n girig mɛ̀. 
Ɓìden ɓi naa ɓi ri lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mɛɛ mɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m; i kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa fɔlɔɔ, di ǹkalìghà mìni. Ǹkɛ̀ɛ mìni kì pègsɛɛ jàŋ. 
M̀ɓiì ɓaà lɛ, i ǹkɛ̀ɛ, i m̀mɛ pègsɛn mini jàŋ, ǹsugtìì lɛ nteɗ mìni a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, lɛ di mìni girig, ɓi ɓa jàŋ inɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì. 
Ɓì yii bee inɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ.
Nni Tomas à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan! Tì yii ɓi jàŋ inɛ ù kɛ̀ɛ, nni lannɛ tì rì lɛ tì yi bee inɛ ì kɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri bee, rì saaɗ, rì cɛɓ. Mum à yin lɛ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta di à fyee ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀. 
I ɓyàa yi mɛ̀, di ɓì rì lɛ ɓì yi Seŋi wɛ̀m. Nni à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì yii nyi, ɓì mɛ ki ghɛn nyi.
Nni Filiɓ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan rèsi ɓìsi Tààta, mɛ̀rem mis mɛɛ kpi ɓi mùm. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Filiɓ, fìɗyàɓ fi maà ɓa rì mìni, ù ka yighà ɓi mɛ? Ŋwaànɛ à mɛ ghɛn mɛ, à mɛ ghɛn Tààta, nni lannɛ ù kpaa lɛ rèsi ɓìsi Tààta? 
Ù gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ ɓi Tààta, Tààta ɓi mɛ̀? Ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpaa mini ɓi, ɓi yin ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ ɓekii lɛ nkpaà, lɔŋ Tààta ànɛ à rì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, yɛɛ̀ kìki ɓiɓan ɓii. 
Gherɛɛna mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ ɓi Tààta, Tààta ɓi mɛ̀; i ɓì ɓèni fɔlɔɔ, ɓì gherɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi nkìkì.
Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à ɓiì kìi girig ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛ nkìkì, à ki kì kɔm̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi cee ɓiǹ ɓisuulɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta. 
Fɔɔnnɛ com kìcèm ki ɓì rì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, ǹɗì mìni kɔ ɓiì kìi, lɛ Tààta a teɗ rìkem ɓi Man. 
I ɓì tɔɔgh com rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m m̀ɓiì kìi kɔ.
I ɓì keesii mɛ̀, ɓì ɓiì ɓèŋi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ m̀ɓiì ɓɔ̀ŋzii Tààta, à rom yì mìni m̀maasì mɛ̀rem adɛŋ, ànɛ à ɓa rì mìni fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nnyɛɛ ri Ǹghay à ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓiɓan ànɛ ziinɛ ì yin lɛ ì teɗ, ɓisuulɛ ì ghɛɛ ɓi nyi, yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi nyi. Lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ yii nyi ɓisuulɛ à rì ɓi mìni. 
Màa càɗ ɓi mini ɓɔɔ̀zii, ǹɗì ɓiì sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ziinɛ yàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ, lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì seesee ɓisuulɛ ǹɗì cem, nni mìni girig ɓì ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ. 
Ŋwos anɛ̀n ɓì yii gɛ lɛ, ǹɗì ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m, mìni ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ɓi mìni. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀ à ki ɓèŋ ɓyɔ, nnyɛɛ keesii mɛ̀. Nni ŋwaànɛ à keesii mɛ̀ innɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m à ɓiì kesii, mɛ̀ ǹkeesì girig nyi, ǹki rèsɛn nyi lɛ a yi mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyuudɛ, àa roànɛ lɛ Iskariyot, a kpaaghi nyi lɛ: Kan! Ki ɓaa la lɛ ɓìsi ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ u resɛn lɛ ti yi wɔ̀, kɔ̀ɔ rèsɛn ziinɛ? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I mum à keesii mɛ̀, à ɓiì ɓèŋi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, Seŋi wɛ̀m à rì nyi ɓiì keesi; tì ɓiì yùu a lɔ̀ŋkii, tì pègsɛ̀n ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wis a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Mum ànɛ à kessi ɓi mɛ, à yin lɛ à ɓèŋ ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀; nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓi wowog inɛ, ì yin jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, ì rì lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Tààta ànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkaka lɛ rì mìni. 
Kìɓan kifog m̀maasì mɛ̀rem ànɛ à rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki Tààta à ɓiì romìì ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, yɛɛ ri mìni ɓiì rèsaagh ɓiɓan ɓìcèm, à ki kì lɛ, ɓi yiti ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ǹkalìghà mìni.
Ǹcàri mìni fyòoog, ǹfaa mìni fyòoog wɛ̀m. Mɛ̀ ǹfaa ɓi mini nyi yɛ̀ɛ ziinɛ ì ti ì falàg. Mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cɛɛcɛɛ̀rɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ mɛ yeèghyèèghkɛ̀n.
Ɓyàa woogh fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ màa kpaa mìni lɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ, m̀ɓiì ki sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkin. I ɓyàa keesii mɛ̀ di ɓì rì lɛ ɓì nyààrɛ̀n lɛ, ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta ɓisuulɛ, Tààta à ceetii mɛ̀. 
Ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓigomìnɛ di ɓi ka kilɛn ɓi, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ɓì gherɛ̀n. 
Tyàa tòki ti ɓi ri mìni, ɓisuulɛ rìfòm ɗi ziinɛ ɗi tiì, nni ɗi yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɗi ki mɛ̀ com. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ziinɛ yɛ̀ɛ yi lɛ, ǹkeesii Tààta rì tì lɛ, nkìki ɓiɓan lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ nki. Pɛ̀sɛɛna aɗyoo, ti pɛsɛn fɛ̀.
Mɛ̀ ǹɗì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à dɛm i viìnyɛ̀, Seŋi wɛ̀m m̀pègsɛ̀n dɛm. 
Ŋwaɓ wucèm wu wu ri wù ròŋɛn ɓi mɛ̀, wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wum ɓiɗùn, à ti à rengì wɔ. Ŋwaɓ wucèm wu wu wumi ɓìɗùn, à farì wɔ lɛ wɛɛ konag tì kì wumì. 
Ɓì ti ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, lɛ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi mɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaa mìni. 
Ràrɛɛna rì mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ǹɗàrɛn ri mìni. Ŋwaɓ wu yin lɛ wu wum ɓìɗùn wɔ rì wɔ, di wu yin wu ràrɛn ɗi ǹɗyèm. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni girig ɓì yin lɛ ɓì wum ɓìɗùn di ɓì yin ɓɛràrɛn ɗi mɛ̀. 
Mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹɗyèm, mìnii ri myaɓ. Nni ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹɗàrɛn ri mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹɗàrɛn ri nyi, à ɓiì wumì ɓìɗùn lɛɛ̀gwey; lɛ ɓì yin lɛ ɓì kì com kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀. 
Ŋwaànɛ à yin nɗàrɛn ɗi mɛ̀, ɓɛ mag nyi ɓi dan yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaɓ wu kite, à womdàg; ɓɛ ɓadɛ̀n min myaɓ mɛ ɓiloŋ mɛǹ, ɓɛ pig mɔ ɓi ɗuu, mɛ ɗikì. 
I ɓì rì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓi ɓa rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi mìni, tɔɔghna com kìcèm ki ɓì kɔ̀ni, ɓɛ ri mìni kɔ ɓiì faà. 
I ɓì wumi ɓìɗùn lɛɛ̀gwey, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m à ɓiì terì rìkem, mìnii ki ɓa ɓɛyilàg ɓɛm.
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta a keesag mɛ, nnɛ mɛ̀ girig mɛ̀ ǹkeesii mìni. Kɔ̀riina ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɛ̀m. 
I ɓì ɓèŋi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀, ɓì ɓiì kɔ̀rii ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɛ̀m, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ m̀ɓègà ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀kɔrii ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìì. 
Ǹkalii mìni fɔlɔɔ lɛ, kìnyàà ki ǹɗì rì kɔ, kɛɛ ɓa a lɔ̀ŋkin, kìnyàà kin ki ki ron lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Kìdɔ̀gsɛna kɛm̀ ki ri lɛ: Kɔnɛɛna mìni rì mìni, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹkeesìghà mìni. 
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n àdɛŋ à cee ɓi anɛ lɛ, mum a fa cɛɓ kii ɓisuu mɛghan mii. 
Ɓì rì mɛ̀ghan mɛm̀, di ɓì kìi ɓìɓan ɓi ǹsiŋ̀dɛɛ mìni. 
Màa reŋdi ɓi mini lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, ɓisuulɛ, ǹkìì-kìsay a ti kɛ̀ɛ yi com ki masà wìì a kìkì. Wɔ̀lɛ ǹɗeŋii mìni lɛ mɛ̀ghan mɛm̀ ɓisuulɛ m̀mɛ rèsag mìni ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ǹwokà rì Seŋi wɛ̀m. 
Àa mìni yɛɛ ɓɔngà mɛ̀, lɔŋ mɛ̀ yɛɛ ɓɔngà mìni, ǹki rɛ̀si mini lɛ, ɓi kɛǹ, ɓi wum̀ ɓìɗùn, ɓìɗùn ɓin ɓi ki ɓa ɓiɗùn ɓi ɓyɛɛ finɛn, fɔɔnnɛ com kìcèm ki ɓì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh Tààta rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, à rì mìni kɔ ɓiì kìi. 
Kìɓan ki mɛ̀ ǹsiŋ̀dɛɛ mìni ki ri lɛ, ɓi kɔnɛn mìni rì mìni.
I ziinɛ ì ɓèèzɛɛ mìni yiina lɛ ì lokà mɛ̀ kì ɓèèzɛɛ ri mìni. 
I ɓi ɓa ɓum ɓɛ ziinɛ, di ziinɛ ì rì lɛ ì keesì mìni fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ com ki yɔ̀. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yin ɓum ɓɛ ziinɛ, ki ki ɓa lɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ngà mìni, m̀pisì mìni ɓi ziinɛ, kɛɛ̀ki ziinɛ yɛɛ̀ ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n mìni miì. 
Yitiina jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹkpaaghà mìni lɛ: Ǹkìì-kìsay a cee ɓi masà wìì. I ɓɛ yeesìghà mɛ̀, ɓɛ ri yeesi girig mìni. I ɓɛ ɓegà ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀, ɓɛ ɓiì ɓèŋi girig ɓiŋkìn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ri kì mini ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓisu wɛ̀m, lɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀. 
I ǹ-yùghà ɓi, kɛ̀ɛ nki tòòghrɛn ri ɓɔ, di ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì bɛ̀lɛn; nni ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ yin ɗi com ki kpaayɛn ɓisuu kiɓe kaa. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓèèzɛɛ mɛ̀ à ɓèèzɛɛ girig Seŋi wɛ̀m. 
I kɛ̀ɛ nkì ɓɛgɛn ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à ka kighà ɓi ɓi nyìinyìm wàa, di ɓɛ yin ri bɛ̀lɛn. Nni ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ nghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛ nkìi, ɓɛ ki ɓèèzɛn lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì Seŋi wɛ̀m. 
Wɔ̀Lɛ ki kilɛɛ fɔlɔɔ, lɛ kɛɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyaa lɛ: Ɓɛ ɓeèzɛ̀ngà mɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹto wu kiɓan. 
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀maasì-mɛ̀rem ànɛ ǹɗì ɓiì romiì à ɓiì yùu, nnyɛɛ ri Ǹghay à ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓiɓan ànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì yɛ̀ɛ Tààta, à ɓiì tɛɛ̀zii ɓum kìɓan kɛm̀. 
Mìni girig, ɓì ri tɛɛzi ɓum kìɓan kɛm̀ ɓisuulɛ, rì mɛ̀ rì mìni, tì rì ǹɗaŋ, à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n.
Màa kpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi kɛ̀ɓtɛn fìɓàg. 
Ɓɛ ri nàɓ mini ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n; cààmɛ̀n ki riì kɔm̀, kɔ yɛɛ ri ɓa lɛ, i mum à woli kìbog ki ɓi mìni, à fèkì lɛ à kìi Bɛ̀ll kìsay. 
Ɓɛ ri ɓiì kìkii fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛ yighà ɓi Tààta, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi mɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ màa kpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ri kpaŋ, ɓì yitì lɛ ǹkalìghà mìni ɓyɔ̀. Ǹkalìghà ɓi mini ɓyɔ a rìtumɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ m̀ɓaghà rì mìni.
Ɓigomìnɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀. Nsoò wààdɛŋ ù tɔɔgh ɓi mɛ lɛ, ù kɛ̀ɛ fe? 
Wɔ̀lɛ bim i mɛ ron mini ɓi mɛ̀rem ɓisuulɛ, màa kpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ. 
Ǹsoò fɔlɔɔ, ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ lɛ ki ri mìni kìrɔɔ lɛ nkɛǹ; lɛ i ǹkɛ̀ɛ ɓi, m̀maasì-mɛ̀rem à yin lɛ à yù a lɔ̀ŋkin; wɔ̀lɛ i ǹkɛ̀ɛ, ǹɗom yì mìni nyì. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à ri yù, à ri konag ki rèsii ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ lɛ, mɛ̀yitì maa ɓi kìɓan ki kiɓe, rì ɓi saaɗ, rì ɓi rìren ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi Bɛ̀ll, mɛ ri kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ. 
Mɛ ri kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ ɓi kìɓan ki kiɓe ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi mɛ. 
Mɛ ɓa zɛ̀ɗ ɓi kìɓan ki saaɗ ɓisuulɛ, mɛ̀ ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta, ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ. 
Mɔ zɛ̀ɗ ɓi kìɓan ki riren ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓisuulɛ, kìɓan ki rifòm ɗi ziinɛ ki mɛ renɛ̀n.
Ǹkaka rì ɓìɓan lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi lɛ nkpaà mìni, nni ɓì yin lɛ ɓì wog ɓyɔ ɓigomìnɛ. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Nghay à ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓiɓan a ri yù, à ri rèsi mini saaɗ bimiɗ. Lɛ, àa kpaa ɓi mini ɓìɓan ɓi nyimiɗ yɛɛ ɓekii lɛ a kpaà, à rì lɔŋ mini ɓiì kpaà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi à woogh, à ki kpaa mini ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ asu. 
À rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kemzii ɓisuulɛ à ri teɗ ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀, à kpaa mìni ɓyɔ̀. 
Ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Tààta à rì rì ɓyɔ, ɓi ri ɓiŋkɛ̀m, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ màa kpaa miì lɛ, Nghay à ri teɗ ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀, à kpaa mìni ɓyɔ̀.
Cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ; nni yɛ̀ɛ maa cààmɛ̀n à ɓiì ghaghii ti, ɓì ghɛɛ̀di mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tɔɔghrɛ̀ngà wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Kìɓan ki à kpaa ɓìsi ki, ki ri ɓà azi lɛ cɛ? À kpaa lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ. Yɛ̀ɛ maa cààmɛ̀n à ɓiì ghaghii ti, ɓì ghɛɛ̀dì mɛ̀, rì tì lɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ànɛ à kpaa ànɛ, à rì azi lɛ cɛ? Ɓìsii woogh ɓi com ki a kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ a kpaà.
Yeesus à yighà lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg nyi kìɓan kiǹ; fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi tɔɔtɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki màa kpaa mìni lɛ, cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ, nni yɛ̀ɛ maa cààmɛ̀n à ɓiì ghaghii ti ɓì ghɛɛ̀dì mɛ̀. 
Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkalì lɛ ɓì ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓì rèn, ɓì ki seeghkɛn, ziinɛ yɔ̀ɔ̀ nyàànyàà. Ɓì ri ɓa ri ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn, kìɓan kifog ǹɗem win wu kɛŋɛn wu ɓiì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ kinyàà. 
Cààmɛ̀n ki giɓ a kɔ̀rii ɗyem, à rì nɗem wu ɓeɓtɛn lɛ cààmɛ̀n kii ki ntɔɓ ki kpaŋi. Nni i man à mɛ yalɛ̀n, à ɗimzɛ̀n rìkɛŋ ɗii ɗiǹ lɛ kìnyàà ki à rì rì kɔ lɛ ǹto wu mum wu yalɛɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni girig bì rì rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ɓigomìnɛ, kìɓan kifog ǹɗi ghɛɛ̀di mini. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗi ghɛɛ̀di mini, mɛ̀rem min mɛ ri wog kinyàà, mum àa ki ɓàtɛn ti ɓi mini kìnyàà kiǹ. 
Ŋwos anɛ̀n, ɓyàa tɔg ti ɓi mɛ kìɓan. Ǹkpaa mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: Com kìcèm ki ɓì ri tɔg Tààta, à ri fa mini kɔ ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m. 
À kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì ka tɔg ɓi com kidɛŋ ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m. Tɔɔghna, ɓɛɛ fa mìni, di fɔɔnnɛ kìnyàà kin kɛɛ roǹ. 
Màa kpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi dàɗkì. Cààmɛ̀n ki riì kɛɛ̀ki màa tòòghrɛn ti ɓi ri mìni ɓi dàɗkì, ǹɗi kpaa lɔŋ mini ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee Tààta lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n. 
Ŋwos anɛ̀n ɓì tɔɔgh gɛ Tààta ɓìɓan ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, nni mɛ̀ ǹki kalii ɓi mìni lɛ, m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh gɛ Tààta ɓisu wiǹ; 
lɛ Tààta nyimiɗ a keesii mìni ɓisuulɛ ɓì keesìghà mɛ̀, ɓì ki gherɛn lɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
M̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Tààta, ǹ-yùy ɓi ziinɛ. Nni ɓigomìnɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ǹsugtì yɛ̀ɛ Tààta.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ghɛna ɓà min yɛ̀ɛ u tòtog ri ɓìsi ɓigomìnɛ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, kɛ̀ɛ̀ dàɗkì. 
Ɓigomìnɛ tì mɛ yi lɛ ù yii ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, rì tì lɛ, ki ghɛɓsii ɓi com lɛ mum a tɔg wɔ̀ ǹtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì gherɛɛ miì lɛ ù ɓaghày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ nnɛ ɓì mɛ gherɛ̀n? 
Ɓì ghɛɛ! Cààmɛ̀n ki riì, kiŋcèm ki mɛ kpaŋ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ɓiì tyàŋzɛɛ, mum ǹcèm à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì bee yiì, ɓi càɗ mɛ̀ cɛ̀ncɛm; nsoò fɔlɔɔ, ǹ-yin cɛ̀ncɛm, lɛ Tààta à rì ɓɛɛ̀ mɛ̀. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɛ, ɓi ɓa rì fyòoog a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀. Ɓì ɓiì ɓaà rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓi ziinɛ nni sììriina mɛ̀rem, mɛ̀ m̀mɛ yag ziinɛ ɓi-tèɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, nni à ɓegsìghà mis aɗyoo, à kpaa lɛ: Tààta, cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ kpaŋ, kemzi Man wɔɔ̀, di Man wɔɔ̀ a kemzi girig wɔ̀. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ù faghà nyi ìtèɗ wu lɛ a lami ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à fa ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ù faghà nyi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ri lɛ, ɓɛɛ yi wɔ̀, lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri m̀bobog à kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki yi Yeesus Kiris, roànɛ ù romgày. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkemzii wɔ̀ ɓi ziinɛ, ǹlègsì kìsay ki ù faghà mɛ̀ lɛ nki. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, Tààta wɔ̀ɔ̀ kemzi mɛ̀ jàŋbog rì wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, rì rìkem ɗi m̀ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ jàŋbog rì wɔ̀, di ziinɛ ì ka yin.
Ǹɗèsìghà ɗii ɗyɔɔ a ɓumɓɛ ù faghà mɛ̀ ɓi ziinɛ; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓum ɓɔɔ, nni ù faghà mɛ̀ ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki ɓèŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ mɛ yi lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ù faghà mɛ̀, ɓi riì a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ǹfaghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ù faghà mɛ̀, ɓɛ ghaɓ ɓyɔ, ɓɛ ki konag ki yiì lɛ, m̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, ɓɛ ki gherɛn lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀. 
Ɓisu waa nnɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg. Ǹ-yin ɓiì ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì ɓisuu ziinɛ, m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii ɓisuu ɓɛroɓɛ ù faghà mɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛnkɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Com kɛm̀ kìcèm ki ri kiŋkɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ kiŋkɔɔ kicèm ki ri girig kiŋkɛ̀m. Ɓi ɓɔ nnɛ rìkem ɗyɛ̀m ɗyɛɛ̀ rèeresɛ̀n. 
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yiìdi ti ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɔ yɛɛ rɔɓi ɓi ziinɛ, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ. Tààta ànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, ɓèŋa ɓumɓɛ ù faghà mɛ̀ rì ɗii ɗyɔɔ, lɛ di ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsii ri ɓɛ̀ràrɛn lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀. 
Cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ̀ɛ nɗì rì ɓɔ, mɛ̀ɛ mɓèŋɓeŋi ɓɔ, ɓì ɗii ɗyɔɔ, mɛ̀ɛ nkàakàmɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ, nsoò kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗyaŋ; i ki cee ɓi lɛ roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìɗyaŋì lɛ mɛ̀kànì mɛɛ roǹ. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, ǹ-yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ; ǹki kpaa ɓìɓan ɓi, cààmɛ̀n ki ǹkaka ɓi ziinɛ, lɛ di ɓɛɛ ɓa rì kìnyàà. 
Ǹfaghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓyɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ziinɛ ì ɓèèzɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛ yin ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ŋwaànɛ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii ɓi wɔ lɛ u pisi ɓɔ ɓi ziinɛ, mɓɔ̀ŋzàg lɔŋ wɔ lɛ, u lɛgsi ɓɔ kìɓe. 
Ɓɛ yin ɓumɓɛ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ŋwaànɛ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Kìya lɛ rì saaɗ wɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓum ɓɔɔ; ɓìɓan ɓyɔɔ ɓi ri saaɗ. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ù romgày mɛ̀ ɓi ziinɛ, mɛ̀ girig mɛ̀ɛ nɗomi ɓɔ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Mɛ̀ɛmiɗ mɓèeɓeŋɗɛ̀n ntɛnɛn lɛ ɓɔ, lɛ di ɓɔ girig ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn ɓi saaɗ ɓi ɗùm.
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii ɓi wɔ ɓisu waa lɔŋ cɛ̀ncaa, m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii wɔ̀ girig ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓiì gherɛɛ mɛ lɛ rìghagsì ɗyaa ɗi ɓɔlɛ̀ ànɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɔ ɓiì ghagsii. 
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzii wɔ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn kìbyɔg kìfog Tààta, yɛ̀ɛ ù rì ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ɓi wɔ̀, kìya lɛ ɓɔ girig ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràren ɓi ɓìsi di fɔɔnnɛ ziinɛ yɛ̀ɛ gherɛn lɛ, wɔ̀ yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀. 
Mɛ̀ ǹfaghà ɓɔ rìkem ɗi ù faghà mɛ̀, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn kibyɔg kìfog yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi. 
Mɛ̀ ɓi ɓɔ, wɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀, lɛ di ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ kìbyɔg kìfog, ziinɛ ì ki yi lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀, nni ǹkeesìghà ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ keesìghà mɛ̀. 
Tààta kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn mɛ lɛ, jàŋ inɛ ǹɗì, ɓumɓɛ ù faghà mɛ̀, ɓɛɛ ɓa girig wɔɔ nɗaŋ ri mɛ̀, di ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ rìkem ɗyɛ̀m ɗi ù faghà ɓisuulɛ ù keesìghà mɛ̀ di ziinɛ ì ka kilɛn ɓi. 
Tààta ànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ, ziinɛ ì yighà ɓi wɔ, lɔŋ mɛ̀ yɛɛ yighà wɔ̀, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ki yi lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀. 
Ǹɗèsìghà ɓɔ ɗii ɗyɔɔ, m̀ɓiì ki rèsii ti ɓɔ ɗyɔ lɛ di ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ù rì rì nyi ɓisu wɛ̀m a ɓa a lɔ̀ŋkaa, mɛ̀ɛmiɗ m̀ɓa a lɔ̀ŋkaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓɛ kɛǹ cɛcɛɗ ki maa ǹsyòm ànɛ lɛ Sedirɔŋ. Ɓɛ ɗiŋì rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓi dɛm idɛŋ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ. 
Zyudas ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà nyi kì kàɓi a yighà jàŋ inɛ̀n, lɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ nti ɓɛ taŋzàg wɔɔ. 
Nni Zyudas à tekà lɛ rì nɗaŋ wu ɓɛsujàà, rì ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ romgày, à yùy rì ɓɔ wɔɔ ɓi dɛm inɛ̀n. Ɓɛ ɓaghày lɛ rì ɓɛ̀lamɓà, rì tìŋwɔkì rì ɓyom ɓi ribaŋì.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà nyi kì tanɛɛ, fɔɔnnɛ à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀ngà ɓɔ a nyoo, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛn innɛ ɓi kaakàà? 
Ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ti kaakaa Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt. Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nɛ. Zyudas ànɛ à kàɓkà nyi à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ mɛ̀rɛy. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nɛ, ɓɛ sugtìghà rì jɛ̀m ɓɛ kpilàg ɓi zi. 
Yeesus à tɔgtì ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛn innɛ ɓi kaakàà? Ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ti kaakaa Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt. 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Màa kalii mìni lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ nɛ. I ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ nnɛ ɓi kaakàà, càrina ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛǹ, ɓɛɛ ghaàgh. 
À kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kalìghà lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nɗimzii ɓi nsoò kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ù faghà mɛ̀.
Nni Simɔn Pyɛɛri ànɛ à ɓaghà rì gàfàg ɓi ɗyaŋ, à sɔŋìghày yɔ̀ à kpɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹkìì-kìsay a rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ à syaŋ nyi ìreè wu weèlem. Ǹkìì-kìsay àǹcèm à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Malkus. 
Yeesus à kpaa Pyɛɛri lɛ: Pɛ̀ɛ̀zi gàfàg ɓi ɗyaŋ. Mɛ̀ m̀ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ɛ nnɔ ɓeŋ ànɛ Tààta à faghà mɛ̀ lɛ nnɔ?
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛsujàà wiǹ, rì Ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n wàà, rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ mɓègì naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ɓangà Yeesus, ɓɛ kaŋ̀ nyi bɛn. 
Ɓɛ ka kɛ̀ngà ɗì nyi yɛ̀ɛ Ann; lɛ Ann à ɓaghà seŋi gili Kayif. Kayif àncèm yɛɛ ɓaghà rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓi bèg ìnɛn. 
Nyi yɛɛ ki reɓkà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ, ki ri kìrɔɔ lɛ mum a wu bog ɓisuu kilɔ̀ŋ.
Simɔn Pyɛɛri rì ǹ-yilàg àdɛŋ, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Yeesus. Nni yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗi yighà ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n, nyii ɗiŋìghà ɓɛɛ̀ Yeesus ɓi nlɛmɓog wu rifòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Pyɛɛri à rɔɓkà ɓi dan, jàŋbog rì ìsuunaa. Nni ǹ-yilàg àmbog ànɛ à yisɛ̀ngà rì rìfòm ɗi bɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ à kpagày, à tòòghrɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ giɓ anɛ à ɓèŋɓèŋgà ìsuunaa, à ɗiŋzì min Pyɛɛri. 
Nni giɓ anɛ à ɓèŋɓèŋgà ìsuunaa ànɛ̀n à tɔkà Pyɛɛri lɛ ù rì girig kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ŋwaànɛ wa? Pyɛɛri à ɓàg lɛ: Àg, ǹ-yin n-yilàg wìì. 
Ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay rì ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà wɔɔ, di ɓɛɛ̀ wowog ɗuu ɗi ɓɛ ghɛŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ kìfɛɓ ki ɓaghà ɓiì kìkii. Pyɛɛri à rɛrɛ̀lìghà ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, à wowòg girig ɗuu.
Nni rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗi tɔkà Yeesus kìɓan ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, rì ɓìɓan ɓi à ti à rèèrèsàg ɓɔ. 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹtòtoogh lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ. Mɛ̀ nɗèresii ɓum ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, rì ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, jàŋ yi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ti ɓɛ taŋzàg, kɛ̀ɛ nki kpaa kiɓan kidɛŋ a rìnyam. 
Nni lannɛ mɛ̀ɛnɛ u tɔtɔg mɛtɔɔ̀ghtɔɔgh? Tɔgha ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nwowoogh ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛ nkpaakpaa, ɓɛɛ kpaà wɔ̀ com ki mɛ̀ɛ nkpaa ɓɔ, lɛ ɓɛ yii ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛ nkpaakpaa. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɓègì naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà foo, ki ɓokà nyi rìɓɛn, ki kpaa lɛ: Rìɓàg ɗi u ɓàɓag rifòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗìn? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I màa sɛ̀rii kìɓàagh, rèsi mɛ̀ jàŋ inɛ zɛ̀ɗ i rì, wɔ̀lɛ i màa ki konaagh kì ɓàagh, ɓi cɛ nnɛ ù ɓoogh mɛ̀?
Nni Ann à romgà nyi ǹkàŋɛn yɛ̀ɛ Kayif ànɛ à ɓaghà rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀.
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà wɔɔ, à wowòg ɗuu, nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ yin irig kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii? Pyɛɛri à roòzɛ̀n, à kpaa lɛ: Àg, ǹ-yin n-yilàg wìì. 
Nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ rifòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ki ki ɓaghà càŋàcaŋa ki ŋwaànɛ Pyɛɛri à rengà ìreè, ki kpaaghà lɛ màa ghɛɛ ɓi wɔ ɓi dɛm i ɓìte nɗaŋ ɗi nyi? 
Pyɛɛri à roòzɛ̀n tì, nni ǹlem à zag a ghàskà kì rɔŋì.
Nni ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà rì Yeesus yɛ̀ɛ Kayif, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi a kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m ɗì sariwa lɛ ɓuɓ. Ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ ɗiŋìghà ɓi ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m kiǹ, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ foŋɗɛn ɓɔmiɗ kìsyeg ɓi nyòò, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi Paskà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ Pilat à kpagày, à kɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà, à kpaa lɛ: Kìɓan adi kɛɛ̀ki ɓi kpaaghì ɓì ràɗ rì ŋwaànɛ? 
Ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: I àa yin fàràfara, di tì yùu yì ɓi ri nyi a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ. 
Nni Pilat à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìɓɔmiɗ terina nyi, ɓi yɔm̀ nyi ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓin. Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa Pilat lɛ: Tì yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ tì ren lɛ ɓɛɛ wey mum. 
Ki kilɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà lɛ a resi rìkuu ɗi riwù ɗi à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìwiì, yɛ̀ɛ ron. 
Nni Pilat à sugtìghà kì ɗiŋii ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m, à reŋì Yeesus, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Ù rì nya rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ kpaa kìɓan kiǹ gìn, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ kalii wɔ̀ fɔlɔɔ ɓɛ raɗ rì mɛ̀? 
Pilat à ɓàg lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n gìn? Ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ, rì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɔ yaa yùu rì wɔ̀ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, nni kìɓan aɗi kɛɛ̀ki wɔ̀ɔ nkìi? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kìlɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀ ki yin fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, i kaa rì ɓi ziinɛ, di ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛm ɓɛ nfaa rìbaŋì lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀n ɗi mɛ̀ a mɛ̀fòm mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. Wɔ̀lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀ ki yin fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Pilat à tɔg nyi lɛ: Yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ù rì rìfòm wa? Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ù kpaa miì, ǹɗì rìfòm. Mɛ̀ ǹ-yalɛ̀ngà, ǹki yù ɓi ziinɛ lɛ ntɛɛ̀zag ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ, fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì ŋwaà saaɗ, à ti à wokì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m. 
Nni Pilat à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Saaɗ innɛ cɛ? Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaŋdìghà, à kɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn ki ŋwaànɛ à kìi. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ki ri mìni kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ, ncaɗ mìni kìmbùŋ kìfog ɓi cààmɛ̀n à tìcàɓ ti Paskà, nni ki kɔni mìni lɛ rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ncaɗ gìn? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà tì rìkpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Èe èe àa nyi, lɔŋ Ɓaraɓas innɛ u caɗ. Kɔlɛ Ɓaraɓas à ɓaghà zyaàzyaa.
Nni Pilat à yùghà min ɗi Yeesus à reɓsì lɛ ɓɛɛ nyi kìtòn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ togà min tàm à ɓìlɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ saàgh Yeesus ɓi nto, ɓɛ waasì nyi kìlàà ki ɓàŋ. 
Ɓɛ tyɛɛ̀tɛ̀n nyi a nyoo di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, tì tògsii wɔ̀, ɓɛ ɓoòɓòkì nyi mɛ̀ɓɛn.
Nni Pilat à kpaŋdìghày, à kpaa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ: Ghɛɛna, ǹti lɛ, nkpaŋziì mìni nyi; ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì lɛ, ǹghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn ki à kìi, ki ki ri lɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀n nyi miì. 
Nni Yeesus à kpagày min. À ɓaghà rì tàm à ɓìlɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nto, rì kìlàà ki ɓàŋ ɓi nyoo, Pilat à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛɛna! mum innɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi, ɓɛ kpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Kpana nyi ɓi kɔrɔs, kpana nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. Pilat à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mìniìɓɔmiɗ terina nyi, ɓi kpaǹ nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. Ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m, mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn ki à kìi, ki ki ri lɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀n nyi miì. 
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg Pilat lɛ: Tì rì rì kìdɔ̀gsɛna, nni kìdɔ̀gsɛna kiǹ kɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wiì ɓisuulɛ àa nɗɛ̀ŋii kì kpaà lɛ, à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pilat à wokà tì jɛɛ ìnɛn, à risì tì lɛɛ̀gwey, 
fɔɔnnɛ à ɗiŋìghà tì ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m, à tɔg Yeesus lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ fuu yì fe? Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓi nyi, Pilat à kpaa min nyi lɛ: 
Mɛ̀ nnɛ ù mìnɛɛ? Ù yii ɓi lɛ ǹɗì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, ǹcàɗ wɔ̀, nsoò lɛ ǹkpaǹ wɔ̀ ɓi kɔrɔs? 
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ù ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, ù ɓa rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, ù kì mɛ̀ com di Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓi wɔ wɔ. Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki mum ànɛ à kàɓi mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀, à kìi kìɓe ki ki cee.
À tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, Pilat à kaakààghà bee inɛ lɛ a caɗ nyi, kìɓan kifog, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaakpààghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: I ù càri ŋwaànɛ̀n di ù yin righan ɗi Kaaza, lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kalii lɛ à rì rìfòm, à rì ŋwaànɛ a ɗùùɗuu ri Kaaza. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pilat à wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaŋzìghày Yeesus à kɔ̀rì ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu riren ɗi ɓiɓan, ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ pàveè, ɓi rì ebìreegh lɛ Gaɓata. 
Ŋwos anɛ̀n à ɓaghà ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ peèghpègsɛ̀ngà tìcàɓ ti Paskà di ki ti nunùg toroɓ, Pilat à kpaa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ: Rìfòm ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ teŋzìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: A wu, a wu, kpana nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. Pilat à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaǹ rìfòm ɗin? Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii yin ɗi rìfòm ɗiɗɛŋ i ki yin lɛ Kaaza. 
Nni Pilat à faghà min ɓɔ Yeesus lɛ ɓɛɛ kpan ɓi kɔrɔs. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tekà nyi, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi.
Yeesus à tɛ̀tɛ̀kà kɔrɔs wìì nyimiɗ ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn ɓi bàn, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ kìtɛtɛg ki nto, yɛ̀ɛ ri ɓi rì ebìreegh lɛ Gɔlgɔta. 
Wɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ kpangà nyi ɓi Kɔrɔs ǹɗaŋ ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, lɛ roànɛ nyi ɓi kìmɛŋ, roàmbog nyi ɓi weèlem, Yeesus ɓi nyìinyìm wàà.
Pilat à kàngà girig ɓi kìɓoŋ, ɓɛ ɓaàtì kɔ ɓi kɔrɔs. Mɛ̀kànì mɛǹ mɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Yeesus ànɛ a Naazarɛt, rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓalà kìɓoŋ kiǹ, lɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ kpangà Yeesus ì ɓaghà jàŋbog rì bàn. Kìɓoŋ kiǹ ki ɓaghà kìkànɛn lɛ, rì ɓi rì ebìreegh, rì ɓi rìgìrɛg, rì ɓi rìlàtɛŋ. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà Pilat lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kàn lɛ rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, kàna lɛ, àa nkpaa lɛ, nyii ri rìfòm ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Nni Pilat à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ki m̀mɛ kàn, ki ti kì kànɛn.
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ kpan Yeesus ɓi kɔrɔs, ɓɛ teɗ ɓìlàà ɓii, ɓɛ kaɓsì ɓyɔ gàɓ yinin, sujàà bimiɗ à teɗ gàɓ bog; ɓɛ tekà girig jɔmpàs wìì, àncèm à ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ jàŋ i ǹɗàrɛn, à ɓa ǹtoŋɛn lɛ ɗyɔɔg, à tumɛ̀n aɗyoo, à kpaŋ azi. 
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kpaaghà wɔɔ ɓɔmiɗ lɛ: Tyɛ̀ ki ghàski jɔmpàs ànɛ, ti ɓog ǹtɔ̀ŋ, di ti ghɛǹ ŋwaànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì terì. Ki kilɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ lɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓaghà kìkànɛn lɛ: Ɓɛ kaɓɓàkà ɓìlàà ɓyɛm̀, ɓɛ ki ɓog ntɔ̀ŋ ɓi jɔmpàs wɛ̀m. Com ki ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ kighà kɛɛ̀kìn.
Ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ lɛ: rì jɛɛ Yeesus, rì geni jɛɛ Yeesus, rì Marii à gili Kileyopas, rì Marii Madelɛn, ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà jàŋbog rì kɔrɔs à Yeesus. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà jɛɛ, à ghɛɛ̀dì tì ǹ-yilàg ànɛ àa nkeesàg ǹɗɛrɛliyɛn jàŋbog rì jɛɛ wìì, nni à kpaaghà jɛɛ lɛ: Giɓ anɛ, man wɔɔ̀ nnɛ̀n lɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà rì ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n lɛ: Gaa nnɛ̀n lɔɔ. À tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n à tekà jɛɛ Yeesus a mɛɛ mii.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà lɛ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi mɛ kpaŋzɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Kìnɔli kɛɛ̀ kìki mɛ, lɛ di ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓìkànɛn ɓyɛɛ roǹ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ tekày dɛ̀ɓ ɓɛ nɔg ɓi ɓìkpamà ɓi mɛrɔ̀g ɓi ɓi ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓi kìbɔkɔ̀ kidɛŋ, ɓɛ ɓam̀ yɔ̀ ɓi kìgeŋ, ɓɛ namzì nyi a ŋwɔm. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à syògà ɓìkpamà ɓi mɛrɔ̀g ɓiǹ, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi roni. Fɔɔnnɛ à tuŋzìghà nto à maasì.
Ŋwos anɛ̀n à ɓaghà ŋwosi jumɓa, di Saɓàt à rì yɛ̀ɛ rìduri. Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kɔngà ɓi lɛ ɓìloŋ ɓyɛɛ rɔɓ fɔlɔɔ ɓikpanɛn ɓi kɔrɔs à kpaŋ ɓi Saɓàt, lɛ Saɓàt ànɛn à ɓaghà coo gòn i kìcèlì. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà Pilat lɛ a fa ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ɓwingi ɓɔ mɛ̀kòò, ɓɛ ki kɔ̀sag yi ɓɔ ɓi ɓɛ̀kɔrɔs. 
Nni ɓɛsujàà ɓɛ yughà ɓɛ ɓungì mɛ̀kòò mɛ kibog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kpangà ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus, ɓɛ ɓungì tì mɛ roàmbog. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà ɓi Yeesus, ɓɛ tanɛ̀n lɛ à mɛ wu ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓwingi nyi mɛ̀kòò. 
Wɔ̀lɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀sujàà ki tuɓkà nyi bèn ɗì rìkɔ̀ŋ, mɛ̀nig rì bwaɓ ɓi ghas kì kpaŋì. 
Ŋwaànɛ a kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi, à ghɛngà ɓyɔ (rì mis). Nni com ki a kpaakpàà ki ri saaɗ, nyimiɗ a yii lɛ, a kpaakpaa saaɗ lɛ, di mìni girig ɓi gherɛn. 
Ki kilɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, kɛɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ nsoò kìwoɓ kii kifog, ɓaa ɓun ɓi.
Ki ri tì kìkànɛn ɓi jàŋ idɛŋ lɛ ɓɛ ri pɛ̀ɛ̀zii gɛ mis rì roànɛ ɓɛ tuɓkà bèn.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yoosɛɓ, ŋwaànɛ a Arimate, à ɓaghà ǹ-yilàg à Yeesus a rìnyam lɛ à rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. Nni à tɔkà Pilat ìtèɗ wulɛ a teɗ kìloŋ ki Yeesus, Pilat à gherɛ̀n. Fɔɔnnɛ à yùghà, à teɗ kìloŋ ki Yeesus. 
Nikodɛm ànɛ à lokà kì kɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus ɗì ìru, à yùghày gìrig; à ɓanɛ̀n yì bùtag i ɓyom ɓi ɓi ɓaghà lɛ ɓi kpaŋ ɓɛ̀kilò rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, ɓi ɓaghà mɛ̀kuu mɛ tirààre mɛ lɛ: rì miìr, rì àlòwɛs. 
Nni kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn ki tekà min kiloŋ ki Yeesus, ɓɛ kagì kɔ rì ɓɛ̀ɓandas, di ɓɛɛ̀ mìmisi tirààre miì yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ nkìlàg di ɓɛ ti ɓiì ɓòmi mum. 
Dɛm idɛŋ ì ɓaghà jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ kpangà Yeesus ɓi kɔrɔs, nni zɔ̀ŋ ì nyɔn ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka ɓom̀ ɓi mum miì, ì ɓaghà ɓi dɛm inɛ̀n. 
Miì nnɛ ɓɛ ɓomgà Yeesus, ɓisuulɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti ɓiì ɓùuɓuŋɛ̀n Saɓàt, rì tì lɛ, zɔ̀ŋ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ jàŋbog.
Ŋwosi sɔnɗì sariwa, Marii Madelɛn à pongà a zɔ̀ŋ rì tìrììriì, à ghɛn lɛ, gɔ̀g ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu zɔ̀ŋ ì ti m̀pisiyɛn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀ree, à kɛ̀n kì ghɛɛ̀ lɛ rì Simɔn Pyɛɛri, rì ǹ-yilàg àmbog ànɛ Yeesus àa nkeesàg, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓaa pisii Kan ɓi zɔ̀ŋ, nni tì yii ɓi fennɛ ɓaa foŋi nyi.
Nni Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ ǹ-yilàg àmbog ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà ɓɛ kɛǹ a zɔ̀ŋ. 
Ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà ɗì mɛ̀ree, kìɓan kifog, ǹ-yilàg àmbog à fyàgà Pyɛɛri ɓi mɛ̀ree, à log kì kpaŋì a zɔ̀ŋ ɗì nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à laŋmɛ̀ngà lɛ a tɛg wɔɔ ɓi ɗùm, à ghɛn ɓɛ̀ɓanɗas ɓɛ̀ nɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn, wɔ̀lɛ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Nni Simɔn Pyɛɛri ànɛ à ɓaghày nyi ajɛ̀m à kpagà, à ɗiŋì ɓi zɔ̀ŋ, à ghɛn ɓɛ̀ɓanɗas ɓɛ̀nɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn, 
kìlàà ki ki ɓaghà Yeesus ɓi nto, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa jàŋbog rì ɓɛ̀ɓanɗas, kɔɔ ɓa kì takakɛn fɔlɔɔ ki nɔ̀ŋziyɛn yi kìpàs. 
Nni ǹ-yilàg àmbog ànɛ à lokà kìkpaŋì a zɔ̀ŋ, à ɗiŋìghà girig, à ghɛn à ki gherɛn. 
Lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka wog ɓi azi anɛ ɓi rìkàn ɗi ɗi kpaakpààghà lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ Yeesus a ghemɓɛn yì a ɓìloŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ sugtì a mɛɛ.
Marii à rɛrɛ̀lìghà ɓi dan, ǹwɔŋì rì zɔ̀ŋ, à renɗèn. Yɛ̀ɛ à rènɗengà, nni à laŋmɛ̀ngà lɛ a ghɛn zɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɗùm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ghɛngà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, rì ɓìlàà ɓi puɓ, di ɓɛ kɔkɔrii ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ nɔŋzìghà kìloŋ ki Yeesus ɓɛ ki lɛ, roànɛ a nto, roàmbog a mɛ̀kòò. 
Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛǹ ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Giɓ anɛ, cɛ u rènɗèn? Nyii ɓaàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓaa pisii Kan wɛ̀m nni mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓaa foŋi nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, à ghɛn Yeesus ǹɗɛrɛriyɛn, kìɓan kifog, à yighà ɓi lɛ Yeesus yɛɛ ri. 
Nni Yeesus à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Giɓ anɛ, ɓi cɛnnɛ u rènɗèn? Ghɛn innɛ u kaakàà? Nyii fefèkà lɛ m̀ɓèŋì-dɛm yɛɛ ri. Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan! i wɔ̀ yaa pisii nyi fɛ, kali mɛ̀ jàŋ inɛ wàa foŋi nyi di mɛ̀ɛ nteɗ yì nyi. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Marii! nni à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, à kpaa Yeesus ɓi rì ebìreegh lɛ: Ràɓunì! yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ ǹɗèsàg. 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kòm mɛ, ɓisuulɛ ǹka ɓɔg ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m; kìɓan kifog kɛ̀na a ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, u kpaa ɓɔ lɛ m̀ɓɔɔgh yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m, nnyɛɛ ri girig Seŋi wìn, yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m, ànɛ à rì girig Bɛ̀ll wìn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Marii madelɛn à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaà ɓɛ̀yilàg lɛ nyaa ghɛɛ Kan, ànɛ̀n à kpaa nyi ɓìɓan ɓi nyii kpaa ɓɛǹ ɓin.
Cɛŋkò ki ŋwosi sɔnɗì nyimiɗ anɛ̀n, mɛ̀suunaa mɛ ɓi naa ìnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛtaŋzɛn, mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀rogakɛn lɛ, ɓɛ rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. Nni Yeesus à yùghà, à rɛlì ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Fyòoog a ɓa rì mìni. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à rèsìghà ɓɔ lɛ, rì ɓyàg ɓii, rì bèn yìì. Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà Kan. 
Yeesus à ɓììtì ɓɔ kìkpaà lɛ: Fyòoog a ɓa rì mìni. Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à romgày mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ǹɗomi girig mìni. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à fɛɓkà ɓɔ bɛ̀ɛ̀bɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi nyoo, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Terina Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓì ɓiì cenɛɛ ɓiɓe, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓìɓe ɓyaa ɓi ri ɓiì ɓaà ɓì cenɛn, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓì cenɛɛ ɓi ɓiɓe, ɓìɓe ɓyaa ɓi rɔɓ kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìcenɛ̀n.
Tomas ànɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ Didim, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, à ɓaghà ɓi wɔɔ cààmɛ̀n ki Yeesus à yùghày kiǹ. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛmbog ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Tyàa ghɛɛ Kan. Tomas à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: I ǹghɛɛ ɓi ɓifìlì ɓi tyɛmì ɓi ɓyàg ɓii, kɛ̀ɛ nki foŋ manàcàg wɛm̀ ɓi ɓìfìlì ɓi tyɛmì nsoò lɛ ǹfoŋ càg kɛm̀ ɓi bèn yìì, ǹ-yin lɛ ǹgherɛ̀n.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru taàraa, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ ɓatìghà ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn ɓi naa, Tomas à ɓaghà wɔɔ ri ɓɔ. Mɛ̀suunaa mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀rogakɛn, nni Yeesus à yùghày, à rɛlì ɓɔ ɓi nyìinyìm, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Fyòoog a ɓa rì mìni. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà Tomas lɛ: Nàmay manàcàg wɔɔ̀ fɛ, ù ki ghɛn ɓyàg ɓyɛm̀; nàmay càg u kom̀ bèn yɛ̀m; kɔ̀ɔ teteɗ nyoey, gherɛn. 
Tomas à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan wɛ̀m, rì Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m! 
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù gherɛɛ ɓisuulɛ ù mɛ ghɛn mɛ? Mààgh rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn. 
Yeesus à kìtìghà dàm yi ɓiɓan yidɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyilàg ɓii, yi yi yin fɛ yì kànɛn ɓi kaàtà ànɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, gàɓ ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ di ɓi gherɛn lɛ Yeesus à rì Kiris, Man à Bɛ̀ll, rì tì lɛ, i ɓì gherɛɛ, ɓì ɓa rì cɛɓ lɛ nyi.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à rèsɛ̀ngà tì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓi bèn ì rìɓày ànɛ a Tiɓeriyaadɛ.
Ɓɛ̀-Simɔn Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Tomas ànɛ à rì ɗii lɛ, Didim, rì Natanayɛl ànɛ à rì ŋwaànɛ a Kana a Galile, rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Zeɓede, rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ. 
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkɛ̀ɛ kì pìigh dam. Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓìsi girig, ti kɛ̀nkɛn nɗaŋ ɗi wɔ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà ɓɛ ɓɔg ɓi kìkɔm, wɔ̀lɛ ìru wìn, ɓɛ wolà ɓi com. 
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, nni Yeesus à rɛrɛ̀lìghà ɓi bèn ì rìɓày, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi lɛ Yeesus yɛɛ ri. 
Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɓti ɓɛ! ɓì yin foo ri com ki ɗiyɛn? Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Àg. 
À kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Pìighna dam ɓi ɓɛg à kìkɔm à weèlem di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓan ɓìzɛn. Nni ɓɛ pikà min dam, bee inɛ ɓɛɛ tug yì yɔ̀ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti, lɛ ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓaghà miì lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yilàg ànɛ Yeesus àa nkeesàg à kpaaghà Pyɛɛri lɛ: Kan yɛɛ ri. Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn Pyɛɛri à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à pùrɛ̀n kìlàà, ɓisuulɛ à ɓaghà kìtòn zɛy, à kpì ɓi rìɓày. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ yughày ɓi kìkɔm, di ɓɛɛ̀ syòŋsyoŋ yi dam ìnɛ ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓaghà miì lɛ pisa, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓiisɛ̀ngà ɓi ki ràɓsɛɛ ri ǹwɔŋì wu riɓày. Ǹwɔŋì wu riɓày wu ɓaghà di wu mɛ rɔ̀ɓ yi ɓɔ nunùg ɓɛ̀mità mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ sɛngà a cɛɗ, nni ɓɛ ghɛngà ɗuu ɗi ɓɛ̀ràŋ, rì ɓìzɛn miì aɗyoo rì bìrɛs. 
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Yùunay rì ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓì ɓaniì. 
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à ɓɔg ɓi kìkɔm à tùg yì dam ìnɛ ì ɓaghà rì ɓìzɛn lɛ pisa. Ɓìzɛn ɓincèm ɓi tɔɔghràkà, ɓi ki ɓaghà ɓìcèm ɓìzɛn mɛ̀tin taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓìzɛn ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiraa. Nni nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓi teghɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ dam ì ghàghàskà ɓi. 
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Yùuna kì ɗiì, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ki ki ghɛɛsìghà lɛ kɛɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ù rì ghɛn? Lɛ ɓɛ yighà lɛ Kan yɛɛ ɓaghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀ngà à teɗ bìrɛs, à fa ɓɔ, à fa girig ɓɔ ɓìzɛn.
Gɛ̀n i kìraa ìnɛ lɛ Yeesus a resɛn ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmɓɛ̀ngà a ɓìloŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓaghà lɔɔ.
Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ ɗi, Yeesus à kpaa Simɔn Pyɛɛri lɛ: Simɔn, man à Zyonas, ù keesii nya mɛ̀ ù cee lèg ànɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ keesii mɛ̀? Simɔn à ɓàg lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀, Kan, ù yii lɛ ǹkeesii wɔ̀. Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓèŋa jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀. 
Nni Yeesus à kpaatìghà nyi ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Simɔn man à Zyonas ù keesii nya mɛ̀? Pyɛɛri à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀, Kan, ù yii lɛ ǹkeesii wɔ̀. Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓèŋa jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀. 
Nni à kpaatìghà nyi ɓi gɛ̀n i kìraa lɛ: Simɔn man à Zyonas ù keesii nya mɛ̀? Pyɛɛri à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan, ù yii ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, ù ki yii lɛ ǹkeesii wɔ̀. Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓèŋa jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀. 
Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ ɓi saaɗ à rìkalì lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki ù ɓaghà kìɓwɛɗ ki mum, wɔ̀ɔ nti ù sìnàg kànɗa wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, ù kɛ̀n jàŋ inɛ ù kɔ̀ni. Kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ ù ɓiì rùni, ù ri nàmgi ɓyàg ɓyɔɔ, ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ siǹ wɔ̀ kànɗa, à ki kɛ̀n ɗi wɔ̀ jàŋ inɛ ù kɔ̀ni ɓi. 
À kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, a resi rìkuu ɗi riwù ɗi Pyɛɛri à ri kemzi Bɛ̀ll rì ɗyɔ. Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaaghà Pyɛɛri lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀!
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, nni à ghɛngà ǹ-yilàg ànɛ Yeesus àa nkeesàg di a nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ɓɔ. N-yilàg ànɛ̀n yɛɛ loŋmɛ̀ngà Yeesus ɓi-reè di ɓɛɛ̀ ɗiɗì, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan, ghɛn yɛɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì kàɓi? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ghɛngà nyi, à tɔg Yeesus lɛ: Kan, cɛ kɛɛ̀ki roànɛ à ɓiì tulɛɛ ri kɔ̀? 
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I ǹkɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓaɓa ɓi cɛɓ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗi sugtiì, ki ri wɔ̀ a cɛ? Wɔ̀ɔ̀ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀. 
Ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn nnɛ ɓɔlɛ à sààghà ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n lɛ ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n àa wu ɓi; kɔm̀ lɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓi Pyɛɛri lɛ ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n àa wu ɓi. À kpaaghà lɔŋ lɛ: I ǹkɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓaɓa ɓi cɛɓ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗi sugtiì ki ri wɔ̀ a cɛ?
Ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n yɛɛ̀ ki tɛɛtɛɛ̀zì ɓìɓan ɓi, nnyɛɛ ki kàngà ɓyɔ. Ɓìsii ki yii lɛ com ki a kpaa ki ri saaɗ. 
Yeesus à kìtìghà ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey. I ɓɛɛ kaǹkan ɓyɔ lɛ, kìfog kìfog, di ziinɛ bimiɗ ìrì lɛsàg, ɓi rìghɛn ɗyɛ̀m, ɓi kìɓan ki jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ foŋ̀ ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ kanɛ̀n.
Tyoofil, ɓi kaàtà wɛ̀m à ǹtonto, ǹkalìghà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Yeesus à Kìghà, rì ɓi à rèsàkà, à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n 
à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ à ɓaa lɛ, à mɛ reɓsag ɓiɓan ɓii rì ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ̀ à ɓɔ̀ngà, à ɓɔg min aɗyoo.
Ajɛ̀m ì rìwu ɗii, à rèsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, à ki rèsi ɓɔ ɓìrèmzɛnà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ yi lɛ à rì cem; à rèsɛ̀ngà a lɔ̀ŋkaa, mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀, à kakàlì ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Ŋwos adɛŋ ànɛ Yeesus à ɗiɗìghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, nni à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi Pɛ̀sɛn a Yorisalɛm, ɓoŋina lɔŋ ǹkàg wu Tààta à kàkà mìni, wɛɛ̀wu ǹwogsìghà mìni; 
lɛ Zyaŋ à ɓàɓtìghà ɓum ɗì mɛ̀nig, kìɓan kifog mìnii ri ɓiì ɓàɓtɛɛ ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay di ɓɔɔ mɛru ɓɛ ghaghii.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ ɓaghà nyi ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn a nyòò, nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Kan! Cààmɛ̀n ki kɛɛ̀ki ù rì nya ɓiì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii ki rɛsii kilamì ki Isirayɛl miì? 
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ki seesee ɓi mini lɛ ɓi yi gòn nsoò lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki Tààta nyimiɗ yɛɛ rengà rì ìtèɗ wii wu rilàmì. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓì ɓiì terì ìtèɗ wudɛŋ di Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki yuuyì ɓi mìni, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛm à tumɛ̀n a Yorisalɛm, à kpaŋ ɓi ziì Zyude bimiɗ, rì a Samari, à kɛ̀n kì kpaŋì a ɓɛ̀yɔ̀ŋyɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ zi.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à tumɛ̀ngà rìɓɔg aɗyoo, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ seesèè yɛ̀ɛ à ɓɔɓɔ̀kà à ràm à ɗim ɓɔ ɓi mis, di kìkwìɗ ki mɛ lɔg nyi. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ cɛɛnɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ mis aɗyoo, cààmɛ̀n ki Yeesus à ɓɔkà, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sigmɛ̀ngà di ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓɔ asu ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, rì ɓìlàà ɓi puɓ, 
ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mini ɓumɓɛ a Galile ɓɛ! Ɓi cɛ nnɛ ɓi cɛɛnɛɛ foo mis aɗyoo? Yeesus ànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ ànɛn ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, à ɓɔg aɗyoo, à ri sugtiigɛy lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓì ghɛɛ nyi ɗìn di a ɓɔɓɔg aɗyoo.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ sugtìghà min a Yorisalɛm, lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi dòn ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɗii lɛ, dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlìvyee, yɛ̀ɛ raɓsɛ̀ngà rì Yorisalɛm com ki kpaŋɛn bimiɗ à kilòmɛɛ̀tìrɛ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ ɓɔg ɓi mɛɛ mɛ aɗyoo, ɓi kìden ki naa ki ɓɛ nkɔ̀ràg miì; ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Rì Pyɛɛri, rì Zyaŋ, rì Zyag, rì Andire, rì Filiɓ, rì Tomas, rì Batelemi, rì Matyoo, rì Zyag à man à Alfe, rì Simɔn ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓɛ̀zelot ri Zyuudɛ à man à Zyag. 
Ɓɛ ǹti ɓɛ taŋzàg ɓɔɔ̀cèm lɔŋ nɗem wùfog lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋzag Bɛ̀ll, ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀yiɓ, rì Marii à jɛɛ Yeesus, rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ Yeesus.
Ŋwos adɛŋ, ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ taŋzɛn nunùg ɓum mɛ̀tin taàfog; nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, à kpaa lɛ: 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! kìɓan ki Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki lokà kì rèsii ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ŋwɔm wu Davit, ki rarɛ̀n ɗì Zyudas ànɛ à syògày ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓangà Yeesus bee, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ kɛɛ kilɛ̀n. 
Zyudas àa nɗì kìbog ki ɓi ǹɗaŋ wis, àa nki rì rì gàɓ ɓi kìsay ki tì rì rì kɔ. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à làkà dɛm ri mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ à fɔ̀ngà ɓi kìɓe kii, à ki kpì ǹto duŋzi kìbuutug ki lanì, ɓyom ɓii ɓi ɗùm ɓi tyaŋzɛ̀n. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ yighà kìɓan kiǹ, kɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓɛɛ reŋi dɛm inɛ̀n ɓi kìtòkì kaa lɛ Akɛldama, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, dɛm i bwaɓ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn ɓi kaàtà à Ɓɛ̀sam lɛ: Ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì rinii mɛɛ mii, mum kɛ̀ɛ kɔ̀ri miì, ri tì lɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu kisày.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà rì ɓìsi cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki Kan Yeesus à rerènìghà kìlɔ̀ŋ nɗaŋ ri ɓìsi, 
à tumɛ̀n lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ à ɓàɓtìghà nyi à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa m̀pɛsɛɛ ɓi nyìinyìm wìs a ɓɔg aɗyoo, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ kɛɛ ɓasɛn ɗì ɓìsi lɛ kɛɛ ɓa wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓi rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗii.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà min ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ rì Yoosɛɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Ɓarisaɓas, nyinnɛ ɓɛ nkpɔgì tì lɛ Yustus, rì Matyas. 
Nni ɓɛ ɓɔŋzìghà Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ yɛɛ yii mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, rèsi ɓìsi ghɛn innɛ ù ɓɔ̀ni ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ 
lɛ a teɗ ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu nkɛ̀nì-fìtom wu Zyudas àa ncàri, à kɛ̀n kì terì wu wu nghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà ǹtɔ̀ŋ rì mii maa, ǹtɔ̀ŋ à kpì ɓi ɗii ɗi Matyas, ɓɛ ɓas min nyi rì kìntɛ̀ɗ ɗì bog ki ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom kimbog.
Ŋwosi Pàŋtèkot, ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ taŋzɛn jàŋbog. 
Nni ɓɛ sigmɛ̀ngà lɛ, gom ì rìì aɗyoo, ì ɓa yɛ̀ɛ gom ì coo bɛ̀ɓ ki kɛɛ̀ fɛɛfɛɓsì, ki yu kì ronì naa ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà miì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓyom yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ròò mɛ ɗuu, ɓincèm ɓì ghasakɛn dɛŋ-dɛ̀ŋ-dɛŋ di ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀ɓɛli ɓɔ ɓi nyòò. 
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓa min ɓɛronɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, ɓɛ ki tòtog ɓitòkì ɓidɛŋ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Nghay à fafàghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ wu lɛ ɓɛɛ totòg.
Wɔ̀lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ falɛ̀ngà ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà girig a Yorisalɛm, di ɓɛ pɛsaagh yì ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gom ìnɛ̀n ì kìlɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ, ɓum ɓɛ ghɛŋmɛ̀n yì nni yɛ̀ɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n à woogh di ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog kitòkì kii, ɓɛ rɔɓ lɛ rèèree. 
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà ɓɛ rɔɓ myɔm ɓìkpaŋ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà ɓɔrìɓɔ lɛ: Nti ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog ɓɛ, ɓɛ rì ɓumɓɛ a Galile? 
Nni cɛ kɛɛ kiì lɛ, mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓìsi a wowog di ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog kitòkì kii? 
À tumɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ̀-Paritɛ, ɓɛ̀-Mɛɛɗɛ, ɓɛ̀-Elamit, ɓumɓɛ a Mɛzopotamii, ri ɓɛ a Zyude rì ɓɛ a Kapados, rì ɓɛ a Pɔŋ, rì ɓɛ a Azii, 
ɓɛ̀roɓɛ a Firizii, rì ɓɛ a Paŋfilii, rì ɓɛ a Egiɓtɛn, rì ɓɛ ɓi, kìden ki zi ki a Liɓii ki ki wòŋzɛɛ rì Sirɛn, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Rom, à teɗ lɛ, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɔmiɗ, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à kpaŋ lɛ, 
ɓumɓɛ a Kirɛɗɛ, rì ɓɛ a Araɓii, cɛ kɛɛ kii lɛ, ti wowog yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kakali dàm yi ɓiɓan yi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓis? 
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà; ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɗim ɓɔ, ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓɔmiɗ lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi kiɓan aɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ri lɛ? 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ wɔwɔ̀là ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ŋwaŋɛn mɛrɔ̀g lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì bog, à kpaa ɓumɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Mìni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, rì mini ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi kɔ̀kɔrii a Yorisalɛm, ramina mɛ̀ree, ɓi wog kìɓan ki nkìki lɛ, nkpaà mìni: 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ŋwaŋi ɓi mɛrɔ̀g yɛ̀ɛ ɓi fèfeg lɔɔ, lɛ mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ taànìn à sariwa yɛɛ kaka lɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ roozii jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì inɛ à kpaaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan wiì ànɛ lɛ Zyuwɛl lɛ: 
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn, ǹɗomigɛy Ǹghay wɛ̀m ɓi mum bimiɗ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀dɛlì ɓin rì ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓin ɓɛ ɓaà gɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɔn ɓin ɓɛ ghɛnghɛ̀n dàm yi ɓiɓan rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay à Bɛ̀ll, ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm ɓi kikì ɓìtùg ɓin ɓi ɓum. 
Ɛ̀ɛ̀! ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n nfoŋi gɛ Ǹghay wɛ̀m ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛm lɛ, rì ɓɛ ɓɛbaŋì, rì ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaŋzi ɓìɓan. 
Nɗi kìi gɛ lɛ dàm yi ɓiɓan yɛɛ resɛn ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ kilɛ̀n ɓi ziinɛ; rì bwaɓ, rì ɗuu, rì fìsilì ɓi ɓaa gɛ; 
ŋ̀wos à suu gɛ ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ birìm, ŋwii à lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n m̀ɓàŋ yɛ̀ɛ bwaɓ, di gòn i rìyù ɗi Kan ì ka kpaŋ ɓi, yɛ̀ɛ ri ɓaa gɛ coo ŋwos a rìkem ɗii. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à reŋii gɛ ɗii ɗi Kan lɛ a ghɛɓsi nyi à ghɛɓi gɛ.
Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl, wooghna kìɓan ki nkìki lɛ, nkpaà mìni: Yeesus ànɛ a Nazarɛt àa nɗì ŋwaànɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹɗèsii mìni lɛ, nnyɛɛ romgày nyi, ɓi dàm yi ɓiɓan, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, rì ɓìrèmzɛnà ɓi à faghà nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ a ki ɓi nyìinyìm wìn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii. 
Yeesus ànɛn innɛ ɓɛ nkàɓi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓaghà kìkaliyɛn, lɔŋ yɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll à fèkà ɓi coo ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii, nyi nnɛ ɓìi nkpani ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyoo, ɓì ki fa nyi rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe lɛ ɓɛɛ wey. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghèmzii nyi, à fùmì nyi bɛn yi riwù, lɛ ki n-yin lɛ ki kilɛ̀n lɛ, rìwu ɗyɛɛ ghaatɛn yì rì nyi. 
Lɛ Davit à ɓùgà kìɓan kii yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹseesèèghà lɔŋ Kan mɛ̀ asu ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, ɓisuulɛ, à rì mɛ̀ ɓi weèlem lɛ m̀ɓa kɛ̀ɛ ǹnìŋdɛ̀n. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗem wɛ̀m wu roni rì kìnyàà, ɓìtòkì ɓyɛm̀ ɓi ki ɓa ɓikpakpag ɓi kinyàà; nsoò nyoo yɛ̀m ì rì ɓiì fɔɔsɛɛ lɛ fyòoog rì ǹtyweeyi wu ǹɗì rì wɔ. 
Lɛ, wàa rini ɓi ǹghay wɛ̀m a ǹyɔ̀ɛ̀y ìsuùcèm, kɔ̀ɔ ki gherɛn lɛ ǹkìì-kìsay wɔɔ̀ ànɛ àrì ǹtɛnɛn a ɓwɛy ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Ù rèsìghà mɛ̀ bee ì cɛɓ, fɔɔnnɛ rìɓa ɗi ù rì mɛ̀ jàŋbog, ɗi ri fa mɛ coo kinyàà.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ǹɗì lɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Davit à seŋi wis a ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: À wughà, ɓɛ ki ɓòm nyi, zɔ̀ŋ yìì i rì fɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan à ki yi ǹkàg wu Bɛ̀ll à kàkà nyi à kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ lɛ, à kɔ̀ɔ̀sii gɛ dòò yìì idɛŋ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì, 
rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi Kiris ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi à lokà lɔɔ ki ghɛɛ̀, à ki kpaa lɛ: Bɛ̀ll àa rini ɓi nyi a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y, kɛ̀ɛ ki càɗ lɛ nyoo yìì yɛ̀ɛ ɓwɛy ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Yeesus ànɛ̀n nnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghèmzii, ɓìsiìcèm tì rì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓi rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗii. 
Yɛ̀ɛ àa mɓɔɔ ki kɔ̀rii ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll, Seŋi àa nfaa nyi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki à kàkà, kɛɛ̀ki à romiì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi seesee lɛ, ɓì ki wowog. 
Davit à ɓɔkà ɓi aɗyoo kìɓan kifog nyimiɗ a kalag lɛ: Kan Bɛ̀ll à kàlighà Kan wɛ̀m lɛ, kɔ̀ri mɛ̀ fɛ ɓi weèlem 
à kɛ̀n kì kpaŋì yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ghaasii ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɔɔ com ki, u rɛsag mɛ̀kòò miì.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Isirayɛl ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì syeesyee à rìyi lɛ, Bɛ̀ll àa ǹkìi lɛ, Yeesus ànɛ ɓìi nkpani ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyoo a ɓa lɛ nyi Kan wis, nyi Kiris.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓi Pyɛɛri ɓiǹ, ɓi ɗiŋì ɓɔ ɓi ǹɗem lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, nni ɓɛ tɔkà Pyɛɛri ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛm̀bog lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min lɛ ti ki la?
Pyɛɛri à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna mɛ̀rem, mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni à ki ɓàɓtɛn ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn ɓìɓe ɓin, à ki fa mini Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Lɛ ǹkàg wu Bɛ̀ll à kàkà wu ri ɓisu win, rì ɓisuu ɓɔn ɓin, wu ki ɓa ti ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri tìràɓ, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll wìs à regiigɛy bàlì ìnɛ ki kɔ̀ni gɛ nyi lɛ a regiì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à rèrèsìghà ɓɔ saaɗ, à ki rereɓ ɓɔ rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yidɛŋ yi à kpaatìghà ɓɔ nwèe: Pɛ̀sɛɛnas̀ lɛfyɛ̀ɗ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi rìɗim ɓi ɗùm.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà rìkpaa ɗi Pyɛɛri ɗiǹ ɓɛ ɓaɓtàkà, fɔɔnnɛ bàlì ì ɓum ìnɛ ì sagtɛ̀ngà ɓi bàlì ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, ì ɓaghà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛraa.
Ɓɛ siìrɛ̀ngà ɓi rìwowòg ɗi rirèsàg ɗi ɓɛkɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓi cɛɓ ki rigeni, rì ɓi rìcusàg ɗi bìrɛs, rì ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. 
Ìris wu ɓangà mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ, lɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ kikìghà dàm yi ɓiɓan rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà kìbyɔg kìfog, ɓyom ɓyaa ɓìcèm ɓi ɓa bùtag. 
Ɓɛ kakàɓkà lɛ: Rì ɓìden ɓyaa ɓi zi, rì ɓyom ɓyaa, ɓɛ kaàkàɓɓɛ̀n mɔɔ̀ni mɛ miì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, mum bimiɗ à tekì gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì nyi. 
Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓɛ ǹti ɓɛ taŋzàg ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ŋwos bimiɗ, ɓɛ ɗiɗì ɓìɗilàg ɓyaa ǹɗaŋ ɓi naa yaa ɓɛ ɗiɗì ɓyɔ rì kìnyàà, rì ǹɗem wu risɛɛ̀dɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ mɓɔgsàg Bɛ̀ll, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ki keekeèsì ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ Kan à tèèghtègsìghà ǹɗaŋ waa ɓɛ ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm rì ɓum ɓɛ ki kɔngà Bɛ̀ll lɛ a ghɛɓsi.
Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓɛ ɓɔ̀ɓɔ̀kà a naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓi cààmɛ̀n à bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa à ŋwos ǹkɛ̀nɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà rì ɓìlɛm, à ɓaghà wɔɔ. Ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ n-yùlàg nyi kì kɔ̀ɔ̀sii asuunaa wu naà-Bɛ̀ll wu ɓɛ ǹɗegì lɛ: Rɔɔrɔɔ, lɛ a lɔǹlɔn ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɗiɗiŋi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓyom. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghɛngà lɛ rì Pyɛɛri rì Zyaŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, fɔɔnnɛ à lɔngà ɓɔ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. 
Pyɛɛri rì Zyaŋ ɓɛ ruusìghà mis ɓi nyi ɓɛ fiɓì nyi lɛ fyɛɛɛyi, Pyɛɛri à kpaa nyi lɛ pɛɓsɛn ɓìsi. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à seesèèghà ɓɔ lɛ tɔ̀ntɔ̀n à fèkì nya lɛ ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì faà com. 
Pyɛɛri à Kpaa min nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ n-yin ɗi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni nsoò gol lɔŋ com ki ǹɗì rì kɔ kɛɛ̀ki ǹfaa wɔ̀: Ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris ànɛ a Nazarɛt pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo u kɛɛ̀ghi! 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɓangà ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi càg ki weèlem à pɛ̀sì nyi mɛ̀rɛy. Lɔŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, mɛ̀kòò mii, rì mɛ̀lèŋiɗ mii ɓi ghas kì terì ìtèɗ; 
lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à lɛlà gɛ̀n bog lɛ doɓtà, à rɛli mɛ̀rɛy à ghagsɛ̀n ɗì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀. Nni à ɗiŋìghà rì ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll di a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀, à lɛɛ̀lɛ̀ɛ̀tɛ̀n, à ki keekemzì Bɛ̀ll.
Mum bimiɗ à ghɛngà yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà di a ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n yɛɛ nti à kɔ̀ràg asuunaa wu naà-Bɛ̀ll wu lɛ Rɔɔrɔɔ à lɔnlɔ̀n ɓum ɓyom, nni ɓɛ risìghà ɓɛ ki kuurag kiɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà kiǹ bi cɛɓ ki ŋwaànɛ̀n, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ŋwaàncèm ànɛn à nɔ̀ɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ, nni ki yeesìghà ɓum rìwog ɓɛ ghɛŋmɛ̀n ɓɔ a nyoo ɓi tuùtuu anɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ tuùtuu à Salomɔŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, nnɛ à kalìghà ɓumɓɛ̀n lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl, ɓi cɛ nnɛ ɓì rì ri mɛ̀kuùkuugh ɓi kìɓan ki? Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi fifiɓi ɓisi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ tì kɛ̀ɛ̀sii ŋwaànɛ rì ìtèɗ wis, nsoò lɛ ɗì rìfalɛ̀n ɗis ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n? 
Bɛ̀ll à Abiraham, Bɛ̀ll à Isag, Bɛ̀ll à Yakɔɓ, Bɛ̀ll à ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis yɛɛ faa ǹkìì-kìsay wiì ànɛ lɛ Yeesus rìkem. Yeesus ànɛn nnɛ ɓìi nkàɓi, ɓi ki roòzɛn nyi ɓi mis mɛ Pilat ànɛ àa m̀mɛɛ̀ kì lɛ di àa càri nyi. 
Ɓìi nɗoòzɛɛ roànɛ àa nɗì ǹtɛnɛn à ki ɓa ti lɛ saaɗ, ɓi tɔg Pilat lɛ a caɗ roànɛ àa nɗì ǹwolì-ɓum. 
Ɓìi kìi lɛ ɓɛɛ wey ŋwaànɛ à làmii cɛɓ, nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghèmzii yì a ɓìloŋ; tìrì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓi rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗii. 
Ǹtyweeyi wu tì rì rì wɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus wɛɛ kii lɛ, ɗii ɗìn ɗyɛɛ fa mɛ̀kòò mɛ ŋwaànɛ ɓi yii ànɛ ìtèɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi seesèè, fɔɔnnɛ ǹtyweeyi wu ɓi Yeesus wɛɛ kii lɛ, a wɔǹ lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi seesee lɔɔ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ǹ-yii lɛ ɓìi ǹkìi fɔlɔɔ lɛ, rì mìni rì ɓɛ̀làmì ɓin ɓìi n-yii ɓì. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓi bee inɛ̀n nnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹdoòzii kìɓan ki à lokà ki kpaà ɓi myɔm mɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ajɛ̀m lɛ: Kiris à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ gɛ kì woògh rìkɛŋ.
Nni lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛna min mɛrem, ɓi sugtiì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, di fɔɔnnɛ a tiìsi ɓìɓe ɓin. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Kan à rì ɓiì romìì ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi rifɔɔsɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ à rì mìni ɓiì romìì ǹghɛɓsì-ɓum, ànɛ à pègsɛ̀ngà ɓisu wìn. Nnyɛɛ rì Yeesus Kiris. 
Yeesus ànɛ à ka ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀kɔrii aɗyoo, à kpaŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ ri ɓiì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii ki rɛsii ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi mɛ̀rɛli mɛ ɓyɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà fìɗyàɓ ɓi myɔm mɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ tɛnɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ Moyis à kalìghà lɛ: Kan Bɛ̀ll wìn à romiì gɛ mìni ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ànɛ à ɓaa gɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀, à kì ɓa ŋwaànɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kin, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com kìcèm ki à kalii gɛ mìni. 
Ŋwaànɛ à sɛɛtii gɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ̀n, ɓɛ pisii gɛ nyi ɓi bàlì ì ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ki wey nyi.
Ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ɓsɛ̀ngà, à tumɛ̀n yì ɓi Samuɛl, ɓɛ ɓugà kìɓan ki ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Mìni yɛɛ ri ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓì ki ɓa ti ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi ɓee ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rengà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓìn, yɛ̀ɛ à kalìghà Abiraham lɛ: M̀màŋi gɛ naa yi ɓum yìcèm yi ɓi ziinɛ ɓi jɛ̀m ì dòò yɔɔ. 
Mìni yɛɛ ri ɓumɓɛ asu ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà ǹkìì-kìsay wiì ɓisu waa, à rom yì nyi, lɛ a maŋ̀ mìni, di a ki lɛ mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi mìni a càɗ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓii ɓi mɛkìkìì.
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, rì ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì naà-Bɛ̀ll, rì Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛ yughày di ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓɛɛ̀ ka tòtog ri ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ wokà bim yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ɓuŋɓùŋ kìɓan ki rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi Yeesus, ɗì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓangà ɓɔ ɓɛ pig ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày lɛ ɓɛɛ kɔri wɔɔ à kpaŋ ɓi duri-tana, lɛ cɛŋkò ki ɓaghà di ki ti. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, kìgwey ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ki gherɛ̀ngà, fɔɔnnɛ bàlì ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ì kpagà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ.
Ɓi duri-tana, ɓɛ̀lànlam ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓaa, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà a Yorisalɛm 
ɗì ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ànɛ̀ lɛ Ann, rì Kayif, rì Zyaŋ, rì Alɛgsaŋdirɛ ri ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi naà-ɓum ì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, ɓɛ tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓi-tèɗ aɗi, ǹsoò lɛ̀ ɓi ɗii ɗì ghɛn innɛ ɓìi nwɔ̀ɔ̀zii ŋwaànɛ̀n? 
Nni Pyɛɛri, ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Ǹghay, à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni ɓɛ̀làmì kìlɔ̀ŋ rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ a Isirayɛl, 
yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɛ tɔg ɓisi gɛɛ̀nɛ, kìɓan ki ɓi kìrɔɔ ki kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ ki mum ki ntanɛɛ rì kɔ, lɛ ti resi yɛ̀ɛ ki mɓaa lɛ a wɔǹ, 
ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl ki yi girig lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à rɛrɛlii mìni asu fɛlɛ lɛ syeesyee ɓi nyoo yìì, lɛ ìtèɗ wu ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris ànɛ a Nazarɛt, ànɛ ɓìi nkpani ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyoo, nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghèmzii yì a ɓìloŋ. 
Yeesus à rì yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓɛ̀toŋì-mɛɛ ɓɛ makà, yɛ̀ɛ ki ghalà kìlèmì ki ǹtɔn à mɛɛ.
Mum à rì lɔŋ ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ lɛ nyi, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓi ɓum ɗii ɗidɛŋ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɗi ɗi ri rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, ɗi fa ɓìsi cɛɓ.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yɔɔ̀yɔ̀mzìghà ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri, ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛ, ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ, Pyɛɛri rì Zyaŋ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓàɓag ɓɔ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris ɓi ǹɗem, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀dì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ yighà ɓi sùkurù, ɓɛ yi min lɛ, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi Yeesus. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à wɔ̀ngà ànɛn à ɓaghà ɓɔ ɓi nwɔŋì, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rɔɓkà ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ yi com ki ɓɛɛ pɛɛ̀zi ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri. 
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà lɛ ɓɛɛ ka kpaŋzi ɓɔ ɓi ɗyɔ̀m di ɓɔɔ rɔ̀ɓ kìnyolɛɛ ɓɔrìɓɔ, lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ bimiɗ à ǹɗɛli ɓi kìɓan kiǹ. 
Ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà lɛ: Ti ki la ri ɓumɓɛ? Lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ mɛ yi lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ, ɓɔ yɛɛ nkìi dàm ì kìɓan ìnɛ, wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsii ki yin lɛ tì teɗ nyoey lɛ ɓɔ yɛɛ nkìi kìɓan kiǹ. 
Nni ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɔlɛ ànɛ kɛ̀ɛ ɓiisɛn ki sàa, ti rɔ̀gsɛɛna ɓɔ lɛ, i ɓɛ kpaatii mum kìɓan ki ki rarɛ̀n ɗì ɗii ɗi Yeesus di ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghɛɛ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ reŋìghà tì min ɓɔ, ɓɛ reèg ɓɔ ìsuùcèm lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓùŋdi ɗii ɗi Yeesus, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ ki rèresiti ɓum ɗii diǹ. 
Ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓɛ ɓaàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ghɛɛna mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ǹkòo ki ri lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ, ti ki mìni mɛ̀wog à cee Bɛ̀ll. 
Lɛ ɓìsii yin lɛ tì rɔ̀ɓ lɛ tì kpaa ɓi kiɓan ki ti ghɛngà, tì ki wog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mzì-ɓɔ, ɓɛ sagɛ̀ngà tì ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki caɗ min ɓɔ, di ɓɛ mɛ rɔɓ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ pɔnɔ̀si ɓɔ ɓisuulɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki keèkèmzìghà Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu dàm ì kìɓan inɛ̀n. 
Ŋwaànɛ à wɔ̀ngà dàm ì rìwɔ̀n ànɛn, à ɓaghà di a mɛ cee bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ caɗkày ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ, ɓɛ kɛngà kì tanɛɛ ɓɛgeni ɓaa, ɓɛ kali ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ rɔgsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kì ti. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ nni ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ pɛsìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹɗaŋ ɓɛ ɓɔŋzì Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ yɛɛ kighà lɛ rì ɗyoo, rì zi, rì rìɓày à kìkòn, rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri miì; 
wɔ̀ yɛɛ kpaaghà rì ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, ɓi ŋwɔm wu seŋi wìs Davit ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkìì-kìsay wɔɔ̀ lɛ: Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ̀nyùùghnyùùgh ɓɛ ri fɛlɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ? Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi taŋzɛɛ ɓìtɔ̀kɔ̀ ɓi zɛy rì zɛy? 
Mɛ̀fòm mɛgwey mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ramiì wɛ̀y, mɛ̀fòm mɛ sàgsàg mɛ ɓasɛ̀n yì kìbyɔg kìfog lɛ mɛɛ ɗuù rì Kan, rì Mèsii wiì.
Ɓi saaɗ, ɗì Eroodɛ rì Pɔŋs-Pilat ɓɛ mɓasɛɛ rì ɓɛ̀kèn, ri mɛ̀kuu mɛ a Isirayɛl ɓi ban ìnɛ, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗuù rì Yeesus ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-kìsay wɔɔ̀ à ǹtɛnɛn ànɛ ù rɛsìghà. 
Ɓìɓan ɓi ù lokà kì fèegh ɓi-tèɗ wɔɔ, rì ɓi rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ lɛ ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓɛ nɗoòzii lɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, Kan, ghɛna yɛɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ sàasagɛ̀n ɓìsi, dì u fa ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɔɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ, ɓɛɛ ghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ̀ɔ̀ rì kìghɛɛsii kicèm. 
Nàmas̀ càg kɔɔ lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ wɔ̀nwɔn tìroɓ, ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ri dàm yi ɓiɓan ɓi kiìkìlɛ̀n ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus ànɛ àrì ǹkìì-kìsay wɔɔ à ntɛnɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ legsìghà bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yàà inɛ̀n, mɛɛ mɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛtaŋzɛn mɛ nyɛŋɗɛ̀ngà, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ rongà rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, ɓɛ ki ghaaghagsì Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll rì ntyweeyi ɓi ǹɗem.
Ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛgherɛ̀n wu ɓaghà ǹɗem wùfog, ɓɛ̀fèg ɓɛ̀fog, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à kalì lɛ ɓyom ɓi à rì ɗì ɓyɔ ɓi ri ɓiŋkii cɛ̀ncii, wɔ̀lɛ ɓyom ɓyaa ɓi ɓaghà ɓisu waa ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓɛkɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓum kìɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi Kan Yeesus rì ìtèɗ lɛɛ̀gwey, fɔɔnnɛ coo geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ì rongà a ɓɔɔ̀cèm. 
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à yɛɓɛ̀ngà ɓi com ɓi nyìinyìm wàà lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì dɛm, rì ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì mɛɛ ɓɛ kakàɓkà ɓyom ɓìn, ɓɛ yuyù rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì 
ɓɛ fafà mɔ rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, ɓɛ kaɓsàg mɔ yɛ̀ɛ mum bimiɗ a teɗ gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɗi nyi...
Yoosɛɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi boo ì ɓum ì Levi ìnɛ ɓi ban ìnɛ lɛ Siipirɛ, nyi nnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ nkpɔgì lɛ Ɓarinaɓas, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ŋwaà-mɛ̀fegsɛn, 
à kàɓkà dɛm inɛ à ɓaghà rì yɔ̀, à yù kì faà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom.
Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ɗii lɛ, Ananyas ɓɛɛ̀ Safira à giy ɓɛ Kaɓkà kìden kaa ki zi. 
Nni Ananyas a ghaɓìghà gàɓ ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, à kɛ̀n ki faà gàɓ ìmbog rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom; giy a yighà kìɓan kiǹ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à kalighà Ananyas lɛ: Ananyas, Satàn a ràgɛɛ ɓà wɔ ri ǹɗem fɛlɛ lɛ cɛ yɔ? Ù pwàa Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ù nyam gàɓ ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ìnɛ ɓi kiden ki zi ki wɔ̀ɔ ǹkàɓi? 
Yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ nka kaɓ ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, ìi ǹɗì jàŋ yɔɔ̀, yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ nki kàɓi yɔ̀, mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ miì mɛ rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɔɔ, nni fèg ànɛ lɛ u ki rìkuu ɗi kiɓan ɗi ù kìi ɗi, à rìì wɔ̀ fe? Yiti lɛ: Àa ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ù pwàa, lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll innɛ ù pwàa. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ananyas à wokà ɓìtòkì ɓi Pyɛɛri ɓiǹ, nni à kpìghà, à wu. Fɔɔnnɛ coo iris wu ɓangà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà kìɓan kiǹ. 
Ɓɛ̀dɛlì ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ yughày rì com ki lɛ, ɓɛɛ lɔg kiloŋ kii miì, ɓɛ pɛsì min kɔ, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì ɓòmi.
Di cààmɛ̀n kaa ghaàgh fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀hawò ɓɛraa, nnɛ gili Ananyas à yùghày, kɛ̀ɛ yi com ki ki kilɛ̀ngà. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Kali ɓà mɛ, mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓi zi inɛ ɓìi nkàɓi mɛɛ ri lɛ? Giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓàg lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ mɔ yɛɛ ri lɔɔ mɛcèm. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ yaa kìi lɛ ɓi woòghrɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ, ɓi feèghrɛn Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki Kan? Ghɛna, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓomiì yii wɔɔ̀ ɓɛɛ ti lɛ asuunaa, ɓɛɛ teɗ wɔ̀ girig. 
Bi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ innɛ à ghàskà kì kpìi a mɛ̀kòò mɛ Pyɛɛri, à wu. Ɓɛ̀dɛlì ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɗiŋìì, ɓɛ tanɛ̀n nyi kìloŋ, ɓɛ pɛsì nyi, ɓɛ kɛn kì ɓòmi ɓi ǹwɔŋì wu zɔ̀ŋ ì yii wiì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ coo iris wu ɓangà kìseŋi kìcèm rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà kìɓan kiǹ.
Ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ kikìghà dàm, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ. Ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ǹti ɓɛ rɛlàg ǹɗaŋ ɓi tuùtuu ànɛ ɓisuunaa wu naà-Bɛ̀ll wu Salomɔŋ. 
Kìɓan kifog, ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à ghɛɛsìghà lɛ a rarɛn ɗì ɓɔ, à ɓaghà ɓì, nsoò fɔlɔɔ ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yuyùghà kì gherɛɛ Kan, lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɗì ɓɛ̀baŋì ì ɓɔɓɔ̀kà mɓɔɓɔghɛn. 
Nni ɓɛ yuyùghà ɗì ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓi ɓìɓàà, ɓɛ nɔŋzàg ɓɔ ɓi ɓɛ̀kon rì ɓi ɓìkàrà lɛ, i Pyɛɛri à ti ɓiì ghaghii, nsoò cììziŋ kii ki kom roàdɛŋ. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum ɓi ɓi bàn yi ɓi mɛ̀wɔŋì, ɓi yuyùy a Yorisalɛm ɗì ɓɛ̀roroɓ, ɗì ɓumɓɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi yeèyèèsìghà, ɓɛ ki wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀m̀ɛn ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, ri ɓumɓɛ à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀sàdùsyɛŋ ɓɛ wokà bim lɛɛ̀gwey ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom. 
Ɓɛ ɓangì ɓɔ, ɓɛ pig ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom à Kan à yùghà rì ìru, à nɛmgì mɛ̀suunaa mɛ naà-zày, à kpaŋzì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, à ki kali ɓɔ lɛ: 
Kɛ̀ɛna ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓi kakali ɓum ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi komi cɛɓ ki. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓɛ pongà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɓum ɗì rèrèsì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓiǹ. Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey, rì ǹɗaŋ wii wu ɓum ɓɛ yughày, ɓɛ reŋɗɛ̀n ǹtaŋzɛn wu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n wu lɛ Sànèdìrɛŋ, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Isirayɛl, ɓɛ rom min ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ yì kì terì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓi naà-zày. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ kpagà ɓi naà-zày, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tanɛn ɓɔ wɔɔ, nni ɓɛ sugtìghày kì kalii ɓumɓɛ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ lɛ: 
Tì tanɛɛ yì lɔŋ naà-zày ǹɗogakɛn lɛ gbàg-gbààg. Ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì naà-zày ɓɛ̀ rɛrɛliyɛn lɔŋ a mɛ̀suunaa wɔ̀lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ti ŋwàri mɛ̀suunaa, tyɛ̀ ki tanɛn mum ɓi ɗùm nsoò bog.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n naà-Bɛ̀ll ɗì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ki yeesì ɓɔ lannɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ kighà lɛ ɓɛɛ silì ɓi naà-zày. Ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n lɛ: Kìɓan ki ki ri ɓiì ɓaà la? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à yùghày ɓɔ kìkalii lɛ: Ɓì ghɛɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓìi ǹfoŋi ɓi naà-zày, ɓɛ ri ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìrèsàg ɗi ɓum.
Nni ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n naà-Bɛ̀ll à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀sujàà, ɓɛ teɗ yì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ rirìsìghà lɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓɔ ɓiì rogii gɔ̀g. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ yughày rì ɓɔ a Sànèdìrɛŋ, ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìtɔg ɗi mɛtɔɔ̀tɔɔgh 
à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹti tìi ǹɗɔ̀gsɛɛ mìni syeesyee à rìrɔ̀gsɛ̀n lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi rèsi ti mum ɗii dìn? Nni ghɛɛna com ki ɓì kìi, ɓì sààtii rìrèsì ɗiǹ ɓi bàn ì Yorisalɛm bimiɗ, ɓi kì kɔ̀n yɛ̀ɛ di ɓyàa saghii ɓìsi rìwu ɗi ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi ǹto.
Nni Pyɛɛri rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ ɓakà lɛ: Bɛ̀ll nnɛ mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi mɛwog, à cee ɓum. 
Bɛ̀ll à ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓìs àa ǹghèmzii Yeesus ànɛ ɓìi ǹwoli di ɓi kpani ɓi kɔrɔs. 
Nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll àa m̀pɛ̀sii aɗyoo, rì weèlem wìì, lɛ a ɓa lɛ, nyi rìfòm, nyi ǹghɛɓsì-ɓum ànɛ à rì ɓiì nɛmì Isirayɛl bee ìnɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem di Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn ɓɔ ɓìɓe ɓyaa. 
Tì rì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɛ, rì ɓìsi, rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki Bɛ̀ll àa ǹɗomiì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki nyi mɛ̀wog.
Fɔɔnnɛ bim i kìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓi ǹtaŋzɛn wiǹ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ, ɓɛ feg lɛ ɓɛɛ cuusi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, 
wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɗii lɛ Gamalyɛl, ǹɗèsàg ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kuuràkà, à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm à Sànèdìrɛŋ, à tɔg lɛ ɓɛɛ ka kpaŋzi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓidan. 
À kpaa min ɓum ɓɛ ǹtaŋzɛn lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl, konaaghna rì com ki ɓi fèfeg kiǹ lɛ ɓi ki rì ɓumɓɛ; 
lɛ, ki ka finɛn ɓì yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ Tedas à peeghày fɛ à yèèghyègsì ɓum lɛ nyii rì bimiɗ à mum à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛnin, nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wolà ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi ɓɛ sanì, com ki ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kìghà kɔɔ duŋɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ. 
Ajɛ̀m ì Tedas, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki bàlì ì kìlɛ̀ngà, ŋwaànɛ a Galile lɛ Zyudas à yùghày, à syòŋ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wootìghà nyi, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ à syògà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ sanì. 
Nni mɛ̀ ǹkalii mìni ɓigomìnɛ lɛ: kɛ̀ ɓi fifiɓi ti kìɓan ki ɓumɓɛ, càrina gì ɓɔ, ɓɛɛ ghaagh; ɓisuulɛ i ki ri lɛ mum yɛɛ faa bɔ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗiǹ, kìɓan ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì kaa ghay ɓi. 
Kìɓan kifog, i Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ ǹfaa ɓɔ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗiǹ, ɓyàa ghɛn ɓi bee inɛ lɛ ɓi yogsì kìɓan ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì. Konaaghna lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ram wɛ̀y rì Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ sɛkà rìkpaa ɗi Gamalyɛl ɗiǹ, nni ɓɛ reŋìghày tì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, ɓɛ ɓog ɓɔ ɓi kìtòn, ɓɛ rɔgsɛ̀n ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaati ɓum kìɓan ki Yeesus, ɓɛ ki càɗ min ɓɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Sànèdìrɛŋ ɗì coo kìnyàà ɓi nɗem lɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghɛɛ lɛ, ki rì syeesyee à kiɓan lɛ, ɓɔɔ ghɛn mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛ, ɗii ɗi Yeesus. 
Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fɔlà ɓi rirèsì, ɗì rìghagsì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus Kiris ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɗì ɓi ɓɛ̀naa ɓaa ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, yɛ̀ɛ bàlì ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ì tèèghtèghɛ̀ngà nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ totòkà rìgìrɛg ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìcɛɛ̀cɛ̀mdɛ̀n ɗi ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ totòkà kìtòkì ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ǹti ɓɛ ɗimzàg mɛ̀kpɔɓ maa ɓi kàɓ à ɓìɗilàg ànɛ ɓɛ ǹkìlàg ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ, ti caɗ rìghagsì ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, lɛ ti kaàkàɓsì ɓum ɓìɗilàg. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mìni ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔ̀ni ɓum taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm wiǹ, ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ yii lɛ, ɓɛ rɔɔtaagh ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ ki ɓa ɓɛronɛn ɗì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ ti fa kìsay ki rikàɓsì ɗi ɓiɗilàg. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsii ri ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu, tì sììrɛ̀n ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, rì ɓi rìghagsì ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll.
Fèg ànɛn à kɔ̀ngà ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛgherɛ̀n wùcèm nni ɓɛ ɓɔngà min lɛ, rì Ityɛn ànɛ à ɓaghà rì coo righerɛ̀n à ki ɓati ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, rì Filiɓ, rì Pikɔɔri, rì Nikanɔɔri, rì Timɔŋ, rì Parimenas, rì Nikola ànɛ à ɓaghà a Aŋtyos, à ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn à ɗiŋì ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Nni ɓɛ yughày rì ɓumɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓɛ resì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàg Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki saaghràg ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyòò.
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì kɛ̀ngà asu di yɛ̀ɛ sààsàà, ɓàlì ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ì ki ɓɔg lɛɛ̀gwey a Yorisalɛm, kìgwey ki ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ki ki foŋ ǹtyweeyi ɓi Yeesus.
Ityɛn à ɓaghà ǹɗonɛn lɛ, rì geesɛ̀n, rì ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll, à kìkìghà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, rì dàm yi ɓiɓan ɓi nyìinyìm à kìlɔ̀ŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ gàɓ ì ɓum ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ìnɛ ì ɓaghà naa ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ka ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kpàn, ɓɛ nyoònyòlɛ̀ngà rì Ityɛn, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi lɛ: rì Sirɛn rì Alɛgsaŋdirii, rì ɓumɓɛ a Silisii, rì ɓɛ a Azii. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, ɓɛ yagsàg Ityɛn ɓi nyoey, ɓisuulɛ, nyii totòkà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki fafàghà nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ lakìyà ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaà lɛ: Tìi nwoogh di Ityɛn a feefengì Moyis, à feèfèngì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓɛ kighà lɛ ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, ɓɛɛ wog bim, ɓɛ yu ɓɛ sɛn ɓi Ityɛn, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi a Sànèdìrɛŋ. 
Ɓɛ kɛɛ̀dì wɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ pwaapwààghà Ityɛn ɓìɓan ɓi nyoo di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à rì lɔŋ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi rìfen ɗi naà-Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis. 
Tìi ǹwoogh di a kakali lɛ: Yeesus ànɛ a Nazarɛt à rì ɓiì wààghii jàŋ inɛ, à ki cenɗag ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis à faghà ɓìsi.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi kìkpanà ki ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓɛ pɛɛzìghà mis dì Ityɛn, ɓɛ ki ghɛn lɛ ìsu wii wɛɛ̀ lònlom yɛ̀ɛ wu ŋwaà-fìtom a Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔmɛ̀n ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à tɔkà min lɛ: Ki ri nya saaɗ fɔlɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpaa?
Ityɛn à ɓàg lɛ: Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɛ̀m, ramina mɛ̀ree ɓi konag kìwoògh lɛ: Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹkeŋkèmì à rèsɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ Abiraham à seŋi wìs a ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀, cààmɛ̀n ki à ɓaghà a Mɛzopotamii, di à ka kɛn ɓi ki kɔ̀rii a Haraŋ. 
À kpaa nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kɔɔ, u ki ghasɛn ɗi naa yɔ̀ɔ̀ i ɓum, u kɛǹ kì kɔ̀rii ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì rèsii. 
Nni Abiraham à pɛsɛ̀ngà min ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Kalde, à kɛ̀n kì kɔ̀rii a Haraŋ. Wɔɔ nnɛ ki ɓaa lɛ, seŋi wìì à mɛ wu, Bɛ̀ll à kpaa nyi lɛ, a syaà yì ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki ɓì rì miì ki gɛɛ̀nɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓi nyi nsoò maa kìden à jàŋ ànɛ a woòghrɛn ɗì nyi ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n, nsoò maa zyònà à zɛy rì zɛy, wɔ̀lɛ, à kàkà nyi lɛ, à ri faa gɛ nyi zi inɛ̀n, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ woòghrɛn rì nyì nsoò nyaa ki yiìdi, dòò yii yi rɔɓ rì yɔ̀; Bɛ̀ll à faghà Abiraham ǹkàg wiǹ fɔlɔɔ di à ka yin ri màn. 
Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Dòò yɔɔ yi kɔ̀rii gɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kidɛŋ, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaasii gɛ yɔ ɓɛ̀kpàn, ɓɛ ki tɔɓ yɔ, bèg ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛnin. 
Kìɓan kifog kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki ghaasii gɛ ɓɔ ɓɛ̀kpàn kiǹ, lɔŋ mɛ̀ yɛɛ yɔ̀mi gɛ kɔ; ajɛ̀m ìnɛn ɓɛ ri pɛ̀sɛɛ gɛ wɔɔ, ɓɛ yu mɛ̀ kìɓɔɔɓɔgsì fɛ ɓi jàŋ ìnɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà Abiraham kɛ̀rɛ̀n ɓi sìg à kìrèmzɛnà ki bee inɛ à rengà ɓɛɛ̀ nyi. Yɛ̀ɛ à yali min Isag, à kɛ̀ɗ nyi ɓi mɛ̀ru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. Isag à yay Yakɔɓ, à kɛ̀ɗ girig nyi, Yakɔɓ à kɛ̀ɗkì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ǹɗem wu yàaka ri Yoosɛɓ à geni wàà, nni ɓɛ kàɓkà nyi a Egiɓtɛn. 
Kìɓan kifog, Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà gàm ɗì nyi, à kwèɗ nyi ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mii mɛcèm; à faghà nyi ɗyomzɛ̀n, à ki kì lɛ Farawɔŋ, rìfòm ɗi a Egiɓtɛn, ɗyɛɛ keèsi nyi, ɗi ki ɓɔgsi nyi gɔmìnà a Egiɓtɛn, rì ɓi naa yìì bimiɗ.
Fɔɔnnɛ coo zày ì kìghà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki a Egiɓtɛn kìcèm rì ki a Kanaaŋ. Ntɔɓ wu ceeghà, ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ ghɛɛ̀di com ki ɗiyɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Yakɔɓ à wokà lɛ gèŋ ì rì a Egiɓtɛn, nni à romgà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis wɔɔ, ɓi gɛ̀n i ǹtonto. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛɛdìghà wɔɔ ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀, Yoosɛɓ à kì lɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛɛ remi nyi, fɔɔnnɛ Farawɔŋ à yighà min rìfuuyì ɗi Yoosɛɓ. 
Nni Yoosɛɓ à romgà min lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ yì, Yakɔɓ à seŋi, rì naa yìì i ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɓum mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓɛtaǹ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Yakɔɓ à kɛ̀ngà min a Egiɓtɛn wɔɔnnɛ nyimiɗ, rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ɓɛ cuughà. 
Nni ɓɛ tɛkà ɓìloŋ ɓyaa, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì ɓyɔ a Sikɛm, ɓɛ ɓom ɓyɔ ɓi zɔ̀ŋ ìnɛ Abiraham à làkà wɔɔ ǹlàghɛn, ri ɓɔn ɓɛ Emɔɔr.
Yɛ̀ɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ Bɛ̀ll a roòzi ǹkàg wu à kàkà Abiraham ki kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghày, bàlì ì ɓum ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a Egiɓtɛn ì tèèghtèghɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ki yaayay ti 
à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìfòm ɗiɗɛŋ ɗi ɗi yighà ɓi Yoosɛɓ ɗi tekà rìlàmì a Egiɓtɛn. 
Rìfòm ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ ɓeèɓèèzɛ̀ngà boo yìs ɓi mɛ̀ghèy ɗi ki tɔ̀ɓ ɓɔ lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ ǹkàgì ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ maàg ɓɔn ɓaa, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛɓ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Moyis à yalɛɛ; à ɓaghà rɔɔrɔɔ à man ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à Keesìghà; ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛ ɓegà nyi naa rì naa, à kpaŋ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rinìghà nyi, fɔɔnnɛ gɔ̀n ì Farawɔŋ ì ɓadɛ̀ngà nyi, ì tɔɔsì nyi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ man wiì. 
Ɓumɓɛ a Egiɓtɛn ɓɛ resàkà Moyis ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa ɓìcèm, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓaghà kìtèetèɗ ki mum lɛ, rì ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓii, rì ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì mii.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ rinɗim, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓekà lɛ a kɛǹ kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ ɓɛgeni ɓii. 
Yɛɛ̀ Moyis à ghɛngà di muu Egiɓtɛn a yeeyeesì gèni wìì adɛŋ, nni à kàmgà geni ànɛ ɓɛ yeeyèèsìghà ànɛn; ɓi ɗi lɛ a rɔŋ̀ kìɓan kiǹ, à wolà muu Egiɓtɛn àncèm. 
À fèfèkà lɛ, ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ ɓɛgèni ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ ɓi rìkì ɗiǹ lɛ, nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à romiì lɛ a ghɛɓsi ɓɔ, wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɔɔ ghɛngà ɓi kiɓan kiǹ fɔlɔɔ. 
Nni ɓi duri tana, Moyis à tanɛ̀ngà ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, di ɓɛɛ̀ ɗùùɗùù, à kɛ̀n ɓɔ kì ghasii, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀ cɛ kɛɛ ri ɓà lɛ, mìni ɓi rìgeni, ɓì ki ciiciìzɛ̀n tì mìni rì mìni? 
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ à ciìcììzìghà gèni àmbog à fengàkà Moyis, à ki tɔg nyi lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ nkpaa kɔm wɔ̀ lɛ, u yu ɓìsi kìlàmii, ù ki yɔ̀myɔm ɓiɓan ɓis? 
U kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u wey mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ ǹwoli muu Egiɓtɛn rìŋkò? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Moyis à wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni à ghɛŋìghà, à kɛ̀n kì nyamzɛɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Maɗyaŋ, wɔɔnnɛ à yalà ɓɔn ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Ajɛ̀m ì bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀, nnɛ ŋ̀waàfìtom à resɛ̀ngà nyi ɓi-reɓ wu dòn ì Sinayi ì rì wɔɔ; à ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗòò wu ɗuu wu wɛɛ̀ ròòroo ɓi kìtywìɗ. 
Moyis à kuughràkà rìkuu ɗi com ɗi à ghɛngà ɗiǹ nni yɛ̀ɛ à mɛɛ̀ tyòŋdɛ̀ngà wɔɔ, à wog di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan ì tòòghrɛɛ, ì kpaa lɛ: 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ rì Bɛ̀ll à ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɔɔ, Bɛ̀ll à Abiraham, Bɛ̀ll à Isag, Bɛ̀ll à Yakɔɓ, nni Moyis à risìghà, kɛ̀ɛ ghɛɛsi ti rìseesèè wɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Kan à kàlìghà Moyis lɛ: Sɔ̀ŋi ɓɛ̀siripàs ɓɔɔ, ɓisuulɛ jàŋ inɛ ù rɛrɛrii miì ìnɛ̀n, ì rì kìcèlì. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ kilɔ̀ŋ kɛm̀ ki ki ri a Egiɓtɛn, ǹki wog bemeg yaa, fɔɔnnɛ ǹsɛnii lɛ ǹghɛɓsì ɓɔ. Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, yu, ǹɗom wɔ̀ a Egiɓtɛn.
Moyis nyimiɗ ànɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ ɓengà, rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ inɛ lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ m̀ɓɔgsii wɔ̀ rìfòm ɗi yɔ̀myɔmɛn ɓisi? Innɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgà lɛ, a lami ɓɔ, à ki kwèɗ ɓɔ ɓi rìkpàn, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaà-fìtom ànɛ à ghɛngà ɓi kìtwìɗ à kpaaghà nyi. 
Nnyɛɛ kpaŋzìghày ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl a Egiɓtɛn di a kìki ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan rì dàm yi ɓiɓan à tumɛ̀n a Egiɓtɛn à kpaŋ ɓi rìɓày à m̀ɓàŋ rì ɓi reɓ bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Lɔŋ Moyis ànɛ̀n yɛɛ kpaaghà ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à romiì gɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi boo yìn i ɓum, lɛ a ɓa ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki taŋzɛ̀ngà ɓi-reɓ, Moyis yɛɛ ɓaghà ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis rì ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ à tòtòkà ɗì nyi ɓi dòn ì Sinayi. Nnyɛɛ ghaɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi Bɛ̀ll yi yi ri cem lɛ a ghagsi mìni yɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà ɓi deɓ yii, ɓɛ ɓengà yɔ, ɓɛ kɔǹ lɛ, di ɓaa sugtii a Egiɓtɛn: 
Lɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà Arɔn lɛ: Syagha ɓìsi bɛ̀ll yi yɛɛ syogi ɓìsi bee ɓisuulɛ, ɓìsii yii ɓi com ki ki ǹkìi Moyis ànɛ àa ǹkpaŋzii yì ɓìsi a Egiɓtɛn. 
Nni ɓɛ syakà min man à sanìnya ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ ɓɛ funɛ̀n ɓìtuwe ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi kìfèèghrɛnà kiǹ, ɓɛ ki nyààrɛn lɛɛ̀gwey ri com ki ɓɔmiɗ ɓɔ yɛɛ syakà rì ɓyàg ɓyaa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à lɔ̀ghìghà ɓɔ jɛ̀m, à càɗ ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì tyɔɛy ti aɗyoo, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kangà lɛ: Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl, ɓi bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ yi ɓì kɔ̀rìghà ɓi-reɓ, mɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓì ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsìghà nya lɛ rì ɓìtuwe rì ìkum? 
Èe èe kìcùmà ki bɛ̀ll ìnɛ lɛ Mɔlɔg rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki fyɛy fi bɛ̀ll yìn ìnɛ lɛ Refan ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓì tɛ̀kà, ɓì syag ɓìnùn ɓiǹ lɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓi ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗì mìni ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ki naŋì fìràɓ, Baɓilon à rɔ̀ɓ fɛ ajɛ̀m.
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓaghà rì kìcùmà ki ki ɓaghà kìrèmzɛnà ki lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓi nyìinyìm wàà. Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à tòtòkà rì Moyis à kpaaghà nyi lɛ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì toŋì kìcùmà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkuu ɗi nyii resìghà ànɛn. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛ rɔɓkà rì kìcùmà kiǹ ɓɛ tekà kɔ, ɓɛ ɗiŋì rì kɔ ɓi zi ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓatɛ̀ngà rì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi Bɛ̀ll à sansàngà ɗi ɓɔɔ tiì yɛ̀ɛ Yooswa à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sìghà ɓɔ; kìcùmà kiǹ ki kɔrìghà wɔɔ à kpaŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Davit à ɓɔkà rìfòm. 
Davit ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ghɛngà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à keesii nyi fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà Bɛ̀ll à Yakɔɓ ìtèɗ wulɛ nyi Davit nyii toŋ̀ ànɛ̀n mɛɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, Salomɔŋ yɛɛ togà Bɛ̀ll mɛɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ à cee, a maà kɔ̀ri ɓi kɔmiɗ ɓi mɛɛ mɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ toŋi.
Ɓisuulɛ Kan a kpaaghi lɛ, ɗyoo ɗyɛɛ ri ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wɛm̀ wu rilàmì, ziì ɓa jàŋ i rìrɛsàg ɗyɛm̀ ɗi mɛkòò, nni rìkuu ɗi mɛɛ aɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì toŋì? Nsoò lɛ rìkuu ɗì jàŋ ɗi la ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi mɛ̀ ǹɗì lɛ ǹfɔɔsàg wɔɔ? 
Àa mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ kìghà ɓyom ɓiǹ ɓìcèm?
Mìni ɓum ɓɛ ǹtoòtèɗ ɓɛ ɓì rì lɛ, mìni kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀rem, mìni rì ɓɛ̀lɔg, fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɗùùɗuu cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɗì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, ɓì rì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn. 
Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan abe nnɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ rɔɓkà lɛ ɓɛ tɔɓi ɓì? Ɓɛ cuusìghà kɔm̀ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ woòwògsìghà ɓum rìyù ɗi m̀bobog à mum ànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ. Nni ɓigomìnɛ, ŋwaàncèm ànɛn innɛ ɓì mɛ kì lɛ, ɓì tɔ̀kɛ̀n, ɓi ki wey. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓi ghàɓkà ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓum ɓɛ titom kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɓèŋ ɓyɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi Sànèdìrɛŋ ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓi Ityɛn ɓiǹ bim i naasàg ɓɔ, ɓɛ tum rìŋààŋààdì ɗi min lɛ bim inɛ ɓɛ wokà rì Ityɛn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Ityɛn à ɓaghà ǹɗonɛn ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, nni yɛ̀ɛ à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à ghɛn kìtɛɛtɛn ki rigwey ɗi Bɛ̀ll rì Yeesus ǹɗɛrɛliyɛn ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll, 
fɔɔnnɛ a kalìghà lɛ: Ɓì ghɛɛ! Mɛ̀ɛ ntaataa ɗyoo ɗì nɛmɓɛn, Man à Mum à rɛrɛ̀lì ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ kuùghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo, ɓɛ simgì ɓyàg ɓi mɛ̀reè, ɓɛ suùrɛ̀n Ityɛn ɓi nyoo.
