Ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi fìràɓ ɗi bàn, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n nyi rìrogì ɗi gɔ̀g lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi. Ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀ngà ɓìlàà ɓyaa ri dɛlìì mum ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Sol. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ roòrògàkà Ityɛn gɔ̀g mii, nyii ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà lɛ: Kan Yeesus, tera nghay wɛ̀m. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpìghà ɓi zi rì mɛ̀ɗu, à nyam jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ, Kan, cenɛn ɓɔ kìɓe ki! Yɛɛ̀ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à maasìghà.
Sol à ghɛngà lɛ rìwey di ɓɛ wolà Ityɛn ɗi ɓaghà syeesyee à kìɓan. Ŋwos àǹcèm ànɛn, wɛ̀y wu pɛsɛ̀ngày ɓisuu kiseŋi ki ki ɓaghà a Yorisalɛm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ saàtɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓɔɔ bàn ɓɛ a Zyude, rì ɓɛ a Samari, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom cɛ̀ncaa ɓɛɛ rɔɓkà a Yorisalɛm. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀falɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓomgà Ityɛn, ɓɛ ki rèn nyi lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Sol nyii kɛnkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu à tɔtɔ̀ɓ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n; à ɗiɗìŋìghà ɓi ɓɛ̀naa, di a Kpaakpàŋzìì lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɗì ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓi-tèɗ à ki foŋfoŋ ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày. 
Ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ Saàtɛ̀ngà ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ Kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà jàŋ lɛ jàŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ ghaaghagsì ɓum Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Filiɓ à Sɛngà ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ìnɛ a Samari à kakàlì ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ kiɓan ki ǹghɛɓsì ɓum. 
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓum lɔŋ ǹɗem wùfog, ɓi siìrɛ̀ngà ɓi rìwog ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi Filiɓ à Kpaakpààghà, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ wowòkà, ɓɛ Ki seesee dàm yi ɓiɓan yi à kìkìghà. 
Ɓi Saaɗ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi Kpaŋkpàŋgà ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓaghà miì di ɓyɛɛ̀ Syaasyaàdɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo, ɓìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ lɛɛ̀gwey, rì ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm ɓɛ wɔngàkà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ Simɔn à ɓaghà ɓi bàn ìnɛn abɛ̀y, à ɓaghà ǹkìì-majìg; à kìkì ɓìɓan ɓi lɛ ɓumɓɛ a Samari ɓɛɛ Kuukùùràg, à ki yèeghyegsì ɓum lɛ nyii ri kìtèetèɗ ki mum. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ Kuuràkà ɗì nyi, à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓɔɓti ɓɛsàg à Kpaŋ ɓi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Roànɛ yɛɛ ri ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll wu ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ, ìtèɗ wugwey. 
Ɓɛ kuuràkà fɔlɔɔ ri nyi lɛ, ki ɓaghà di kaa finɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɓan ɓii ɓi majìg ɓi keèghkègsìghà ɓum. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ Filiɓ à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ, Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, rì à ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓaɓtàkà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ, rì ɓɛ̀baŋì. 
Ǹsoò Simɔn nyimiɗ, à gherɛ̀ngà girig, à ki ɓàɓtɛn, à nɔ̀ɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Filiɓ, à kuùkùùghràg dàm ɗì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ à seesèèghà di roànɛ̀n a kìkì.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ ɓɛ rɔɓkày a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ wokà lɛ ɓum ɓɛ a Samari ɓɛ ghaɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll lɛ syeesyee, nni ɓɛ romgà lɛ rì Pyɛɛri rì Zyaŋ wɔɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpagà a Samari, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàkà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ, lɛ Bɛ̀ll a fa ɓɔ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Ɓisuulɛ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày ki ɓaghà di ki ka sɛn yi ɓi nsoò ɓi kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ; ɓɛ ɓaghà lɔŋ yɛɛri di ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ɓàɓtakɛn ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìsasààgh ɗi ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, ɓɛ teɗ min Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn à ghɛngà lɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ ti lɛ i ɓɛ saghii mum ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, à ɓa rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày, fɔɔnnɛ à sɔ̀ŋìghà mɔ̀ɔ̀ni lɛ a fa ɓɔ. 
Rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ a nwɔm lɛ: Faana mɛ̀ girig ìtèɗ wulɛ, ŋwaànɛ ǹsaghii ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, à ɓa rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghày. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓa gi la rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɔɔ mɛncèm, yɛ̀ɛ ù fèegh lɛ ù rì lɛ ù làg rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, 
lɛ ù yin gi rì gàɓ nsoò rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi kìsay ki, lɛ nɗem wɔɔ wu yin lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Koɓsɛn fèg à m̀ɓeɓtɛn anɛ ùrì ànɛn ɗì nyi, ù ki ɓɔ̀ŋzi Bɛ̀ll lɛ, a cenɛn wɔ̀ kìɓan ki ù mɛɛ̀ fèg kiǹ di à kɔ̀ni. 
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛyitì ɓi roni wɔ̀ ǹɗem lɛ pisa, kìɓe ki ki ghaasii wɔ̀ ǹkpàn. 
Nni Simɔn à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓɔ̀ŋzaghna Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wɛ̀m lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓi ɓì kalii ɓìn ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀-Pyɛɛri ɓɛɛ̀ Zyaŋ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓaa rèsag ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɔɔ yighà, ɓi rarɛ̀n rì Yeesus, ɓɛ ki kali ti ɓɔ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ Sugtìghà a Yorisalɛm di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi a Samari Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ.
Ŋwaàfìtom a Kan à kpaaghà Filiɓ lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u nɔɔ̀ti bee inɛ ì pɛ̀sɛɛ yì a Yorisalɛm ì sɛn a Gaza, ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fyee ti ɓi bee incèm. 
Nni Filiɓ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà, à ghàs kì kɛ̀ɛ, nni à pìkà mis, à ghɛn ŋwaàdɛŋ nyi asu, ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓaghà ŋwɛg, nyi tì coo ǹsasàlì à Kaŋɗas giɓ anɛ à ɓaghà rìfòm a Etyopii, nyi tì baŋ-masà à giɓ anɛ̀n. A ɓaghày kìɓɔgsii Bɛ̀ll a Yorisalɛm. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n yɛɛ susùkà ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi calig di a ɓàɓay kaàtà à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kalìghà Filiɓ lɛ: Pìgha mɛ̀kòò, ù tanɛn calig kinii. 
Nni Filiɓ à Cɛ̀ɓtìghà mɛ̀ree, à tanɛ̀n calig kìn, à wog min yɛ̀ɛ muu Etyopii ànɛ̀n à ɓàɓàlà kaàtà à ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii. Filiɓ à tɔg nyi lɛ: Tɛɛnɛ, u wowog nya com ki u ɓàɓay kiǹ? 
Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà Filiɓ lɛ: Lannɛ ǹɗì lɛ ǹwog com ki mɓàɓày di ɓɛ tɛɛ̀zii ɓi mɛ kɔ? Nni à kpaaghà Filiɓ lɛ a ɓɔg yì ɓi calig, a kɔri nyi ɓi nwɔŋì.
Kìden ki à ɓàɓàlà ɓi kaàtà ànɛn ki ɓaghà lɛ: À rɔ̀ɓkà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìtuwe ki ɓɛɛ kɛ̀nkɛn ɗi kɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ gheg̀ ɓoŋ, à ki maarag lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ caacaa nyùŋ. Fɔɔnnɛ à rɔ̀ɓkà fɔlɔɔ, kɛ̀ɛ pini nsoò ŋwɔ̀m. 
Ɓɛ sootìghà nyi, ɓɛ ki ǹyuŋzag nyi, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ŋwaànɛ lɛ à lòèy kìɓan kii; ɓɛ̀ghɛn ɓɛɛ ri ɓùŋ lɛ à càri boo ì mum, yɛ̀ɛ cɛɓ kii ki ti kìtììsiyɛn ɓi ziinɛ?
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à tɔkà Filiɓ lɛ: Kùrùg, kali ɓà mɛ, ɓìɓan ɓi ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a kpaa ɓìn ɓi seesee ghɛn, nyimiɗ gìn ŋwaàdɛŋ? 
Nni Filiɓ à pɛ̀sìghày min kitòkì ɓi jàŋ inɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàlà, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à konàkà nyi kìtɛɛ̀zii Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛɛdìghà tì beèbɛ̀y, nni ɓɛ kpagà ɓi kìràà, ŋwaànɛ̀n à tɔg Filiɓ lɛ: Mɛ̀nig mɛɛ̀mɛ, cɛ kɛɛ regtii lɛ kɔ̀ɔ ɓàɓti mɛ? 
Filiɓ à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I ù gherɛɛ rì ǹɗem wɔɔ wucèm ǹɗi lɛ m̀ɓàɓtì wɔ̀; ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀, ǹgherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus Kiris à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à tɔkà m̀pusì calig lɛ a rɛli. Ɓɛ sɛn min ɓɛɛ̀ Filiɓ, ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi kìràà, Filiɓ à ɓàɓtì min nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagày a cɛɗ, Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à tɛ̀g Filiɓ à kɛ̀n ɗi nyi, ŋwaànɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ ghɛɛ̀di nyi; nsoò fɔlɔɔ, muu Etyopii ànɛ̀n à ghagsìghà rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗii di a nyàànyàà. 
Filiɓ à sìgmɛ̀ngà di à ti a Azɔt, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n wɔɔ, à kɛ̀n a Sezare, à kakàlì ɓum Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll, ɓi bàn yìcèm yi à ghaghìghà ɓi bee.
Yɛ̀ɛ sol à ɓaghà di à kaka rì coo ǹɗem wu rìgɛn wulɛ, a cuùcùùsì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ Kan, nni à kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey, 
à tɔg nyi ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛ ɓɛ faa nyi Ìtèɗ wulɛ, a kɛǹ a Damas, i à tanɛɛ ɓum ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nsoò, ɓɛ̀yiɓ nsoò ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì bee i Kan, a ɓangiì ɓɔ a ki sug yi rì ɓɔ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ̀kàgakɛn.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɛ̀nkɛni a Damas, di à ti ɓiì wuuwuɓsɛ̀n bàn, nni à sìgmɛ̀ngà di kìtɛɛtɛn ki mɛ làn yi ɗyoo lɛ ŋwààɗ, ki ceŋzɛ̀n nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpìghà ɓi zi à wog di jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa nyi lɛ: Sol, Sol wɔ̀, ɓisuucɛ nnɛ u tɔtɔɓ mɛ fɛlɛ̀? 
Sol à tɔg lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ ghɛn wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri? Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Yeesus ànɛ u tɔtɔ̀ɓ ki ri wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓaà ǹtɔɓ lɛ u ki ti ǹtoòtèɗ di mɛ̀kɔ̀ŋ mɛɛ̀ roorogì wɔ̀. Nni Sol à risìghà, à tumɛ̀n rìnììghnìŋdɛ̀n à kpaa lɛ: Kan nni wɔ̀ɔ kɔ̀ngi lɛ nki la? Kan à ɓàg min nyi lɛ: 
Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u ɗiŋi ɓi bàn, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì kpaà com ki ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi. 
Ɓumɓɛ Sol à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, ɓɛ rɛlìghà, ìris wu mamzì ɓɔ, ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ wowɔkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ̀ ri yɔ̀, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn ŋwaànɛ à tòtòkà. 
Nni Sol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ghɛnɛnti nsoò yɛ̀ɛ mis mii mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ ŋwàrɛn. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓangà nyi ɓi càg, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀sì nyi à kpaŋ a Damas. 
À kɔ̀rì mɛ̀ru mɛraa, kɛ̀ɛ ghɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ ɗi, kɛ̀ɛ nɔ.
Ǹgherɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Ananyas à ɓaghà a Damas, nyi nnɛ Kan à reŋìghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ananyas wɔ̀! Roànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan, mɛ̀ɛnɛ lɛ. 
Kan à kpaa tì nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u kɛǹ ɓi bee ì mɛ̀rɛy, u kpaŋ a mɛɛ mɛ Zyudas, u tɔg ŋwaàdɛŋ wɔɔ lɛ Sol, ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà a Tarisi àncèm a kìki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ; 
nni ɓi bɔŋ̀zɛ̀n ìnɛn, ki kiì yì nyi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm lɛ à ghɛɛ yì mum ɗii lɛ Ananyas di à ɗiŋii yì ɓi naa yìì, à ki saagh nyi ɓyàg ɓi nyoo lɛ di a ghɛnɛn tì. 
Ananyas à ɓàg lɛ: Kan, m̀mɛ wog di ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ sɛsɛg rigɛn ɗi ŋwaànɛ̀n àa nkìi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm. 
Nni ɓi ɗi à rì ɗi fɛ, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ nfaa nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ a ɓangi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rereŋi ɗii ɗyɔɔ, à ki fogi ɓɔ ɓi ɓìsɔŋ. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, Kan à kpaatìghà Ananyas lɛ: Kɛ̀na lɔŋ ɓisuulɛ, Sol à rì mɛ̀ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ com ki kisay ki ǹsɔnɛɛ. À rì ɓiì rèresii ɗii ɗyɛ̀m ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓɛ yii ɓi mɛ wɔɔ, rì a mɛ̀fòm, rì ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl. 
Mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì rèsii mɛtɔɓ mɛ̀cèm mɛ à ɓiì woògh ɓisu wɛ̀m.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ananyas à kɛ̀ngà min wɔɔ; nni yɛɛ̀ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa ìnɛ Sol à ɓaghà miì, à saagh nyi ɓyàg ɓi nyoo a ki kpaa nyi lɛ: Geni wɛ̀m Sol, Kan Yeesus ànɛ àa ǹɗèsɛɛ yì wɔ̀ ɓi bee di u yùyuiy fɛ, yɛɛ romiì mɛ̀ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, lɛ mɛ̀ nsaagh wɔ̀ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo di wɔ̀ɔ ghɛnɛn tì, ù ki ɓa nɗonɛn ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Lɔŋ ɓi gom yɔ̀miɗ inɛ̀n, ɓyom ɓidɛŋ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɓaaɓaa ɓi ɓìzɛn ɓi ɓaaghrɛ̀ngày ɓi mis mɛ Sol, ɓi kpi ɓi zi, à ghɛnɛ̀n tì min, fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, ɓɛ ɓaɓtì nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à ɗighà ɓìɗilàg, ìtèɗ wu yutì nyi ɓi nyoo. À kɔ̀rìghà tì gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Damas. 
Nni à ghagsɛ̀ngà lɔŋ wɔɔ foo ɗi rìkakàlì ɗi ɓum ɗii ɗi Yeesus ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à lààlàmɓɛ̀n lɛ: Yeesus à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà di a kpaakpaa fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ Kuuràkà, ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀g lɛ: Àa ŋwaànɛ yɛɛ ǹ-yeèyèèsì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpɔŋkpɔŋ ɗii ɗi Yeesus a Yorisalɛm? Àncèm aà n-yuyuu yì ɓi fɛ rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, a ɓangi bɔ, a fogi ɓɔ ɓi ɓìsɔŋ, di a kɛǹ ɗì ɓɔ a ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey? 
Kìɓan kifog Sol à kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu, à ki sìisiìrɛ̀n ɓi rìrèrèsì ɗi ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ yi saaɗ lɛ Yeesus à rì lɔŋ Kiris; Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Damas ɓɛ rɔɓkà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ pɛ̀ɛ̀zì Sol.
Yɛ̀ɛ gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ì ghaghìghà tì foo, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔrɛ̀n lɛ ɓɔɔ wey Sol. 
Kìɓan kifog, Sol à yighà kìtɔ̀kɔ̀ kaa ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ramgàkà nyi a mɛ̀suunaa mɛ bàn lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, ɓɛ beŋ̀ mɔ lɛ rì ìru rì ŋwos. 
Nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tekà nyi ɓi-ru wudɛŋ, ɓɛ kaŋ̀ nyi ɓi kìkpoŋ, ɓɛ ɓɔg gari ɗi nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ sɛɛ̀di nyi rì ǹɗig ɓɛg àmbog. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Sol à kpagà a Yorisalɛm, nni à kaaghà bee ìnɛ a rarɛn ɗì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ rirìsìghà nyi, lɛ ɓɛ ɓiisɛ̀ngà ɓi kigherɛɛ lɛ à ti ǹ-yilàg. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓarinaɓas à tekà Sol à kɛ̀n ɗì nyi a ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, à kpaa ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ Sol à ghɛngà Kan ɓi bee ìnɛ a Damas rì yɛ̀ɛ Kan à tòòghrɛ̀ngà ɗì nyi, nni à kpaatìghà ɓɔ rìkuu ɗi ǹtyweeyi ɗi Sol àa ǹɗì rì ɗyɔ a Damas di a kakali ɓum ɗii ɗi Yeesus. 
À tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ Sol à ɓasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ kikì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓɔg, ɓɛ sɛn ǹɗaŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi ɓum ɗii ɗi Kan rì ǹtyweeyi ɓi nɗem. 
Sol à kuùkùrɛ̀ngà ɗì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹtòkì rìgìrɛg, à ki nyoonyolɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɔɔ kaakàà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ Sol ɓɛ righerɛn ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà ɗì nyi a Sezare; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà wɔɔ, ɓɛ càɗ nyi lɛ a ghaàgh a Tarisi.
Kìseŋi ki ɓaghà lɛ fyòoog, ɓi zi ì Zyude bimiɗ, a Galile rì a Samari; kìseŋi ki tetèkà ìtèɗ, ki kikì Kan mɛ̀wog, ki ki tèeghteghɛ̀n rì ǹghɛɓsɛn wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Pyɛɛri à rerènìghà kìlɔŋ kìcèm, nni nwos adɛŋ, à sɛngà a Lida lɛ a ghɛn ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à tanɛ̀ngà ŋwaàdɛŋ wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Enee ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn ɓi kon. Ki ɓaghà di ki ti bèg taàraa yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kpìghà ɓi zi, lɛ à ɓaghà ǹwɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ: Enee wɔ̀, Yeesus Kiris à wɔ̀ɔ̀zii wɔ̀, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u pegsɛn ɓyom ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓyɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì pɛ̀sɛɛ aɗyoo. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Lida, rì ɓɛ ɓi-reɓ wu lɛ Sarɔn ɓɛ ghɛngà ŋwaànɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Kan.
Giɓ adɛŋ yɛɛ ɓaghà ǹgherɛ̀n a Zyope ɗii lɛ Taɓita yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ Dorikas; à kìkìghà kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey à ki ghɛɛghɛɓsì ɓum ɓɛ nyìighnyìg. 
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, nni à roɓkà, à ki wu. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wuɓsìghà kìloŋ kii, ɓɛ kɛǹ kɔ kì nɔ̀ŋzii ɓi kìden ki naa ɓi mɛɛ mɛ aɗyoo. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Zyope ɓɛ wokà lɛ Pyɛɛri à rì a Lida, Lida ànɛn à ràɓsɛ̀ngà ɓi loò rì Zyope, nni ɓɛ romgà ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì kpaà Pyɛɛri lɛ: Kùrùg yuis̀ a lɔ̀ŋkis, kɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ̀mziì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà, à kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ. Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ɓɔg ɗì nyi ɓi kìden ki naa ki ɓi mɛɛ aɗyoo, mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛcèm mɛ tyoŋdɛ̀n nyi a nyoo di mɛɛ̀ rènɗèn ɓɛ rerèsì nyi lɛ, rì bùɓa rì ɓɛ̀kàɓà ɓɛ Dorikas à raràɗkà di à kaka cem. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à kpaŋzìghà min ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓidan, à ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, à ɓɔ̀ŋzàg Bɛ̀ll, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n min ɓi ɓɛg à kìloŋ à kpaa lɛ: Taɓita wɔ̀, pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo! Nni à ŋwàɗkà min mis à ghɛn Pyɛɛri, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n kìkɔ̀ɔ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Pyɛɛri à ɓan nyi ɓi càg, à pɛ̀sì nyi mɛ̀rɛy. À regìì min lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n rì mɛ̀kpɔɓ, à rèsì ɓɔ nyi, ɓɛ ghɛn lɛ à ti cem. 
Bàn ì Zyope bimiɗ ì wokà kìɓan kiǹ, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ki gherɛn Kan. 
Pyɛɛri à finɛ̀ngà a Zyope lèg àdɛŋ, à kɔ̀kɔ̀rì yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ Simɔn ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkìì-gòò.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà a Sezare ɗii lɛ Kɔrinɛy, à kɔ̀mɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀sujàà mɛ̀tin mɛtaǹ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛsujàà wu a Italii. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à falɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi righerɛ̀n, àa nki risàg Bɛ̀ll lɛ rì nyi ɗì rìmɛɛ ɗii ɗicèm, à ki fafa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà nyìighnyìg ɓyom lɛɛ̀gwey, à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg Bɛ̀ll ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Ŋwos adɛŋ, di mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa à ŋwos ǹkɛ̀nɛn à tiì, Kɔrinɛy à ghɛngà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm di ŋwaà-fìtom a Bɛ̀ll à ɗiŋii yì a lɔ̀ŋkii, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɔrinɛy wɔ̀! 
Nni à fiɓìghà ŋwaà-fìtom lɛ fyɛɛɛyi, à risì, à tɔg nyi lɛ: La yɛɛ ri Kan? Ŋwaàfìtom a ɓàg nyi lɛ: Bɛ̀ll àa ǹghàɓi lɛ, rì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɔɔ, rì gɛ ɓyom ànɛ ù ti ù fafà ɓum ɓɛ nyìighnyìg, fɔɔnnɛ à ɗimzɛɛ ɓi wɔ. 
Rom ɓum a Zyope ɓigomìnɛ, lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ kì terìì ŋwaàdɛŋ wɔɔ, ɗii lɛ Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛɛ kpɔgi tì lɛ Pyɛɛri. 
À kɔ̀kɔrii yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ Simɔn ǹkìì-gòò ànɛ à toŋi ɓi nwɔŋì wu rìɓày à kìkòn.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaà-fìtom ànɛ à tòtòkà ɗì nyi à ghaghìghà, Kɔrinɛy à ghàs kì reŋii ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ rì kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ à làmìghà, sujàà ànɛ̀n à ɓaghà ǹfalɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n; 
fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔ kìɓan kicèm ki ki ghaghìghà à ki rom min ɓɔ a Zyope.
Ɓi duri tana, yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà, di ɓɛ mɛ wuɓsɛn bànì Zyope, Pyɛɛri à ɓɔkà kì kìi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓi mɛɛ aɗyoo di toroɓ à ti jàŋbog. 
Nni zày ì kɔ̀ngà Pyɛɛri, à kɔ̀n lɛ a ɗi com; ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ kikìghà nyi ɓìɗilàg, nnɛ à sìgmɛ̀ngà di à mɛ cɛɛnɛn mis ɓìkpaŋ. 
À ghɛngà ɗyoo ɗì nɛmɓɛn à ki ghɛn di com ki riì wɔɔ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ coo sànjà ànɛ à rì mɛ̀keɓ mɛsugakɛn, ki sɛnsɛ̀n yì ɓi zi. 
Ɓyom ɓi ɓaghà ɓi sànjà ànɛn lɛ: Nyàm yi kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛyɛn mɛkòò mɛnin mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, rì yi wɔwɔghɛn ɗì ɗùm, rì tììlì ti aɗyoo mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Pyɛɛri à wog di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa nyi lɛ: Pyɛɛri! Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, ù wey nyam foo bog di u ɗi. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à ɓàkà lɛ: Àg, Kan! Mɛ̀ ǹka ɗighà ɓi com ki ki ri ɓaa, nsoò ki ki ri kìsyeg ŋwos adɛŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì kpaatìghà nyi ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kì lɛ: Com ki Bɛ̀ll à kpaa lɛ ki ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsyeg, wɔ̀ɔ̀ kpaa lɛ, ki ri rì kìsyeg. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiìtɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ gɛ̀n yiraa, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ sànjà ànɛn à sugtìghà kì ɓɔɔ̀gh aɗyòò.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Pyɛɛri à kaakaa lɛ, a yi azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki à ghɛngà kiǹ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓumɓɛ Kɔrinɛy à romgày ɓɛ tɔtɔghiì mɛɛ mɛ Simɔn, ɓɛ yu, ɓɛ rɛlì asuunaa, 
ɓɛ regì ɓum, ɓɛ tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: A mɛɛ mɛ innɛ Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpɔgì lɛ Pyɛɛri à kɔ̀kɔrii wa? 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà lɔŋ ɓiì fèfeegh kìɓan ki à ghɛngà, nni Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Wɛɛ̀ nnɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg lɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛraa. 
Pɛ̀sɛn, u sɛn ɓi zi, ù kɛǹ rì ɓɔ, kɔ̀ɔ risi, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ yɛɛ nɗomiì ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à sɛngà min, à tanɛ̀n ɓumɓɛ̀n, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Mɛ̀ɛ nɛ lɛ, mɛ̀ yɛɛ rì ŋwaànɛ ɓi kaakàà, nni ɓì yùu yì fɛ ɓi ǹto wu kiɓan aɗi? 
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Tì yùu yì fɛ lɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà ànɛ lɛ Kɔrinɛy yɛɛ romiì ɓìsi a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, àncèm à rì saaɗ à mum ànɛ à ti à risàg Bɛ̀ll, à ki rì tì ŋwaànɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ̀ Sɛsɛ̀g; ŋwaà-fìtom a Bɛ̀ll àa ǹkpaa nyi lɛ a regiì wɔ̀ a mɛɛ mii, a wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ù rì lɛ ù kpaa nyi. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi naa, à reɓ ɓɔ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ lày; ɓi duri tana nnɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà ǹɗaŋ rì ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ kɛǹ. Ɓɛ̀gèni ɓii ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a Zyope ɓɛ kɛǹgà nyi kì foŋì.
Nni ŋwos anɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkà ànɛn nnɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Sezare, Kɔrinɛy à ɓoŋɓòŋgà ɓɔ lɛ rì naa yìì ì ɓum, rì mɛ̀ghan mii mɛ à reŋɗɛ̀ngà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à kpagà wɔɔ, Kɔrinɛy à kɛ̀n nyi ki ghàɓi, à kpi nyi à mɛ̀kòò lɛ a fa nyi bɔgsɛ̀n. 
Nni Pyɛɛri à ɓangà nyi lɛ a pɛsi nyi aɗyoo di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn yì aɗyòò lɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì girig romum yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa di ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog lɔŋ lɛ rì nyi rì Kɔrinɛy, à tanɛ̀n ɓum lɛ kùnag kùnag, 
à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ri ɗì coo ǹsiŋdɛn wudɛŋ lɛ, mum waà kɛ̀ɛ ràrɛn ɗi muu cee-rìkuu, kɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɗiŋi naa ì roànɛ̀n, nni ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, Bɛ̀ll àa ǹɗèsii mɛ̀ lɛ, ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì ɓi ki ghɛɛ̀ ŋwaàdɛŋ lɛ à rì rì ɓìsyeg, kɛ̀ɛ nki cèli ti mum lɛ, à yin ntɛnɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yùu yì miì kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìkàna ɓì ǹɗeèghreŋi wu wàa regii mɛ̀; nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ, di màa yii ǹto wu kiɓan wu wàa regii mɛ̀ miì.
Nni Kɔrinɛy à ɓàkà lɛ: Gɛɛ̀nɛ mɛ̀ru mɛraa nnɛ mɛ nkìkii bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓi kìden kɛ̀m ki naa cààmɛ̀n à mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛraa à ŋwos. Nni mɛ̀ɛ ǹsìgmɛ̀ɛ di mum à mɛ rɛli mɛ asu, ɓìlàà ɓii ɓi lònlòm lɛ syaŋ̀syaŋ̀ à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: 
Kɔrinɛy Bɛ̀ll àa nwoogh bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀, à ki yiti gɛ ɓyom ànɛ ù ti ù fafà ɓum ɓɛ nyìighnyìg. 
Nni rom ɓum a Zyope ɓɛɛ regiì Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpɔgì lɛ Pyɛɛri a yuiy; à kɔ̀kɔrii yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn à m̀pègsɛ̀n-gòò ɓi bèn ì rìɓày à kìkòn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghàsi kì romìì ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ yu wɔ̀ kì reŋii. Ù konaagh yɛ̀ɛ ù yùu yì. Nni ɓigomìnɛ tì rì yɛɛ lɛ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ ti wog com kìcèm ki Kan àa kpaa lɛ wɔ̀ɔ kali ɓìsi.
Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sìghà min ɓitòkì, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓi saaɗ ǹkonaagh kì ghɛɛ̀ gɛɛ̀nɛ lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à yin ɗi ǹɗèè wu ǹɗem 
ǹki ghɛɛ̀di lɛ, mum bimiɗ ànɛ à risii Bɛ̀ll à ki kìki ɓiɓan ɓi saaɗ, Bɛ̀ll à rì nyi ɓiì keesii àa soo rì ŋwaànɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki be. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày jɛ̀ɛ̀ a ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl lɛ ɓɛɛ yi lɛ, fyòoog à rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì nyi rì ɓum, ɓi jɛ̀m ì Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm; 
ɓì yii kìɓan ki ki nkìlɛɛ ɓi ziì Zyude bimiɗ, à tumɛ̀n yì a Galile ajɛ̀m ì bàɓtis ìnɛ Zyaŋ à lààlàmɓɛ̀ngà. 
Ɓì yii lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà Yeesus ànɛ a Nazarɛt à rom yì nyi Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kii, à ki fa nyi ìtèɗ wucèm, fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus ànɛ̀n à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà jàŋ bimiɗ à kìkì ɓum kìrɔɔ, di a wɔ̀ɔwɔɔ̀zì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi rìkpàn ɗi Satàn ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà ɗì nyi. 
Ɓìsii ri ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi à kìghà ɓi zi ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì a Yorisalɛm, nni Yeesus ànɛ̀n innɛ ɓɛ ǹwoli di ɓɛ kpani ɓi kɔrɔs. 
Kìɓan kifog, Bɛ̀ll, à ghèmzì nyi ɓi ŋwos a kìraa, à ki fa nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ, a resɛn a ɓum. 
Wɔ̀lɛ àa ɓum a ɓɛ̀cèm nnɛ à rèsɛ̀ngà, lɔŋ a ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à lokà kì ɓɔ̀ni. A ɓìsi ɓumɓɛ ti kìghà lɛ, tì ɗi, tì ki nɔ nɗaŋ ɗì nyi di à mɛ ghemɓɛn yi a ɓìloŋ. 
Nni Yeesus à reɓsìghà ɓìsi lɛ ti ghaàghàgsì ɓum Ɓɔlɛ wìì, tì ki sììrag ɓɔ kìresii lɛ, nnyɛɛ rì roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à rɛsìghà lɛ, à ri yù ki renì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kaka cencem, rì ɓi ɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ wù. 
Yeesus ànɛ̀n nnɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓugà yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ: Ɓì ɗii ɗii nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì cenɛɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ nyi ɓìɓe.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà di a ka tòtog a ŋwɔm fɔlɔɔ, nni Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛngày ki ɗiŋì ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓii ɓiǹ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghày ǹɗaŋ ɗi Pyɛɛri, ɓɛ kuuràkà lɛɛ̀gwey, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à faa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Ɓɛ wowòkà di ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog ɓìkènekènè ɓi ɓitòkì, ɓɛ kpaàkpàgsɛ̀n ɗìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll. Nni Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà min lɛ:
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ teɗ Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsii tekà, nni cɛ kɛɛ ri ɓiì règtii lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓàɓti ɓɔ rì mɛ̀nig? 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kalìghà min lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓaɓti ɓɛǹ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus Kiris. Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ki tɔg nyi lɛ, a kɔri tì a lɔ̀ŋkaa, gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru.
Ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rìghà a Zyude ɓɛ wokà lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀kuu mɛm̀bog ɓɛ ǹghàɓi girig jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à sugtìghà kì ɓɔɔ̀gh a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tumɛ̀n nyi rìɓɛ̀ɓɛ̀y. 
Ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ nɗiŋii ɓi naa yi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ù ki ɗi ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ?
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à tumɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rìtɛɛ̀zì ɗi kiɓan ki à ghɛngà kìcèm, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: 
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓi bàn ì Zyope di nkìki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni ki nkìi mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm lɛ: ǹghɛɛ rìkuu ɗi coo sànjà kì sugakɛn ɓi mɛ̀keɓ mɛ kinìn aɗyoo, ki yuyùy mɛ̀ a nyòò. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ǹkonaagh kì sìŋii sànjà àncèm, ǹghɛn miì ɓi ɗùm lɛ: Rì nyàm yi ɓi ziinɛ yi yi ri mɛ̀kòò mɛnin, rì nyàm yi ɓi cog, rì yi wɔwɔghɛn ɗì ɗùm, rì tììlì ti aɗyòò. 
Nni nwokì, di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa mɛ lɛ: Pyɛɛri wɔ̀! Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u wey nyàm bogtɛ̀n ɓi nyàm yi, u ɗi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ m̀pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà lɛ, àg! Kan, ɓi cɛɓ kɛ̀m kìcèm, ǹka fogà ɓi com ki ki ri kìcèlì, nsoò lɛ ki ki ri kìsyeg ɓi ŋwɔm wɛ̀m. 
Nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn i kpaatìghà ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ, com kìcèm ki Bɛ̀ll à kpaa lɛ ki rì kìtɛnɛn, wɔ̀ kɔ̀ɔ kpaa lɛ, ki ri rì kìsyeg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓiìtɛɛ fɔlɔɔ gɛ̀n yiraa, nni sànjà à sugtìghà kìɓɔɔ̀gh aɗyoo rì ɓyom ɓìn. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Sezare ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛraa ɓɛ peetɛ̀ngày a mɛɛ mɛ m̀ɓaghà wɔɔ, lɛ ɓɛ romiì ɓɔ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀. 
Nni Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Sugtɛn ɗì ɓɔ, kɔɔ̀ foŋ tikàna. Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ, ɓɛ kɛǹ mɛ̀ kìfoŋì a Sezare, tì ɗiŋì ɓi naa ì Kɔrinɛy. 
Kɔrinɛy à tumɛ̀n ɓìsi rìkpaa yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà di ŋwaà-fìtom a Bɛ̀ll à yùu a mɛɛ mii, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Rom ɓum a Zyope, lɛ ɓɛɛ reŋiì Simɔn ànɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpɔgì lɛ Pyɛɛri 
nyɛɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì kpaa ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì ghɛɓsii lɛ, rì wɔ̀, rì naa yɔ̀ɔ̀ ì ɓum bimiɗ 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ m̀mɛɛ̀ pinìghà ŋwɔm lɛ ǹtoòghrɛn, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛn yì ɓi ɓɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki sɛngày girig ɓi ɓìsi a rìtumɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹ-yitii min jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Kan à kàlìghà lɛ: Zyaŋ à ɓàtìghà rì mɛ̀nig, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɓì rì ɓiì ɓàɓtɛɛ ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ fa ɓɔ com ki à faghà ɓìsi ɓɛ tì gherɛ̀ngà Yeesus Kiris, nni mɛ̀ɛnɛ ghɛn anɛ ǹɗì lɛ, ǹkì rìkì ɗidɛŋ?
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓitòkì ɓiǹ, nnɛ ɓɛ kɔrìghà lɛ fyòoog, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìkemzì ɗi Bɛ̀ll di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à mɛ nɛm girig ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀kuu mɛm̀bog bee inɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, di ɓɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ.
Ǹtɔɓ wu ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀ɓkà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ wolà Ityɛn, wu kìghà lɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ saàtɛn. Fɔɔnnɛ gàɓ ìdɛŋ ì kɛ̀ngà a Fenisii, rì ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ Siipirɛ, rì a Aŋtyos, kìɓan kifog, lɔŋ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓɛ kpaakpààghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà lɛ, rì ɓumɓɛ a Siipirɛ, rì ɓumɓɛ a Sirɛn, ɓɛ kɛngà a Aŋtyos, ɓɔɔ totòkà girig rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Gìrɛg, ɓɛ kpaakpaa ɓɔ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan Yeesus. 
Ìtèɗ wu Kan wu ɓaghà rì ɓɔ, kɛɛ kighà ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛɛ gherɛn Kan.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ wokà gom ì kìɓan kiǹ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ romgà Ɓarinaɓas a Aŋtyos. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà wɔɔ, à ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ì rèsɛ̀ngà a ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛǹ, à nyààrɛ̀n, à ki toni ɓɔ lɛ: Sììrɛɛna lɔŋ ɓi Kan Yeesus, rì mɛ̀rem min mɛcèm. 
Ɓi saaɗ, Ɓarinaɓas à ɓaghà syeesyee à mum, ǹɗonɛn ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, à ki gherɛn Bɛ̀ll lɛɛ̀gwey, fɔɔnnɛ ɓàlì ì ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Kan.
Nni Ɓarinaɓas à kɛ̀ngà min a Tarisi, à teɗ yì Sol. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à tanɛ̀ngà nyi wɔɔ, ɓɛ kɛǹ a Aŋtyos ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ kɔrì wɔɔ bimiɗ à bèg, ɓɛ sasày bas rì kìseŋi ki wɔɔ, ɓɛ ki rèrèsàkà coo bàlì ì ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll. Nni wɔɔ a Aŋtyos nnɛ ɓɛ tɔmgà kì ròo ɓɛ̀yilàg ɗii ɗi lɛ ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Yorisalɛm, ɓɛ sɛn a Aŋtyos. 
Fɔɔnnɛ, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ, ɗii lɛ Agaɓus, ki pɛsɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, ki kalì ɓum rì ìteɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay lɛ, coo zày ì rì ɓiì kìi ɓi zi bimiɗ wɔ̀lɛ ì ki kìghà, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Kiloodɛ à ɓaa rìfòm. 
Nni ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ rengà lɛ, mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ, a syɔɔ̀ gàɓ ì com ìnɛ à rì lɛ à ghɛn, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛɓsi ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a Zyude miì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kighà fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓɛ romgà min Sol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas rì ɓyom ɓìn lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ɓyɔ kì faà rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ a Zyude.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, rìfòm ɗi lɛ Eroodɛ ɗi tumɛ̀ngà rìtɔtɔ̀ɓ ɗi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey Zyag à geni Zyaŋ rì gàfàg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà lɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi rɔɔghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ à reɓsìghà tì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ Pyɛɛri; kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓaghà ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ǹkìlàg bìrɛs kɛ̀ɛ̀ nwìɗ. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Eroodɛ à ɓangà Pyɛɛri, à lɔg nyi, à foŋ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛnin ɓɛnin gwìy yinin lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ nyi rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, i tìcàɓ ti Paskà ti ghaghii, ɓɛ yɔ̀m kìɓan kii di kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm ki kɔkɔ̀rìì. 
Ɓɛ ɓeŋɓèŋgà Pyɛɛri ɓi naà-zày, nsoò fɔlɔɔ ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛgherɛ̀n wu ɓɔɔɓɔ̀ŋzàg Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wii ri ìtèɗ.
Di ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛ Pyɛɛri ɓaa rɔ̀ɓ lɛ rìduri, à lalàlà ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ǹkàŋɛn ɗi mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi mɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ɓeŋ̀ɓèŋ mɛ̀suunaa mɛ naà-zày. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à kpagày lɛ vwàs kìtɛɛtɛn ki kpeŋzì kìden ki naa ki Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà miì. Nni ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ̀n à ghèmzìghà Pyɛɛri di à nyɛ̀ŋi nyi ɓi tum, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi mɛ à ɓaghà rì mɔ ɓi ɓyàg, mɛ fumɓɛ̀ngà. 
Ŋwaàfìtom à kpaa nyi lɛ: Sìnɛn kànɗa, ù ki waatɛn ɓɛsiripàs ɓɔɔ, Pyɛɛri à kì lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ; nni à kpaatìghà nyi lɛ, waatɛn kìlàà u nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pyɛɛri à kpagày, à nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi kɛ̀ɛ yi lɛ com ki ŋwaà-fìtom a yùghà kì kìi kiǹ ki ɓaghà saaɗ à kìɓan, nyii fekì lɔŋ lɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm ɓyɛɛ̀ kìki nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ceeghà kìtuu ki ɓɛsujàà ki ǹtonto, ɓɛ ceetì ki kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, nni ɓɛ kpagà asuunaa wu wu ɓaghà wù kìyɛn ɗi bɔŋ, wu ki seesee ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ ɓi bàn. Ìsuunaa wìn wu nɛmɓɛ̀ngà wɔmiɗ di ɓɔɔ ti wɔɔ jàŋbog. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpagà ɓi dan ɓɛ fyee ɓi kìɓàà kìdɛŋ, nni ŋwaà-fìtom à ghàskà kì rinii Pyɛɛri, à ghaàgh.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à sugtìghà min ɓi nyimiɗ, à kpaa lɛ, ǹkonaagh min ki ghɛɛ̀ ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, Kan àa romiì mum wiì à fìtom, à sɔrì mɛ̀ ɓi ɓyàg ɓi Eroodɛ, à ki lɛgsi mɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀cèm mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ǹfèfeegh lɛ ǹghɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à kɔ̀rìghà lɛ fyòoog, à fèg, fɔɔnnɛ à rɔ̀ŋìghà bee inɛ a mɛɛ mɛ Marii ànɛ à ɓaghà jɛɛ Zyaŋ ànɛ ɓɛ nkpɔgì lɛ Marikus, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋzag. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pyɛɛri à ɓokà ìsuunaa, nni giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkìì-kìsay ɗii lɛ Roodɛ à yughày lɛ a woòghrag. 
Nni à rèmìghà Pyɛɛri ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀, à wog kìrɔɔ: Kɛ̀ɛ ka ŋwàɗ nyi naa, kìɓan kifog à sugtì rì mɛ̀ree lɛ a kali ɓum lɛ; Pyɛɛri yɛɛ ri asuunaa. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù rì ǹduŋɛn? Wɔ̀lɛ nyii siìrɛ̀n lɔŋ lɛ, kìɓan ki nyaa kpaa ki ri saaɗ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà min lɛ: ǹghay wu Pyɛɛri wɛɛ rì nya lɛ wu ɓa, nsoò fɔlɔɔ Pyɛɛri à kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà lɔŋ asu rì rìɓoɓòg ɗi naa. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ŋwaɗkà naa, ɓɛ ghɛn nyi, ɓɛ kuuràg lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Pyɛɛri à maasì ɓɔ rì càg, à ki kali ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à kpaŋzi yì nyi ɓi naà-zày, à kpaa tì ɓɔ lɛ, kaliina Zyag rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛmbog kìɓan ki, fɔɔnnɛ à kpagà, à kɛ̀n jàŋ idɛŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri ì tangà, kìɓan ki yeesì ɓɛ̀sujàà, ɓɛ rɔɓ kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀kanikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀g lɛ: Nni Pyɛɛri ànɛ à ɓaa là? 
Eroodɛ à tɔkà lɛ ɓɛɛ kaà Pyɛɛri, nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ rɔɓkà kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛn nyi, ɓɛ yɔmzìghà ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ̀ncèm, Eroodɛ à ki reɓsi lɛ ɓɛɛ cuùsi bɔ. Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Zyude à kɛ̀n a Sezare, à ghagsì gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru wɔɔ.
Eroodɛ à ɓaghà ɓi paàzì rì ɓumɓɛ a Tiir, rì ɓɛ a Sidɔŋ, nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wooghrɛ̀ngày jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi kì ghɛɛ̀. Ɓɛ ɗiŋi dàŋ rì Bilastus ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ ɓi gari yiì. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ ɓɔɔ pègsɛn paàzì wàà, ɓisuulɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa ki ǹlakàg ɓìɗilàg rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki rifòm. 
Ŋwos anɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓaghà ɓiì kìikilɛ̀n Eroodɛ à waatɛ̀ngà ɓìlàà ɓii ɓi rifòm, à kɔ̀rì ɓi kìnuugh, à ki tumɛn ɓitòkì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Bɛ̀ll ìdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ tòtog lɔɔ, àa mum yɛɛ ri. 
Lɔŋ wɔɔ foo, ŋwaà-fìtom a Kan à ɓog nyi ɓisuulɛ à gherɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ fa nyi rìkem ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ fa Bɛ̀ll. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛgɛn ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà nyi rìɗiɗì ɓi ɗùm, à wu.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì kɛ̀ngà asu ì sààsàà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛɛ̀ Sol ɓɛ lègsìghà fìtom fi ɓɛ kɛngà a Yorisalɛm, nni ɓɛ sugtìghà; ɓɛ ɓasɛ̀n yì ɗì Zyaŋ ànɛ ɓɛ nkpɔgì lɛ Marikus.
Ɓi kìseŋi ki a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɗì ɓyoo ɓɛrèsàg sùkurù ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ. Ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: rì Ɓarinaɓas rì Simeyɔŋ ànɛ à ɓatìghà ɗii lɛ ŋwaà-ǹfin, rì Lusyus ànɛ a Sirɛn rì Manaɛŋ ànɛ ɓɛ tɔɔsɛ̀ngà rì gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ Eroodɛ, rì Sol. 
Ŋwos adɛŋ ànɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɗii ɗi Kan, ɓɛ ki cèli ɓiɗilàg ɓi ŋwos àncèm ànɛn, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ! Pisiina mɛ̀ ɓum ɓɛ lɛ rì Ɓarinaɓas, rì Sol, lɛ ɓɛɛ ki kìsay ki ǹɗegìghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kighà lɛ, ɓaa cèli ɓiɗilàg, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàg Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki saaghrag ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, ɓɛ càɗ min ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaàgh.
Yɛ̀ɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki romgà Sol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas fɔlɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sɛngà a Silisii, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkà kìkɔm lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Siipirɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Salamin, ɓɛ kpaakpàà ɓum Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɗì Zyaŋ lɛ a ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsì ɓɔ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, di ɓaa syàà kirìŋ ki riɓày kìcèm, nni ɓɛ kpagà a Pafos, wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà ǹkìì-majìg àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Bari-Yeesus, à ɓaghà muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, à ki yèeghyegsì ɓum lɛ nyii ri ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓaghà rìghan ɗi gɔmìnà ànɛ lɛ, Sɛrizyus-Paolus, gɔmìnà ànɛ̀n à ɓaghà ŋwaà ɗyomzɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ à reŋìghà Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛɛ̀ Sol lɛ, à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a wog ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni Elimas, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ǹkìì-majìg ɓi rìgìrɛg, nyii ramzɛ̀ngà rìbaŋì rì ɓɛ̀-Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛɛ̀ Sol, à kaakàà bee inɛ lɛ gɔmìnà kɛ̀ɛ gherɛn Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Sol ànɛ à ɓatìghà ɗii lɛ, Pol à ɓaghà ǹɗonɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay; à fiɓìghà ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ fyɛɛɛyi 
à kpaa lɛ: Wɔ̀ ŋwaànɛ, ù rì lɛ, wɔ̀ coo ghèghes̀, wɔ̀ ɓèèɓeè, man à Satàn anɛ lɛ wɔ̀, bènàbena à ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ, ù yin ɓìì rɛɛrɛɛ̀sì rìyoòyògsì ɗi bee yi Kan yi yi ri lɛ saaɗ? 
Ɓigomìnɛ, yiya lɛ Kan à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì pɔnɔsii, ù rì ɓiì ɗiŋii tiɗyaŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ù rì ɓiì finɛɛ maa cààmɛ̀n kɔ̀ɔ ghɛɛ̀di kisaa ki ŋwos. Nni mis mii mɛ ghaskà kì ɓulì, birìm ì sigtɛ̀n nyi, à tumɛ̀n rìgbɔ̀mgbɔ̀m di a kaakaa ŋwaànɛ a ɓan nyi ɓi càg, a kɛɛ̀si nyi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ gɔmìnà à ghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ, nni à gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll ɓisuulɛ, dɔgtɛ̀n ì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee Kan, ì kòmgà nyi ǹɗem lɛ syeesyee.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol rì ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓii ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà a Pafos, ɓɛ teɗ kìkɔm lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Pɛrizɛ ànɛ a Paŋfilii Zyaŋ nyii ghasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, à sugti a Yorisalɛm.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà a Pɛrizɛ, ɓɛ ghagsì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyaa, ɓɛ kɛǹ kìkpaŋì a Aŋtyos ànɛ a Pisidii. Nni ɓɛ ɗiŋìghà ɓi naa ì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ŋwosi Saɓàt ɓɛ kɔri ɓi zi. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ lègsìghà ki ɓàli kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis rì ɓi à ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, nni ɓɛ̀làmì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ romgà mum lɛ a kali ɓɛ̀-Pol lɛ: Bɔɔsoŋ! ì ɓì rì rì deɓ yidɛŋ yi ɓì rì lɛ ɓì fa ɓum, tòòghrɛɛna ɓigominɛ.
Nni Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à maasì ɓum ɗì càg, à kpaa lɛ: Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl rì mìni ɓɛ ɓi risag Bɛ̀ll, ramina mɛ̀reè! 
Bɛ̀ll à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Isirayɛl, à ɓɔ̀ngà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, à ki kì lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ kɛɛ tɔɔ̀, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ ɓaghà a Egiɓtɛn, ajɛ̀m inɛn nnɛ à pisìghày ɓɔ wɔɔ ri ìtèɗ wii. 
À mɛnìghà ɓɔ ɓi-reɓ nunùg bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à cuusìghà ɓìlɔ̀ŋ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ziì Kanaaŋ, fɔɔnnɛ à faghà zi yaà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki finɛ̀ngà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ bèg ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛnin, rì bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ. Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɔ ɓɛ̀renì-ɓìɓan ɓɔ yɛɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sìghà kìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ànɛ lɛ Samuɛl. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì rìfòm, nni Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɔ Saul, man à Kis ànɛ ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Bɛŋzyamɛŋ, nnyɛɛ lamìghà ɓɔ bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à pisìghà Saul, à fa ɓɔ Davit lɛ nnyɛɛ ɓa rìfòm ɗyaa. Davit ànɛ̀n innɛ Bɛ̀ll à sɛkà à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ Davit, man à lzayii, à rì rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi nɗem wɛ̀m wu ǹfèfeegh, nnyɛɛ rì ɓiì kìi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ǹkɔ̀ni lɛ a ki.
Ɓi dòò yi Davit ànɛ̀n nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà lɛ Yeesus a yalɛn fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛɓsì lsrayɛl, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ nyimiɗ a kàkà. 
Di Yeesus à ka yu ɓi, Zyaŋ à rerèŋìghà ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ ɓaɓtàg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ à ɓaghà di à ti ɓiì lègsii kìsay kii, nni à kpaaghà lɛ, àa mɛ̀ yɛɛ rì roànɛ ɓi ɓoŋɓòŋ, kìɓan kifog, ŋwaàdɛŋ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, nnyɛɛ ri rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi mɛ̀ ǹkpaŋi ɓi ɓi ǹkoŋ wulɛ, ǹfùmì ǹɗig wii wu gòò.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Mìni dòò yi Abiraham rì mìni ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì risàg Bɛ̀ll, ɓɔlɛ à cɛɓ ànɛ, à rì ɓisu wis ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓumɓɛ a Yorisalɛm rì ɓɛ̀làmì ɓaa, ɓɛ roòzɛ̀ngà Yeesus, kìɓan kìfog ɓi rìren ɗi ɓɛ rengà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, ɓɛ ròzìghà rìkalì ɗi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɗi ɓɛti ɓɛ ɓaàyì ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ Saɓàt ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓi ǹto wu kiɓan wu ɓɛɛ wey nyi miì, ɓɛ tɔkà Pilat lɛ a kali ɓɛɛ wey Yeesus. 
Fɔɔnnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ lègsìghà kì kìi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì kànɛn ɓi rarɛ̀n ɗì nyi, nni ɓɛ kɔsìghày nyi ɓi kɔrɔs ɓɛ ɓom nyi ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, Bɛ̀ll à ghèmzìghày nyi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìloŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à rèsɛ̀ngà bàlì ì mɛ̀ru lɛɛ̀gwey a ɓumɓɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày rì ɓɔ a Galile ɓɛ ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm ǹɗaŋ, ɓɔ yɛɛ ti ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɛɛtɛɛ̀zì ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl kìɓan kii.
Ɓìsi girig, tì yùu mìni rì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ lɛ, ǹkàg wu wu falɛ̀ngà a ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, 
Bɛ̀ll à roozii wɔ ɓisu wis, ɓɛ tì rì ɓɔn ɓaa, ɓi rìghèmzì ɗi àa ǹghèmzii Yeesus, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi Sam à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Ù rì man wɛm̀, mɛ̀ ǹki ɓa soŋì à tumɛ̀n gɛɛ̀nɛ.
Rìghèmzì ɗi à ghèmzìghà nyi a ɓìloŋ lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ɓwɛ̀y, ɗi ri lɔŋ kiɓan ki nyimiɗ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹɗì mìni ɓiì faà ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛ ɓyom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, ɓɛ ǹkàkà Davit.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki à kpaatii jàŋ idɛŋ ɓi kaàtà wìì lɛ: Wàa càɗ ɓì mum wɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ àrì ntɛnɛn lɛ, a ɓwɛy ɓi zɔ̀ŋ.
Wɔ̀lɛ, Davit à kìghà rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɓi cààmɛ̀n kii nni à wughà, ɓɛ ɓom̀ nyi ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ɓomgà ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓii, à ki ɓwɛ̀y ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Kìɓan kifog, roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à ghèmzìghà, nyii ɓɔlà ɓi ɓi zɔ̀ŋ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Konaaghna kì yiì lɛ ɓisu wii nnɛ ɓɔlɛ ànɛ lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì cenɛɛ ɓum ɓìɓe ɓyaa, a kpaakpaàrɛ̀n a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Ɓi Yeesus ànɛn nnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ à rì ɓiì tɔ̀sɛɛ ɓiɓe ɓìcèm ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓi ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, ɓi pisì. 
Kɔ̀riina ɗyomzɛ̀n! Lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi tulɛn ɗi kìɓan ki ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛkpaaghà, ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ lɛ:
Mìni ɓɛ̀daŋàdaŋa, ghɛɛna di ɓi kuughrag, ɓì ki pɛ̀sɛn mɛ ɓi mis, ɓisuulɛ ǹɗì ɓiì kìi rikuu ɗi kiɓan ɗidɛŋ ɓi mɛ̀ru min ɗi ɓì ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɓì gherɛ̀n lɛ, ɗi ri lɛ ɗi kilɛ̀n di ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ kpaa mìni lɛ ɗyaa kìlɛɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Sol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ti ɓiì kpaŋìì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔg ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ sugtiì ŋwosi Saɓàt ànɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkày, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓiìti ɓɔ kì kalii kiɓan kiǹ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ rìghàdà ɗi lekà, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ ɗiŋìghà ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kuùkùrɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ, ɓɛ teètèèsì ɓɔ nyoo di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛn asu, ɓɛ ki sììrɛn ɓi geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll.
Nni gòn i Saɓàt ìnɛ ì ɓɔ̀ɓkà foo, ɓaàyiɓi bàn bimiɗ yɛ̀ɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà gɛ ɓum ànɛ̀n, nni ǹɗem wu yàaka wu ɓɔkày ɓɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìfeèfèngì ɗi Pol di ɓɛɛ̀ sɛɛsɛ̀mgì nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ kpaghà ɓɔ lɛ fwàafwàày lɛ: Ki ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ log kì kpaarɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin, nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ɓèni yɔ̀ yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ɓì ghɛɛ lɛ cɛɓ ki fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ri mìni, nni ɓìsii tiŋ̀mɛɛ min a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Ɓisuulɛ, Kan a kalag ɓisi lɛ: Ǹɗɛsìghà wɔ̀ lɛ, ù ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓimbog ù ki sààti cɛɓ ɓi zi bimiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà rìkpaa ɗìn ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkeèkèmzì ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan. Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓɔlɛ à Kan à sààghà jàŋbimiɗ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ. 
Kìɓan kifog, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ toosìghà lɛ, rì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓi ɓi falɛ̀ngà ɓi rìgherɛ̀n rì gìni-ɓum yi ɓi bàn ìnɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓigti paàzì rì ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpagà ɓɔ rìbaŋì, ɓɛ ki nàɓ ɓɔ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kaa. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kwiɗ kùrùɓu ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀kòò maa ɓi ɓɔ, lɛ a ɓa kìrèmzɛnà ki lɛ, ɓɛ nàɓi ɓɔ; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà min ɓɛ kɛǹ a Ikonyɔm. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ roǹgàkà rì kìnyàà ɓi ǹɗem, ɓɛ ki ɓa ti ɓɛ ronɛn ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
A Ikonyɔm, Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ ɗiŋìghà girig ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ kurɛ̀n rì ɓum, lèg ànɛ lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓengà dɔgtɛ̀n ì Pol, ɓɛ toosìghà ɓum ɓɛ zɛy lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛyitì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n. 
Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ finɛ̀ngà a Ikonyɔm lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ɓaghà rì coo ǹtyweeyi ri Kan ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ kpaakpààghà, fɔɔnnɛ à fafàghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ, ɓɛɛ, kiki lɛ rì dàm, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, à kì fɔlɔɔ lɛ a siìrag ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ kpaakpààghà ɓi komkòm geesɛ̀n yìì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ lanɛ̀ngà gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀ lɛ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ sug jɛ̀m ɗì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛmbog ɓɛ sug jɛ̀m ɗi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ Yeesus. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ zɛy, rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, rì ɓɛ̀làmì ɓaa ɓɛ peèghpègsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ki ɓɔ ǹtɔɓ, ɓɛ rogì ɓɔ gɔ̀g, 
Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓaa ghɛn fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ kaa bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛŋi kì nyàmzɛɛ a Likawonii rì a Listirɛ, rì a Dɛriɓɛ rì ɓi jàŋ yidɛŋ yi yi ɓaghà wɔɔ jàŋbog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghagsìghà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ wɔɔ ɓi jàŋ yiǹ.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ ɓaghà kìwɔ̀g a Listirɛ. A rɔ̀ɓkà kìsɛkɛ̀rɛ̀ à tumɛn a rìyalɛ̀n ɗii, nsoò ŋwos adɛŋ, ŋwaànɛ̀n à fèèghrɛ̀ngà ɓi kirɛlii mɛrɛy, à ɓày ìkòò. 
Nni ŋwos adɛŋ ànɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à wowòkà di Pol à tòtòg, fɔɔnnɛ Pol à pɛɓsɛ̀ngà nyi, à fiɓì nyi lɛ fyɛɛɛyi à ghɛn lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓaghà ɗì ǹtyweeyi lɛ a wɔɔ̀zi nyi. 
Nni à kpaaghà ŋwaànɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, u rɛli mɛrɛy wɛ̀ɛmiɗ. Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo lɛ fàtweɗ, à ghagsɛ̀n ɗì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ gɛ ɓum ànɛ à ɓaghà wɔɔ a ghɛngà kìɓan ki Pol à kìghà kiǹ, nni ɓɛ làmɓɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo ɓi kìtòkì ki ɓumɓɛ a Likawonii lɛ ɓɛ̀y yidɛŋ yɛɛ yuù yì a lɔ̀ŋkaa, ɓi nghay wu ɓum. 
Nni ɓɛ roòghà Ɓarinaɓas ɗii ɗi ɓɛ̀y ìnɛ lɛ Zes, ɓɛ ròò Pol ɗii lɛ Ɛrmɛs, ɓisuulɛ nnyɛɛ totòkà. 
Nni pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ à ɓɛ̀y ìnɛ lɛ Zes, inɛ naa yìì i ɓaghà ɓi rìɗigì ɗi ɓi bàn, à yughà rì ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓɛ̀sanìnya ɓɛ̀rɛ̀gakɛn ri zyònà yi ɓilàà lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog rì ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ ɓɛɛ funɛn ɓìtuwe ɓiǹ, ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi ɓɛ̀y yi yi yughà a lɔ̀ŋkaa, yi lɛ rì Ɓarinaɓas rì Pol. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ lɛ, rì Pol rì Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ ghɛngà fɔlɔɔ, nni ɓɛ ghaskàkà ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓɛ tɔy ɓi gwìy di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: 
Ɓi kìki fɔlɔɔ lɛ la? Ɓìsii ri girig ɓum lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mìni. Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ ti ghaaghagsì mìni à ri lɛ, ɓi caɗ rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn ɓi zɛy rì zɛy, ɓi lɔɔ̀ghrɛn yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cencem, ànɛ à kìghà lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi, rì rìɓày à kìkòn ɗì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri miì. 
Ɓi gbàà yi ajɛ̀m, Bɛ̀ll à càɗkà lɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì bee yi ɓi kɔni lɛ ɓyɛɛ nɔɔ̀ti. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, à rèrèsìghà lɔŋ riɓa ɗii, ɓi ɓìrɔɔ ɓi à kìkìghà ɓum, à ti à nɔsàg mìni bwey, à kì lɛ, ɓìɗilàg ɓyɛɛ ɗiŋi mìni, à fa mìni ɓyom ɓiɗiyɛn lɛɛ̀gwey, à ki roòzi mɛrem min ɗi kìnyàà. 
Rì ǹtɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey ìnnɛ rìkpaa ɗyaa ɗiǹ ɗi ki rèkà gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n lɛ, yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fùnɛn ɓìtuwe ɓisu waa.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày a Aŋtyos ànɛ a Pisidii rì a Ikonyɔm, ɓɛ syoŋ gwìy ì ɓum ɓi gàm yàà, ɓɛ rogì Pol gɔ̀g ɓɛ syòŋ nyi, ɓɛ kɛǹ nyi kì naŋì ɓi nwɔŋì wu bàn lɛ ɓɛ fefèkà lɛ à mɛ wu. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà nyi à nyoo, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n aɗyoo, à sugtì kì ɗiŋii ɓi bàn. Ɓi duri tana, ɓɛ kɛ̀ngà a Dɛriɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas.
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ ghagsìghà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ lɛ Dɛriɓɛ, ɓɛ ki syòŋ ɓum wɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sugtìghà a Listirɛ, rì a Ikonyɔm, rì a Aŋtyos ànɛ a Pisidii. 
Ɓɛ fafàghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ itèɗ ɓi ǹɗem ɓɛ rerèɓ ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ siìrɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ti ka wog mɛtɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi ɗi lɛ ti ɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni ɓɛ rɛsàkà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓi naa yi Bɛ̀ll yìcèm yi wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, i ɓaa cèli ɓiɗilàg, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀n min ɓɔ rì Kan ànɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ saghìghà ǹtyweeyi waa ɓi nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ceeghà ɓi kiden ki zi ki lɛ Pisidii, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaŋì a Paŋfilii. 
Ɓɛ mɛ ghagsi Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll a Pɛrizɛ, ɓɛ sɛn min a Atalii. 
Wɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ teri min kikɔm lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Aŋtyos ànɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày wɔɔ, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ rì Bɛ̀ll à geesɛ̀n, ɓisuu kisay ki ɓɛ kighày kiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki wɔɔ, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ kikì, à ɓiisɛ̀n rìnɛm ɗi à nɛmgà ɓum ɓɛ zɛy bee inɛ ɓɛɛ gherɛn girig nyi. 
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ Pɛsɛ̀ngày a Zyude ɓɛ yu a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìrèrèsì ɗi ɓɛgherɛ̀n di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ì ɓì kɛ̀rɛɛ ɓi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì ghɛn cɛɓ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ coo kiyoòyòò ki kpighà, dì Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ mɛ teɗ rirèsàg ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n nyoey, ɓɛ ren min lɛ, rì Pol rì Ɓarinaɓas rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔɔ̀gh a Yorisalɛm lɛ, ɓɛɛ ghɛn ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ fiɓi kìɓan kiǹ. 
Kìseŋi ki ki a Aŋtyos ki faghà ɓɔ ɓyom ɓi ɓi kɔ̀ɔ̀kɔ̀nɛ̀ngà ɓi rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyaa: Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ fyeeghà a Fenisii rì a Samari di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓɛgeni ɓaa rilɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɗi ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à faghà ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛǹ coo kinyàà ɓi ǹɗem. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Yorisalɛm nni kìseŋi rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ghaɓkà ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ resìghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà rì ɓɔ. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi ǹɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n, ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀raagh, ɓɛ kì kàŋ ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ fiɓi kìɓan kiǹ. 
Di ɓaa nyolɛn lɛɛ̀gwey, nni Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Ɓì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà mɛ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn lɔŋ a rìtumɛ̀n lɛ, nkali Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ a ɓum ɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, lɛ i ɓɛ woogh Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ gherɛn Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à yii mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓum, àa ǹɗèsii lɛ à ghàɓi ɓɔ, yɛ̀ɛ àa ǹfaa ɓɔ girig Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à faghà ɓìsi; 
àa ǹɗèsii ɓi ǹɗèè ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì ɓìsi rì ɓɔ, àa ǹtɛɛ̀zii ɓɔ mɛ̀rem lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓɛ ǹgherɛɛ nyi. 
Nni lannɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi feèghrɛn Bɛ̀ll, yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kìki lɛ ɓi tɛgsi ɓɛ̀yilàg ǹtɛ̀g wu wu kighà lɛ, wu yag ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis, wu ki yag ti ɓisi rìtɛ̀g? 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsii gherɛɛ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ ghɛɓsi ɓisi lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Kan Yeesus lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ girig.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà a rìghàdà ɗiǹ ɓɛ maaghà lɛ fyòoog, ɓɛ wowòg yɛ̀ɛ Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ, rì dàm yi ɓiɓan, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà rì ɓɔ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓɛ zɛy.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ lègsìghà ɓìtòkì, nni Zyag à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Wooghna girig rìkpaa ɗyɛ̀m!
Simɔn àa rèsii ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ ki kilɛ̀ngà a rìtumɛ̀n lɛ, Bɛ̀ll a ɓɔn kìlɔ̀ŋ ki kɛɛ ɓa kiŋkii, ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi zɛy. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ gì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ:
Kan lɛ, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ǹɗi sugtii gɛs̀ m̀pɛ̀sì mɛɛ mɛ Davit mɛ mɛ kpilàkà; fɔɔnnɛ m̀pègsaagh gɛ jàŋ yi yi ri yìwààrɛn, m̀pɛ̀ɛ̀zì mɔ kì rɛsii. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kaa gɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ Kan, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyɛɛ rereŋi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m. 
Rìkalì ɗi Kan ànɛ à rèsìghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ à tumɛ̀n fìɗyàɓ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗìn.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki rììsi ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll ǹtɛ̀g ɓi nyoo. 
Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ɓɔ kì kàni kaàtà, ti kpaa ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì cèlii lɛ: rì riɗi ɗi ɓituwe ɓi ɓɛ woli ɓisuu riɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì rìɗi ɗi ɓituwe ɓi ɓi wii lɛ swììɗ bwaɓ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓi gbàà yi ajɛ̀m, bàn yìcèm yi ri rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèeresàg ɓum ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓaàyì ɓyɔ ɓi naa yi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ Saɓàt.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn rì kìseŋi kìcèm ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔǹ ɓum ɓɛɗɛŋ ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, di ɓɛɛ rom ɓɔ nɗaŋ ri Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas a Aŋtyos. Nni ɓɛ ɓɔngà min lɛ, rì Zyuudɛ ànɛ ɓɛ nɗegàg tì lɛ Ɓarisaɓas, rì Silas. Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn ki ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ keesìghà lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ romgà ɓɔ rì kaàtà ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkànɛn fɛlɛ̀: Ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ɓɛ togsaghiì mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa, ɓɛ ɓì yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓì kɔ̀kɔrii a Aŋtyos, rì a Sirii, ri a Silisii.
Tìi nwoogh lɛ, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì fɛ, ɓìsi tyɛ̀ ki rom yi ɓɔ, ɓɛ yu mìni kì ɓùùsii, ɓɛ ki syaŋdi mini mɛ̀rem rì ɓìtòkì ɓyaa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ tìi n-yɔɔsii jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog lɛ: Ti ɓɔǹ ɓumɓɛ tì romiì a lɔ̀ŋkin ǹɗaŋ ɗi Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas, ɓɛ ɓɛ rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ǹɗem. 
Ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ kàɓɓɛn ɓɔmiɗ ɓisuu kisay ki Yeesus Kiris Kan wìs. 
Nni tì romiì mìni lɛ, rì Zyuudɛ rì Silas lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ kpaàti mìni ɓìɓan ɓi tì kàniì ɓi. 
Lɛ rì ɓìsiì ɓɔmìɗ rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, tìi nghɛɛ lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki tɛ̀gsi ti mìni ǹtɛ̀g wudɛŋ, i ki cee ɓi lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓì ɓi ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋi, ɓi ɓi ri lɛ: 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɗi ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ɓɛ woli ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, rì bwaɓ, rì ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ì wii lɛ swììɗ, kɛ̀ ɓi kì tisɔ̀mɔ̀g, i ɓì lɛɛgh ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, di ɓì konaagh, ÒO òona yàà!
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgà ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ kɛngà min a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ, lɛ ɓɛɛ fa ɓɔ kaàtà ànɛ ɓɛ kangày ɓɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓalà nyi, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ nyaàrɛ̀n, lɛ à tèèsìghà ɓɔ nyòò. 
Zyuudɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Silas ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tokàkà rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛǹ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ teèsì ɓɔ nyoo, ɓɛ ki sììrag ɓɔ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Silas ɓɛɛ̀ Zyuudɛ ɓɛ kɔrìghà wɔɔ lèg àdɛŋ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ghesɛ̀ngà ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì kɛ̀n lɛ fyòoog; nni ɓɛ sugtìghà min a ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɔ 
(Kìɓan kifog Silas à ghɛngà lɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rɔ̀ɓi a Aŋtyos).
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛ rɔ̀ɓkà a Aŋtyos, ɓɛ ɓasɛ̀n ɗì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓi rìrèrèsì rì ɓi rìkakàlì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ ghaghìghà foo, Pol à kpaa Ɓarinaɓas lɛ: Ti sugtiina kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓi bàn yi tìi nkpaa Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan wɔɔ, lɛ ti ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri, 
Ɓarinaɓas à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ǹɗaŋ ɗi Zyaŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ Marikus, 
wɔ̀lɛ Pol à gherɛ̀ngà ɓi lɛ ɓɛɛ Kɛǹ ɗì Zyaŋ, ɓisuulɛ, à rinìghà ɓɔ a Paŋfilii, kɛ̀ɛ ki teeti gàɓ ɓi kìsay ki ɓɛ kɛngà kì kìi. 
Ɓɛ nyolɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ syɔngà kì ghasɛɛ, lɛ rì mum à ròŋì bee yiì, fɔɔnnɛ Ɓarinaɓas ɓɛɛ̀ Marikus ɓɛ ɓɔkà kìkɔm, ɓɛ kɛǹ a Siipirɛ.
Pol nyii tekà Silas ɓɔɔ kɛǹ, dì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ mɛ reɓsɛn ɓɔ rì geesɛ̀n ì Kan.
Fɔɔnnɛ à fyeeghà a Sirii rì a Silisii di a tèeteèsì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ nyoo ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Nni Pol à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaŋì a Dɛriɓɛ, rì a Listirɛ n-yilàg àdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Timote, jɛɛ wìì a ɓaghà ǹgherɛ̀n, gɔ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, seŋi muu Gìrɛg, 
ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ a Listirɛ rì ɓɛ a Ikonyɔm ɓɛ sɛsɛ̀kà nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à kɔ̀ngà lɛ a teɗ nyi, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ; yɛ̀ɛ à ki tekà nyi, à kɛ̀ɗ nyi, lɛ à rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ, lɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yighà lɛ seŋi Timote à ɓaghà muu Gìrɛg. 
Ɓi bàn yìcèm yi Pol rì Silas ɓɛ ghaghìghà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ghaàghàgsìghà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ rengà, ɓɛ ki kpaakpaa ɓum lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓeŋ̀ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ. 
Ɓìseŋi ɓi mɛ tetèkà ìtèɗ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ì ɓɔɓɔ̀g m̀ɓɔɓɔghɛn ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kì rekà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓi kìden ki zi ki a Azii fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaghìghà bàn ì Firizii, rì zi ì Ɓɛ̀gàlat rì mɛ̀kòò. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà jàŋbog rì Misii, nni ɓɛ kaaghà bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Bitinii, kìɓan kifog Nghay à Yeesus kɛ̀ɛ gherɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ syaàghà min zi inɛ a Misii, ɓɛ kɛǹ a Tirowas. 
Nni ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀ ɓi kighà Pol rì ìru lɛ à ghɛɛ ŋwaànɛ a Masedwan mɛ̀rɛy, à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg nyi lɛ: Yu a Masedwan, u ghɛɓsi ɓìsi. 
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm ɓi Pol ɓiǹ, nnɛ tì ghàskà kì kaà bee ìnɛ lɛ ti kɛǹ a Masedwan, lɛ tì konàkà kì ghɛɛ̀ lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ regii ɓìsi lɛ, ti kɛǹ kì kalii Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ wɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì tekà kìkɔm a Tirowas, tì kɛ̀n lɔŋ kilomì ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ, Samotiras, ɓi duri tana tì kɛ̀n a Neyapolis, 
wɔɔnnɛ tì pɛ̀sɛɛ, tì kɛ̀n a Filiɓ, ànɛ à rì ǹtonto à bàn ànɛ a Masedwan, à ki ɓa ti bàn ìnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Rom ɓɛ lamìì; tì kɔ̀rìghà ɓi bàn ìnɛn, bàlì ì mɛ̀ru.
Nni ŋwosì Saɓàt, tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi bàn, tì kɛ̀n ɓi bèn ì ǹsyòm, ɓi jàŋ inɛ tì fèfèkà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n wɔɔ. Yɛ̀ɛ tì kɔ̀rìghà ɓi zi, nni tì tòkàkà rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛtaŋzɛn. 
Giɓ àdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ ɗii lɛ Lidyaa àa m̀ɓɔgsàg Bɛ̀ll, à ɓaghà ǹkìì-dùne ì ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓilàà ɓi ɓàŋ ɓi bàn ì Tyatiir, à ramgà mɛ̀reè lɛ syeesyee lɛ a wog ɓìtòkì ɓis, fɔɔnnɛ Kan à nɛmgà nyi ǹɗem lɛ a konag kì woògh ɓìtòkì ɓi Pol. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà lɛ rì nyi, rì naa yìì i ɓum nni à tɔkà ɓìsi lɛ, ti kɛǹ a mɛɛ mii, à kpaa lɛ: I ɓì ghɛɛ lɛ ǹɗì ǹgherɛ̀n Kan, yùuna kì kɔ̀rii a mɛɛ mɛm̀. Fɔɔnnɛ à sììrɛ̀ngà lɛ ti gherɛn lɛ, ti kɔri à lɔ̀ŋkii.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà ŋwos adɛŋ ɓi jàŋ i bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, nni tì tulɛ̀ngà rì gɔ̀n ì giɓ idɛŋ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ɓiì sasali ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ; ì ɓaghà rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, ki ki fafàghà yɔ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ log kì yiì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀masà ɓii ɓɛ fɔ̀nfɔ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi ɓìfyeŋ ɓii ɓiǹ. 
Nni ì tumɛ̀ngà ɓìsi rìnɔ̀ɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì lɛ, rì ɓìsi rì Pol, di yɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à teŋmɛɛ à cee, ɓɛɛ̀ kakali mini ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi fa mìni cɛɓ. 
Ɓàlì ì mɛ̀ru ì ghaghìghà lɛɛ̀gwey ŋwutyàà giɓ anɛ̀n à kɛ̀nkɛ̀n lɔŋ asu à kpaakpàà fɔlɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ bim ì ɓaghà lɛ ì mɛ naasag Pol, à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n à kpaa kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ki ɓaghà ɓi giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: Ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus Kiris, ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ lɛ, u pɛsɛn ɓi giɓ ànɛ. Nni kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ghàskà kì pɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi gom yɔ̀miɗ inɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀masà ɓɛ giɓ anɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ bee yaà ì rìfɔ̀n ìnɛn ì simɓɛɛ, nni ɓɛ ɓangà lɛ, rì Pol rì Silas, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì ɓɔ ɓi jàŋ ì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yuu rì kìɓùùsì ɓi bàn yìs, ɓɛncèm ɓɛ ki rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; 
ɓɛɛ rèeresàg ɓum ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓidɛŋ, ɓi ɓìsi Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ tì yin ri ìtèɗ wulɛ, tì teɗ, nsoò lɛ tì ɗiŋì miì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ, ì wokà bim ri Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kpaa lɛ, ɓɛɛ kori ɓɔ ɓìlàà ɓi nyoo ɓɛ ki ɓog ɓɔ kìtòn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓaàgh lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ ɓog ɓɔ kìtòn fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ piìg min ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày, ɓɛ kalì m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày lɛ, a ɓeŋ ɓɔ, lèg ànɛ lɛ àdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɗim. 
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì naà-zày à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à pìg ɓɔ ɓi kìden ki naa ki ki ɓaghà lɔŋ wɔɔ ɓi naà-zày ɓi ɗùùm, à ki pùrag ɓɔ mɛ̀kòò ɓi ɓìɓèg.
Di ǹɗem-irù wu ti jàŋbog, Pol rì Silas ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ɛ̀gh tyem ti lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll, ɓìmbùŋ ɓimbog ɓi wowòg yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ghìghà. 
Nni zi i ghàskà kì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ ri ìtèɗ lèg ànɛ lɛ mɛɛ mɛ naà-zày mɛ kpikɛ̀ngà, ɓìsìm ɓìcèm ɓi ghas kì ŋwàrɛɛ, bɛn yi ɓimbùŋ ɓìcèm yi fumɓàg. 
Yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à fòsɛ̀ngày ɓi fìlo, à ghɛn mɛ̀suuna mɛ naà-zày ɓìkpaŋ à sɔ̀ŋìì gàfàg yìì lɛ, a wolɛn ɓisuulɛ à fèfèkà lɛ, ɓìmbùŋ ɓìcèm ɓyaa làngii. 
Nni Pol à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kìlɛn com! tì rì fɛ ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
M̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à tɔg min lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi ɗuu; à ɗiŋì rì mɛ̀ree ɓi kìden ki naa, di a nìighniŋdɛ̀n lɛ kpàg-kpàg-kpàg, à kpì Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas a mɛ̀kòò; 
fɔɔnnɛ à kpaŋzìghà ɓɔ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀kan ɓɛ̀m! Cɛ ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi ɓisuulɛ mɓa rì cɛɓ? 
Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Gherɛn Kan Yeesus, fɔɔnnɛ ù rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ cɛɓ lɛ rì wɔ̀, rì naa yɔ̀ɔ̀ ì ɓum. 
Nni ɓɛ kalìghà min nyi Ɓɔlɛ à Kan Yeesus, lɛ rì nyi rì rìmɛɛ ɗii. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, nnɛ, m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ lɛ a soò ɓɔ beŋ yi ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghàskà kì ɓàɓtii lɛ rì ŋwaànɛ̀n, rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à tekà lɛ rì Pol rì Silas, à ɓɔg rì ɓɔ a mɛɛ mii, à fa ɓɔ ɓyom ɓiɗiyɛn, ŋwaànɛ̀n rì naa yìì i ɓum, ɓɛ wokà kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ rom yì ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ kali m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày lɛ, à caɗ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛɛ ghaàgh. 
Nni m̀ɓèŋì-naà-zày à kpaaghà Pol lɛ: Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ romiì ɓum lɛ, mɛ̀ ncaɗ mìni, mìnii ghaàgh, nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, kpaŋina min, ɓi kɛǹ lɛ fyòoog. 
Nni Pol à kalìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɛǹ lɛ: Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ mɛ kì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓog ɓìsi kìtòn ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, di ɓɛ ka yɔmzi ɓi ɓisi, kɔlɛ tì rì girig Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ, ɓɛ ki pìg ɓisi ɓi naà-zày nni ɓɛ ti ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaŋzi ɓìsi ɓi naà-zày; a rìnyam, èe èe, ɓìsii ɓenì, ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ yu ɓìsi kì kpaŋzii. 
Nni ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɛǹ ɓɛ sugtìghà kì kalii ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Pol ìnɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ìris wu ɓangà ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà lɛ ɓɛ̀-Pol ɓɛ ri Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ yughà ɓɔ kì tɔɔ̀gh rìcenɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaŋzì ɓɔ ɓì naà-zày, ɓɛ ki ɓɔ̀ŋzag ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn ɓi bàn ìnɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Pol rì Silas ɓɛ kpagày naà-zày ɓɛ kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Lidyaa, ɓɛ ghɛn ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ rìgherɛ̀n, ɓɛ teèsì ɓɔ nyoo, ɓɛ ghaàgh min.
Pol rì Silas ɓɛ fyeeghà a Aŋfipolis rì a Apolonii, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaŋì a Tesalonika, wɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà rì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ àa nti à kìlàg. À kurɛ̀ngà rì ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ, ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, gòn yi Saɓàt yiraa. 
À tɛɛ̀tɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, à rèrèsì ɓɔ lɛ, ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ, Kiris a wog rìkɛŋ, à ki ghèmɓɛn yi a ɓìloŋ; à kpaakpàà ɓɔ lɛ: Yeesus ànɛ nkakali mini ànɛ yɛɛ rì Kiris. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, ɓɛ ɓasɛ̀n ǹɗaŋ ri Pol rì Silas, rì Gìrɛg lɛɛ̀gwey ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nɗisàg Bɛ̀ll, gàɓ ì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ì nɔɔ̀tìghà girig ɓɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì yàaka ɓɛ reŋɗɛ̀ngày ɓumɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ yoòyòmgà ɓi bàn, ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀n cììba, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìkì ɗi kiyoòyòò ɓi bàn. Nni ɓɛ kɛngà kì kaà lɛ rì Pol rì Silas a mɛɛ mɛ Jazɔŋ, lɛ ɓɛɛ rɛsi ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ kilɔ̀ŋ lɛ kɛɛ yɔm ɓɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà ɓì ɓɔ, nni ɓɛ ɓangà lɛ rì Jazɔŋ rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ kɛǹ rì ɓɔ a ɓɛ̀làmì bàn ìnɛn ɓɛ kpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓuùsìghà ziinɛ bimiɗ, ɓɛ nkpaŋi girig fɛ ɓi bàn yìs, 
Nni Jazɔŋ àa ǹghàɓi ɓɔ a mɛɛ mii; rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɗi wɛɛsɛɛ ɓi ri ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Kaaza, lɛ ɓɔɔ kalag lɛ: Rìfòm ɗidɛŋ ɗi rì wɔɔ, ɗyɛɛ ri ɗii lɛ, Yeesus. 
Rìkpaa ɗìn ɗi ɓuùsìghà lɛ rì gwìy ì ɓum, rì ɓɛ̀làmì mɛ̀to ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ, 
ɓɛ kagà Jazɔŋ rì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ, ɓɛɛ peè làman ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ càɗ ɓɔ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ìru wu fingà, ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ghas kì kaà bee inɛ lɛ, Pol ɓɛɛ̀ Silas ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn, ɓɛɛ kɛǹ a Bere. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà wɔɔ, ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Bere ɓɛ rɔɔtɛ̀ngà ǹɗem ɓɛ cee ɓɛ̀roɓɛ a Tesalonika, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll rì coo kinyàà, ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ fifìɓìghà kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ nkòo ɓìɓan ɓi Pol à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ, ɓi ri miì. 
Kìgwey ki ɓi ɓɔ, ki gherɛ̀ngà; ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓi a Gìrɛg rì gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀baŋì ǹɗììtɛn, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà girig. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Tesalonika ɓɛ wokà lɛ Pol à titì ɓiì ghaaghagsì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll a Bere, nni ɓɛ yughày wɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓuùsi jàŋ, ɓɛ ki kì kiyoòyòò ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ. 
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ghas min ki kìi lɛ Pol a kɛǹ ɓi ɓɛg à rìɓày à kìkòn, Silas rì Timote ɓɛɛ rɔɓkà lɔŋ a Bere.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɛngà kì foŋì Pol, ɓɛ kɛngà lɔŋ ǹɗaŋ ɗì nyi à kpaŋ a Atɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sugtìghày min a Bere, Pol à romgì ɓɛ̀-Silas ɓɛɛ̀ Timote jɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓɔ, lɛ, ɓɛɛ nɔɔ̀tiì nyi lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Pol à ɓaghà ɓiì ɓoŋɓoŋi ɓɛ̀-Silas a Atɛn, à ɓaghà rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓi ǹɗem yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà lɛ bàn ì Atɛn ì ronɛ̀ngà rì bɛ̀ll yi ɓinùn. 
A nyoònyòlɛ̀ngà lɛ rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ǹɗisàg Bɛ̀ll; ki ɓaghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. À nyoònyòlɛ̀n tì rì ɓumɓɛ àa ǹtanàg ɓi kìyan ki ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ nkuràg wɔɔ ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓɛ̀rèsàg dɔgtɛ̀n yidɛŋ yi yɛɛ, kpaakpaa lɛ ŋwaà keèsi rìyɛ̀y ɗi cɛɓ, rì lɛ, ŋwaà ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓiɓì nɗem ɓi rìkɛŋ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà girig ìkurè rì Pol, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ lɛ: Cɛ ǹkìì-kɛɛgh anɛ a kpaakpaa kɔmiɗ? Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ki pisɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ a kakali kiɓan ki bɛ̀ll yidɛŋ, yi tì yii ɓi; ɓɛ ɓakà fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ wokà di Pol a kakali Ɓɔlɛ à Yeesus, rì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ. 
Nni ɓɛ tekà Pol ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹtaŋzɛn wu a Atɛn wulɛ, ayèròpaàzɛ̀ ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Tì rì nya lɛ tì yi nyɔɔnyɔn à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ u rèresi anɛ? 
Ki ri yɛ̀ɛ u kakali ɓisi ɓìkènekènè ɓi ɓiɓan, nni ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ti kɔ̀nkɔ̀n lɛ di tyàa yii yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ri azi. 
Ɓumɓɛ a Atɛn rì ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn, ɓɛ ɓaghà rì kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ, ì duri i tani, ɓɛ kɔrì foo lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaàkpaa, nsoò lɛ ɓɛɛ wowog ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓɛ nyɔn.
Nni Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹtaŋzɛn wulɛ, àyèròpaàzɛ̀ a kpaa lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Atɛn, mɛ̀ ǹka ghɛɛ lɛ, ɓì rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ falɛɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi mɛgherɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Ɓisuulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nɗerenii bàn yìn, ǹseesèè gɛ mɛɛ ànɛ ɓì togii bɛ̀ll yin; mɛ̀ɛ mɓàli kɔm̀ ɓi mɛɛ mɛdɛŋ lɛ: Mɛɛ mɛ, mɛ ri ɓisuu bɛ̀ll ìdɛŋ ìnɛ tì yii ɓi. Nni bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ɓi ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ìnɛn kɛ̀ ɓi yi yɔ̀, yɛ̀ɛnnɛ ǹ-yùu mìni kì rèsii. 
Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à kìghà lɛ, rì zi rì ɗyoo, rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi miì, nnyɛɛ ri Kan ànɛ à làmii ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm. Bɛ̀ll ànɛn à yin lɛ à kɔ̀rì ɓi mɛɛ mɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ toŋi rì ɓyàg ɓyaa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìsay kii ki yin ɓiì tɔtɔɔgh ɓyàg ɓi ɓum lɛ kɛɛ kìlɛn, ɓisuulɛ com kidɛŋ ki kaarɛɛ ɓi nyi; nnyɛɛ ti à falàg ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm cɛɓ, rì cɔ̀ŋzɛn rì ɓyom ɓimbog ɓìcèm. 
Nnyɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ fuùyì ɓi mum bog, à ki kɔ̀ɔ̀si ɓyɔ ɓi zi bimiɗ; à kìghà lɛ, à wòŋzàg ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓisu waa, à ki rɛsag mɛrèè mɛ zi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii. 
A kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɗi ɓum ɓɛɛ kaàkaa nyi ɓaàyiɓi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ghɛn nyi di ɓɛ mɛ gbɔ̀mgbɔ̀m, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à raɓsɛɛ gì ɓi ri ɓìsi; 
ti ghɛghɛ̀ɓ, tì nyɛ̀ɛ̀nyɛŋɗɛ̀n, tì ki ɓa ɓum, lɛ nyi. Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ̀toŋì ɓyom ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓìsii ri gìrìg boo yìì i mum. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ tì rì lɔɔ boo ì mum ì Bɛ̀ll, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi kifèegh lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ à pisɛ̀n gol, nsoò mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò gɔ̀g yi ɓum ɓɔ yɛɛ soɓi rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗyaa. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à foŋi ɓi ǹto rì ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓiǹ ɓi rìɗim, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi gɛɛ̀nɛ, a rereŋi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm nsoò ɓɛ fe, nsoò ɓɛ fe, lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔghrɛn mɛ̀rem. 
Ɓisuulɛ à rɛsìghà bimiɗ à ŋwos ànɛ à rì ɓiì yɔ̀mi zi bimiɗ miì, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n; à ɓɔ̀ngà mum ànɛ à rì ɓiì kìi kisay kiǹ, à fa ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm kìrèmzɛnà ki ki resii lɛ, nnyɛɛ ɓɔngà ŋwaàncèm, yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmzìghày nyi a ɓìloŋ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà di Pol à ti ɓiì kpaakpaa kiɓan ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpusɛ̀n ɗi tyɛ̀y, ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ, tì ri wog kiŋkɔɔ kiǹ ŋwos adɛŋ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Pol à kpagà, à ghaàgh. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, gàɓ ì ɓum ìdɛŋ ì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Pol, ì gherɛ̀n. Ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɛǹ, Denis kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ǹtaŋzɛn wulɛ àyèròpaàzɛ̀ à ɓaghà miì, rì giɓ adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Damaris, ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ tì foo.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà à Atɛn à kɛ̀n a Kɔrɛŋt. 
A tuusɛ̀ngà wɔɔ ri muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Akilas; ŋwaànɛ̀n à yalɛ̀ngà ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki lɛ Pɔŋ. A pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Italii ɓɛɛ̀ Pirisilya à giy, ɓisuulɛ rìfòm ɗi lɛ Kiloodɛ ɗi rengà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Rom ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn wɔɔ. Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à ràrɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rìkuu ɗi kisay ɗifog, kìsay ki toŋtoŋɛn ɓilaa rì tàpot, nni Pol à kɔ̀rìghà a lɔ̀ŋkaa ɓɛ sasày ǹɗaŋ.
Gòn yi Saɓàt yìcèm, Pol àa ǹtòòghraagh ɓi naà-bɔ̀nzɛ̀n lɛ à kaakààghà bee lɛ a syoŋ̀ lɛ rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Silas rì Timote ɓɛ kpagà a Kɔrɛŋt di ɓɛ pɛsɛɛ yì a Masedwan, Pol à nagà ɓɔɔ ɓisay ɓimbog, à rɔ̀ɓ lɔŋ lɛ a kpaàkpaa ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, à kakàlì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à ki sììrɛn lɛ, Yeesus yɛɛ ri Kiris. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓeèdɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓi Pol à kpaakpààghà, ɓɛ ki sɛmgi nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à sàɗkà kùrùɓu ànɛ à ɓaghà nyi ɓi ɓìlàà à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ì ɓì ɗyaŋi ŋwos yɛ̀ɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, di zɛ̀ɗ yiǹ ì mìniìɓɔmiɗ, mɛ̀ ǹ-yiìdi miì rì bɛ̀lɛn. Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ǹ-yùu kì kɛ̀ɛ a ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo à kɛ̀n a mɛɛ mɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ àa ǹɗisàg Bɛ̀ll ɗii lɛ Tityus-Yustus, mɛɛ mii mɛ ɓaghà jàŋbog ɗì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, rìfòm ɗi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɗii lɛ Kirispus ɗi gherɛ̀ngà Kan, rì rìmɛɛ ɗii ɗicèm, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓumɓɛ a Kɔrɛŋt lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi Pol ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà girig, ɓɛ ki ɓàɓtag.
Ɓi-ru wudɛŋ, Kan à kpaaghà Pol a ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi, kɛ̀na asu rì rìkakàlì ɗi ɓɔlɛ, kɔ̀ɔ mam. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ajɛ̀m, ŋwaàdɛŋ à yin lɛ à saàgh wɔ̀ càg ɓi nyoo lɛ a ki wɔ̀ kìɓe ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ ronɛɛ fɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ.
Pol à kɔ̀rìghà a Kɔrɛŋt bèg bog rì kìden di a rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Galyɔŋ à ɓaghà gɔmìnà ànɛ ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki lɛ Akayi, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔrɛ̀ngà ɓɔɔ̀cèm, ɓɛ ɓigtì paàzì rì Pol ɓɛ kɛǹ ɗì nyi ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m. 
Ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ a tootoòsì, ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìkuu ɗi riɓɔgsì ɗi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi reègh. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Pol à mɛɛ kìghà lɛ a pini ŋwɔm a toòghrɛn, Galyɔŋ à kpaa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ lɛ: Mìni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n! I kaa rì lɛ Pol à woliì mum nsoò lɛ à sɛ̀raaghiì coo kiɓan kidɛŋ, di ǹɗì lɛ ǹkɔ̀rì lɛ fyòoog ǹkonàg tì kì woògh sɔmìnà wìn yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ki rì lɛ ɓi nyoonyolɛ̀n ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ìdɛŋ rì ɓi mii mɛdɛŋ, rì ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓin, mìniìɓɔmiɗ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìpègsɛɛ kiɓan kin; mɛ̀ ǹ-yin lɛ ǹ-yɔ̀m ɓìɓan ɓi fɔlɔɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaŋzìghà ɓɔ ɓi naà-ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m. 
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ sɛngà ɓi Sostɛn ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹlàmì naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n nyi rìɓog ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛyɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan, wɔ̀lɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yeesi Galyɔŋ nsoò lɛsàg.
Pol à kɔ̀rìghà tì a Kɔrɛŋt gàɓ, fɔɔnnɛ à ghesɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ righerɛ̀n, à teɗ min kikɔm lɛ a kɛǹ a Sirii. À kɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀ngà rì Pirisilya ɓɛɛ̀ Akilas. Pol à kɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà ǹto à Saŋkire ɓisuulɛ, à càrɛ̀ngà tyòŋ ɓi bɛ̀ɗ idɛŋ ìnɛ ɓɛ ǹɗegi lɛ bɛ̀ɗ i nàziryià. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kpagà a Efɛɛzɛ Pol à càɗ Pirisilya wɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ Akilas, à kɛ̀n ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n à tòkì rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ a kɔri gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru rì ɓɔ, à ɓèn. 
Kìɓan kifog à ghasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, à ki kàg ɓɔ lɛ, à rì ɓiì sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkaa ŋwos adɛŋ di Bɛ̀ll à kɔ̀ni. Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaghà lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, nɗi tìcàɓ ti ti riì ti a Yorisalɛm nsoò kaa ɓaa la. Nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Efɛɛzɛ ɓi fìtimà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à sɛni fìtimà à Sezare, à ɓɔg kitògsii ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛgherɛ̀n wu a Yorisalɛm, fɔɔnnɛ à sɛngà min a Aŋtyos.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ gàɓ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà tì, à reni zi ì Galasi bimiɗ, à ghaàgh min a Firizii, di a sìisiìràg ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Apolos, ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà a Alɛgsaŋdirii, à kpagà a Efɛɛzɛ. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à kìghà lɛ, à yi rìlɛ̀ŋì ɗi ɓitòkì, à ki yi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ rèsi nyi bee ì Kan ǹɗem wii wu ki falɛn miì lɛɛ̀gwey. A kakàlìghà ɓum, à ki rèresi ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, kìɓan kifog, bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ yɛɛ̀nɛ nyii yighà yɔ̀riyɔ̀. 
Nni Apolos à tumɛ̀ngà rìtòtòg ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris, yɛ̀ɛ Pirisilya rì Akilas ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓii, nni ɓɛ tekà nyi, ɓɛ konàg nyi kì tɛɛ̀zaagh bee inɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Apolos à fèkà lɛ a kɛǹ a Akayi, ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ teèsì nyi nyoo lɛ a kɛǹ, ɓɛ ki kàn ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ ghaɓ nyi lɛ syeesyee. Yɛ̀ɛ à kpàgà wɔɔ, à ɓaghà rì ǹghɛɓsɛn ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ì kìghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, 
lɛ àa ǹti à ciìzàg Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ di ɓɛɛ̀ ǹyoonyolɛ̀n ɓi gwìy. À rèrèsì ɓɔ, di a ɓaaɓaàzì rì kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ, Yeesus à rì Kiris.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Apolos à ɓaa a Kɔrɛŋt, kɛɛ̀ki Pol à kìi lɛ, à mɛ rereniì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi dòn, à yù kì kpaŋì a Efɛɛzɛ, à tanɛn gàɓ ì ɓɛ̀yilàg wɔɔ, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: 
Ɓì tekà nya Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay yɛ̀ɛ ɓi gherɛ̀ngà? Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii ka wokà ɓì gi di ɓɛ ɓuŋi com kidɛŋ lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Nni Pol à tɔkà min ɓɔ lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi bàɓtis ɗibe ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà mìni? Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Bàɓtis ì Zyaŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Zyaŋ à ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀rem, à kakàlì ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl lɛ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì gherɛɛ roànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì ɓɔ̀ɓiì, yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ Yeesus. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, nni ɓɛ ɓaɓtìghà ɓɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à saghìghà ɓɔ ɓyàg ɓi nyoo, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki sɛn yì ɓi ɓɔ, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìtòg ɗi ɓìkènekènè ɓi ɓitòkì di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à rèrèsìghà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kpaà. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Nni Pol à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, à tòòghrɛ̀n wɔɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, à kurɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi seesee kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, à kaakàà bee inɛ a ki lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wowòkà ɓìtòkì ɓii, ɓɛɛ gherɛn ɓìɓan ɓi à kpaakpààghà. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀rem mɛ̀tèɗkakɛn ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀n lɛ di ɓaa gherɛɛ, ɓɛ ki feefengì bee ì Kan ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ɓum, fɔɔnnɛ Pol à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, à teɗ ɓɛ̀yilàg à kɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ jàŋ ìdɛŋ, à kuùkùrɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi naà-sùkurì ì Tiranus. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki finɛ̀ngà bèg yiɓɛɛ̀, kɛɛ kighà lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Azii, à tumɛ̀n lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à kpaŋ lɛ Gìrɛg, ɓɛ wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà Pol ìtèɗ wulɛ a kiki dàm yi ɓiɓan yi kuurakɛn, 
lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ ntekì zyònà yi ɓilàà rì ɓìden ɓi ɓilàà ɓi ɓi komgà nyoo ì Pol, ɓɛ ɓaɓàɓì ɓɛ̀roroɓ miì, tìroɓ tyaa ti wɔnwɔ̀n, ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ki kpaŋkpaŋ ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà jàŋ bimiɗ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀nàɓì-ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ fèèghrɛ̀ngà kì nàɓi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay rì ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus, ɓɛ kpaa ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓìn lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni ɓi ɗii ɗi Yeesus ànɛ Pol à ti à lààlàmɓɛ̀n lɛ, ɓi kpaŋ̀! 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kikìghà kìɓan kiǹ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɔn ɓɛ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey àdɛŋ, muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɗii lɛ, Seva; ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ɓaàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii Yeesus, ǹki yi ghɛn yɛɛ rì lɛ Pol; nni mìniìɓɔmiɗ, mìnii ri ɓɛ̀ghɛn? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ànɛ̀n rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay à sɛngà ɓi ɓɔɔ̀cèm, à cee ɓɔ ɓi-tèɗ, à kì ɓɔ lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓɛ faŋɗàkày ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n di ɓɛ ti nyoo zɛ̀y, beŋ jàŋ bimiɗ. 
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm rì Gìrɛg bimiɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà a Efɛɛzɛ, ɓɛ wokà kìɓan kiǹ, ìris wu ɓan ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ keèkèmzìghà ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus. 
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɛ yuyùghà kì kpàkpaagh ɓì mis mɛ ɓum, ɓɛ ki rèresi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓɛ kighà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìgwey ki ɓum ki ki kikìghà majìg abɛ̀y, ki yughày rì ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓaa ɓɛ majìg, ɓɛ tɔ̀n ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm. Ɓɛ ɓalà lɛ, ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kpagà bàlì ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì kɛ̀nkɛ̀ngà beèbɛ̀y ɗì rìsààsàà ɓi-tèɗ wu Kan.
Ajɛ̀m ì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, Pol à ɓekà lɛ a kɛǹ a Yorisalɛm, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì syàa zi ì Masedwan rì zi ì Akayi, fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ i m̀ɓaa wɔɔ, ǹkɛ̀n girig kì ghɛɛ̀ Rom. 
Nni à romgà min ɓɔɓti ɓii ɓɛ kisay ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ, rì Timote rì Erast a Masedwan, nyimiɗ a rɔ̀ɓtì kì ghagsii gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Azii kiǹ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓɛ ɓigtìghà coo kiyoòyòò ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee bee ì Kan. 
Ǹsyaàgh-ìrɛm adɛŋ ɗii lɛ Demetiriyus àa ǹti à syakì ɓɔɔ ɓifèèghrɛnà ɓɛ mɛɛ mɛ bɛ̀ll ìnɛ lɛ Aritemis rì rìkuu ɗi swiɗ ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kìlag mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ tiraŋ̀ miì, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à lèlèɓkà ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii lɛ syeesyee. 
Nni à taŋzɛ̀ngà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii, rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ kikìghà rìkuu ɗi kisay ɗiǹ, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Ɓì yii lɛ, dìgdìg wìs a rìɓa, à rìì ɓi-rɛm wu ti syasyag wu. 
Nni ɓi seesèè ɓì ki wowog, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ lɛ Pol ànɛ à mɛ kì lɛ, à rèsàg, à ki syoŋ̀ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, àa fɛ a Efɛɛzɛ nyi rì nyi, ɓaàyiɓi ɓi ziì Azii bimiɗ. À kpaakpàà lɛ, bɛ̀ll yi ɓum ɓɛɛ kii rì ɓyàg ɓyaa, yi yin Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan ki ki ɓeɓtɛɛ miì, ki yin lɔŋ lɛ, kìsay kis ki ri ɓiì sòo, ki ri girig lɛ mɛɛ mɛ coo bɛ̀ll yìs i giɓ inɛ lɛ Aritemis mɛ rì ɓiì ghalì com ki zɛy, nsoò rìgwey ɗi bɛ̀ll ìnɛn, ìnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ɓi ziì Azii bimiɗ, rì ziinɛ ǹcèm ɗi ri ɓiì lèegh.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, bim i kì ɓɔ lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n ɗìlààlàmɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Aritemis ànɛ à Efɛɛzɛ à rì mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìyoòyòò ki kpighà ɓi bàn bimiɗ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ suùrɛ̀n ɓi naa ìnɛ ɓɛ ǹkìlàg tìcàɓ miì, di ɓɛ mɛ ɓan ɓumɓɛ a Masedwan lɛ rì Gayus, ri Aristarikɛ ɓɛ ɓɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀ghàg ɗì Pol. 
Pol à kɔ̀nkɔ̀ngà lɛ a rɛli ɓi mis mɛ ɓum wɔ̀lɛ, ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ reèg lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kì fɔlɔɔ. 
Mɛ̀fòm mɛdɛŋ mɛ a Azii mɛ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ghan mɛ Pol, mɛ romgà nyi jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛ fèèghrɛn ki yùu ɓi naà-tìcàɓ. 
Kì ɓaghà lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ syansyàn ɓi rìsyansyàn ɗyaa, ɓɛ̀roɓɛmbog, ɓɔɔ syansyàn ɓi ɗiŋkàà; kìyoòyòò ki ɓaghà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi gwìy ìnɛn, fɔɔnnɛ kìgwey ki ɓum ki yighà ɓi gi ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà. 
Nni ɓɛ sɔŋìghày ŋwaàdɛŋ ɓi gwìy inɛn ɗii lɛ Alɛgsaŋdirɛ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n innɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tyɔtyɔ̀kày asu. Fɔɔnnɛ Alɛgsaŋdirɛ ànɛn à maasìghà ɓum rì càg lɛ a toòghrɛn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n yɛɛ ri, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog, ɓɛ tumɛ̀n rìkpaakpàà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Aritemis ànɛ a Efɛɛzɛ à rì mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, ɓɛ ɓiìtàkà kìɓan kìn fɔlɔɔ à kpaŋ nunùg ɓɛ̀hawò ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkanì-ɓɛ̀kaàtà à gɔmìnà à maasìghà ɓum, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Efɛɛzɛ, ghɛn yɛɛ nani lɛ ɓi bàn ì Efɛɛzɛ ìnnɛ mɛɛ mɛ coo bɛ̀ll ì giɓ inɛ lɛ Aritemis mɛ ri, rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki bɛ̀ll ìnɛn ki ki kpighày aɗyòò? 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ nyoey yi yin ɓi kìɓan kiǹ, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɔ̀rii lɛ fyòoog, kɛ̀ ɓi swèɗ kiɓan kidɛŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓyàa yùu yì fɛ rì ɓɔ ɓɛ, ɓɛ komi ɓi com ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri ɓi naà-bɛ̀ll yìs i giɓ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki tòg yɔ̀ kiɓè. 
Nni i Demetiriyus rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ ri rì kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ɓɛɛ seèghkɛn ɓɛ raɗ rì ŋwaàdɛŋ, gòn yi ɓɛyɔ̀m yi ri wɔɔ, ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà girig wɔɔ, ŋwaànɛ à rì rì kìɓan ki sɔmɛn, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sɔmɛɛ! 
I ɓì rì tì rì ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓì rì lɛ ɓi tɔg, ɓi ri lɛ ɓɛ pegsɛ̀n ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà ɓɛ taŋzɛɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ. 
Ɓɛ ki rì lɛ ɓɛ sɔmɛ̀n ɓìsi lɛ ti syòŋsyoŋ yi kìyoòyòò ɓi rìtaŋzɛ̀n ɗi tyàa taŋzɛɛ ɗi gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓisuulɛ, tì yin ɗi com ki tì rì lɛ ti kpaa lɛ, ti resi azi anɛ tì rì fɛ miì ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn; lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ à kpaa ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ suki.
Yɛ̀ɛ kìyoòyòò kiǹ ki lekà, Pol à taŋzɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ à ɓaa lɛ à mɛ reɓ ɓɔ, à ghesɛ̀n min ɓɔ, à kɛ̀n a Masedwan.
A renìghà kìlànà ki zi kiǹ di a fafa ɓɛgherɛ̀n deɓ lɛɛ̀gwey, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ min ki kpaŋì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Gìrɛg. 
A kɔ̀rìghà wɔɔ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa, yɛ̀ɛ à mɛɛ̀ tekà fìtimà lɛ a kɛǹ a Sirii, nni à wokà lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ mɛ tɔ̀kɛn nyi, fɔɔnnɛ à tekà min nɗɛli lɛ, a sugti a Masedwan. 
Ɓumɓɛ Pol à ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ, ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ: Sopatɛr, ànɛ à ɓaghà man à Pirus ànɛ a Bere, rì Aristarikɛ ɓɛɛ̀ Sekunɗus ɓumɓɛ a Tesalonika, Gayus ànɛ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Dɛriɓɛ, rì Timote, rì Tisig, rì Tirofim ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ a Azii. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ lokà kì kɛ̀ɛ asu, ɓɛ Kɛǹ ɓìsi kì ɓoŋì a Tirowas. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis, ɓìsii ɓɔkà kìkom a Filiɓ di mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ nkìlàg ɓìrɛsì kɛ̀ɛ̀ nwìɗ mɛ mɛ ghaàgh, fɔɔnnɛ tì kɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì tanɛɛ a Tirowas ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛtaǹ, tì ki kɔ̀ri wɔɔ mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Ɓi ŋwos a ǹtonto ànɛ ɓi rìtumɛ̀n ɗi sɔnɗì nnɛ tì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn lɛ ti teɗ ɓìɗilàg ɓi Bɛ̀ll. Pol nyii ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ghaghii ɓi duri tana, nni à tòkàkà rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, à ki ràɓsi ɓitòkì à kpaŋ nyìinyìm à-ru. 
Ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi kìden ki naa ki tì taŋzɛ̀ngà miì ɓi mɛɛ mɛ aɗyòò. 
Nni dɛlì ì mum ìdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Etig ìnɛ ì kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà ɓi wonɗò ì ghaghìghà rì fìlo lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ di Pol a ka ràaraɓsì lɔŋ ɓitòkì ɓii, yɛ̀ɛ fìlo fi teri nyi fɔlɔɔ, nni à kɔ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓi dɛg ì kìraa, à kpì azi; yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ pɛ̀sìghà nyi, ɓɛ ghɛn lɛ, à mɛ wu. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Pol à sɛngà min à kɛ̀n mɛ̀ree à pɛ̀sì dɛlì ìnɛn, à kpaa ɓum lɛ: Kɔ̀riina lɛ fyòoog, à rì cem. 
Nni à sugtìghà kìɓɔɔ̀gh, à ɓɛg bìrɛs à ɗi ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìtìghà lɔŋ ri ɓìtòkì ɓii asu, duri ì ràm ì tan, fɔɔnnɛ à ki ghaghìghà min. 
Ɓɛ sukà rì mutyàà dɛlì ànɛn, di à rì cem, kìɓan kiǹ ki ki lɛ, mɛ̀rem mɛɛ kpi ɓum ɓi mùm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsii lolòkà kì kɛ̀ɛ beèbɛ̀y ɓi fìtimà fi fi kɛnkɛ̀ngà a Asɔs, wɔɔnnɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì teetii Pol, ɓisuulɛ nyii kɔnkɔ̀ngà lɛ, a kpaŋ wɔɔ ɓi zi. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ à tanɛ̀ngà ɓìsi a Asɔs, tì teɗ nyi ɓi fìtimà lɛ, ti kɛǹ a Mitilɛn. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì Pɛ̀sɛɛ wɔɔ, tì ghagsì lɔŋ rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗis ɓi fìtimà, tì kɛ̀n kìkpaŋì a Siyos ɓi duri tana, ŋwos anɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkà foo, tì syaàghà a Samos, ɓi ànɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓtìtìghà nnɛ tì kpagà a Milɛ. 
Pol à ɓaghà ǹsììrɛn lɛ kɛ̀ɛ rɛli a Efɛɛzɛ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki ri nyi ɓiì cee a Azii. À ɓòòɓòòzɛ̀ngà lɛ, a ɓa a Yorisalɛm ɓi ŋwosi Pàŋtèkot, di bee i ɓaa.
Pol à pɛ̀sìghà ɓum a Milɛ, à rom lɛ ɓɛɛ regiì nyi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ kiseŋì ɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki a Efɛɛzɛ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ yughày, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yi yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛghɛɓi rì mìni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki mɛ̀ɛ nɗì rì mìni, à tumɛ̀n lɔŋ ɓi ŋwos à ǹtonto ànɛ ǹkpagà ɓi kìlànà ki zi ki a Azii. 
Mɛ̀ɛ nkìi Kan kìsay kɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓɔgsɛn mɛ̀ɛmiɗ nsoò lɛsàg, rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam ɓi nyìinyìm à mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ lɛ ɓìtɔ̀kɔ̀ ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ntɔɔ̀tɔ̀kɛ̀n mɛ̀. 
Ɓì yii lɛ, ǹnyamgà ɓi mini kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ki ri lɛ, ki ghɛɓsì mìni, kɛ̀ɛ ǹki risi mini rìkpaakpàà, ɗì rìrèèrèsàg ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi gwìy ì ɓum, nsoò lɛ a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓin. 
Ǹɗerèŋìghà lɛ, rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n rì Gìrɛg lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki tyweeyi Yeesus à Kan wìs.
Nni ɓigominɛ, ǹkɛ̀ɛ a Yorisalɛm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Nghay a titini mɛ lɛ nkɛǹ, ǹ-yii ɓi com ki kɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓoŋ mɛ wɔɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog, ǹ-yii lɛ ɓi bàn bimiɗ ìnɛ ǹkpaŋi wɔɔ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ti ki resàg mɛ̀ lɛ, rì naà-zày, rì ǹkulɛ̀n ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓoŋ mɛ wɔɔ. 
Mɛ̀ m̀ɓiisɛɛ gì ɓi ki foŋì ǹto ɓi cɛɓ kɛ̀m ki mɛ̀ɛmìɗ, com ki nfɔmfɔ̀m ki ri lɛ, nkɛnkɛn asu rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyɛm̀ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ǹki kì kisay ki Kan Yeesus à faghà mɛ̀, kɛɛ ri lɛ, ǹghagsi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll.
Mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ǹghaghìghà a lɔ̀ŋkin di nkakali Ɓɔlɛ à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, ǹ-yii lɛ syeesyee lɛ, ɓyàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi ìsu wɛ̀m à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹkalii mìni gɛɛ̀nɛ lɛ: Bwaɓ yi wààdɛŋ yi yìn lɛ, yi kɛǹ mɛ̀ ɓi ǹto. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ǹkpàkàkà mìni dwìɗ i Bɛ̀ll bimiɗ, kɛ̀ɛ nnyam mini nsoò maa kìɓan adɛŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ, ɓèŋina mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ɓì ki ɓèŋ di kituu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi Bɛ̀ll, yi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki rɛsìghà mìni lɛ ɓi ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ. Mɛniina kìseŋi ki Bɛ̀ll lɛ syeesyee, lɛ à làkà kɔ rì bwaɓ yii. 
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii lɔŋ lɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ rì yɛ̀ɛ ɓìmonɗo, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ajɛ̀m yɛ̀m, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓaa kèŋi ɓi kituu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nsoò ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tumɛɛ gɛ rìrèrèsì ɗi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi, lɛ, ɓɛɛ syoŋ̀ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓi bee yaà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓaana cem, ɓì ki yiti lɛ, ǹɗeɓi mìni bèg yiraa, yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos kɛ̀ɛ nfɔɛy, rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam.
Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ǹɗeɓsɛɛ mìni rì Bɛ̀ll ǹki reɓsɛnti mìni rì ɓɔlɛ à geesɛ̀n yìì; ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ri lɛ, à kì lɛ ɓi ɓa rì ìtèɗ, à ki fati mini ɓyom ɓi à nyamgà ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛŋkii. 
M̀ɓaghà ɓi ri zày ìnɛ lɛ, mum a fa mɛ̀ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò gol, nsoò ɓìlàà. 
Mìniìɓomiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, ǹsasàlà rì ɓyàg ɓyɛm̀ ɓi, lɛ ǹtanɛn ɓyom ɓi ti ghɛɓ miì lɛ rì mɛ̀, rì ɓumɓɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà rì ɓɔ. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹɗèsii mìni bee yicèm lɛ, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓi sasay fɔlɔɔ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓì rì ɓiì ghɛɓsii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ, ɓì ki yiti jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Kan à kalìghà ɓi ŋwɔm wii lɛ: Rì ŋwaànɛ à faa, rì ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ faa com roànɛ à faa yɛɛ ti à ɓiisàg kì woògh kìrɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ fɔɔnnɛ à ɓakà mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, à ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ǹɗaŋ rì ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mum bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ à kpusɛ̀ngà rì ǹkɛ̀gh, à ki fyuŋ Pol ɓi kìmììgh lɛ a lɔɛɗ nyi. 
Kìɓan ki ki ɓiisɛ̀ngà ɓɔ kì faà ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ki ɓaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Pol à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ, ɓaa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi ìsu wii ŋwos adɛŋ. Nni ɓɛ kɛ̀ngà min nyi ki foŋì a fìtimà. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghasɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓìsii ɓɔg ɓi fìtimà tì ròŋì bee inɛ a Kos lɛ saaɗ. Ɓi duri tana tì kpaŋ a Roodɛ, yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà wɔɔ, tì kɛ̀n a Patara. 
Tì tanɛ̀ngà fìtimà fi fi ɓaghà ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni a Fenisii, tì ɓɔg min miì, tì kɛ̀n. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà di tì ti ɓiì seesee yì kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ Siipirɛ, tì càdkày kɔ ɓi kìmɛŋ tì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a Sirii. Tì kɛ̀n kì rɛlii a Tiir, wɔɔnnɛ fìtimà fi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì sɛɛ̀dii mɛtɛ̀g. 
Tì kɔrìghà wɔɔ mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ tì tanɛ̀ngà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n wɔɔ, Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki tinì bɛ̀gherɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ kpaà Pol lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ɓɔg a Yorisalɛm. 
Di tyàa ghagsi mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, nnɛ tì rùɓtɛ̀ngà tì rì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà ɓìsi kìfɔŋì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓaa, rì ɓɔn ɓaa, ɓɛ ceesì ɓìsi ǹdèè wu bàn. Nni tì ɓakà mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, tì ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ɓi bèn ì rìɓày. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ghesɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ, ɓìsii ɓɔg ɓi fìtimà, ɓɔɔ sugtàg a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓaa.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Tiir ɓi fìtimà tì yùtìghà lɔŋ ki rɛlii a Pitolemayis, tì tògsì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n, tì ki ghagsi bimiɗ à ŋwos ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ.
Ɓi duri tana nnɛ tì pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà tì kɛ̀n a Sezare, wɔɔnnɛ tì kɛ̀ngà a mɛɛ mɛ Filiɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkalì-ɓɔlɛ, à ki ɓati kibog ki ɓi ɓum taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà a Yorisalɛm; a lɔ̀ŋkii nnɛ tì kɔ̀rìghà. 
À ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀gɔ̀n ɓɛnin, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka yi ɓi ɓɛbaŋì, ɓɛ ki ɓa ti ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà di tyàa ghagsi bàlì ì mɛ̀ru wɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan àdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Agaɓus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Zyude.
