Ki ri syeesyee à kìɓan lɛ mum a siirɛn ɓi rìkìkì ɗi kirɔɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm àa lɔŋ lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ǹɗì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn kɛɛ̀ki ɓì sììrɛ̀n. 
Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, ǹtumɛɛ tì rìwog ɗi rikɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɗi giɓ a woki ɓi rìyay ɓisu wìn, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀rem mìn. 
Kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn mɛ lɛ di màa ɓaa ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ɓigomìnɛ, n-yi yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì lɛ ǹtòòghrɛ̀n ɗì mìni dɛŋ ɓisuulɛ kiɓan kin ki ri mɛ̀ kì yeesiyɛn.
Mìni ɓɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi wog nya rìrèsì ɗi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna? 
Lɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Abiraham à ɓaghà ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛbaŋì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀. À yay bog rì ǹkpàn wiì à giɓ, bog rì gil ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi ǹkpàn. 
Nni man à ǹkpàn a giɓ anɛ̀n, à yalɛ̀ngà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ti ɓɛ yalàg, wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ man à giɓ anɛ à ɓaghà ɓi ǹkpàn nyii yalɛɛ, rìyalɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ɓaghày ɓi nkàg wu Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ri kìfèèghrɛnà; ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ resii bee yi kiɓɛɛ̀ yi Bɛ̀ll à rengà rì ɓum. Bee bog ìnɛ ɓi bee yi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì bee inɛ ì renɛ̀ngà ɓi dòn ì Sinayi yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ Agaar. 
Agaar yɛɛ ri dòn ì Sinayi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Araɓii, à rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yorisalɛm ànɛ ɓigomìnɛ ɓisuulɛ à rì ɓi rìkpàn rì ɓɔn ɓii. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Yorisalɛm ànɛ aɗyoo, nyii yin nkpaǹ, nnyɛɛ ki rì jɛɛ wìs. 
Lɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Wɔ̀ nɔ̀nɔg à giɓ anɛ à yin ɓiì yayali, nyàànyaa! Syagti ǹkeèghkeegh wu kinyàà, wàànɛ ù ka wokà ɓi rikɛŋ ɗi riyày, rɔŋɗɔŋ kìkpakpag ɓisuulɛ giɓ anɛ yii à nagà à ɓiì ɓaà rì ɓɔn à cee roànɛ yii à keesii. 
Ɓi mìni, ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì rì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Isag lɛ ɓì yalɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ ǹkàg wu Bɛ̀ll wu ɓaghà. 
Nni lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ man ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ti ɓɛ yalàg à tɔtɔ̀ɓkà roànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay à Bɛ̀ll ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ nnɛ ki kaka ki kɛnkɛ̀n fɔlɔɔ à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll a kalag lɛ cɛ? Nàɓa lɛ rì ǹkpàn a giɓ rì man wiì ɓisuulɛ man à ǹkpàn a giɓ àa kàɓɓɛn ɓi mɛwus mɛ seŋi ɓɛɛ̀ man à giɓ anɛ à yin ǹkpàn. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì yin ɓɔn ɓɛ ǹkpàn, tì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ giɓ anɛ à yin ǹkpàn.
Kiris à kwèɗkà ɓìsi lɛ ti ɓa ɓɛ̀kan; nni kɛ̀ ɓi foŋɗɛn ti mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi kìɓèg lɛ ɓi sugti ɓi rìkpàn. 
Mɛ̀ Pol ǹkalii mìni lɛ: I ɓì kɛ̀ɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛɗ mìni, di Kiris àa ɓa ti ɓi ri gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓisu win. 
M̀ɓììtii tì mìni kì kalii lɛ: Mum bimiɗ ànɛ à rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ kɛ̀rɛ̀n, a yi lɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓìcèm. 
Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓi kaakaa lɛ ɓi ɓa lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna, ɓì mɛ ghasɛn ɗi Kiris, ɓì ki ti ɓɛ mɛ̀mɛn geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓi ɓɛg wìs, com ki ti ɓoŋɓòŋ ki ri lɛ, tì ti rì dyàɓɛn lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì kìi lɛ ti ɓa lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mii; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ti ɓoŋɓoŋ ri ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ɓi ntyweeyi wu tì rì rì wɔ. 
Ɓi ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓi Kiris ɓi ɗùm, rìɓa di lɛ à rì ǹkɛ̀rɛn nsoò lɛ à yin nkɛ̀rɛn ɗi yin com; bimiɗ à kìɓan anɛ à ghɛɓsii à rì lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ri rì mɛ̀kìkìì ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n.
Ɓì tumɛ̀ngày mɛ̀ree min lɛ syeesyee, nni com aɗi kɛɛ kighà mìni lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ɓati ri mɛ̀wog ɓi com ki saaɗ à kpaa? 
Mɛ̀yitì mɛǹ mɛ fuu yì ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a regi mini. 
Com ki ɓɛ tɔɓi rì maa gàɓ à nwìɗ ki ti ki nuràg lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ɓi mɛ̀, ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi ri Kan ɓi kìɓan kin, ɓyàa ɓa ti ɓi ri rìyitì ɗi ɗi ghasɛɛ rì ɗiŋkɛ̀m, wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì pɔnɔsii ŋwaànɛ a ɓùuɓuùsì mìni, nsoò ghɛn yaa rì. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, i kaa rì lɛ ǹkaka ǹɗèrèsì ɓum lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀rɛɛ, di ɓi cɛ nnɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀n asu ɓɛ tɔtɔ̀ɓ mɛ̀? I kaa rì fɔlɔɔ, di rìwu ɗi Kiris à wughà ɓi kɔrɔs ɗi yin lɛ ɗi kɛɓtì tì mum fìɓàg. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ syòŋsyoŋ yi kìyoòyòò ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓɛɛ ghaki  gì ɓɔmiɗ di ɓɛ kɔni.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà mìni lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀kan; nni kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛɓ zɔɔ rì rìɓa ɗiǹ lɛ ɓi nɔɔ̀ti rìyɛ̀y ɗi cɛɓ ki mɛmùù. Wɔ̀lɛ ghɛɛghɛ̀ɓsɛɛna mìni rì mìni ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n; 
ɓisuulɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓìcèm ɓi ti ɓì ronɛn ɓi m̀bobog à jɛ̀ɛ̀ ànɛ lɛ: Keesi ro mum ànɛ wɔ̀ jàŋbog yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmìɗ. 
Nni wɔ̀lɛ, i ɓì ɓaa lɛ ɓì loòlòmɓɛ̀n ɓì ki ɗiiɗilɛ̀n mìni rì mìni, ɓì konàg lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi lègsi ki weesɛɛ, mìni rì mìni.
Càrɛɛnà lɛ Nghay à Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì ɓyɛɓ ɓin, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyàa kì ti ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀mùù mɛɛ̀ syògi ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ ki. 
Ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀mùù mɛ ri rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi mɔ, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ɓa ɓì ghasɛn ri ɓi Nghay à Bɛ̀ll a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. Nghay à Bɛ̀ll à rì rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi nyi, ɓi ki ɓa ɓi ghasɛn ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù mɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n; mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓiɓan mɛǹ mɛ ri ɓi wɛ̀y, lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓi yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi ki com ki ɓì kɔ̀ni. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i Nghay à Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì mìni, ɓyàa ɓati ɓi ɓɛkpàn ɓɛ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna.
Ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi mɛmùù ɓi nanɛɛ ɓì; ɓyɛɛ ri lɛ: Kìfàrà, tisɔ̀mɔ̀g, cɛɓ ki sààsaa, 
rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, majìg, bènà, momɓɛ̀n, m̀mììghrɛ̀n, rìbiìbìmɓɛ̀n, tìkaŋ ti mɛkɔ̀ɔ̀, ǹlànag rì ǹɗèè wu nɗem. 
Yàaka, rìŋwaŋ ɗi mɛrɔ̀g, dili rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓiɓan mɛ fɔlɔɔ. Yɛ̀ɛ ǹlokà mìni kì kpaà, nni ǹɗɔ̀gsɛɛ tì mìni lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki ɓiɓan ɓiǹ, ɓaa ghɛn ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìɗùn ɓi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ti ki falàg ɓi ri lɛ: Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, kìnyàà, fyòoog, rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem, rìɓòò, rì kìpuɓì nɗem, rìɓèŋ ɗi ntyweeyi, rìɓa ɗi tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, rìyi ɗi riɓan ɗi nɗem. 
Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓeezɛɛ ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi fɔ̀lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓi ɗùm ɓɛ mɛ kpan mɛmùù maa ɓi kɔrɔs, rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ rɔɔghi mɔ. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ki ri lɛ Nghay à Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ̀ fafa ɓisi cɛɓ, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min ki kɛ̀ɛ̀ghii yɛ̀ɛ Nghay a rèresi ɓisì.
Tyɛ̀ ki kaakaa rikem ɗi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu, tyɛ̀ ki kaakaa ɓɛ̀paàzì ɓi nyìinyìm wìs nsoò lɛ tì mììghmììghrɛ̀n ɓìsi rì ɓìsi.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, i ɓì sììdii mum di à rì ɓi rìnàn ɗiɗɛŋ, mìniɓɛ ɓì rì rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, pɛ̀ɛ̀ziina nyi kì rɛsii ɓi syeesyee à bee rì nɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀. Ù konàg rì wɛ̀ɛmiɗ lɛ kɔ̀ɔ kɛ̀ɓtɛn girig fìɓàg. 
Gheeghèŋzɛɛna rìtɛ̀g ɗi mɛtɛ̀g mɛ ɓì rì rì mɔ, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi roòzi kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki Kiris. 
I mum à terɛɛ nyimiɗ lɛ bimiɗ à mum, kɔlɛ à yin com, di à pwààrɛɛ nyimiɗ. 
Mum ǹcèm à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì fiɓii rikɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗii, i à rì lɛ à sanɛ̀n, a sanɛn ɓɛɛ̀ nyimiɗ, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ɛ fèèghrɛn ɗi ɓum ɓɛɗɛŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ mum ncèm à rì ɓiì tɛ̀ɛgh ntɛ̀g wii nyimiɗ.
Kighɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ Ŋwaànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll a fa roànɛ a rèresi nyi gàɓ ɓi ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi pwààrɛn mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ɓaà yègsi ɓi Bɛ̀ll, lɔŋ com ki mum à ɓɛ̀li kɛɛ̀ki à rì girig ɓiì ɓùmii. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì tìŋzii kisay kii ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ kɔ̀ngi mɛmùù, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ki lɛ a ɓumi rìwu; wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì tìŋzii kisay kii ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Nghay, Nghay à kì lɛ a ɓumi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nni tyɛ̀ ki fwɛy rikì ɗi kirɔɔ, lɛ i tì fɔli ɓi jàŋ ri jàŋ, tì rì ɓiì saŋì mɛ̀saŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ min lɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ti ghɛɛ kìrɔŋiɗ, ti ki ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm kìrɔɔ, à ɓiìɓììsɛ̀n ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ghɛn ɓyoo ɓikàngà ɓi nkàniì mìni kaàtà miì mɛ̀ɛmìɗ.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kaakaa lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ sɛsɛg ɓɔ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi mɛmùù ɓɛɛ̀ kàŋkaŋ mini lɛ ɓi kɛrɛn; ɓɛɛ̀ ki kìki fɔlɔɔ ri azi lɛ kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ tulɛn ri ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓisuu Kɔrɔs à Kiris. 
Lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀kɛ̀rɛn, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓèŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɔngì lɛ ɓi kɛrɛn lɛ di ɓɔɔ keŋkem ɓi gòò yìn. 
Ɓi san wɛ̀m, ki yin fɔlɔɔ, mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ɗi com kidɛŋ ki lɛ nsaàsànɛ̀n i ki cee ɓi lɛ kɔrɔs à Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris. Lɛ kɔrɔs à Yeesus ànɛ̀n, ziinɛ ì rì kìloŋ ɓi mis mɛ̀m, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗì kìloŋ ɓimis mɛ ziinɛ. 
Rìɓa ɗi lɛ ŋwaà rì ǹkɛ̀rɛn nsoò lɛ à yin nkɛ̀rɛn ɗi yin com, kìɓan ki ki ri bimiɗ à com ki ri lɛ mum a ɓa nyɔɔnyɔn à mum. 
Fyòoog à Bɛ̀ll rì nyìinyìg ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll a woki ɓum, ɓyɛɛ ɓa rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ǹsiŋdɛn wiǹ, ɓi ɓa girig ɗì Isirayɛl à kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Nni mum kɛ̀ɛ yùti mɛ rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ doòdoo yi ǹɗì rì yɔ, yɛɛ̀ rèresi lɛ ǹɗì ǹkpàn a Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, geesɛ̀n ì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì ǹghay wìn. Ààmɛ̀n.
Mɛ̀ Pol, ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris lɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, mɛ̀ yɛɛ kani ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀falɛn ɓi Kiris Yeesus a Efɛɛzɛ. 
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɓɛɛ̀ Kan Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa mìni geesɛ̀n rì fyòoog.
Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa rì Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris, ànɛ à màgà ɓìsi ɓi rìɓa ɗis ɗi tì rì ɓɛ̀ ràrɛn ɗi Kiris, yɛ̀ɛ à faghà ɓìsi ɓɛ̀mààgh ɓɛ nghay ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm. 
Ɓi Kiris, Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà ɓìsi di ziinɛ ì ka kilɛn ɓi, lɛ ti ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki lɛ ɓɛ fen ɓi mis mii. Ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìì, 
Bɛ̀ll à lokà kì rèni lɛ à ɓiì kìi lɛ, ti ɓa ɓɔn ɓii lɛ Yeesus Kiris. Ki kɔngà nyi lɛ a ki kìɓan kiǹ lɛ ki rɔɔghà nyi fɔlɔɔ, 
lɛ a nyaàsì rìkem ɗi geesɛ̀n yìì inɛ à kìghà ɓìsi ɓi Man wiì à nɗem. 
Ɓi Man ànɛ̀n, tì ti ɓɛ̀kòrɛn ri bwaɓ yii, ɓìɓe ɓis ɓi ɓa ɓìcàrɛn lɔŋ lɛ coo itègh wu geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll, 
ìnɛ à rèsìghà ɓìsi lɛɛ̀gwey, yɛ̀ɛ à kìghà lɛ ti ɓa rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, tì ki ɓa ri syeesyee à fèg. 
À kpàkàkà ɓìsi dwìɗ i rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɗi a rìnyam, ɓi kìɓan ki nɗem wii wu lokà kì renì lɛ à kìi gɛ ɓi Kiris. 
Kìɓan kiǹ, Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì ràtɛɛ kɔ kì kìi, di cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀n; à taŋzɛ̀n ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri aɗyoo, rì ɓi ɓi ziinɛ lɛ ɓyɛɛ ɓa rìfòm ɗifog lɛ Kiris. 
Ɓi rìɓa ɗis ɗi tì rì ɓi Kiris, tì mɛ teɗ gàɓ yìs i cɛɓ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à lokà ɓìsi kì ɓɔ̀ni lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìyitì ɗii ɗi ɓaghà. Bɛ̀ll a kìlag ɓiɓan lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗem wii wu kɔnì. 
Lɛ di ɓìsi ɓɛ tì lokà kì foŋì dyàɓɛn yis ɓi Kiris, ti ki com ki lɛ rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗyɛɛ nyaà. 
Ɓi Kiris, mìni girig ɓì kìghà lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓì wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì saaɗ, yɛ̀ɛ ri Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ à ɓaghày rì gòri yìn, nni ɓì gherɛ̀ngà Kiris, Bɛ̀ll à foŋ min kirèmzɛnà kii ɓi mìni, yɛ̀ɛ à faghà mìni Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki à kàkà. 
Nghay ànɛ̀n yɛɛ̀ kìki lɛ, tyɛ̀ ki ɓa ri nyoey ɓi kìrɔɔ ki Bɛ̀ll à nyamgà ɓisuu ɓum ɓii, à ki kì lɛ ti yi syeesyee à rìyi lɛ, tì rì ɓiì terì ɓyom ɓi syeesyee ɓi à nyamgà ɓiǹ, di gòri yìs i mɛ ron. Tì rì ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à tekà ɓisuulɛ ti nyaànyààsì rìkem ɗii.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nwoogh girig di ɓɛɛ̀ sɛsɛg lèg ànɛ ɓì gherɛɛ Kan Yeesus, rì nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rì rì nyi ɓi san à ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm, 
nni ǹti ǹfafà lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ̀ cààmɛ̀n ɓisu win, ǹki ɓùŋɓuŋ mini ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛm̀, 
ǹtɔtɔ̀g Bɛ̀ll à Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris, ànɛ à rì ǹkeŋkèmì wìs a Seŋi lɛ a fa mìni ǹghay à ɗyomzɛ̀n ànɛ a rèsag ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam lɛ a ki lɛ ɓi yi nyi. 
À lòm mìni kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi mɛ̀rem, lɛ ɓi yi rìkuu ɗi dyàɓɛn ɗi à reŋìghà mìni lɛ ɓi ɓa rì ɗyɔ, ɓì ki yi lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓyom ɓi syeesyee ɓi à nyamgà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓi ri ɓì tèghɛn. 
Ɓì yi girig lɛ, à ti à rèsàg ìtèɗ wu kuurakɛn ɓisuu ɓisi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n. Ìtèɗ wiǹ wɛɛ̀wu à rèsìghà lɛ wu laŋi mɛ̀tèɗ mɛcèm. 
Wɛɛ̀wu à kìghà kìsay ri wɔ, yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmzìghày Kiris a ɓìloŋ, à kɔ̀ɔ̀sì nyi ɓi weèlem wìì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm. 
Wɔɔ, Kiris à rì ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu wu teŋmɛɛ wu cee mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ mɛfòm mɛcèm, rì ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ̀cèm, rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛcèm, rì ɓɛ̀kemì ɓɛ̀cèm; ɗii ɗii ɗi cee mii mɛ ɓɛri lɛ ɓɛ reŋì ɓigomìnɛ nsoò lɛ ɓi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
À fogà ɓyom ɓìcèm a mɛ̀kòò mɛ Kiris, à rɛsì nyi rìfòm ɗi gol ɓi Kìseŋi kii 
ki ki ri nyoo yìì, miì nnɛ Kiris à rì ǹɗonɛn lɛ pisa, nyi ànɛ à mɛ ron zi bimiɗ à sòsòɓ.
Ɓi ɓɛg wìn, ɓì ɓaghà ɓìloŋ lɛ zɛ̀ɗ yin rì ɓìɓe ɓin, 
ɓi ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà miì abɛ̀y di ɓi ka nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, ɓì kìkì rìkɔ̀n ɗi rifòm ɗi ɗi lamii mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓi nlɛŋlɛŋ̀, ɗyɔ yɛɛ ri ǹghay ànɛ a kìki kisay ɓigomìnɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ǹtoòtèɗ. 
Ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, tì ɓaghà girig ɓi nɗaŋ waa lɛ tì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà abɛ̀y ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀mùù mis mɛ ɓaghà zày rì ɓyɔ, tì kìkì rìkɔ̀n ɗi nyoo yis rì ɗi mɛrem mis lɛ rìɓa ɗi tì ɓaghà ɓum lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmɓog, tì ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ bim i Bɛ̀ll ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpaŋì a lɔ̀ŋkaa. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì rì nyìighnyìg yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀ fɔɔnnɛ ɓi coo nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à keesìghà ɓìsi rì nyi, 
ɓìsi ɓɛ tì ɓaghà ɓìloŋ lɛ mɛ̀nànì mis, à kìghà lɛ ti ɓa ti rì cɛɓ ǹɗaŋ ɗi Kiris. Ɓì rì ɓɛ̀kòrɛn lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll. 
À kìghà lɛ, à ghèmzì ɓìsi ǹɗaŋ ri nyi, à ki kɔ̀ɔ̀si ɓisi ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm ɓi rìɓa ɗi tì rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris. 
À kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, di ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm ɓi asu a resi geesɛ̀n yìì inɛ ì tèghɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, ɓi kìrɔɔ-ǹɗem ànɛ à kìghà ɓìsi ɓi Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀kòrɛn lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll, ɓi bee ì rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ nyi; ki kilɛɛ ɓi fɔlɔɔ lɛ rìkì ɗin, ki ri lɔŋ rifa ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki yin yi lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì min, fɔɔnnɛ mum à yin lɛ à sanɛ̀n. 
Ɓisuulɛ, tì rì kìsay ki nnyɛɛ salà; à yègà ɓìsi ɓi Yeesus Kiris lɛ, ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki ki ri rì mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ syeesyee mɛ Bɛ̀ll à lokà kì pègsɛɛ lɛ ti kilag.
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yitii lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kalag lɛ ɓɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀rɛn, ɓɛ nɗegì mìni abɛ̀y lɛ ɓɛ̀suswiɗ; ɓɔɔ ki ɓa lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kɛɗkàkà ɓɔ. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓì ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ Kiris, ɓì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kèn, kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa ɓɛroɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà; ɓì ɓaghà ɓi ri gàɓ ɓi bee yi Bɛ̀ll à kàkà lɛ à ɓiì renì rì kɔ; fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi ziinɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ dyàɓɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ, ɓi Yeesus Kiris mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓaghà fìràɓ, ɓì mɛ tyòŋdɛn yi nyi jàŋbog lɛ bwaɓ yi Kiris. 
Ɓisuulɛ Kiris ànɛ̀n yɛɛ mɛ fa ɓisi fyòoog, nnyɛɛ ɓaskà ɓyom ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓì ghasɛn kibyɔg kìfog yɛ̀ɛ à wààghàkà bàŋbàŋ ìnɛ ì fogà gasɛ̀n rì bènà ɓi nyìinyìm wìs. 
À pisìghà ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì mɛ̀siŋdɛn mɛ miì rì ɓìcèlì ɓi miì ɓi rìfa ɗi à faghà nyoo yìì lɛ di ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓìn ɓyɛɛ sug kìlɔ̀ŋ kìfog, ki kɛɛ ɓa nyɔɔnyɔn à kìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi rìràrɛ̀n ɗi rì nyi, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à kìghà lɛ fyòoog a ɓa. 
Kiris à wolà bènà ɓi rìwu ɗi à wughà ɓi kɔrɔs, à ràɗkà ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀rɛn lɛ ɓyɛɛ ɓa nyoo bog , ɓi ki sugti ki ràrɛɛ ri Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Kiris à yùghà kì ghagsii Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à fyòoog, a lɔ̀ŋkin, mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓaghà fìràɓ ri Bɛ̀ll rì a Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà jàŋbog rì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓisuulɛ, rì ɓìsi, rì ɓɔ, tì rì rì bee i ǹkpaŋɛn yɛ̀ɛ Tààta lɛ nyi rì ǹghɛɓsɛn wu Nghay bog.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓì yiìdi ɓɛ̀kèn nsoò lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi rìghaàgh, wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ ɓì ti ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri kìlɔ̀ŋ kìfog rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, ɓì ki ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓi naa ì ɓum ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓì rì kìtoŋ ki ki ri kìyàghɛn yi ɓi kìsay ki ɓɛkɛ̀nì-fìtom, rì ki ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan; Yeesus Kiris nyimiɗ a ɓa gɔ̀g ìnɛ ì ɓanɓani ntɔn à naa. 
Nyi yɛɛ ti à kìlàg lɛ kìtoŋ kɛɛ kpegmɛn, ki ki ɓɔg, ki ghay naa ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn ɓi Kan ɓi ɗùm. 
Ɓi nyi nnɛ mìnii ri girig ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛ ɓi kìtoŋ kiǹ, lɛ ɓi ɓa ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔɔ̀ cèm mɛɛ mɛ Bɛ̀ll à kɔ̀kɔrii miì ɓi Nghay.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki mɛ̀ Pol ànɛ ǹɗì kìmbùŋ ki Yeesus Kiris ɓisuu win mìni ɓɛ ɓì yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n mɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋzì Bɛ̀ll. 
I ɓì ɓaghà lɛ ɓi wog di ɓɛɛ̀ kakali geesɛ̀n ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rèsìghà mɛ̀ lɛ ǹɗoòzi rìyitì ɗi à ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ ɓi san wìn. 
Mɛ̀ n-yii fèg à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a rìnyam fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ màa fèèghrɛɛ mìni kì còŋi lɛsàg lɛ nnyɛɛ resii mɛ̀ fèg ànɛn. 
I ɓì ɓàli gàɓ ì ɓìɓan inɛ màa kàni, ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ghɛn lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹ-yii ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam ɓi ɓi seesee Kiris. 
Bɛ̀ll à rèsìghà ɓi gbàà yi ɓum yi abɛ̀y ɓìɓan ɓi a rìnyam ɓìn yɛ̀ɛ à mɛ rèsi ɓyɔ ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, rì a ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn rì a ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ti girig ɗì gàɓ ɓi ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll à nyamgà ɓisuu ɓum ɓii, ɓɛ ɓa ɓìkàɓ ɓi nyoo bog, ɓɛ ki ɓa girig ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi nkàg wu Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓi Yeesus Kiris lɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, 
ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ miì lɛ rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à faghà mɛ̀ ìtèɗ wii, ɓi geesɛ̀n yìì. 
Mɛ̀ ànɛ ǹɗì tìì-kìtòn a zɛy ànɛ ɓi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm, mɛ̀ɛ nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà geesɛ̀n ìnɛ lɛ nghagsi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ ɓi kìrɔɔ ki ki ri ɓi Kiris, ki ɓum ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ wog, a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. 
Lɛ nɗesi ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll a rooroòzì fèg wìì anɛ a maà ɓa ǹnyamɛn, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à kìghà ɓyom ɓìcèm, nnyaà nyamnyàm fèg ànɛ̀n nyimiɗ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ɓɛ̀làmì, rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, ɓɛ yii ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm lɛ kìseŋi ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n. 
Bɛ̀ll à kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìyitì ɗi a maa ɓa rì ɗyɔ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɗi ri; ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi à roòzìghà rì Yeesus Kiris à Kan wìs. 
Ɓi nyi, bee i rì ɓìsi kìkpaŋ lɛ ti kɛǹ Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog rì ntyweeyi ɓi nɗem lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi tì gherɛɛ nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ: mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ nwowog ɓisu win mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fa mini ìɓwɛɗ; mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n mɛ ri ɓisuu rikem ɗin.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki m̀ɓaagh mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi ɓi mis mɛ Tààta, 
ànɛ naa yi ɓum yìcèm lɛ rì yi aɗyoo rì yi ɓi ziinɛ, yɛɛ̀ fuughag yi a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Ǹtɔg nyi lɛ a fa mìni Nghay wìì lɛ a foŋ mìni ìteɗ ɓi nɗem, 
di fɔɔnnɛ Kiris a kɔri ɓi mɛ̀rem min lɛ rìgherɛ̀n. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì kìi lɛ, ɓì ròò gàŋ, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛnyìsɛn ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm; 
fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓiì yii ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀cèm lèg ànɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Kiris à kìi lɛ: à fùùrɛ̀n, à ràɓ, à rim, à ki teŋmɛn, 
rì tì lɛ, ɓi yi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Kiris ànɛ̀n, ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ tɔɔnɛ̀n kì yiì; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀ronɛn syeesyee à rìron ɗì rìɓa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à rì nɗonɛn.
Nni roànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à kì ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi tì rì lɛ tì tɔg, nsoò lɛ tì fèg, à ceesàg kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg rì ìtèɗ wu wɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ɓi ɓìsi, 
nnyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì rìkem ɓi kìseŋi ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n, rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓi gbàà yi ɓum yìcèm, à kpaŋ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ri fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ ànɛ ǹɗì kìmbùŋ lɛ ǹsàsay Kan, ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, ghɛɓina rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ǹɗeèghreŋi wu wu kpagà a lɔ̀ŋkin, 
sɛɛ̀diinà mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi, ɓì kɔ̀rì lɛ fyòoog, ɓì ɓa rì kìnìri ki nɗem, ɓì cenɛ̀n lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓin lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri, ɓɔ girig ɓɛ ki fɔlɔɔ ɓi san wìn, rìkì ɗiǹ ɗìcèm ɗi ɓa ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm; 
ɓì tèètèèsì nyoo lɛ ɓi ɓeŋ rìɓa ɗi kibyɔg kìfog ɗi ɓi mɛ̀ghay rì fyòoog ànɛ à ràri mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Nyoo ì rì lɔŋ bog, Nghay lɔŋ bog, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì rì girig ɓɛ̀ reŋiyɛn lɛ ɓi ɓa rì dyàɓɛn bog, yɛ̀ɛ ri dyàɓɛn inɛ ɓi nɗeèghreŋi win. 
Kan à rì lɔŋ bog, rìgherɛ̀n ɗifog, bàɓtis bog, 
Bɛ̀ll bog, nnyɛɛ ri Seŋi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à làmii ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, à kìkì kìsay ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ki ɓa ɓi ɓɔɔ̀cèm.
Wɔ̀lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓìsi à tekà bimiɗ à rìfa ɓi lèg ànɛ Kiris à faghà nyi. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ri kì kaliyɛn lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ à ɓɔkà ɓi jàŋ yi yi teŋmaagh, à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓìmbùŋ, à fa ɓum ɓyom.
Rìkpaa ɗi lɛ à ɓɔkà ɗi resii cɛ? Ɗi resii lɛ à sɛngà ɓi kìrimi ki zi. 
Roànɛ à sɛngày, nnyɛɛ ri girig roànɛ à ɓɔkà aɗyoo ɗi ɗi teŋmɛɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg, lɛ di a ron ɓi ɓyom ɓìcèm. 
Nnyɛɛ faghà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀kalì-Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀pàstɛɛ̀rì nsoò lɛ ɓɛ̀rèsàg. 
À kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ di ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ tɔɔ̀ ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wu ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ki kìsay ɓi rìtoŋ ɗi nyoo ì Kiris. 
À kɛ̀n kì kpaŋì ɓi jàŋ inɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗis, rì rìyi ɗi tì yii Man à Bɛ̀ll, ɓyɛɛ ɓa com kìfog di tì mɛ sììrɛn ɓum, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à ǹɗɛli a Kiris. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tyàa ɓa ti ɓi ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ goo, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ rì rìkuu ɗi dɔgtɛ̀n ɗiǹ miì ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì, ɓum ɓɛ yeèghyègsì ɓɔ lɛ rì momzɛ̀n maa, rì mɛ̀ghèy mɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ syogì ɓum miì ɓi rìnàn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, i ti kakali saaɗ rì ǹɗem wu nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, tì ɓiì tɔɔtɔɔ ɓɛɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi Kiris ànɛ à rì nto. 
Lɛ nyi nnɛ nyoo bimiɗ ì ti ì kìlàg lɛ, ì tɔɔ, ì ki toŋɗɛn yɔ̀miɗ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm lèg ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓìkàɓ ɓi miì ɓìcèm; nyoo ìnɛ̀n ì rì ǹwògakɛn lɛ syeesyee ì ki ɓa nɗàrakɛn lɛ kpeg kpeg rì gòga yìcèm yi ì rì rì yɔ̀.
Kìɓan ki mɛ̀ ǹkalii, ǹki sììrɛn ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan kɛɛ̀ki lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛɓti yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ zɛy ɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n, ɓɔ yɛɛ ti ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tàg ɓɔɔ momzɛ̀n ɓaa ɓɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu. 
Ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗyaa ɗi ri ɗì sigtɛn birìm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yin ri gàɓ ɓi cɛɓ ki Bɛ̀ll lɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìyi wàà, rì rìɓa ɗi mɛ̀rem maa mɛ ri mɛ̀ tèrɛn. 
Ɓɛ yiìdi ri ǹtoòrìɗ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ mɛ ɗiŋi ɓi kìɓùùsì, ɓɛ kɛǹ ɓiì kìkii ɓiɓan ɓi tifin, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìmin, ɓɛ ɓutɛ̀n tì zày ì ìkum miì. 
Ɓi san ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin, àa fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìnii yilàkà Kiris; 
di ɓì ki wokà di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa kiɓan kii, ki ki ɓa lɛ nyi nnɛ ɓɛ resìghà mìni, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ ànɛ ɓi Yeesus à rì. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rinii fiɗyàɓ fin fi riɓa fi ɓi cɛɓ ki ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà abɛ̀y, ɓìɓan ɓi ǹɗem wu mum wu ti wu kɔngì ɓi rìɓa ɗi yɛ̀ɛ ɗiǹ, ɓi ri rì ǹ-yègsɛ̀n, ɓi ki ɓa ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi yogsì mum. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓɛ̀nyɔɔnyɔn ɓɛ ɓum lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀rem min, rì ɓi mɛ̀yitì min. 
Ɓì waatɛ̀n nyɔɔnyɔn à rìɓa ànɛ à rì ǹkìyɛn ɓi kìpisɛn ki Bɛ̀ll, rìɓa ɗìn ɗi resɛ̀n ɓi cɛɓ ki nkpaà rì ki tɛnɛn, ki ki fuu yì ɓi saaɗ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki càrina pwàà, mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni a kalag geni kìɓan yɛ̀ɛ ki ri, ɓisuulɛ, ɓìsiìcèm tì rì ɓìkàɓ ɓi ɓi nyoo bogtɛ̀n. 
I ɓì woogh bim, ɓì konàg lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi kì kiɓe; ŋwos kɛ̀ɛ màg ɓilɛy di bim yiǹ ì kaka. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi nɛm Satàn ikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ŋwaànɛ àa nti à fyaasàg ɓyom, à lèg ɓi wii, kìɓan kifog, a teki ntɔɓ lɛ a say rì ɓyàg ɓii yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, fɔɔnnɛ a ɓa rì com ki à rì lɛ à ghɛɓsì soghàsogha ri kɔ̀. 
Ŋwɔm win wu ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki kpaà kìɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn, wɔ̀lɛ i ki kpaŋi lɛ ɓi toòghrɛn, jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìn i ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì lɛ ì fa ìtèɗ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ì ki ɓa ri ǹghɛɓsɛn ɓisuu ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ woogh yɔ̀. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi kì lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki Bɛ̀ll à rèmzàkà mìni rì kɔ ɓisuu ŋwos anɛ gòri yìì ì ri ɓa, kɛ̀ɛ wog bim. 
À tumɛɛ lɛ kìmìighmigtɛ̀n, kìnyɛn, bim, kìyoòyòò, mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, rì rìgɛn mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì lèegh ɓi nyìinyìm wìn. 
Ɓaana rì nɗem wu geesɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓì yi rìghɛn ɗi ɓɛro ɓɛmbog nyìighnyìg. Ɓaana rì rìcenɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wiǹ, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à cenɛ̀ngà mìni ɓi Kiris.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ nɗem, tèèsiina nyoo lɛ ɓi nɔɔ̀ti kìfèèghrɛnà kii. 
Ɓì kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à rèsìghà ɓìsi, à fa cɛɓ kii ɓisu wis, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ com ki ŋwaà à faa, nsoò lɛ kìtuwe ki ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll; ɓyom ɓìn ɓi ɓa rì syeesyee à kìnùbe.
Tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm, rì zày ì ìkum, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ ɓi ɓuŋɗɛ̀n nsoò m̀ɓùŋɗɛn ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ ɓi kpaakpaa ɓìɓan ɓi ǹtoòrìɗ, rì ɓìdìmìdimi ɓi ɓiɓan, rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓiyèg. Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ lɛ ɓi fafa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n. 
Konaaghna kì yiì lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, nsoò lɛ ǹkìì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin, nsoò lɛ ànɛ à rì rì zày ì ìkum, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ mɓɔgsì ɓìnùn, à yin ɗi gàɓ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Kiris, rì ki Bɛ̀ll. 
Mum kɛ̀ɛ yègsi mini rì ɓìtòkì ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀-su lɛ ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓiǹ innɛ bim i Bɛ̀ll ì rì ɓiì sɛni ɓi ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ǹtoòtèɗ. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓutɛn ri ɓɔ ɓi kìɓan kidɛŋ nsoò kìfog.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì ɓaghà ɓumɓɛ ɓi birìm abɛ̀y, nni ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì ti kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi Kan ɓi ɗùm. Nni ghɛɓina min yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn. 
Kìtɛɛtɛn kìn kɛɛ ti ki falàg ɓum ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ rɔɔtɛn nɗem ɓɛ ɓa ɓumɓɛ nkpaà, ɓɛ ki ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa saaɗ. 
Yiina rìghasì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ rɔɔghi Kan. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓasɛn ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki ɓiɓan ɓi birìm, ɓi ɓi ghɛɓsii ɓi com. Lɔŋ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpàkii ɓyɔ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn; 
ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ kìki a rìnyam ɓi kilɛɛ ǹtoòrìɗ, nsoò ɓi rìkpaakpàà. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i ɓɛ mɛ kpàki ɓiɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, ɓi konag kì ghɛnɛɛ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, lɛ com kìcèm ki ki mɛ kpagi dan, ki ti ɓi kìtɛɛtɛ̀n. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ki ri kì kaliyɛn lɛ: Wɔ̀ ŋwaànɛ u lalày, ghèmɓɛn ɓi fìlo pɛ̀sɛn yì aɗyoo ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìloŋ, di Kiris a lom̀ wɔ̀ kìtɛɛtɛn.
Ɓì konag kì fiɓii righɛghɛ̀ɓ ɗin lɛ syeesyee; kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìyèg, ghɛɓina lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ɗyomzɛ̀n. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi yogsi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì rì rì kɔ zɛy rì zɛy, lɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ tì rì mɛ miì mɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ɓì. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà ɓìdùŋdùŋ ɓi ɓum, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓi yi cɛ kɛɛ̀ki Kan a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ŋwagi mɛrɔ̀g lɛ fɔlɔɔ a ti à syògìì cɛɓ ki ɓùùɓuu; kìɓan kifog, ɓaana ɓɛ̀ronɛn ri Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Ɓì kuùkùrɛ̀n rì ɓɛ̀sam, rì mɛ̀ɓàlì, rì tyem ti Bɛ̀ll; ghàɓina mɛ̀ɓàlì lɛ ɓi ɓɔgsi Kan, rì mɛ̀rem min mɛcèm. 
Ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, faana Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓaana rì mɛ̀wog ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ɓisuu rinìŋ ɗi ɓì ti ɓì nìgì Kiris. 
Mìni ɓɛ̀yiɓ, kìina ɓɛ̀yii ɓin mɛwog yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ti ɓì kìlàg Kan. 
Ɓisuulɛ, baŋì ì làmii giɓ wiì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à làmii kìseŋi kìì; nyimiɗ yɛɛ ti ǹghɛɓsì à kìseŋi ki ki ri nyoo yìì. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìseŋi ki ti ki kilàg Kiris mɛ̀wog, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì woògh ɓɛ̀yii ɓaa ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm.
Mìni ɓɛ̀baŋì, keesiina ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓin fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à keesìghà Kìseŋi kii à fa cɛɓ kii lɛ kɔ. 
À kìghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ di Kìseŋi kii kɛɛ ɓa kìtɛnɛn; lɛ à tɛɛ̀zìghà kɔ lɛ rì mɛ̀nig rì jɛ̀ɛ̀; 
à kɔ̀ngà lɛ Kìseŋi kìn kɛɛ kpaŋ ɓi mis mii ɗi rìkem, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin, nsoò fìrun, nsoò kìɓeɓtàg ki kiɓan kidɛŋ. Wɔ̀lɛ ki kɔngà nyi lɛ Kìseŋi kìn kɛɛ ɓa kìtɛnɛn kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ fen miì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì keesii ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓaa yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔmiɗ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ à keesii giɓ wiì, à keesii nyimìɗ. 
Ɓisuulɛ mum à ka ɓeèzɛ̀ngà ɓi nyoo yìì i nyimìɗ; lɔŋ à ti à mɛnàg yɔ̀, à ki ɓèŋɓeŋ yɔ̀ lɛ syeesyee fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ti à ɓègì Kìseŋi kii. 
Lɛ ɓì rì ɓìkàɓ ɓi ɓi nyoo yìì. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki baŋì ì ɓiì càriì lɛ rì seŋi rì jɛɛ, ì ràrɛ̀n ɗì giɓ wiì, kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum kìn ki ghay mum bog. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki ri gɛn à kìɓan ànɛ à rimi; mɛ̀ ǹkpaa fɔlɔɔ ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris rì kìseŋi kìì. 
Kaa soo rì la, mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni a keesi giɓ wiì yɛ̀ɛ nyimìɗ, giɓ bimiɗ à kì yii mɛ̀wog.
Mìni ɓɔɓti, kìina ɓɛ̀yalì ɓin mɛwog yɛ̀ɛ Kan a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n ɓisuulɛ fɔlɔɔ a ri lɛ saaɗ. 
Nyaasi soŋi ɓɛɛ̀ gaa, à rì kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki ǹtonto ki ǹkàg wu riì miì wù foŋɛn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ù ɓiì ɓa rì kìrɔɔ, ù ki finɛn ɓi ziinɛ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Mìni ɓɛ̀seŋi, kɛ̀ ɓi nyɛɛ̀zag ɓɔn ɓin, kìɓan kifog, tɔɔsiina ɓɔ ɓi ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓì fafà ɓɔ deɓ yi yi riì yɛ̀ɛ Kan.
Mìni ɓɛ̀kpàn, kìina ɓɛ̀masà ɓin ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀mùù mɛ̀wog, ɓì nìgì ɓɔ, ɓì fafà ɓɔ bɔgsɛ̀n, rì syeesyee à nɗem lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris innɛ ɓi kìki kisay. 
Syeesyee wìn a rìkì ɗi ɓiɓan kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ seesee mini, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ ɓi kaakaa lɛ ɓi puɓsi ɓɔ mɛ̀rem; a ɓa lɔŋ lɛ ɓi kìki rikɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll rì nɗem win wucèm lɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ Kiris. 
Kìina ɓɔ kìsay ri syeesyee à nɗem, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan innɛ ɓi kìki kisay àa ɓum. 
Ɓì yi lɛ, nsoò ǹkpàn, nsoò ŋwaànɛ à yin ǹkpàn, mum ǹcèm à rì ɓiì terì mɛ̀lèɓ yɛ̀ɛ Kan ɓi syeesyee wìì a rìkì.
Mìni ɓɛ̀masà, ghɛɓina girig fɔlɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓin, kɛ̀ ɓi tamtam ɓɔ; ɓì yitì lɛ rì mìni rì ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓin ɓì rì lɔŋ Masà bog ànɛ à rì aɗyoo; nyii yin ɗi nlànag ɓi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ.
Ǹsyɔɔdii ɓìtòkì ɓyɛm̀ lɛ: Kaana ìtèɗ win ɓi rìràrɛ̀n ɗi rì Kan, rì ɓi coo itèɗ wii. 
Ɓanɛɛna ɓyom ɓi ribaŋì ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓìcèm di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓa rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓì yag mɛ̀ghèy mɛ Satàn. 
Ɓisuulɛ àa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì bwaɓ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ti ɗùùɗuu ri ɓɔ; ti ɗùùɗuu lɔŋ ri mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓi ri ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ làlàmì, ɓi ɓa rì ìtèɗ; ti ɗùùɗuu girig rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ làlami ziì ì birìm ìnɛ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wotii ɓyom ɓi ribaŋì ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓìcèm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓa rì ìtèɗ wu cenɛn wɛ̀y, yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos a m̀ɓeɓɛn a ri kpaŋ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri ɓa lɛ, i ɓyàa cee ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓì rɔ̀ɓ mɛ̀rɛy. 
Sììrɛɛna min: Ɓì sìnɛ̀n saaɗ ɓi kìɓon ɓi sìg à kànɗa; ɓì waatɛ̀n ǹkpaà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà ki bɔŋ. 
Terina rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìghagsì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à fyòoog, ɓì waatɛ̀n ɗyɔ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ gòò. 
Terina lɔŋ righerɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ gàŋ ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ghɛɓsi mìni lɛ ɓi ɓuɓsi ɗuu ɗi tigɛnì ti ghèghey tìcèm ti ti riì rì ǹɗòò. 
Terina girig gòri ì Bɛ̀ll ɓi sìg à tàm, ɓì teɗ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ìrì gàfàg ì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Ɓɔ̀ŋziina Bɛ̀ll cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ri Nghay, ɓì tɔtɔ̀g nyi ǹghɛɓsɛn ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yin yicèm; ɓaana cem ɓi rìkì ɗiǹ, ɓì ki sììrɛn miì lɛ syeesyee, ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm; 
ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wɛ̀m lɛ, a fa mɛ̀ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹghagsi, rì kìghɛɛsii cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki m̀pinii ŋwɔm lɛ nɗesi ɓum kìɓan ki ki ri kì nyamɛn ɓi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n innɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ɓi fìtom fi miì, ǹki ɓa ɓi naà-zày lɛ nyi; nni ɓɔ̀ŋzaaghna lɛ nkakali Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n lɛ cààcàà yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpaakpaa.
Tisig, maaseŋi wìs a nɗem, ànɛ a kìki Kan kìsay ri ǹtyweeyi, à rì mìni ɓiì rèsii ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi seesee cɛɓ kɛ̀m, lɛ ɓi yi com ki nkìki ɓigomìnɛ. 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ɓekii lɛ nɗom yì nyi a lɔ̀ŋkin lɛ ɓi yi ǹɗɛli wis wu tì rì miì ɓigomìnɛ, à ki fɔɔsi mini mɛ̀rem. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs, ɓɛɛ̀ Kan Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ̀cèm fyòoog, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, bas ɗì rìgherɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ keesii Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à yin lɛ à ɗyoŋ.
Ɓìsi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Yeesus Kiris lɛ rì Pol, rì Timote, tì kàni ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀ ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi bàn ì Filiɓ, rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì ɓaa rì ɓɛ̀dyaakìrɛ̀. 
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs rì Kan Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa mìni lɛ rì geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog.
Cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ǹ-yitii mìni, ǹti falàg Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m ɓìtògsɛ̀n. 
Ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yìcèm yi nkìki ɓisu win ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, ǹti m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg rì kìnyàà, 
ɓisuu gàɓ ìnɛ ɓì mɛ teɗ ɓi rìsààtì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, à tumɛ̀n ŋwos a ǹtonto, à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ. 
Ǹ-yii syeesyee à rìyi lɛ roànɛ à tumɛ̀ngà syeesyee à kìsay anɛ̀n ɓi mìni, à rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ri kɔ asu à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ à ri wɔmɓɛn kɔ ɓi ŋwos a Yeesus Kiris. 
Ki wooghrɛɛ gì lɛ mɓa rì mekuu mɛ mɛyitì mɛ fɔlɔɔ ɓi san wìn, ɓisuulɛ ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓi nɗem, rì tì lɛ, nsoò cààmɛ̀n ki ǹɗì ɓi naà-zày, nsoò cààmɛ̀n ki ǹɗì ɓidan nkàakamɛ̀n ǹki sìisiìràg Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, mìniìcèm ɓì ti ɓì tekì gàɓ ɓi geesɛ̀n ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà mɛ̀. 
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì mɛ̀ wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ, ǹkeesii mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm rì syeesyee à ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Yeesus Kiris. 
Com ki mɛ̀ɛ ntɔtɔg Bɛ̀ll ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛm̀ ki ri lɛ, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìn a kɛn asu à tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓi rìyi ɗi ɓiɓan, rì ɓi syeesyee à rìwog, 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓiì yiì rìghasì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri rì gɛɓsɛ̀n, ɓì ki ɓa mɛrem lɛ sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ɓɛy mìni miì ŋwos a Kiris; 
ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛronɛn rì mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ saaɗ mɛ mɛ ti mɛ ghɛnàg a lɔ̀ŋkis lɛ Yeesus Kiris ɓisuu rikem, ɗì rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ki kɔni mɛ̀ lɛ di ɓyàa yii lɛ, kìɓan ki ki nkìi mɛ̀, ki nghɛɓsii kɔm̀ lɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ a kɛɛ̀di beèbɛ̀y. 
Lɛ ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi gari ì rìfòm, rì jàŋ yimbog yìcèm ɓɛ yii lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ ǹɗì ɓi naà-zày lɛ ǹɗì nkìì-kìsay a Kiris. 
Ntyweeyi wu mɛ yùti ɓɛgeni ɓɛ̀m lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi Kan, lɛ naà-zày ìnɛ ǹkɛ̀ngà; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ti rì kìghɛɛsii ki ki cee lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaàghàgsì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris.
Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ làalam̀ɓɛ̀n Kiris rì ǹɗem wu yàaka ki ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi ǹlog rì mɛ̀, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ làalamɓɛ̀n nyi rì ǹɗem wu sɛɛghi sɛɛghi. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rɛsìghà mɛ̀ lɛ nkaàkàmɛ̀n rì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ yin ɓiì làalam̀ɓɛ̀n Kiris rì ǹɗem wu sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay kiǹ rì ǹɗem wulɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi nlog, ɓɛ fekì lɛ, ɓɛɛ̀ foofoŋdì mɛ̀ ǹtɔɓ ɓi naà-zày ìnɛ ǹɗì miì. 
Ki kii ɓi mɛ com. Nsoò mɛ̀yitì maa maa ɓeɓtɛɛ, nsoò maa rɔɔtɛɛ, kìɓan ki ki ri miì ki ri lɛ, ɓɛɛ̀ làalam̀ɓɛ̀n Kiris; mɛ̀ nki wowog kirɔɔ fɔlɔɔ, ǹɗì ɓiì ki kɛ̀nkɛni asu ǹwowòg kìrɔɔ, 
ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yii lɛ, kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ ɓi bee inɛ lɛ mɛ̀ ǹghɛɓ lɛ bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yin, rì ǹghɛɓsɛn wu Ǹghay à Yeesus Kiris à ti à yùlàg rì wɔ. 
Lèg ànɛ ǹɗì rì coo zày, ǹki ɓa ri dyàɓɛn, màa wog ɓi ntoòrìɗ ri com kidɛŋ. Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓimbog, rì ǹtyweeyi wu wu ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ronì ɓi nɗem, Kiris à ɓiì kemì ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m, màa soo rì cem, màa soo wìì. 
Ɓisuulɛ Kiris à rì cɛɓ kɛ̀m, fɔɔnnɛ rìwu ɗi ri mɛ̀ rì kɔ̀misɔ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i rìɓaɓà ɗi cem ɓi mɛ̀mùù ɗi ri lɛ ɗi ɓa rì gɛɓsɛ̀n lɛ nki kìsay, com ki ǹɗì lɛ mɓɔ̀n ki yag mɛ̀. 
Ǹɗì mɛ̀rem mɛɓɛɛ̀; ǹɗem wu lɛ di màa kɛ̀ɛ, ti kɔkɔri ɗì Kiris, kìɓan kiǹ ki ki rɔɔtɛn ki cee. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ki pɔɔ̀zii mìni kì ɓaà rì gɛɓsɛ̀n lɛ mɛ̀ nka ghɛghɛɓ. 
Nɗem wɛ̀m wùcèm wu gherɛɛ kìɓan kiǹ lɛ ǹ-yii lɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ka ghɛghɛɓi ǹki kɔ̀ri mìniìcèm jàŋbog lɛ ɓi tɔɔ̀, ɓì ki nyààrɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓi ɗùm. 
Rìsugtìì ɗi mɓiì sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɗi ri mìni ɓiì faà coo nyɔɔnyɔn à kìɓan anɛ ɓi rì lɛ ɓì sànsàm miì ɓi Kiris ɓi ɗùm, lɛ mɛ̀.
Kìɓan kifog, ghɛɓina rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì Syeesyee a Ɓɔlɛ à Kiris ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ nsoò màa yùu mìni kì ghɛɛ̀, nsoò lɛ màa rì mìni fìràɓ, ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ɓì rì lɔŋ ɓɛsììrɛn, ɓì ɓa ɓɛ̀fèg ɓɛ̀fog, ɓi ki ɗùùɗuu nɗem wùfog ɓisuu ǹtyweeyi wu wu ri ɓi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɛɛ niŋzi mìni nyoo nsoò lɛsàg; kìɓan kiǹ ki ri kìrèmzɛnà ki lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓi rìɗyaŋ; wɔ̀lɛ ɓi san wìn, ki ɓa kìrèmzɛnà ki cɛɓ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓisuulɛ àa mààgh ànɛ lɛ ɓi gherɛn Kiris nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà mìni nyi rì nyi, ànɛ lɛ ɓi wog girig mɛ̀tɔɓ ɓisu wii, à rì girig miì. 
Kɛɛ̀ki ɓi ɗùùɗuu zàà ìnɛ ɓì ghɛngà mɛ̀ di nɗùùɗùù, ìnɛ ɓì ki yii lɛ ǹkaka ǹɗùùɗùù à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ.
I ǹtyweeyi wu yɛ̀ɛ Kiris wu ki rì lɛ wu fɔɔsì mum ǹɗem, i rìfalɛ̀n ɗi itèɗ ɓi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɗi ki rì wɔɔ, i rìràrɛ̀n ɗi rì Nghay ɗi ri wɔɔ, i ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg wu geesɛ̀n wu ri lɛ wu ɓa wɔɔ, 
kìina lɛ kìnyàà kɛɛ ron mɛ̀ nɗem, di ɓì ɓaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog. Ɓaana rì rìkuu ɗi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɗìfog, ɓì ɓa ǹɗem wufog, ɓì ki ɓa ti ɓɛfèg ɓɛ̀fog. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi kì kiɓan kidɛŋ rì ǹɗem wu kalɛn nsoò lɛ ɓisuu rikem ɗi kɛ̀ɛ̀-su. Wɔ̀lɛ sɛɛ̀dɛɛna mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi, ɓì teɗ ɓum ɓɛmbog fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ceeghii mìni. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni kɛ̀ɛ yiti lɔŋ lɛ kìrɔɔ kii ki nyimiɗ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì yitii kirɔɔ ki ɓɛro ɓɛm̀bog. 
Ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓaana rì mɛ̀yitì mɛ Yeesus Kiris à ɓaghà rì mɔ.
Nyi ànɛ à ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, à ghɛngà ɓi lɛ rìɓa ɗi lɛ, rì nyi rì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛɛ ɓa ǹɗɛli wufog, ɗi ri com ki à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sɔrii ɓi-tèɗ; 
wɔ̀lɛ à kòrìghà rìɓa ɗii ɗiǹ ɗìcèm à teɗ rìɓa ɗi ǹkìì-kìsay; à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ɓi kìpisɛn ki ɓum; à rèsɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ zɛy rì zɛy à mum, 
à sɛɛ̀dɛ̀n nyimiɗ ɓi zi à ki ɓa ri mɛ̀wog à kpaŋ a rìwu; rìwu ɗincèm lɛ ɗi ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyòò. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ ki Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔgsìghà nyi ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu wu teŋmɛɛ wu cee mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ̀cèm à ki fa nyi ɗii ɗi ɗi laŋi mii mɛ̀cèm 
lɛ di ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ aɗyoo, rì ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi ziinɛ, rì ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi zi ɓiɗùm, ɓyɛɛ ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, ɓi ɓɔgsì ɗii ɗi Yeesus, 
ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ki làmɓɛ̀n ɓi myɔm maa lɛ Yeesus Kiris à rì Kan ɓi rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll Seŋì.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ, mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem ɓɛ ɓyàa kìkì mɛ̀ mɛ̀wog, mɛ̀wog min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sugtɛn lɔŋ lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ǹɗì mìni jàŋbog, wɔ̀lɛ mɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛnɛɛ ti à cee fɔlɔɔ, cààmɛ̀n ki ǹɗì mìni ki fìràɓ. Salina ɓisuu gòri yìn, rì coo bɔgsɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll nnyɛɛ kìki kisay ɓi mìni, à fafà mìni lɛ rì ǹɗem, rì ìtèɗ wu kìyen ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì syeesyee wìì a ɗyomzɛ̀n. 
Com kìcèm ki ɓì rì lɛ ɓì kì, kìina kɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìrùrùmì nsoò lɛ tìkàna 
di fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛtɛnɛn, ɓì ɓa ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓeɓtàg ki kiɓan kidɛŋ ɓi nyìinyìm à gbàà ì ɓum ìnɛ ì rì ɓìɗyoŋi ì ki ɓa ti ɓɛ̀ɓèèɓeè; ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìlònlomi ɓi nyìinyìm wàà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tyɔɛy, 
ɓì rèrèsì ɓɔ ɓɔlɛ à cɛɓ; kìɓan kiǹ ki ri mɛ̀ ɓiì ɓaà kìɓan ki nkeŋkem miì ɓi ŋwos a Kiris, ki ki rèsi lɛ ǹkpuùkpùtɛ̀ngà ɓi, kɛ̀ɛ nki ɗiɗig mɛtɔɓ zɛy. 
Wɔ̀lɛ nsoò bwaɓ yɛm̀ yaa ki kpaŋì ɓi sìg à com ki ɓɛ funɛɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ yɛɛ ɓɔɓtɛn ɓi rìfa ɗi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll rì ɗyɔ, fɔlɔɔ a fa lɔŋ mɛ kìnyàà, ǹki nyààrɛn ǹɗaŋ ri mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Mìni girig, nyààrɛɛna, ɓì ki nyààrɛn ǹɗaŋ ri mɛ̀.
Ǹɗì rì dyàɓɛn ɓi Kan Yeesus, lɛ cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ǹɗì ɓiì romìì Timote a lɔ̀ŋkin, lɛ di ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓin ɓɛ ǹɗì ɓiì terì ɓɛɛ foŋdi mɛ̀ ìtèɗ ɓi nɗem; 
ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yin ɗi ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ tì rì mɛ̀yitì mɛ̀fog rì nyi, ànɛ à rì lɛ à ghɛ̀ghɛ̀rì lòo ǹɗem aɗyòò ɗì rìɓa ɗin. 
Lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ̀ kaakaa lɔŋ kirɔɔ kaa ki ɓɔmiɗ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kaa ki Yeesus Kiris. 
Ɓì yii lɛ Timote à mɛ fa ɓirèmzɛnà ɓi ɓi resii lɛ à rì mum à ǹtyweeyi; ɓì yi girig lèg ànɛ à falɛ̀ngà ɓi kìsay ki Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ǹɗaŋ ri mɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ man ànɛ à rì seŋi a mɛ̀kòò. 
Nyi nnɛ nfèfeg lɛ nɗom̀ yì mìni, di m̀manɛɛ kì yiì rìsyɔn ɗi kiɓan kɛm̀ lɛ syeesyee. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi ri Kan lɛ cààmɛ̀n lesàg mɛ̀ɛmiɗ. Nkpaŋ lɔŋ foo.
Mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ mpɛɛziì mìni kì romìì Epafirodit à geni wɛ̀m ànɛ ti kiki kisay ri nyi, tì ɗùùɗùù ǹɗaŋ ri nyi; rì nyi innɛ ɓìi nɗomiì mɛ̀ nghɛɓsɛn ɓisuu ɓyom ɓi ɓi nkaakààrɛ̀n mɛ̀. 
Àa ǹɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ di àa ghɛɛ̀daagh mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, wɔ̀lɛ kìɓan ki ki ǹ-yeesii nyi lɛɛ̀gweey, ki ǹɗì kiɓan ki ɓɔlɛ à fìroɓ fii anɛ ɓìi nteri foo. 
Ki ri lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ lɛ, àa nɗoɓi yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, à ɓosɛ̀n rìwu, kìɓan kifog Bɛ̀ll àa nwoogh nyi nyìighnyìg, nni àa nyi cɛ̀ncii innɛ Bɛ̀ll àa nwoogh nyìighnyìg, àa nwoogh girig mɛ̀ nyìighnyìg, lɛ kɛ̀ɛ mɓa lɛ, mɛ̀ ɓi ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn abɛ̀y, wudɛŋ, wu yu tì kì ɓɔɓtɛɛ ɓi wiǹ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹfyaŋzii yì mìni kì romìì nyi mɛ̀ree rì mɛ̀ree lɛ, ɓi woòg kìrɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì rì nyi ɓiì ghɛɛdii, ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn wu ǹɗì rì wɔ, wu ghaɓɓɛ̀n. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min lɛ ɓì ghàɓ nyi rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìnyàà ànɛ ɓi Kan ɓi ɗùm, ɓì ki nyaasag rikuu ɗi ɓum ɗi yɛ̀ɛ nyi. 
Ɓisuulɛ, àa m̀mɛɛ̀ wu lɛ kìsay ki Kiris, àa mmɛ̀ɛ ɗimzi cɛɓ kii, lɛ a yu mɛ̀ rì ǹghɛɓsɛn wu ɓìi n-yin lɛ ɓì yù rì wɔ mìniìɓɔmiɗ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì nyàànyaa ɓi Kan ɓiɗùm; ki yeesii ɓi mɛ nsoò lɛsàg lɛ mɓiìti mìni kìkàni ɓiɓan ɓi m̀mɛ ka kàn mini abɛ̀y; rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi ri ɓi kìrɔɔ kin.
Ɓi konàg rì bu, ɓì konàg rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, ɓì ki konag ti rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀rɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋ̀ ɓɛ̀ro ɓum. 
Lɛ ɓìsi yɛɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ kɛ̀rɛn syeesyee à kɛ̀rɛ̀n lɛ ɓìsi yɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll rì Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll, tì saàsànɛ̀n ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓi ɗùm, tyɛ̀ ki ki foŋ ntyweeyi wis ɓi kìɓan ki mɛmùù.
Kɔm̀ lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ màa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì foŋì ǹtyweeyi wɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀mùù. I ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ fèki lɛ ɓɛ ri rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛ tyweeyì mɛ̀mùù, gɛ̀n yaŋ ri mɛ̀ 
ànɛ ǹkɛ̀rɛ̀ngà ɓi mɛ̀ru taàraa ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹ-yalɛ̀ngà, mɛ̀ nki rì muu Isirayɛl ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Bɛŋzyamɛŋ, kìyalì ki ɓɛ Ebìreegh. Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna, ǹɗì Fàrìzyɛŋ. 
Bi ɓɛg anɛ a coo rifalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗis, ǹɗì ŋwaànɛ à yeèyèèsìghà kìseŋi ki Kiris. Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a rìɓa ɗi saaɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, com ki ŋwaà rì lɛ à kpaa à ràɗ rì mɛ̀, ki yin. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ɓaghà mɛ̀ rì kɔ̀misɔ̀n, mɛ̀ ǹtekà ɓyɔ lɛ ɓi rì rìɗimzì ɓisuu Kiris. 
Ǹghɛɛ gì lɛ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ri rìɗimzì di ù fèegh ɓyɔ rì coo kirɔɔ ki ki laŋi ɓìrɔɔ ɓìcèm, kìrɔɔ kìn kɛɛ ri rìyi ɗi Yeesus Kiris; ɓisu wii nnɛ ǹgherɛ̀ngà lɛ mmɛm̀ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, fɔɔnnɛ nseesee ɓyom ɓìcèm yɛ̀ɛ ɓyaaɓi ɓi kìkùnkùn lɛ di nfɔǹ Kiris, 
ǹki ɓa lɛ ǹɗì saaɗ à mum ɓi rìràrɛ̀n ɗi rì nyi, saaɗ ànɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ti saaɗ à mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, ànɛ à rèsii lɛ ǹti m̀ɓègì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, à ɓa lɔŋ saaɗ ànɛ mum ànɛ à gherɛɛ Kiris à ti à ɓalàg rì nyi. Saaɗ ànɛ̀n nnyɛɛ fuu yì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, à ki ɓa nto lɛ rìgherɛ̀n. 
Com ki nkɔ̀nkɔ̀n ki ri lɛ: n-yi Kiris, ǹ-yi ìtèɗ wu rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗii, ɗi a ɓìloŋ, ǹteɗ gàɓ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mii, ǹki pisɛn nyi ɓi rìwu ɗi à wughà 
lɛ i bee i ɓaa, mɛ̀ ǹghèmɓɛɛgɛy girig a ɓìloŋ.
Ki yin loo lɛ m̀mɛ kpaŋzɛn mɛ̀ree lɛ nteɗ mɛ̀lèɓ, nsoò lɛ m̀mɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ kìɓan ki ɓɛ feèdì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti. Kìɓan kifog, nka kɛ̀nkɛn lɔŋ asu rì mɛ̀ree, ǹki tèeteèsì nyoo lɛ nkobɛn mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓi mɛ̀ree mɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ Yeesus Kiris à mɛ ɓan mɛ. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ǹ-yin ɗi fèg ànɛ lɛ, m̀mɛ kòbɛn mɛlèɓ, kìɓan kifog, com ki mɛ̀ɛ nkìkì ki ri lɛ, ǹti ǹɗimzàg ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi mɛ rɔ̀ɓ yi mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, mɛ̀ ǹnànàɓ lɔŋ ɓi ɓi ri mɛ̀ beèbɛ̀y. 
Fɔɔnnɛ nghɛghɛŋi lɛ nkɛǹ kìkpaŋzɛɛ, di nteɗ mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓi ǹɗeèghreŋi wu wu ɓaghày mɛ̀ aɗyòò yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓi Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ tì ti ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓi cɛɓ ki ɓi nghay, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìɓaà rì fèg ànɛn; nni i ki kpaŋi lɛ ɓì wooghrɛɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi kìɓan kidɛŋ Bɛ̀ll à rì mìni ɓiì lomi kitɛɛtɛn ɓi kìɓan kiǹ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓì nɗɛli wu tì ti wu miì, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ tì kɛ̀nkɛ̀n lɔŋ asu ǹɗaŋ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, nɔ̀ɔ̀tiina mɛ̀kòò mɛm̀, ɓì seesèè ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì kìfèèghrɛnà kis. 
Maà kakàlì mìni lɛ kìgwey ki ɓum ki ri wɔɔ ki ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓyaa ɓyɛɛ̀ rèrèsi lɛ ɓɛri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeèzɛɛ kɔrɔs à Kiris, m̀ɓììtii mìni kìkalii ɓiɓan ɓiǹ ɓigomìnɛ rì mìsì ɓi mɛ̀tam. 
Rìsyɔn ɗyaa ɗi ri lɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗyaŋì; ɗùm ɗyaa ɗyɛɛ rì ɓɔ bɛ̀ll yàà, com ki kɛɛ̀ sòosoòtì ɓɔ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ foŋi rìkem ɗyaa miì; lɔŋ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓɔɔ̀ fèfèg. 
Ɓi san ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis, kìlɔ̀ŋ kis kɔɔ ri aɗyòò; wɔɔnnɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris à ǹghɛɓsì wìs ànɛ ti ɓoŋɓòŋ à rì ɓiì ɓaà yì. 
Nnyɛɛ ri lɔ̀ghi nyoo yìs inɛ ì rì nyìighnyìg lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓa nyoo ì ǹlònlomɛn yɛ̀ɛ ìnkìì, rì ìtèɗ wu a rì rì wɔ, wɛɛ̀ wu à ti fogì ɓyom ɓìcèm miì ɓi rìlàmì ɗii azi.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ, mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ nɗem ɓɛ ǹɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ di màa ghɛɛdii, ɓì rì lɛ, mìni kìnyàà kɛm̀, mìni rìkem ɗyɛ̀m, kɛ̀ɛna lɔŋ asu, ɓi siìrɛn fɔlɔɔ ɓi Kan, mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem.
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh Evodii, m̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàg tì Sɛ̀ntis, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ǹɗem wùfog ɓi Kan ɓiɗùm. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, wɔ̀ reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m à kìsay ànɛ ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi ri nyi, ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ lɛ, u ghɛɓsi ɓɔ; lɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ɗuùghà ǹɗaŋ ri mɛ̀ ɓi rìsààtì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kilemaŋ rì ɓum ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ tì salà rì ɓɔ ǹɗaŋ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ mii maa mɛ ri mɛ̀kànɛn ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ.
Nyàànyaana lɔŋ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi Kan ɓiɗùm, m̀ɓììtii kìkalii lɛ, nyàànyaana.
Rìɓa ɗin ɗi tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ yi ɗyɔ; Kan à ti jàŋbog ɗì rìyù. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛ̀ri nɗem aɗyòò rì com kidɛŋ, kìɓan kifog, ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, rèsiina Bɛ̀ll cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì rì zày rì kɔ, ɓì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n, ɓì yɛ̀ɛ̀ghyɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg, ɓì ki fafa nyi ɓìtògsɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ fyòoog à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛ wog, à ɓiì ɓèŋi mɛrem min rì mɛ̀yitì min ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓi ɗùm.
Ɓi rìsyɔɔ̀dì, ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! com kìcèm ki ki ri kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à com, kìcèm ki ki ri gìn i com, kìcèm ki ki ri lɛ saaɗ, kìcèm ki ki ri kìtɛnɛn, rì kìcèm ki ki ti ki kɔngì ɓum, rì com kìcèm ki ɓum ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ sɛg, com kìcèm ki ki ri rì ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓì syeesyee ki ki ɓa com ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɗì rìkem, ɓyom ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓyom ɓi ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìfèfeegh ɓi mɛ̀rem min. 
Ɓìɓan ɓi ɓì kìghà lɛ, ɓì yilàg, ɓì teɗ, ɓì ki wog a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, rì ɓi ɓì ghɛngà mɛ̀ di nkìkì, ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi kìkiina. Fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à fyòoog à ɓiì ɓaà rì mìni.
Mɛ̀ɛ nwoogh kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi Kan ɓiɗùm yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛdii rìrèsì ɗi ɓìi ǹɗèsii lɛ ǹɗì mìni ɓi nɗem; ɓìi nɗì lɔŋ ri ǹɗem wu fɔlɔɔ ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m abɛ̀y nni cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓi resi kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ nkaàkààrɛ̀n. 
Ǹ-yin ɓiì kpaakpaa fɔlɔɔ lɛ yɛɛ ǹɗì rì kìsoghà, ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yilàkà yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìnyààrɛɛ ɗi rìɓa ɗìcèm ɗi ǹɗì miì. 
Ǹ-yii rìghɛɓ ɓi kìsowà, ǹki yi righɛɓ ɓi-kum; ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, rì jàŋ bimiɗ ǹ-yilàkà rìghɛɓ ɓi ɗuri, rì ɓi zày; ǹ-yilàg cɛɓ ki ɓi-kum rì cɛɓ ki ɓi kìyɛɓà. 
Ǹɗì lɛ ǹcenɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm rì ìtèɗ wu roànɛ à ti à falàg mɛ̀ ìtèɗ. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ ɓìi nkonaagh kìkìi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìi nteri gàɓ ɓi ntɔɓ wɛ̀m.
Mìni ɓɛ̀Fìlìpyɛŋ! mìniì ɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, ɓi rìtumɛ̀n ɗi rikakàlì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Masedwan Kìseŋì kidɛŋ, ki ghɛɓsìghà ɓi mɛ i ki cee ɓi lɛ kiŋkìn, lɔŋ mìni cɛ̀ncin yɛɛ tekà gàɓ, lɛ rì ɓi rìfɔ̀n rì ɓi rìɗimzì ɗyɛm̀. 
Lɔŋ mìni cɛ̀ncin yɛɛ kìghà kìɓan kiǹ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓaghà di ǹti a Tesalonika, ɓì romgày mɛ̀ com ki kɛɛ ghɛɓsi mɛ̀ ɓi kìyɛɓà kɛm̀ gɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ yiɓɛɛ̀. 
Ki yin lɛ nkaakaa lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ fafa mɛ̀ ɓyom, com ki nkaakàà ki ri lɛ, bimiɗ à kɔ̀misɔ̀n adɛŋ a sagtɛn ɓi ɓirɔɔ ɓin. 
Mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓìi nɗomiì, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì rì ɓyom lɛɛ̀gwey ɓigominɛ ɓi cee gàɓ ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ m̀mɛ teɗ ɓyom ɓi ɓìi nɗomiì mɛ̀ rì Epafirodit; ɓyom ɓiǹ ɓi ri yɛ̀ɛ tìrààre ti ti rɔɔtɛɛ mɛ̀rùù nsoò lɛ kìtuwe ki ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll, Bɛ̀ll à ghàɓ kɔ ki ki rɔɔ nyi. 
Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m à rì mìni ɓiì faà ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kaakaàrɛ̀n mìni, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ìkum wii wu wu ɓɛghɛɛ kìrɔɔ wu ti wu ghɛnàg ɓi Yeesus Kiris. 
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɗì rìkem fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ààmɛ̀n.
Tògsiina ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓi Yeesus Kiris. Ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ righerɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ri fɛ rì mɛ ɓɛ togsii yì mìni. 
Ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ togsii mìni à ɓiisɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓi naa ì Kaaza. 
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì ǹghay wìn.
Mɛ̀ Pol ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris lɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, rì Timote à geni wìs, 
tì kàni ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, rì ɓɔɔseŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓi Kiris ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓum ɓɛ ntyweeyi, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri a Kolos. Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs a fa mìni lɛ rì geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog!
Tì ti tì fafà Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris ɓìtògsɛ̀n, di tì ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll ɓisu win, tyɛ̀ ki fɔy. 
Lɛ tìi nwoogh di ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa lɛ, mìnii ri rì ǹtyweeyi ɓi Yeesus Kiris lɛɛ̀gwey, mìnii ki ɓa ri geesɛ̀n ɓi san ànɛ a ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm, 
ɓisuu dyàɓɛn yiǹ ìnɛ ì ɓoŋɓoŋi mìni aɗyoo. Dyàɓɛn incèm yɛ̀ɛnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìɓan, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ, ì wogsìghà mìni abɛ̀y. 
Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n à kpagà foo a lɔ̀ŋkin fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ a wumwum ɓiɗùn à kɛ̀nkɛ̀n asu ɗì rìsààsàà zi bimiɗ; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ a kìki girig ɓi nyìinyìm wìn à tumɛ̀n ŋwos anɛ ɓì wokà, ɓì ki yi yɛ̀ɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ì rì a tààkaà, 
lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Epafiras ànɛ à rì reŋkàŋ wìs a nɗem ànɛ ti kìki kisay ri nyi à rèsìghà mìni; à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Kiris à ntyweeyi ɓisu wìn. 
À kpaaghà ɓìsi rìkuu ɗi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɗi Ǹghay à faghà mìni. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓìsi girig, à tumɛ̀n ŋwos anɛ tì wokà fɔlɔɔ, tì fɔli ɓi riɓɔ̀ŋzì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɓisu win, tì tɔtɔ̀g lɛ, a roòzi mìni rì rìyi ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi nyi, à fa mìni ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗìcèm, rì syeesyee à rìwog ànɛ ɓi Nghay wìì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ghɛɓina cɛɓ ki kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Kan, ɓì kìkì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi puɓsì nyi nɗem cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. Wumina ɓìɗùn ɓi ɓyɛɛ ghɛnɛn ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ syeesyee mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu, ɓì ki tɔɔtɔɔ ɓi rìyi ɗi ɓì yii Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓaana rì ìtèɗ, ɓɛ̀ɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm, ìtèɗ win wu ɓa wu ɓi rìkem ɗii, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓiì ɓaà rì kìsììrì, ɓì ki yi rinìɗ ɗi nɗem lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Faana Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɗì kìnyàà; lɛ nnyɛɛ kighà com ki lɛ, ɓi ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi ɓìrɔɔ ɓi ɓi ri ɓì pègsɛn ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn ɓiɗùm. 
À kwèɗkà ɓìsi ɓi rìkpàn ɗi mɛtèɗ mɛ birìm, à ceesì ɓìsi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Man wiì à ǹɗem, 
ànɛ tì rì ɓɛ̀kòrɛn lɛ nyi, ɓìɓe ɓis ɓi ki ɓa ɓi cenɛn. 
À rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki Bɛ̀ll ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ ɓi, nyi tì Man à ǹtonto ànɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà. 
Ɓisuulɛ rì nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓyom ɓìcèm, lɛ rì aɗyoo, rì ɓi ziinɛ; ɓyom ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ seesèè, rì ɓi ɓɛ ghɛɛ ɓi, mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ mɛghay, rì mɛ̀làmì, rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛm̀bog. Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓyom ɓìcèm rì nyi, rì ɓisu wìì.  
Nnyɛɛ lokà kì ɓaà rì ɓyom ɓìcèm, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi rɛrɛlii lɛ nyi. 
Nnyɛɛ ri nto wu ɓi nyoo ìnɛ ì rì lɛ kìseŋi kii; nnyɛɛ ri rìtumɛ̀n, à ki ɓa ti man à ǹtonto ànɛ à lokà kìghèmɓɛɛ a ɓìloŋ lɛ di a ɓa beèbɛ̀y ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm. 
Ɓisuulɛ ki kɔngà Bɛ̀ll lɛ a kɔri ɓi nyi, à rongì ɓi nyi lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
À ki kì lɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, nsoò lɛ ɓi aɗyoo, ɓyɛɛ rarɛn tì rì nyi lɛ Man wiì, yɛ̀ɛ à kìghà lɛ fyòoog a ɓa lɛ bwaɓ yi Man ànɛ̀n yi yi kpagà ɓi kɔrɔs.
Fɔɔnnɛ mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓaghà abɛ̀y ɓɛ̀ ràɓsɛn ri Bɛ̀ll, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓii, lɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓì kìkìghà, 
ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, lɛ rìwu ɗi Man wiì à wughà ɓi nyoo yìì i mɛ̀mùù, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ pɛ̀ɛ̀zi mini kì ràri ɗi nyimiɗ, lɛ di a ki com ki lɛ ɓi kpaŋ ɓi mis mii ɓɛtɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ zɛ̀ɗ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn. 
Kìɓan kifog, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ɓi ɓeŋ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, ɓì sììrɛ̀n, ɓì ki rɛli lɛ kpegkpeg, kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ syoŋ mìni fìràɓ ɗi dyàɓɛn ìnɛ ɓì rì rì yɔ̀ ɓi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ ɓì wokà. Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ kalɛ̀ngà a ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi ɗyoo azi; innɛ mɛ̀ Pol ǹti ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ miì.
Ǹɗì rì kìnyàà ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ nwowog ɓisu win, fɔɔnnɛ com ki kɛɛ̀ kaakaàrɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ Kiris, mɛ̀ɛ nɗàaratɛ̀n kɔ kì woògh ɓi nyoo yɛ̀m ɓisuu nyoo yìì ìnɛ ì rì kìseŋi kii. 
Mɛ̀ ǹtighà ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki Kiris, lɛ ǹtɛ̀g wu Bɛ̀ll à tɛ̀gsìghà mɛ̀ lɛ nghagsi mìni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, 
yɛ̀ɛ ri kìɓan ki Bɛ̀ll à ɓègà a rìnyam fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ gbàà yi ɓum yìcèm yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi, wɔ̀lɛ kɛɛ̀ki à mɛ rèsi ɓum ɓii ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, 
ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll àa nkɔ̀ni lɛ a resi ɓɔ fèg wìì anɛ a rìnyam, ànɛ à kìi lɛ, à fɔm à ki rɔɔtɛn yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀; fèg ànɛn à rì ɓisuu ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll, nnyɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ: Kiris à rì ɓi mìni, à ki fa mini dyàɓɛn inɛ lɛ ɓì ɓiì ɓaà rì gàɓ ɓi rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Kiris ànɛ̀n nnɛ ɓìsii ghaaghagsì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, tì rɔ̀ɔ̀rɔ̀gsɛ̀n ɓɔ, tì ki rèsag ɓɔ rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗìcèm, lɛ ti ki lɛ mum bimiɗ a kpaŋ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, di à ti ǹsììrɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓi Kiris. 
Kìsay kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki nkìkì, ǹɗùùɗùù rì nghɛɓsɛn wu ìtèɗ wii wu wɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ɓi mɛ̀ rì ìtèɗ.
Lɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ di ɓyàa yii coo wɛ̀y wu mɛ̀ɛ nɗùùɗuu ɓisu win, rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ a Lawodise, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi mɛ ɓi-su. 
Nɗùùɗuu fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀rem maa mɛɛ ɓa mɛ̀ronɛn ɗi ìtèɗ, rì tì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, ɓɛ ki ɓa ti ɓɛronɛn ɗi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à ɗyomzɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì yii fèg à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì a rìnyam, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ Kiris. 
Ɓi Kiris ànɛ̀n nnɛ ìkum wu ɗyomzɛ̀n wùcèm rì wu riyi ɗi ɓiɓan wu ri wù nyamɛn.
Ǹkpaa kìɓan kiǹ ɓisuulɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ̀ŋ mini rì ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓitòkì. 
Lɛ nsoò màa rì mìni fìràɓ ɓi rìɓa ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù, ǹɗem wɛ̀m wu ri lɔŋ foo ri mìni, ǹwowog kirɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ nseesee syeesyee à rìwòŋzàg ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, rì yɛ̀ɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɓi Kiris, ɗi ri lɛ kpeg-kpeg.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì tekà Yeesus Kiris lɛ Kan wìn, ghɛɓina min cɛɓ ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ ràrɛn ɗi nyi. 
Ɓaana ɓɛ̀ɓaghɛn gàŋ ɓi nyi, ɓì toŋ cɛɓ kin ɓi nyi, ɓì sììrɛ̀n ɓi rìgherɛ̀n lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ resìghà mìni, ɓì ki fafa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ɓì konàg lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ wɔɔsi mini ɓi fìram fi ɗyomzɛ̀n rì ǹ-yègsɛ̀n à zɛy, ɓyɛɛ ri ɓìtoŋɛn ɓi ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓum, rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ mɛghay mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ɓitoŋɛn ɓi Kiris. 
Ɓisuulɛ rìɓa ɗìcèm ɗi Bɛ̀ll à rì ɗi yughà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi nyoo ì Kiris lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì mɛ teɗ ɓyom ɓìcèm kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìteɗ ɓi Kiris ànɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ̀cèm rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ mɛghay mɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓi nyi, ɓì kɛ̀rɛ̀ngà rìkuu ɗi kɛ̀rɛ̀n ɗi ɗi yin ɗi ɓum ɓɛɛ kɛri rì ɓyàg ɓyaa, kìɓan kifog, ɓì kɛ̀rɛ̀ngà kɛ̀rɛ̀n à Kiris ànɛ à rì lɛ mum a leg ɓi rìkpàn ɗi nyoo ì kìɓe. 
Ɓɛ ɓomgà mìni ǹɗaŋ ri nyi yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ɓàɓtɛ̀ngà, ɓì mɛ ghèmɓɛn girig ɓi nyi, ǹɗaŋ ɗi nyi lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ghèmzìghày nyi a ɓìloŋ. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓaghà ɓìloŋ abɛ̀y lɛ ɓìɓe ɓin, ɗì rìɓa ɗi ɓì ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìkɛ̀rɛɛ, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ fati mini cɛɓ ǹɗaŋ ɗi Kiris, yɛ̀ɛ à cenɛ̀ngà ɓisi ɓìɓe ɓis ɓìcèm. 
À pisighà sɔmìnà à m̀ɓeɓɛn ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓisi ɓi nyoo innɛ ɓìɓan ɓi miì ɓi nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà ɓìsi; à pisìghà ɓìsi nyi yɛ̀ɛ à kpangà nyi ɓi kɔrɔs. 
À dùŋzìghà ɓɛ̀làmì rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ mɛghay, à ghanì ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm yɛ̀ɛ à yagsàkà ɓɔ ɓi kɔrɔs aɗyòò.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ yɔ̀mdi mini ɓi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ɗi, rì com ki ɓì rì lɛ ɓì nɔ, nsoò ɓi kìɓan ki ticàɓ tidɛŋ nsoò lɛ ǹtaasi wu ŋwii, nsoò lɛ saɓàt. 
Ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ri lɔŋ cììziŋ ki ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi riì, wɔ̀lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìɓan a rì lɔŋ ɓi Kiris. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓi mɛ̀ree mɛ ɓi ghɛghɛŋì ŋwaàdɛŋ a ɓatɛn mìni mɔ yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔni nyi, rì ìghèy lɛ à rì ǹsɛɛ̀dɛn nyimiɗ ɓi zi, rì tì lɛ, a ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ɓum ɓɛ titom; rìkuu ɗi mum ɗìn ɗi ti ɗi ɓiisàg kì kuughraagh ɓiɓan ɓi ɗi ghɛɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm̀; ɗi ki ɓalag ɗi ronɛn ɗi ɓìdaŋà ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀-su, ɓi ɓɔɔ mɛyitì ɓii ɓɛ à rì rì ɓɔ, ɓi rìɓa ɗii ɗi lɛ mum. 
Rìkuu ɗi mum ɗìn ɗi yin ɗi ràrɛn ri ǹto wu wu ɓanɓani nyoo bimiɗ, wu ki kì lɛ nyoo ìnɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ rarag lɛ syeesyee ɓi jàŋ yi ì rì miì ǹwògakɛn ì ki tɔɔtɔɔ kitɔɔ ki Bɛ̀ll a fafa yɔ̀.
I ɓì wughà ǹɗaŋ ri Kiris ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ mɛghay mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓɛ kaŋkàŋ tì mìni rì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ ɓì kaka ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓ ɓi ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ? 
Kɔ̀ɔ teɗ, kɔ̀ɔ ɓoɓti, kɔ̀ɔ kòm! 
Ɓìcèlì ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi koŋkomi ɓyom ɓi ɓi ti ɓi ɗyogì di ɓɛ kii kìsay miì gɛ̀mbog; ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ri lɔŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna rì mɛ̀rèsàg mɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ foŋi. 
Ki ri saaɗ lɛ ɓìcèlì ɓiǹ, ɓi rìseèsèèrɛ̀n ɗi ɓi mis, ɓi ri lɛ ɓɛ sɛg lɛ, ɗì rìɓɔgsàg ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi miì ɗi ɗi ri kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛɛ ɓekii, ɗì rìsɛɛ̀dɛ̀n ɗi ɓi zi, rì kìɓan ki lɛ, mum a ki nyoo yìì rìgɛn; kìɓan kifog gɛ ɓìɓan anɛ̀n à ghɛɓsii ɓi bimiɗ à com, à rì lɔŋ ɓisuu kinyàà ki mɛmùù.
I ɓì mɛ ghèmɓɛn min nɗaŋ ri Kiris, kaakaana ɓìɓan ɓi aɗyoo, jàŋ inɛ Kiris à rì ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll. 
Foŋina ǹɗem rì ɓìɓan ɓi aɗyoo, kɛ̀ ɓi fèfeg ɓi ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓì rì ɓìloŋ, cɛɓ kin ki ri kì nyamɛn nɗaŋ ɗi Kiris ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Kiris ànɛ à rì cɛɓ kin, à ɓiì rèsɛɛ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ, mìni girig ɓì ɓiì rèsɛɛ nɗaŋ ri nyi ɓi rìkem ɓi ɗùm.
Wolina ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi zi ɓìcèm ɓi ɓì rì rì ɓyɔ ɓi mìniìɓɔmiɗ, ɓyɛɛ ri lɛ, cɛɓ ki tisɔ̀mɔ̀g, cɛɓ ki tifin, ɗì rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn, rì kìsee ki ikum, kɛɛ ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn. 
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ ti ɓi kilàg lɛ Bɛ̀ll a wog bim, ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeni nyi kì kìi mɛwog . 
Cɛɓ ki ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà abɛ̀y kɛɛ ri lɔɔ, di ɓì kaka ɓi ɓìɓe ɓiǹ ɓi ɗùm. 
Nni à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, mìni girig, càrina ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm lɛ rì bim, rì kìnyɛn, rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nɗem, rì tìfena, rì ɓìtòkì ɓi kɛ̀ ǹtoòrìɗ ɓi ɓi ti ɓi kpagìì ɓi myɔm min.
Pwàà à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì ɓi ki ɓaà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓisuulɛ ɓì mɛ rini lɛ rì fìɗyàɓ fin fi riɓa fi ɓi mɛ̀mùù rì ɓìɓan ɓi miì. 
Ɓì teɗ nyɔɔnyɔn à rìɓa, ànɛ à rì rìɓa ɗi ŋwaànɛ à ti ncenɗɛn, à ɓa cààmɛ̀n kìcèm à suùsùgtì nyɔn ɓi kìpisɛn ki roànɛ à kìghà nyi, lɛ di a konag lɔŋ nyi kì yiì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìyi. 
Foo ǹlànag wu yiìdi ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ, rì muu Gìrɛg, rì muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ rì ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹkɛ̀rɛn, rì roànɛ à yin nkɛ̀rɛn, ǹkèn a mum, rì muu Sit, nsoò lɛ rì ǹkpàn rì ŋwaànɛ à yin ǹkpàn, lɔŋ Kiris yɛɛ ri com kìcèm ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà mìni, à tɛɛ̀zì mìni, à ki keesi mini, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓì waatɛ̀n nɗem wu nyìinyìg, rì wu geesɛ̀n, rì wu sɛɛ̀dɛn ɓi zi, rì wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, rì rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ceecenɛ̀n mìni rì mìni, i ki kpaŋi lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à rì rì kìɓan ki ki kɛŋi nyi rì geni, ɓaana rì rìcenɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wìn; fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à cenɛ̀ngà mìni, mìni girig ɓaana ɗì ricenɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wìn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm, ɓaana rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n. Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì com ki ki ti ki raɗkì ɓum syeesyee à rìràɗ. 
Fyòoog à Kiris ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà mìniìcèm miì lɛ, ɓi ɓa ɓìkàɓ ɓi ɓi nyoo bog, a lami mɛ̀rem min. Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì rìfa ɗi ɓìtògsɛ̀n.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kiris yɛ̀ɛ kɔri mìni ɓi mɛ̀rem rì ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee ɓìcèm ɓi ì rì rì ɓyɔ; ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ reèrèsàg ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog, ɓì reèrèɓɓɛ̀n mìni rì mìni rì ɗyomzɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓì kɛkɛ̀ɛ̀gh Bɛ̀ll tyem ti ɓi ɓɛ̀sam, rì mɛ̀ɓàlì rì ɓìgheesì ɓi Ǹghay à resii, kìina kìɓan kiǹ rì nɗem win wucèm. 
Com kìcèm ki ɓì rì lɛ ɓì kpaa, nsoò lɛ ɓì kì, kìina kɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus, ɓì fafà Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɓìtògsɛ̀n rì ɗii ɗìì.
Mìni ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓaana rì mɛ̀wog ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀yii ɓin, yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ɔkɔnɛ̀n ɓi mis mɛ Kan.
Mìni ɓɛ̀baŋì, keesiina ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓin, kɛ̀ ɓi biibimɓɛ̀n rì ɓɔ.
Mìni ɓɔn, kìina ɓɛ̀yalì ɓin mɛwog ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, ɓisuulɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ri lɛ syeesyee ɓi mis mɛ Kan.
Mìni ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɔn, kɛ̀ ɓi ǹyɛɛnyɛɛ̀dɛ̀n ɓɔn ɓin, di mùm mɛ ri ɓɔ ɓiì sɛ̀nsɛni.
Mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, kìina ɓɛ̀masà ɓin ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀mùù mɛ̀wog ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, kɛ̀ ɓi kì lɔŋ ɓɔ mɛ̀wog cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛɛ̀ seesee mini kɔ rì kɔ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ, ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi puɓsi ǹɗem, kìɓan kifog kìina ɓɔ mɛ̀wog rì nɗem wu sɛɛghi sɛɛghi ɓisuu bɔgsɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓì rì rì yɔ̀ ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kan. 
Nsoò cɛ kɛɛ̀ki ɓyaà kìkì, kìina ɓìɓan ɓìcèm rì nɗem win wucèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kìki ɓyɔ ɓisuu Kan, àa ɓisuu ɓum, 
ɓì ki yi lɛ, ɓyom ɓi syeesyee ɓi ɓi ri ɓì nyamɛn, ɓì ɓiì teri ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ Kan ɓisuu mɛlèɓ min. Kiris ànɛ à rì Kan innɛ ɓi kìki kisay. 
Lɛ ŋwaànɛ a kìki ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn à ɓiì terì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ mɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì kìɓeɓtàg kii ki rikì, lɛ Bɛ̀ll à yin ɓiì làlanii ɓum.
Mìni ɓɛ̀masà ɓɛ ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, kìina ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓì yitì lɛ mìnii ri girig rì masà aɗyòò.
Sììrɛɛna ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n; ɓì ɓa cem miì ɓi rìfafà ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n. 
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wis lɛ a nɛm̀ ɓìsi bee inɛ ti lamɓɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, di fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghagsi ɓum dwìɗ inɛ ì seesee Kiris, lɛ kiɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗì miì nkàgakɛn bɛn. 
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig lɛ nkakali kìɓan kiǹ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lèg ànɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nkpaà.
Ɓaanà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓi rìghɛghɛ̀ɓ ɗin ɗi rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi yogsi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì rì rì kɔ. 
Ɓìtòkì ɓin ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓalaagh ɓitòkì ɓi geesɛ̀n, ɓi yɛyɛ̀y yɛ̀ɛ kìkòn; fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓiì yiì lannɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓì ɓàg mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ, di à tɔɔgh mìni kìɓan.
Ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee rìɓa ɗyɛ̀m, Tisig à geni wɛ̀m à nɗem, ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Kan à ǹtyweeyi, ànɛ ti kìki kisay ki Kan ɗì nyi nɗaŋ, à rì mìni ɓiì kalii ɓiɓan ɓìcèm. 
Nɗomiì mìni nyi rì azi lɛ, ɓi yi rìɓa ɗis, à ki fɔɔsi mini mɛ̀rem. 
Ɓɛ riì nɗaŋ ri Onezim, geni wìs a ǹɗem, ànɛ à rì mum à ǹtyweeyi, nyi tì maaseŋi wìn. Ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì wogsii ɓiɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kìikilɛ̀n fɛ.
Aristarikɛ ànɛ à rì ɓi naà-zày rì mɛ̀ à tògsii yì mìni, nsoò Marikus ànɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɔn rì ɓɔn ɓɛɛ̀ Ɓarinaɓas. Marikus ànɛ̀n innɛ tì mɛ kpaa mini lɛ i à yùu foo a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɓì ghàɓ nyi lɛ syeesyee. 
Yeesus ànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ Yustus, à tògsii yì girig mìni; lɔŋ kìraa ki ɓum kìn kɔ rì kɔ, kɛɛ ri Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sasay nɗaŋ ri mɛ̀ ɓisuu kilɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ fatìghà mɛ̀ ìtèɗ ɓi nɗem. 
Epafiras à maaseŋi wìn à tògsii yì mìni, à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à fɔli ɓi riɗùù ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓisu wìn, lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀sììrɛn, ɓì ɓa ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ ɓum, ɓì ki gherɛn rikɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll syeesyee à rìgherɛ̀n. 
Ǹɗì nyi wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ a woowolɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓisu win, rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ a Lawodise rì ɓɛ a Iyerapolis. 
Lukas à reŋkàŋ wìs a nɗem, ànɛ à rì dɔgtà ɓɛɛ̀ Demas ɓɛ togsii yì mìni.
Ɓì tògsàg ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛ ri a Lawodise, rì Nɛmfa, rì kìseŋi ki Kiris ki ki ri ɓi naa yìì.
I ɓɛ mɛ ɓày kaàtà ànɛ foo a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓay girig kìseŋi ki a Lawodise nyi; fɔɔnnɛ mìni girig ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓàli kaàtà ànɛ à rì ɓiì ɓaà yì mìni a Lawodise. 
Kaliina Arisip lɛ: Ù konàg rì kìsay ki Kan à faghà wɔ̀, tèèsi nyoo lɛ u konag kɔ kì kìi.
Mɛ̀ɛmiɗ Pol yɛɛ kaniì mìni ɓìtɔkì rì càg kɛm̀, kɛ̀ ɓi ɗimzɛn lɛ ǹɗì ɓi naà-zày. Geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni!
Mɛ̀ Pol, ɓɛɛ Silas rì Timote, tì kàni ɓumɓɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Tesalonika ki ki ri ɓi Bɛ̀ll Seŋi rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris Kan. Geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìfayɛn a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Ɓisiì fafa lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓisu wiǹ mìniìcèm, tì ki ɓùŋɓuŋ mini ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yis. 
Ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs tì ti tì yitàg ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm mɛ̀kìkìì min mɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, rì kìsay ki ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wiǹ a kìkì, rì rìsììrɛ̀n ɗin ɓi dyàɓɛn inɛ tì rì rì yɔ̀ ɓì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à keesìghà mìni, à ki ɓɔ̀n mini. 
Ɓisuulɛ tì ghagsìghà ɓi mini Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ tì ɓaghày rì nyi rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ŋwɔm yɔ̀ ri yɔ̀, tì ghagsìghà girig nyi ɓi dàm yi tì kìkìghà rì ìteɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, tì ki konag kiyiì saaɗ bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n. Ɓi saaɗ, ɓì yii cɛɓ ki tì ghɛɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn; fɔlɔɔ a ɓaghà ɓi kìrɔɔ kin. 
Ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà lɛ rì mɛ̀kòò mis, rì mɛ̀kòò mɛ Kan, ɓì ki tulɛn rì mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ bì ghàɓkà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ rì kìnyàà ki Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ falàg. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ti kìfèèghrɛnà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Masedwan, rì ɓɛ a Akayi. 
Lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan ì mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yi a lɔ̀ŋkin, ì kpaŋ à Masedwan rì a Akayi, nni àa lɔŋ foo nyi rì nyi, gom ì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ Bɛ̀ll, ì mɛ sàà jàŋ bimiɗ à kpaŋ ɓi lèg ànɛ tì yin gi lɛ tì kpaakpàà. 
Ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa righàɓ ɗi ɓì ghàɓkà ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ tì kpagà a lɔ̀ŋkin rì yɛ̀ɛ ɓì càɗkàkày ɓìnùn, ɓì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓi ɓɔgsi nyi, lɛ nnyɛɛ ri kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a rì cem, 
ɓì ɓoŋɓòŋ lɛ Man wiì Yeesus, ànɛ à ghèmzìghày a ɓìloŋ, a sɛǹ yì aɗyoo, di a kweɗ ɓìsi ɓi rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ɗi riì.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, rìyù ɗi tì yùghà a lɔ̀ŋkin ɗi wughà ɓi zɛy. 
Di tì ka kpaŋ ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkin, tì ghɛngà mɛ̀tɔɓ, ɓum ɓɛ ki yeesi ɓisi a Filiɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yii, wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓìsi ìtèɗ wulɛ ti ghagsi mìni Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ wìì nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓaghà bimiɗ à wɛ̀y. 
Ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi tì kakàlìghà ɓum ɓi rooghày ɓi ǹɗuŋ ɓi rìnàn ǹsoò lɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi tifin, fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ki yin ɗi ǹ-yègsɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à timgà rìɓa ɗis à ki fa ɓisi kìsay ki Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì yin ɓiì kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɛ ti puɓsi ɓum mɛ̀rem, kìɓan kìfog, ti kpaakpaa ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à ghɛngì yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓum, mɛ ri ɓi ɗùm.
Ɓì yii lɛ tì ka ɓaghà ɓi ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì fìɗyɛɓi, nsoò rìyitì ɗi lɛ ti fɔǹ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ŋwos adɛŋ, Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓìsi wusìnɛ̀ɗ. 
Tì kaaghà ɓi lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kemzi ɓisi, nsoò a lɔ̀ŋkin, nsoò a ɓum ɓɛm̀bog, kɔlɛ tì ɓaghà lɛ tì làmì mìni ɓi-tèɗ ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ Kiris. 
Wɔ̀lɛ tì ghɛɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn rì nɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ jɛɛ ɓɔn à ti à ɓègì ɓɔn ɓii. 
Ɓi rìkeesì ɗi tì keesìghà mìni, àa Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll nyi rì nyi innɛ tì ɓaghà lɛ tì kɔ̀n lɛ ti fa mìni, ti ɓaghà lɛ ti fa mìni lɔŋ lɛ rì ɓyɛɓ ɓis miì, lɛ ɓì ɓaghà di ɓì ti ɓum ɓis ɓɛ nɗem lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì yitì kìsay ki tì kìghà, rì ǹtɔɓ wu tì wokà; tì ghagsìghà mìni Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll tì ki sasay lɛ rì ìru rì ŋwos lɛ ǹtɛ̀g wis wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ siŋ wààdɛŋ ɓi nyòò. 
Ɓì rì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓis, nsoò Bɛ̀ll à rì girig wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ cɛɓ ki tì ghɛɓkà rì mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ki ɓaghà kìtɛnɛn, kɔ tì lɛ saaɗ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan kifenɛn miì. 
Ɓì yii girig lɛ tì ghɛɓkà rì mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ seŋi à rì lɛ à ghɛɓ rì ɓɔn ɓii. 
Tì kìghà lɛ tì reɓ mìni, tì fɔɔsì mìni mɛ̀rem, tì ki ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì mìni lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a regi mini lɛ ɓi ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, rì ɓi rìkem ɗii.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki tì fafa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ bì ghàɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì ìnɛ tì wogsìghà mìni, ɓì ghàɓkà ɓi yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì mum; ɓì ghàɓkà lɔŋ yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ì rì a tààkaà, lɛ ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìki kisay ɓi mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì mɛ pisɛn Ɓiseŋi ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓi ri a Zyude ɓi Yeesus Kiris, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kin ɓɛ yeesìghà mìni lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛroɓɛ a Zyude ɓɛ yeesìghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ ɓɛɛ wolà Kan Yeesus, ɓɛ ki cuusi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓɛɛ yeeyèèsìghà ɓìsi; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓeɓkì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki ɓèèzag ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ rekì ɓìsi lɛ tyɛ̀ ki ghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ. Rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛn beèbɛ̀y ɓɛ teètègsì kìɓe kaa cààmɛ̀n kìcèm rì ɗyɔ̀; wɔ̀lɛ rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi mɛ syɔn ɓɔ kìkòmi.
Ɓi san wìs, yɛ̀ɛ tì ghasɛ̀ngà rì mìni tyɛ̀ ki ghɛnɛn ti a mɛ̀su ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, fɔlɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ ki rèsi lɛ tì ti tyɛ̀ ki fègti mini, ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tìi nɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ ti ghɛnɛn tì rì mìni, fɔɔnnɛ tìi ǹtèèsii nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ kilɛn. 
Tì kɔ̀ngà lɔŋ lɛ di tyàa yùu foo, a lɔ̀ŋkin mɛ̀ɛmiɗ Pol ǹfèèghrɛɛ gɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ yiɓɛɛ̀, wɔ̀lɛ Satàn a règ ɓìsi rìyù. 
Ghɛn yɛɛrì min ɓiì ɓaà dyàɓɛn yìs, rì kìnyàà kis nsoò lɛ tàm wìs a rìkem ɓi mis mɛ Kan wìs Yeesus, ŋwosi risugtìì ɗii? Àa lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ rì ɓa wa? 
Ɛ̀ɛ̀, mìni yɛɛ ri rìkem ɗis, rì kìnyàà kis.
Yɛ̀ɛ tìi n-yiidi lɛ tì cenɛ̀n lɛ ti ɓoŋɓoŋ tì, nni tìi nghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ, ti rɔɓ a Atɛn ɓìsi cɛ̀ncis. 
Fɔɔnnɛ tìi nɗomiì mìni geni wìs Timote, ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìghagsì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kiris lɛ a fa mìni ìtèɗ, à ki fegsi mìni ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin; 
lɛ di mum kɛ̀ɛ càrɛn lɛ mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛ mɛ ri ɓigomìnɛ mɛɛ ɓigti nyi, ɓisuulɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛǹ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀pègsɛn ɓisu wis. 
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà a lɔ̀ŋkin, tì lokà mìni ki rèsii lɛ tì rì ɓiì tanɛɛ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ki ki kìlɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yii. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓatìghà ɓi lɛ m̀ɓoŋɓòŋ tì nni ǹɗomgày Timote lɛ a yu kìwoògh lannɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ ǹɗirìsìghà lɛ kɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ ǹfèèghrɛ̀n-ɓum à fèèghrɛ̀ngà mìni lɛ kìsay kis kɛɛ wu zɛy.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ nnɛ Timote à sughiì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi àa nɗìì a lɔ̀ŋkin; à sughiì ɓìsi rì ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ ɓɛ komi lɛ rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rì rì nyi. À kpaa ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ mìniì ka yiiyitàg lɔŋ ɓisi rì nkɔ̀nɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ɓì ki ɓa ri zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓi ghɛǹ ɓìsi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi girig tì rì rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ti ghɛnɛn. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìi nfaa ɓìsi ìtèɗ ɓi nyoo rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin, ɓi nyìinyìm à mɛ̀tɔɓ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛcèm mɛ tì rì rì mɔ. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ ki ri yɛ̀ɛ tì teetii tì cɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ tì woogh lɛ ɓì kaka lɔŋ ɓɛsììrɛn ɓi Kan. 
Tì rì lɛ tì tògsàg Bɛ̀ll wìs ɓisu win à kpaŋ fe, ɓi kìnyàà kìcèm ki tì rì rì kɔ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu righerɛ̀n ɗin! 
Ti ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, tì ki sììrɛn ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɛ a ki lɛ ti ghɛnag tì a mɛ̀su, à ki roozi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaarɛɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin?
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs nyimiɗ, rì Kan wìs Yeesus, ɓɛɛ ɓaà ɓìsi bee ìnɛ tì rì lɛ tì kpaŋ miì a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Kan a tegsi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rì rì nyi, lɛ a roǹ à sòsòɓ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, à kòm ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ki ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓisii ri rì nyi ɓi san wìn. 
A ki lɛ mɛ̀rem min mɛɛ siìrɛn, mɛ ɓa mɛ̀ tɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ rì lɛ ɓɛ fen miì ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs, ŋwosi risugtìì ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus ǹɗaŋ rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ti siìtɛn kìkpaà lɛ ɓì yilàkà rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗi ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛɓì lɛ Bɛ̀ll a wog kìrɔɔ rì mìni, a lɔ̀ŋkis nni cɛɓ kìn kɛɛ̀ki ɓi ghɛghɛ̀ɓ; tì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni, tì ki yɛ̀gsi mini ɓyàg ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus lɛ ɓi teèsi tì nyoo rì rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗìn à cee fɔlɔɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì yii ɓìɓan ɓi tì siitàkà mìni; ɓi ɓaghà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi riì yɛ̀ɛ Kan Yeesus. 
Rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki tɛnɛn, ɓì cèlì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìyiì rìɓèŋ ɗi nyoo yìì ɓi rìtɛn , à ɓèŋɗɛ̀n lɛ a ɓa mum à saaɗ, ɗì rìmum; 
kɛ̀ɛ càrɛn lɛ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓyɛɛ syòŋ nyi ǹɗem, yɛ̀ɛ ki ti ki ɓalàg rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ŋwaàɗɛŋ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki yègsiì geni, nsoò lɛ à kì nyi kìɓeɓtàg ki nɗem, lɛ Kan à ti à rɔ̀gì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ tì mɛ kì lɛ, tì kpaa mìni, tì ki rèsi mini. 
Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà ɓi ɓisi lɛ ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki kitɔɓì, wɔ̀lɛ à reŋìghà ɓìsi lɛ ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki tɛnɛn. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì ɓèni ɓìɓan ɓi nsiisiìtàg ɓi, a yi lɛ, àa mum ìnnɛ à ɓèni, lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à mɛ fa mini girig Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n kii ki Nghay.
Ki ghɛɓsii ɓi com lɛ ti kaǹ mìni kìɓan ki ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll nyimiɗ a rèsàkà mìni kìɓan ki ɓi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn. 
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛn innɛ ɓi rèresi rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri Masedwan bimiɗ. Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓisii yɛgsii lɔŋ mini ɓyàg lɛ ɓi kɛɛ̀di beèbɛ̀y rì rìkì ɗiǹ. 
Ɓì foŋ ǹɗem ɓi kìɓan ki lɛ ɓi ghɛ̀ɓ lɛ fyòoog, ɓì kìkì ɓìɓan ɓin ɓi mìniìɓɔmìɗ, ɓì ki sasay ri ɓyàg ɓin lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ tì siŋdɛ̀ngà mìni; 
di fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ teɗ mìni rì rìmum, ǹtɛ̀g win wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ rìɗ ŋwaàdɛŋ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ ɓi ɓa lɛ dùŋdùŋ ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìloŋ lɛ di kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa lɛ mɛ̀rem min mɛ ɓeɓtɛ̀n ɓi mùm yɛ̀ɛ mɛ ɓum ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ɓɛ rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ dyàɓɛn. 
Lɛ i tì gherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus à wughà, à ki ghèmɓɛn, ti gherɛɛna girig lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì ghèmzii ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus, ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi ɓɛ ɓaa wu. 
Ɓisuulɛ com ki ti kpaaghì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan ì rì ki ri lɛ: Ɓìsi ɓɛ tì rì ɓiì ɓaà di tì kaka cem ɓi rìsugtìì ɗi Kan, tyàa syòŋ ɓi ɓɛroɓɛ ɓaa wu bee. 
Ɓisuulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì ɓìì toòghrɛɛ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì coo ŋwaà-fìtom, ɗyam ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi rɔŋ, Kan nyimiɗ a ɓiì sɛnìì aɗyòò; fɔɔnnɛ ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓi Kiris ɓi ɓiì loògh kì ghèmɓɛɛ. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ɓìsi ɓumɓɛ tì ɓiì ɓaà di tì kaka cem, ɓɛ rì ɓìsi ɓiì terì ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, tì ɓɔg ɓi ɓìkwìɗ lɛ tì tuùsɛn rì Kan ɓi nlɛŋlɛŋ̀. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ɓiì kɔ̀kɔrii ri Kan cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓì fɔɔ̀fɔ̀ɔ̀sɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ mɛrem rì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, kìɓan ki ki seesee cààmɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ gòn inɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ki yiìdi lɛ ɓɛ kaǹ mìni kɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì konaagh kì yiì lɛ ŋwos a Kan à rì ɓiì kpaŋì fɛlɛ yɛɛ wiiwìì à ti à yùlàg rì ìru. 
Cààmɛ̀n ki yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓiì kpaakpaa lɛ fyòomà fi ri lɛ fyòoog kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki risiyɛn kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ rì ɓiì sìgmɛɛ lɛ cuu ki mɛ sɛn ɓi ɓɔ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìkɛŋ ɗi riyay ɗi ti ɗi siɗkì giɓ a ɗyem. Ɓaa ɓa ɓi ri bee ì ǹlɛghɛn cuu kìn.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, mìnii yin ɓi birìm, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwos anɛ̀n à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi mini kì sìri yɛ̀ɛ wiiwìì. 
Mìniìcèm ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn, ɓì ɓa ti ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ŋwos; ɓìsiì yin ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ìru, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ ɓi birìm. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi min kilalì yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛro ɓɛm̀bog; ti kɔ̀riina lɔŋ cem, tì ɓèŋɗɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki mɛrɔ̀g. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ lalày, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ laayì rì ìru, ɓɛ̀ŋwaŋì mɛ̀rɔ̀g, ɓɛ ŋwagì rì ìru. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsi ɓɛ tì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ŋwos, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋɗɛɛ ɓi kìɓan ki mɛrɔ̀g, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì pùrɛɛ rìgherɛ̀n rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n fɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà ki bɔŋ tì waatɛ̀n girig dyàɓɛn inɛ ɓi gòri yìs fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tàm. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à fèkà ɓi lɛ ti ɓa ɓumɓɛ bim yiì ì ɓiì rèsɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkaa, wɔ̀lɛ à fèkà lɛ tì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ gòri ì cɛɓ lɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris, 
ànɛ à wughà ɓisu wis lɛ ti ghɛɓ ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗì nyi, nsoò tyàa mɛ wu, nsoò tyàa kaka cem yɛ̀ɛ à risugtìì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì faafàlɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ ìtèɗ, ɓì kì feèfègsɛ̀n mìni rì mìni yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ti ɓiì kìkii.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì tɔɔgh mìni lɛ ɓi ɓalag rì bɔgsɛ̀n ɓi san ànɛ a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sasay ɓi nyìinyìn wìn, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì mìni ɓi cɛɓ ki Kan, ɓɛ ki rereɓ mini. 
Terina ɓɔ rì coo nyaasɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓisuu kìsay ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì. Ghɛbina lɛ fyòoog ɓi nyìinyìm wìn. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! tì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni lɛ, ɓi rɔgsɛn ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi kìɓùùsì , ɓì cààsì ɓɛ̀riris nyoo, ɓì lènlèm ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ, ɓì yi rìnìɗ ɗi ǹɗem rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓì konàg lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ à rɔ̀ŋ kiɓe ri kìɓe; wɔ̀lɛ kaana lɔŋ lɛ ɓi kiki kìrɔɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, lɛ rì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, rì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓum ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Nyàànyaana cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. 
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll kɛ̀ ɓi fɔy. 
Faana Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi tanɛɛ mìni, lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɓi cɛɓ kin ki rì Yeesus Kiris. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓuɓsi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi sɛɛti ɓiɓan ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kpaŋzii rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay à Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kifog, fiɓɓaaghna ɓìɓan ɓìcèm lɛ syeesyee, ɓi ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓì ɓèŋ. 
Lɛɛghna kìɓe mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm. 
Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a falag fyòoog a tɛɛ̀zi mìni nyimiɗ bee yicèm, fɔɔnnɛ a ɓeŋ rìɓa ɗin ɗicèm ɗi lɛ: rì Nghay win, rì ǹɗem   win, rì nyoo yìn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin ɓisuu rìsugtìì ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris. 
Roànɛ a regag mìni à rì ɓiì kìi kiɓan kiǹ ɓisuulɛ, à ti à roòzàg mɛ̀kàg mii. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig ɓisu wis. 
Ɓi tògsag ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓì lwɛ̀ɗkì ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll. 
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan lɛ, ɓi ɓày kaàtà ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ɓɛgeni ɓis ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n. 
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni.
Mɛ̀ Pol, ɓɛɛ̀ Silas, rì Timote, tì kàniì ɓumɓɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n ki a Tesalonika, ki ki ri ki Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs, ɓi Yeesus Kiris à Kan wìs. 
Bɛ̀ll Seŋi rì Kan Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa mìni lɛ rì geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì fafaa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓisu win tyɛ̀ ki fɔy; tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìkii fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ tɔɔtɔ̀ɔ̀, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à rì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn a tèèghtèghɛ̀n. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ti kaakalɛ̀n Ɓìseŋi ɓi ɓɛgherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll rìɓa ɗin, ɓisuu kisììrì kin, rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀cèm, rì rìkɛŋ ɗìcèm ɗi ɓi wowòg ɓì ki nìniɗ mɛrem. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ rèresi lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à ti à yɔ̀mgì ɓum yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ à rì. Fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ɓi wuwu mɛtɔɓ miì. 
Lɛ ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ki ri lɛ saaɗ lɛ Bɛ̀ll a yeèsi girig ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ yeeyeèsì mìni, 
à fa mìni ɓɛ ɓi wowog rikɛŋ rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ǹɗaŋ ri ɓìsi; à ɓiì kìi fɔlɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ Kan Yeesus à ɓiì rèsɛɛ yi aɗyoo, nɗaŋ ri ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ìtèɗ, 
ɓi nɗòò wu ɗuu, lɛ a pɔnɔsi lɛ, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wog rikpaa ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kan wìs Yeesus. 
Pɔnɔsì ànɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì terì, à rì rìɗyaŋ ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ wuɓsɛn ìsu wu Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wuɓsɛn kitɛɛtɛn ki rikem ɗii, 
yɛ̀ɛ à ri yù ɓi ŋwos anɛ̀n lɛ a kem̀ ɓi ɓum ɓii, ɓɛ ki sɛsɛg nyi rì mis ɓi ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi ɓɛ̀cèm; mìnii gherɛ̀ngà gì kɔm̀ ɓɔlɛ ànɛ tì kalìghà mìni.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓìsiì ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓisu win lɛ, di Bɛ̀ll wìs a ki lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ǹɗeèghreŋi wii; à kì tì lɛ ɓi ɓa rì bee i ǹkìyɛn ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi kɔ̀nkɔ̀n, à ki kì lɛ kìsay ki rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ kìkì kɛɛ ɓa lɛ syeesyee. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɗii ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus ɗi ɓiì kemì ɓi mìni, mìnii kem ɓi nyi, lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll wìs, rìì Kan Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee rìsugtìì ɗi Kan Yeesus Kiris, rì rìtaŋzɛ̀n ɗi tì ri taŋzɛn nyi a nyoo, tì tɔɔgh mìni lɛ, 
kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ mum a fyaŋzi mìni kì nyɛ̀ŋi ɓi syeesyee à ǹɗɛli anɛ ɓì rì miì, nsoò lɛ a syaŋdi mìni bwaɓ ɗi rìkuu ɗi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗidɛŋ ɗi ǹghay wudɛŋ wu ri lɛ wu fa nyi, nsoò rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ, nsoò rì kaàtà ànɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ pwaà mìni lɛ ɓìsi yɛɛ kani, ki pisɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos a Kan à mɛ kpaŋ. 
Ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ yègsi mini, nsoò ɓi-ghèy wu la, ɓisuulɛ ŋwos anɛ̀n à yin lɛ à kpaŋ di ɓum ɓɛ ka resi ɓi lɛ ɓɛ naŋi rìgherɛ̀n, Kìɓeɓtàg ki mum ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗyaŋì, ki resɛ̀n. 
Ki ri ɗùù ri com kìcèm ki ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ɓɛ rerèŋì lɛ bɛ̀ll, ki ràm ki kɛ̀n kì kɔ̀rii ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì ki rì lɛ ì Bɛ̀ll, ki rɛsɛ̀n kɔmiɗ lɛ kɔ yɛɛ ri Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓì yitii ɓi lɛ ǹkalìghà mìni kìɓan kiǹ cààmɛ̀n ki m̀ɓaghà di ǹkaka a lɔ̀ŋkin? 
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓì yii lɔŋ com ki ki ka ghegheegh nyi lɛ kɛ̀ɛ ka resɛn ɓigomìnɛ; lɔŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kii ìnnɛ kìɓetàg ki mum kìn ki ɓiì rèsɛɛ. 
Lɛ ìtèɗ wu kiɓe wu a rìnyam wu ti ɓiì kìkii kisay; kɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg lɔŋ lɛ roànɛ à ka ghegheegh mɔ a ɗim̀ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛɛ̀di nyi. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn innɛ Kìɓeɓtàg ki mum ki ɓiì rèsɛɛ yi, Kan à wey kɔ rì cɔ̀ŋzɛn ki ki kpaŋiì nyi ɓi ŋwɔm, à tììsì kɔ rì kìtɛɛtɛn ki ɓi rìsugtìì ɗii. 
Rìyùy ɗi Kiɓeɓtàg ki mum ɗi kìlɛɛ gɛ rì ìtèɗ wu Satàn; à kìi gɛ lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, rì dàm yi ɓiɓan yi ɓɛpwàà; 
à kìi gɛ kìsay ri kìɓe mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm lɛ a ɓɔŋ̀ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗyaŋì ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà ɓi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓi saaɗ ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à ghɛɓsì ɓɔ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Bɛ̀ll à romiì ìtèɗ wu wɛɛ naàzi ɓɔ bee, lɛ ɓɛɛ gherɛn ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà, 
di fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll a yɔm̀ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓi saaɗ, ɓɛ kìnyàà kaa ki ɓaghà lɛ rìkì ɗi kiɓe.
Ɓi san ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkis, ɓɔɔseŋi ɓis ɓɛ Kan a keesag lɛɛ̀gwey, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì fafaa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓisuu kiɓan kin, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà mìni à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀kòrɛn ɓi rìkì ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ kìki lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, rì ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ saaɗ. 
Kìɓan ki Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà tì mìni miì, rì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ tì ghagsìghà mìni ki ri lɛ, ɓi ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi rìkem ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris.
Fɔɔnnɛ sììrɛɛna lɔŋ ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì ɓèŋ ɓìɓan ɓi tì rèsàkà mìni, rì ŋwɔm nsoò lɛ ɓi kaàtà ànɛ tìi nkàniì mìni. 
Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris nyimiɗ, rì Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs anɛ à keesìghà ɓìsi, à fa ɓìsi fɔɔy ànɛ ɓi nɗem ànɛ à rì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, rì dyàɓɛn i syeesyee, 
ɓɛɛ fɔɔ̀si mìni mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ fa mìni ìtèɗ wu kìyɛn ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee, ɓi mɛ̀kìkì min mɛcèm, rì ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓin ɓìcèm.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! ǹsiitɛɛ mìni kì kpaà lɛ: Ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wìs, di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan yɛ̀ɛ kɛn asu ì sààsàà, ì ki keŋkem, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ yɛɛ̀ keŋkem a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig Bɛ̀ll lɛ a kweɗ ɓìsi ɓi ɓyàg ɓi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓi ɓi ri rì rìgɛn, ɓisuulɛ àa ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ ri rì rìgherɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Kan à ti à roòzàg mɛ̀kàg mii; à rì mìni ɓiì faà ìtèɗ, à lɛgsì mìni kìɓeɓtàg ki mum. 
Tì rì rì ǹtyweeyi ri Kan ɓisu win lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi tì tɔɔgh mìni, ɓì ti ɓì kìlàg ɓyɔ ɓì ki rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu, ɓì kìkì ɓyɔ. 
Kan a ki lɛ mɛ̀rem min mɛɛ tiŋi ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Bɛ̀ll, rì rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem ɗi Kiris a falàg.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! tì tɔɔgh mìni ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi wuɓsɛn ɓɛgeni ɓin ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔɓwɛɗ, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeni kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓiɓan ɓi tì rèsìghà mìni. 
Mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lannɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi lɛ ɓi nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀kòò mis, lɛ ɓìsii ɓaghà ɓi ɓɛ̀ɓɔɓwɛɗ yɛ̀ɛ tì ghɛɓkà a lɔ̀ŋkin. 
Mum à faghà ɓi ɓisi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ti ɗi zɛy, tì sasàlà lɔŋ lɛ rì ìru rì ŋwos, tì wowòg mɛ̀tɔɓ rì kìfɔli lɛ ǹtɛ̀g wis wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ siŋ wààdɛŋ ɓi nyòò. 
I tì kìghà fɔlɔɔ, ki yin lɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà ɓi lɛ tì tɔg mìni ǹghɛɓsɛn, tì kɔ̀ngà lɔŋ yɛɛri lɛ ti fa mìni kìfèèghrɛnà ki ɓì rì lɛ ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì. 
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà a lɔ̀ŋkin, tì siŋdɛ̀ngà mìni lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ a say, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi girig lɛ à ɗi. 
Tì kpaa fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ ti wowog lɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ foo ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ cɛɓ ki iɓwɛɗ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kòm com ki kìyɛn, ɓɛ roòròòtɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ. 
Tì tɔɔgh ɓumɓɛ̀n, tì ki reɓ ɓɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus lɛ, ɓɛɛ say ɓi fyòoog , ɓɛ ɗi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓɔmiɗ ɓɔ yɛɛ reni kìɗìg miì.
