Ɓi san wìn, ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, kɛ̀ ɓi fɔy rikì ɗi kirɔɔ. 
I mum à ɓèni kìnɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓiɓan ɓi tì kpaa mìni ɓi kaàtà ànɛ ɓi, ɓàlina kìɓan kiǹ, ɓì lɛg ŋwaànɛ̀n miì, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à ɓiì woògh ǹtoòrìɗ ɗi rìɓa ɗii ɗiǹ. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi teɗ nyi yɛ̀ɛ bènàbena wiǹ, kìɓan kifog rɔ̀gsɛɛna nyi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ geni wiǹ.
Kan ànɛ a falag fyòoog, nnyɛɛ fa mìni fyòoog nyimiɗ ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, bee yicèm; Kan a ɓa rì mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Mɛ̀ɛmiɗ Pol yɛɛ kaniì ɓìtɔkì ɓi, rì càg kɛm̀; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹti ǹsangì ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛm ɓɛ̀cèm, rìkàn ɗyɛm ɗyɛɛ ri lɔɔ.
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Mɛ̀ Pol, ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris lɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs, rì Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì dyàɓɛn yis. 
Ǹkàni Timote, à kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ wɛ̀m à man ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, Bɛ̀ll Seŋi rì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa wɔ̀ lɛ, rì geesɛ̀n, rì rìcenɛ̀n, rì fyòoog.
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹtɔkà wɔ̀ di ǹti lɛ nkɛǹ a Masedwan, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ lɛ, u kɔkɔri a Efɛɛzɛ lɛ u siìtɛn ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ rèresi dɔgtɛ̀n yidɛŋ, 
ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki mɛ̀ɛ̀tɛn ɓi mɛ̀kànkàn rì rìɓààɓààsì ɗi boo ɗi kɛ̀ɛ̀ sugtag, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ titini ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ nyoonyòlɛ̀n, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ghɛɓsi lɛ fèg à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ lɛ a ghɛɓsi ɓum lɛ rìgherɛ̀n a kɛn asu.
Rìsyɔn ɗi ɓi kìɓan ki ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ kiǹ ɗi ri lɛ, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à rìì ɓi nɗem wu wu ri wù tɛnɛn, rì ɓi nɗem wu wu ri lɛ sɛɛghisɛɛghi, rì ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfyèèrɛnà. 
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ nagà bee inɛ̀n, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì bee i ǹkpaakpaayɛn ɓiɓan ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu. 
Ki kɔnkɔ̀n ɓɔ lɛ di ɓaa ɓaa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ pɔɔ̀zii kì yiì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi nsoò com kɔm̀ ki ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, nsoò ki ɓɛɛ̀ sìisiìrɛ̀n ɗì rìkakàlì lɛ ki ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔɔ̀ kpaaghì. 
Tì yii lɛ syeesyee lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ, di mum à kìi kìsay ri ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n; 
tì ki yii lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi yin ɓifalɛn ɓisuu ŋwaà saaɗ, ɓi ri lɔŋ ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì rìgɛn, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wooghrɛn, ɓɛ̀ɓènì rìgherɛ̀n, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ risi nsoò Bɛ̀ll, nsoò ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri kìcèlì, rì ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ weeyì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓaa, rì ɓɛ̀jɛɛ ɓaa, rì ɓisuu ɓɛwolì-ɓum, 
ɓɛ̀kìì-kìzyaa, ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɔràg rì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛ̀baŋì(n) ɓɛ̀kìì-dune ì ɓɛ̀kpàn, rì ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà, ɓɛ̀kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ yi ɓɛpwàà, rì com kìcèm ki ki yin yɛ̀ɛ syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn a kpaakpàà. 
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à ǹkeŋkèmì à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹtin wu ɓɛmààgh a rèrèsì. Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n nnɛ ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀.
Ǹtògsaagh Yeesus Kiris à Kan wìs, ànɛ à faghà mɛ̀ ìtèɗ ɓisuulɛ, à ghɛngà lɛ ǹɗì mum ànɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ tyweeyì, yɛ̀ɛ à ɓɔ̀ngà mɛ̀ lɛ nki nyi kìsay. 
Màànɛ ǹfeèfèngàkà nyi abɛ̀y, ǹ-yeèyèèsì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, ǹkìkì rìbaŋì, mɛ̀ ànɛ̀n innɛ Bɛ̀ll à wokà nyìinyìg ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yighà ɓi com ki ǹkìkìghà, lɛ m̀ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìgherɛɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ geesɛ̀n ì Kan wìs ì rongà ì sòsòɓ, ɓi mɛ̀ bas ɗì rìgherɛ̀n rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à jɛ̀ɛ̀ ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ kiterì rì ǹtyweeyi wucèm yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ Yeesus Kiris à yùghà ɓi ziinɛ lɛ a ghɛɓsi ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, nni ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛǹ, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri lɛ ɓog. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à wokà mɛ̀ nyìinyìg lɛ di Yeesus Kiris a resi rìnìɗ ɗii ɗi nɗem ɓi mɛ̀ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkìì-kìɓe à ǹtonto, fɔɔnnɛ kìɓan kiǹ ki ɓiì ɓaà kìrèmzɛnà ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì gherɛɛ nyi lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Roànɛ a maà làlàmì cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ànɛ à yin lɛ à wu, roànɛ ɓum ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ghɛn, nyi yɛɛ ri m̀bobog à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ rì ǹnyaasɛ̀n, rì rìkem fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Man wɛm̀ Timote, kìɓan ki mɛ̀ ǹsiŋ̀dɛɛ wɔ̀ ki rarɛɛ yì rì ɓìɓan ɓi Nghay à rèsìghà ɓi san wɔ̀ɔ̀; ɓi ɗi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ u ɗùu syeesyee à wɛ̀y, 
ù ɓèŋ rìgherɛ̀n rì syeesyee à ǹɗem. Syeesyee à ǹɗem ànɛ̀n, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ mɛ naŋ nyi, rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa ɗi ɓɛǹ mɛ̀nig yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ rìɓày à teri. 
Imenee rì Alɛgsaŋdirɛ ɓɛ ǹfaghà rì Satàn lɛ ɓɛɛ yilag rìɓèŋ ɗi myɔm maa lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tògti Bɛ̀ll kìɓe, ɓɛ ri ɓi bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ̀n.
Kìɓan ki asu ki ntɔki ki ri lɛ, ɓum ɓɛɛ tɔtɔg Bɛ̀ll ɓìɓan, ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzì nyi, ɓɛ reǹɗèn nyi mɛ̀tɔɓ di ɓɛɛ̀ fafa nyi ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, 
ɓisuu mɛfòm, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀làmì, lɛ di ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki fyòoog rì tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, tì falɛ̀n ɓi rìgherɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, tì ɓa ɗì rìmum. 
Fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ kiì lɛ, à rɔɔtɛ̀n à ki yɛ̀lɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs, 
ànɛ a kɔ̀ngi lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ ghɛn cɛɓ, ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ ɓɛɛ yi saaɗ. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɔŋ bogtɛ̀n, mum à ki ɓa girig bog ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum, nnyɛɛ ri Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì mum; 
nnyɛɛ falɛ̀ngà nyimiɗ lɛ a leɓ pon anɛ ɓi gòri ì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm; fɔlɔɔ a rì kìɓan ki ki kilɛ̀ngà, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ki ɓaghà kìsiŋdɛn, 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ rɛsìghà mɛ̀ miì lɛ mɓa ǹghagsì-ɓɔlɛ rì ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom anɛ miì. Nkpaakpaa saaɗ, m̀pwàa ɓi, ǹɗì ǹɗèsàg à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ànɛ a rèresi ɓɔ rìgherɛ̀n, rì saaɗ.
Rìkɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀ ɗi ri min lɛ ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓɛɛ ɓɔɔɓɔ̀ŋzàg jàŋ bimiɗ, ɓɛ pɛpɛ̀sì ɓyàg ɓi ɓi ri ɓì tɛnɛn aɗyoo, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bim nsoò paàzì.
Ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì waataagh yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓɛ ɓa rì ntoòrìɗ; ǹwaà waa wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yeesɛn, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaaghraagh tyòŋ ti ti yeesɛɛ rìɓag, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ waatɛn mɛrɛ̀ŋ mɛ gol nsoò lɛ mɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀syaghɛn ri ɓyom ɓi ɓi ciɓtaagh kìrɔɔ, nsoò ɓìlàà ɓi ɓi kɛŋi lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Lɔŋ ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì, ɓyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà mɛ̀rɛ̀ŋ maa, lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì rìgherɛ̀n. 
Giɓ a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ a maàrɛn lɛ fyòoog cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi nyi, à ɓa rì mɛ̀wog lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Mɛ̀ ǹfaa ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ itèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ reresi  nsoò lɛ ɓɛɛ lami ɓɛ̀baŋì, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ki sìmi myɔm maa, 
ɓisuulɛ Adam nnɛ ɓɛ lokà kì kìi, ɓɛ ɓɔ̀ɓ min Ɛɛvɛ, 
rì tì lɛ àa Adam nnɛ ɓɛ yegsìghà, lɔŋ giɓ innɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ yègsì, à kì kìɓe. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, à ki rì ɓiì ghɛɛ cɛɓ, lɛ à rì rì ɓɔn, ɗì lɛ à ɓèŋi rìgherɛ̀n, à ghɛɓ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, à ɓèŋɗɛ̀n ǹtɛnɛn ɓi nghay, à ki sɛɛ̀dɛn nyimiɗ ɓi zi.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì lɛ, i kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn mum lɛ a ɓa ŋwaànɛ a kɛɛ̀si Kìseŋi, di ŋwaànɛ̀n miì a kɔ̀nkɔn syeesyee à kìsaay. 
Nni ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀sì-kìseŋi a ɓa ŋwaànɛ à yin ɗi kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ cɛɛ̀cɛ̀mdɛ̀n. À ɓa giɓ bog, kɛ̀ɛ keesi ɓinɔɔ̀nɔɔ̀, à ɓa ŋwaà ɗyomzɛ̀n, à yi rìghɛɓ rì ɓum, à ɓègì ɓɛ̀kèn a mɛɛ mii lɛ syeesyee, à ki ɓa ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ à yi rìrèsàg ɗi ɓum ɓìɓan. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ a ɓa kìnɔɔ̀ mɛ̀rɔ̀g nsoò lɛ mum à ɓìgùg, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ lɛ a ɓa kìfyòoog ki mum, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa mum à ɓɛsaaka nsoò lɛ à keesì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì naa yìì i ɓum lɛ syeesyee, à yi rìkì lɛ ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛɛ ɓa rì mɛ̀wog, ɓɛ falàg nyi bɔgsɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Ɓisuulɛ i mum à yii ɓi rikɛ̀ɛ̀sì ɗi naa yìì i ɓum lannɛ à rì lɛ à yi rìfiɓì ɗi Kìseŋi ki Bɛ̀ll? 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ à ɓa ŋwaànɛ à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ ǹɗen nyɔn, lɛ ɓìdaŋà ɓi ri lɛ ɓi ɓɔg nyi ɓi nto, à ki ghay lɛ à teri zɔɔ yi Satàn. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi dan ɓɛɛ sɛg nyi di ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sɛɛti nyi, fɔlɔɔ a kì nyi lɛ a kpi ɓi fìram fi Satàn.
Ɓɛ̀dyaakìrɛ̀ girig ɓɛɛ ɓa rì rìmum, ɓɛ ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓiì ghèeghelɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ falɛn ɓi mɛ̀rɔ̀g lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓiì kaakaa rifɔ̀n ɗi mɛsòo; 
ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋì ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓìnyamɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n rì nɗem wu wu ri wùtɛnɛn. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ ka fèèghrɛ̀n ɓɔ fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ teɗ min mɛkɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓɛdyaakìrɛ̀ di ɓɛ ghɛɛ ɓi kiɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn a lɔ̀ŋkaa. 
Ɓɛ̀yiɓ girig ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì rìmum, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ falɛn ɓi mɛ̀rɔ̀g, ɓɛ ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ tyweeyì ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm. 
Dyaakìrɛ̀ à ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà giɓ bog, à ki kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì ɓɔn ɓii, rì rìmɛɛ ɗii lɛ syeesyee. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ki dyaakìrɛ̀ lɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛɛ̀ nyaanyaàsì, ɓɛ ki rì lɛ ɓɛ totòg kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris ɓi nɗem ɓi kìɓan ki wu tì rì rì wɔ ɓi Yeesus Kiris.
Ǹkàniì wɔ̀ kaàtà ànɛ kìɓan kifog, ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi lɛ ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì yùu ki ghɛɛ̀ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀ mɛtiì. 
Kìɓan kifog, nsoò màa lɛ̀mzii yì, ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaa ɓi ri wɔ̀ ɓiì rèsii lannɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ u ghɛɓ ɓi naa ì ɓum ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì rì kìseŋi ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem à ki ɓa rikwìy ɗì kìlèmì ki saaɗ. 
Ki ri girig saaɗ lɛ kìɓan ki ki ri kìnyamɛn ɓi ntyweeyi wis ki rimi yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, kìɓan kiǹ ki yughày yɛ̀ɛ mum à mɛ̀mùù, ki ghɛnɛ̀n lɛ ki ri lɛ saaɗ rì ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, ki resɛ̀n a ɓum ɓɛ titom, ki kaàkàlɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìlɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ki gherɛn kɔ ɓi ziinɛ, ki ɓɔg aɗyoo ɓi rìgwey  ɓi ɗùm.
Ǹghay a kpaaghi lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ, ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn, ɓum ɓɛɗɛŋ ɓɛ naŋigɛ rìgherɛ̀n, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì mɛ̀ghay mɛ mɓɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n rì dɔgtɛ̀n yi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay; 
ɓi fyɛɛ̀-fyɛɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm ìghèy ɓi ɗùm à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ mɛ̀rem maa mɛ ri mɛ̀ tɔ̀nɛn ɗi swiɗ ànɛ à ɓàŋiì ɓi ɗuu lɛ pɔɔŋ. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ rerèg lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ wɔlɛn, kɛ̀ɛ ki ɗi ɓiɗilàg ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà lɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ yii saaɗ ɓɛɛ ɗiɗi di ɓɛɛ̀ fafa nyi ɓìtògsɛ̀n. 
Kɔlɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ, fɔɔnnɛ com ki màghɛn ki yin; kɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg yɛɛri lɛ mum a ɗi com kìcèm di a fafa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, 
ɓisuulɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, rì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ɓi ti ɓi kilàg lɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìtɛnɛn.
Ù rì ɓiì ɓaà syeesyee à ǹkìì-kìsay a Yeesus Kiris di u kakali ɓɛgoni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ù ki rèresi lɛ u mɛmɛni wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ɓi nghay rì ɓìɓan ɓi righerɛ̀n rì syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n ànɛ ù yilàkà yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ. 
Kìɓan kifog, ù càɗ dàɗkì yi zɛy rì mɛ̀kànkàn mɛ ɓitùg ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ. 
Mɛ̀ɛ̀zi nyoo yɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n; ɓisuulɛ rìmɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɗi nyoo ɓi tìcàɓ ti tyɛɛ̀ fafa itèɗ ɓi mɛ̀mùù ɗi ɓiisɛɛ ɓi kiɓaà rì gɛɓsɛ̀n kɔm̀ lɛ rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ghɛɓsii bee lɛɛ̀gwey; ɗi ri rì ǹkàg wu cɛɓ ki gɛɛ̀nɛ rì ki kɛɛ̀ yùyuiy. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à jɛ̀ɛ̀ ànɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì kɛ̀ɛ̀ nywey. 
Kìɓan ki ɓìsiì kpuukputɛ̀n, tì ki ɗùùɗuu miì ki ri lɛ, tì fogà dyàɓɛn yis ɓi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem, à ki ɓa nghɛɓsì-ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm à ɓiisɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n.
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì siŋɗɛɛ ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ ki, ù ki rèeresàg ɓɔ ɓyɔ̀. 
Mum kɛ̀ɛ sɛɛti riɓa ɗyɔɔ ɗi ùrì ŋwɔɓti, kìɓan kifog, ɓaya kìfèèghrɛnà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓi ɓìtòkì ɓyɔɔ, ɗì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyɔɔ, rì ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, rì ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, rì ɓi rìtɛn.
À kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì yùu, sììrɛn ɓi rìɓàɓày ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll rì rìrerèɓ ɗi ɓum, ɗì rìrèèrèsàg ɗi ɓɔ. 
Kɔ̀ɔ sɛɛti rifa ɗi Nghay ɗi ù rì ri ɗyɔ, ɗi ù tekà ɓi rìkpaa ɗi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓɛ kpaaghà, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Kiseŋi ɓɛ saghì wɔ̀ ɓyàg ɓi nyòò. 
Falɛn wɛ̀ɛmiɗ bimiɗ ù ki foŋ ǹɗem ɓi kìsay kiǹ di fɔɔnnɛ kɛɛ ghɛnɛn ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ rìkìkì ɗyɔɔ ɗi kisay ɗyɛɛ̀ ceecenɗɛ̀n. 
Ù konàg lɛ rì wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, rì ɓìɓan ɓi u rèresi ɓum, ù ki sììrɛn miì rì ìtèɗ; ɓisuulɛ i u kìki fɔlɔɔ, ù ɓiì ghɛɓsii lɛ rì wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog rikpaa ɗyɔɔ.
Kɔ̀ɔ fwààdag kitùg ki mum, kìɓan kifog ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ù reɓ nyi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ soŋi; ù reɓkì ɓɛ̀dɛlì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀goni, 
ù reɓkì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ù rì lɛ ù reɓ ɓɛ̀gaa, ù reɓkì ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛɓwɛɗ yɛ̀ɛ ù rì lɛ ù reɓ ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛ ɓɛyìɓ; rìkì ɗiǹ ɗìcèm ɗi ɓa ɗìtɛnɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Nyaasag mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ mɛ mɛ ri lɛ mɛ̀kpɔɓ. 
I ǹkpɔɓ wu giɓ wu ri rì ɓɔn nsoò lɛ dòò, ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ka ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì loògh kì yilaagh lannɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɓ ɓi naa yàà i ɓum yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, ɓɛ fa ɓɛ̀yalì ɓaa ɓyom ɓi ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓɔ kì faà lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ti à rɔɔghì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ǹkpɔɓ wu wu ri lɛ ǹkpɔɓ, wu wu rɔɓi nlɛŋlɛŋ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ mum, wu ri nkpɔɓ wu wu ri rì dyàɓɛn yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, wɔ yɛɛ ti wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fwɛy ritɔtɔ̀g ɗi Bɛ̀ll ǹghɛɓsɛn ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos. 
Kìɓan kifog, ǹkpɔɓ wu wɛɛ̀ ka nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì rìyɛ̀y ɗi cɛɓ wu ri kìloŋ nsoò yɛ̀ɛ wu kaka cem̀. 
Ɓìɓan ɓi ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ u siŋɗag mɛ̀kpɔɓ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓìn, lɛ di ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ cɛmdɛ̀n mɔ miì. 
I mum à yii ɓi rìɓèŋ ɗi ɓum ɓii, à ɓiisɛ̀n rìmɛɛ ɗii, di à roòzɛɛ rìgherɛ̀n; rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi fɔlɔɔ ɗi ɓeɓtɛɛ ɗi cee ŋwaànɛ à yin ngherɛ̀n. 
Ɓi ɗi lɛ ɓɛɛ kaǹ ǹkpɔɓ wu giɓ ɓi bàlì ì mɛ̀kpɔɓ, wu ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi kiɓaà giɓ anɛ à ka kpaŋ ɓi bèg mɛ̀tin mɛraa, wu ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà giɓ anɛ à wɔlà lɔŋ yii bog. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ a ɓa giɓ anɛ ɓum ɓɛ yii ɓìsyeesyee ɓii ɓi mɛkìkìì, ànɛ à mɛ tɔɔsag ɓɔn, ànɛ àa nghàɓkì ɓɛ̀kèn lɛ syeesyee, à sòòghì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n mɛ̀kòò, à ghɛɓsàg ɓum ɓɛ nyìinyìg, à ki kaakaa lɛ a ki ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee. 
Kìɓan kifog ù ɓèn mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ mɛ kaka ɓìɓwɛɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓisuulɛ i ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀rem maa mɛɛ̀ ka kɔ̀nkɔn ɓi mɛ ghasi ɓɔ rì Kiris ɓɛ ɓa rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛngi tì mɛ̀wɛy, 
ɓɛ ɓa rì bɛ̀lɛn ɓisuulɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi yogsii ǹsiŋdɛn waa wu ǹtonto wu ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ teɗ. 
À kɛ̀ɛ̀dì kì ɓaà lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsay, ɓɛ yilàg ǹdèŋì wulɛ, rì naa ìnɛ̀n miì ɓɛ ɗiŋì, ɓɛ teetì cɛɓ ki ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ rì mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, ɓɛ sagtɛ̀n ɓi rìɓa ɗi ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìsay, ɓɛ kpaakpàà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓaa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki kpaà. 
Rìkɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀ ɗi ri lɛ mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ mɛ kaka ɓɔɓti, mɛɛ kɛngi tì mɛ̀wɛy, mɛ yay ɓɔn, mɛ ɓeŋ̀ naa yaa, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ nɛm bènàbena bee inɛ a totog ɓìsi kìɓe. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ti gì ɓɛ̀ ɗimɛn bee, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì Satàn. 
I giɓ adɛŋ ànɛ à rì ǹgherɛ̀n à rì rì mɛ̀kpɔɓ mɛ mɛ riì ɓi boo yìì i mum, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ mɔ kìɓèŋi, lɛ ǹtɛ̀g wu mɛkpɔɓ mɛǹ wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ siŋ ɗi Kìseŋi ki Kiris, fɔɔnnɛ Kìseŋi ki ri lɛ ki teɗ ǹtɛ̀g wu mɛkpɔɓ mɛ mɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ mum.
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Kiseŋi ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì ɓìɓan lɛ syeesyee, à ɓiisɛ̀n ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ teetekì ǹtɔɓ lɛ ɓɛɛ kakali ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki rèresi ɓyɔ, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ǹyaasɛ̀n ànɛ à cee à ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog gɛ̀n yiɓɛɛ̀. 
Ɓisuulɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Ɓaa kàŋ ɓi ŋwɔm wu sanìnya ànɛ a kìki kisay, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkìì-kìsay a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ rì mɛ̀lèɓ. 
Kɔ̀ɔ gherag sɔmìnà à ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn a Kìseŋi di ɓɛ̀nkɔ̀ɔwa ɓɛ yin ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ nsoò lɛ ɓɛraa ɓɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaàzi sɔmìnà ànɛn. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kii kìɓe, fwààdag ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ ri girig ɓiì risii. 
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓi mis mɛ Yeesus Kiris, rì ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn lɛ, u ɓeŋ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹsiitaagh wɔ̀ ɓiǹ, kɔ̀ɔ saa mum ìsu, kɔ̀ɔ ki ɓa ri nɗèè wu nɗem. 
Kɔ̀ɔ fyɛ̀ɗmag kisaghii mum ɓyàg ɓi nyoo lɛ duri yàa tani, kɔ̀ɔ ɓɛmdag ɓiɓe ɓi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓèŋɗɛn wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ntɛnɛn. 
Càra kìɓan ki lɛ mɛ̀nig mɛɛ̀mɛ u nɔlag mɔ rì mɔ, wɔ̀lɛ ù nɔlàg ɓɔɔ mɛrɔ̀g ɓisuu kifuu kɔɔ, rì kìɓan kɔɔ ki nyàanyamɓɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm. 
Ɓìɓe ɓi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓi ti ɓi ɓalàg ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn nsoò di ɓɛ ka yɔm̀ ɓi ɓɔ; ɓi ɓɛro ɓɛmbog ɓi ghɛnàg ajɛ̀m ì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ syeesyee mɛ ti mɛ ghɛnàg lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n, mɛ mɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ɓi mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki rɔ̀ɓ a rìnyam.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛɛ̀ ɓɛ̀masà ɓaa lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì bɔgsɛ̀n bimiɗ, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sòòti lɛ rì ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll, rì dɔgtɛ̀n yìs. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ ɓɛ̀masà ɓaa ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki sɛɛtii ɓɛ̀masà ɓaa rì ǹkpaà lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ righerɛ̀n; kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓɔ kì kìkii ɓisay à cee fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, rì tì lɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ nɗem ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay fɔlɔɔ lɛ syeesyee.
Ɓìɓan ɓi ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsaagh di u siisiŋdàg ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓìn lɔɔ. I mum a rèresi dɔgtɛ̀n ìdɛŋ, kɛ̀ɛ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ɓi syeesyee à rìkpaa à Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris, rì yɛ̀ɛ rìrèsì ɗi dɔgtɛ̀n ìnɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɗì rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, 
di ɓìdaŋà ɓi roni ŋwaànɛ̀n miì ɓi nɗem, kɛ̀ɛ ki yi com, à rì ŋwaànɛ a roròɓ firoɓ fi lɛ a nyoònyòlɛ̀n di a saasaàkɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki mii; jàŋ inɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛnɛ ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi ti ɓi fuughàg yì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀mììghrɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀paàzì, mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, kìnɗèmɓàg ki ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn, 
rì nyoey yi yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ren ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓumɓɛ mɛ̀yitì maa mɛ ti ɓigɛŋ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi saaɗ, ɓɛ ki fèki lɛ rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ri kìɓan ki mum à rì lɛ à fɔ̀nfɔ̀n miì. 
Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ri bee i rìfɔ̀n, di mum à nyààrɛɛ rì gàɓ ì com ìnɛ à rì rì yɔ̀. 
Ɓisuulɛ tì yùghày ɓi ri com ɓi ziinɛ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tyàa sug ɓi girig rì com. 
I tì rì lɛ rì ɓìɗilàg rì com ki waatɛn lèg ànɛn à ghɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗì ɓìsi. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ di ɓaa kumi, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpilàg ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn rì ɓi fìram fi lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì zày ì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓiyèg rì ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓi ti ɓi pikì mum ɓi rìɗyaŋ rì ɓi rìwu. 
Ɓisuulɛ kìsee ki mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ki ri ǹɗyèm wu ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓìcèm, nni ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ falɛ̀ngà ɓi kìsee ki mɔ̀ɔ̀ni kìn, ɓɛ ghasɛ̀ngà rì rìgherɛ̀n, ɓɛ ki syòŋ yi ɓɔmiɗ mɛtɔɓ ɓi nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey.
Ɓi ɓɛg wɔ̀ɔ̀, wàànɛ ù rì mum à Bɛ̀ll, lɛgha ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, ɓìcèm; u kaà lɛ rì saaɗ, rì rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, rì rìgherɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, ɗì rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem, ɗì rìɓa ɗi lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Ɗùùya syeesyee à wɛ̀y a rìgherɛ̀n, ù ɓan cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ki Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà wɔ̀ lɛ u teɗ, cɛɓ kìn kɛɛ̀ki ù tòòghrɛ̀ngà ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓitòkì miì, ɓi mis mɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ ù rèsìghà rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ. 
Ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à falàg ɓyom ɓìcèm cɛɓ, rì ɓi mis mɛ Yeesus Kiris, ànɛ à konàkà kì rèsii righerɛ̀n ɗii ɓi mis mɛ Pilat lɛ, 
u ɓeŋ̀ kìdɔ̀gsɛna, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn à kpaŋ a rìsugtìì ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris, 
kìɓan kiǹ ki ri ɓa ɓi cààmɛ̀n ànɛ ɓɛ fekà lɛ kɛɛ ɓa, ɓi rìkì ɗi roànɛ à rì ǹtin wu ɓɛmààgh, à ki ɓa mbobog à ǹlàmì, nyi yɛɛ ri rìfòm ɗi ɗi lamii mɛ̀fòm mɛcèm, nyi Kan ànɛ a ɓɛ̀kan, 
nyi cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ yin lɛ à wu, à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn ki mum à yin lɛ à kpaŋ wɔɔ, mum à ka ghɛngà ɓi nyi, nnyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ǹnyaasɛ̀n, rì ìtèɗ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Tɔgha ɓɛ̀guŋgum ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri kalɛn, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki foŋ dyàɓɛn yaà ɓi ìkum wu wu ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹtyweeyi, ɓɛɛ foŋ lɔŋ dyàɓɛn yaà yɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à falàg ɓìsi ɓyom ɓìcèm lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ ti wog kìrɔɔ rì ɓyɔ. 
Kali ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛɛ kiki kìrɔɔ, ɓɛɛ kum̀ ɓi ɓìsyeesyee ɓi mɛkìkìì, ɓɛ ɓa rì rìɓòò, ɓɛ fafà ɓum ɓyom, 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì taŋzɛɛ ikum wu wu rɔɔtɛɛ wu ki kpegmɛn ɓisuu cɛɓ ki kɛɛ̀ yùyuiy, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì terì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à cɛɓ.
Timote, konag kì ɓèŋi com ki ɓɛ tɛfɛ̀ngà rì wɔ̀, ù lèg kɛɛgh à kɛ̀ɛ̀-su ànɛ kɛ̀ɛ wuɓsɛn ɓiɓan ɓi righerɛ̀n, rì nyoey yi riyi ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ɗi ri ɓi zɛ̀ɗ. 
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ghasɛ̀ngà rì rìgherɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà bee inɛ̀n. Geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni.
Mɛ̀ Pol ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris lɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓi nkàg wu cɛɓ wu wu ri ɓi Yeesus Kiris, 
ǹkàni Timote à man wɛm̀ à nɗem, Bɛ̀ll Seŋi wìs, rì Yeesus Kiris Kan wìs, ɓɛɛ fa wɔ̀ geesɛ̀n ɗì rìcenɛ̀n, rì fyòoog
Ǹfaa Bɛ̀ll ànɛ nkìki kisay ɓitògsɛ̀n; kìsay kiǹ, ki ri rìkɛ̀n ɗi beèbɛ̀y ɗì kìsay ki ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ kighà nyi; nkìki kɔ rì nɗem wu sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹfɔli ɓi wɔ rìɓùŋ yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛm̀; 
ɓisuulɛ ǹti ǹ-yiìyìtì misì mɔɔ fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ di màa ghɛɛ̀dii wɔ̀ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹɗem wɛ̀m wɛɛ rongi rì kìnyàà lɛ pisa. 
N-yiiyitì girig rìgherɛ̀n ɗi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìghèy azi ɗi ɗi ri wɔ̀ ɓi nɗem, rìkuu ɗi righerɛ̀n ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi gaa à ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn anɛ lɛ Lɔyis à ɓaghà rì ɗyɔ, Enis à jɛɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ ri ɗyɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗem wɛ̀m wùcèm wu gherɛɛ lɛ ɗi ri girig fɔlɔɔ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹtɔɔgh wɔ̀ lɛ, u lɔŋ̀zi tì ɗuu ɗi ɓi rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ù tekà yɛ̀ɛ ǹsaghìghà wɔ̀ ɓyàg ɓi nyòò. 
Lɛ àa ǹghay à kìɗyɔn innɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓìsi, lɔŋ ǹghay à ìtèɗ, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n rì ɗyomzɛ̀n innɛ à faghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kɔ̀ɔ wog ntoòrìɗ lɛ u tɛɛ̀zi kìɓan ki Kan wìs, nsoò lɛ ki màànɛ ǹɗì kìmbùŋ ɓisu wii. Kìɓan kifog ɓi-tèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll, wogha rìkɛŋ ɓisuu Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ǹɗaŋ ri mɛ̀, 
Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ kweɗkà ɓìsi, à ki reŋi ɓisi ǹɗeèghreŋi wu wu ri wùtɛnɛn, àa ɓisuu mɛkìkìì mis, lɔŋ ɓisuu fèg wìì a nyimiɗ rì geesɛ̀n yìì inɛ à kìghà ɓìsi ɓi Yeesus Kiris; à kìghà kìɓan kiǹ di ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi a rìtumɛ̀n ɓi ka yin. 
Geesɛ̀n ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ mɛ rèsɛn ɓigomìnɛ ɓi rìyù ɗi nkòrì wìs Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à ɓigtɛ̀ngà rì rìwu, à kpaŋzì lɛ rì cɛɓ rì rìɓa ɗi lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ bwɛ̀y, ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn, ɓi bee ì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n innɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà mɛ̀ lɛ nlaàlamɓɛ̀n m̀ɓa ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ǹɗèsàg ànɛ miì. 
Ɓisu wìn miì nnɛ nwowog mɛtɔɓ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ, wɔ̀lɛ ki faa ɓi mɛ ntoòrìɗ ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yii roànɛ ǹgherɛ̀ngà; ǹɗem wɛ̀m wùcèm wu yii saaɗ wu ki gherɛn lɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à ɓèŋ com ki à tɛfɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀, à kpaŋ ŋwos anɛ̀n.
Tera ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓiɓan ɓɛ ù wokà a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, ɓɛɛ ɓa wɔ̀ kìrèmzɛnà ù ki sììrɛn ɓi ntyweeyi rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, ɓi tì rì rì ɓyɔ ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓiɗùm. 
Ɓèŋa syeesyee à rìrèsàg ànɛ ù rì rì nyi, rì nghɛɓsɛn wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ki ri ɓi ɓìsi.
Ù yii lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri a Azii ɓɛ nagà mɛ̀, ɓumɓɛ lɛ rì Fizyɛl rì Ɛrimozyɛn ɓɛ ri ɓi bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ̀n. 
Kan à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsii ǹɗem wii wu nyìinyìg ɓi naa ì ɓum ì Onezifɔɔr ɓisuulɛ ɓyaàmɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, a fɔɔsag mɛ nɗem, kɛ̀ɛ wog ntoòrìɗ ri naà-zày ìnɛ ǹɗì miì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà a Rom, à ghagsɛ̀ngà mɛ̀ rì rìkaa, rì kìɗìg à ki ghɛn mɛ. 
Kan à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi lɛ Bɛ̀ll a resi nyi kìrɔɔ-ǹɗem wìì ŋwos anɛ̀n. Ɓìsay ɓìcèm ɓi Onezifɔɔr à kìghà mɛ̀ a Efɛɛzɛ, wɔ̀ yɛɛ raŋ̀zii ɓyɔ kì yiì ù cee ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni wɔ̀ man wɛm̀, foŋa ìtèɗ ɓì geesɛ̀n ìnɛ ì rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris ɓi ɗùm. 
Kìɓan ki ù wokà mɛ̀ di nkakàlì ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛwusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛɛ̀gwey, ghagsi kɔ rì ɓum ɓɛ ntyweeyi ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛ resàg girig ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ. 
Wogha mɛ̀tɔɓ nɗaŋ ri mɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ syeesyee à sujàà à Yeesus Kiris. 
Sujàà ànɛ àrì ɓi kìsay à kaakàà lɛ a puɓsi ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n wìì nɗem, ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi cɛɓ ki zɛy ɓi ti ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓùùsi nyi ǹto. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛŋì-mɛ̀ree ànɛ à kpaŋi beèbɛ̀y ɓi ǹlog à mɛ̀ree, à yin lɛ à teɗ tàm à rìkem di à nɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓi mɛsiŋdɛn mɛ ɓi nlog. 
Ǹsalì-dɛm anɛ a teetekì ǹtɔɓ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ŋwaà beèbɛ̀y ànɛ a teɗ ɓìɗùn. 
Wogha com ki nkpaakpàà, ɓisuulɛ Kan à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm.
Yiti Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à ghèmɓɛ̀ngày a ɓìloŋ, di à yalɛɛ yì ɓi boo ì mum ì Davit lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹghaaghagsì a kpaakpàà; 
Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n nnɛ nwowog mɛtɔɓ miì à kpaŋ ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ kaŋ̀ mɛ̀ bɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹwolì-ɓum, kìɓan kifog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll yɔ̀ɔ̀ yin nkàŋɛn bɛn. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki nceecenɛ̀n mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀cèm ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn lɛ di ɓɔ girig ɓɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ ki ki ri ɓi Yeesus Kiris bas rì rìkem ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì saaɗ: I tì wughà nɗaŋ ɗi nyi, tì rì girig ɓiì ghɛɓì nɗaŋ ɗi nyi.
I tì sììrɛɛ tyɛ̀ ki càrɛn lɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ, tì rì ɓiì làmii girig nɗaŋ ɗi nyi; I tì roòzɛɛ nyi, nyii roòzɛɛ gɛ girig ɓìsi.
I ɓìsii ti tyɛ̀ ki roòzi mɛkàg mis, nyii ri lɔŋ roànɛ a roozag mɛkàg mii cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓisuulɛ nyii yin lɛ à roòzɛ̀n rìɓa ɗii ɗi nyimiɗ.
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓìiɓiìtàg ɓum, ù ki siisiŋdɛ̀n ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ ɓɛɛ lɛg ɓɛsaaka rì rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki mii, lɛ ɓi ghɛɓsii ɓi com, di nya lɛ ɓyɛɛ ɗyaŋzi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog ɓɛsaaka ɓɛǹ. 
Tèèsi nyoo lɛ u ghɛnɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à mɛ rèsi ɓum lɛ à rì mum, yɛ̀ɛ ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ à yin lɛ à wog ǹtoòrìɗ ri kìsay kii, ànɛ a rèresi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì saaɗ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. 
Càra ɓìtòkì ɓi zɛy ɓi ɓi yin ɓiì kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi righerɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog rikuu ɗi ɓitòkì ɗiǹ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ràaraɓsɛ̀n tì rì rìgherɛ̀n à cee fɔlɔɔ. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ yàà i rì yɛ̀ɛ kìɓɛɛ ki ki ti ki cɛkì mum ìkòò, ki kpaŋ ɓi kìwoɓ. Imenee rì Filɛt ɓɛ ri ɓi bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ̀n; 
ɓɛ pasɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ caɗ saaɗ, ɓɛ yoòyògsì rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ, rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ ɗi mɛ kpaŋ. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ kìgɔ̀ŋgɔ̀m ki mɛɛ ki Bɛ̀ll à yàghɛ̀ngà kìtoŋ miì ki kaka lɛ kpeg-kpeg. Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì miì ǹkànɛn yɛ̀ɛ sìtam̀ lɛ: Kan à yii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛŋkìì; fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ a rereŋi ɗii ɗi Kan, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ à sɔ̀ŋì ìkòò wii ɓi kìɓe. 
Àa ɓɛ̀ɓɛŋi ɓɛ gol rì ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kìyɛn ri swiɗ à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ ɓalàg ɓi mɛɛ mɛ mɛ teghɛɛ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ̀ɓɛŋi ɓɛ soɓɛn ri kìte rì ɓɛ yèŋɛn ri fyòò ɓɛ rilàg girig wɔɔ. Ɓɛ kìyɛn ri gol, rì ɓɛ swiɗ à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓɛ ri ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi bànà, ɓɛmbog ɓisuu titom ti zɛy. 
Nni i mum à ɓèŋɗɛɛ nyimiɗ ntɛnɛn à rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓɛŋi anɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ teɗ ŋwosi kiɓan ki bànà; ɓɛŋi a ǹtɛnɛn ànɛ à rì rì gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓisuu ŋwaànɛ à rì rì nyi, à ki ɓa ɓɛŋi anɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓisuu rikì ɗi ɓyom ɓi syeesyee.
Lɛgha ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ti ɓi rɔɔghì ɓɛ̀dɛlì; kaaya saaɗ, rì rìgherɛ̀n, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, rì fyòoog ànɛ rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ regì ɗii ɗi Kan rì nɗem wu tɛnɛn. 
Ɓèna nyoey yi zɛy rì zɛy yi yi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀-su, ù ki yi lɛ, yi ti yi syogìì ɓɛsaaka. 
Ǹkìì-kìsay a Kan à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà mum à ɓɛ̀saaka; à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ lɛ a ghɛɓ rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, à ɓa ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ à rèsàg ɓum ɓìɓan, à ki yi rinìɗ ɗi nɗem. 
À rèrèsì ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓii zɛ̀ɗ yaa ri nɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, rì ntyweeyi lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɛ à fa ɓɔ mààgh ànɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem, ɓɛɛ kpaŋ̀ ɓi nɗɛli wu ɓɛɛ yi saaɗ, 
fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ sugtiì ɓi ɓɔmiɗ, ɓɛ ki sɔtɛn yi ɓi fìram fi Satàn a wɔɔsìghà ɓɔ miì lɛ ɓɛɛ kiki lɔŋ rìkɔ̀n ɗii.
Yiya lɛ, ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn, ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ri ɓiì ɓaà. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓa ɓɛ̀wemwèm, ɓɛ̀keesì-mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀daŋàdaŋa, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀kìì-kalɛn, ɓɛ feèfèngì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ kikì ɓɛ̀yalì ɓaa ntoòtèɗ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ foŋ kirɔɔ ki ɓum ɓɛ kii ɓɔ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ risi ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri kìcèlì. 
Ɓɛ ɓa mɛ̀rem mɛ̀tèrɛn, ɓɛ ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ nyìighnyìg, ɓɛ kikì ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓanɛn, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀wolì-ɓum, ɓɛ ki ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kirɔɔ, 
ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀tɔ̀kɔ̀tɔkɔ, ɓɔ mɛ̀rem lɛ bùɓbùɓ, ɓɔ rì kalɛn ɓi nɗem, ɓɛ keesì rìyɛ̀y ɗi cɛɓ ki mɛmùù à cee Bɛ̀ll; 
ɓɛ ri rɔ̀ɓ ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓi rìseesèè ɗi ɓidan, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ roòzɛ̀n com ki ki ri ìtèɗ wu righerɛ̀n. Ràɓsɛn mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum mɛ fɔlɔɔ. 
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ waa ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɗiŋɗàg ɓi ɓɛ̀naa, ɓɛ ɓangìì ɓɔɔ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ tɛtɛɛgh ǹkun wu ɓiɓe, ɓɛ ki ɓa ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi mɛ̀mùù mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu ɓyɛɛ̀ yeeyeèsì, ɓi ɗiɗì mɛ̀rem ɗì rìkɔ̀n; 
ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ri lɔŋ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi cilag, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wu ɓɛɛ yi saaɗ. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Zyanɛs rì Zyamɓirɛs ɓɛ ramgà wɛ̀y ri Moyis, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ ɗùùɗuu girig rì saaɗ, ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ nghay waa wu ti wù ɗimɛn bee, rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa ɗi yiǹ lɛ ɗi ɓanɛ̀n di mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛ tanɛɛ ɓɔ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓaa kɛ̀ɛ̀di ɓi beèbɛ̀y lɛ kìyèg kaa ki rikì ki ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki Zyanɛs rì Zyamɓirɛs ki ghɛnɛ̀ngà.
Ɓi ɓɛg wɔ̀ɔ̀, ù ghɛngà rìrèsì ɗyɛm̀ lɛ syeesyee, rì rìghɛghɛ̀ɓ ɗyɛm̀, rì ɓɛ̀fèg ɓɛm, ɗì rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɛm̀, ɗì rìnìɗ ɗyɛm̀ ɗi nɗem, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɛ̀m, rì kìsììrì kɛm̀, 
ù yii lɛ rì ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ànɛ ntuutulɛ̀n rì nyi, rì mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ǹwowoogh; rìkuu ɗi ntɔɓ aɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ǹɗɔ̀ɓi lɛ ǹghɛɛ ɓi a Aŋtyos rì Ikonyɔm rì a Listirɛ? Rìkuu ɗi ǹ-yeesɛ̀n aɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ǹɗɔ̀ɓi lɛ ǹtulɛɛ ɓi ri ɗyɔ, ǹki sìisiìrì nɗem? Wɔ̀lɛ Kan à ghɛɓsìghà mɛ̀ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n mɛ̀cèm. 
Ki ri gì lɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki lɛ ɓɛ falɛ̀n rì Bɛ̀ll ɓi Yeesus Kiris lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, ɓɛ ri ɓiì tulɛɛ ri ǹ-yeesɛ̀n, à ɓum. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum rì ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ri ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni lɔŋ beèbɛ̀y ɗì rìkìkì ɗi kiɓe, ɓɛ naànààzì ɓum bee lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɔɔ ka rì ɓɛ̀ɗimɛn bee.
Wɔ̀ɔ̀ sììrɛn lɛ tiŋtiŋ ɓi kìɓan ki ù yilàkà, kɛɛ̀ki ǹtyweeyi wɔɔ wu ri miì; ù yii ŋwaànɛ ù yilàkà kìɓan kiǹ a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
À tumɛ̀n ɓi rìŋwɔɓti ɗyɔɔ, ù yii ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ri lɛ ɓi fa wɔ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi u ɓa rì cɛɓ, lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ù gherɛɛ Yeesus Kiris. 
Ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri ɓìkànɛn, ɓi kanɛ̀ngà rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay à Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ki rì rì gɛɓsɛ̀n, lɛ ɓyɛɛ resag ɓum saaɗ, ɓi ki lɛ ɓɛɛ gherɛn, ɓi rɛsàg ɓìɓan ɓi zɛ̀ɗ, ɓi ki tɔɔsi ɓum ɓi cɛɓ ki saaɗ, 
lɛ mum à Bɛ̀ll a ɓa m̀pègsɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, à ki ɓa ri bee inɛ lɛ a ki ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee.
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓi mis mɛ Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yɔ̀mi lɛ rì ɓum ɓɛ cem rì ɓìloŋ, rì ɓi ɗii ɗi risugtìì ɗii, rì kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, 
lɛ u kakali jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, ù sììrɛ̀n miì ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, lɛ rì ɓi syeesyee rì ɓi ɓeɓtɛn; kìya lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ gherɛn, fwààdag ɓum, ù rerèɓ ɓɔ, ù yi rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem, ù ki rèeresàg ɓɔ. 
Lɛ cààmɛ̀n kidɛŋ ki ri ɓiì ɓaà ki ɓum ɓaa cenɛnti ɓi riwowòg ɗi syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n, ɓɛ ri nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀rem maa mɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n, ɓɛ taŋzàg ǹkun wu ɓɛrèsàg, ɓɛ ɓɛɛ kpaakpaa ɓɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ rɔɔrɔɔ ɓɔ rìwowòg; 
ɓaa ramdi ɓi mɛreè lɛ ɓɛɛ wog saaɗ, ɓɛ ri mɔ ɓiì ramì lɛ ɓɛɛ wowog mɛ̀kànkàn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, ɓèŋa rìmum ɗyɔɔ lɛ kɔ̀ɔ ghaasi wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹkpàn a com kidɛŋ, sììri nɗem ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ, kìya kìsay ki ǹkalì-ɓɔlɛ, roozi kìsay kɔɔ lɛ syeesyee.
Ɓi san ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, mɛ̀ nti lɛ com ki kifùna, cààmɛ̀n ki rìpɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗyɛm̀ kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛyi. 
M̀mɛ ɗùù syeesyee à wɛ̀y, m̀mɛ lègsi kighɛŋii mɛ̀ree, ǹki ɓèŋ righerɛ̀n. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, tàm à rìkem ànɛ à rì tàm à saaɗ innɛ m̀ɓoŋɓoŋi, Kan ànɛ à rì ǹ-yɔ̀mì-ɓum ànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ à rì mɛ̀ nyi ɓiì faà ŋwos anɛ̀n, nni àa mɛ̀ cɛ̀ncɛm nnɛ à rì ɓiì faà, kìɓan kifog à ɓiì faà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋgà rìsugtìì ɗii ri ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n.
Kaaya bee inɛ u fyaŋziì kìyùu a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, 
lɛ Demas àa nɗinii mɛ̀ à kɛ̀n a Tesalonika, lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi cɛɓ ki gɛɛ̀nɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn nyi; Kiresaŋsɛ àa nkɛ̀ɛ a Galasi, Tit à kɛ̀n a Dalmasii. 
Lukas cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ ri fɛ rì mɛ̀. Teray Marikus, ɓi yuiy ɓɛɛ̀ nyi, lɛ àrì mɛ̀ rì coo gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓi kìsay. 
Mɛ̀ɛ nɗomi Tisig a Efɛɛzɛ. 
I ù ti ɓiì yùu, ù yùy mɛ̀ rì rɛ̀ŋkweɗ wɛ̀m ànɛ ǹcàɗkày a Tirowas yɛ̀ɛ Karipus, rì ɓɛ̀kaàtà, à ɓiisɛ̀n gòò yi nyàm yi ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kàngì ɓɛ̀kaàtà miì.
Alɛgsaŋdirɛ ànɛ à rì ǹsyaàgh-ìrɛm, àa nkìi mɛ̀ kìɓe lɛɛ̀gwey; Kan à lèɓi gɛ nyi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkì ɗii ɗi ri. 
Ù konàg girig ɗì nyi ɓisuulɛ à ɗùùghà rì ɓìɓan ɓi tì kpaaghà rì ìtèɗ.
Gɛ̀n i ǹtonto ìnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nɗì ɓi mɛ̀kpaà, mum àa nkɛ̀ɛ ɓi mɛ kìfoŋì nsoò bog, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ nɗinii mɛ̀, nni Bɛ̀ll à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ɓɔ kìnɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓi rìkì ɗiǹ. 
Lɔŋ Kan yɛɛ ǹɗì mɛ̀ jàŋbog, à ki fa mɛ ìtèɗ, lɛ nghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, yɛ̀ɛ woòghrɛn ɓi mɛ̀ree mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ nɗùnɛɛ mɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm wu kimonɗo. 
Kan à rì mɛ̀ ɓiì lɛgsii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓìcèm, à ki ghɛɓsi mɛ lɛ nɗiŋi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ki ki ri aɗyòò. Nyi yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì rìkem fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Tògsi Piriska rì Akilas rì naa ì ɓum ì Onezifɔɔr.
Erast àa nɗɔ̀ɓi a Kɔrɛŋt, ǹki càɗ Tirofim a Milɛ di a roròɓ.
Kaaya bee inɛ lɛ u yu di bùmà ì ka tumɛn ɓi. Eɓulus rì Pudaŋs rì Linus rì Kiloodya rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ togsaghiì wɔ̀.
Kan a ɓeŋ̀ ǹghay wɔɔ! Geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. Ààmɛ̀n.
Mɛ̀ Pol ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìsay a Bɛ̀ll, ǹki ɓa ti ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris lɛ nsyoŋ̀ yì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ gherɛn Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki yi saaɗ ànɛ à rì yɛ̀ɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗis ɗyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, 
kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ sasaghii ɓi dyàɓɛn i cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ki Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a maà pwàà ɓi a kàkà fìɗyàɓ, di ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi a rìtumɛ̀n ɓi ka yin. 
Yɛ̀ɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ki ɓaghà kìsiŋdɛn ki kpagà, à kìghà lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì yɛ̀ɛ yilɛn ɓi kìɓan ki à faghà mɛ̀ lɛ nlaàlamɓɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ rìkalì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs ɗi ri.
Ǹkàni wɔ̀ Tit, kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à man wɛm̀ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ri ɓìsi bas, Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs rì ǹkòrì wìs Yeesus Kiris, ɓɛɛ fa wɔ̀ lɛ rì geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog.
Tit, mɛ̀ɛ ncàri wɔ̀ a Kirɛt lɛ u legsiì kìwòŋzaagh ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi kaka wɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìwòŋzàg, ù ki rɛsi ti ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Kiseŋi ɓi bàn yìcèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹsiitaagh wɔ̀. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ cɛmdɛ̀n, à ɓa giɓ bog, ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ɓɔɓti ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ cɛɛcɛmdɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ nyùùnyùùgh, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ ri rì ntoòtèɗ. 
Lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀sì-kìseŋi a ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìcɔrɔɓ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓèŋì ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll; à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà rì kalɛn kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ŋwaà bim, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa kinɔɔ̀ mɛ̀rɔ̀g, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri ɓìgùg, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki lɛ a fɔngi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓi kìcòò. 
Kìɓan kifog à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì rìghàɓ ɗi ɓɛ̀kèn, à keesì ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee, à ɓa rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, à ɓa lɛ saaɗ, à ɓa ǹtɛnɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, à ki ɓìɓ nɗem, 
à sììrɛ̀n lɛ tiŋtiŋ ɓi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ resìghà nyi yɔ̀, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à rì ɓiì ɓaà rì ìtèɗ wulɛ a rereɓ ɓum yɛ̀ɛ syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n a rèrèsì, à ki kì lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɗùùɗuu ri syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n ɓɛɛ yi lɛ ɓɔ yɛɛ ri ɓi zɛ̀ɗ.
Ǹkpaa fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ri rì ntoòtèɗ, ɓɔ rì mɓog à ŋwɔm ɓɛ ki ɓa ri ǹ-yègsɛ̀n à ɓiìɓììsɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kìristɛ̀n, 
ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì sìmi ɓumɓɛ̀n myɔm. Ɓɛɛ̀ ɓùuɓuùsì ɓɛ̀bimiɗ ɓɛ naa yi ɓum, ɓɛ rerèsì yɔ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi, lɛ ɓɛɛ fɔnfɔn mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ ntoòrìɗ. 
Kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ ki ki ri ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan waà, ki kpaaghà lɛ: Mìni ɓumɓɛ a Kirɛt, ɓi ɓalag lɔŋ ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ɓì nyɛngì yɛ̀ɛ nyàm yi ɓi cog, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛ̀ɓɔɓwɛɗ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fèfeg lɔŋ lɛ ɓìɗilàg. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ à kpaaghà ìnɛn ì rì miì, kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓɔ kì fwààdaagh ù nyɛzì jɛ̀ɛ̀, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì syeesyee à rìgherɛ̀n, 
ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa lɛ ɓɛ falɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀kànkàn mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, rì ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lɔghii jɛ̀m rì saaɗ. 
Com kìcèm ki ri kì tɛnɛn ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, wɔ̀lɛ com kidɛŋ ki yin ki tɛnɛn ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ tɔɔtɔɓki, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ɓɛgherɛ̀n, ɓisuulɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n rì nɗem waa, ɓi ri lɛ tɔɔtɔɓki. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpaaghì lɛ ɓɔɔ yii Bɛ̀ll, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ roòròòzɛ̀n nyi ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì maa, ɓum ɓɛ ɓeèzɛɛ rìɓa ɗyaa ɗiǹ, ɓɛ ri rì ǹtoòtèɗ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ki syeesyee à kìɓan nsoò bog.
Ɓi san wɔ̀ɔ̀, rèresi ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ syeesyee à dɔgtɛ̀n a kpaakpàà.
Ù kpaa ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum lɛ ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔnɔ mɛrɔ̀g lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìɓaà rì rìmum, rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓɛ ki ɓa ri ìtèɗ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, rì ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, rì ɓi rìɓìɓ ɗi nɗem.
Ù kpaa ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì ɓaà rì cɛɓ ki ɓum ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ghɛn lɛ ki ri cɛɓ ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ɓɛkpàn ɓɛ mɛrɔ̀g, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìfafaa ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ deɓ, 
lɛ di ɓɛɛ resag ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓwɛ̀ɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ keèsi lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yii ɓaa, rì ɓɔn ɓaa, 
ɓɛ ɓa rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓeŋɗɛ̀n ɗì ndèŋì wu ɓidan, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ɓɛ foŋi ǹɗem rì gìlɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓi naa lɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ rɔɔtàg mɛ̀rem ɓɛ wog ɓɛ̀yii ɓaa, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓaa fen ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll.
Rereɓ girig ɓɛ̀dɛlì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì ɗyomzɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm. 
Wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ù ɓa kìfèèghrɛnà ɓi rìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee, ù rèèrèsàg ɓum dɔgtɛ̀n inɛ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn, ɗì rìmum. 
Ɓìtòkì ɓyɔɔ ɓyɛɛ ɓa lɛ sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɓɛ fen miì, lɛ di ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓis ɓɛɛ wog ǹtoòrìɗ, ɓɛ rɔɓ kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn ki ɓɛ fen a lɔ̀ŋkis.
Ù kpaa ɓɛ̀kpàn lɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɓɛ̀masà ɓaa ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, ɓɛ puùpùɓsi ɓɔ mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tùùzi kiɓan ki ɓɛ̀masà ɓaa ɓɛ kpaa, 
ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fyaasi com, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsii ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì tyweeyii lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓɛ ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ nyaàsi dɔgtɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs.
Ɓisuulɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì rì ǹsim à cɛɓ ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, ì mɛ rèsɛ̀n, 
geesɛ̀n yìì inɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ rèresi ɓisi lɛ ti roòzɛn cɛɓ ki kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi ɓum ɓi ziinɛ, tì ghɛɓ ɓi ziinɛ rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, tì ɓa lɛ saaɗ tì ki falɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, 
cààmɛ̀n ki ti ka ɓoŋɓoŋ coo ŋwos a kìnyàà ànɛ à rì dyàɓɛn yis, tì ki ɓoŋɓoŋ ti rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll wìs anɛ à teŋmɛɛ, rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs Yeesus Kiris, 
ànɛ à falɛ̀ngà nyimiɗ ɓisu wis lɛ a pwaŋ̀ yì ɓìsi ɓi kìɓe mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm, à kì lɛ ti ɓa kìlɔ̀ŋ kitɛnɛn ki kɛɛ woòghrɛn ɗì nyi; ki falɛ̀n ɓi rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee.
Ɓìɓan ɓi ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kakalii ɓum ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓìn lɔɔ, ù tèètèèsì ɓɔ nyoo, ù ki fwààdag ɓɔ ɗì ìtèɗ wu rilàmì wùcèm wu ù rì rì wɔ. Kɔ̀ɔ gherɛn lɛ mum a sɛɛ̀ti wɔ̀.
Yiti ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki ɓɛ̀làmì kìlɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà mɛ̀wog; ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi com ki ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔɔgh ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki, ɓɛ ki fɛmɓɛn ɓi rìkì ɗi kiɓan kicèm ki ki ri lɛ syeesyee. 
Ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wɛ̀ɗ mum, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓum ɓɛ fyòoog, ɓɛ ɓa rì syeesyee à nɗem, ɓɛ ghɛɓ lɔŋ lɛ fyòoog rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓìsi girig tì ɓaghà abɛ̀y kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓìsi rì ntoòtèɗ, ɓìsi ɓi rìɗim; tì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ ɓiɓan mɛkuu mɛ̀kuu, ɓi mɛ̀rem mɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngì rì ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ̀yi mɛmùù, tì ghɛghɛ̀ɓ ɓi rìgɛn rì ɓi m̀mììghrɛ̀n, tì ɓeɓèɓ ɓum, tì ki ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n ɓìsi rì ɓìsi. 
Kìɓan kifog yɛ̀ɛ kìrɔɔ-nɗem à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à rì rì nyi ɓisuu ɓum, ɓi resɛ̀ngà, 
nni à ghɛɓsìghà ɓìsi, àa ɓisuu ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ, ɓi tì kìkìghà, lɔŋ à ghɛɓsìghà ɓìsi lɛ nɗem wu nyìinyìg wu à rì rì wɔ, rì ɗùùɗùù ɗi ɗi ti ɗi kilàg lɛ mum a ɓiìti kìyalɛɛ, rì rìkì ɗi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ kìlag lɛ mum a ghay nyɔɔnyɔn à mum. 
Bɛ̀ll à romgày Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kìn ɓi ɓìsi lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi gòò ì Yeesus Kiris à ǹghɛɓsì wìs, 
lɛ di ti ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi dyàɓɛn i cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, yɛ̀ɛ geesɛ̀n yìì i mɛ kì lɛ ti ɓa lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis miì.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à jɛ̀ɛ̀, fɔɔnnɛ nkɔ̀ngi lɛ u siìrɛn ɓi rìkpaakpàà ɗi yɔ̀ di fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll ɓɛɛ teèsi nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey, ɗì rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ki ki ɓa ri gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓum. 
Kìɓan kifog, lɛgha nyoey yi kɛ̀ɛ̀-su ɗì rìɓààɓààsì ɗi boo, rì ɓɛsaaka, rì rìkààkàdàg ɓi kìɓan ki ɓidɔ̀gsɛna, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm ɓi ghɛɓsii ɓi, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa com. 
I ŋwaàdɛŋ à yùu rì kìɓùùsì ki lɛ gasɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ kpi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, rɔ̀gsɛn nyi gɛ̀n yiɓɛɛ̀, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, foŋa nyi ɓi nwɔŋì. 
Ù yii lɛ rìkuu ɗi mum ɗi fɔlɔɔ ɗi ri ɓi kìɓeɓtàg ki bee, ɗi kikì kìɓe, di ɗyɛɛ̀ faafàlɛ̀n ɗyɔmiɗ zɔɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗi rom yi wɔ̀ Aritemas nsoò lɛ Tisig, ù fyaŋzìì mɛ̀ kìyùu ki tanɛɛ a Nikopolis lɛ wɔɔ nnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkpaa lɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ghagsii bùmà. 
Pègsɛn ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi Zenas ànɛ à rì coo ǹɗèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì Apolos ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ com kidɛŋ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kaarɛn ɓɔ. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wis ɓɛɛ yilɛn rì rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì kìkii ɓɛ̀gɛni-ɓiɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓìɗùn.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri fɛ rì mɛ̀ ɓɛ togsaagh yì wɔ̀. Wɔ̀ɔ̀ tògsi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg ɓìsi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n. Geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Mɛ̀ Pol ànɛ ǹɗì kìmbùŋ ɓisuu Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ̀ geni wɛ̀m ànɛ lɛ Timote, ɓìsi yɛɛ kani lɛ rì Filemɔŋ à reŋkàŋ wìs a ǹɗem, ànɛ ti kìki kisay kifog rì nyi, 
rì geni wìs a giɓ anɛ lɛ Apya, rì reŋkàŋ wìs anɛ lɛ Arisip ànɛ ti ɗùùɗuu nɗaŋ ɗi nyi, rì Kìseŋi ki Kiris ki ki ti ki taŋzàg ɓi naa yɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs rì Kan Yeesus Kiris ɓɛɛ fa mìni lɛ rì geesɛ̀n rì fyòoog.
Ǹti ǹfafà Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ǹki yiiyitì wɔ̀ ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛm̀, 
lɛ ǹti ǹwowòg di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, rì ntyweeyi, ɓi u rèresi ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kan Yeesus rì ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ǹti ǹtɔkì nyi lɛ, rìɓa ɗi ù rì ǹɗàrɛn ri ɓìsi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɛɛ ki lɛ u konag kì yiì kìrɔɔ kìcèm ki tì rì rì kɔ ɓi cɛɓ ki ti ghɛghɛɓ nɗaŋ ri Kiris. 
Lɛ mɛ̀ɛ nwoogh kìnyàà lɛɛ̀gwey nɗem wu ki kpì mɛ ɓi ɗùm lɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ù rì rì nyi; ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓɛgherɛ̀n mɛ mmaa lɛ fyòoog lɛ kìsay kɔɔ, geni wɛ̀m.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à mɛ fa mɛ ìtèɗ lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ nsiŋdɛn wɔ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ù kìkì, 
ki mɓiisɛɛ mɛ̀ kì kɔ̀ni lɛ mɓɔŋzi wɔ̀ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n. Ɓi rìɓa ɗi mɛ̀ Pol ǹɗì ɗi kìtùg ki mum, à kɛ̀ɛ̀dì kì ɓaà lɛ ɓigomìnɛ ǹɗì kìmbùŋ ɓisuu Yeesus Kiris. 
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh wɔ̀ ɓisuu Onezim à man wɛm̀ ànɛ ǹ-yali ɓi Kiris di ǹɗì ɓi naà-zày. 
Nnyɛɛ ǹɗìlàg wɔ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ gɛɓsɛ̀n abɛ̀y; wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ, à ti ɓìsi rì gɛɓsɛ̀n lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀. 
M̀pɛ̀ɛ̀zii yì wɔ̀ nyi kìromìì; nyii ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìkàɓ kɛm̀ ki nyoo kidɛŋ.
Mɛ̀ m̀mɛɛ̀ ɓa ri zày ìnɛ lɛ nɗɔɓ fɛ rì nyi, lɛ a ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsì mɛ̀ ɓi sìg wɔ̀ɔ̀ cààmɛ̀n ki ǹkaka rì bɛn ɓisuu Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ mɛ̀ ǹkɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ nki fɔlɔɔ di ǹka wog ɓi fèg wɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ kìrɔɔ ki ù rì lɛ ù kì mɛ̀ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ù kìi kɔ ɓi kàŋbɛn, kɛɛ ɓa kìɓan ki wɛ̀ɛmiɗ ù ɓekii rì syeesyee wɔ̀ɔ̀ a ǹɗem. 
Ɓaà yi ɓi Onezim àa nɗì lɛ à ghasɛ̀n ɗì wɔ̀ ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n lɛ di a sugtiì wɔ̀ ɓi ɓyàg rìsugtìì ɗi isuùcèm, 
kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ti ǹkpàn, kìɓan kifog rìɓa ɗii ɗi cee ɗi ǹkpàn a zɛy, à ɓa maaseŋi wìs a ǹɗem; i à ki ti maaseŋi wɛ̀m à ǹɗem, à rì ɓiì ɓaà girig aŋkɔ̀ɔ̀ à cee fɔlɔɔ, lɛ rì ɓi bee inɛ ɓi mɛ̀mùù rì ɓi ìnɛ ɓi rìgeni ɗi ɓi Kan ɓiɗùm. 
I ki ri lɛ, u seesee mɛ lɛ roŋkàŋ, ghàɓa nyi yɛ̀ɛ ù rì lɛ ù ghàɓ mɛ̀. 
I à sɛ̀rìghà kìɓan kidɛŋ rì wɔ̀ nsoò lɛ à rì wɔ̀ rì pon, foŋa ɓi nɗem lɛ ntɛ̀g wu miì wu seesee mɛ̀. 
Mɛ̀ Pol yɛɛ kaniì kìɓan kiǹ rì càg kɛm̀ lɛ, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓyɔ ɓiì lèɓi; yɛ̀ɛ kɛ̀ɛ n-yiti wɔ lɛ ù rì mɛ̀ rì pon, pon anɛ̀n yɛɛ ri lɛ cɛɓ kɔɔ kɔmiɗ. 
Ɛ̀ɛ̀ geni wɛ̀m, kìya mɛ̀ kìsay kiǹ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Kan, fɔɔsi mɛ̀ ǹɗem ɓi Kiris ɓiɗùm.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì rì ǹtyweeyi lɛ ù ɓiì kìi com ki ǹtɔɔgh, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkàniì wɔ̀; ǹki yii lɛ ù ɓiì kìi com ki ǹkpaa, ù ceesàg.
Ǹkpaatii wɔ̀ lɛ u pegsɛn mɛ̀ kìden ki naa ɓisuulɛ ǹɗì rì dyàɓɛn lɛ bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yin yi ri ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓɛɛ pɛɛ̀ziì mɛ̀ a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Epafiras ànɛ à rì reŋkàŋ wɛ̀m ànɛ tì rì ɓi naà-zày rì nyi, ɓisuu Yeesus Kiris 
à tɔkii yì wɔ̀, Marikus rì Aristarikɛ rì Demas, rì Lukas ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓɛm ɓɛ kisay ɓɛ togsaagh yì girig wɔ̀.
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni.
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ajɛ̀m, Bɛ̀ll à tòòghrɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis gɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, bee lɛ bee ɓi ŋwɔm wu ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, 
nni ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn mɛ, àa ntòòghrɛɛ rì ɓìsi ɓi ŋwɔm wu Man wiì, man ànɛ̀n innɛ à rɛsìghà lɛ a teɗ ɓìɓan ɓicèm; rì nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi. 
Man ànɛ̀n à rì cììghziŋ ki rikem ɗi Bɛ̀ll, à ɓa tì syeesyee à kìfèèghrɛnà ki ɓi rìɓa ɗi yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì, à lènlemi ɓyom ɓìcèm rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì inɛ ì rì rì ìtèɗ. Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà zòghɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓi ɓìɓe ɓi ɓum, fɔɔnnɛ à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi ɗyoo ɓiɗùm, ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à làŋi mɛ̀tèɗ mɛcèm.
Man à Bɛ̀ll à mɛ cee ɓum ɓɛ titom lèg ànɛ lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ fa nyi ɗii ɗi ɗi laŋi ɗi nkaa. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ka kpaaghà ɓi ŋwaà fìtom adɛŋ lɛ: Ù rì Man wɛm̀, à tumɛ̀n gɛɛ̀nɛ, ǹti soŋì, nsoò lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì ɓaà Seŋi, nyii ɓa mɛ̀ Man.
Wɔ̀lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà à ti ɓiì romìì Man à ǹtonto wiì ɓi ziinɛ, à kpaa lɛ: Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ nyi kì ɓɔgsii.
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓum ɓɛ titom, à kpaaghà lɛ: Bɛ̀ll a kìlag lɛ: À ghaasì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom bɛ̀ɓ, à ki ghaasi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii nɗoò wu ɗuu.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Man, à kpaa lɛ: wɔ̀ Bɛ̀ll ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wɔɔ wu rilàmì wu ri fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, kìgeŋ kɔɔ ki rilàmì, ki ri kìgeŋ ki rilàmì ɗi saaɗ.
Ù keesìghà saaɗ, ù ɓèèzɛ̀n kìɓe kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki wɔ̀ Bɛ̀ll, Bɛ̀ll wɔ̀ɔ̀ a mɛ ɓɔ̀n wɔ, à siŋì wɔ̀ mɔ̀ɔ mɛ nnyaasɛ̀n à càɗ ɓɛ̀roŋkàŋ.
À kpaatìghà lɛ: Kan, wɔ̀ yɛɛ kighà zi a rìtumɛ̀n, nsoò ɗyoo ɗi ri girig kìsay ki ɓyàg ɓyɔɔ ɓyɛɛ kiì.
Ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓiì ɗyaŋì kìɓan kifog wɔ̀ɔ̀ rɔ̀ɓ; ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓiì rùni yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà;
ù tag ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ taki rɛ̀ŋkweɗ, ɓɛ koɓsɛ̀n ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìlàà, kìɓan kifog, wɔ̀ɔ̀ kɔ̀kɔrii lɔŋ zìŋ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀, cɛɓ kɔɔ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri ǹɗèè.
Bɛ̀ll à ka kpaaghà ɓi ŋwaà fìtom adɛŋ lɛ: Kɔ̀ri mɛ̀ fɛ ɓi weèlem à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ghaasii ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓɔɔ kiɓoŋ ki u rɛsag mɛ̀kòò miì.
Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yin nya mɛ̀ghay mɛ mɛɛ̀ kìki Bɛ̀ll kìsay? Mɛ ki ɓa lɛ, nyi yɛɛ romi mɔ lɛ mɛɛ kɛǹ kì ghɛɓsii ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì gàɓ ɓi gòri ì Bɛ̀ll?
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓiisɛɛ ki ɓaà ɓɛ̀ sììrɛn ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi tì wokà di tì kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ, ti ɗyaŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kpaaghà ki kilɛ̀ngà; fɔɔnnɛ mum bimiɗ ànɛ à fogà ɓi nɗem rì kìɓan kiǹ nsoò lɛ, à ɓèn kìwoògh com ki ɓɛ kpaaghà, à tekà deɓ inɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà rì rìkì ɗii. 
Nni lannɛ tì rì ɓiì kìi lɛ tyɛ̀ ki teɗ deɓ di tì sɛɛtii coo gòri yɛ̀ɛ ìnɛ? Kan nyimiɗ a lokà kìkpaà kìɓan ki gòri ìnɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wokà di a kpaakpàà ɓɛ siìràkà ɓìsi kì rèsii saaɗ ànɛ miì. 
Bɛ̀ll à ki sìisiìràg rìkalì ɗyaa lɛ rì ɓìrèmzɛnà, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan rì dàm mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu, rì mɛ̀fafàà mɛ Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay mɛ a kàakàɓsì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔni nyi.
Ɓisuulɛ, àa ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà nyɔnyɔn à zi anɛ a yùyuiy lɛ ɓɛɛ lami; nyɔnyɔn à zi anɛ̀n nnɛ tì kpaakpàà. 
Kɔlɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à kpaaghà jàŋ idɛŋ ɓi kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Mum innɛ cɛ, ɓi ɗi lɛ wɔ̀ Bɛ̀ll u yitag nyi? Nsoò man à mum, à rì cɛ lɛ u teki ntɔɓ ɓisu wìì?
Ù sɛɛ̀dìghà rìɓa ɗii ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, lɛ ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋdi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓum ɓɛ titom, ù waasì nyi lɛ, rì rìkem, rì nnyaasɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tàm à mɛ̀fòm.
Ù fogà nyi ɓyom ɓìcèm a mɛ̀kòò lɛ a lami ɓyɔ̀. Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kalag lɛ: À faghà nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ, a lami ɓyom ɓìcèm fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ: À faghà mum ìtèɗ wulɛ a lami ɓyom ɓìcèm kɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ki lɔɔ̀sɛɛ. Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, ɓìsii ka ghɛn ɓi ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ti ɓi rìlàmì ɗi mum. 
Kìɓan kifog, roànɛ ɓɛ sɛɛ̀dìghà rìɓa ɗii ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n lɛ ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋdi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓum ɓɛ titom yɛɛ ri Yeesus, nyi nnɛ ti seesee yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɛ waasi rìkem, rì ǹnyaasɛ̀n ɓisuu riwù ɗi à wughà; lɛ à wughà ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à kìghà ɓyom ɓìcèm, ànɛ à ki rì rì ɓyom ɓìcèm, nnyɛɛ̀ ki kìghà lɛ ɓɔn lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛɛ teɗ gàɓ ɓi rìkem ɗii, ɓi bee ì rìkɛŋ, a ki lɛ Yeesus ànɛ à rì ǹto wu gòri yàà, a kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wu, kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri kìɓan ki fenɛn a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Ɓisuulɛ rì ǹtɛɛ̀zì ɓum, rì ɓumɓɛ à tɛɛ̀zii ɓɛ fuu yì yɛ̀ɛ mum bog, ɓisu wìn miì nnɛ ki yeesii ɓi nyi lɛ a regi ɓɔ lɛ, ɓɛ̀geni ɓii, 
yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì ghagsii ɓɛgeni ɓɛ̀m ɗii ɗyɔɔ, ǹkemzì wɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹtaŋzɛ̀n.
Rì tì lɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì faà ǹtyweeyi wɛm̀ ɗì nyi. Rì tì lɛ: Rì mɛ̀ rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà mɛ̀, ɓìsi ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɛ lɛ̀.
Nni fɔlɔɔ nnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ri lɛ, rì nyoo ì mɛ̀mùù, rì bwaɓ, nyi girig à tekà nyoo ìnɛ̀n lɛ, di a ghaàsi Satàn ànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wu riwù com ki zɛy, ɓi rìwu ɗi à wughà 
à ki ghɛɓsi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ìris wu riwù wu fogà ɓi rìkpàn cɛɓ kaa kicèm. 
Ɓisuulɛ, àa ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à yùu ɓà kìghɛɓsii, lɔŋ dòò yi Abiraham. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì pisɛɛ ɓɛgeni bee yicèm lɛ, di a ɓa rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗi ɗi ri rì nɗem wu nyìighnyìg, ɗi kikì kìsay ki Bɛ̀ll lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, lɛ ɗyɛɛ soò ɓìɓe ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ. 
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ nyimiɗ a tulɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, à wog rìkɛŋ à rì lɛ à ghɛɓsì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn.
Nni fɔlɔɔ nnɛ, mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓi rì rì gàɓ ɓi nɗeèghreŋi wu Bɛ̀ll, seeseena Yeesus ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày lɛ a ɓa rìfòm ɗi ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓìsiì làalam̀ɓɛ̀n. 
Yeesus à kìghà Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à faghà nyi kìsay kiǹ mɛ̀wog, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Moyis à kighà, ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll bimiɗ. 
Lɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì rìkem ɗi ɗi cee ɗi Moyis, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à toŋi mɛɛ, à ti à kemgì à cee mɛɛ mɔmiɗ mɛ à toŋi. 
Mɛɛ mɛcèm mɛ ri rì ŋwaànɛ à toŋi mɔ, nni ǹtoŋì ɓyom ɓìcèm yɛɛ ri lɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Moyis, à kìghà mɛ̀wog yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll bimiɗ, à ɓaghà ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ghagsii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì kalɛɛ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Kiris à rì rì mɛ̀wog fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Man ànɛ àrì beèbɛ̀y ɓi naa yìì; naa ìnɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ ɓìsi, i tì ɓèŋi à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n lɛ rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à ǹtyweeyi rì dyàɓɛn inɛ ti saasanɛ̀n.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, i ɓì woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì gɛɛ̀nɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ti ki kalàg,
kɛ̀ ɓi tèèsi mɛrem min fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓì kìghà nyi ntoòtèɗ ŋwos anɛ ɓì fèèghrɛ̀ngà nyi ɓireɓ,
jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ feèghrɛ̀ngà mɛ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ com ki ǹɗì lɛ ǹkì, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ǹkìghà ɓi bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà bim ri gbàà ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n, ǹkpaa lɛ: mɛ̀rem maa mɛɛ̀ pwààpwaa ɓɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ɓɛ wokà ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ǹtɔtɔ̀kà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ ɓi bim inɛ ǹwokà, ǹkpaa lɛ: Ɓaa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi jàŋ inɛ m̀pègsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ ri fɔɔsɛn wɔɔ, nsoò ŋwos.
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, konaaghna lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi mìni kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri nɗem wu ɓeɓtɛn, wu wu ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n ɓi lèg ànɛ a ghasɛn ɗì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem. 
Kìɓan kifog, reerèɓɓɛɛna ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm à kpaŋ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ kalì lɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, di fɔɔnnɛ kìbog ki ɓi mìni kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ càrɛn lɛ nɗem wii wɛɛ teɗ ɓiɗùm di kìɓe kaa yègsi nyi. 
Lɛ tì rì ɓum ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ nɗaŋ ri Kiris, di tì sììrɛɛ lɛ, ti ɓeŋ̀ ǹtyweeyi wu tì ɓaghà rì wɔ a rìtumɛ̀n. 
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkaliyɛn lɛ: I ɓì woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì gɛɛ̀nɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi tèèsi mɛrem fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ɓì kìghà nyi ǹtoòtèɗ.
Ɓɛ̀ghɛn ɓɛɛ wokà kɔm jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki kì nyi ntoòtèɗ? Lɔŋ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ Moyis à kpaŋzighày a Egiɓtɛn. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ be ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à wokà bim ri ɓɔ à kpaŋ bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀? À wokà bim ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kighà kìɓe, ɓɔ yɛɛ wuwùghà di ɓɛɛ̀ kpìkpi wɔɔ ɓireɓ. 
Ɓɛ̀ghɛn ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ lɛ ɓaa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi jàŋ inɛ à pègsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ ri fɔɔsɛn wɔɔ? Lɔŋ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kighà nyi ǹtoòtèɗ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ à kpaaghà. 
Ɓìsii ghɛɛ gì lɛ, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɓɛ ɗiŋì ɓi jàŋ i rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ìnɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ri rìgherɛ̀n.
Nni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki yɛ̀ɛ ǹkàg wulɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗii wu kaka, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì konaagh lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi mìni kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri fèg ànɛ lɛ nyii kpaŋi di cààmɛ̀n kaa ceè. 
Ɓisuulɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à mɛ kalɛn a lɔ̀ŋkis lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kalɛ̀ngà a lɔ̀ŋkaa. Wɔ̀lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓɛ wokà, ì ghɛɓsìghà ɓi com, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ wokà yɔ̀, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teɗ yɔ̀ ri rìgherɛ̀n. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓìsiɓɛ tì gherɛɛ, tì rì ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ ɓi bim inɛ mɛ̀ɛ nwoogh, ǹkpaa lɛ: Ɓaa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi jàŋ inɛ m̀pègsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ ri fɔɔsɛn wɔɔ. À kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ki ri lɛ kìsay kii ki ɓaghà di ki mɛ lèg, à tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki à kìghà lɛ rì ɗyoo, rì zi. 
Lɛ ki ri kìkaliyɛn jàŋ idɛŋ ɓi kìɓan ki ŋwos a kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à fɔɔsɛ̀ngà kìsay kii kìcèm ɓi ŋwos a kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, 
à kpaa tì fɛ lɛ: Ɓaa ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi jàŋ inɛ m̀pègsɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ ri fɔɔsɛn wɔɔ.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìsiŋdɛn lɛ, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗiŋii ɓi rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗiǹ ki ki ɓa ti lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lokà kì terì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n, ɓɛ rɔɓkà ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗiŋi wɔɔ lɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, 
fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ rɛsi ti bimiɗ à ŋwos adɛŋ lɛ: Gɛɛ̀nɛ, yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà ɓi ŋwɔm wu Davit di cààmɛ̀n kaa ghaàgh lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi jàŋ inɛ tyàa mɛ wog lɛ: Gɛɛ̀nɛ, i ɓì woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì. Kɛ̀ ɓi tèèsi mɛrem.
Ɓisuulɛ, i Yooswa a fa ɓɔ rìfɔɔsɛ̀n, di Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà ɓi lɛ, à kàgtì ɓum ŋwos adɛŋ, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à fɔɔsɛ̀ngà ɓi Saɓàt ɗi ri wɔɔ ɓisuu ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaànɛ à ɗiŋii ɓi rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, à mɛ fɔɔsɛn ɓisay ɓii fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ nyii fɔɔsɛ̀ngà girig ɓi nkìì.
Ti tèèsiina nyoo lɛ ti ɗiŋi ɓi rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗiǹ, di fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ à kpì, di à nɔ̀ɔ̀tii rìkuu ɗi ntoòtèɗ ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓireɓ ɓɛ resìghà.
Lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì rì cencem, ì ki ɓa ri ìtèɗ, ì poo ì cee gàfàg ìnɛ ì rì ǹghɛliyɛn ɓɛɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm. Yɛ̀ɛ ɗiɗiŋi mum ɓi nɗem à kpaŋ ɓi jàŋ inɛ cɛɓ ki mum  rì nghay wii ɓi rarɛɛ; ì ɗiŋì ì kpaŋ ɓi rìràrɛ̀n ɗi gòga rì ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ ɓiwoɓ. Yɛ̀ɛ rèresi nkòo rìkɔ̀n ɗi mum rì mɛ̀yitì mɛ mɛ ri nyi ɓi nɗem, ɓi ri lɛ syeesyee. 
Ɓi ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà, com kidɛŋ ki yin nyi kìnyamɛn, ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓìghaniyɛn lɛ kpeènye-kpèènyèè ɓi mis mɛ roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓìsi kì tɔɔ̀gh kìsay ki tì kìghà.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì rì min ri nkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey lɛ Yeesus ànɛ à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ɓɔkà aɗyoo yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sììrɛɛ lɛ syeesyee ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi tì gherɛɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi tì ti tì kakàlì ɓum. 
Ɓisuulɛ ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ wìs àgwey a yin rikuu ɗi ɗi ri lɛ, ɗi taŋ̀ ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg ɓi rìɓa ɗi tì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ, lɛ à tulɛ̀ngà rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi, kìɓan kifog, à kìghà ɓi kiɓe. 
Ti tyoŋdɛn min jàŋbog rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll, jàŋ inɛ geesɛ̀n ì rì, tì ɓa rì ǹtyweeyi, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ wog ɓìsi nyìighnyìg, tì ki ghɛn geesɛ̀n ìnɛ ì rì ɓìsi ɓiì ghɛɓsii ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ.
Lɛ ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ǹcèm ànɛ ɓɛ teri ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, à rì ǹrɛsɛn ɓisuu ɓum, lɛ a ki kìsay ki Bɛ̀ll, à fafà nyi ɓyom, à ki fùufunɛ̀n ɓìtuwe ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓi ɓum. 
À rì lɛ à ɓa rì rìcenɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ nanàg lɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìyi, lɛ nyimiɗ a rì mum ànɛ à rì lɛ à nànɛ̀n ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ. 
Rìɓa ɗi à rì ɗiǹ ɗì ìkɔ̀g, ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì lɛghii Bɛ̀ll lɛ, rì ɓi ɓìɓe ɓii ɓi nyimiɗ, rì ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ.
Mum à yin lɛ à falɛ̀n m̀ɓɔg wìn nyimiɗ, di Bɛ̀ll à reŋii ɓi nyi fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ à reŋìghà Arɔn. 
Nsoò Kiris à falɛ̀ngà ɓi nyimiɗ rìgwey ɗi lɛ, a ɓa ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀. Kìɓan kifog à tekà ɗyɔ rì roànɛ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ù rì Man wɛm̀, à tumɛ̀n gɛɛ̀nɛ ǹti wɔ̀ seŋi. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaatìghà jàŋ idɛŋ lɛ: Ù rì pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, rìɓa ɗi isuùcèm, ɓi nɗɛli wu Mɛlkisedɛg.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi ziinɛ, à ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Bɛ̀ll, à yɛ̀ɛ̀ghyɛ̀gsì nyi ɓyàg, rì ɓyoo ɓikiŋ, rì misì ɓi mɛ̀tam, lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ ɓaghà lɛ à ghɛɓsì nyi ɓi rìwu; nni Bɛ̀ll à wokà bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yii lɛ mɛ̀wog mɛ à ɓaghà rì mɔ. 
Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ à ɓaghà Man à Bɛ̀ll, à yilàkà com ki lɛ mɛ̀wog, ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀cèm mɛ à wokà; 
fɔɔnnɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à mɛ teŋzi nyi ɓi nɗɛli wu kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ti ri kìɓan ki ɓɛ fen a lɔ̀ŋkii, nni à ghalà ǹfaà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ woogh nyi, gòri ì fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, 
lɛ Bɛ̀ll à làmìghà lɛ, ànɛ̀n à rì ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓi nɗɛli wu Mɛlkisedɛg.
Tì tèghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi kpaayɛn ɓi kìɓan kiǹ wɔ̀lɛ rìrèsì ɗi ti resi mìni ɓyɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ ɓi konag kìwoògh ɗi yeesɛɛ ɓisuulɛ ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi wog ti kiɓan lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ. 
Lɛ mìniɓɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìɓaà ɓɛ̀rèsàg ɓɛ ɓìɓan ɓi fiɗyàɓ, ɓì kaka rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ resag mìni mɛ̀to mɛ ɓiɓan mɛ beèbɛ̀y mɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll. Ɗi ɓyàa rì lɛ ɓì ɗi ɓìɗilàg ɓi tèɗ, ɓì kaka rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓi nyɔŋnyɔŋ mɛlì. 
Kɔlɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kaka ɓi mɛlì, à ka yi ɓi righasì lɛ, rì saaɗ, rì pwàà ɓisuulɛ à kaka man. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓìɗilàg ɓi tèɗ ɓi ri ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛ sììrɛn ɓum, ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi mɛ mɛ̀ɛ̀tɛn ɗi rìghasì ɗi lɛ, rì kìɓe rì kìrɔɔ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ti càrina rìrèsì ɗi a rìtumɛ̀n ɗi ɓi kìɓan ki Kiris, ti ɓeg̀mɛn ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi konaagh kì rɔɔtɛɛ, tyɛ̀ ki sugti tiì rìjɛ̀m ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi a rìyàghɛ̀n ɓi ɓi ri lɛ: Mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì càri ɓiɓan ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu, 
à gherɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll, rì mɛ̀rèsàg mɛ mɛ koŋ̀komi bàɓtis mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu, ɗì rìsaàgh ɗi mum ɓyàg ɓi nyoo lɛ ɓɛɛ maŋ̀ nyi, rì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, rì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à ri yɔ̀m ɓum gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm. 
Kìɓan ki tì rì ɓiì kìi di Bɛ̀ll à gherɛɛ kɛɛ̀kìn.
Ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà kìtɛɛtɛn ki Bɛ̀ll cààmɛ̀n kidɛŋ, ɓɛ ɓoɓtì rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki teɗti gàɓ ɓi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, 
ɓɛ ɓoɓtì rìyɛ̀y ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ki ghɛn mɛtèɗ mɛ ɓi cɛɓ ki ki riì 
ɓɛ ki sugti ki kpìi ɓi kìɓeɓtàg ki cɛɓ, bee inɛ ŋwaà rì lɛ à kì lɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn tì nɗem ì yiìdi ɓisuulɛ, ɓɔɔ̀ ɓìiɓiìtì kì kpanì Man à Bɛ̀ll ɓi Kɔrɔs aɗyoo, ɓɛ ki sòosoòtì nyi ɓi mis mɛ ɓum. 
Lɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki zi yɛ̀ɛ nɔnɔ mɛnig di bwey yɛ̀ɛ nɔnɔ miì lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ fyɛ̀ɗ, zi inɛ̀n ì ki fafa ɓyaɓi ɓi ɓi ri rì gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ jàŋ inɛ̀n ì salɛ̀ngà ɓisu waa, zi inɛ̀n ì ti ì tekì ɓɛ̀mààgh yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i zi inɛ̀n yɛɛ̀ fafa lɛ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓyaaɓi, rì keŋ, di ì yin syeesyee à zi, ì ki ɓa jàŋbog lɛ yɛ̀ɛ teɗ ǹcɛ̀m, ki ki syɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔǹ yɔ̀.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ti kpaakpaa lɔɔ, tì konaagh kì yiì lɛ ɓì rɛrɛlii ɓi syeesyee à bee, ànɛ à rì bee ì cɛɓ. 
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì Bɛ̀ll à saaɗ, fɔɔnnɛ à yin lɛ à ɗimzɛ̀n kìsay kin, nsoò ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rèsìghà nyi ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓì ghɛɓsìghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, rì ɓi ɓì kaka ɓì ghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsì ɓɔ. 
Ti kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni a ɓa rì rìkuu ɗi rifalɛ̀n ɗiǹ à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ɓoŋɓòŋ ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ lɛ syeesyee, 
ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi rɛ̀gsi nyoo, ɓi nɔɔ̀ti lɔŋ ikòò wu ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ, ɓɛ ki ɓa ri kìsììrì; ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ tekì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kàkà lɛ rìkì ɗyaa ɗiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà Abiraham ǹkàg, à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ ri myimìɗ, lɛ à ɓaghà ɓi lɛ à kànɛ̀n bɛ̀ɗ ri ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à cee nyi. 
Nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Ǹkànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ lɛ: Ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì màŋi, ǹtègsì boo yɔ̀ɔ̀ i mum. 
Abiraham à sììrɛ̀ngà ɓi rìɓoŋ ɗi nkàg wiǹ, nni à ki tekà com ki Bɛ̀ll à kàkà nyi. 
Ɓum ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kanàg bɛ̀ɗ ri mii mɛ ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ceetii ɓɔ; rìkànɛ̀n ɗi bɛ̀ɗ ɗyɛɛti ɗi rengì nywey ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛɛ̀ nyoonyolɛ̀n. 
Yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à kɔ̀ngà lɛ a konag kì rèsii ɓumɓɛ à faghà mɛ̀kàg lɛ nyaa lɔ̀gtiigɛ ɓi rikalì ɗii, fɔɔnnɛ à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ. 
Ɓìɓan ɓi ri min ɓiɓɛɛ̀ ɓi ɓi yin lɛ ɓi lɔgtɛ̀n, ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi Bɛ̀ll à yin ɗi ìtèɗ wu lɛ à foŋ pwàà miì. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓìsiɓɛ tì mɛ tanɛn ǹnyamzɛn a lɔ̀ŋkii, ɓi mɛ fati ɓisi itèɗ lɛɛ̀gwey, lɛ ti siìri kì ɓanì dyàɓɛn inɛ ìrì ɓìsi ǹfayɛn. 
Dyàɓɛn inɛ̀n ìrì ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ com ki ki lenlemi cɛɓ kis, ki ɓa kì bɛ̀lɛn lɛ kpeg-kpeg, kɔ yɛɛ ɗiŋii ki syaà kìlàà ki ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ki kpaŋzɛ̀n ɓi jàŋ i kìcèlì ìnɛ wɔɔ ɓiɗùm, 
jàŋ inɛ Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓisu wis, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓìsi ǹsyòŋɛn bee, lɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà nyi ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey isuùcèm ɓi nɗɛli wu Mɛlkisedɛg.
Mɛlkisedɛg ànɛ̀n à ɓaghà rìfòm ɗi kilɔ̀ŋ ki lɛ Salɛm, nyi tì pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹteŋmɛn à cee, nnyɛɛ kɛngà kì tulɛɛ ri Abiraham, di roànɛ̀n a susug yi wɛ̀y wu à yakày mɛ̀fòm mɛdɛŋ miì à ki màŋ nyi. 
Rì nyi nnɛ Abiraham à faghà gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓii ɓìcèm. Ɗii ɗi lɛ Mɛlkisedɛg àncèm ɗi ka rèsii lɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi saaɗ, à ki ɓa ti lɛ rìfòm ɗi Salɛm yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ rìfòm ɗi fyòoog. 
À rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ seŋi, kɛ̀ɛ̀ jɛɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìfuuyì; ɓɛ ɓuŋi ɓi kiɓan ki riyalɛ̀n ɗii, nsoò ki riwù ɗii jàŋ idɛŋ, à pisɛɛ Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì lɔŋ pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓì rì lɛ ɓì ghɛn lɛ, à ɓaghà coo gìn i mum, Abiraham à seŋi wìs ànsɛ̀ɛ̀ a faghà nyi gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓi à sukày wɛ̀y ri ɓyɔ. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓi boo ì Levi ɓɛɛ ri rì ìtèɗ wu lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔki ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓìcèm lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà. Yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ tɔkì gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛn rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa, ɓɛ ɓɛ ki rì girig lɛ dòò yi Abiraham. 
Mɛlkisedɛg à ɓaghà ɓi ɓi boo ì mum ì Levi kìɓan kifog à tekà gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓi Abiraham à ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ, à ki màŋ roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà mɛ̀kàg. 
Kɔlɛ mum bimiɗ à yii lɛ, rìɓa ɗi ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ maŋi ɗi wuɓsɛɛ ɓi ɗi ŋwaànɛ à màŋi nyi. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ tekì gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ fɛ, ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wulàg; kìɓan kifog ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Mɛlkisedɛg, nyii ri ŋwaànɛ kìntɛ̀ɗ, kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll à sììraagh kì kpaà lɛ à rì cem. 
Nni tì rì lɛ tì kpaa lɛ: Levi ànɛ dòò yii yi ti yi tekì gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ à faghà girig gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki Abiraham à faghà gàɓ ì kìntɛ̀ɗ. 
Ɓisuulɛ nsoò Levi à ɓaghà di à ka yalɛn ɓi, tì rì lɛ tì kpaa lɛ à ɓaghà di à kakay ɓi bwaɓ yi seŋi ànsɛ̀ɛ̀ anɛ lɛ Abiraham, cààmɛ̀n ki Mɛlkisedɛg à kɛ̀ngà kì tulɛɛ ri nyi.
Kìsay ki pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ki ɓɔn ɓɛ Levi kɛɛ̀ki ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓɛ faghà kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl ɓi sasàghìghà miì; i ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓi boo ì Levi ɓɛɛ ki kìsay ki kɛɛ rɔɔtɛn, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri kìɓan ki fenɛn, di ki ghɛɓsìghà tì ɓi com lɛ rìkuu ɗi pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɗidɛŋ ɗyɛɛ ghɛnɛn ɗi ɗi ɓa ɓi nɗɛli wu Mɛlkisedɛg, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti ɓi nɗɛli wu Arɔn. 
Ɓisuulɛ i kìsay ki pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ki ti kì cenɗɛn, ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig lɛ ɓi koɓsɛ̀n. 
Nni roànɛ kìɓan kii ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi jàŋ inɛ ti kpaakpaa inɛ, à rì ŋwaànɛ ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗidɛŋ, ɗi mum à ka ɓaghà ɓi pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ miì. 
Lɛ ɓɛ yii lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ Kan wìs a rì ŋwaànɛ à yalɛɛ ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Zyuda ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi Moyis à ɓùgà ɓi ɓi kìsay ki pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki konaagh tì kì ghɛnɛɛ fɔlɔɔ, yɛ̀ɛ pirɛɛtìrɛ̀ adɛŋ ànɛ à rì ɓi kìpisɛn ki Mɛlkisedɛg à mɛ kpaŋ. 
À tekà ɓi ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu Pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓi rìkpaa ɗì ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓum ɓɛɛ faa, à ɓɔkà lɔŋ rì ìtèɗ wu cɛɓ ki ki ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ sugtag. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll a kalag lɛ: Ù rì pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓi nɗɛli wu Mɛlkisedɛg fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ mɛ pisi kidɔ̀gsɛna ki abɛ̀y lɛ ki ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ghɛɓsi com. 
Lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓi kighà ɓi lɛ com kidɛŋ kɛɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ kìɓan ki fenɛn miì kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti, kìɓan kifog dyàɓɛn inɛ ì cee ì mɛ ɗiŋì, yɛ̀ɛ ti ì kìlàg lɛ ti kɛǹ Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog. 
Ki kɛɛ̀dì kì ɓaà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ, 
kɔlɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi boo ì Levi ɓɛ mɓɔkaagh ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, Bɛ̀ll àa nkànaagh ɓi bɛ̀ɗ fɔlɔɔ; kìɓan kifog ɓi rìɓɔg ɗi Yeesus à ɓɔkà Pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀, Bɛ̀ll à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kan àa ǹkànɛɛ bɛ̀ɗ, àa ki lɔ̀gti ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀: Ù rì ɓiì ɓaà Pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì rèsii lɛ: Yeesus à rì roànɛ à kìi lɛ, Bɛ̀ll a ren bee ìnɛ ì rɔɔtɛɛ ì cee ìnɛ abɛ̀y rì ɓìsi. 
Ki ki ɓa ti lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓaà ɓɔɓɔ̀g ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ teghɛɛ; rìwu ɗyɛɛ rekà ɓɔ rìkɛ̀nkɛ̀n ɗi rì kìsay asu, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus, nyiì ghɛghɛɓ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, fɔɔnnɛ à yin lɛ à ceesì kìsay kii ki pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ rì ŋwaàdɛŋ. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à ghɛɓsì lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ tyoŋdɛɛ Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog, di ɓɛ fyee a lɔ̀ŋkii ɓisuulɛ, à rì lɔŋ cem cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, à ki ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔŋ̀zàg Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wàà.
Rìkuu ɗi nlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓìsi ɗyɛɛ ri Yeesus, lɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin, kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìnàn, ɓɛ ghasìghà nyi rì ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, à ki teŋmɛɛ à cee ɗyoo. 
Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì fùnɛɛ ɓituwe ɓɛŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi rìlɛɛghràg ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓyaa ɓi ɓɔmiɗ, rì ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ. Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki kìkii yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ, ɓisuulɛ nyii lɛɛghràkà Bɛ̀ll gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm yɛ̀ɛ à faghà nyimiɗ ɓi sìg à kìtuwe ki mɛlɛɛ̀ghlɛɛgh. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis ɓi nfalàg ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey, ɓɛ ɓaghà lɔŋ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ ki kìɓe; wɔ̀lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì ɓi bɛ̀ɗ inɛ Bɛ̀ll à kànɛ̀ngà ajɛ̀m ì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ì ɓɔgsìghà Man à Bɛ̀ll ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ à ti ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ kɛ̀ɛ nààdi isuùcèm.
Ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ti kpaakpàà, ki ki cee kɛɛ ri lɛ, tì rì rì ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ, à kɛ̀ngà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi weèlem à rìlàmì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, 
à rì ǹkìì-kìsay anɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì rì kìcèlì, rì ɓi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìnuugh  ànɛ à yin lɛ mum yɛɛ togà, lɔŋ Kan yɛɛ togà.
Ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey bimiɗ à rì ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹɗɛsɛn lɛ, a resi Bɛ̀ll lɛ rì ɓyom ɓi ɓum ɓɛ faa, rì ɓìtuwe ɓi ɓum ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll; fɔɔnnɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nyii ɓa girig rì com ki nyimiɗ yɛɛ faa ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
I Yeesus a ɓa ɓi ziinɛ, di à yin gi lɛ à ɓa pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ri wɔɔ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi Bɛ̀ll ɓyom ɓi ɓum ɓɛ faa ɓi rìɓɔgsì, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. 
Kìsay ki ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛǹ ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì, ki ri kìfèèghrɛnà, rì cììziŋ ki ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à kalìghà Moyis di à ti lɛ a toŋ kìlaa lɛ: Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kɔ kì toŋì ɓi kìfèèghrɛnà ki kilaa ki ǹɗèsìghà wɔ̀ ɓi dòn. 
Nni ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, Yeesus à ti rì kìsay ki ki cee ki nkaa ɓisuulɛ, à rì roànɛ à kìghà lɛ Bɛ̀ll a ren syeesyee à bee ri ɓum; bee inɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ sasaghii ɓi mɛ̀kàg mɛ mɛ rɔɔtɛɛ mɛ cee.
I bee inɛ Bɛ̀ll à lokà kì renì rì ɓum yɛ̀ɛ ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓeɓtɛn ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ kpaakpàà, di ki ghɛɓsìghà tì ɓi com lɛ, ɓɛɛ koɓsɛn yɔ̀ ri bee idɛŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì rì ɓìɓan ɓi a fenfen a ɓum ɓii, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ: Kan a kpaaghi lɛ: Mɛ̀ru mɛɛ̀ yùyuiy mɛɛ̀mɛ ǹɗì ɓiì renì nyɔɔnyɔn à bee lɛ rì ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl, rì ɓum ɓɛ a Zyuda. 
Yàa ɓa ti ɓi yɛ̀ɛ bee inɛ ǹɗengà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓaa ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, ŋwos anɛ m̀ɓangà ɓɔ ɓi càg lɛ nkpaŋziì ɓɔ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Egiɓtɛn. Ɓɛ ɓegà ɓi bee inɛ ǹɗengà ìnɛn rì ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ ǹghɛ̀righà ɓi girig nɗem aɗyoo rì ɓɔ, rìkpaa ɗi Kan ɗyɛɛ̀ɗìn. 
Nni bee inɛ ǹɗì ɓiì renì rì ɓumɓɛ a Isirayɛl yɛɛ̀nɛ: Kan lɛ: Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ǹɗì ɓiì foŋì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀yitì maa ǹkàn ɓɔ ɓyɔ ɓi mɛ̀rem, ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà Bɛ̀ll wàà, ɓɔɔ ɓa ɓum ɓɛm. 
Àdɛŋ àa ɓa ti ɓi lɛ à rèsì maaseŋi à kìlɔ̀ŋ, nsoò lɛ geni lɛ, a yi lɛ ǹɗì Kan; ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì yiì, à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓɔɓti à kpaŋ ɓi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn. 
Ǹɗi cenɛn ɓɔ mɛ̀nànì maa kɛ̀ɛ nki yiti ɓiɓe ɓyaa.
Ɓi rìkpaa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à kpaa lɛ à rì ɓiì renì bee ì nyɔn rì ɓum, à ghaasì bee i ǹtonto bee inɛ abɛ̀y. Nni com kìcèm ki ki mɛ finɛ̀n ki ki rùn, kaa rɔ̀ɓ lɛsàg lɛ kɛɛ silì.
Bee i ǹtonto ìnɛ lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum ì ɓaghà girig rì mɛ̀siŋdɛn mɛ mɛ seesee ɓìɓan ɓi riɓɔgsì, rì naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ togà kìnuugh; ɓi kìden ki asu ki ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ jàŋ i kìcèlì; ɓyom ɓi ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛ: rì kìrɛsì ki lamɓà rì teɓèrè, rì bìrɛs yi ɓɛ fafaa ɓisuu riɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ajɛ̀m ì kìlàà ki kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, nnɛ kìden ki ɓɛ nkalàg lɛ jàŋ inɛ ì pɔ̀ɔ̀zii kì ɓaà kìcèlì ì ɓaghà. 
Wɔɔ nnɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ntɔ̀ngì ɓyom ɓi nùnnumɛn i ɓaghà; jàŋ inɛ̀n ì ɓaghà gol rì gol; fìkɔrɔŋ fi riràrɛ̀n fi ɓaghà girig wɔɔ, fincèm fì pàmɛn ri gol; kìbɔkɔ̀ ki gol ki ɓaghà ɓi fìkɔrɔŋ fiǹ; ɓyom ɓi ɓaghà ɓi kìbɔkɔ̀, kiǹ lɛ: rì manà, rì kìgeŋ ki Arɔn ki ki sam̀gà, rì ɓìɓoŋ ɓi ɓi ɓaghà rì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓi bee inɛ lɛ, rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum. 
Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ lɛ ɓɛ̀syèrùɓɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì rìgwey ɓi nyoo ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà ɓi fìkɔrɔŋ fi riràrɛ̀n aɗyoo, kìfìì kaa ki gheg jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ nti ɓɛ weeyì ɓìtuwe ɓi risòghɛ̀n ɗi ɓiɓe. Nni àa cààmɛ̀n ki kpaakpaayɛn ɓiɓan ɓiǹ lɛ tintɔ̀ɔ̀ŋ kɛɛ ri lɛ̀. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi ɓaghà fɔlɔɔ ɓi woŋzakɛn, ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛɛ nti ɓɛ ɗiŋɗàg ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi kìden ki asu lɛ ɓɛɛ ki kìsay kaa. 
Ɓi kìden ki kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, lɔŋ ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ nyi cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ nti à ɗigàg wɔɔ, gɛ̀n bog ɓi bèg; à ki ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ wɔɔ ki ɗiŋii ri bwaɓ yi kituwe ki à faa Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wii wu nyimiɗ rì ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓi kilɔ̀ŋ kìcèm. 
Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki kɔnkɔ̀ngà lɛ kɛɛ resi ɓi rìkì ɗiǹ lɛ, bee inɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì pɔ̀ɔ̀zii kì ɓaà kìcèlì ì ɓaghà di ì ka yin kikpaŋ, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki yɛ̀ɛ kìnuugh ki abɛ̀y ki ɓaghà di ki kaka. 
Rìkì ɗiǹ ɗi ɓaghà kìfèèghrɛnà ki ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki tì rì ki miì, ki resii lɛ: Ɓyom ɓi mum à faa, rì ɓìtuwe ɓi à cuusii ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓi yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi konàg kì tɛɛ̀zii nɗem wu ŋwaànɛ a ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll ɓi bee inɛ̀n. 
Bee i rìɓɔgsì ìnɛ̀n ì ɓiisɛ̀ngà kì kòmi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓiɗilàg, rì ɓyom ɓi nɔnɔyɛn, rì ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi zòghɛ̀n mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu; ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi miì ɓi komkòmgà lɔŋ ɓyom ɓi zɛy, fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ɓaà rì ìtèɗ à kpaŋ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki rilɔ̀gtàg ɗi ɓiɓan.
Wɔ̀lɛ Kiris à yùghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey ànɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì ɓaà; à syààghày kìnuugh ki ki kii lɛ, ki teghɛ̀n ki cee, ki ki rɔɔtɛn ki cee, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa kinuugh ki ɓum ɓɛɛ toŋi, yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ ki yin ɓi bàlì ì ɓyom ɓi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà ɓi ziinɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ɗiŋìghà gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm, ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì pɔ̀ɔ̀zii kì ɓaà kìcèlì; à ɗiŋìghà ɓi wɔɔ ri bwaɓ yi ɓipiì, nsoò lɛ yi ɓɔn ɓɛ sanìnya, à ɗiŋìghà wɔɔ lɛ a ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll rì bwaɓ yii yi nyimiɗ, à ki fɔ̀n yi ɓìsi gòri ì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Lɛ i bwaɓ yi ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ sanìnya rì yi ɓipiì, rì kìɓu ki jɛɛ à sanìnya ànɛ ɓɛ tɔni, ɓɛ ɗyɛɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ɓìsyeg, ɓi ti ɓi pisàg ɓɔ ɓìsyeg ɓi nyoo, 
bɔ̀ɓ yaŋ min ɗi bwaɓ yi Kiris ànɛ à falɛ̀ngà nyimiɗ ri Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ɛ̀ fìfin, ɓi Nghay ànɛ à ri fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Bwaɓ yii yi ri ɓiì tɛɛ̀zii mɛrem mis ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ gɛɓsɛ̀n, lɛ ti ki Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem kisay.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Kiris à rɛrɛlii ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ ɓi bee i nyɔn ìnɛ lɛ, rì ɓum rì Bɛ̀ll, lɛ di ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à mɛ reŋi ɓɛɛ teɗ ɓìrɔɔ ɓi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓi à kàkà ɓumɓɛ abɛ̀y; ɓɛ ri ɓyɔ ɓiì terì lɛ rìwu ɗi mum bog ɗyɛɛ mɛ kwèɗ ɓum ɓi ɓìɓe ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kighà di ɓɛ kaka ɓi fìɗyàɓ fi bee. 
Ɓisuulɛ jàŋ inɛ kaàtà ànɛ mum à reɓsàkà rìwu ɗii miì à rì, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ yi lɛ mum nyimiɗ anɛ à reɓsàkà rìwu ànɛ̀n à mɛ wu. 
Lɛ kaàtà ànɛ mum à reɓsaagh rìwu ɗii miì à rì rì ìtèɗ di mum àncèm à mɛ wu, ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki mum àncèm à kaka cem, kaàtà ànɛn à yin ɗi ìtèɗ wudɛŋ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki nsoò bee i ǹtonto ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rengà rì ɓum, ì tumɛ̀ngà ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ bwaɓ yi yi kpaŋì; 
lɛ Moyis à kìghà lɛ, à mɛ làmɓɛn mɛsiŋdɛn mɛcèm mɛ mɛ ri ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi mis mɛ kilɔ̀ŋ kìcèm, à teɗ min bwaɓ yi ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓɛ̀sanìnya, rì yi ɓipiì, rì mɛ̀nig, à mìsì lɛ, rì ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, rì ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, rì kìvùree ki kite ki lɛ ìzoɓ, rì ɓi ǹfìŋga wu ɓàŋ lɛ pɔɔŋ. 
À kpaa lɛ: Bwaɓ yi yi siìraagh bee inɛ Bɛ̀ll àa ǹsiŋ̀dɛɛ mìni lɛ, ɓi ɓeŋ yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ Moyis à mìsìghà girig bwaɓ ɓi kìnuugh, rì ɓi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ nkìlàg kìsay miì ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓi ɗi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ soghàg ɓyom ɓìcèm rì bwaɓ, nsoò ɓìɓe, ɓi ti ɓi ɓalàg ɓìcenɛn di bwaɓ yi kpaŋi.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà min lɛ, ɓìfèèghrɛnà ɓi ɓɛkɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri aɗyoo ɓyɛɛ teɗ rìkuu ɗi zòghɛ̀n ɗiǹ, rì tì lɛ, nsoò ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓyom ɓɛ aɗyoo ɓɛncèm ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì terì zòghɛ̀n rì ɓìfùna ɓi ɓi cee ɓiǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ Kiris à ɗiŋìghà ɓi ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ toŋi, ìnɛ ì rì lɛ ì ɓa kìfèèghrɛnà ki naà-Bɛ̀ll ì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, à ɗiŋìghà lɔŋ ɓi ɗyoo ɗyɔmiɗ lɛ di a rɛli ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wis. 
À ɗiŋìghà ɓi wɔɔ lɛ di a funɛn nyimiɗ gɛ̀n lɛ gɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ nlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àa nti à ɗigàg bèg bimiɗ rì bwaɓ yi nyàm. 
I kɛɛ ɓa fɔlɔɔ, di ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà min lɛ Kiris a wog rìkɛŋ gɛ̀n lɛ gɛ̀n à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ zi i kìlɛ̀ngà. Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, à yùghà gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm, di mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn mɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi lɛ a legsi kìɓe di à fùnɛɛ nyimiɗ. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìsiŋdɛn lɛ mum à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wii gɛ̀n bog, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn innɛ Bɛ̀ll à yɔ̀mzì nyi, 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Kiris ànɛ à falɛ̀ngà nyimiɗ gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm lɛ a tɛg ɓìɓe ɓi ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey à rì ɓiì ɓììtii ti kìrèsɛɛ ɓi gɛ̀n i kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓe a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓoŋɓoŋ nyi lɛ a kweɗ ɓɔ.
Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi konaagh ɓi ki ɓaà syeesyee à kìfèèghrɛnà à ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓyom, ɓi ri lɔŋ cììghziŋ ki ɓi ɓìrɔɔ ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ yùyuiy; ɓi yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi konàg kì tɛɛ̀zii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kɛ̀ngì Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog ɓi bee inɛ̀n, ɓi ki yin lɛ ɓi tɛɛ̀zì ɓɔ rì rìkuu ɗi ɓifùnà ɗi fɔlɔɔ, ɗi ɗi ri lɔŋ bèg yìcèm rìkuu ɗìfog, kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìlɔ̀gtɛ̀n. 
I ɓyɛɛ ɓa rì ìtèɗ wu tɛɛ̀ziyɛn mum, di ɓɛ mɛ lèkà rìwewèy ɗi ɓituwe ɓi rìsòòsòghɛ̀n ɗi ɓum, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìkuu ɗi riɓɔgsì ɗiǹ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ teɗ zòghɛ̀n gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti ri fèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛ ri rì ɓìɓe. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi saaɗ à rìkpaa, ɓìtuwe ɓi ɓɛ ti ɓɛ weeyì ɓi zòghɛ̀n ì ɓum ɓi ti ɓi kilàg lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yiyiti ɓìɓe ɓyaa bèg yìcèm. 
Lɛ bwaɓ yi ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓɛ̀sanìnya rì yi ɓipiì yi yin lɛ yi pisì ɓìɓe ŋwos adɛŋ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ɓaghà di à ti ɓiì yùu ɓi ziinɛ, à kpaaghà rì Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Ù kɔ̀ni ɓi kifùna, nsoò lɛ com ki mum à faa wɔ̀, kìɓan kifog, ù faghà mɛ̀ nyoo. 
Ù ti kɔ̀ɔ wog kirɔɔ rì ɓìtuwe ɓi ɓɛ tɔni lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi wɔ̀ rì ɓyɔ, nsoò ɓi ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n ì ɓìɓe. 
Nni fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ɛ nkpaaghi lɛ: wɔ̀ Bɛ̀ll, mɛ̀ɛnɛ, ǹ-yùu lɛ nki rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìɓan kɛm̀ ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna.
À loogh kìkpaa lɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ kɔ̀ni ɓi nsoò ɓìfùna, nsoò mɛ̀fafàà mɛ zɛy, nsoò ɓìtuwe ɓi ɓɛ tɔni lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi wɔ̀ rì ɓyɔ, nsoò ɓi ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n ì ɓìɓe, ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi rɔɔ ɓi wɔ, kɔlɛ ɓìfùna ɓìn ɓyɛɛ̀ kìikilɛ̀n lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà. 
À ki ɓɔ̀ɓti lɛ wɔ̀ Bɛ̀ll! Mɛ̀ɛnɛ, ǹ-yùu lɛ nki rìkɔ̀n ɗyɔɔ, fɔlɔɔ a rì lɛ, à pisii bee ì rìɓɔgsàg ɗi Bɛ̀ll ì ǹtonto, à rèsì bee ì nyɔn. 
Ɓisuulɛ Yeesus Kiris à roòzìghà rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsii ti rì zòghɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓi ɓìɓe ɓis lɛ rìfa ɗi à faghà nyoo yìì gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm.
Pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ bimiɗ à ti à rɛlàg ɓɛ̀ŋwos ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi jàŋ yiì ì kìsay à kìkì mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓifùna mɛ̀fog mɛ mɛ yin lɛ mɛ pisi ɓìɓe ŋwos adɛŋ. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Kiris à faghà kìfùna kifog ɓisuu ɓiɓe, à ki kɔ̀ri min ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ a ɓoŋɓoŋ ɓigomìnɛ lɛ ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓii ɓɛɛ ɓa kìɓoŋ ki a rɛsag mɛ̀kòò mii miì. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi rìfa ɗìfog, à mɛ kì lɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛɛ̀ziyɛn ɓɛɛ ɓa lɛ syeesyee ìsuùcèm kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ fen a lɔ̀ŋkaa. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ rèresi girig ɓìsi; lɛ à loogh kì kpaà lɛ, 
Kan lɛ: Bee inɛ ǹɗì ɓiì renì ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛ lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì ɓɔ, ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n ì rì ɓiì ɓaà fɛlɛ: Ǹɗì ɓiì foŋì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀rem maa, ǹkàn ɓɔ ɓyɔ ɓi nto. À ɓɔ̀ɓ min lɛ:
Fɔɔnnɛ màa yititi ɓi ɓiɓe ɓyaa, nsoò mɛ̀nànì maa.
Ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓìɓe ɓi ti ɓì cenɛn, ki ghɛɓsii tì ɓi com lɛ ɓɛɛ fa ɓìfùna ɓisuu risòghɛ̀n ɗi ɓiɓe ɓiǹ.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ mìni ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì ti lɛ tì ɗiŋì ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì rì kìcèlì kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris lɛ bwaɓ yi Yeesus. 
À nɛmgà ɓìsi nyɔɔnyɔn à bee, bee inɛ ì rì rì cɛɓ ɓi kìlàà ki ki ɓaghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ ɓi nyoo yìì i nyimìɗ. 
Tì rì rì ǹlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey anɛ ɓɛ rɛsìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll. 
Ti tyòŋdɛɛna min Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog rì ǹɗem wu wu ri lɛ sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ri ɗìronɛn, ǹɗem wù tɛnɛn ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi fa wɔ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, nyoo ì ɓa ǹwùɓsiyɛn ɓi mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀ tɛnɛn. 
Ti ɓèŋina dyàɓɛn inɛ ti làalam̀ɓɛ̀n, tì sììrɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à faghà ǹkàg roòzag mɛkàg mii. 
Ti ɓèeghɓèŋɗɛɛna ɓìsi rì ɓìsi, tì feèfègsɛ̀n lɛ ti ɓa rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, tì ki kìki ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee. 
Tyɛ̀ ki lèg rikɛ̀ngì ɗi a mɛ̀taŋzɛn mis yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg, ti faàfàlɛ̀n lɔŋ ɓìsiìɓɔmiɗ itèɗ, à ɓiisɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓi seesee lɛ ŋwos a Kan a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi.
Ɓisuulɛ, i tì kɛ̀nkɛni asu tì kìkì kìɓe ɓi rìfee, di tì mɛ yi saaɗ, kìfùna kidɛŋ ki yiìdi ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n ì ɓìɓe. 
Tì rì ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi lɔŋ lɛ ti ɓoŋɓoŋ lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, rì ɗuu ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗigsii ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki Bɛ̀ll ǹtoòtèɗ ri coo iris ɓi nɗem. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ weeyì mum ǹcèm ànɛ à yogsii ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wog nyi nyìighnyìg di ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, nsoò lɛ ɓɛraa ɓɛ resii rìnàn ɗii. 
Ɓì rì lɛ ɓì fèg lɛ rìkuu ɗi ntɔɓ aɗi ɗyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ŋwaànɛ à kìi lɛ à sɛɛtì Man à Bɛ̀ll, à ghɛn bwaɓ yi riràrɛ̀n ɗi lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum, yi yi kii lɛ a ɓa ǹtɛnɛn, yɛ̀ɛ zɛy rì zɛy à com, à ki fen Nghay à geesɛ̀n. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓìsii yii roànɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì rɔ̀ŋi mɛ̀ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì lèɓi à kpaa tì lɛ: Kan à rì ɓiì yɔ̀mzii ɓum ɓii.
Ki ri koŋnyoo lɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem, a raɗ mum ɓi ɓyàg ɓii. 
Yitiina lɔŋ cɛɓ ki ɓì ghɛɓkà ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ǹtonto mɛ ɓì tekà kìtɛɛtɛn ki Bɛ̀ll; ɓì wokà mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n; wɔ̀lɛ ɓì ki càrɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓi zàà ìnɛn. 
Ki mɓalàg lɛ ɗi ɗi yii, ɓɛ sɛɛ̀sɛ̀mgì mìni, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ yeeyeèsì mìni ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, ɗi ɗi yii, ɓì sug ɓi gàm ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yeèyèèsìghà fɔlɔɔ. 
Ɓì kàɓɓɛ̀ngà mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓimbùŋ, ɓì ki woki kirɔɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ɓɛ nti ɓɛ ɓatàg mìni ɓyom, ɓisuulɛ ɓì yighà lɛ ɓì ɓaghà rì ɓyom ɓi ɓi cee ɓiǹ lɛ, ɓyɔɔ ri ɓi ɓi ri cààmɛ̀n kìcèm. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ ɓi càɗ ntyweeyi win ɓisuulɛ wu ri rì ɓyoo mɛlèɓ. 
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓi ɓa rì kìsììrì, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi roòzi rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ɓì teɗ min com ki à kàkà mìni. 
Lɛ cààmɛ̀n kaa rɔ̀ɓ kiden lɔŋ lɛsàg lɛ roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùu a kpaŋ, àa lɛ̀mzii ɓi. 
Kìɓan kifog ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ̀m à rì ɓiì ghɛɓì lɛ rìgherɛ̀n, wɔ̀lɛ i à sugtii rì jɛ̀m, ǹɗem wɛ̀m wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wogti kirɔɔ rì nyi. 
Ɓìsii yin ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ sugtàg rì jɛ̀m lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗyaŋ, ɓìsii ri ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛɓsi ɓyɛɓ  ɓyàà.
Rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ri rìyi ɗi mum à yii saaɗ ànɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi à tyweeyii, ɗi ɓa tì com ki kɛɛ̀ rèresi mum ɓɛ̀saaɗ ɓɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi à ghɛɛ ɓì.
Ɓumɓɛ abɛ̀y ɓɛ tekà mɛ̀sɛɛ̀ghsɛɛgh lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n nnɛ tì ti tì yilàg lɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà zi ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ti seesee ɓi kilɛ̀ngà rì com ki ŋwaà ghɛɛ ɓì.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n nnɛ Aɓɛl à ɓɔgsìghà Bɛ̀ll rì ɓìfùna ɓi ɓi cee ɓi Kaɛŋ; lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗii, Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà Aɓɛl lɛ à rì ŋwaà saaɗ, Bɛ̀ll nyimiɗ a sɛkà rìfa ɗii, ɗyɛɛ kii lɛ a ɓaɓa à tòtòg, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ à mɛ wu.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n nnɛ Enɔg à ɓɔkà yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll cem, kɛ̀ɛ yi com ki lɛ rìwu; ŋwaàdɛŋ à ghɛɛ̀dìghà ɓi nyi ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔkà rì nyi aɗyoo; di ɓɛ ka ɓɔg ɓi ri nyi aɗyoo, Enɔg à kìghà lɛ Bɛ̀ll a wog kìrɔɔ rì nyi. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i mum àrì kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n, à yin lɛ à rɔɔ Bɛ̀ll; ŋwaànɛ à tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛɛ Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì gherɛɛ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì wɔɔ, à ki gherɛn ti lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à lèɓkì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kaaghì nyi.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n nnɛ Nowe à kìghà lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à lokà nyi kì kpaa kìɓan ki ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka ghɛn ɓi, nni à risìghà, à wog rìkpaa ɗi Bɛ̀ll, à toŋ kìkɔm lɛ a ghɛɓsi naa yìì i ɓum; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi kighà Nowe lɛ a fa ziinɛ bɛ̀lɛn, à fɔ̀n rìɓa ɗi mum à rì lɛ à ɓa lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, lɛ rìgherɛ̀n.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Abiraham à kìghà Bɛ̀ll mɛ̀wog yɛ̀ɛ à reŋìghà nyi, à pɛ̀sɛ̀n ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì nyi ɓiì faà. À kɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ yi jàŋ inɛ à kɛ̀ɛ. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n, nnɛ à ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkèn ɓi ziinɛ Bɛ̀ll à siŋdɛ̀ngà lɛ à rì nyi ɓiì faà. Àa nkɔ̀ràg ɓi ɓìlaa, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀-Isag ɓɛɛ̀ Yakɔɓ ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà girig ǹkàg wɔm wiǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ Abiraham à ɓoŋɓòŋgà bàn ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ fekà yɛ̀ɛ ì rì lɛ ì toŋɗɛ̀n, nyimiɗ yɛɛ ki toŋ, yɔ̀ lɛ kpegkpeg.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ, nsoò Sara à ɓaghà di à mɛ sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛ̀n, à ɓaghà rì ìtèɗ wulɛ a kiti boo ì mum, ɓisuulɛ à tyweeyàkà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì roòzii nkàg wii. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki kìbog ki mum ki ki ɓaghà di kaa tɔ̀gti kiǹ, ki kighà boo ìnɛ ì tèghɛɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tyɔɛy ti aɗyoo, nsoò lɛ yɛ̀ɛ sɛɛ̀sɛɛ anɛ ɓi bèn ì rìɓày à kìkòn ànɛ ɓɛ yin lɛ ɓɛ ɓay.
Lɔŋ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n innɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ cuughà di ɓɛ ka teɗ ɓi ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kàkà ɓɔ; kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ghɛngày ɓyɔ, ɓɛ ki nyààrɛn ri ɓyɔ di ɓi kakay fìràɓ, ɓɛ ki kpaa lɛ ɓɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi rìghaàgh fɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog ɓɛǹ fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ: Ɓɛɛ̀ kaakaa kilɔ̀ŋ kidɛŋ. 
I kɛɛ ɓa lɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày wɔɔ kɛɛ ɗiɗìghà ɓɔ ɓi nɗem, di ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ ɓɛ ɓa rì cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓɛɛ sugti wɔɔ.
