Ɓi saaɗ à rìkpaa, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki cee kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ kɔnkɔ̀ngà, yɛɛlɔɔ lɛ, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki aɗyoo; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Bɛ̀ll à yin lɛ à wog ǹtoòrìɗ lɛ ɓɛɛ reŋi nyi lɛ Bɛ̀ll wàà, ɓisuulɛ à pègsɛ̀ngà ɓɔ bimiɗ à bàn.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Abiraham à fùnɛ̀ngà Isag di Bɛ̀ll à fèèghrɛɛ nyi; m̀bobog wìì a man nnɛ à fùnɛ̀ngà lɔɔ, kɔlɛ rì nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà ǹkàg. 
À kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓi Isag nnɛ ù ɓaagɛ rì boo ì mum ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓɛsàg rì wɔ̀. 
Abiraham à ɓaghà rì fèg ànɛ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ, nsoò mum àa wii, à ghèmzì nyi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zìghà nyi man wiì; rìkuu ɗi kifèèghrɛnà ki righèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, kɛɛ ri lɔɔ.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Isag à màgà lɛ rì Yakɔɓ, rì Eso ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ beèbɛ̀y.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Yakɔɓ à màgà ɓɔn ɓɛ Yoosɛɓ ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ bog bòg bog, di à ti ɓiì wiì, à tuŋì ɓi nto wu kigeŋ ki àa mɓèmdàg miì, à ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Yoosɛɓ à ɓùgà kìɓan ki rìpɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗi ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl a Egiɓtɛn, di à ti jàŋbog rì rìwu, à ki reɓsɛn com ki ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì kìi ri ɓìwoɓ ɓii.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ ɓɛ̀yalì ɓɛ Moyis ɓɛ nyamgà nyi ɓi naa ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛraa ajɛ̀m ì rìyalɛ̀n ɗii, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ man ànɛ̀n à rɔɔtɛ̀ngà, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ risìghà ɓi kidɔ̀gsɛna ki rifòm ɗi faghà. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Moyis à ɓèngà lɛ ɓɛɛ regi nyi lɛ man à gɔ̀n ì Farawɔŋ di à ti ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, 
à ɓiìsɛ̀n kìkɔ̀ni lɛ ɓɛɛ kiki nyi mɛ̀tɔɓ ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll à rɔ̀tɛ̀ngà, à cee lɛ a wog kìrɔɔ ɓi kìɓe ɓiɗùm maa cààmɛ̀n. 
À ghɛn lɛ ǹtoòrìɗ wu Kiris à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh wu cee coo ikum wu Egiɓtɛn kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg ɓisuulɛ mis mii mɛ ɓaghà lɔŋ ri mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ mɛ ɓoŋɓòŋgà nyi asu. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày a Egiɓtɛn, kɛ̀ɛ risi bim inɛ rìfòm ɗi ɓaghà lɛ ɗi wog, à sììrɛ̀ngà lɔŋ ɓi nɗɛli wii yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ, a seesee Bɛ̀ll ànɛ ɓaà ghɛn ɓi. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ à kìghà Paskà, à tɔg lɛ ɓɛɛ misi bwaɓ ɓi mɛ̀suunaa di fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì cuusii ɓɔn ɓɛ ǹtonto, a rɔɓ kɛ̀ɛ cuusi ɓɛroɓɛ a Isirayɛl.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛ syaàghà rìɓày à m̀ɓàŋ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ zi i zɛy; yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ a Egiɓtɛn ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ fèèghrɛ̀ngà girig, mɛ̀nig mɛ ghaàgh rì ɓɔ.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ gari ì Zyeriko ì kpìlàkà di ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓaa cèŋzɛn yɔ̀ mɛru taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ Rahaɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà giɓ a rìɓàmɓà à wughà ɓi nɗaŋ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kighà Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀lɔg ɓisuulɛ à ghàɓkà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɛngà mɛ̀wooghrag, rì syeesyee à ǹɗem.
Nkpaati ɓà cɛ? Cààmɛ̀n ki ri lɛ ki kaarɛ̀n mɛ̀ di ǹkpaa lɛ, nkali ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ-Zyedeyɔŋ, ɓɛ̀-Ɓarag, ɓɛ̀-Samsɔn, ɓɛ̀-Yɛfte, ɓɛ̀-Davit, ɓɛ̀-Samuɛl rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan. 
Ɓɛ kighà lɛ ɓɛ yagsàg ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi mɛ̀y, ɓɛ kikì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ saaɗ, ɓɛ ki ghɛn yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kàg mɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì mɔ mɛ rongà, ɓɛ simdì ɓìmonɗo myɔm, lɛ rìgherɛ̀n; 
ɓɛ ɓuɓsì ìtèɗ wu ɗuu, ɓɛ ki lɛg lɛ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wey ɓɔ rì gàfàg, ɓɛ wɔngì tìroɓ ti ɓɛ ɓaghà rì tyɔ, ɓɛ ɓa rì kìghɛɛsii a wɛ̀y, ɓɛ ki sansan mɛraŋ mɛ wɛ̀y mɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓidɛŋ. 
Lɛ rìgherɛ̀n innɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ghɛɛdìghà tì yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓaa ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓaa wu ɓɛ ghem̀ɓɛ̀ngà tì, ɓɛ ɓa tì rì ɓɔ. Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ tulɛ̀ngà rì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi mɛtɔɓ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki gherɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ pisi ɓɔ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n, lɛ di fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ syɔɔ̀dɛn rì rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ ɗi ɗi rɔɔtɛɛ ɗi cee. 
Ɓɛ fengàkà tì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ, ɓɛ bog ɓɔ kìtòn rì gbaǹ, ɓɛ kagì ɓɔ bɛǹ, ɓɛ ki pìki ɓɔ ɓi naà-zày. 
Ɓɛ rogàkà ɓɔ gɔ̀g lɛ ɓɛɛ wey ɓɔ ɓɛ rengì ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓìden ɓiɓɛɛ̀ rì ɓìghàg ɓɛ wewèy ɓɛm̀bog rì gàfàg, ɓɛ rerènìghà jàŋ, ɓɛ waatàg lɛ rì gòò yi jɔ̀ɔ̀, rì yi bwiy, ɓɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ com, ɓɛ yeèyèèsì ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki tɔtɔɓ ɓɔ, 
ɓɔ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum mɛ ziinɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà gì ɓi lɛ ì ɓa rì mɔ, ɓɔ yɛɛ deŋdèŋgà lɛ rì ɓi mɛ̀reɓ, rì ɓi dòn aɗyoo, ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓ lɛ rì ɓi bagsɛn yi dòn rì ɓi ɓìbùgsɛnà. 
Nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à sɛkà rìgherɛ̀n ɗyaa ɓɛ tekà ɓi com ki Bɛ̀ll à kàkà ɓɔ 
ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ peèghpègsɛ̀ngà bimid à com àdɛŋ ànɛ à cee ɓisu wis, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ kìɓan ki fenɛn kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti a lɔ̀ŋkaa, di ɓìsii ka yiǹ.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsi girig, yɛ̀ɛ tì ti ɓɛ̀rìɓiyɛn ri ǹkun wu ɓɛwusìnɛ̀ɗ yɛ̀ɛ wu, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min ki càri com kìcèm ki ki ri ɓìsi ǹtɛ̀g, rì kìɓe ki ki ti kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tɔg ɓisi kìlaataagh, tì sììrɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀ree mɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg ɓisi lɛ ti ghɛŋì. 
Tì seesèè lɔŋ Yeesus ànɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗis ɗi sasaghii nto ɓi nyi, à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n. Yeesus ànɛ̀n yɛɛ cenɛ̀ngà rìwu ɗi ɓi Kɔrɔs, kɛ̀ɛ tɔg com rì ntoòrìɗ wu à wokà, lɛ à seesèèghà kìrɔɔ ki ki ɓoŋɓòŋgà nyi; ɓi gomìnɛ, à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi weèlem à ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll.
Terina kìrèmzɛnà ɓi roànɛ à cenɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛɛ̀ ɗuù fɔlɔɔ ri nyi, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓa kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ kìfɔlìmùm kɛɛ teɗ mìni mɛ̀rem.
Ɓi wɛ̀y win wu rì kìɓe, ɓì ka ɗuù ɓi à kpaŋ ɓi jàŋ inɛ lɛ ɓi wu, 
ɓì mɛ ɗimzɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi mɛfegsɛn yi Bɛ̀ll a kpaaghi mini fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓii lɛ: Man wɛm̀ kɔ̀ɔ sɛɛti zàà ìnɛ Kan à ɓoogh wɔ̀, kìfɔlìmùm kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓan wɔ di à fwààdɛɛ wɔ̀. 
Ɓisuulɛ Kan à tì à falàg ŋwaànɛ à keesii ǹtɔɓ à ki ɓoki roànɛ à yii lɛ à rì nyi man.
Cenɛɛna mɛ̀tɔɓ, Bɛ̀ll a kìki mini fɔlɔɔ lɛ ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓii. Man àbe nnɛ seŋi à ti kɛ̀ɛ ɓog? 
I à kuli ɓi mini yɛ̀ɛ à ti à kwiiyì ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm, di ɓì yin ɓɛkɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓii ɓɛ ɓɔn, ɓɛ à yali ɓi ɓɛ̀y. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀mùù ɓɛ mɓokì ɓìsi tì ki kìki ɓɔ mɛ̀wog, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min lɛ tì pɔ̀ɔ̀zì kì woògh Seŋi ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀ghay, lɛ ti ɓa rì cɛɓ. 
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɓɛ yaayii ɓìsi ɓɛ nti ɓɛ falàg ɓìsi ǹtɔɓ ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ nghɛngì lɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à ɓokì ɓìsi ɓi kìrɔɔ kis lɛ di ti ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi rìɓa ɗii ɗi à rì ǹtɛnɛn. 
Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ lɛ ǹtɔɓ wucèm wu ti wu lokì kìghɛnɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìɓan ki kɛɛ wogsi mum bim, wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa kiɓan ki kinyàà, kìɓan kifog, wu ti wu siitàg kì faà ɓìɗùn ɓi cɛɓ ki fyòoog, rì ki saaɗ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì tèèsii ɓyàg ɓin ɓi ɓyaa nyɔŋì, rì mɛ̀ɗu min mɛ maa kpɔ̀gtì. 
Mɛ̀kòò min mɛɛ nɔɔ̀ti lɔŋ bee yi yi ri lɛ saaɗ di fɔɔnnɛ ìkòò wucèm wu wu ri rì kìlɛm wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nìmɓɛn, wɛɛ wɔǹ lɔŋ nwɔ̀nɛn. 
Kaana lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ lɛ fyòoog rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓì ki ɓa ri cɛɓ ki ki ri kìtɛnɛn; lɛ ŋwaànɛ cɛɓ kìn ki ri ɓiì kaarɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkii, àa ghɛn ɓi Kan. 
Ɓì konàg lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ à rèèghrɛ̀n geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll, nsoò lɛ gàŋ i ǹlòlolɛn yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ròò ǹɗuŋ, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓuùsi jàŋ, ì ki yeesi ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ri ìrɔ̀g wu yɔ̀.
Ɓì konàg lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri cɛɓ ki tɔɔtɔɓki, nsoò lɛ a ɓa rì zɛɛtɛn ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri kìcèlì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Eso ànɛ à kàɓkà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu risɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓisuu càà ki ɓiɗilàg. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, yɛ̀ɛ à mɛɛ̀ kaaghà lɛ seŋi a maŋ nyi, nni à nàɓkà nyi lɛ bee inɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à lɔ̀gtì tì kìɓan ki à kìghà ì ɓaghà ɓi. Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ à kaakààghà bee fɔlɔɔ di a rènɗèn.
Lɛ àa dòn ìnɛ mum à rì lɛ à kòm yɛɛ̀nɛ ɓì tyòŋdɛ̀ngà jàŋbog rì yɔ̀, dòn ì Sinayi ìnɛ ì ɓaghà rì ɗuu, rì tìfììfìnà, rì birìm ì ɓìɓɓìɓ, rì bɛ̀ɓ 
rì gom ì ɗyam, rì gom ì jɛ̀ɛ̀; ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ wokà gom ìnɛ̀n, ɓɛ ɓeèdɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ asu rì rìwowòg ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɓɛ cenɛ̀n ǹsiŋdɛn wulɛ: Nsoò nyàm yàa kòmi dòn ìnɛn, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ yɔ̀ ki rogii gɔ̀g, ɓɛ wey yɔ̀. 
Kìɓan kiǹ ki koŋɗɛ̀ngà nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi rìseesèè ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ Moyis à kpaghà lɛ ǹɗisii, ǹki nìŋdɛn lɛ kpàg kpàg kpàg. 
Wɔ̀lɛ, ɓìi nkɛ̀ɛ jàŋbog rì dòn ì Siyon, jàŋbog rì bàn ì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem, Yorisalɛm ànɛ aɗyoo, rì ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓìtuu ɓìtuu, 
ɓìi nkɛ̀ɛ jàŋbog rì ǹtaŋzɛn wu ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ǹtonto, ɓɛ mii maa mɛ ri mɛ̀ kànɛn ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm; ɓìi nkɛɛ̀ jàŋbog rì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ɓiì yɔ̀mi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm; ɓìi nkɛ̀ɛ jàŋbog rì mɛ̀ghay mɛ mɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, mɛ mɛ ti lɛ syeesyee, kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ fen ɓi mɔ. 
Ɓìi nkɛɛ̀ jàŋbog rì Yeesus ànɛ à rì ɓi nyìinyìm à nyɔɔnyɔn à rìràrɛ̀n ànɛ lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓum, ànɛ bwaɓ yii yi yi kpagà yɛɛ̀ tòtòg yi cee yi Aɓɛl.
Ɓì konàg lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ɓèn kiwoògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a tòtòg, ɓisuulɛ i ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓengà kì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ à rɔ̀ɔ̀rɔ̀gsɛ̀ngà ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ rɔmɛ̀ngà ɓi deɓ, gɛ̀n yaŋ ri ɓìsi, cààmɛ̀n ki tì lɔ̀ghii ɓyàs rì roànɛ a rɔɔrɔgsɛ̀n yì ɓìsi ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm. 
Nyi ànɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì i nyɛ̀ŋzìghà zi ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, nnyɛɛ mɛ fa nkàg ɓi gomìnɛ lɛ: Àa lɔŋ zi yɔ̀ ri yɔ̀ yɛɛ̀nɛ ǹɗì ɓiì nyɛ̀ŋzii, m̀ɓiì nyɛ̀ŋzii ti girig gɛ̀n bogtɛ̀n lɛ rì ɗyoo miì. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ lɛ: Gɛ̀n bogtɛ̀n inɛ̀n ì rèsii lɛ: ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓi ɓiì nyɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ, ɓi silàg, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓi ɓi yin lɛ ɓi kpig ɓyɛɛ ri rɔ̀ɓ. 
Nni ti faana min Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ tì teri kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki yin lɛ ki kpig, tì ɓɔgsì nyi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɗi ri lɛ ɗi rɔɔ nyi, rì mɛ̀wog, rì ìris. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll wìs a rì girig yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ɗiighɗigsì lɛ lɛɛ̀ lɛɛ̀.
Sììrɛɛna ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɗimzɛn kiɓan ki lɛ ɓi ghaɓki ɓɛ̀kèn lɛ syeesyee; ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ laasìghà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi ɓi kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ kiǹ.
Ɓì yitàg ɓìmbùŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ ɓì rì ɓi naà-zày ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ; ɓì yitàg girig ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ tɔtɔ̀ɓ, ɓisuulɛ mìni girig ɓì rì rì nyoo.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kuughraagh riwɛy; naa ì rìwɛy ì ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓìi yɔ̀mi ɓum ɓɛ kitɔɓi rì ɓɛ̀kìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g.
Kìsee ki mɔ̀ɔ̀ni kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ làmì ɓyɛɓ ɓin; nyààrɛɛna rì gàɓ ì ɓyom inɛ ɓì rì rì yɔ̀, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll nyimiɗ a kpaaghi lɛ: Màa càɗ ɓi wɔ, kɛ̀ɛ nki rini wɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ tì rì min lɛ tì kpaa rì ǹtyweeyi lɛ: Kan à rì roànɛ à ti à ghɛɓsàg mɛ̀, ǹ-yin lɛ ǹɗisì com, mum à rì lɛ à kì mɛ̀ cɛ?
Yitiina ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ lokà mìni kì kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì, ɓɛɛ wogsìghà mìni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, ɓì fiɓì rìsyɔn ɗi cɛɓ kaa, ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tì ìkòò waa wu righerɛ̀n.
Yeesus Kiris à rì lɔŋ com kìfog, yɛ̀ɛ rìŋkò, yɛ̀ɛ gɛɛ̀nɛ, à kpaŋ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ mɛ̀rèsàg mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛ riì tìràɓ, mɛɛ ɗimzi mìni bee, lɛ ki rɔɔtɛɛ lɛ ǹɗem wɛɛ teɗ ìtèɗ lɛ geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll, à cee ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ɓi komi ɓìɗilàg ɓi ɓi ghɛɓsìghà ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ falɛ̀ngà miì nsoò ɓi bee idɛŋ. 
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ɓi kìnuugh ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛ ɗi ɓyom ɓi ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓi jàŋ yis ì rìtɔ̀ngì ɗi ɓyom. 
Nlàmì ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ àgwey à ti à kɛ̀ngì rì bwaɓ yi ɓituwe ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì pɔ̀ɔ̀zii kì ɓaà kìcèlì, lɛ yɛɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ com ki à faa ɓisuu ripisì ɗi ɓiɓe; wɔ̀lɛ ɓɛ nti ɓɛ tɔngì ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓituwe ɓiǹ fìràɓ ri jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Yeesus à wughà girig fìràɓ ɗi bàn, lɛ a tɛɛ̀zi ɓum ɓɛ kilɔ̀ŋ rì bwaɓ yii yɔmìɗ. 
Nni ti kɛ̀ɛna min a lɔ̀ŋkii, tì kpaŋdɛ̀n daŋdarààŋ rì jàŋ inɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri, tì ki kàɓɓɛn ntoòrìɗ wii. 
Ɓisuulɛ tì yin fɛ rì bàn ì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ziinɛ, ti kaakaa lɔŋ bàn ìnɛ ì ri yù. 
Ti faana min Bɛ̀ll rìkem ɓi sìg à ɓyom ɓi tì fùnɛɛ ɓi Yeesus, fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri rìfa ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ rèeresɛ̀n ɓi myɔm mɛ mɛɛ̀ kpaakpagsɛ̀n nyi lɛ à rì Kan wìs. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɗimzɛn rikì ɗi kirɔɔ rì rìghɛɛ̀ghɛ̀ɓsɛ̀n ɗi ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, lɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ ti ɗi rɔɔghì Bɛ̀ll, ɗi ɓa ɓi bàlì ì ɓyom ɓi ɓì faa nyi.
Kìina ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì mìni mɛ̀wog ɓì fa ɓɔ bɔgsɛ̀n, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔmɓɔm kirɔɔ ki ɓi mɛ̀ghay miǹ, lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓàaghgɛ kìɓan ki miì ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll; kìina lɛ ɓɛɛ kiki kìsay kiǹ ɗì kìnyàà, àa rì bemeg lɛ fɔlɔɔ àa ghɛɓsi ɓi mini bimiɗ à com.
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg ɓisu wis, lɛ tì konaagh kì yiì lɛ mɛ̀rem mis mɛ ri lɛ sɛɛghi sɛɛghi, rì rìkɔ̀n ɗi lɛ ti ghɛghɛɓ ɓi ɓɛ̀saaɗ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm. 
Ǹtɔɔgh mìni kìɓan kiǹ, ǹsììrɛ̀n miì lɛ di fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll a pɛɛ̀zi mɛ̀ a lɔ̀ŋkin lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ.
Bɛ̀ll à fyòoog ànɛ à ghèmzìghày coo mɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ lɛ Kan wìs Yeesus a ɓìloŋ rì bwaɓ yi riràrɛ̀n ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, 
a fa mìni ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi kiki ɓìɓan ɓi syeesyee lɛ ɓi roòzi rikɔ̀n ɗii; a ki lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ rɔɔghi nyi ɓyɛɛ ghɛnɛn ɓi ɓìsi lɛ Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɗì rìkem fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ri fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ Ààmɛ̀n.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ǹtɔɔgh mìni lɛ ɓi niɗ mɛ̀rem, ɓì teɗ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ fa mìni ìtèɗ ɓi mɛ̀rem ɓisuulɛ kaàtà ànɛ ǹkàniì mìni à ràɓi ɓi.
Yiina lɛ, ɓɛ ncàri Timote à geni wìs anɛ àa nɗì m̀ɓamɓanɛn, i à fyaŋzii fɛ kì kpaŋì, di tì rì mìni ɓiì yùu ki ghɛɛ̀ ǹɗaŋ lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì nyi.
Ɓìtògsàg ɓɛ̀rɛlì asu ɓiǹ, rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm; ɓɛ̀roɓɛ a Italii ɓɛ togsaaghi mìni.
Mɛ̀ Zyag, ànɛ ǹɗì Ǹkìì-kìsay a Bɛ̀ll rì à Kan Yeesus Kiris, ǹkàni mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ Isirayɛl, ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì mɛɓɛɛ̀ mɛ mɛ saàtɛ̀ngà zi bimiɗ. Ǹtògsii yàà!
Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, terina mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛtɔɓ mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì tulɛ̀n rì mɔ lɛ mɛ ri kìɓan ki kinyàà ki kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, 
ɓì ki yi lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi tulɛɛ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, ki ri ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓi ɓa rì kìnìri ki nɗem; 
kìɓan kifog, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ rìnìɗ ɗin ɗi nɗem ɗyɛɛ ki ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kii lɛ, ɓɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn nsoò bog, ɓɛ ki ɓa ɓɛronɛn ɗi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm, com ki ki kaarɛ̀n ɓɔ, kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa.
I ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi mìni à kaarɛɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n, a tɔg ɗyɔ rì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à falàg ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɗyomzɛ̀n zɛy rì zɛy, rì syeesyee à nɗem, fɔɔnnɛ àrì nyi ɗyɔ ɓiì faà; 
kìɓan kifog, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɗyɔ kìlɔnì rì ǹtyweeyi kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri nyoey; ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì rì nyoey à pisɛɛ ɓìkus ɓi riɓày ɓi bɛ̀ɓ yɛɛ̀ nyɛ̀ɛnyɛŋ̀zì di yɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì aɗyoo. 
Rìkuu ɗi mum ɗìn ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fèg ɓi nɗem lɛ ɗi ri ɓiì terì com kidɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan. 
Ŋwaànɛ fɔlɔɔ a rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ bimiɗ à nɗɛli anɛ à sììrɛɛ miì ɓi ɓìɓan ɓii ɓìcèm.
Maaseŋi wìn a rìgherɛ̀n ànɛ à rì soghàsogha, a nyaàrɛn ɗì rìpɛ̀sì ɗi Bɛ̀ll à pɛ̀sii nyi aɗyòò. 
Wɔ̀lɛ guŋgum nyii ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì nyààrɛɛ ri rìsɛɛ̀dì ɗi Bɛ̀ll à sɛɛ̀dii nyi, ɓisuulɛ à rì ɓiì ghaghii yɛ̀ɛ kìsàmà ki caaɓi. 
Ŋwos a pɛ̀sɛ̀n yì rì rìtɔ̀n ɗii ɗi syàn, à kì lɛ caaɓi kɛɛ womdag, kìsàmà ki caaɓi kiǹ ki kpi, kìrɔɔ ki kɔ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛɛ̀di. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ guŋgum a rì ɓiì wom̀daagh ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi a kìkì.
Mààgh rì ŋwaànɛ à ti à nìɗkì nɗem di à tulɛɛ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn; ɓisuulɛ i à mɛ ghɛn mɛfèèghrɛn fɔlɔɔ, à rì ɓiì terì tàm à cɛɓ ànɛ Kan à kàkà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg nyi.
Mum kɛ̀ɛ kì lɛ i à rì ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, a kpaa lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ̀ fèeghfeèghrɛ̀n mɛ̀. Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à yin lɛ kìɓe ki fèèghrɛ̀n nyi, nyimiɗ kɛ̀ɛ ki fèèghrɛn mum. 
Kìɓan kifog mum bimiɗ à ti à ɓalàg rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn lɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn nyi ɓyɛɛ ti ɓi syogì nyi, ɓi ki teki nyi nɗem. 
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓɛfèg ɓi mum ɓi nɗem, ɓi ti lɛ i ɓi teri ɗyem, ɓi yay kìɓe; kìɓe ki ɓalàg lɛ i kaa tèɗ, ki yay rìwu.
Mìni ɓɔɔseŋi ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ nɗem, kɛ̀ ɓi pwààrɛn: 
Com ki syeesyee kìcèm ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ fa ɓìsi, rì rìɓòò ɗìcèm ɗi ɗi rɔɔtɛɛ lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, ɓi ti ɓi ɓalàg yì aɗyoo, yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi ànɛ à rì rì kìtɛɛtɛn, ànɛ à ti kɛ̀ɛ cenɗɛn, nsoò kìfìì ki lɛ à rì lɛ à lɔ̀gtɛ̀n, ki yin a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
À faghà ɓìsi cɛɓ ɓi rìkɔ̀n ɗii, rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì i saaɗ lɛ ti ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɗùn ɓi ǹtonto ɓi ɓyom ɓi à kìghà. 
Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ nɗem, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì fɔlɔɔ. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mum bimiɗ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ lɛ a wog, kɛ̀ɛ fyaŋzi ki tòòghrɛɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ki fyaŋzag ki woògh bim, 
ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ bim yɛɛ̀ kìkì, à ti kɛ̀ɛ roòzi rikì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì càri ɓiɓan ɓi tifin, rì kìɓe mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm, ɓì teɗ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì ɓɛ̀lɛ̀ngà ɓi mìni, ìnɛ ì ki rì lɛ ì ghɛɓsì ɓyɛɓ ɓin, rì ǹɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀.
Kìina ɓìɓan ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, kɛ̀ ɓi rɔ̀ɓ lɔŋ lɛ rìwowòg ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ̀n ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ, ɓì pwààpwààrɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ ri ɓɛ̀fèg ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ a wowog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ kì ɓiɓan ɓi yɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà, à rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à ti à kìlàg lɛ, i à ghɛɛ ìsu wii ɓi ŋwii yɛ̀ɛ wu ri, 
ajɛ̀m ìnɛn à pɛ̀sɛ̀n à ghaagh, à ghàs kì ɗimzɛɛ lannɛ à rì. 
Kìɓan kifog, i mum à sìŋii ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ foŋfoŋ mum ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rikan, à ki sììrɛn, àa ɓi rìwowòg ɗi lɛ i à woogh, à ɗimzɛ̀n, lɔŋ ɓi rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi miì rì ìtèɗ, ŋwaànɛ̀n yɛɛ ri ɓiì woògh kìrɔɔ ɓi rìkì ɗii ɗiǹ.
I mum a fèfeg lɛ à rì mum à rìgherɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓèŋ rìlemàg ɗii, kìɓan kifog à yèèghyègsì ǹɗem wii, rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ŋwaànɛ̀n ɗi ghɛɓsii ɓi com. 
Rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ri ɗìtɛnɛn, ɗi ki ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɗyɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg lɛ mum a kɛngi kì ghɛɛ̀ lɛ rì ɓɔɔ̀zii rì mɛ̀kpɔɓ cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ ri rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn, à ki ɓèŋɗɛn lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓi ɓi ziinɛ.
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, kɛ̀ ɓi ɗiŋzi nlànag ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì ǹkeŋkèmì.
I ɓum ɓɛ ɗiŋii yì a ntaŋzɛn win ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ lɛ roànɛ rì bɔŋ i gol ɓi càg rì syeesyee à kìlàà à ǹlònlomɛn, roàmbog rì kìtùg ki kilàà, 
i ɓì ɓisɛɛ kì kuuraagh roànɛ à waatɛɛ kìlàà ki syeesyee, ɓì kpaa nyi lɛ kɔ̀ri fɛ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu syeesyee wu, ɓì kalì soghàsogha lɛ, wɔ̀ɔ̀ rɛli fɛnii; nsoò lɛ kɔ̀ri ɓi com ki ǹti ǹsaaghràg mɛ̀kòò miì azi, 
fɔlɔɔ a rèsii ɓi nya lɛ ɓì foŋi ǹlànag ɓi nyìinyìm wìn rì tì lɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛyitì?
Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ nɗem wooghna! Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀guŋgum ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ ki ɓa ri gàɓ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii ki à kàkà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ keesàg nyi. 
Nni i mìnii mɛ sɛɛti soghàsogha! Àa ɓɛ̀guŋgum ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ yeesàg mìni, ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀n ɗì mìni ɓi naa yi ɓɛyɔ̀m? 
Àa ɓɔ yɛɛ ti ɓɛ fengàg syeesyee à ɗii ànɛ ɓì tɛ̀tɛɛgh?
Nyoey yi yin miì, i ɓì roòzii kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki rifòm fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì keesii romum ànɛ wɔ̀ jàŋbog yɛ̀ɛ wɛ̀ɛmiɗ, di ɓì konaagh. 
Kìɓan kifog i ɓì ɗiŋii ɓi kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ki lɛ ɓi lalani ɓum, di ɓì kìi kìɓe; ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì lɛ ɓì yogsii ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna. 
Ɓisuulɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓèŋi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓìcèm, kìɓan kifog à yogsì lɔŋ kidɔ̀gsɛna kifog a yi lɛ à ti rì zɛ̀ɗ ɓi san ànɛ a ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓìcèm. 
Roànɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ kì fisɔ̀mɔ̀g, à kpaaghà girig lɛ kɔ̀ɔ wey mum, fɔɔnnɛ wàa soo kìi ɓi fisɔ̀mɔ̀g, i ù woli mum di ù ti ǹ-yogsì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna.
Tòtooghna, ɓì kìkì ɓìɓan fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ yɔm̀ ri ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi ɓyɛɛ foŋfoŋ ɓisi ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rikan, 
ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà kɛ̀ɛ̀ nyìighnyìg ɓisuu ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg. Nɗem wu nyìighnyìg wu ti wu kilàg lɛ mum a yagsag ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m.
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ki ghɛɓsii cɛ lɛ mum a kpaàkpaa rì ŋwɔm lɛ à rì rì rìgherɛ̀n di à yin ɗi mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ syeesyee? Rìkuu ɗi righerɛ̀n ɗiǹ ɗi ri nya lɛ ɗi ghɛɓsì nyi? 
I geni wìn a baŋì àdɛŋ nsoò lɛ à giɓ, ɓɛ ri nyoo zɛy, ɓɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki ɗiyɛn ɓɛŋwos ɓɛcèm; 
nnɛ kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki kalii ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna lɛ fyòoog, ɓi ɓaɓɓɛn a ɗuu ɓi wurag, kɛ̀ɛ fa ɓɔ com ki ki ri ɓɔ rì gɛɓsɛ̀n ɓi san ànɛ a mɛ̀mùù, fɔlɔɔ a ghɛɓsii cɛ? 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ri gìrig; i ɗi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀kìkìì di ɗi ri kìloŋ ɓi ɗyɔmiɗ. 
Kìɓan kifog ŋwaàdɛŋ à rì lɛ à kpaa lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì rì rìgherɛ̀n, mɛ̀ rì mɛ̀kìkìì; rèsi mɛ̀ rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ ɗi ɗi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀kìkìì, mɛ̀ɛ nɗesi wɔ̀ ɗiŋkɛ̀m ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì mɛm̀. 
Ù ti ù gheràg lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì lɔŋ bog, fɔlɔɔ a rì lɛ syeesyee; ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ti ɓi gheràg girig fɔlɔɔ, ɓi ki ririsi.
Wɔ̀ mum à kɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyomzɛ̀n, ù kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ u yi lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀kìkìì ɗi ghɛɓsii ɓi com? 
Abiraham à seŋi wìs a ghɛnɛ̀ngà lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì lɛ à fùnɛ̀ngà Isag à man wiì ɓi rìkùna ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓyom ɓi ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll rì ɓyɔ miì. 
Ù ghɛɛ foo lɛ rìgherɛ̀n rì mɛ̀kìkìì ɓi kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ǹɗaŋ, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ roòzìghà rìgherɛ̀n ɗii lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Jàŋ inɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ: Abiraham à gherɛ̀ngà Bɛ̀ll, nni kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ kighà lɛ a ghɛnɛn lɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, yɛ̀ɛ ron, nni fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ reŋìghà nyi lɛ rìghan ɗi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓì ghɛɛ min lɛ mum à ti à ghɛnàg lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mii, àa lɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ. 
Rahaɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà giɓ a rìɓàmɓà nyi girig à ghɛnɛ̀ngà lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mii, ɓisuulɛ à ghàɓkà ɓum ɓɛ mɛwoorag lɛ syeesyee, à ki fyeesi ɓɔ ɓi bee ìdɛŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ sug. 
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ nyoo ìnɛ ì rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹghay ì rì kìloŋ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗi ɗi yin ɗi mɛ̀kìkìì ɗi ri girig kìloŋ.
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ki rɔɔtɛɛ ɓi lɛ kìgwey ki ɓi mìni kɛɛ kaàkaa lɛ kɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀rèsàg ɓisuulɛ, ɓìsi ɓɛ tì rì ɓɛ̀rèsàg, ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓis ɓɛ tèèsɛɛ gɛ ɓɛ cee ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛmbog. 
Ɓìsiìcèm tì ti tì sɛ̀ràg ɓìɓan bee lɛɛ̀gwey; i mum à ka nɛskà ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ di a tòtòg, di mum ànɛ̀n miì à rì lɛ sɛɛghisɛɛghi, à ki yi riɓan ɗi nɗem lɛ a lami nyoo yìì. 
Tì ti tì fogì zòm i kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀ bɔŋ ɓi ŋwɔm lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki com ki ti kɔ̀nkɔ̀n fɔɔnnɛ tì ri min lɛ tì kɛ̀ɛ̀sì yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ tì kɔ̀ni. 
Ghɛɛna girig tìtimà, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ti teghaagh yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, ti ti ti ɓalàg lɛ, i coo bɛ̀ɓ kɛɛ̀ tyɔtyɔg tyɔ, lɔŋ maa giyà nnyɛɛ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì tyɔ ɓi rìkɔ̀n ɗi ŋwaànɛ a pupus tyɔ. 
Com kìfog kɛɛ ri rì rìlemàg ɗi ɗi ri maa kìkàɓ ànɛ ɓi nyoo ì mum, kìɓan kifog ɗi ri lɛ ɗi sanɛ̀n lɛ ɗi ti ɗi kilàg ɓɛ̀gɛni-ɓiɓan; ɓì yii lɛ maa syeǹ à ɗuu à ti à ɗigsàg coo ìreɓ. 
Rìlemàg ɗi ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu; ɗi ri kìlɔ̀ŋ ki kɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ; ɗi ri rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìkàɓ ɓis, nni ɗi ti ɗi yogsàg nyoo bimiɗ, ri ki ti ri ɗigsàg cɛɓ ki mum kìcèm yɛ̀ɛ ɗyɔmiɗ ɗyɛɛ̀ lɔŋlɔŋ ri ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Nyàm yi ɓi cog mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm, rì tììlì rì nyàm yi wɔwɔghɛn ri mùm, rì yi ghɛghɛɓɛn ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, mum à rì lɛ à mɛ̀ɛ̀zì yɔ, ni à mɛ ki mɛ̀ɛ̀zi yɔ. 
Kìɓan kifog, mum à yin lɛ à nyìnɛ̀n càg ɓi dwey lɛ à rì lɛ à ɓèŋ rìlemàg ɗii, lɛ ɗi ri fìroɓ fi fi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ boòboo, ɗi ki ɓa ɗi ronɛn ɗi ìrɔ̀g wu cuucuùsìyɛ̀n ɓum. 
Rìlemàg ɗyɔmiɗ ɗi tì ti tì kemzàg Kan ànɛ à rì Seŋi wìs ri ɗyɔ, ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi tì ti tì nyɔ̀màg ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓi kìpisɛn kii ri ɗyɔ̀. 
Ŋwɔm wùfog wɔ yɛɛ ti wu magì ɓum, wu ki nyɔ̀mag ɓum. Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà fɔlɔɔ. 
Nsim à mɛ̀nig à rì lɛ à kpaàkpàŋzì lɛ rì mɛ̀nig mɛ lòlolɛn rì mɛ yɛ̀yɛlɛn ɓi ɗyas dìfog? 
Ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ǹɗyèm wu firònì wu ti wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wum mɛfùmɓa, ǹɗyèm wu nfùmɓa wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wum tirònì; ǹsim à mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ ri rì kìkòn, à yin lɛ à kpaŋzì mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìkòn.
Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛ kii lɛ, à womzɛ̀n à ki ɓa ri fèg? A resi min ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii ɓi syeesyee wìì a rìghɛghɛ̀ɓ, rì ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi a kìkì ɓi ɓa lɛ ɗì rìsɛɛ̀dɛ̀n ɗi ɓi zi, rì ɗyomzɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i ɓì rì rì m̀mììghrɛ̀n à m̀ɓeɓtɛn, rì nɗem wu yàaka, kɛ̀ ɓi saasanɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ ɓì kìkì ɓɛ̀pwàà ɓɛ ɓɛ wuɓsɛɛ ɓi saaɗ. 
Rìkuu ɗi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗiǹ ɗi yin ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɗi riì aɗyoo, ɗi ri lɔŋ ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɓi ziinɛ, ɗi mum à mɛ̀mùù, ɗi ki ɓa ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɗi riì yɛ̀ɛ Satàn. 
Ɓisuulɛ jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ m̀mììghrɛ̀n rì nɗem wu yàaka ɓi ri, kìɓùùsì rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm ɓi ti ɓi ghɛnàg wɔɔ. 
Ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɗi riì aɗyoo ɗi ka rì ɗì tɛnɛn, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn ɗi ɓa tì lɛ fyòoog, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ròoroòtɛ̀n, ɗi kaaghì lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn, ɗyɔ ɗìronɛn ri nɗem wu nyìighnyìg, ɗi ki kìlag ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ri ǹlànag nsoò tìfyèèrɛnà. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kisay ki lɛ fyòoog a ɓa jàŋ bimiɗ, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ miskì boo ì saaɗ ɓi fyòoog ɓi ɗùm.
Ɓìɓan ɓi lɛ rì ɓìtùrì rì ɓɛsaaka ɓi ɓaa yì la ɓi nyìinyìm wìn? kaa yin lɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi mìni ɓi mɛ̀rem ɓyɛɛ̀ ɗùuɗuùsì wɛ̀y wiǹ ɓi nyoo yin. 
Ɓì ti ɓì ɓalàg rì zày ìnɛ lɛ di ɓyàa ɓaa rì ɓyom, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɓa ri ɓyɔ; ɓì rì ɓɛ̀wolì ɓum; ɓì ki ɓa ti ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi ɓa rì ɓyom, wɔ̀lɛ bee inɛ ɓi ɓa rì ɓyɔ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa; ɓì woòwòmɓɛ̀n, ɓì ɗùùɗùù, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɓa ri com, ɓisuulɛ ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi lɔn. 
Ɓì ti ɓì lɔǹgì, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fa mini ɓisuulɛ ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi yi rilɔ̀n; ɓyom ɓi ɓì ti ɓì lɔngì, ɓì ti ɓì lɔngì ɓyɔ lɛ ɓi yogsag ɓi rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓi ti ɓi rɔɔghì mìni.
Mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g ɓɛ! Ɓì yii ɓi lɛ i mum à rì rìghan ɗi ziinɛ di à rì bènàbena a Bɛ̀ll? Nni ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì kɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓa rìghan ɗi ziinɛ à rì ɓiì ɓaà bènàbena a Bɛ̀ll. 
Àa zɛy innɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à ti à keesàg Nghay wu à fogà ɓi ɓìsi à kpaŋ lɛ a ki yɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɓisuu Nghay wìn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à kìlàg ɓìsi geesɛ̀n ìnɛ ì cee, lɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à ti kɛ̀ɛ rɛ̀gti ri ɓɛ̀daŋàdaŋa, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ sɛɛ̀dii ɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ a rèsag geesɛ̀n yìì.
Nni càrɛɛnà min mìniìɓɔmiɗ lɛ Bɛ̀ll a lami mìni, ɓì ki cakɛn ɗi mìniìɓɔmiɗ lɛ Satàn kɛ̀ɛ làmi mini, fɔɔnnɛ à rì mìni ɓiì ghɛŋii fìràɓ. 
Tyɛ̀ɛ̀tɛɛna Bɛ̀ll jàŋbog fɔɔnnɛ nyi girig à rì mìni ɓiì yùu jàŋbog, sòona ɓyàg ɓin ɓyɛɛ tɛn, mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, ɓì ki kpɔg mɛrem min, mìni ɓum ɓɛ tyoo tiɓɛɛ̀. 
Yiina lɛ ɓì rì nyìighnyìg, ɓi waàtɛn ɓìlɛ̀ɓì, ɓì ki rèn; mɛ̀keèghkeegh min mɛ tyɔɛ̀y mɛɛ ghas̀ ɓìɓààsì ɓi mɛkɛɛ̀gh, kìnyàà kin ki ghay ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn. 
Sɛɛ̀diinà mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi mis mɛ Kan fɔɔnnɛ à rì mìni ɓiì pɛ̀sii aɗyòò.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, kɛ̀ ɓi ɓùuɓuŋ̀ɗɛ̀n a mɓeɓɛn. Ŋwaànɛ à ɓùŋi geni a mɓeɓɛn nsoò lɛ à yɔ̀mi geni, a yi lɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi à tòogh kìɓe, à ki yɔ̀m ɓyɔ. Nni i wɔ̀ɔ̀ ti ɓiì yɔ̀myɔmi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna, di ù yiìdi mɓèŋì-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, ù ti ǹ-yɔ̀mì-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna. 
Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ ti à fogì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna, à ki yɔ̀mgi ɓum, nyi cɛ̀ncii yɛɛ ri lɛ à ghɛɓsì mum nsoò lɛ a wey nyi; nni wɔ̀ mum, wɛ̀ɛ nnɛ ghɛn anɛ u ren kìɓan ki mum?
Ɓigomìnɛ mìni ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì kpaaghì lɛ, gɛɛ̀nɛ nsoò lɛ rìduri, tì rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛ fɛlɛ̀, tì ghagsì bimiɗ à bèg wɔɔ di ti kìki dùne, tì fɔ̀ngì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, wooghna. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì yii ɓi lannɛ cɛɓ kin ki ri ɓiì ɓaà rìduri, yiina lɛ ɓì rì cuùcuu ki ki ti ki ghɛnàg ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ki ɗimì. 
Ɓyàa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kɔm̀ kìkpaaghii lɛ, i ki kɔni Kan tì rì lɛ tì ghɛɓ, tì kì kìɓan ki fɛlɛ̀. 
Kìɓan kifog mìniì kaakalɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ ɓi ɓɔɔ ɓidaŋà ɓɛ mìni ɓi mɛ̀rem; rìkuu ɗi kalɛn ɗi fɔlɔɔ ɗi rɔɔtɛɛ ɓì. 
I mum à yii kìɓan ki syeesyee ki à rì lɛ à kì nni à rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ɛ kì kɔ di à kìi kìɓe.
Ɓigomìnɛ, mìni ɓɛ̀guŋgum, ramina mɛ̀reè ɓi wog, rɔŋɗɔŋina ɓìkiŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo ɓisuulɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ikum win wu ri ɓiì ròo dywɛ̀ɗ, zeg yi ɗi ɓìlàà ɓin, 
gol yìn rì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni min ɓi ri rì geègee; geègee yiǹ yi ri wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ à rì mìni ɓiì pyèni mis, à tɔ̀ngì mìni yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu. Ɓìi nɗɛ̀ŋi kì taŋzaagh ìkum ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn mɛ. 
Ghɛɛna lɛ mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓin ɓɛ ɓɛ saŋsàŋgà mìni ɓìɗilàg ɓi dɛm yin, mɛ ɓì ki ɗighà, mɛɛ̀ rɔŋɗɔŋ ɓikiŋ, ɓìkukug ɓi ɓɛ̀saŋì-mɛ̀saŋ ɓi mɛ kɛ̀n ki kpaŋì ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ Kan à mɛ̀raŋ mɛ wɛ̀y. 
Ɓi ghɛɓkà ɓi ziinɛ ɓi coo ikum di ɓi nyàànyaa ri cɛɓ, ɓì wùùwùrɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓisuu ŋwos a kìsɛ̀ɓ. 
Ɓì rengà lɛ ɓɛɛ yeesi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan, ɓì ki wey ɓɔ, ɓɔɔ kɔrì ɓɛ kɛɛ̀ ram ɓyàg lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗuù rì mìni.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀ sììriina lɔŋ mɛrem à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à ri sugtiì; ɓì ti ɓì ghɛngì yɛ̀ɛ ǹsalì-dɛm a ti à maasàg nɗem ɓisuu riɓoŋ ɗi bwey yi ǹtonto rì yi siitòn, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ bwey yìn yi ti yi nɔlàg. 
Mìni girig ɓanina mɛ̀rem rì ɓyàg, mɛ̀rem min mɛ siìrɛ̀n rì ìtèɗ lɛ rìyù ɗi Kan ɗi ti jàŋbog.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ cɛmdag ɓɛro ɓɛmɓog, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yɔ̀m mini; ɓì ghɛɛ! Ǹ-yɔ̀mì-ɓum à ti a suunaa. 
Nɔ̀ɔ̀tiina ìkòò wu ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ toòghrɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan, ɓɛ wokà mɛ̀tɔɓ, ɓɛ niɗ mɛ̀rem. 
Ghɛɛna, tì ti tì kpaaghì lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ siìrɛɛ rì ìtèɗ, ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀mààghmaagh; ɓì mɛ wog di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa kinìri ki nɗem ki Zyɔɓ, ɓì ki ghɛngà lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kan à kìghà lɛ cɛɓ kii kɛɛ kɛǹ kì syɔnì ɓisuulɛ Kan à rì rì nɗem wu nyìighnyìg lɛɛ̀gwey, rì kìpuɓì ǹɗem.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, kìɓan ki ǹloogh mìni kìkpaà ki ri lɛ, kɛ̀ ɓi kànag bɛ̀ɗ ri ɗyoo, nsoò rì zi, nsoò bɛ̀ɗ inɛ mum à kànɛɛ rì ŋwɔm, kìɓan kifog kɛɛ ɓalag lɛ, i ɓì kpaa lɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀, ki ɓa lɛ ɛ̀ɛ̀; i ɓì kpaa lɛ èe èe, ki ɓa lɛ èe èe; di fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ ɓi kpì ɓi ncɛ̀m.
I mum ɓi mìni à tanɛɛ rì ǹtɔɓ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔ̀ŋzii Bɛ̀ll, nsoò lɛ à rì rì kìnyàà, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔgsii Bɛ̀ll rì tyem. 
I ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi nɗaŋ win a roɓi, à reŋì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Kiseŋi, lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔŋzag Bɛ̀ll ɓisu wii, ɓɛ siŋì nyi mɔ̀ɔ ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan. 
I bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛn ì kìlɛɛ rì ǹtyweeyi ɓi nɗem, ì rì ɓiì ghɛɓsii roròɓ ànɛ̀n, kaa soo rì lɛ à kìghà kìɓe, Bɛ̀ll à cenɛ̀n nyi kɔ.
Kìlaaghna lɛ, i wààdɛŋ ù kìi kìɓe, ù rèsì ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛmbog, ɓì ki ɓa ri kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn lɛ ɓi ɓɔŋzag Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ɓɛgeni ɓin ɓɛ ɓi ghɛghɛɓ ri ɓɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓiì wɔ̀ni. Syeesyee à bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n à ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à ɓalàg rì coo nghɛɓsɛn. 
Eli à ɓaghà lɔŋ mum fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi, nni à ɓɔ̀ŋzàkà Bɛ̀ll rì nɗem wii wucèm lɛ bwey yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔ, fɔɔnnɛ bèg yi ghaghìghà yiraa rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii taàfog, bwey yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛ̀n nnɛ à ɓɔ̀ŋzìghà tì Bɛ̀ll lɛ bwey yɛ̀ɛ nɔti, fɔɔnnɛ ɗyoo ɗi romgày bwey, zi i ki fa ɓiɗilàg ɓi yɛ̀ɛ falàg.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀ i kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ɗimgà bee, ki raɓsɛ̀n rì saaɗ, nnɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à pɛ̀ɛ̀zii yì nyi ɓi syeesyee à bee, 
yiina lɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì kìi lɛ ǹkìì-kìɓe a pɛsɛn yì ɓi bee inɛ à tɔlɛ̀ngà miì, à kòri ǹghay wu ǹkìì-kìɓe anɛ̀n ɓi rìwu, à ki kì lɛ Bɛ̀ll a cenɛn ǹkun wu ɓiɓe.
Mɛ̀ Pyɛɛri ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris, ǹkànì ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri a gwèɗ, ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sààtakɛn ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi zi ɓi lɛ rì Pɔŋ, rì Galasi, rì Kapados, rì Azii, rì Bitinii. 
Ɓì ɓaghà ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll Seŋi a lokà kìwòŋzii ɓiɓan, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ti ɓɛ̀tɛnɛ̀n lɛ Nghay wìì, lɛ ɓi ɓa rì mɛ̀wog ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus Kiris ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛtɛɛ̀ziyɛn ɓi bwaɓ yii yi yi kpagà. Geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ teghɛn a lɔ̀ŋkin lɛɛ̀gwey.
Rìkem ɗyɛɛ ɓa rì Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris; ɓi coo kipuɓì ǹɗem kii, à faghà ɓìsi cɛɓ ki nyɔn yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmzìghày Yeesus Kiris a ɓìloŋ; fɔlɔɔ a fa ɓìsi dyàɓɛn inɛ ì rì cem rì ǹtyweeyi, 
ɓisuu mɛwus mɛ mɛ yin lɛ mɛ ɓwɛy, mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teɗ tifin nsoò lɛ mɛ womdàg; mɛ̀wus mɛǹ mɛɛ ri mɛ̀ nyamɛn aɗyoo ɓisu wìn, 
mìni ɓɛ ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll wɛɛ̀ ɓèŋɓèŋ lɛ rìgherɛ̀n, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ gòri ìnɛ ì ti jàŋbog lɛ yɛ̀ɛ resɛn ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn ì ɓiì rèsɛɛ. 
Sàmsamina ɓisuu kiɓan kiǹ, nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓi ɓa rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n lɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓi taatanɛ̀n rì mɔ ɓigomìnɛ mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu. 
Mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n mɛɛ̀ fèeghfeèghrɛ̀n rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɗi ri gìn i com ìnɛ ì cee gol kɛ̀ɛ̀ vèg; gol ì rì com ki ki ri lɛ ki ɗyoŋ, nsoò fɔlɔɔ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ fogì gol ɓi ɗuu lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ ì rì; fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ìtèɗ wu righerɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ fèefeèghrɛ̀n wu ɓiì ɓaà kìɓan ki mɛsɛɛ̀ghsɛɛgh, ɗì rìkem, ɗì ǹnyaasɛ̀n ɓisu win ŋwos anɛ Yeesus Kiris, à ɓiì rèsɛɛ. 
Nyi ànɛ ɓì kesii nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ka ghɛngà ɓi nyi; ɓi ki gherɛɛ nyi kɔlɛ ɓì ghɛɛ ɓi nyi ɓigominɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓi sànsam ri coo kinyàà ki keŋkemɛn ki mum à yin lɛ à yi rìkpaa, 
ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀raà mɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin mɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà gòri ì ɓyɛɓ ɓin, inɛ ɓì ri teɗ.
Ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓugà kìɓan ki geesɛ̀n ìnɛ ì ɓaghà m̀pègsɛn ɓisu win, ɓɛ kaaghà lɛ ɓɛɛ yi, ɓɛ ki tim kiɓan ki gòri ìnɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ siìrɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ yi lɛ rì zìŋɛn, rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi koŋkomi ɓìɓan ɓi Ǹghay à Kiris ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi ɓɔ à rerèɓkà ɓɔ abɛ̀y; à rèsìghà mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ Kiris à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìwoògh, rì rìkem ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ɓɔ̀ɓiì mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n. 
Bɛ̀ll à rèsìghà ɓɔ lɛ kìɓan ki ɓɛ kpaakpààghà kiǹ ki ɓaghà ɓi ɓisu waa wu ɓɔmiɗ, ki ɓaghà lɔŋ ɓisu win, rì tì lɛ ɓɔɔ ɓaghà lɔŋ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ. Ɓigomìnɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà mìni Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ɓɛ romgày aɗyoo, ɓɛ wogsìghà mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, nsoò ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɔmiɗ, ɓɛ ri rì zày ìnɛ lɛ di ɓaa ghɛɛ ɓyɔ̀.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, ɓaana rì mɛ̀rem mɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀ɓùŋɛn ɓi kìsay, ɓì kɔ̀rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓì foŋ dyàɓɛn yiǹ bimiɗ ɓi rìfa ɗi ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì faà ɓi ŋwos anɛ Yeesus Kiris à ɓiì rèsɛɛ. 
Ɓaana ɓɔn ɓɛ mɛwog, kɛ̀ ɓi nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ti ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi nti ɓi kɔngì mìni, ɓyɛ ɓi ɓì kìkìghà abɛ̀y di ɓì kaka ɓi rìɗim. 
Wɔ̀lɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à reŋìghà mìni àrì ǹtɛnɛn mìniìrig ɓaana ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn ɓi rìkɔ̀kɔ̀rì ɗin ɗicèm, 
lɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹtɛnɛn.
I roànɛ à ti à yɔ̀mgì mum bimiɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mii mɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹlànag, innɛ ɓì ti ɓì regì ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yin lɛ Seŋi wìn, rèsiina lɛ ɓì risii nyi ɓi gàɓ ì cààmɛ̀n ìnɛ ɓi ghaaghagsì ɓi ziinɛ, 
rì rìyitì ɗi lɛ ɓɛ kweɗkà ɓi mini ɓi kìɓeɓtàg kin ki cɛɓ ki ɓì tekà rì ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin, rì ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi ɗyoŋ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni nsoò lɛ gol, 
lɔŋ rì bwaɓ yi Kiris yi yi ri gìn i com innɛ ɓɛ kweɗkà mìni. Kiris yɛɛ ri fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ à rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ fìsɛm, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìpɛ̀mì; 
nyi nnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔngà abɛ̀y di zi i ka kilɛn ɓi, à ki rèsɛn ɓisu win ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi siitòn ɓi. 
Lɛ nyi, ɓì gherɛɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ghèmzìghày nyi a ɓìloŋ, à ki fa nyi rìkem, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ǹtyweeyi wiǹ rì dyàɓɛn yiǹ ɓi ri yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓyàa lègsi kìpuɓsii mɛghay min ri mɛ̀wog mɛ ɓì rì rì mɔ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a saaɗ, lɛ ɓi ɓa rì nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni ànɛ à rì lɛ sɛɛghisɛɛghi; kɔ̀nɛɛna rì ìtèɗ, rì nɗem win wucèm. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì tekà ɓi cɛɓ ki nyɔn ɓi boo ìnɛ ì rì lɛ ì ɓwɛ̀y, kìɓan kifog ìnɛ ì yin lɛ i ɓwɛ̀y ɓì tekà lɔŋ kɔ rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì rì cencem, ì ɓa tì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀; 
ɓisuulɛ mum ǹcèm à rì yɛ̀ɛ caaɓi, rìkem ɗii ɗicèm ɗi ɓa yɛ̀ɛ kìsàmà ki caaɓi; caaɓi ki ti ki yɔɔ̀ghì, kìsàmà ki raà, 
kìɓan kifog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì rì lɔŋ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à wogsìghà mìni.
Càrina min kiɓeɓtàg ki nɗem bee yicèm, rì ɓɛ̀pwàà, rì mɛ̀ghèy, rì m̀mììghrɛ̀n, rì mɛ̀wɔ̀wɔrì, 
ɓaana fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓwɛɗ, ɓì keesì milig mɛ ɓi nghay mɛ mɛ ri lɛ syeesyee mɛɛ ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi tɔɔ̀, ɓì ki ghɛn cɛɓ, 
i ɓì mɛ ɓoɓti ki ghɛɛ̀ lɛ Kan à rɔɔtɛɛ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kì kànɛn.
Kɛ̀ɛna jàŋbog rì nyi, nyi ànɛ à rì gɔ̀g ì cem inɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓengà, kìɓan kifog ì ɓa gɔ̀g ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà, yɛ̀ɛ ki rì gìn i com ɓi mis mii, 
fɔɔnnɛ mìni girig, fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g yi yi ri cencem, ɓì rì ɓɛ̀toŋɛn lɛ ɓi ɓa mɛɛ mɛ ɓi Nghay, ɓì ɓa ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ fùufunɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll ɓyom ɓi ɓi Nghay ɓi ɓi ri rɔɔ nyi, lɛ Yeesus Kiris. 
Lɛ ki ri kìkaliyɛn ɓi kaàtà lɛ: Ghɛɛna, ǹnɔ̀ŋzii gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓi ǹtɔn à mɛɛ a Siyon, ì rì m̀ɓɔ̀nɛn, ì ki ɓa gìn i com, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì yɔ̀ ɓiì gherɛɛ, àa wog ɓi ǹtoòrìɗ.
Ǹnyaasɛ̀n à rì min ɓisu win wu mini ɓɛ ɓì gherɛɛ; wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi, gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓɛ̀toŋì-kìtoŋ ɓɛ makà yɛ̀ɛ ghalà ǹlem à gɔ̀g ànɛ ɓi ntɔn à mɛɛ, ì ki ɓa gɔ̀g ì fìɓàg, riɓan ɗi ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kpìkpi miì.
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kpilàg miì lɛ ɓɛ ɓengà kì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ɓaà ɓisu waa. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg wìn, mìnii ri boo ì mum ìnɛ ì rì m̀ɓɔ̀nɛn, ǹɗaŋ wu ɓɛpìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ rifòm, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ki ri ki Bɛ̀ll, ki ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à tekà ɓisu wiì lɛ ɓɛɛ laàlàmɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀gɛn ɓɛ mɛkìkìì ɓɛ roànɛ à reŋìghày mìni lɛ ɓi pɛsɛn yì ɓi birìm, ɓi yu ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn kii ki ki ri kìɓan ki kuughrakɛn; 
mìni ɓɛ ɓì ɓaghà ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii abɛ̀y, mìni yɛɛ ti kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll ɓigomìnɛ, mìni ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll àa nti kɛ̀ɛ rèsi ǹɗem wu nyìighnyìg a lɔ̀ŋkin abɛ̀y, ɓigomìnɛ, à mɛ wog mini nyìinyìg.
Mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m ɓɛ nɗem, ǹtɔɔgh mìni ɓi rìɓa ɗi lɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀kèn ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi rìghaàgh ɓi ziinɛ lɛ ɓi celi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ti ɓi yɛɛ̀yì mɛ̀mùù, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ ri ɓi wɛ̀y ri ǹghay wu mum. 
Ɓaana rì ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kɛɛ ɓalag lɛ, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ ɓùŋ mini a mɓeɓɛn, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ ɓi kìki ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan, i ɓɛ ghɛɛ mɛ̀kìkìì min mɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ kemzì Bɛ̀ll ŋwos anɛ à ɓiì yùu.
Rèsiina mɛ̀wog ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a kìlàmì kìcèm ki ɓum ɓɛ foŋi ɓisuu Kan, nsoò rìfòm ɗyɛ yaa rì, ɓì kì ɗyɔ mɛ̀wog lɛ ɗi ri ǹlàmi àgwey, 
nsoò ɓɛ̀gɔmìnà ɓɛ yaa rì ɓì wog ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ rìfòm ɗi romi lɛ ɓɛɛ pɔnɔ̀sag ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kiɓe, ɓɛ ki sɛki ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kirɔɔ. 
Ɓisuulɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri lɛ, ɓi sim ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìdùŋdùŋ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi com myɔm rì kìrɔɔ ki ɓi kìkì. 
Ghɛɓina yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kan, wɔ̀lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi kì lɛ rìkan ɗin ɗyɛɛ ghay kìlàà ki kɛɛ̀ lɔlɔg nɗem win wu rigɛn; ghɛɓina lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛɓì ɓi rìkan. 
Nyaasiina mum bimiɗ, ɓì keesì ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ righerɛn, ɓì risì Bɛ̀ll, ɓì nyaasì rìfòm.
Mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay, kìina ɓɛ̀masà ɓin mɛwog rì bɔgsɛ̀n bimiɗ; kɛ̀ ɓi wog lɔŋ lɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ǹɗem ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nyɛn, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì woògh ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeɓtaagh mɛ̀rem, 
ɓisuulɛ ki ri mààgh di mum à cenɛɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki nyi ɓi mɛ̀ɓèe lɛ a ki Bɛ̀ll mɛ̀wog. 
Lɛ rìkem ɗidɛŋ ɗi yin ɓisuu ŋwaànɛ à ti à cenàg mɛ̀ɓìì mɛ ɓi kìɓe ki nyi yɛɛ kiì. Wɔ̀lɛ i ɓì cenɛɛ rìkɛŋ di ɓi kìi kirɔɔ, fɔlɔɔ a rì mààgh ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Lɛ rìɓa ɗìn ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà mìni miì ɓisuulɛ Kiris girig à wokà rìkɛŋ ɓisu win, à ki càɗ mini kìrèmzɛnà ki lɛ ɓi nɔɔ̀ti ɓìɓɔ̀ɓ ɓii. 
Nyi ànɛ à kìghà ɓi kiɓe, kɛ̀ɛ ki kpaa kiɓan ki pwàà nsoò ŋwos bog; 
nyi ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ soo sɛmi nyi, kɛ̀ɛ pɛ̀ɛ̀zi mum kìsɛmì, àa soo wowòg rìkɛŋ kɛɛ̀ tam mum, kìɓan kifog, à fa ɓìɓan ɓìcèm rì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à yɔ̀mgì ɓum lɛ saaɗ; 
nyi ànɛ à tɛ̀kà ɓìɓe ɓis ɓi nyoo yìì ɓi kìte aɗyoo lɛ di kɛɛ ɓa lɛ, i tì mɛ wu ɓi san ànɛ a ɓìɓe ɓis, tì ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ. Mɛ̀ɓìì mii mɛɛ kighà lɛ ti wɔǹ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi yɛɛ dèŋdèŋ kɛ̀ɛ̀ m̀ɓèŋì, wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì mɛ sugti yɛ̀ɛ mɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ a ɓèŋɓeŋ mɛghay min.
Nsoò mìni ɓɛ̀yiɓ, ɓaana girig rì mɛ̀wog, giɓ bimiɗ a wog yii wiì, di fɔɔnnɛ kɛɛ ɓa lɛ i ɓɛ̀baŋì ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓaa ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ri ɓɔ ɗyɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓɔ kìsyòŋi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n nsoò mum àa tòòghrɛɛ ɓi ri ɓɔ. 
Lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ cɛɓ kìn ki ri kìtɛnɛn, rì mɛ̀wog. 
Mɛ̀rɛ̀ŋ min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa mɛrɛ̀ŋ mɛ seeseèrɛ̀n ɓi dan; fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tyòŋ ti ɓaghrɛn, tìcaka rì mɛkpèy mɛ ɓɛ kii rì gol, rì ǹwaà wu syeesyee, 
kìɓan kifog ǹɗɛ̀ŋ wu ɓì ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìɓaà rì wɔ wu ri wu wu ri wù nyamɛn ɓi nɗem, wɛɛ ri ǹɗɛ̀ŋ wu wu yin lɛ wu ɗyoŋ, lɛ wu ri ǹɗɛ̀ŋ wu nghay wu wu ri lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, wɔ tì lɛ fyòoog, rìkuu ɗìn ɗyɛɛ ri gìn i com ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ abɛ̀y, ɓɛ dyàɓɛn yaà ì ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ nti ɓɛ rɛŋɗàg, lɛ ɓɛ nti ɓɛ wokì ɓɛ̀yii ɓaa; 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Sara àa nti à wokì Abiraham à ki regi nyi lɛ kan wìì. Sara ànɛn nnɛ ɓì ti dòò yii, di ɓi kìki kirɔɔ kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ com kidɛŋ kɛɛ niŋzi mìni nyòò.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mìni ɓɛ̀baŋì, ɓì ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig lɛ mum bimiɗ a ghɛɓ rì giɓ wiì, à yi lɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀baŋì; terina ɓɔ rì nyaasɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kìterì mààgh à cɛɓ bas ɗì mìni, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ com kidɛŋ kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ gheŋɗɛn ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yìn.
Ǹsiitɛɛ mìni kìkpaà lɛ, ɓaana ɓɛ̀fèg ɓɛ̀fog, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n bog, ɓaana ɓɛ̀ronɛn ɗi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni, ɓì ɓa rì nɗem wu nyìinyìg rì nɗem wu sɛɛ̀dɛn mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi rɔ̀ŋ kiɓe ri kìɓe, nsoò lɛ ɓi pɛɛ̀zi fìsɛm ri fìsɛm, lɔŋ com ki ɓì ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kìkiì ki ri lɛ ɓi maŋ̀maŋ ɓum, lɛ kìɓan ki Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà mìni miì kɛɛ̀kìn, lɛ ɓi teɗ mɛ̀wus mɛ ɓɛmààgh. 
Ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ a kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ a keesi cɛɓ, à ghɛn mɛ̀ru mɛ kinyàà, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìɓèŋi ŋwɔm wii lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn kɛ̀ɛ kì ɓɛ̀pwàà; 
à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì lɔ̀ghii jɛ̀m rì kìɓe, kìrɔɔ kɛɛ̀ki à kìkì, à falɛ̀n ɓi rìkaakàà ɗi fyòoog. 
Ɓisuulɛ mis mɛ Kan mɛɛ̀ seesee ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ saaɗ, mɛ̀reè mii mɛramɛn rì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yaa, kìɓan kifog, Kan à ti à paàzàg rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kiɓe.
Ghɛn yɛɛ ri min lɛ à tɔɓ mìni di ɓì falɛɛ ɓi rìkì ɗi kirɔɔ rì ìtèɗ? 
I ki kpaŋi gi kɔm̀ lɛ ɓi wog ǹtɔɓ ɓisuu saaɗ, di ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀mààgh; kɛ̀ ɓi risi ɓum nsoò, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ɓùùsɛn; 
wɔ̀lɛ kemziinà Kiris ɓi mɛ̀rem min fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kan wìn. Ɓaana cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓɛ̀pègsɛn lɛ ɓi ɓag mum bimiɗ ànɛ à tɔɔgh mìni azi anɛ ɓi dyàɓɛn inɛ ɓì rì rì yɔ̀. 
Kìɓan kifog kìina fɔlɔɔ ri ǹɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀, rì bɔgsɛ̀n; ǹɗem win wu ɓa wù tɛnɛn ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tòtog mini kìɓe, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ feefengì syeesyee wìn a rìghɛɓ ɓi Kiris ɓi ɗùm ɓɛɛ wog ǹtoòrìɗ. 
Lɛ ki ri kìrɔɔ lɛ mum a wog ǹtɔɓ lɛ a kìki kirɔɔ, di fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à cee lɛ a wog ǹtɔɓ lɛ a kìki kìɓe.
Ɓisuulɛ Kiris girig à wughà gɛ̀n bog ɓi gɛnicèm ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓi ɓum, nyi ànɛ à ɓaghà syeesyee à mum, à wu ɓisuu ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum lɛ di a kɛǹ ɗì mìni yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɛ wolà nyi rìwu ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù à ghèmɓɛ̀n ɗì ìtèɗ wu Nghay. 
Rì Nghay ànɛ̀n innɛ à kɛ̀ngà kɔm̀ kì kakalii Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ a mɛ̀ghay mɛ mɛ ri ɓi naà-zày, 
yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ mɛ̀ghay mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kighà Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀lɔg ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ajɛ̀m, cààmɛ̀n ki Bɛ̀ll à sììsììrìghà nɗem, à ɓoŋɓòŋ; ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ Nowe à sosòɓkà kìkɔm; kìkɔm kìn kɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓɔɔ ɓum ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ taàraa ɓɛ ghɛɓkà lɛ mɛ̀nig. 
Mɛ̀nig mɛǹ mɛ ɓaghà kìfèèghrɛnà ki bàɓtis ìnɛ yɛɛ̀ ghɛɛghɛɓsì mìni ɓigomìnɛ, bàɓtis ìnɛ̀n ì yin ɓiì sòòsoo tifin ti ɓi nyoo, kìɓan kifog ì rì rìfalɛ̀n ɗi mum à falɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll rì syeesyee à nɗem. A ghɛɛghɛɓsì mìni lɛ rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi Yeesus Kiris à ghèmɓɛ̀ngà, 
à ɓɔg aɗyoo, à rì ɓi weèlem à Bɛ̀ll; wɔɔ a làlami lɛ rì ɓum ɓɛ titom, rì mɛ̀tèɗ mɛ ɓi ɗyoo mɛ̀cèm .
Nni yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à wokà rìkɛŋ ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù, mìniìrig ɓanɛɛ na rì rìyitì ɗiǹ ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à mɛ wog rikɛŋ ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù, à rì ŋwaànɛ à mɛ ghasɛn ɗi kìɓe 
lɛ di fɔɔnnɛ a ghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri, ɓi gàɓ ì mɛ̀ru ìnɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ tì kìghagsii ɓi ziinɛ, kɛ̀ɛ ghɛɓ ti cɛɓ ki ǹɗem wii wɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ a ghɛɓ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì roòzìghà rìkɔ̀n ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi kìɓùùsì, ɓì kìkì ɓìɓan ɓi ǹɗem win wɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n, ɓì nɔnɔ̀ mɛ̀rɔ̀g, ɓì ɗiɗì ɓìɗilàg rìɗi ɗi kiɓe, ɓì ŋwaŋŋwàŋ mɛ̀rɔ̀g, ɓì ki ɓɔɔɓɔgsì ɓìnùn ɓi ɓi ri kìɓan ki ki ɓeɓtɛɛ ki ciɓ. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ kuukuùghràg yɛ̀ɛ ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii tì ɓi ɓɔ ɓi coo kiɓeɓtàg ki cɛɓ kìn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wɔmwɔm mini. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ɓàagh gɛ kìɓan ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kiǹ ɓi mis mɛ roànɛ à ti jàŋbog lɛ a yɔm̀ lɛ rì ɓum ɓɛ cem rì ɓìloŋ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à kalɛ̀ngà girig a ɓìloŋ, a ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀yɔ̀mɛn ɓi cɛɓ kaa ki mɛmùù lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, lɛ di ɓɛɛ ɓa rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay.
Rìsugtɛ̀n ɗi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɗi ti jàŋbog, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi falɛn ɓi ɓìnɔɔ̀nɔɔ̀, di ɓi kiki bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n. 
Kìɓan ki asu ki ri lɛ: Ɓaana rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ kɛ̀ɛ lɔ̀gtɛn ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, lɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à ti à lɔkì ǹkun wu ɓiɓe. 
Ɓaana rì ǹɗem wulɛ ɓi ghaɓki ɓɛ̀geni ɓin di ɓɛ yuu a lɔ̀ŋkin kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìrùrùmì. 
Yɛ̀ɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni à rì rì rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à faghà nyi, kìina kìsay ri rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à faghà mìni ɓi kìrɔɔ ki ɓum ɓɛmbog fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀syeesyee ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì ti ì ghɛnàg bee lɛ bee. 
I mum à pinii ŋwɔm lɛ a kali ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, a ghagsi lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rìì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, ŋwaànɛ a ghɛɛghɛɓsì kìsay, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kɔ kì kìi ri ìtèɗ wu Bɛ̀ll à faa nyi, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Bɛ̀ll a teɗ rìkem ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm lɛ Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì lɛ, rì rìkem, rì ìtèɗ, fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, rìɓa ɗi ɓì rì ɓi ɓɛ̀gɛn ɓɛ mɛfèèghrɛn ɓɛ ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu ɗi ghɛ̀g-ghɛ̀g, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sìɗ mini yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ kìkènekènè ki kiɓan kidɛŋ kɛɛ tanɛɛ mìni. 
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ lɛ ɓì nyààrɛ̀n lɛ ɓi teteɗ gàɓ ì mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ Kiris, di fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓiì rongii girig rì kìnyàà yɛ̀ɛ rìkem ɗii ɗi ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ.
I ɓɛɛ̀ sɛɛsɛmgì mìni lɛ ɗii ɗi Kiris, di ɓì rì ɓɛ̀mààghmaagh ɓisuulɛ Ǹghay à rìkem, Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓi mìni. 
Wààdɛŋ kɔ̀ɔ ɓa lɛ ù wowòg mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛ ù woli mum, nsoò lɛ ù yii com, nsoò lɛ ù kìi coo kiɓeɓtàg ki kiɓan kidɛŋ, nsoò lɛ ù pùrii ŋwɔm ɓi kìɓan ki ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ; 
wɔ̀lɛ i ki ri lɛ ɓi wowog ntɔɓ ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ kìristɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi wog ntoòrìɗ, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ki kemzii Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ɗii ɗìn.
Ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛyɔ̀m ki kpaŋi, nni ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛǹ ɓɛ tumɛɛ ɓi naa ì ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll. I ɓi ɓìsi nnɛ ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛ tumɛɛ, rìsyɔn ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓengì kì gherɛɛ Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ɗi ri ɓa là? 
I rìghɛɓ ɗi ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ saaɗ a ghɛɓ ɗi ka ti fɔlɔɔ ri ntɔɓ, ki ɓa min la ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ kiɓeɓtàg ki mum rì ǹkìì-kìɓe? 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog mɛtɔɓ lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ kɔni, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì faà ɓyɛɓ ɓyaa ri ǹkìì-ɓyom ɓìcèm ànɛ à ti à roòzàg mɛ̀kàg mii, ɓi rìkì ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kiki kirɔɔ. 
Ǹtɔɔgh min ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ Kiseŋi ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, mɛ̀ ànɛ ǹɗì girig Ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn a Kìseŋi yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔ, ǹki ɓa ti wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ Kiris, mɛ ti rì gàɓ ɓi rìkem ɗi ɗi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsɛɛ, 
lɛ mɛniina kìtuu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀ ki Bɛ̀ll ki ɓɛ reɓsɛ̀ngà rì mìni; kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ǹkàŋɗɛ̀n, mɛniina yɔ rì syeesyee à rìkɔ̀n yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ ɓi kì kisay kiǹ rì ǹɗem wulɛ ɓi fɔǹ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, kììna lɔŋ kɔ rì syeesyee à nɗem. 
Kɛ̀ ɓi tuturi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ faghà mìni lɛ ɓi ɓeŋ̀, kìɓan kifog ɓaana kìfèèghrɛnà ki jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi Bɛ̀ll yi ri lɛ yi nɔɔ̀tì; 
fɔlɔɔ nnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ɓiì kpaŋì, ɓì ɓiì terì tàm à rìkem ànɛ à yin lɛ à ɗyoŋ.
Mìni ɓìɓwɛɗ ɓi ɓum, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ girig lɛ ɓi ki ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn mɛwog. Nni mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓi cɛɓ ki ɓi ghɛghɛɓ mini rì mìni, sɛɛ̀dɛɛna mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti kɛ̀ɛ ɓa nkɔɔ rì ɓɛ̀daŋàdaŋa, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ sɛɛ̀dɛɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ a rèsag geesɛ̀n yìì.
Nni sɛɛ̀dɛɛna min mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓi zi ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ ucem lɛ nyi yɛɛ pɛsi mìni aɗyoo ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki à siŋdɛ̀ngà. 
Sɛɛ̀dɛɛna ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ ɗiɗi mini mɛ̀rem a lɔ̀ŋkii ɓisuulɛ nyimiɗ a ɓeŋ̀ɓeŋ mini.
Ɓaana cem, ɓì konàg ɓisuulɛ bènàbena wiǹ ànɛ lɛ Satàn a ŋwɔŋ-ŋwɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìmonɗo ki kɛɛ̀ kaakaa com ki kɛɛ sokɛn. 
Ɓaana ɓɛ̀sììrɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛn lɛ a ɓigti mìni, ɓì ki yi lɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ̀ tuutulɛ̀n rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ mɛtɔɓ mɛ̀n ɓi ziinɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ki ɓiì ɓaà lɛ i ɓyàa wog rikɛŋ ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì rì geesɛ̀n bimiɗ, ànɛ à reŋìghà mìni lɛ ɓi teɗ gàɓ ɓi rìkem ɗii ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi Kiris ɓi ɗùm, à rì mìni ɓiì konagh ki rɛsii lɛ syeesyee nyimiɗ, à sììràg mìni, à fa mìni ìtèɗ, à kì lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓumɓɛ com ki yin lɛ ki ɓigtì. 
Bɛ̀ll ànɛn yɛɛ ri rì ìtèɗ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ Ààmɛ̀n.
Ǹkàniì mìni ɓɔɔ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ rì Silvɛŋ  ànɛ à rì geni wìs a ǹtyweeyi lɛ nfa mìni deɓ, ǹki tɛɛ̀zi mini kì rèsii lɛ fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à geesɛ̀n ì Bɛ̀ll, ànɛ ɓì rì miì ɓɛ̀sììrɛn lɛ tiŋtiŋ, à rì.
Kìseŋi ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn ki a Baɓilon ki togsaagh yì mìni, Marikus à man wɛm̀ à tògsì girig mìni. 
Tògsɛɛna mìni rì mìni, di ɓi lɔ̀ɔlɔrɛ̀n ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni. Fyòoog a ɓa rì mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓi Kiris ɓi ɗùm.
Mɛ̀ Simɔn Pyɛɛri ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìsay, ǹki ɓa ti nkɛ̀nì-fìtom a Yeesus Kiris, ǹkàni ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà rìkuu ɗi ntyweeyi ɗifog rì ɗinkis, ɓisu saaɗ à Yeesus Kiris à Bɛ̀ll wìs rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs. 
Geesɛ̀n rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ teghɛn a lɔ̀ŋkin lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ rìyi ɗi ɓì yii lɛ rì Bɛ̀ll rì Yeesus Kiris à Kan wìs.
Ìtèɗ wu Kan wu wu riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll wu faghà ɓìsi com kìcèm ki ki ri lɛ ki ghɛɓsì ɓìsi lɛ ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki lɛ ti falɛn rì Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìkì ɗi à kìghà lɛ ti yi roànɛ à reŋìghà ɓìsi lɛ ti kaɓɓɛn rìkem ɗii, rì syeesyee wìì a kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à faghà ɓìsi ɓyoo ɓisyeesyee rì gìn yi mɛkàg lɛ, i ɓì teri ɓyom ɓi à kàkà, ɓì ɓa rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓi ghɛŋi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ yooyogsì ɓum ɓyɛɛ ri ɓìcakɛn ɗi ziinɛ, ɓi yu kì terì gàɓ ɓi rìɓa ɗii ɗi à rì Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓisu wìn miì nnɛ ɓì ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì foŋì ìtèɗ win wucèm lɛ, ɓi ɓɔɓtɛn syeesyee à kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin, ɓì ɓɔ̀ɓtɛ̀n rìyi ɓi syeesyee à kìsyɔ̀ɔ̀, 
ɓi rìyi ɗìn aɗyoo, ɓì ɓɔ̀ɓtɛ̀n tì rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem; ɓi rìnìɗ ɗi nɗem ɗìn, ɓì sagtɛ̀ntì kìsììrì; ɓi kìsììrì kiǹ, ɓì foŋdì rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n; 
ɓi rìfalɛ̀n ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, ɓì ɓɔ̀ɓtɛ̀ntì kìrɔɔrɛɛ ki ɓi rìgeni; ɓi kìrɔɔrɛɛ ki ɓi rìgeni kìn, ɓì foŋ̀dì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n. 
Ɓisuulɛ i ɓì rì rì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, nni ɓi ghɛnɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin lɛɛ̀gwey, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì rɔ̀ɓ lɛ ɓì kìi ɓi lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sasày ɓɛ ki wumwum ɓiɗùn, ɓi rìyi ɗi ɓì yii Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris. 
Kìɓan kifog, ŋwaànɛ à tàŋi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ à rì ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ànɛ a mɔmɔɓ m̀mɔmɔɓɛn, à ɗimzɛ̀n lɛ ɓìɓe ɓii ɓi abɛ̀y ɓi ti ɓì sòòyɛn. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki mìni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ̀m, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì tèèsii nyoo lɛ ɓi siìrag ǹɗeèghreŋi win ɗi rìɓɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà mìni; i ɓì kìi fɔlɔɔ, ɓyàa kpì ɓi ɓi kìɓe. 
Fɔlɔɔ anɛ̀n nnɛ rìɗiŋì ɗin ɗi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ki Kan wìs rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs Yeesus Kiris, ɗi ri ɓiì ɓaà kɛ̀ɛ̀ maa ntɔɓ nsoò lɛsàg.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ǹɗì lɔŋ mini ɓiì yiiyitàg ɓìɓan ɓiǹ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm kaa soo rì lɛ ɓì mɛ yi ɓyɔ, ɓì ki ɓa ɓɛsììrɛn lɛ syeesyee ɓi saaɗ ànɛ ɓì tekà. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛɛ lɛ ki ri lɛ syeesyee lɛ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki ǹkaka ɓi ziinɛ, nki lɛ ǹɗem win wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wu ɓi rìyitì ɗi ǹɗì mìni ɓiì yiiyitàg ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, 
ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yii lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan wɛ̀m Yeesus Kiris àa nɗèsii mɛ̀ lɛ rìpɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗyɛm̀ ɗi ɓi ziinɛ ɗi ti jàŋbog. 
Kìɓan kifog ǹɗì ɓiì kaà bee inɛ lɛ ajɛ̀m ì rìpɛ̀sɛ̀n ɗyɛm̀, ɓi rɔɓ kìyitaagh ɓiɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ.
Lɛ yɛ̀ɛ tì rèsìghà mìni kìɓan ki lɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris à rì ɓiì sugtii yi, à ɓay rì ìtèɗ, tì ɓaàdɛ̀ngà ɓi ɓi mɛ̀kànkàn mɛ ɓum ɓɛ konaagh kì syaàgh, tì rèsìghà lɔŋ mini kìɓan kiǹ ɓisuulɛ ɓìsiìɓɔmiɗ tì ghɛngà rìgwey ɗii fɛlɛ rì mis mìs. 
Ɓisuulɛ à tekà lɛ rì ǹnyaasɛ̀n rì rìkem yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì ɓaghày ɓi jàŋ inɛ rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ɗi cee ɗi ri, lɛ: Roànɛ à rì man wɛm̀ à nɗem ànɛ à ti à rɔɔghì mɛ̀. 
Tì wokày jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn di ì tòòghrɛɛ yì ɓi ɗyoo yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà rì nyi ɓi dòn ìnɛ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn aɗyòò. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ɓiisɛɛ tì kìgherɛɛ rikpaa ɗi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ ɗi ri saaɗ; saaɗ ànɛ̀n innɛ ɓi kookonàg yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ranɗam mɛreè lɛ ɓi wog lɛ à rì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ lamɓà ànɛ a ròòroo ɓi jàŋ inɛ ì rì birìm, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ duri i ɓiì tanì, fyɛy fi duriɓuɓ fi kpeŋzì mɛ̀rem min. 
Kìɓan ki asu ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yiì ki ri lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ resìghà ki ki ri kìkànɛn, ki mum à rì lɛ à wog azi anɛ miì yɛ̀ɛ nyii kɔni lɛ a wog, 
ɓisuulɛ ɓum ɓɛ ti kɛ̀ ɓɛɛ̀ kpaŋzi-ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìkɔ̀n ɗyaa ɗi ɓɔmiɗ, kìɓan kifog ɓum ɓɛ toòghrɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki tinìghà ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ toòghrɛn.
Ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛpwàà ɓɛ ɓaghà abɛ̀y ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛrèsàg ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà girig ɓi nyìinyìm wìn; ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗiŋzii yi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ɓi ɓi rìɗyaŋ lɛ ɗyɔ̀ɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ki roòzɛn masà ànɛ à kwèɗkà ɓɔ, fɔlɔɔ a kì lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛɛ syoŋ yì cuu ki kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ lɛ̀mziì ɓi nyoo yàà. 
Kìgwey ki ɓum ki ri ɓɔ ɓiì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓi kìɓeɓtàg kaa ki cɛɓ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ri ɓiì feefengì bee ì saaɗ lɛ rìkì ɗyaa. 
Lɛ kìsee ki mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ki ɓɛ ri rì kɔ, ɓɛ ri mìni ɓiì kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà lɛ ɓi fafa ɓɔ ɓyom; kìɓan kifog ŋwaànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓɔ kìyɔ̀mi à tighà m̀pègsɛn lɛ a ki kìsay kii fìɗyàɓ, fɔɔnnɛ rìɗyaŋ ɗyaa ɗyaa finɛn yi tì ɓi.
Ɓisuulɛ i Bɛ̀ll à rɔ̀ɓkà kɛ̀ɛ kèŋi ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ kighà kìɓe, à ràm lɔŋ à ɓangì ɓɔ, à ki pìki ɓɔ ɓi bɛŋ yi yi ri rì birìm, wɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ kaka ɓɛ̀ɓanɓanɛn ɓɛ ɓoŋɓoŋ ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll; 
i à rɔ̀ɓkà kɛ̀ɛ kèŋi ɓum ɓɛ ǹtonto, kìɓan kifog à ghɛɓsìghà lɔŋ ɓum taàraa yɛ̀ɛ à romgày coo doni mɛnig ɓi zi i ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe; Nowe ànɛ à lààlàmɓɛ̀ngà saaɗ à ɓaghà ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kitaàraa ɓɛ̀n; 
i à cɛ̀mgà bàn yi lɛ rì Sɔdɔm rì Gɔmɔɔr lɛ yɛɛ ɗyaŋ, à ki ɓùgsi yɔ lɛ ɓùùghɓùùgh lɛ yɛɛ ɓa kìfèèghrɛnà ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ asu, 
kìɓan kifog à ghɛɓsìghà Lɔt ànɛ à ɓaghà ŋwaà saaɗ, ànɛ cɛɓ ki tifin ki ɓɛwolì-ɓum ɓɛ a Sɔdɔm rì Gɔmɔɔr ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ wowɔlà rì ǹɗemi-kɛŋɛn 
ɓisuulɛ saaɗ à mum ànɛ̀n à ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wàà, à seesèè ɓìɓan ɓyaa, à ki wowog ɓyɔ mɛ̀ru mɛ̀cèm; ǹɗem wii wu wu ɓaghà lɛ saaɗ wu ɗiìɗìlɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓyaa ɓi ɓiɓan ɓiǹ. 
Fɔlɔɔ a rèsii lɛ Kan à yii rìghɛɓsì ɗi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ falɛɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n di ɓɛ ri ɓi mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, à ki ɓoŋzag ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum lɛ ɓyɛɛ ɓoŋ yɛ̀ɛ à rì ɓyɔ ɓiì pɔnɔsii ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓii. 
À ɓiisɛ̀n ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ yɛɛ̀sàg ɓìɓan ɓi tifin, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ti ɓi rɔɔghì mɛ̀mùù, ɓɛ sɛɛtì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rìlàmì ì Kan. Ɓɛ tɔɔghraagh mɛ̀rem, ɓɛ ki ɓalag ri kalɛn, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ risi risɛmgì ɗi ɓyom ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ aɗyoo ɓi rìkem. 
Kɔm̀ lɛ, nsoò ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ceeghii ɓɛ̀rèsàg ɓɛ ɓɛpwàà lɛ, rì ɓi-tèɗ, rì ɓi nkoŋ, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ sɔmɛn ɓyom ɓìn, ɗì rìkuu ɗi tisɛm ɗiǹ ɓi mis mɛ Kan. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ ri lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ nyàm yi yi yin ɗi ɗyomzɛ̀n, yɛɛ kilɛ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹɓan di ɓɛɛ̀ wewèy, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ sɛmgì com ki ɓɛ yii ɓi, ɓɛ ri lɔŋ ɓiì cuù lɛ rìɓa ɗyaa ɗi ɓɛ ri ɓìɗyoŋi. 
Mɛlèɓ mɛ ɓi kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ mɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà lɛ kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ. Kìrɔɔ ki ɓɛ ri lɛ ɓɛ wog ki ri lɛ ɓɛɛ kiki ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ti ɓi kɔngì ɓɔ rì ŋwos ɓi nto. Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓutàg kɔm̀ ɗì mìni, ɓɛ teɗ gàɓ ɓi ɓìɗilàg ɓin ɓi rigeni, wɔ̀lɛ rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyaa ɗi ri ǹtoòrìɗ, ɗi ki ɓa kiɓan ki fiɓàg; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ nyaàràg rì m̀ɓɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n ànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔ̀ŋɓɔŋ ɓum. 
Mis maa mɛ ri lɔŋ kizyaa ri kìzyaa, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wuri rikì ɗi kiɓe; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wɔɔsàg ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri mɛ̀rem lɛ fɛnfɛn ɓi fìram fyaa, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ mɛɛ̀tɛɛ rì zày ì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, ɓɛ ri ɓum ɓɛ ncɛ̀m. 
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ caɗkà bee ì syeesyee ɓɛ kɛǹ kì pasɛɛ ɓi bee i Balam à man à Beɔr ànɛ à keesìghà rìfɔ̀n ɗi mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ɓi bee ì kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ, 
kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ fwaadɛ̀ngà nyi ɓi kìɓeɓtàg ki rikì ki à ɓaghà ɓiì kìkii. Lɛ Jàɗki ìnɛ ì ti yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ tòòghrɛn, ì tòòghrɛ̀n gà yɛ̀ɛ mum, ì rèsì kìyèg ki rikì ki ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a ɓaghà ɓiì kìkii.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀pom ɓɛ mɛnig ɓɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀nig, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìkwìɗ ɓi coo bɛ̀ɓ kɛɛ̀ tyɔtyɔg; Bɛ̀ll à nyamgà ɓɔ ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi birìm ì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kalàg ɓìɓan ɓi ɓidaŋà ɓi ɓi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìsu, ɓɛ ɓaàdɛ̀n ɓi zày ì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓi ɓi mɛ̀mùù lɛ ɓɛɛ yegsi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ sɔtɛ̀n yi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi rìɗim ɓi ɗùm; 
ɓɛ kakàg ɓɔ cɛɓ ki rikan, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ ɓiɓe ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ titini ɓɔ ɓi rìɗyaŋ ɓisuulɛ mum bimiɗ à rì ǹkpàn a com kìcèm ki ki lamii nyi.
Fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri lɛ i ɓum ɓɛ ghasɛɛ yì rì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓi ɓi ziinɛ lɛ rìyi ɗi ɓɛ yii Ǹghɛɓsì-ɓum, Kan Yeesus Kiris, nnɛ ɓɛ carɛɛ tì lɛ ɓɛɛ sugti ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ lami tì ɓɔ, rìɓa ɗyaa ɗi siitòn ɗi ɓiì ɓeɓtɛɛ ɗi cee ɗi ǹtonto. 
Lɛ ki ɓaghà lɛ ki ɓa tì rì ziŋ ɓi san wàà lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi bee ì saaɗ, à cee lɛ i ɓaa yi yɔ̀, ɓɛɛ lɔɔgh tì jɛ̀m rì kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki tɛnɛn ki ɓɛ faghà ɓɔ. 
Kìɓan ki ki kighà ɓɔ ki resii saaɗ ànɛ ɓi dàɗkì ìnɛ yɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ: Bu ìi nsugtii tì kì ɗiì ɓyom ɓi ì nlooghii, jèè inɛ ɓɛ wuɓsii lɔŋ a-kɔ̀ɔ̀, ì kɛ̀ɛ̀dì kì tɔɓɓɛɛ ɓi bìbìɗ.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, kaàtà wɛ̀m à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ànɛ ǹkàniì mìni yɛɛ ri lɛ; ɓi kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀rɛn ki ɓɛ̀kaàtà kiǹ, n-yiiyitì mìni ɓìɓan, lɛ nghem̀zi mìni mɛ̀rem yɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɓa rì syeesyee à fèg 
lɛ ɓi yiìyìtàg lɛ rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ ɓi ɓiì kìlɛɛ, rì kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki Kan ànɛ à rì Ǹghɛɓsì-ɓum, kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓin ɓɛ resìghà mìni. 
Ka looghna kì yiì lɛ, ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓiì pee yì, ɓɛ ghɛghɛ̀ɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀rem maa mɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n, ɓɛ wɔwɛ̀y mìni 
ɓɛ ki kpaakpaa lɛ: Nni ǹkàg wu à kàkà lɛ à ɓiì sugtii yi wɛm̀be min? Lɛ à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ cuughà, ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ri lɔŋ zìŋ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ɓyaà ɓa, à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ zi i kìlɛ̀ngà.
Lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɗimzàg ɓi rìfee lɛ, ɗyoo rì zi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà abɛ̀y di Bɛ̀ll à tòòghrɛɛ, zi i kpaŋ yì ɓi mɛ̀nig, yɔ̀ nkìyɛn ɗi mɛ̀nig. 
Nni mɛ̀nig mɛ coo don inɛ ì kìlɛ̀ngà mɛɛ ki yogsìghà tì lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi ɓi ɓi ɓaghà ǹtonto. 
Kìɓan kifog, ɗyoo rì zi ɓi tì seesee ɓi gɛɛ̀nɛ, ɓi ri ɓyom ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll yɔ̀miɗ inɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓèŋɓèŋ lɛ ɗuu ɗi ri ɓyɔ ɓiì yogsii ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ ri yɔ̀mi gɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, ɓɛ cuusì ɓɔ.
Wɔ̀lɛ com ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki ɗimzɛɛ, mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, ki ri lɛ: Ìru wùfog ɓi mis mɛ Kan wu ri yɛ̀ɛ bèg tɔɔsìm; bèg tɔɔsìm yi ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ìru wùfog. 
Kan à lɛ̀mzii ɓi lɛ a roòzi ǹkàg wu à faghà yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ fèfèg, ki ri yɛɛ ri lɛ, a nìniɗ nɗem rì mìni, lɛ ki kɔni ɓi nyi lɛ mum a ɗyaŋ̀ nsoò bog, rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɗi ri lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ kpaŋ ɓi nɗɛli wulɛ ɓɛɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛn mɛ̀rem. 
Ŋwos a Kan à ɓiì kpaŋì yɛ̀ɛ wiiwìì à ti à yùlàg. Ŋwos anɛ̀n, ɗyoo ɗi ri ɓiì silii ri coo gom, ɗuu ɗi digsì ɓyom ɓi ɓi ɗyoo, zi rì ɓìɓan ɓi miì ɓìcèm ɓi ɗig.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɗyaŋì fɔlɔɔ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ cɛɓ kin, ɗì rìfalɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìtɛnɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀. 
Mìni ɓɛ ɓi ɓoŋɓòŋ, ɓì ki lolos lɛ di ŋwos a Bɛ̀ll àa kpaŋi, ŋwos anɛ̀n yɛɛ ri ŋwos anɛ ɗuu ɗi ri ɓiì yogsii ɗyoo, ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ghaŋmɛ̀n rìtɔ̀n ɗi nɗòò wu ɗuu. 
Kìɓan kifog ɓìsii ɓoŋɓòŋ lɛ rì ɗyoo ɗi nyɔn rì zi i nyɔn ìnɛ saaɗ à ri ɓa miì, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à kàkà.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki, mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓi ka ɓoŋɓoŋ ŋwos anɛ̀n, tèèsiina nyoo lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓì ki ɓa lɛ fyòoog rì nyi. 
Terina rìnìɗ ɗi ǹɗem ɗi Kan wìs lɛ ɗi ri ɓi kìrɔɔ kin lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ geni wìs a nɗem ànɛ lɛ Pol à kàngà girig mìni ɓi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à faghà nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à ti à kìlàg ɓi ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ à ɓùŋi ɓìɓan ɓin miì, ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ri rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yidɛŋ yi yi teri rìwog, yɛɛ̀ yi ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi com, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ɓɛsììrɛn yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ sɛràg kì woògh lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kiki ri ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛmbòg, kìɓan kiǹ ki ki ɓa ɓisuu riɗyaŋ ɗyàà.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, ɓi ɓɛg wìn mìni yɛɛ mɛ log ki yiì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɔɔ abɛ̀y, nni kɔ̀riina rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, di kɛ̀ ɓi càrɛnti lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛɛ ɗimzi mìni bee ri ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓyaa ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ sɛ̀sɛ̀rì, fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ ɓi càɗ lɛ ɓɛɛ pwaŋ mìni ɓi ntyweeyi wu ɓì rɛrɛlii miì lɛ kpegkpeg, 
wɔ̀lɛ tɔɔtɔɔna ɓi geesɛ̀n, rì ɓi rìyi ɗi Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì Ǹghɛɓsì-ɓum, nyi yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì rìkem à tumɛ̀n gɛɛ̀nɛ à kpaŋ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, Ààmɛ̀n.
Tì kàni mìni kìɓan ki jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì cɛɓ ìnɛ ì ɓaghà, a rìtumɛ̀n ɗi ɓyom ɓìcèm; tì wokà yɔ̀ di yɛɛ̀ tòtòg, tì ghɛn yɔ̀ ri mis, tì sìŋì yɔ̀, tì ki kòm yɔ̀ ri ɓyàg ɓis. 
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛɓ ki resɛ̀ngày, ɓìsii ghɛngà kɔ; fɔɔnnɛ ti kpaakpaa mini kìɓan ki miì, tì ki ghagsi mini ɓɔlɛ à cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ki ɓaghà jàŋbog rì Seŋi, cɛɓ kìn kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ resìghà ɓìsi, lɛ ti yi kɔ. 
Kìɓan ki tì kìghà lɛ, tì ghɛn tì ki wog kɛɛ̀ki ti ghaaghagsì girig mìni, lɛ di mìni girig, ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ri ɓìsi. Nni ɓìsii ri ɓɛ̀ràrɛn lɛ rì Seŋi, rì Yeesus Kiris à Man wiì. 
Tì kàni mìni ɓìɓan ɓi lɛ di kìnyàà kis kɛɛ roǹ lɛ pisa.
Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ ɓìsii wokà rì nyi, innɛ ɓìsii ki ghagsii mìni; nnyɛɛ lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à rì kìtɛɛtɛn, birìm ì yin a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
I tì kpaa lɛ, tì rì ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗi nyi, tì ki kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi birìm di tì pwàa, tyɛ̀ ki ki kì yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ a kpaakpàà. 
Kìɓan kifog i ti kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ nyimiɗ a rì ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn, di tì rì ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɓisi mɛ̀to mɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ bwaɓ yi Man wiì Yeesus yi soò ɓìɓe ɓis ɓìcèm. 
I tì kpaa lɛ, tì yin ɗi ɓìɓe, di tì pwààrɛɛ ɓìsiìɓɔmiɗ, saaɗ kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓa a lɔ̀ŋkis. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i tì gherɛɛ ɓìɓe ɓis ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, tì rì lɛ tì ɓa rì ǹtyweeyi ri nyi lɛ, rìkì ɗii ɗi ri yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n; à ɓiì cenɛɛ ɓisi ɓìɓe, à ki sòò mɛnànì mis mɛcèm. 
I tì ki kpaa lɛ tì kìghà ɓi kiɓe, di tì ghaasii nyi pwààpwaà, jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa ɓisi ɓi mɛ̀rem.
Ɓɔn ɓɛm, ǹkàni mìni kìɓan ki lɛ, di kɛ̀ ɓi kì kiɓe; wɔ̀lɛ i ki kpaŋi lɛ wààdɛŋ ù kìi kìɓe, tì rì rì ŋwaànɛ a kamɛn ɗì ɓìsi jàŋbog rì Tààta, nnyɛɛ ri Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì saaɗ à mum. 
Lɛ nyimiɗ a faghà cɛɓ kii ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓe ɓis ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìcenɛn, àa gì lɛ ɓinkis ɓyɔ rì ɓyɔ, lɔŋ ɓisuu ɓiɓe ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm girig.
I ti ɓèŋɓeŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll, fɔɔnnɛ tì rì lɛ tì yi lɛ, tì mɛ yi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kpaa lɛ, à mɛ yi Bɛ̀ll, kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓèŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓii, à rì pwààpwaà, saaɗ kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓa a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Wɔ̀lɛ i mum à ti à ɓègì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, di ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì ǹɗonɛn ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi nɗem kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìron; bee innɛ tì rì lɛ tì yi lɛ tì rì ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗi Bɛ̀ll ì rì lɛ, 
ŋwaànɛ à kpaa lɛ, à rì ǹɗàrɛn ri Bɛ̀ll, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛɓì yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus nyimiɗ à ghɛɓkà.
Ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, àa kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn kɛɛ̀ki ǹkàni mìni, lɔŋ ki abɛ̀y ki ɓì tekà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n; kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki abɛ̀y kiǹ kɛɛ ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì inɛ ɓì mɛ wog. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn kɛɛ̀ki ǹkàni mìni; kiŋcèm kɛɛ̀ki saaɗ ànɛ miì a ghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n ɓi Kiris rì ɓi mìni ɓisuulɛ birìm ì mɛ lèg, kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìtɛɛtɛn à ti gì ɓiì lònlomi. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kpaa lɛ à rì ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn à ki ɓèèzɛn geni, à kaka ɓi birìm. 
Ŋwaànɛ à keesii geni yɛɛ ri ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn; kìɓan ki kɛ̀ɓtiyɛn nyi fìɓàg ki yin a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Kìɓan kifog, ŋwaànɛ à ɓèèzɛɛ geni à rì ɓi birìm; a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi birìm kɛ̀ɛ yi fe nnɛ a kɛ̀nkɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ birìm ì mɛ ɗiŋzi nyi tìɗyaŋ.
Ɓɔn ɓɛm, ǹkàni mìni ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓe ɓin ɓi ti ɓì càrɛn ɓi ɗii ɗìì. 
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓɛ̀m, ǹkàni mìni ɓisuulɛ ɓì yii roànɛ à ɓaghà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n; ǹkàn mìni ɓɛ̀dɛlì, ɓisuulɛ ɓì mɛ yag ghèghey à mum. Ǹkàni mìni ɓɔɔɓɔɓti ɓisuulɛ ɓì mɛ yi roànɛ à rì Seŋi. 
Ǹkàni mìni ɓɛ̀seŋi, ɓisuulɛ ɓì yii roànɛ à ɓaghà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n; ǹkàn mìni ɓɛ̀dɛlì ɓisuulɛ ɓì tèèsɛɛ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ì ɓa mìni ɓi mɛ̀rem, rì tì lɛ ɓì mɛ yag ghèghey à mum.
Kɛ̀ ɓi keesi ziinɛ, nsoò com kidɛŋ ki miì; i mum à keesii ziinɛ, di ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Tààta à yin nyi ɓi nɗem; 
ɓisuulɛ, ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri ɓi ziinɛ lɛ rì zày ì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan, ɓi ɓi mɛ̀mùù, yàaka à mis, rì ǹcàŋà wu ìkum wu ti wu falàg mum, ɓi pɛsɛɛ yì ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Tààta, ɓyɛɛ̀ pɛ̀ɛpɛsàg yì ɓi ziinɛ. 
Nni ziinɛ yɛɛ̀ ghaghààgh, kìkɔ̀nɛɛ ki ɓiɓan ɓi miì ki ghaghààgh girig, wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ a kìki rikɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll à ɓiì kɔ̀rii fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓɔɔ ɓɔn ɓɛ̀m, siitòn a cààmɛ̀n yɛɛ ti lɛ! Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì wokà lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à rì ɓiì ɗùùɗuu ri Kiris à ɓiì yùu yi, ɓɛ̀ɗùù rì Kiris ɓɛ mɛ tèghɛn ɓigomìnɛ, kɛɛ resii ɓìsi lɛ siitòn a cààmɛ̀n yɛɛ ti lɛ. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpagày ɓi ǹɗaŋ wis kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ɓɛɓàlɛn ɓi bàlì yìs i ɓum, lɛ i ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀ɓàlɛn ɓi bàlì yìs, di ɓɛ rɔɓkà rì ɓìsi; nni ɓɛ mɛ ghasɛn ɗi ɓìsi lɛ kɛɛ ghɛnɛn lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ, ɓɔɔ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi ɓi bàlì ì ɓum ɓis.
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin, ɓì mɛ teɗ Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki Kiris à sààtìghà ɓi mìni, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓì mɛ yi saaɗ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm. 
Ǹkàni mìni, ki yin lɛ ɓì ka yi ɓi saaɗ, ki ri lɔŋ lɛ ɓì mɛ yi nyi, rì tì lɛ pwàà à yin lɛ à ɓay ɓi saaɗ. 
Ghɛn yɛɛ ri min pwààpwaà? Ŋwaànɛ à kpaa lɛ Yeesus à yin Kiris yɛɛ ri pwààpwaà; ŋwaànɛ̀n miì yɛɛ̀ ɗùùɗuu ri Kiris, à ki roòzɛn lɛ, rì Seŋi rì Man. 
Lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à roòzɛɛ Man à roòzɛɛ girig Seŋì; roànɛ à gherɛɛ Man, à rì girig rì Seŋi.
Ɓi ɓɛg wìn, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋi kiɓan ki ɓì wokà kiǹ à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n ki ɓa mìni ɓi mɛ̀rem, mìni girig ɓì rì ɓiì kɛ̀nkɛni asu, ɓì ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ri kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum ki lɛ, rì Man, rì Seŋi. 
Nni ǹkàg wu à faghà ɓìsi wɛɛ ri lɛ, cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ǹkàni mìni fɔlɔɔ, ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi lɛ, ɓɛɛ yegsi mìni. 
Ɓi ɓɛg wìn, Kiris à miskà Nghay wìì ɓi mìni; fɔɔnnɛ ɓì yiìdi ri zày ì rìrèsàg ɗi ŋwaàɗɛŋ ɓisuulɛ Nghay wìì a rèresi mini ɓìɓan ɓicèm; rìrèsì ɗii ɗi ri lɛ saaɗ, ɗi yin ɓɛpwàà, kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh rìrèsì ɗi Nghay, ɓì ɓa ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗi Kiris.
Ɓigomìnɛ, mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, ɓaana lɔŋ ɓɛràrɛn ɗi Kiris lɛ yɛ̀ɛ à rì ɓiì yùu, ti ɓa kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris, tyɛ̀ ki wog ntoòrìɗ ɓi mis mii ŋwosi risugtìì ɗii. 
I ɓì yii lɛ, à rì lɛ saaɗ, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì yiì lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ a kìki ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri lɛ saaɗ, à rì man à Bɛ̀ll.
Ghɛɛna rìkuu ɗi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɗi Tààta à rèsìghà ɓìsi ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rereŋi ɓìsi lɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll! Tì ki rì ɓɔn ɓii a tààkaà. Kìɓan ki ziinɛ ì yii ɓi ɓisi miì ki ri lɛ: Ì yighà ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, tì ti ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓigomìnɛ, nni com ki tì rì ɓiì ɓaà ki ka resɛn ɓi lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n; wɔ̀lɛ tì yii lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ɓiì rèsɛɛ, tì ɓiì ɓaà com kìfog rì nyi, ɓisuulɛ, tì rì nyi ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à rì. 
Nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì rì ǹtyweeyi wiǹ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris, à ti à ɓègì nyimiɗ ntɛnɛn fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus Kiris à rì ǹtɛnɛn.
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kìi kìɓe, à yogsii ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɛ, kìɓe ki ri rìyogsì ɗi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓì yii lɛ Yeesus Kiris à yùghày lɛ a pisi ɓìɓe, nni kìɓe ki yin a lɔ̀ŋkii. 
Fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì ǹɗàrɛn ɗi nyi à ti kɛ̀ɛ kì ti kiɓe; wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ a kɛ̀nkɛn asu à kìkì kìɓe, à ka ghɛn ɓi nyi, kɛ̀ɛ ki yi nyi.
Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, mum kɛ̀ɛ yègsi mini; ŋwaànɛ a kìki ɓiɓan ɓi saaɗ, à rì lɛ saaɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan Yeesus à rì lɛ saaɗ. 
Ŋwaànɛ a kɛ̀nkɛn asu à kìkì kìɓe, à rì ŋwaà Satàn, lɛ Satàn a maà kìkì kìɓe, à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n. Man à Bɛ̀ll à yùghày lɛ, a yogsi mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ Satàn.
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì man à Bɛ̀ll à ti kɛ̀ɛ kì ti kiɓe ɓisuulɛ, ìtèɗ wu cɛɓ wu wu riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll wu ri a lɔ̀ŋkii. À yin lɛ à kɛ̀nkɛ̀n asu rì rìkìkì ɗi kiɓe lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì nyi Seŋì. 
Kìɓan ki ki ghasii lɛ rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Satàn ki ri lɛ: Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kìi ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi saaɗ, nsoò roànɛ à keesii ɓi geni à yin man à Bɛ̀ll.
Lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓì wokà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n ì rì lɛ: Ti kɔ̀nɛɛna ɓìsi rì ɓìsi. 
Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki pisɛɛ Kayin ànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi kìkàmì ki ghèghey à mum, nnyɛɛ wolà geni. À wolà nyi lɛ cɛ? Lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ geni mɛ ɓaghà lɛ saaɗ, mɛŋkii mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ rɔɔtɛn. 
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! Kɛ̀ ɓi kuurag lɛ ziinɛ ì ɓèèzɛɛ mìni. 
Ɓìsii yii lɛ tì mɛ pɛ̀sɛn ɓi rìwu, tì ɗiŋì ɓi cɛɓ; tì yii fɔlɔɔ lɛ tì keesii ɓɛ̀geni ɓis; ŋwaànɛ à yin ɗi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, à kaka ɓi rìwu ɓi ɗùm. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓèèzɛɛ geni, à rì ǹwolì-ɓum; ɓì ki yii lɛ ǹwolì-ɓum, à yin ɗi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyimiɗ.
Rìyi ɗi tì yii com ki lɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi lɛ, Yeesus Kiris à faghà cɛɓ kii ɓisu wis; fɔɔnnɛ ɓìsi girig, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì faà cɛɓ kis ɓisuu ɓɛgeni ɓis. 
I ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ìkum à ghɛɛ geni di à rì ɓi kìyɛɓà, kɛ̀ɛ wog nyi nyìighnyìg, lannɛ à rì lɛ à kpaa lɛ à keesii Bɛ̀ll ɓi nɗem wii?
Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi lɛ ti kɛkɛɛgh ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìs ŋwɔm ɗì ŋwɔm; ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìs a ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ a rèeresɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀kìkìì mis. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ɓiì yiì lɛ, tì rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi gàm ì saaɗ; fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀rem mɛ ri ɓìsi ɓiì kpìi ɓi mùm rì rìɓa ɗis ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Nsoò mɛ̀rem mis maa faa ɓìsi bɛ̀lɛn, tì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à cee ǹɗem wis, à ki yi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm. 
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, i ǹɗem wu faa ɓi ɓisi bɛ̀lɛn, di tì rì yɛɛ lɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki lɛ tì risì ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
À ti à falàg ɓìsi com kìcèm ki tì tɔɔgh nyi ɓisuulɛ, tì ti tì ɓègì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓii, tì ki kìlag ɓiɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi nyi. 
Ǹsiŋdɛn wu à faa ɓìsi wɛɛ̀wu lɛ, ti gherɛn Yeesus Kiris à Man wiì, tì ki kɔ̀nɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓìsi lɛ ti kɔnɛn. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ti à ɓègì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll à rì lɔŋ nɗàrɛn ri Bɛ̀ll, Bɛ̀ll girig ǹɗàrɛn ri nyi. Com ki tì ti tì yilàg miì lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì a lɔ̀ŋkis kɛɛ̀kìn; tì ki ti tì yilàg fɔlɔɔ lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki à faghà ɓìsi.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, kɛ̀ ɓi siighrag ɓi mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kpaa lɛ, à rì rì Nghay à Bɛ̀ll; fèèghraaghna mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum mɛ̀n, lɛ ɓi yi ǹkòo ǹghay wu ɓɛ ri rì wɔ, wu ri wu Bɛ̀ll ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ti ɓi ziinɛ lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Bee inɛ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì rèmì Nghay wu wu riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ̀nɛ lɛ: Nghay wùcèm wu wɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Yeesus Kiris à yalɛ̀ngà mum wu riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll; 
nni ǹghay wùcèm wu wu gherɛɛ ɓi Yeesus fɔlɔɔ, wu yin yi yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, wu ri wu roànɛ a ɗùùɗuu ri Kiris, ànɛ ɓì wokà lɛ à ɓiì yùu, à ki ti ɓi ziinɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki.
Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓì mɛ yag ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ, Nghay wu wu ri ɓi mìni wu teèsɛɛ wu cee wu wu ri ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ɓɔɔ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, kìɓan kiǹ kɛ̀ɛ̀ki ɓìtòkì ɓyaa ɓi ri ɓìtòkì ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, fɔɔnnɛ ziinɛ yɛɛ̀ wowog ɓɔ. 
Ɓi ɓɛg wìs, ɓìsii ri ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll; ŋwaànɛ à yii Bɛ̀ll, à rì ɓiì woògh com ki ti kpaakpàà; wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à yin mum à Bɛ̀ll àa wog ɓi com ki ti kpaakpàà, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì rì lɛ tì yi rìghasì ɗi lɛ rì Nghay wu wu ri ɓi saaɗ, rì wu wu ri ɓi rìnàn.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, ti kɔ̀nɛɛna ɓi nyìinyìm wìs ɓisuulɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à ti à ɓalàg yì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì man à Bɛ̀ll, à ki yii Bɛ̀ll. 
Ŋwaànɛ à yin ɗi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à yii ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓisuulɛ, Bɛ̀ll à rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n. 
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Bɛ̀ll à ghɛnɛ̀ngà a lɔ̀ŋkis ɓi bee inɛ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày m̀bobog wìì a Man ɓi ziinɛ lɛ, ti ɓa rì cɛɓ lɛ nyi. 
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛn à yin lɛ ɓìsi yɛɛ keesìghà Bɛ̀ll, kìɓan kifog nnyɛɛ keesìghà ɓìsi, à rom yì Man wiì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìtuwe ki kɛɛ ghɛɓsi ɓi zòghɛ̀n ì ɓìɓe ɓis. 
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, i Bɛ̀ll à keesìghà ɓìsi fɔlɔɔ, ɓìsii ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì ɓaà rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wìs.
Mum à ka ghɛngà ɓi Bɛ̀ll; i tì rì rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm wìs, di Bɛ̀ll à rì a lɔ̀ŋkis, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wìì a ki ɓa ɓi ɓìsi syeesyee à rìɓa. 
Com ki tì ti tì yilàg miì lɛ, tì rì ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗi nyi, nyi ǹɗàrɛn ri ɓìsi ki ri lɛ; à faghà ɓìsi Ǹghay wìì, 
nni ɓìsii ghɛngà, tì ki làalamɓɛ̀n lɛ, Tààta à romgày Man, lɛ a ghɛɓsi ziinɛ. 
Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, di Bɛ̀ll à rì rì nyi, nyi ɓa girig ɓɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓìsii yii ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì rì nyi ɓi ɓɛg wìs, tì ki gherɛɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ̀n. Bɛ̀ll à rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n, ŋwaànɛ a ghɛghɛɓ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, à rì ɓɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll, Bɛ̀ll ɓɛɛ̀ nyi.
I ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì a lɔ̀ŋkis syeesyee à rìɓa, fɔɔnnɛ tì rì ɓiì ɓaà kɛ̀ɛ̀ ìris ŋwosi ɓɛyɔ̀m, ɓisuulɛ cɛɓ kis ki fɛ ɓi ziinɛ ki pisɛɛ rì ki Yeesus Kiris. 
Ìris wu yin ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n, syeesyee à ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à ti à lègsàg ìris, lɛ ìris wu resii yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ, ǹkulɛ̀n à rì lɛ à ɓa, nni ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ìris, à yin ɗi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n syeesyee à rìɓa. 
Ɓi ɓɛg wìs, tì keesii Bɛ̀ll lɛ, nyimiɗ yɛɛ lokà ɓìsi kì keesii.
I mum à kpaa lɛ: Ǹkeesii Bɛ̀ll nni à ɓèèzɛɛ geni, di à rì pwààpwaà, ɓisuulɛ, i mum à keesii ɓi geni ànɛ a seesèè, lannɛ à rì lɛ à keesì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ghɛɛ ɓi? 
Kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki Kiris à faghà ɓìsi kɛɛ̀ki lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à keesii Bɛ̀ll, a keèsì girig geni.
Mum bimiɗ ànɛ à gherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus à rì Kiris, à rì ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ Bɛ̀ll; nni ŋwaànɛ à keesii seŋi, à ti à keesàg girig ɓɔn ɓɛ seŋi ànɛ̀n à yali. 
Tì ti tì yilàg lɛ, tì keesii ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll cààmɛ̀n ki tì keesii Bɛ̀ll, tì kìkì com ki ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓii ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà. 
Rìkeesì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri lɛ, ti ɓeŋ̀ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓii; nni ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓii ɓi ki tèri ɓi riɓèŋ. 
Ɓisuulɛ, mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì man à Bɛ̀ll, à ti à yakì ziinɛ. Rìyag ɗi tì ti tì yakì ziinɛ ɗi ri ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗis. 
Ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ à yag ziinɛ, i ki yin lɛ ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ lɛ, Yeesus Kiris à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Yeesus Kiris ànɛ̀n yɛɛ yughà lɛ, rì mɛ̀nig, rì bwaɓ; à yùghà ɓi ri mɛ̀nig mɔ rì mɔ, à yùghà lɔŋ lɛ rì mɛ̀nig rì bwaɓ; nni Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ rèresi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ, lɛ Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay ki ri saaɗ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ rèresi kiɓan kiǹ, ɓɛ ri ɓɛraa, 
lɛ rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, rì mɛ̀nig, rì bwaɓ, nni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ bog.
I tì ti tì gheràg com ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ kpaa, rìɓa ɗi Bɛ̀ll à rì wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɗi cee. Rìɓa ɗii ɗi wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ: À rèsìghà saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan ki Man wiì. 
Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ Man à Bɛ̀ll à rì ɗì rìrèsì ɗiǹ ɓi nyimiɗ, wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ ɓi Bɛ̀ll, à teri Bɛ̀ll yɛ̀ɛ pwààpwaà ɓisuulɛ, à gherɛɛ ɓi saaɗ ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à rèsìghà ɓi kìɓan ki Man wiì. 
Nni rìrèsì ɗi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ɗyɛɛ ri lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓìsi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, cɛɓ kìn ki ki ɓa ɓi Man wiì. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì rì Man, à rì rì cɛɓ kiǹ, ŋwaànɛ à yin ɗi Man à Bɛ̀ll, à yin ɗi cɛɓ kìn.
Ǹkàniì mìni kìɓan kiǹ lɛ ɓi yi lɛ: Ɓì rì rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, mìni ɓɛ ɓì gherɛɛ ɗii ɗi Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Tì konaagh kì yiì lɛ: Com kìcèm ki tì rì lɛ tì tɔg nyi, ki ɓa lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɗi ri, à rì ɓiì woògh; kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ fafa ɓisi ìtèɗ ɓi nɗem rì nyi. 
I tì ki yii lɛ, a wowog ɓisi, nsoò cɛ kɛɛ̀ki tyàa lɔni nyi, tì yi lɛ, tì rì rì com kìn miì.
Nni i ŋwaà ghɛɛ di geni a kìki kiɓe ki ki yin lɛ ki ki lɛ a ɗyaŋ̀, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì faà geni ànɛ̀n cɛɓ. Kìɓan ki ki seesee ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓìɓe ɓyaa ɓi yin lɛ ɓi ki lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗyaŋ̀; wɔ̀lɛ kìɓe kidɛŋ ki ri wɔɔ, ki ki ri lɛ ki ki lɛ mum a ɗyaŋ̀, nni àa kɛɛ̀ki nkpaghi mini lɛ ɓi ɓɔŋzi Bɛ̀ll miì. 
Kìɓan kicèm ki mum à nàni ki ri kìɓe, wɔ̀lɛ ɓìɓe ɓidɛŋ ɓi ri wɔɔ, ɓi ɓi yin lɛ ɓi ki lɛ mum a ɗyaŋ̀.
Tì yii lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, à ti kɛ̀ɛ kì ti kiɓe kìɓan kifog roànɛ à fuughày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, Bɛ̀ll a ɓèŋɓeŋ nyi, fɔɔnnɛ ghèghey à mum à yin lɛ à kɔ̀m nyi. 
Tì yii lɛ tì rì ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, rì tì lɛ ziinɛ bimiɗ ì rì ɓi rìlàmì ɗi ghèghey à mum. 
Tì yii girig lɛ, Man à Bɛ̀ll à yùghà, à ki fa ɓisi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi lɛ, ti yi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll, nni tì rì ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛn ɓi Yeesus Kiris à Man wiì. Nyi yɛɛ ri kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll, nyi tì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm ɓì konàg rì ɓìnùn.
Mɛ̀ Ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, mɛ̀ yɛɛ kani Kirya, giɓ anɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà, rì ɓɔn ɓii ɓɛ ǹkeesii lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀; nni àa mɛ̀ cɛ̀ncɛm yɛɛ keesii mìni, lɔŋ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ yii saaɗ ɓɛ keesii girig mìni; 
lɛ saaɗ ànɛ à rì ɓi ɓìsi, ànɛ à ki rì ɓiì kɔ̀rii a lɔ̀ŋkis fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Geesɛ̀n ɗì rìcenɛ̀n rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ ɓa rì ɓìsi lɛ rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll Seŋi, rì ɗi Yeesus Kiris Man à Seŋi, ɓi saaɗ rì ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n.
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹnyààrɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ lɛ ɓɔn ɓɔɔ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi saaɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à siŋdɛ̀ngà ɓìsi. 
Nni ɓigomìnɛ, Iyà, com ki ǹtɔtɔ̀g ki yin lɛ kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn kɛɛ̀ki ǹfaa wɔ̀, ki ri lɔŋ kidɔ̀gsɛna ki tì tekà à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n, kɛɛ ri lɛ ti kɔ̀nɛɛna ɓìsi rì ɓìsi. 
Nni ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rì lɛ mum a ghɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpàà; kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii kɛɛ̀ kìn lɔɔ, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì wokà a rìtumɛ̀n.
Lɛ ɓɛ̀yègsì-ɓum ɓɛ mɛ sààtɛn ɓi ziinɛ lɛɛ̀gwey; ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, Yeesus Kiris à yalɛ̀ngà lɔŋ mum. Rìkuu ɗi mum ɗìn ɗi ri ǹ-yègsì-ɓum ɗi ki ɓa ŋwaànɛ a ɗùùɗuu ri Kiris. 
Ɓì konàg rì mìniìɓɔmiɗ lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi ɗimzi ɓiɗùn ɓi ɓi kìsay kis, wɔ̀lɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ki terì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ miì mɛ̀cèm. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghaghii ɓìdyànì, kɛ̀ɛ ɓèŋdi rirèsì ɗi Kiris, à yin ɗi Bɛ̀ll; nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ asu à ɓèŋɓèŋ rìrèsì ɗi Kiris, à rì lɛ, nyi rì Seŋi, nyi rì Man. 
Nni i mum à yùu yì a lɔ̀ŋkin, kɛ̀ɛ ɓay ɗì rìrèsì ɗiǹ, kɛ̀ ɓi ghàɓ nyi ɓi naa yìn, kɛ̀ ɓi ki tògsi nyi; 
ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à tògsii nyi, à teri gàɓ ɓi ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓii ɓi mɛkìkìì.
Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ǹtèghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi lɛ, nkaǹ mìni, ǹghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ, kɛ̀ɛ nkàǹ mini ɓyɔ rì kìkànì ɓi rìfɛɓ, wɔ̀lɛ ǹɗì rì rìyitì ɗi lɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹɗì lɛ n-yù a lɔ̀ŋkin, nkpaà mìni ɓyɔ rì ŋwɔm fɔɔnnɛ kìnyàà kis ki roǹ ki sosòɓ.
Ɓɔn ɓɛ goni à giɓ anɛ à rì girig m̀ɓɔ̀nɛn, ɓɛ togsaghiì wɔ̀.
Mɛ̀ ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn yɛɛ kani Gayus, mum wɛm̀ à nɗem ànɛ ǹkeesii lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Mum wɛm̀ à nɗem, nkɔ̀ngi lɛ ɓìɓan ɓyɔɔ ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ ɓa lɛ syeesyee, ù ɓa lɛ kpiŋŋ ɓi mɛ̀mùù yɛ̀ɛ ù rì ɓi nghay. 
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹnyààrɛɛ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ nkpaŋi fɛ, ɓɛ resì mɛ̀ lèg ànɛ ù rì ǹfalɛn ɓi saaɗ, rì yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ ki ghɛghɛɓ cɛɓ ki saaɗ. 
Kìnyàà kidɛŋ ki cee ɓi mɛ ki lɛ nwog lɛ ɓɔn ɓɛm ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi saaɗ ɓi ɗùm.
Mum wɛm̀ à nɗem, u kìki ɓɛgoni ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓìɓan, nsoò ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀n, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ǹgherɛ̀n a ki. 
Ɓɛ nsɛɛgh geesɛ̀n yɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum ɓi Kìseŋi ki Kiris. Ki ri ɓiì ɓaà lɛ syeesyee di ù pègsɛɛ ɓɔ rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ lèg ànɛ ki ri lɛ ki rɔɔ Bɛ̀ll. 
Lɛ ɓisuu kisay ki Kiris nnɛ ɓɛ roŋìghà bee ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ teɗ nghɛɓsɛn wudɛŋ a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n. 
Ɓìsi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ min ki lèmi rikuu ɗi ɓum ɗìn, lɛ ti kaɓɓɛn kìsay ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìki kiǹ ɓisuu saaɗ.
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkàni ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki Kiris maa kaàtà, kìɓan kifog Dyotirɛf ànɛ a ɓiisag ki kɔ̀ni lɛ a ɓa ǹlàmì wàà, à kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ a wog com ki nkpaakpàà. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ ri ɓiì kìi lɛ, i ǹ-yùu mìni kì ghɛɛ̀, ǹɗèsi mìni ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi a kìkì, à tòtòg ɓìsi kìɓe, kɛ̀ɛ ki rɔ̀ɓ lɛ rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ, à ti à ɓèngì kì ghàɓi ɓɛgeni ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ yuù foo; nni i ɓum ɓɛɗɛŋ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kì lɛ ɓɛɛ ghaɓ ɓɔ, à règ lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghàɓ ɓɔ, à ki nàɓ ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ pɛsɛn ɓi kìseŋi ki ɓɛgherɛ̀n.
Mum wɛm̀ à ǹɗem, kɔ̀ɔ ɓa ri ǹfèfèègh ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ù ɓalàg rì ǹfèfèègh ɓi kìrɔɔ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ a kìki kirɔɔ à rì mum à Bɛ̀ll; ŋwaànɛ a kìki kiɓe à ghɛngà ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ̀ sɛsɛg Demetiriyus, saaɗ nyimiɗ a sɛsɛg girig nyi, nsoò ɓìsi girig ti sɛsɛg nyi, ù ki yii lɛ, com ki ti kpaakpàà ki ri saaɗ.
Ǹtèghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi kànɛn wɔ, kìɓan kifog ǹkɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ nkaǹ wɔ̀ ɓyɔ rì kìkànì ɓi rìfɛɓ.
Ǹɗì rì dyàɓɛn lɛ, mɓiì ghɛɛ̀ wɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ mɛ riì mɛ fɔɔnnɛ tì ɓiì tòkii, tì seèsèèrɛ̀n a mɛ̀su. 
Mɛ̀ Zyuudɛ ànɛ ǹɗì ǹkìì-kìsay a Yeesus Kiris, ǹki ɓa geni Zyag, mɛ̀ yɛɛ kaniì ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà kaàtà ànɛ. Ɓumɓɛ̀n Bɛ̀ll Seŋi a keesag ɓɔ, Yeesus Kiris, à ki ɓègi ɓɔ. 
Rìcenɛ̀n, rì fyòoog, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓyɛɛ nɔ a lɔ̀ŋkin yɛ̀ɛ bwey.
Mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, mɛ̀ɛ nɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ di màa kàni mìni kìɓan ki gòri ìnɛ ì seesee ɓìsi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛcèm; mɛ̀ɛ nɗì ǹtiniyɛn lɛ nki fɔlɔɔ lɛ nfegsi mìni lɛ ɓi ɗuù ɓisuu ntyweeyi wu Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n gɛ̀mbog ɓi gɛ̀n yicèm. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓidɛŋ ɓi nɗyɔ̀ɔ̀gɛɛ yì ɓi yu kìsɔ̀lɛɛ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn; ɓɛ tum rìlɔ̀ɔ̀lɔ̀gtì ɗi rirèsàg ɗi geesɛ̀n ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì rì yɔ̀ ɓi san wìs lɛ ɓɛɛ kiki ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓɛ roòròòzɛ̀n m̀bobog wìs a masà ànɛ à rì lɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris; ǹcɛ̀m à ɓumɓɛ̀n à ɓaghà di à ti ǹkànɛn fiɗyàɓ.
Mìni ɓɛ ɓì yii ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓìcèm lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, nkɔ̀nkɔn lɛ n-yiti mìni lɛ, Kan à ɓaghà lɛ à mɛ kwèɗ yi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Isirayɛl a Egiɓtɛn, fɔɔnnɛ à cuusìghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓengà nyi kìgherɛɛ. 
Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓegà ɓi rigwey ɗi Bɛ̀ll à rɛsìghà ɓɔ miì, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀n ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu wu ɓaghà wuŋkaa, Bɛ̀ll a maà ɓèŋɓèŋ ɓɔ ɓɛ̀kàgakɛn ɓi mɛ̀sɛ̀ŋi cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓi birìm ɓiɗùm ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋ coo gòn i ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ bàn yi lɛ rì Sɔdɔm rì Gɔmɔɔr rì bàn yimbog yi yi ɓaghà wɔɔ jàŋbog yi yi falɛ̀ngà girig ɓi cɛɓ ki tisɔ̀mɔ̀g ɓɛ lɔɔ̀lɔ̀gtì fèg ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓaghà rì nyi ɓisuu ɓum, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri kìrèmzɛnà ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog ɓi ɗuu ɗi fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ sɔlɛ̀ngà ɓɛǹ ɓɛɛ̀ kìki girig mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓiɓan mɛǹ, lɛ ɓìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ ɓyaa ɓi mɛyitì ɓi ti ɓi tinàg ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ri nyoo yàà, ɓɛ sɛɛtì kìlàmì ki Kan, ɓɛ ki feefengì ɓumɓɛ aɗyoo ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à kemzìghà.
