Nsoò Mikaɛl ànɛ à rì rìfòm ɗi ɓum ɓɛ titom, ɓi nywey yi ɓɛ ɓaghà miì di ɓɛɛ̀ kaakaŋ̀ɗɛ̀n kìloŋ ki Moyis ɓɛɛ̀ Satàn, à fèèghrɛ̀ngà ɓi nyi kì ɓaàgh bɔ̀rɔ, à kpaaghà lɔŋ Satàn lɛ: Kan nyimiɗ yɛɛ pɔnɔ̀si wɔ̀. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ feèfèngì com ki ɓɛ yii ɓi, ki ɓɔɔ̀ fèki lɛ ɓɛ yii, ɓi fèg wàà anɛ à rì yɛ̀ɛ fèg à nyàm ìnɛ ì rì kɛ̀ɛ ɗyomzɛ̀n, kɛɛ ki ti, ki pikì ɓɔ ɓi rìɗyaŋ. 
Nyìighnyìg rì ɓɔ, lɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà ɓìɓɔ̀ɓ ɓi kayin, ɓɛ mɛ kɛ̀n ki tɔlɛɛ ɓi rìnàn ɗi Balam à nàngà lɛ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni; rìkuu ɗi ntoògwey ɗi Koree ɗyɛɛ mɛ kì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗyaŋ̀. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ yulàg yì rì fìɓàg a ɓìɗilàg ɓin ɓi rigeni, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ rokàg ɓi ɓìɗilàg kɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹtoòrìɗ ɓɛ fɔmfɔ̀m lɔŋ lɛ mùm maa mɔ rì mɔ. Ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓìkwìɗ ɓi bɛ̀ɓ yɛɛ̀ titìnì, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔsi bwey. Ɓɛ ri tì yɛ̀ɛ ɓìte ɓi ɓi ri kɛ̀ɛ ɓìɗùn nsoò ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓyaa ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wumì; ɓìte ɓi ɓi ri ɓì wuyɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓi ki ɓa ɓi mùsakɛn. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ɓyoo ɓikus ɓi riɓày à kìkòn ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpaŋzì ɓìfuùfusa ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ntoòrìɗ ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì; ɓɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ tyɔɛy ti tyɛɛ̀ yòmyom fɔlɔɔ aɗyoo ǹ-yòmyomɛn; tyɛɛ̀ ti Bɛ̀ll à fèkà lɛ ti ri ɓiì kɔ̀rii ɓi birìm ì tìɓtìɓ fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ̀n innɛ Enɔg ànɛ à rì dòò yì Adam ì kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, à kpaŋzìghà ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kpaa lɛ: Ghɛɛna, Kan à tiì rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ɓɛtɛnɛn, ɓìtuu lɛ ɓìtuu kɛ̀ɛ̀ bàlì, 
lɛ a yɔm̀ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ren kìɓan kaa, lɛ di ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ teɗ ǹcɛ̀m ɓisuu ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛ kighà, rì ɓi ntoòtèɗ wu ɓɛ resìghà Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓisuu ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe ɓɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ risi Bɛ̀ll ɓɛǹ ɓɛ kpaàkpàŋzìghà di ɓɛɛ̀ feefengì nyi.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri lɔŋ ɓɛ cɔɔ̀cɔ̀ɓɛ̀n rìɓa ɗyaa, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wog kirɔɔ, ɓɛ kikì ɓìɓan lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀rem maa mɛ feègh, ɓɛ kpaakpàà ɓìɓan ri kalɛn, ɓɛ ɗyɛɓsàg ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sìŋsiŋ kirɔɔ kidɛŋ a lɔ̀ŋkaa.
Kìɓan kifog mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, yitiina ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris ɓɛ kpaaghà mìni lɛ ɓi ri ɓiì ghɛnɛɛ. 
Ɓɛ kpaaghà mìni lɛ: Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ siitòn, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓaa gɛ, ɓɛ wɔwɛ̀y mìni, ɓɛ ki ghɛghɛɓ ɓi kìɓe lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗem waa wɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔ̀n. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ ti ɓɛ syogìì gasɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, mɛ̀yitì maa mɛ ɓa mɛ̀yitì mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ yin ɗi Ǹghay à Bɛ̀ll.
Wɔ̀lɛ mìni ɓum ɓɛm ɓɛ nɗem, faafàlɛɛna mìniìɓɔmiɗ itèɗ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɗi ri ɗìtɛnɛn lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, ɓì ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzì rì ìtèɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay. 
Kɛ̀ɛna asu ɓì kɔ̀kɔ̀rì lɔŋ ɓi nkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Bɛ̀ll ɓiɗùm, ɓì ɓoŋɓòŋ yɛ̀ɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris à rì mìni ɓiì woògh nyìighnyìg, à fa mìni cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Lemina ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì nyoey ɓi mɛ̀rem. 
Pàsina ɓɔ ɓi ɗuu, ɓì ghɛɓsì ɓɔ, ɓi wog ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ nyìighnyìg; nyìighnyìg ìnɛn ì ɓa m̀ɓùtɛn ɗi ìris, wɔ̀lɛ ɓì ɓèèzɛ̀n ɓìɓan ɓyaa ɓìcèm, à kpaŋ lɛ rì ɓìlàà ɓyaa ɓi ɓi ri ɓìtɔɓiyɛn ri ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓi ɓi mɛ̀mùù.
Roànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ à ɓèŋ mìni lɛ kɛ̀ ɓi kɛ̀ɓtɛn fiɓàg, à ki kì lɛ ɓi kpaŋ ɓi rìkem ɗii lɛ sɛɛghisɛɛghi kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, ɓi kìnyàà ɓi ɗùm, 
rìgwey, rì m̀ɓɔg, rì ìtèɗ rì rìlàmì ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì m̀bobog à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì ǹghɛɓsì wìs, lɛ Yeesus Kiris, à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓi ɓi ghaghighà ɓìcèm à kpaŋ gɛɛ̀nɛ rì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Àpòkàliɓsɛ̀ à Yeesus Kiris, ànɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà nyi lɛ a resi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìlɛɛ di maa cààmɛ̀n à ghaghii, ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi à kìghà lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ yi, yɛ̀ɛ à romgày mum wiì à fìtom yɛ̀ɛ nkìì-kìsay wiì ànɛ lɛ Zyaŋ, 
Zyaŋ ànɛ̀n yɛɛ kalìghà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi à ghɛngà, fɔɔnnɛ à ghagsìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll rì ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ ɓi Yeesus Kiris à rèsìghà nyi.
Mààgh lɛ, rì roànɛ a ɓàɓày rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ wowog ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓɛ resii ɓi, ɓɛ ki nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì com ki ki ri kìkànɛn miì ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓyɛɛ kilɛn ki ti jàŋbog.
Zyaŋ yɛɛ kani Ɓìseŋi ɓi Kiris ɓi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ɓi ri a Azii. Ɓaana lɛ, rì geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog lɛ rìfa ɗi roànɛ à rì, ànɛ à ɓaghà, ànɛ a ki yùyuiy, rì mɛ̀ghay mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ mɛ rɛrɛlii ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì asu, 
rì lɛ rìfa ɗi Yeesus Kiris ànɛ à rì wusìnɛ̀ɗ à ǹtyweeyi, ànɛ à rì Man à ǹtonto ànɛ à lokà kìghèmɓɛɛ yi a ɓìloŋ, à ki ɓa ti nkɔ̀mɛ̀n mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ. Roànɛ a keesag ɓisi, roànɛ à kwèɗkà ɓìsi ɓi ɓìɓe ɓis rì bwaɓ yii, 
nyi yɛɛ ki kìghà lɛ ti ɓa kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìì, Yeesus ànɛ̀n yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ rì rìkem ɗì rìlàmì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ààmɛ̀n.
Ghɛɛna à rìì ɓi ɓìkwìɗ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì ghɛɛ̀, nsoò ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ tuɓkà nyi bèn. Fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ri seeghkɛɛ gɛ ɓisu wii. Ɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓaa gɛ fɔlɔɔ. Ààmɛ̀n. 
Kan Bɛ̀ll a kpaaghi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Alfà, rì Omegà, roànɛ à rì, ànɛ à ɓaghà, ànɛ a yùyuiy, roànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wucèm.
Mɛ̀ zyaŋ ànɛ ǹɗì geni wìn, ǹɗì rì gàɓ lɛ rì ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ, rì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll rì ɓi rìsììrɛ̀n ɗi ɓi Yeesus, m̀ɓaghà ɓi kìrìŋ ki riɓày ki lɛ Patmos ɓisuu righagsì ɗi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, ǹki tɛɛ̀zi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan ki Yeesus. 
Ǹghay à sɛngà ɓi mɛ̀ ŋwosi Kan fɔɔnnɛ  ǹwokà coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ gom ì ɗyam ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ rɔŋɗɔ̀ŋ, 
jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì kpaakpààghà lɛ: Kàna com ki ù ghɛɛ ɓi bimiɗ à kaàtà, u rom̀ kaàtà ànɛ̀n a Ɓìseŋi ɓi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi a Efɛɛzɛ, rì a Simirinɛ, rì a Pɛrigam, rì a Tyatiir rì a Saridɛ, rì a Filadɛlfii, rì a Lawodise.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹlɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà, ǹghɛn ŋwaànɛ à tòtòkà ànɛn rì mɛ̀. Yɛ̀ɛ ǹlɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà nni ǹghɛngà ɓyom ɓi ɓɛɛ̀ rɛsag lamɓà miì taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓì kìyɛn ɗi gol. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓyom ɓìn, rìkuu ɗi com ɗi ɓaghà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mum. À ɓaghà rì coo jɔmpàs, nyi tì ǹwaatɛn kànɗa à gol ɓi dwey. 
Ǹto wii rì tyòŋ tii, ɓi ɓaghà ɓìpuɓ yɛ̀ɛ nyùŋ yi jɔ̀ɔ̀ ìmpuɓ, nsoò lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìkwìɗ ki ki nɔɔ ɓi dɛ̀ɓ. Mis mɛ ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗòò wu ɗuu, 
mɛ̀kòò mii lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkuu ɗi swiɗ ɗiɗɛŋ ɗi ɓɛ ɓaŋzii ɓi ɗuu ɗi ghɛ̀g-ghɛ̀g, jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì i wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ coo boɓ ì rìɓày. 
À ɓanɓàngà tyɔɛy taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi càg kii ki weèlem, fɔɔnnɛ gàfàg ìnɛ ì ɓaghà ǹghɛliyɛn ɓɛɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm, ì kpaŋkpàŋgày nyi ɓi ŋwɔm, ìsu wii wu ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos a ɓalàg, cààmɛ̀n ki a lònlom ri ìtèɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛngà nyi, nni ǹkpìghà nyi a mɛ̀kòò yɛ̀ɛ kìloŋ. À saghìghà mɛ̀ càg kii ki weèlem ɓi nyoo, à kpaa lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ risi! 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri ŋwaà ǹtonto, mɛ̀ tì ŋwaà siitòn, roànɛ à rì cem. Ǹwughà, kìɓan kifog ǹɗì cem fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Ǹwowotii tìɗìɓà ti riwù rì ti a tɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Nni kàna min com ki wàa ghɛɛ, com ki ki ri, rì ki ki ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ ajɛ̀m ìnɛn. 
Ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀azi ɓɛ a rìnyam ɓɛ ɓi tyɔɛy ti kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ti wàa ghɛɛ mɛ̀ rì tyɔ ɓi càg ki weèlem, rì ɓìrɛsì ɓi lamɓà ɓi gol taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, tyɔɛy ti kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ti ri ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ Ɓiseŋi ɓi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓìrɛsì ɓi lamɓà ɓi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓyɔɔ ri Ɓìseŋi ɓi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓincèm. 
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki Kiris ki a Efɛɛzɛ lɛ: Roànɛ à wowotii tyɔɛy ti kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi weèlem wìì, roànɛ a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓìrɛsì ɓi lamɓà ɓi gol taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a kalag fɛlɛ̀:
Ǹ-yii mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ, ǹ-yii kìsay kɔɔ rì kìsììrì kɔɔ. Ǹ-yii lɛ ù yin lɛ ù cenɛ̀n ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓum, wɔ̀ɔ nfèèghrɛ̀ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ nkpaakpaa lɛ ɓɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛkɛ̀nì-fìtom, fɔɔnnɛ wɔ̀ɔ nghɛɛ lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà. 
Ù rì rì kìsììrì, wɔ̀ɔ ǹwoogh mɛ̀tɔɓ ɓisuu ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, kɔ̀ɔ ki càrɛn. 
Wɔ̀lɛ kìɓan ki ǹɗì wɔ̀ rì kɔ ki ri lɛ wɔ̀ɔ ncàri ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ù ɓaghà rì nyi ǹtonto. 
Yiti min jàŋ inɛ wɔ̀ɔ nkpìi, u lɔgti rìkì, ù tumɛn rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ù kìkìghà ǹtonto, kɛ̀ɛ̀ fɔlɔɔ di ǹɗì ɓiì yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, m̀pisì kìrɛsì ki lamɓà wɔ̀ɔ̀ jàŋ inɛ ki ri, di ù ɓèni kìcenɗɛɛ. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ kìɓan ki syeesyee ki ù rì rì kɔ ki ri lɛ, ù ɓèèzɛɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ Nikolayit mɛ mɛ ti mɛ ɓeɓkì girig mɛ̀.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali Ɓiseŋi ɓi Kiris, ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì yagsaagh innɛ ǹɗì ɓiì faà kìɗùn ki kite ki cɛɓ ki ki ri ɓi pàràɗis à Bɛ̀ll.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Simirinɛ lɛ: Mum ànɛ à rì lɛ nyi ŋwaà ǹtonto, nyi ŋwaà siitòn, mum ànɛ à wughà à ki ghèmɓɛn, a kpaaghi fɛlɛ:
Ǹ-yii ǹtɔɓ wu ɓɛɛ̀ kìki wɔ, rì kìsowà kɔɔ, kɔm̀ lɛ ù rì rì ìkum; ǹ-yii lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ reereŋɗɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ ri Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛɛ yooyogsì wɔ̀ ɗii; ɓɛ ri lɔŋ ntaŋzɛn wu Satàn. 
Kɔ̀ɔ risi ntɔɓ wu ù rì ɓiì tulɛɛ ri wɔ. Ghɛna lɛ Satàn a rì ɓiì pìigh kigwey ki ɓi mìni ɓi naà-zày lɛ a feèghrɛn mìni, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì tulɛɛ ri ǹ-yeesɛ̀n ànɛ à rì ɓiì finɛɛ mɛru ǹtɛ̀ɗ. Sììrɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n à kpaŋ a rìwu, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì faà tàm à cɛɓ.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Nghay a kakali ɓiseŋi ɓi Kiris, ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì yagsaagh innɛ rìwu ɗi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗyaa kòm ɓi.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi kìseŋi ki a Pɛrigam lɛ, fɛlɛ nnɛ roànɛ à rì rì gàfàg ìnɛ ì rì ǹto lɛ pyɔŋpyɔŋ, yɔ̀ mpooyɛn ɓɛɓɛg ɓɛ̀cèm a kalàg: 
Ǹ-yii jàŋ inɛ ù kɔ̀kɔrii, jàŋ inɛ̀n yɛɛ̀ nnɛ ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu Satàn wu rilàmì wu ri, kìɓan kifog ù rì lɔŋ ǹsììrɛn ɓi ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, ù roòzɛ̀ngà ɓi ntyweeyi wu ù rì rì wɔ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, nsoò ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ ɓɛ wolà wusìnɛ̀ɗ wɛ̀m à ǹtyweeyi ànɛ lɛ Antipas a lɔ̀ŋkin jàŋ inɛ Satàn a kɔ̀kɔrii. 
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, ǹɗì rì ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓi ɓeɓi mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀; ù rì foo ri ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì dɔgtɛ̀n ì Balam; Balam àa nɗèsàg Balag lɛ a ki com ki lɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl ɓɛɛ kɛɓtɛn fìɓàg lɛ ɓɛ ɗii ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm yi ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn, ɓɛ ki ɗiŋi ɓi rìkìkì ɗi tisɔ̀mɔ̀g. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ù rì girig foo ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ siìrɛɛ ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ì Nikolayit. 
Lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn min nɗem, kɛ̀ɛ̀ fɔlɔɔ di nkpaŋkpaŋ wɔ a nyoo lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ, ǹki ɗùùzi ɓumɓɛ̀n wɛ̀y ri gàfàg ìnɛ ì rì mɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali ɓiseŋi ɓi Kiris. Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì yagsaagh ǹfa nyi manà mɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀ nyamɛn, rì gɔ̀g ìmpuɓ; gɔ̀g ìnɛn ì rì rì ɗii ɗi nyɔn miì ɗìkànɛn ɗi ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ faa gɔ̀g ìnɛn.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki à Tyatiir lɛ: Fɛlɛ nnɛ Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ mis mɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗòò wu ɗuu, mɛ̀kòò yɛ̀ɛ rìkuu ɗi swiɗ ɗiɗɛŋ, a kalàg:
Ǹ-yii mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wɔ̀ɔ̀, ɗì rìgherɛ̀n ɗyɔɔ, rì càg kɔɔ ki kisay, rì kìsììrì kɔɔ, rì mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ mɛ siitòn mɛ mɛ teghɛɛ mɛ cee mɛ ǹtonto. 
Kìɓan kifog kìɓan ki ki ɓeɓi mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀ ki ri lɛ, ù ti ù càɗkì giɓ anɛ lɛ Zyezaɓɛl ànɛ à ti à kalàg lɛ à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ a reresi, à ki syòŋsyoŋ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛm lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗiŋi ɓi tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g ti kìkiyɛn, ɓɛ ki ɗiɗi ɓyɛn ɓi nyàm ìnɛ ɓɛ funɛɛ ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi ɓinùn. 
Ǹfaghà nyi cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ a lɔɔghrɛn ǹɗem, kìɓan kifog à kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ di àa lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ nɗem lɛ a caɗ ɓìɓan ɓi tifin ɓi a kìkì. 
Ghɛna, ǹ-yùu nyi kì nɔ̀ŋzii ɓi ɓyom ɓilɔ̀ŋ lɛ a wog rìkɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey kɛ̀ɛ̀ rìrɔ̀ɓ, lɛ rì nyi rì ɓumɓɛ à ti à kìlàg fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g rì ɓɔ; i ɓɛ lɔɔ̀ghrɛɛ nya mɛ̀rem ɓɛ caɗ mɛ̀kìkìì maa mɛǹ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki lɔɔ̀sɛ̀n. 
Ǹɗì ɓiì cuusii ɓɔn ɓii, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓìseŋi ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓiì yiì lɛ mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri roànɛ à ti à sɔ̀gì mɛ̀yitì rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓum ɓi mɛ̀rem ɓiɗùm, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì ɓiì lèɓi mum bimiɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mii mɛ ri. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkin, rì ɓum ɓɛmbog ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Tyatiir ɓɛ ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà ɓi dɔgtɛ̀n ìnɛ̀n, kɛ̀ ɓi ki tim lɛ ɓi yi com ki ɓɛ ti ɓɛ regì lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi Satàn ɓi rim, mɛ̀ ǹfoŋdii ɓi mini ǹtɛ̀g wudɛŋ. 
Kìɓan kifog, com ki ɓì rì rì kɔ kɛɛ̀ki ɓanina rì ìtèɗ, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì ɓiì yùu.
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì yagsaagh à ɓèŋ mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ mɛ ti mɛ kɔngì mɛ̀ à kpaŋ a rìsugtɛ̀n innɛ ǹɗì ɓiì faà ìtèɗ wu a lami ɓìlɔ̀ŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ à rì ɓyɔ ɓiì kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì rì ǹkpas wu bɔŋ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ weeyi bèè yi ɓɛ yeŋi rì fyòò, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ ǹtekà ìtèɗ wiǹ ɗì Seŋi wɛ̀m, 
fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì faà fyɛy fi fi ti fi lomgì sariwa. 
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali Ɓiseŋì.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Saridɛ lɛ, fɛlɛ nnɛ roànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀ghay mɛ Bɛ̀ll mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì tyɔɛy ti kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a kpaaghì: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ, u keŋkem lɛ ù rì cencem kɔm̀ lɛ ù rì kìloŋ. 
Kɔ̀ri ɗyomzɛ̀n ù ki sììrag righerɛ̀n ɗi gàɓ ì ɓum ìnɛ ù kaka rì yɔ̀, gàɓ ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ti jàŋbog ɗì rìwu, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀ɛ nghɛɛ lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ mɛ ɓiisɛɛ ɓi kirɔɔtɛɛ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Yiti min ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ù tekà rì ɓi ù wokà, ɓèŋa ɓyɔ ù ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn nɗem; i ù kɔ̀rii ɓi cem, di ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì yùu ki sìri kɔ̀ɔ ki yi ŋwos anɛ ǹɗì ɓiì yùu. 
Kìɓan kifog, ù rì rì ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ a Saridɛ ɓɛ ɓɛ nsiŋɗɛɛ ɓi tifin ɓi ɓìlàà ɓyaa; ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ri ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ nɗaŋ ɗi mɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì rìɓa ɗyɛ̀m.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì yagsaagh yɛɛ ri ɓiì waatɛɛ ɓilàà ɓi puɓ; màa tììsi ɓi ɗii ɗii ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ. Ǹɗì lɔŋ ɓiì gherɛɛ lɛ à rì mum wɛm̀ ɓi mis mɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m rì mɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali Ɓiseŋì.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Filadɛlfii lɛ: Roànɛ à rì lɛ nyi ǹtɛnɛn, nyi lɛ saaɗ, ànɛ à ki ɓanɓani fìɗìɓà fi Davit, nyi yɛɛ ri lɛ, i à ŋwàri, ŋwaàdɛŋ à yin lɛ à sìm, i à ki sìmi, ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ŋwàɗ, a kpaaghi lɛ: 
Ǹ-yii mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ. Ghɛna, mɛ̀ yɛɛ foŋi ìsuunaa wu wu ri kìkpaŋ asu wɔɔ, wɛɛ̀wu ŋwaàdɛŋ à yin lɛ à sìm ɓisuulɛ ù ɓiisɛɛ ɓi ki ɓaà rì ìtèɗ, kɔm̀ lɛ ù ɓègà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m kɔ̀ɔ ki roòzɛn mɛ. 
Ghɛna mɓiì faà wɔ̀ ɓumɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu Satàn ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ pwààpwàà, ɓɛ reèghrèŋɗɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛ ri Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ pwààpwàà. Ghɛna, ǹɗì ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓɛɛ yu wɔ̀ kìkuŋii a mɛ̀kòò, ɓɛ ki yi lɛ ǹkeesìghà wɔ̀. 
Lɛ ù ɓègà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m ɗì kìsììrì, fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀ girig ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓèŋi ɓi cààmɛ̀n à mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛ mɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùu ɓi ziinɛ bimiɗ lɛ mɛɛ feèghrɛn ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ tiì lɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ, sììri kìɓanì com ki ù rì rì kɔ, di ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ teɗ tàm wɔ̀ɔ̀ a rìkem. 
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì yagsaagh ǹkì nyi lɛ a ɓa rìkwìy ɗi ɓi naa ì Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m, fɔɔnnɛ àa kpaŋdii gɛ tì ɓi ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n. Ǹɗì ɓiì kàni ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m ɓi nyi, ɗii ɗi bàn ì Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m, bàn ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ ri myɔɔnyɔn à Yorisalɛm ànɛ a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, di à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì Bɛ̀ll wɛ̀m jàŋbog, ǹki kàn irig ɗii ɗyɛ̀m ɗi nyɔn ɓi nyi.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali Ɓiseŋì.
Kàna ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Lawodise lɛ: ŋwaànɛ à rì ɗii lɛ Ààmɛ̀n, ànɛ à rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à wusìnɛ̀ɗ à ǹtyweeyi, roànɛ à rì rìtumɛ̀n ɗi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà a kpaaghi lɛ: 
Ǹ-yii mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ, ù rì lɛ, kɔ̀ɔ kèŋmɛn, kɔ̀ɔ ki tɔ̀n. I wàa ka rì ɓà lɛ ù kèŋmɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ ù tɔ̀n. 
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ù rì lɛ yaɓì yaɓì kɔ̀ɔ kèŋmɛn, kɔ̀ɔ ki tɔ̀n, ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì loghii a ŋwɔm. 
Ɓisuulɛ u kpaakpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì guŋgum, m̀mɛ kum, com ki kaarɛɛ tì ɓi mɛ, kɔ̀ɔ ki yi lɛ ù rì nyìighnyìg ì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, wɔ̀ soghàsogha, wɔ̀ ɗyaŋɗyàŋ, wɔ̀ kìtòn zɛy; 
nni ǹɗeɓi wɔ̀ lɛ u lag gol ìnɛ ɗuu ɗi ghaŋzii a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, di fɔɔnnɛ u ɓa rì ìkum, ù làg girig ɓìlàà ɓi puɓ lɛ u waàtɛn ɓyɔ, di ǹtoòrìɗ wɔɔ wulɛ ù rì kìtòn zɛy wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛnɛn; ù ki làg boòboo ìnɛ lɛ u foŋɗɛn ɓi mis di fɔɔnnɛ u ghɛnɛn. 
Lɛ ǹti ǹfwààdàg, ǹki ɓoki ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ǹkeesii, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ falɛn ɓi rìgherɛ̀n rì ìtèɗ, ù ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn nɗem. 
Ghɛna, ǹɗɛrɛlii asuunaa, m̀ɓoɓòg kìsìm, nni i mum à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, à nɛm mɛ̀ ìsuunaa, ǹɗì ɓiì ɗiŋii a lɔ̀ŋkii rì mɛ̀ rì nyi tì ɗi ǹɗaŋ.
Ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì yagsaagh ǹkì lɛ a kɔri ǹɗaŋ ri mɛ̀ ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wɛm̀ wu rilàmì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yagsàkà ǹkɔ̀rì ǹɗaŋ ri Seŋi wɛ̀m ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì mɛ̀reè à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì woògh com ki Ǹghay a kakali Ɓiseŋì.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ m̀pɛ̀ɓsɛ̀ngà, ǹghɛn ìsuunaa kìkpaŋ ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ǹtonto ìnɛ ǹwokà di ì tòòghrɛɛ rì mɛ̀ ì ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ ɗyam ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ rɔŋɗɔ̀ŋ ì kpaakpàà lɛ: Ɓɔghay fɛ di nɗesi wɔ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ asu.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ǹghay à ghàskà kìsɛnì ɓi mɛ̀, ǹghɛn ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wɔɔ ɓi ɗyoo, mum miì ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn. 
Ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà ànɛn ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì à ɓaghà ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g yi lònlomɛn yi lɛ rì Zyaspɛ̀ rì Sàrìdwanà; fɔɔnnɛ ǹsyèɗ wu wu lonlòmgà ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ èmèroòdɛ̀ wu ceŋzɛ̀ngà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wuncèm.
Mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ rilàmì mɛdɛŋ rìtin ɗì mɛnin mɛ ceŋzɛ̀ngà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu ǹtonto; ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum rìtin ɗì ɓinin ɓi ɓaghà ɓìkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛn, ɓi waatɛ̀n ɓìlàà ɓi puɓ, ɓyɔ tì rì ɓɛ̀tàm ɓɛ gol ɓi mɛ̀to.
Ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wiǹ, ŋwàaŋwàɗ à ŋwàŋwàɗkà, gom, rì baàbàn ɓi fafàŋìghày miì. Ɓɛ̀lamɓà taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ roòròò lɛ pàŋ pàŋ asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, ɓɛ̀lamɓà ɓɛǹ ɓɛ ri mɛ̀ghay mɛ Bɛ̀ll mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Tì tì fɛlɛ asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, jàŋ i ghay lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìɓày ànɛ à rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii, ì lònlòm yɛ̀ɛ maa kìpɛsà à ŋwii. Ɓi nyìinyìm à ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì rì ɓi mɛ̀wɔŋì, nyàm yi ɓaghà yinin, yɔ yì ronɛn ri mis jàŋ bimiɗ lɛ, rì asu rì ajɛ̀m. 
Nyàm ì ǹtonto ì pisɛ̀ngà kìmonɗo, ì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀rɛn ì pisɛ̀n man à sanìnya, ì kìraa ì ɓaghà rì ìsu yɛ̀ɛ wu mum, nyàm ì kìnìn ì ɓa yɛ̀ɛ bèè i fììlì ìnɛ yɛɛ̀ lɛŋlɛ̀ŋ. 
Nyàm yi kinìn yiǹ yi ɓalàkà lɛ, nyàm bog mɛ̀keɓ taàfog, yɔ̀ mis nyoo bimiɗ lɛ rì ɓi ɗùm, rì ɓi ɓyàs. Fɔɔnnɛ yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, ɓɛ fɔli ɓi rikakàlì lɛ: Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm à rì ǹtɛnɛn, à rì ǹtɛnɛn, à rì ǹtɛnɛn, Bɛ̀ll ànɛn yɛɛ, ɓaghà nnyɛɛ ri nnyɛɛ̀ ki yùyuiy.
Nni cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ki nyàm yiǹ yi fafàghà roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, ànɛ à rì cem fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ, rì rìkem, rì bɔgsɛ̀n, 
ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum ɓi ritin ɗì ɓinin ɓi nti ɓi kuŋɗàg roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì asu, ɓi ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì roànɛ a ghɛghɛɓ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓi nagì ɓɛ̀tàm ɓaa asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì di ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: 
Wɔ̀ Kan wìs, Bɛ̀ll wìs, ù ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ, ɗì rìkem, rì bɔgsɛ̀n, rì ìtèɗ, ɓisuulɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ kighà ɓyom ɓìcèm, yɛ̀ɛ ki kɔngà wɔ̀ lɛ ɓyom ɓìn ɓyɛɛ ɓa, nnɛ ɓi kilɛ̀ngà.
Nni ǹghɛngà ɓi weèlem à roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, kaàtà àdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkànɛn lɛ rì ɓi ɗùm rì ɓi ɓyàs, ɓɛ̀sìtam̀ miì ɓɛ̀ ɓaatiyɛn taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Nni ǹghɛngà kìtèetèɗ ki ŋwaà-fìtom di kɛɛ̀ làalamɓɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ à ŋwàɗ kaàtà, à ɓɛkì ɓɛ̀sìtam̀ ɓɛ miì? 
Kìɓan kifog nsoò ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, nsoò ɓi ziinɛ, nsoò ɓi ziinɛ a zi, ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà ɓi ri ìtèɗ wulɛ à ŋwàɗ kaàtà ànɛn nsoò lɛ à seesèè nyi. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗèngà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓisuulɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ à ŋwàɗ kaàtà ànɛn nsoò lɛ à seesèè nyi à ɓaghà ɓi. 
Nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum ki kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ rènɗen! Ghɛna, kìmonɗo ki a Zyuda, dòò ì Davit ì mɛ yagsàg, ì rì ɓiì ŋwàri kaàtà, ì ɓɛ̀kì ɓɛ̀sìtam̀ ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ di à rɛrɛlii ɓi nyìinyìm à ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, ɓi nyìinyìm à nyàm yi kinìn, rì ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum. Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛn à ɓaghà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à rì ǹwolɛn, à ɓaghà mɛ̀tɔŋ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, rì mis taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀; mis mɛ̀n mɛ ri mɛ̀ghay mɛ Bɛ̀ll mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ à romgày ɓi ziinɛ bimiɗ. 
Nni à yùghà, à teɗ kaàtà ànɛ à ɓaghà ànɛ̀n ɓi weèlem à roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à ghàɓkà kaàtà, nyàm yi kinìn, rì ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum ɓi ritin ɗì ɓinin, ɓi kuŋìghà Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ asu, mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi ɓɔ, à ɓaghà ɓi càg lɛ rì fìloŋ rì ɓeŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkìyɛn ri gol, ǹɗonɛn rì tìrààre ti ti ri bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ghìghà fyem fi nyɔn di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ù teɗ kaàtà ànɛ̀n, ù ɓɛkì ɓɛ̀sìtam̀ ɓɛ miì, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ wolà wɔ̀, ù ki kwèɗ ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm, ɓìtòkì ɓìcèm, mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll rì bwaɓ yɔɔ. 
Ù kìghà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa bimiɗ à kìlɔ̀ŋ, ɓɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ri ɓiì làmii ziinɛ.
Nni ǹseesèèghà, ǹwog jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì kìtuu ki ɓum ɓɛ titom ki ki ceŋzɛ̀ngà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì nyàm rì ɓìtùg ɓi ɓum; ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm lɛ ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin kɛ̀ɛ̀ bàlì. 
Ɓɛ laàlàmɓɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ ɓɛ wolà à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì terì ìtèɗ wu rilàmì, rì ìkum, rì ɗyomzɛ̀n, rì ìtèɗ, rì bɔgsɛ̀n, rì rìkem, rì mɛ̀sɛɛ̀ghsɛɛgh.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà di ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kìghà ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, rì ɓi ziinɛ, rì ɓi ziinɛ a zi, rì ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri miì ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì rì Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ìtèɗ wu rilàmì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ nyàm yi kinìn yi ghaɓkà lɛ Ààmɛ̀n. Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹseesèèghà; yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ŋwàɗkà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀sìtam̀ ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ǹwog kìbog ki ɓi nyàm yi kinìn di ki toòghrɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ baàbàn, kì kpaa lɛ: Yu. 
Nni ǹghɛ̀ngà zòm i kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀ ìmpuɓ. Ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà miì aɗyoo à ɓaghà rì bàsàg; ɓɛ fa nyi tàm à rìkem, à kɛ̀n fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹceeyɛn wɛ̀y lɛ a ki yagsàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ǹwog di nyàm ì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ i kpaa lɛ: Yu. 
Fɔɔnnɛ zòm i kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀ ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ì ɓàŋɓàŋgà yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu, ì kpagày, ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà miì aɗyoo à teɗ ìtèɗ wulɛ a pisi fyòoog ɓi ziinɛ di ɓum ɓɛɛ woòwòòsɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ faghà nyi coo gàfàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìraa, ǹwog di nyàm ì kìraa ì tòòghrɛɛ ì kpaa lɛ, Yu. Nni ǹghɛngà zòm i ǹfin, ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà miì aɗyoo à ɓanɓàngà kilò ɓi càg. 
Ǹwokà gom ìdɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kali lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ tòtog ɓi nyìinyìm à nyàm yi kinìn di yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Mità à gèŋ bog, ɓi mɛ̀lèɓ mɛ mɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì kìsay ki ɓi bimiɗ à ŋwos, ɓɛ̀mità ɓɛ rikuu ɗi gèŋ ɗidɛŋ ɓɛraa ɓisuu mɛlèɓ mɛ kisay ki bimiɗ à ŋwos; ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a mɔ̀ɔ rì mɛ̀rɔ̀g kɔ̀ɔ kòm ɓyɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìnìn, ǹwog di nyàm ì kìnìn ì kpaa lɛ: Yu! 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà zòm i kìmbɛ̀rɛ̀; nyoo ì zòm inɛ̀n ì ɓaghà ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ rùnì. Ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà miì aɗyoo ɗii lɛ rìwu, kìlɔ̀ŋ ki nyɔ̀ɛ̀y ki nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìì nyi ajɛ̀m. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ faghà ɓɔ ìtèɗ ɓi kìlànà kìfog ki ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi zi ɓi kinìn lɛ ɓɛɛ cuùsi ɓum lɛ rì gàfàg, rì zày, rì tìroɓ ti ceeceèrɛ̀n, rì nyàm yi ɓaaɓanɛ̀n yi ɓi ziinɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìtaǹ, nni ǹghɛngà mɛ̀ghay mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ cuusìghà ɓisuu jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓisuu riɓa ɗyaa ɗi ɓɛ resìghà lɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ Kiris. Mɛ̀ghay mɛ̀n mɛ ɓaghà ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ntɔ̀ngì ɓìtuwe ɓi riɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll fɛlɛ yì azi. 
Ɓɛ nyàmgà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Wɔ̀ Kan ànɛ ù rì ǹtɛnɛn, ù ki ɓa kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll, ù rì ɓiì ɓooɓoŋ̀zì ɓɛ̀yɔ̀m, ɗì rìrɔ̀ŋ ɗi bwaɓ yis yi ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ yogsìghà à kpaŋ fin? 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ falàkà ɓɔ ɓɛ̀kàɓà ɓɛ puɓ ɓɛ tɔg ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ ka ɓoŋdi ti lɛ tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀ maa cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ bàlì ì ɓɛ̀reŋkàŋ ɓaa ɓɛ kisay rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓaa ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì cuusii fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ cuusìghà ɓɔ, yɛ̀ɛ raɗ.
Nni ǹghɛngà yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìtaàfog, fɔɔnnɛ zi i nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà lɛɛ̀gwey, ŋwos a lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n ǹfin yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà ki lɛ mɛ̀rin, ŋwii à sug bimiɗ lɛ zyɔŋŋ yɛ̀ɛ bwaɓ. 
Tyɔɛy ti aɗyoo ti ki kɔ̀ɔkɔsɛ̀n yì di tyɛɛ̀ rààraa ɓi zi lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗyèm wu firònì wu coo bɛ̀ɓ yɛ̀ɛ nyɛ̀ɛnyɛŋzì wu ti wu raàsàg tìrònì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɗyoo ɗi ghɛŋìghà yɛ̀ɛ kaàtà ànɛ ɓɛ taagh yɛ̀ɛ kìkàrà; dòn yìcèm, rì ɓìrìŋ ɓi riɓày ɓi pɛsàg ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ ɓyɔ. 
Mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, rì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓum, ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà, ɓɛ̀guŋgum, ɓɛ̀tèteɗ, ɓɛ̀kpàn ɓɛ̀cèm rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛkpàn, ɓɛ nyamzàkà lɛ rì ɓi bùù rì ɓi bagsɛn yi mɛɓan mɛ ɓi dòn. 
Di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa dòn rì mɛ̀ɓan lɛ: Kpìlaaghna ɓìsi ɓi nyoo, ɓi lɔg ɓìsi di tyɛ̀ ki wuɓsɛn ti ìsu wu roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, tyɛ̀ ki ki wuɓsɛn ribaŋì ɗi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀; 
ɓisuulɛ coo ŋwos a rìbaŋì ɗyaa a mɛ kpaŋ, nni ghɛn yɛɛ ri ɓiì cenɛɛ?
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nni ǹghɛngà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛnin ɗi ɓɛ rɛrɛlii ɓi mɛ̀fon mɛ zi mɛ kinìn mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, lɛ di bɛ̀ɓ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kì ɓi ziinɛ nsoò ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, nsoò ɓi kìte kifog. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ di a ɓɔɓɔg yi ɓɛg ànɛ ŋwos a ti à kpagìì, à ɓanɓàn yì sìtam̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì cem ɓi càg. Nni à nyàmgà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo, a kpaa kìnìn ki ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ tekà ìtèɗ wulɛ, ɓɛɛ ki ziinɛ, ɗì rìɓày à kìkòn ǹtɔɓ lɛ: 
Kɛ̀ ɓi kòm zi lɛ ɓi ki yɔ̀ kiɓe; nsoò rìɓày à kìkòn, nsoò ɓìte, di tì ka legsi ɓi kirèmzaagh mɛsu mɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll wìs ri sìtam̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà bàlì ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ remzàkà rì sìtam̀; ɓi mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm mɛ a Isirayɛl, ɓum ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin. 
Ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Zyuda, ɓum ɓɛ rèmziyɛn ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Ruɓɛn, ɓum ɓɛ rèmziyɛn ɓɛtɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Gaad ɓum ɓɛ rèmziyɛn ɓɛtɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; 
ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Azɛr ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Nɛftalii ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Manase ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; 
ɓi rìpwìɗ ɗi Simeyɔŋ ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Levi ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Isakar, ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; 
rìpwìɗ ɗi Zaɓulon, ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Yoosɛɓ ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀; rìpwìɗ ɗi Bɛŋzyamɛŋ ɓum ɓɛ rèmziyɛn ri sìtam̀ ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ǹghɛngà coo kituu ki ɓum ki mum à ɓaghà ɓi lɛ à ɓày, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛsàkày ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm, rì ɓi mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm, rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, rì ɓìtòkì ɓìcèm; ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì ɓi mis mɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ waatàg ɓɛ̀kàɓà ɓɛ puɓ, ɓɛ ki ɓa ri maŋ ɓi ɓyàg. 
Ɓɛ kpaàkpàgsɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ǹghɛɓsɛn wu ti wu ɓalàg yì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll wìs anɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì yɛ̀ɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ceŋzɛ̀ngà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum, rì nyàm yi kinìn; ɓɛ ɓakàkà mɛ̀su ɓi zi asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll, 
di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ààmɛ̀n, bɔgsɛ̀n, rìkem, ɗyomzɛ̀n, ɓìtògsɛ̀n, nyaasɛ̀n, ìtèɗ wu rilàmì, rì ìtèɗ wu zɛy, ɓi ri ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll wìs fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ Ààmɛ̀n.
Nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum ki tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ki kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ waataagh ɓìlàà ɓi puɓ ɓɛ, ɓɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀ghɛn? 
Nni m̀ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Kan wɛ̀m wɔ̀ yɛɛ yii! Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ pɛsɛɛ yì ɓi jàŋ yi ǹ-yeesɛ̀n à ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n à rì lɛɛ̀gwey. Ɓɛ sooghà ɓɛ̀ kàɓà ɓaa ɓɛ ki puɓsi ɓɔ ɓi bwaɓ yi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ rɛrɛlii miì asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki ɓɔɔɓɔgsì nyi yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos ɓi naa yìì. Yɛ̀ɛ roànɛ à rì ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, à rì toŋ kìnuugh kii à foŋ ɓɔ miì. 
Ɓaa wogtii gɛ ɓi zày, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wogti kinɔli nsoò ŋwos kɛ̀ɛ ɓogti ɓɔ, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki wogti nsoò cɔ̀ɔ̀zɛ̀n. 
Ɓisuulɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi nyìinyìm à ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì à rì ɓɔ ɓiì mɛnii à kɛ̀n ɗì ɓɔ ɓi jàŋ yi ɓɛ̀ǹsim ɓɛ mɛnig ɓɛ cɛɓ ɓɛ ri. Bɛ̀ll à ki tɔ̀sag misì mɛ ɓɔ ɓi mis mɛ̀cèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ŋwàɗkà sìtam̀ à kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ɗyoo ɗi maarɛ̀ngà lɛ fyòoog, à kpaŋ nunùg kìden ki cààmɛ̀n.
Nni ǹghɛngà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ faghà ɓɔ mam taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ à yùghà kì rɛlii ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓituwe lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll rì ɓyɔ, à ɓanɓàngà maa cɔɔgh anɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi firu miì, maa cɔɔgh àǹcèm à ɓaghà ǹkìyɛn ɗi gol. Ɓɛ faghà ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ̀n tìrààre lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ a ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll rì tyɔ, bas rì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n, ɓi com ki ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓituwe miì, ki ki ɓaghà Bɛ̀ll asu, ki ɓa kìkiyɛn ɗi gol. 
Fɔɔnnɛ fìsilì fi ɓyom ɓi lɛ rì tìrààre rì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓi syooghà ɓi càg ki ŋwaà-fìtom, fi ɓɔg Bɛ̀ll asu. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a tekà maa cɔɔgh anɛ ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi firu miì ànɛ̀n, à roòzì nyi rì ɗuu ɗi ɗi ɓaghà ɓi com ki ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓyom miì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll, à pìg nyi ɓi zi; fɔɔnnɛ baàbàn ì tumɛ̀ngà rìɓoɓòg, ɓyoo gom ɓi ghaghààgh, ŋwàaŋwàɗ à kìkì, zi i nyɛ̀ɛ̀nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓum ɓɛ titom ki ki ɓaghà rì mam ki ɓuŋɛ̀ngà lɛ kɛɛ rɔŋ mɔ.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a ǹtonto à rɔgà ɗyam, bol ì gɔ̀g rì ɗuu, ɓì ɓùtakɛn ɗi bwaɓ ɓi suùrɛ̀n ɓi zi; fɔɔnnɛ ki kighà lɛ kìlànà ki zi kifog ki ɓi ɓìlànà ɓiraa ki ɗig, gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓìte ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓi ɗig, ɓyaaɓi ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ɓaghà cem ɓi ɗig.
Ŋwaàfìtom a kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a rɔŋ ɗyam, ɓɛ pig rìkuu ɗi coo dòn diɗɛŋ ɗi ɗi roòròòghà, ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi mɛ̀nig mɛcèm mɛ ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn ì ghalà bwaɓ, 
gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn ì cuughà, gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓìkɔm ɓìcèm ì ɗyogà.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom à kìraa à rɔgà ɗyam, coo fyɛy fi kɔsɛ̀n yì aɗyoo, fi roòròò yɛ̀ɛ baɓ; fyɛy fiǹ fi kpighà ɓi gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓɛ̀rìɓày rì mɛ̀syòm mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Fyɛy fiǹ fi ɓaghà ɗii lɛ kìte ki lòlolɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ cuughà ɓi rìnɔ ɗi ɓɛ nɔnɔ̀ghà mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ sukà mɛǹ kìlòloli yɛ̀ɛ ɓaŋ.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kìnìn à rɔgà ɗyam, kìlànà kìfog ki ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi ŋwos ɓi kiraa, rì kìfog ki ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi ŋwii ɓi kiraa, rì gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi tyɔɛy ticèm, ɓi ɓuɓìghà; gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi rìlònlòm ɗi ɓyom ɓìn, ì ghaɓɓɛ̀n; fɔɔnnɛ gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn ki ŋwos i ɓuɓìghà, ki kilɛ̀n tì girig fɔlɔɔ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ à-ru. 
Nni ǹseesèèghà tì, ǹwog di bèè i fììlì yɛɛ̀ lɛŋlɛŋ ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, ì kpaakpàà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Nyìighnyìg! Nyìighnyìg! Nyìighnyìg rì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓisuu gom ì mam mɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kiraa ɓɛ siitòn ɓɛ ri ɓiì rɔŋì.
Ŋwaàfìtom a kìtaǹ à rɔgà ɗyam; fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà fyɛy fi fi kɔsɛ̀ngày aɗyoo fi kpi ɓi zi; nni ɓɛ tekà fìɗìɓà fi ɓi coo riɓee ɗi rimɛn, ɓɛ fa rì fyɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ fyɛy fi ŋwaɗkà coo riɓee ɗiǹ. Coo fisilì fi tumɛ̀n rìsyoo ɓi rìɓee ɗiǹ lɔn yɛ̀ɛ fìsilì fi fi riì ɓi kìgɛ̀ŋ ki ɗuu, fìsilì fiǹ fi fiìzì lɛ rì ŋwos rì bɛ̀ɛ̀bɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Ɓìtàtàɗ ɓi kpagày ɓi fìsilì fiǹ, ɓi saàtɛ̀n ɓi zi, nni ɓɛ faghà ɓìtàtàɗ ɓiǹ ìtèɗ wu wu pisɛɛ rì ìtèɗ wu tìrèè ti zi. 
Ɓɛ kpaa ɓìtàtàɗ ɓiǹ lɛ, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kòm caaɓi ki ɓi ziinɛ nsoò kìfog, nsoò kìtìbag, nsoò kìte kidɛŋ, lɔŋ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi sìtam̀ à Bɛ̀ll ɓisu ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi kiɓe ɓɔ rì ɓɔ. 
Ɓɛ faghà ɓi ɓyɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓyɛɛ cuusi ɓumɓɛ̀n, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ faghà ɓyɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓyɛɛ wogsi ɓɔ rìkɛŋ ɓɛ̀bimiɗ ɓɛ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛtaǹ, nni rìkɛŋ ɗi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì wogsii ɓum ɗi ri rìkɛŋ ɗi mum à ti à wokì di fìrèè fi taɓi nyi. 
Ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀n, ɓum ɓɛ ri kaakaa gɛ bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ wu, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛn ki kɔnkɔ̀n ɓɔ lɛ ɓɛɛ cuu, wɔ̀lɛ rìwu ɗi ghɛŋì ɓɔ fìràɓ. 
Ɓìtàtàɗ ɓiǹ ɓi ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ yi yi ri yì pègsɛn lɛ yɛɛ kɛǹ wɛ̀y. Mɛ̀to mɛ ɓyɔ mɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀tàm ɓɛ rikem ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ gol, mɛ̀su mɛ ɓyɔ mɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀su mɛ ɓum. 
Ɓi ɓaghà rì tyòŋ yɛ̀ɛ tyòŋ ti giɓ, ɓyɔ rì min yɛ̀ɛ mɛ kimonɗo. 
Dwey yi ɓitàtàɗ ɓiǹ yi ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ yi ri yì pàmgakɛn ri bɔŋ; mɛ̀keɓ mɛ ɓyɔ mɛ kikì gom lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓyalig ɓi kìtuu ki zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ yɛɛ̀ tùtug mɛ̀ree rì mɛ̀ree lɛ yɛɛ kɛǹ kì ɗùu wɛ̀y. 
Ɓìtàtàɗ ɓiǹ ɓi ɓalàkà rì mɛ̀ghey mɛ mɛ pisɛ̀ngà rì tìrèè, mɛ̀ghey mɛncèm mɛ ɓalàg rì ɓìlɔ̀ɔ̀, nni ɓi mɛ̀ghey mɛ̀n innɛ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ wogsi ɓum rìkɛŋ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛtaǹ, wu ɓaghà. 
Rìfòm ɗi ɓitàtàɗ ɓiǹ ɗi ri ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ ɓi rìɓee ɗi rimɛn anɛ à rì ɗii ɓi rì Ebìreegh lɛ Aɓadon, ɓi rìgìrɛg lɛ Apolyɔŋ .
Ǹtɔɓ wu ǹtonto wu mɛ ghaàgh, nni wɔ̀lɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛdɛŋ mɛɓɛɛ̀ mɛ ri tìì ajɛ̀m ì wiǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàfog à rɔgà ɗyam, ǹwog di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì pɛ̀sɛɛ yì ɓi mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛ kinìn mɛ ɓi com ki gol rì gol ki ɓɛ ntɔ̀ngì ɓyom miì ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, com kìn kɛɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà Bɛ̀ll asu. 
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì kpaa ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàfog anɛ à ɓaghà rì ɗyam lɛ: Fùmi ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kinìn ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kàgakɛn bɛn ɓi coo riɓày ànɛ lɛ Efirat. 
Nni ɓɛ fumìghà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kinìn ɓɛǹ, ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ ɓùŋɛn ɓisuu cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, rì gòn inɛ̀n, rì ŋwii ànɛ̀n, rì bèg ìnɛn, lɛ ɓɛɛ cuùsi gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Bàlì ì ɓɛ̀ɗùù wɛ̀y inɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓɛsujàà wu wu ɓaghà rì zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ ì ɓaghà ɓum ɓɛ̀mìlìyɔŋ ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ǹwokà di ɓɛ faa bàlì ì ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛǹ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi ǹseesèèghà ɓiǹ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìdɛ̀ndɛm, ǹghɛngà zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà miì aɗyoo; ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀pàmɓɛn dwey rì bɔŋ yi yi ɓaghà lɛ yɔ yì ɓàŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu, yɔ bùrum ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g ìnɛ lɛ yàsɛŋtɛ̀, yɔ tì ɓi mis yɛ̀ɛ ǹdùsi. Mɛ̀to mɛ zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ yiǹ mɛ ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀to mɛ ɓimonɗo, fɔɔnnɛ ɗuu rì fìsilì rì ǹdùsi ɓi fafàŋìghày yɔ ɓi myɔm. 
Ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓyom ɓi kiraa ɓi lɛ rì ɗuu rì fìsilì rì ǹdùsi ɓi ɓi kpaŋkpàŋgày ɓi myɔm mɛ zòm, ɓi cuusìghà gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ɓisuulɛ ìtèɗ wu zòm yiǹ wu ri lɛ rì ɓi myɔm rì ɓi mɛ̀ghey; mɛ̀ghey mɛ yɔ mɛ ri yɛ̀ɛ nyoo, mɔ rì mɛ̀to, mɛ̀to mɛ̀n mɛɛ̀mɛ mɛ̀ghey mɛ̀n mɛ ri lɛ mɛ ki kìɓe miì. 
Ɓum ɓɛmɓog ɓɛ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓyom ɓìn ɓi cuusìghà ɓi, ɓɛ ɓengà kìlɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛrem lɛ ɓɛɛ caɗ ɓìnùn ɓi ɓɔmiɗ ɓɔ yɛɛ syaagh rì ɓyàg ɓyaa; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà lɔŋ beèbɛ̀y ɗì rìɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì ɗi ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, rì ɓìnùn ɓi ɓi ri ɓì syaghɛn ri gol nsoò lɛ rì swiɗ à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nsoò lɛ rì bɔŋ idɛŋ, nsoò lɛ rì gɔ̀g, nsoò lɛ rì kìte; ɓìnùn ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ yin lɛ ɓi ghɛnɛ̀n, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wooghrɛn, ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki kɛ̀ɛ̀ghi. 
Ɓɛ ɓengà kì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛrem lɛ ɓɛɛ caɗ rìwowèy ɗi ɓum, rì ɓìɓan ɓi kifuu rì tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì wii.
Nni ǹghɛngà kìtèetèɗ ki ŋwaà-fìtom kidɛŋ di kɛɛ̀ sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, kì waatɛn kikwìɗ, ǹsyèɗ wu ɓaghà nyi wu gheniyɛn ɓi nto, ìsu wu lonlòm yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, mɛ̀kòò mii mɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kwìy mɛ ɗùù. 
À ɓaghà rì maa kaàtà ǹŋwàrɛn ɓi càg; à kìghà lɛ, à rɛsì ìkòò wii wu weèlem ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, wu kimɛŋ ɓi zi ì zɛy, 
nni à nyàmgà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kìmonɗo kɛɛ̀ nyàmgì, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à nyàmgà fɔlɔɔ, baàbàn yi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ yi ɓog, gom ì ghaàgh. 
Yɛ̀ɛ baàbàn yi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ yi ɓokà fɔlɔɔ, m̀mɛɛ̀ kìghà lɛ nkaǹ, nni ǹwokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ di ì rìì aɗyoo lɛ: Nyama kìɓan ki baàbàn yi kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ yi kpaa kìn, kɔ̀ɔ kàn kɔ. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹɗɛrɛliyɛn lɛ ìkòò wu ɓi rìɓày, wumbog a cɛɗ, à pɛ̀sìghà weèlem wìì aɗyoo; 
fɔɔnnɛ à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ ɓi ɗii ɗi roànɛ a ghɛghɛɓ fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ànɛ à kìghà ɗyoo rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ri miì, à kì lɛ rì zi rì ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri miì, à kì lɛ rì rìɓày à kìkòn, rì ɓyom ɓi ɓi ri miì; à kànɛ̀ngà bɛ̀ɗ lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ ɓuŋɛn kaa ɓa ti ɓi, 
kìɓan kifog ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì ɓiì wooghrɛɛ, di à ti lɛ à tumɛ̀n ɗìrɔŋ ɗi ɗyam, innɛ fèg à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a ɓalag nyamɛn à ɓiì ronì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ à wogsìghà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ ɓi fèg ànɛn rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii. 
Nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ǹwokà di ì rìì aɗyoo ì tòòghrɛ̀ngà tì rì mɛ̀ fɛlɛ̀: Kɛ̀na, u teɗ maa kaàtà ànɛ à rì ǹŋwàrɛn ɓi càg ki ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ à rì ǹɗɛrɛliyɛn lɛ rì ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn rì a cɛɗ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ̀n ǹkpaa nyi lɛ a fa mɛ̀ maa kaàtà àncèm; nni à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Tera nyi, u miǹ, à rì wɔ̀ ɓiì lòloli ɓi mɛ̀ɗyɔɔ, kìɓan kifog à yɛ̀yɛ̀y wɔ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm yɛ̀ɛ mɔ̀ɔ mɛ ilòò. 
Nni ǹtekà maa kaàtà ànɛ̀n ɓi càg ki ŋwaà-fìtom m̀mìn nyi; à ɓaghà mɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔm yɛ̀ɛ mɔ̀ɔ mɛ ilòò, nni yɛ̀ɛ m̀mìngà nyi, mɛ̀ɗyɔɔ mɛ̀m mɛ tumɛ̀n rìlòlòèy. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ u kpaŋzi tì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓi seesee mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey, rì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ lɛɛ̀gwey, rì mɛ̀fòm lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni ɓɛ faghà min mɛ kìsyòŋ ki ki ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ kìgeŋ, ɓɛ kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Kɛ̀na u feg lɛ rì naà-Bɛ̀ll, rì com ki ɓɛ ti ɓɛ tɔngì ɓìtuwe miì, ù ɓày ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll wɔɔ ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a nlɛmɓog wu ɓi dan, càra wɔ, kɔ̀ɔ fèg ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ faghà wɔ rì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi zɛy; ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ ri ɓɛɛ̀dag bàn ì ǹtɛnɛn ɓɛ̀ŋwii mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹfaa gɛ ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛm ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ kpaŋzi ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll mɛ̀ru tɔɔsìm ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ rì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛraa. 
Ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛǹ ɓɔ yɛɛ ri mɛ̀ɗyèm mɛ olìvìyee mɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓìrɛsì ɓi lamɓà ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ɓi rɛrɛlii ɓi mis mɛ Kan à ziinɛ. 
Nni i mum à kɔ̀ni lɛ a ki ɓɔ kìɓe, ɗuu ɗi kpaŋ yì ɓɔ ɓi myɔm, ɗi ɗigsì ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓaa. Rìkuu ɗi riwù ɗìn ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi mum ǹcèm ànɛ à kɔ̀ni lɛ a ki ɓɔ kìɓe a rì ɓiì wiì. 
Ɓɛ ri rì ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ sim ɗyoo lɛ bwey yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔ, ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaŋzì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll; ɓɛ ki ɓa ri ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ghaàsi mɛ̀nig bwaɓ, ɓɛ ki ɓa ri ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ rom yì rìkuu ɗi ntɔɓ ɗìcèm ɗi ɓɛ kɔni ɓi ziinɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaa gɛ di ɓaa lègsi ki rèsii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛ yùu gɛ kì rèsii, fɔɔnnɛ nyàm ìnɛ ì kpaŋiì gɛ ɓi rìɓee ɗi rim ì faa gɛ ɓɔ rìbaŋì, ì cee ɓɔ ɓi-tèɗ, ì ki cuusi ɓɔ. 
Nni ɓìloŋ ɓyaa ɓi cɛnɛɛ gɛ ɓi nlɛmɓog wu coo bàn ìgwey inɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi ɓi mɛ̀ghèy lɛ Sɔdɔm nsoò lɛ Egiɓtɛn ɓi jàŋ yɔ̀miɗ inɛ ɓɛ kpangà Kan wàà ɓi kɔrɔs. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, rì mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm, rì ɓìtòkì ɓìcèm, rì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓɛ ri seesee gɛ ɓìloŋ ɓyaa à kpaŋ mɛ̀ru mɛraa rì kìden, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ gherɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓom̀ ɓyɔ ɓi zɔ̀ŋ. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ ri nyààrɛɛ gɛ rì rìwu ɗyaa, ɓɛ wog kìrɔɔ; ɓɛ roòròmɓɛ̀n ɓyom ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛǹ ɓɛ tɔɓkà ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛ kiraa rì kìden mɛ̀n, ǹghay àdɛŋ ànɛ à rì nghay à cɛɓ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, à ɗiŋì ɓi ɓɔ, ɓɛ ki pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo, ɓɛ rɛlì mɛ̀rɛy, fɔɔnnɛ coo iris wu ɓangà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ seesèèghà ɓɔ. 
Nni ɓɛ wokà di coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rìi aɗyoo, ì kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔɔghnay fɛ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkà aɗyoo ɓi ɓìkwìɗ ɓi mis mɛ ɓɛ̀bènàbena ɓaa. 
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ, zi i nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà rì ìtèɗ; kìlànà ki bàn kìfog ki ɓi ɓìlànà ɓi kintɛ̀ɗ ɓi ɓi bàn ìnɛn ki waàrɛ̀n, ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ cuu, ɓi rìnyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n ɗi zi i nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀ngà ɗiǹ, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ risì, ɓɛ fa Bɛ̀ll ànɛ aɗyoo rìkem.
Ǹtɔɓ wu kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ wu mɛ ghaàgh, nni ǹtɔɓ wu kiraa wɔ yɛɛ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tìì lɔŋ ɓigomìnɛ.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a rɔgà ɗyam; fɔɔnnɛ ɓyoo jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ɓaghày ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, ɓi kpaakpàà lɛ: Kìlàmì ki zi ki cee ɓi ɓyàg ɓi Kan wìs, rì Mèsii wìì. À ɓiì làmii fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ritin ɗì ɓɛnin ɓɛ ɓɛ kɔkɔ̀rìghà Bɛ̀ll asu ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ maa mɛ rilàmì, ɓɛ kpilàkà, ɓɛ ɓakì mɛ̀su maa ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll. 
Di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Tì faa wɔ̀ ɓìtògsɛ̀n Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm, ànɛ à rì, ànɛ à ki ɓaghà, wɔ̀ɔ nɗèsii coo itèɗ wɔɔ, ù rèsì kìlàmì kɔɔ. 
Ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi wokà bim, kìɓan kifog, cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ bim yɔɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ghɛnɛn ki yuù, rì ki lɛ u yɔm̀ ɓìloŋ; rì cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ u leɓ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɔɔ ɓɛ lɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ nigì ɗii ɗyɔɔ, lɛ rì ɓɔɓti rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn; cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ u cuùsi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ yooyogsì ziinɛ ki kpaŋi.
Nni naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ì rì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm ì ŋwàrɛ̀ngà, fìkɔrɔŋ fii fi riràrɛ̀n fi seèsèèrɛ̀n yì ɓi naa yìì ɓi ɗùm. Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwàaŋwàɗ à tumɛ̀ngà rìŋwàŋwàɗ, ɓyoo gom ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi ghaghààgh, baàbàn ì ɓoɓòg, zi i nyɛ̀ɛ̀nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n, bol ì gɔ̀g ì sùùsùùrɛ̀n.
Coo kifèèghrɛnà ki resɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm; giɓ ŋ̀waatɛn ŋwos yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà, ŋwii à lònlòm nyi a mɛ̀kòò-zi, tàm à rìkem ànɛ à ɓaghà rì tyɔɛy ntɛ̀ɗ rì tiɓɛɛ̀ nyi ɓi nto. 
Giɓ anɛ̀n à ɓaghà rì ɗyem, à ki kuukugsɛ̀n lɛ ɗyem ɗi kikìghà nyi à wowòg rìkɛŋ ɗi giɓ a woki ɓi rìyay.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìfèèghrɛnà kidɛŋ ki resɛ̀ngà tì ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm; coo kinààgɔ̀n kɛɛ ɓaghà, ki ɓaŋɓàŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɗuu, kɔ mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, mɛ̀tɔŋ ǹtɛ̀ɗ; nni ɓi mɛ̀to mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛǹ, ɓɛ̀tàm ɓɛ rikem ɓɛ ɓalàkà miì. 
Ǹghey wu kinààgɔ̀n kiǹ wu wɔɔwɔ̀ɔ̀rɛ̀ngày rì gàɓ ì kìraa ìnɛ ɓi tyɔɛy ticèm ti aɗyoo, wu suùsùùrì tyɔ ɓi zi. Kìnààgɔ̀n ki rɛlìghà giɓ anɛ à ɓoŋɓòŋgà rìyay ànɛ̀n asu lɛ i à yali, kɛɛ sokɛn man. 
Giɓ a yalà man à baŋì, ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kɛ̀ɛkɛɛ̀sì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm rì gbaǹ ànɛ à rì ǹkìyɛn ɗi bɔŋ. Nni ɓɛ ki ɓɔkà rì man wiì ànɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓi kɔ̀ɔ̀ wii wu rilàmì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à ghɛŋìghà ɓi-reɓ, wɔɔnnɛ jàŋ inɛ Bɛ̀ll à pègsɛ̀ngà nyi ì ɓaghà, lɛ à rì wɔɔ ɓiì ɗiɗii à kpaŋ mɛ̀ru tɔɔsìm ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ rì mɛ̀ru mɛ̀tin mɛraa.
Fɔɔnnɛ wɛ̀y wu ɗuurɛ̀ngà ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm; Mikaɛl rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɗùùghà ri kìnààgɔ̀n. Kìnààgɔ̀n girig, ki ɗuughà wɛ̀y wiǹ rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom, 
kìɓan kifog, àa kìnààgɔ̀n kɔ yɛɛ ceeghà ɓi-tèɗ; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓatìghà ɓi ri jàŋ i ǹkɔ̀riyɛn aɗyoo. 
Nni ɓɛ tyɔkày coo kinààgɔ̀n kiǹ, fìɗyàɓ fi nyoo fìn, fi fi ri ɗii lɛ ǹɗèm nsoò lɛ Satàn, nnyɛɛ ri ǹ-yègsì zi bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ miì, ɓɛ tyɔkày nyi ɓi zi, ɓɛ ki tyɔg yi girig ɓum ɓii ɓɛ titom ǹɗaŋ ri nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà di coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa yi ɓi ɗyoo lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n ki gòri rì ìtèɗ, rì kìlàmì ki Bɛ̀ll, kɛɛ ti lɛ ɓigomìnɛ, rì ìtèɗ wu rilàmì ɗi Kiris wìì, ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ mɛ tyɔg roànɛ à ti à sɔmàg ɓɛ̀geni ɓis, lɛ nnyɛɛ nti à sɔmàg ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Ɓɛ mɛ yag nyi ɓi wɛ̀y lɛ bwaɓ yi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓɛ nɗèresii saaɗ ànɛ miì; ɓɛ nki keesii ɓi ɓyɛɓ ɓyaa à kpaŋ lèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ risi rìwu. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki ɗyoo, rì mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓì kɔ̀kɔrii aɗyoo, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìnyàànyaa! Nyìighnyìg rì ziinɛ, ɗì rìɓày à kìkòn, ɓisuulɛ Satàn a mɛ sɛn yi a lɔ̀ŋkin, ǹwoghɛn coo bim lɛ à yii lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kii ki mɛ rɔ̀ɓ lɛsàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ kìnààgɔ̀n ki ghɛngà lɛ ɓɛ tyɔghiì kɔ ɓi ziinɛ, nni ki ɓɛɓsɛ̀ngà rì giɓ anɛ à yalà man baŋì. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ faghà giɓ anɛ̀n kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki mɛkeɓ ki coo bèè i fììlì, lɛ a lɛŋ ɓi-reɓ, ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ri nyi ɓiì mɛnii bèg yiraa rì kìden, fìràɓ ri nyoo. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ nyoo ì looghày giɓ anɛ̀n mɛ̀nig ajɛ̀m yɛ̀ɛ rìɓày lɛ di rìɓày a ɓɛǹ ɗì nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog zi i rùnɛ̀ngà giɓ, ì ghasì ŋwɔm ì mìn rìɓày ànɛ kìnààgɔ̀n kiǹ ki looghày a ŋwɔm̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ kìnààgɔ̀n ki wokà bim ri giɓ anɛ̀n ki ki kɛ̀n ki kpaŋì dòò yii wɛ̀y, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓegì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll rì saaɗ ànɛ Yeesus à rèsìghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà di nyàm ìdɛŋ yɛɛ̀ kpaŋkpaŋ yi ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn; ì ɓaghà mɛ̀tɔŋ ǹtɛ̀ɗ, rì mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛ yɔ̀ mɛǹ mɛ ɓalàkà rì ɓɛ̀tàm ɓɛ rikem, mii mɛ tifena ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll mɛ ɓalàkà mɛ̀ kàngakɛn ɓi mɛ̀to mɛ nyàm ìnɛn.
Nyàm ìnɛ ǹghɛngà ìnɛn ì pisɛ̀ngà ǹgɔn, mɛ̀kòò mɛ yɔ̀ mɛ ɓa yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kòò mɛ kpaò, ŋwɔm wu yɔ̀ wu ɓa yɛ̀ɛ ŋwɔm wu kimonɗo. Kìnààgɔ̀n ki tekà lɛ, rì ìtèɗ wu ki ɓaghà rì wɔ, rì ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì coo itèɗ wu rilàmì, ki fa nyàm ìnɛn. 
Nni ǹghɛngà kibog ki ɓi mɛ̀to mɛ nyàm ìnɛn rì coo beŋ i nfin, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ wɔɔ̀zìghà coo beŋ inɛ̀n. Zi bimiɗ ì kuùkùùghràg nyàm ìnɛn, ì ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti yɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ kɛngà kìɓaàgh mɛ̀ɗu ɓi mis mɛ kinààgɔ̀n ɓɛ ɓɔgsì kɔ, ɓisuulɛ ki faghà ìtèɗ wu rilàmì rì nyàm ìnɛn; nni ɓɛ ɓakà girig nyàm ìnɛn mɛ̀ɗu asu di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ à ɓa yɛ̀ɛ yɔ̀? Ghɛn yɛɛ ki rì lɛ à ɗùù rì yɔ̀? 
Nni ɓɛ faghà nyàm ìtèɗ wulɛ yɛ̀ɛ kpaàkpaa ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀càŋà, ì feèfèngì Bɛ̀ll. Ɓɛ ki fa ti yɔ̀ ìtèɗ wulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ lami ɓɛ̀ŋwii mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓɛɓɛɛ̀. 
Nni ì pinìghà ŋwɔm lɛ yɛ̀ɛ fengi Bɛ̀ll, rì ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll, rì kìnuugh ki Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi ɗyoo ɓiɗùm. 
Ɓɛ ki fa nyàm ìnɛn ìtèɗ wulɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɗuùzi ɓɔ wɛ̀y, ì yag ɓɔ. Ɓɛ fa yɔ̀ ìtèɗ wu yɛ̀ɛ lami ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm, rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm, rì ɓìtòkì ɓìcèm rì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm. 
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ mii maa mɛ ka ɓaghà ɓi mɛ kànɛn ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ à Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ ɓɛ wolà, à tumɛ̀n a rìyàghɛ̀n ɗi zi, ɓɛ ɓaagh gɛ mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi ɓɛ ɓɔgsì nyàm ìnɛn. 
I ŋwaà rì rì mɛ̀reè à wog.
I mum à yalɛ̀ngà lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ gɛ rìkpàn, à rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ, i ŋwaà woli mum rì gafàg, ɓɛ woli gɛ nyi rì gàfàg. Cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì sììrɛɛ, ɓɛ ki ɓa ri ǹtyweeyi kɛɛ̀ki.
Nni ǹghɛngà nyàm ìdɛŋ di yɛɛ̀ kpaŋkpaŋ yi ɓi zi, Nyàm ìnɛn ì ɓaghà mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛ man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, ì ki tòtog yɛ̀ɛ kìnààgɔ̀n.
Ì kìkìghà kìsay ri ìtèɗ wu rilàmì wu nyàm ì ǹtonto, ɓi mis mɛ nyàm ìncèm ìnɛn. Ì ki kàŋkaŋ zi, ri ɓumɓɛ miì lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi nyàm ì ǹtonto ìnɛ ì ɓaghà rì coo beŋ i ǹfin ìnɛ ɓɛ ɓooghà ì wɔ̀n. 
Ì kìkì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, à kpaŋ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kɔsag yì ɗuu ɓi ɗyoo, ɗyɛɛ sɛǹ yì ɓi ziinɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ seesèè. 
Ì yègsì ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ rì dàm yi ɓɛ faghà yɔ̀ itèɗ wulɛ yɛ̀ɛ kiki ɓi mis mɛ nyàm ì ǹtonto di yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki kìfèèghrɛnà ki nyàm ìnɛ ɓɛ kpɛɛ̀ghà rì gàfàg ì ki ghɛɓ. 
Ɓɛ faghà nyàm ìmbog ìnɛ̀n ìtèɗ wulɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki lɛ kìfèèghrɛnà ki nyàm ì ǹtonto kɛɛ nyɛɛ̀nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n lɛ di kɛɛ toòghrɛn ki ki lɛ, ɓɛɛ cuusi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓeni kìɓɔgsii kifèèghrɛnà ki ncèm kiǹ. 
Nyàm ì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ inɛ̀n ì kàŋkàŋgà lɛ rì ɓɔɓti rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn rì ɓɛ̀guŋgum rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛkpàn rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀kpàn, lɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ ɓalag rì kìrèmzɛnà ɓi càg ki weèlem, rì ɓisù, 
rì tì lɛ mum kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ri bee inɛ lɛ a lag com nsoò lɛ a kaɓ, di à yin ɗi kìrèmzɛnà kiǹ, kɛɛ ri ɗii ɗi nyàm ìnɛn, nsoò lɛ bàlì ì ɗii ɗi nyàm ìnɛn.
Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ mum a womzɛn kɛɛ̀ki, ŋwaànɛ à wom̀zɛɛ, a kaà lɛ à tanɛ̀n bàlì ì nyàm ìnɛn, ɓisuulɛ bàlì ìnɛn ì rì bàlì ì ɗii ɗi mum. Bàlì yìì inɛ̀n ì rì ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ taàfog rì mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì taàfog.
Nni ǹseesèèghà, ǹghɛn Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ǹɗɛrɛliyɛn ɓi dòn ì Siyon, ǹɗaŋ ri ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin; ɓi mɛ̀su mɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɗii ɗii, rì ɗii ɗi Seŋi mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ kànɛn. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokày jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo di yɛɛ̀ wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔɔ yi yɛ̀ɛ ɓìkus ɓi riɓày, ì pisɛ̀n tì coo gom ì baàbàn; gom ìnɛ ǹwokà ìnɛ̀n ì ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ fìloŋ fyɛɛ̀ fi ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ ɓoɓòg. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ghìghà fyem fi nyɔn di ɓɛ rɛrɛlii asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, rì nyàm yi kinìn, rì asu wu ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum. Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ɓaghà ɓi lɛ à yilàg fyem fìn, i ki yin lɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm mɛ̀tin taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛnin ɓɛ à kwèɗkà ɓi ziinɛ. 
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛɛ tɔɓɓɛ̀ngà ɓi tifin rì ɓɛyìɓ; ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yii ɓi ɓɛyìɓ; ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ jàŋ bimiɗ ìnɛ à kɛ̀ɛ. Ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀kòrɛn ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìɗùn ɓi ǹtonto ɓisuu Bɛ̀ll rì ɓisuu Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, 
fɔɔnnɛ ŋwɔm wu roàdɛŋ wu kpaaghà ɓi kiɓan ki ɓɛpwàà; ɓɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ bɛ̀lɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ di a lɛŋlɛŋ ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm, à ɓaghà rì Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ànɛ lɛ a ghagsi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm, rì mɛ̀pwìɗ mɛ̀cèm, rì ɓìtòkì ɓìcèm, rì mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm. 
À lààlàmɓɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Risiina Bɛ̀ll, ɓì fa nyi rìkem ɓisuu cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛyɔ̀m ɓii ki ki kpaŋi; ɓaaghna mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi ɓi mis mɛ roànɛ à kìghà lɛ rì ɗyoo rì zi, ɗì rìɓày à kìkòn rì ɓɛ̀ǹsim ɓɛ mɛnig ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ, ànɛ à ɓɔ̀ɓkày roà ǹtonto, à yùghà di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Baɓilon àgwey a kpìi, Baɓilon àgwey a kpìi; nnyɛɛ nɔsìghà ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ɓi cɛɓ kii ki tifin ki ki ri koŋnyòò.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a kìraa à nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghày di a kpaakpaa jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: I mum à ɓɔgsii nyàm rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki yɔ̀ nsoò lɛ ɓɛ teɗ nyi kìrèmzɛnà ki nyàm ìnɛn ɓisu nsoò lɛ ɓi càg, 
di à rì girig ɓiì nɔɔ̀ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ribaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, mɛ mɛ ri mɛ̀ɓèniyɛn ɓi ɓeŋ à bim yiì, mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa mɛ ɓùtɛn ɗi com kidɛŋ; à ki rì ɓiì wowoogh ntɔɓ ɓi ɗuu, rì ɓi ǹdùsi, ɓi mis mɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, rì ɓi mis mɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fìsilì fi ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ɗiighɗigsì ɓɔ fyɛɛ̀ syoosyoo fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, rìfɔɔsɛ̀n ɗyaa ɓa ɓi ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓɔgsìghà lɛ rì nyàm rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki yɔ̀, rì ɓisuu mum bimiɗ ànɛ à tekà kìrèmzɛnà ki ɗii ɗi nyàm ìnɛn.
Cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓèŋɓeŋ ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Bɛ̀ll rì ǹtyweeyi wu yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus, ɓɛɛ siìrɛn kɛɛ ri lɛ̀.
Nni ǹwokà di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rìì aɗyoo ì kpaa lɛ: Kàna kìɓan ki! Mààgh rì ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓi wii ɓi kìsay ki Kan, à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ. Ǹghay a kpaaghi lɛ: Ki ri fɔlɔɔ saaɗ, lɛ di ɓɛɛ fɔɔ̀sɛn ɓìsay ɓyaa, ɓisuulɛ mɛ̀kìkìì maa mɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ɓɔ.
Nni ǹseesèèghà, ǹghɛn kìkwìɗ ki puɓ; ɓi kìkwìɗ kiǹ mum à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn yɛ̀ɛ man à mum, à ɓaghà rì tam à rìkem ɓi nto, ànɛ ɓɛ kiì rì gol, à ki ɓanɓan zɛ̀m i mpooyɛn ɓi càg. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ à kpagày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à kpaa ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi kìkwìɗ jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Pìgha zɛ̀m, u saŋ ɓyom, lɛ cààmɛ̀n à mɛ̀saŋ yɛɛ kpaŋi lɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ ɓyom ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓi mɛ tèɗ lɛ Bɛ̀ll a saŋ̀ ɓyɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi kìkwìɗ à pìkà zɛ̀m, à saŋ ɓyom ɓi ɓi ziinɛ. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ à kpagày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ aɗyoo, à ɓaghà girig rì zɛ̀m i mpooyɛn ɓi càg; 
fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ ànɛ à làmìghà ɗuu, à kpagày ɓi com ki ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓyom miì ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll, à kpaa roànɛ à ɓaghà rì zɛ̀m i mpooyɛn ɓi càg jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Pìgha zɛ̀m yɔɔ̀, u syaŋ ɓìjug ɓi viìnyɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ ɓìɗùn ɓi mɛ ɓàŋ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a pìkà zɛ̀m, à syagì viìnyɛ̀ bimiɗ ìnɛ ɓi ziinɛ, di a sùusuùrì yɔ̀ ɓi coo wayɗ wu bim i Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni ɓɛ saɓkà ɓìɗùn ɓiǹ ɓi wayɗ wu wu ɓaghà fìràɓ ri bàn; fɔɔnnɛ ɓìrɛm ɓi bwaɓ ɓi ɓɛngàkày ɓi wayɗ, ɓi riɓì ɓɛ̀kòdò lɛ ɓɛ̀kòdò, ɓi ki rim, nunùg mɛɛtɛ̀rɛ̀ bog rì kìden.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà kìrèmzɛnà kidɛŋ aɗyoo, ki ki ɓaghà coo gɛn à kìɓan a ǹkuurakɛn; ɓum ɓɛ titom taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀; ɓɛ ɓanɓàngà mɛ̀tɔɓ taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ siitòn. Ɓi mɔ innɛ bim i Bɛ̀ll ì tulii.
Nni ǹghɛngà di ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yakà lɛ rì nyàm, rì kìfèèghrɛnà ki yɔ̀, rì bàlì ì ɗii ɗi nyàm ìnɛn. Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ rɛrɛ̀lìghà ɓi com ki kèleŋ̀ŋ̀ yɛ̀ɛ rìɓày ànɛ à rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii rì ɓɛ̀ŋwii, m̀ɓùtakɛn ɗi ɗuu, ɓɛ ɓanɓàn tìloŋ ti Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓɔ. 
Ɓɛ kɛkɛ̀ɛ̀gh lɛ rì fyem fi Moyis ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Bɛ̀ll, rì fi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm, mɛ̀kìkìì mɔɔ mɛ kii lɛ, mɛ teghɛ̀n, mɛ ki ɓa com ki kuurakɛn! Rifòm ɗi ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm, bee yɔɔ yi ri lɛ saaɗ, yi ki ɓa ɓɛkɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ bee. 
Kan ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ à rɔ̀ɓ lɛ à risii ɓi ɗii ɗyɔɔ, kɛ̀ɛ ki kemzi ɗyɔ? Ɓisuulɛ, lɔŋ wɔ̀ cɛ̀ncɔɔ yɛɛ ri ǹtɛnɛn. Ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ri ɓiì yùu, ɓi ɓag wɔ̀ mɛ̀ɗu asu, lɛ saaɗ wɔ̀ɔ̀ a mɛ rèsɛ̀n.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ǹghɛngà di naà-Bɛ̀ll ì ŋwàrɛɛ aɗyoo; ɓi na-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛn innɛ kìnuugh ki riràrɛ̀n rì Bɛ̀ll ki ri. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓanɓàngà kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki mɛtɔɓ, ɓɛ kpagày ɓi na-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛn, ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀waatakɛn ɓisyeesyee ɓi ɓilàà ɓi puɓ, ɓi ɓi lonlòmgà ǹlònlomɛn, ɓɛ ŋiràg ɓɛ̀kànɗa ɓɛ gol ɓi ɓìɓon. 
Kìbog ki ɓi nyàm yi kinìn ki falàkà ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀ɓeŋ ɓɛ gol, ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓalàkà ɓɛ̀ronɛn ɗi bim i Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ fìsilì fi rongà naà-Bɛ̀ll lɛ rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll rì ìtèɗ wii. Mum à ki ɓaghà ɓi lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi na-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛn, à kpaŋ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ ri ɓiì lèegh.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà di coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rìì ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ì kpaakpàà ɓum ɓɛ titom lɛ: Kɛ̀ɛna kìsùùrii kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ki ɓɛɓeŋ ɓɛ bim i ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɓi zi.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a ǹtonto à kɛ̀ngà, à sùùrì ɓeŋ wìì ɓi zi; fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì kìrèmzɛnà ki nyàm, ɓɛ ki ɓɔɔɓɔgsì kìfèèghrɛnà ki yɔ̀, ɓɛ roɓkàkà rìkuu ɗi kiɓɛɛ ɗiɗɛŋ ɗi mum kɛ̀ɛ yi yɛ̀ɛ ɗi kɛɛ̀kɛɛ yì, ɗi ki kɛŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a sùùrìghà ɓeŋ wìì ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, rìɓày à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n bwaɓ, yɛ̀ɛ bwaɓ yi kiloŋ ki mum, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ghɛghɛ̀ɓkà ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn ɓi cuughà.
Ŋwaàfìtom a kìraa à sùùrì ɓeŋ wìì ɓi ɓɛ̀rìɓày ɓɛ zɛy rì ɓi ɓɛ̀ǹsim ɓɛ mɛnig, ɓyom ɓìn ɓìcèm ɓi lɔɔ̀ghrɛ̀n bwaɓ. 
Nni ǹwokà di ŋwaà-fìtom a mɛ̀nig a kpaa lɛ: Ù rì lɛ saaɗ, yɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ nɗeni lɛ kɛɛ ɓa fɔlɔɔ, wàànɛ ù rì ǹtɛnɛn, ùrì, ù ki ɓaghà. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ yogsìghà bwaɓ yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n rì yi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, nni wɔ̀ɔ nfaa ɓɔ bwaɓ lɛ ɓɛɛ nɔ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ki ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ. 
Nni ǹwokà di com ki ɓɛɛ̀ tɔ̀ngi ɓyom miì ɓi rìɓɔgsì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ki kpaa lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm, rìren ɗyɔɔ ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ri miì, ɗi ki ɓa lɛ saaɗ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a kìnìn à sùùrìghà ɓeŋ wìì ɓi ŋwos, ŋwos a teɗ ìtèɗ wulɛ a ɗigsi ɓum rì ɗuu, 
nni coo ritɔ̀n ɗi syàn ɗiǹ ɗi ɗigsìghà ɓum, ɓɛ tum rìfengì ɗi ɗii ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ànɛ à làmii mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn mɛrem lɛ ɓɛɛ fa nyi rìkem.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaǹ à sùùrìghà ɓeŋ wìì ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu nyàm, birìm ì sigtɛ̀n kìlɔ̀ŋ ki nyàm ìnɛn, ɓum ɓɛ kaŋkàm mɛ̀lemàg lɛ rìkɛŋ ɗi cee ɓɔ, 
ɓɛ ki feefengì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ aɗyoo ɓisuu rikɛŋ ɗi ɓɛ wowòkà rì ɓisuu ɓiɓɛɛ̀ ɓyaa, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛn mɛrem lɛ ɓɛɛ caɗ ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓyaa ɓi mɛkìkìì.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàfog à sùùrìghà ɓeŋ wìì ɓi rìɓày ànɛ lɛ Efirat, mɛ̀nig mɛ miì mɛ ghemì lɛ mɛɛ nɛm̀ mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ ŋwos a ti à kpagìì bee. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà di ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓiraa ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaŋkpaŋ yi lɛ rì ɓi ŋwɔm wu kinààgɔ̀n, rì ɓi ŋwɔm wu nyàm, rì ɓi ŋwɔm wu ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà; mɛ̀ghay mɛ̀n mɛ ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ ɓìgbòri. 
Ɓi ri ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kìki dàm, ɓi ki kɛ̀ngi a mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ bimiɗ, lɛ ɓyɛɛ taŋzɛn mɔ ɓisuu wɛ̀y wu wu ri ɓiì ɓaà ɓi coo gòn i Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì rì ìtèɗ wucèm. 
Ghɛna, n-yùyuy yɛ̀ɛ wiiwìì. Mààgh rì ŋwaànɛ à rì cem, à ki ɓèŋɓeŋ ɓilàà ɓii lɛ kɛ̀ɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ghi kitòn zɛy lɛ a wog ǹtoòrìɗ di ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ nyi kìtòn zɛy. 
Mɛ̀ghay mɛ̀n mɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà mɛ̀fòm ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi ɓi rì Ebìreegh lɛ Arimagedɔŋ.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ a sùùrìghà ɓeŋ wìì ɓi bɛ̀ɛ̀bɛ̀ɛ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ ki kpagày ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, di ki riì ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì ki kpaa lɛ: Ki leègh! 
Fɔɔnnɛ ki kighà lɛ ŋwàaŋwàɗ à ŋwàŋwàɗ, gom yi woòghwòòghrɛ̀n, baàbàn ì ɓoɓòg, zi i ki nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey lèg ànɛ ì ka nyɛŋɗɛ̀ngà ɓi rikuu ɗìn, à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓaà ɓa ɓi ziinɛ. 
Bàn ìgwey i lànɛ̀ngà ɓìlànà ɓiraa, bàn yi ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓimbog ɓìcèm yi waàrɛ̀n, Bɛ̀ll à yitì Baɓilon àgwey lɛ a nɔsi nyi ɓeŋ à mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ ɓi coo bim yiì. 
Ɓìrìŋ ɓi riɓày ɓìcèm ɓi ghɛŋɗàkà, dòn yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛnɛn ti nsoò bog. 
Coo bol ì gɔ̀g ì kɔ̀sɛ̀ngày aɗyoo ì nɔ ɓum ɓi nyoo, gɔ̀g yi bol ìnɛ̀n yi ɓalàkà nunùg ɓɛ̀kilò mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀; nni ɓum ɓɛ fengàkà Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu ntɔɓ wu ɓɛ ghɛngà wiǹ ɗì bol ì gɔ̀g, ǹtɔɓ wìn wu teèsɛ̀ngà wu ciɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓum ɓɛ titom taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓanɓàngà ɓɛ̀ɓeŋ ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ, ki yughày ki kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Yu, nɗesi wɔ̀ lannɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì pɔnɔsii coo giɓ a rìɓàmɓà ànɛ à kɔ̀kɔri ɓi bèn yi ɓɛrìɓày ɓɛgwey. 
Rì nyi nnɛ mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ɓaghà ɓi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ ŋwaŋ rìnɔ ɗi mɛrɔ̀g mɛ ɓi cɛɓ kii ki tifin kìn.
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ̀n à tekà mɛ̀ ɓi nghay à kɛ̀n ɗì mɛ̀ ɓireɓ. - Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà giɓ adɛŋ ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi nyàm ìdɛŋ fɛlɛ m̀ɓàŋ, nyàm ìnɛn rì mii mɛ mɛɛ̀ feefengì Bɛ̀ll nyoo bimiɗ, ì ki ɓa ri mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, mɛ̀tɔŋ ǹtɛ̀ɗ. 
Giɓ anɛ̀n à waatɛ̀ngà ɓìlàà lɛ, rì ɓi ɓàŋ lɛ pɔŋŋ, rì ɓi ɓàŋ lɛ ɓùlùg-ɓùlùg, à ki waatɛn lɛ rì mɛ̀rɛ̀ŋ mɛ gol, rì mɛ ɓɛ kiì rì gɔ̀g yi ŋwèrim ŋwèrim, rì tìcaka. À ɓaghà rì ɓeŋ à gol ɓi càg, ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ rì ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan, rì tìfin ti kiɓeɓtàg kii ki cɛɓ. 
Ɗii ɗidɛŋ ɗi ɓaghà nyi ɗìkànɛn ɓisu; azi anɛ ɓi ɗii ɗìn à ɓaghà kìɓan ki a rìnyam; ɗii ɗìn ɗi ɓaghà lɛ Baɓilon àgwey, à jɛɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɓɛ riɓàmɓà rì ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi ɓi ziinɛ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà giɓ anɛ̀n ǹŋwaŋɛn lɛ rì bwaɓ yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n, rì yi ɓɛwusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ Yeesus. Yɛ̀ɛ ǹghɛngà nyi, ǹkuuràg lɛɛ̀gwey. 
Ŋwaàfìtom a tɔg mɛ̀ lɛ ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ù kuuraagh? Ǹɗì wɔ̀ ɓiì kalii ɓɛ̀azi ɓɛ a rìnyam ɓɛ ɓi giɓ anɛ̀n rì nyàm ìnɛ ì tɛ̀tɛɛgh nyi, ìnɛ ì rì mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ rì mɛ̀tɔŋ ǹtɛ̀ɗ. 
Nyàm ìnɛ wàa ghɛɛ, ì ɓaghà nni ì yiìdi. Ì rì ɓiì kpaŋìì ɓi coo riɓee ɗi rimɛn, ì kɛ̀n kì ɗyaŋì. Nni ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, ɓɛ mii maa mɛ ɓaghà ɓi mɛ kànɛn ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ, à tumɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ ziinɛ ì kìlɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ri kuuràg di ɓɛ ghɛɛ nyàm ìnɛn, ɓisuulɛ ì ɓaghà, nni ì yiìdi, nni ì ki rì ɓiì sugtii yi tì. 
Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ mum a ɓa rì fèg ànɛ à rì rì ɗyomzɛ̀n kɛɛ̀ki. Mɛ̀to mɛ nyàm ìnɛn mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, mɛ ri dòn taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ yi giɓ anɛ̀n à kɔ̀kɔrii miì. 
Mɛ ri girig mɛ̀fòm taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀; mɛ̀fòm mɛtaǹ mɛ ɓi mɛ̀fòm mɛn mɛ mɛ kpì, ɗìfog ɗi kaka ɗi lalàmi, ɗimbog ɗi ka kpaŋ ɓi. Yɛ̀ɛ ɗi ri kpaŋ, ɗi ri kɔ̀ri maa cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg. 
Nyàm ìnɛ ì ɓaghà, ìnɛ ì ki yiìdi inɛ̀n, yɛ̀ɛ ri rìfòm ɗi kitaàraa, ì ɓa tì kìbog ki ɓi mɛfòm mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, ì ki rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ki ɗyaŋì. 
Mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛ kiǹtɛ̀ɗ mɛ wàa ghɛɛ, mɛ ri mɛ̀fòm ǹtɛ̀ɗ mɛ mɛ ka tumɛn ɓi rilàmì; kìɓan kifog ɓɛ ri ɓiì rɛsɛɛ mɛfòm ɓɛ lamì hawò bog nɗaŋ ɗi nyàm. 
Mɛ̀fòm mɛǹ mɛ ri lɔŋ riyitì ɗìfog, lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ lɛ rì ìtèɗ waa, rì kìlàmì kaa, ɓɛɛ fa rì nyàm ìnɛn. 
Ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɗùu ri Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀, Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ki yag ɓɔ ɓi wɛ̀y ɓisuulɛ, à rì Kan ànɛ a ɓɛ̀kan, à ki ɓa ti rifòm ɗi mɛfòm. Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à rì ɓɔ ɓiì yaàgh ɓi wɛ̀y, ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓumɓɛ à reŋìghà ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀ɓɔ̀nɛn, ɓɛɛ ri ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓii ɓɛ ntyweeyi. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom a kpaatìghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Mɛ̀nig mɛ wàa ghɛɛ di giɓ a rìɓàmɓà à kɔ̀kɔrii wɔɔ, mɛ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓi mɛ̀kuu lɛ mɛ̀kuu, ɓìtuu lɛ ɓìtuu, ɓìlɔ̀ŋ lɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ, rì ɓìtòkì lɛ ɓìtòkì. 
Mɛ̀tɔŋ mɛ kiǹtɛ̀ɗ mɛ wàa ghɛɛ rì nyàm ìnɛn, ɓi ri ɓiì ɓèèzɛɛ giɓ a rìɓàmɓà ànɛ̀n, ɓi pumzì nyi, ɓi caɗ nyi kìtòn zɛy, ɓi ɗi mɛ̀mùù mii, ɓi ki tɔ̀n nyi ɓi ɗuu. 
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à fogà ɓɔ fèg ànɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ roòzi rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɓi mɛ̀rem; rìkɔ̀n ɗìfog ɗyɛɛri lɛ, ɓɛɛ teɗ rìlàmì ɗyaa, ɓɛɛ fa rì nyàm à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ. 
Nni giɓ anɛ wàa ghɛɛ, nnyɛɛ ri bàn ìgwey inɛ ì làmii mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ ǹghɛngà di ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, nyi rì coo itèɗ wu rilàmì, kìtɛɛtɛn ki ɓi rìkem ɗii ki kpeŋzì zi bimiɗ. 
Nni à làmɓɛ̀ngà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Baɓilon àgwey a kpìi, Baɓilon àgwey a kpìi! À ghali mɛɛ mɛ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi mɛghay, rì ǹnyamzɛn wu mɛghay mɛ ɓeɓtɛn mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm, rì wu ɓìɓeɓtàg ɓi tììlì ɓi ɓi ti ɓi ɓeɓkì ɓum, 
ɓisuulɛ ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi nnɔɔ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ cɛɓ kii ki tifin ki ki ri koŋnyoo; rì tì lɛ mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ nkìkii tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g ri nyi, ɓɛ̀kìì-dùne ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ kum, lɛ coo gɛn à ìkum wiì.
Nni fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà di jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìdɛŋ ì rìì aɗyoo lɛ: Mìni ɓɔn ɓɛm, pɛ̀sɛɛna ɓi bàn ìnɛn, di kɛ̀ ɓi teɗ gàɓ ɓi kìɓe ki yɔ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓyàa ɓa ɓi ri gàɓ ɓi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ yɔ̀. 
Ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓe ɓi yɔ̀ ɓi mɛ saɓtàg à kɛ̀n kì kpaŋì aɗyoo, nni Bɛ̀ll àa n-yitii mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ yɔ̀ mɛ ɓeɓtɛn. 
Kìina nyi yɛ̀ɛ à kìghà mìni, ɓì lèɓ nyi rìkì ɗii gɛ̀n yiɓɛɛ̀ ɓi ɓeŋ ànɛ à fogà mìni mɛ̀rɔ̀g mii miì; càɓina nyi mɛ̀rɔ̀g miì gɛ̀n yiɓɛɛ̀. 
Faana bàn ìnɛn ǹtɔɓ, ɓì ki cuusi yɔ̀ lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìkem ɗi kɔngà yɔ̀, bas rì ìkum, ɓisuulɛ bàn ìnɛn yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa ɓi nɗem ɓi ɗùm lɛ: Ǹkɔ̀kɔrii lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ giɓ anɛ à rì rìfòm a kɔ̀ràg, ǹ-yin nkpɔɓ, rìwu ɗyaa tanɛɛ gɛ ɓi mɛ. 
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki mɛ̀tɔɓ mii mɛ ri yù lɔŋ ŋwos bog, mɛ ɓa lɛ: ɗì rìwu, ɗì ɓìlɛ̀ɓì, rì zày, ɗuu ɗi ki rì nyi ɓiì ɗigsii. Ɓisuulɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll ànɛ àa n-yɔ̀mi kìɓan kii a rì rì ìtèɗ.
Mɛ̀fòm mɛcèm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, mɛ mɛ ɓaghà ɓi fìsɔ̀mɔ̀g ɗì nyi, mɛ ki nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tì ìkum wii, mɛ ri ɓiì rènɗeni, mɛ ki seeghseèghkɛ̀n ɓisuu kiɓan kii, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ri ghɛn di fìsilì fi ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ɗiighɗigsì nyi fyɛɛ̀ syoosyòò. 
Mɛ̀fòm mɛǹ mɛ ri rɛlag yi fìràɓ lɛ mɛɛ̀ ririsi ntɔɓ wu bàn ìnɛn, mɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Nyìighnyìg, nyìighnyìg ɗì coo bàn ì Baɓilon, bàn ìnɛ ì rì kìtèetèɗ ki bàn; kìɓan kɔɔ ki yɔm̀ɓɛɛ lɔŋ ɓi hawò bog. 
Ɓɛ̀kìì-dùne ɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ ɓɛ rènɗèn, ɓɛ ki waatɛn ɓilɛ̀ɓì ɓisu wii, lɛ mum à làgtii tì ɓi dùne yàà, 
dùne ìnɛ̀n ì rì ɓyom mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀kuu, lɛ rì gol, rì swiɗ à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, rì gɔ̀g yi ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim, rì tìcaka, rì syeesyee à kìrimitì, rì ɓìlàà ɓi ɓàŋ lɛ pɔŋŋ, rì silig, rì ɓi ɓi ri ɓìɓàŋ lɛ ɓùlùg-ɓùlùg; rì mɛ̀ɓam mɛ ɓite ɓi ɓi kaarɛɛ rì ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ syaagh rì mam mɛ zòg, rì ɓi ɓɛ soɓi rì ɓìte ɓi syeesyee, rì ɓìcèm ɓi ɓɛ kiì rì rìkuu ɗi swiɗ ɗidɛŋ nsoò lɛ rì bɔŋ nsoò lɛ rì gɔ̀g yi ɗyɔ̀ɔ̀ɗyɔ̀ɔ̀gh; 
ɓìɓaaɓaa ɓi kite ki lɛ kanèlìyee rì ɓyom ɓi nùnnumɛn, rì tìrààre, rì rìkuu ɗi firu ɗi lɛ miìr, rì fìru fi lɛ àŋsaŋ, rì mɛ̀rɔ̀g, rì mɔ̀ɔ, rì fàriǹ ɗì rìkuu ɗi gèŋ ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kìlag bìrɛs miì, rì ɓɛ̀sanìnya, rì jɔ̀ɔ̀, rì zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀, rì ɓyalig, rì ɓɛkpàn rì ɓyɛɓ ɓi ɓum. 
Ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓi ǹɗem wɔɔ wu kɔnkɔ̀ngà, ɓi mɛ ràɓsɛn wɔ; ìkum wɔɔ, rì gìn yi ɓyom yi wɔ̀ɔ nɗi rì yɔ, ɓi ti ɓìɗimɛn ɓi san ànɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ, wàa ki ghɛɛ̀dii gɛ ɓi ɓyɔ. 
Ɓɛ̀kìì-dùne ɓɛ ɓɛ kumgà lɛ bàn ìnɛn, ɓɛ ri rɛlii fìràɓ, lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ririsi ntɔɓ wu bàn ìnɛn; ɓɛ ri ɓiì rèni, ɓɛ waatɛ̀n ɓìlɛ̀ɓì; 
ɓɛ kpaa gɛ lɛ: Nyìighnyìg, nyìighnyìg rì coo bàn ìnɛ ìi nɗì ǹwaatɛn lɛ rì syeesyee à kìrimitì, rì ɓìlàà ɓi ɓàŋɓaŋɛn lɛ pɔŋŋ rì ɓi ɓàŋ lɛ ɓùlùg-ɓùlùg, yɔ̀ lɛ ri mɛ̀rɛ̀ŋ mɛ gol, rì mɛ ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim rì tìcaka, coo ikum wiǹ wùcèm wu ɗyoŋi ɓi bimiɗ à hawò. 
Ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n tìtimà ɓɛ̀cèm, rì ɓɛ̀pusì tìtimà rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sasay ɓi tìtimà, rì ɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ miì, ɓɛ rɛlàkày fìràɓ, 
ɓɛ kuùkùgsɛ̀n di ɓaa ghɛn fisilì fi ɗuu ɗi ɗyɛɛ̀ ɗiighɗigsì bàn ìnɛn, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ bàn ì be yɛ̀ɛ kpagà yɛ̀ɛ coo bàn ìnɛ? 
Ɓɛ ɗyɛɛɗyɛ̀ɛ̀rɛ̀ngà kùrùɓu ɓi mɛ̀to, di ɓɛɛ̀ rèereèdɛ̀n, ɓɛ waatɛ̀n ɓìlɛ̀ɓì, di ɓɛɛ̀ kuukugsɛ̀n jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Nyìighnyìg, nyìighnyìg rì coo bàn ìnɛ; ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì tìtimà ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn, ɓɛ mmɛ kum lɛ ìkum wu ɓi bàn ìnɛn, yɛ̀ɛ ghali ìreɓ ɓi maa hawò bog!
Wɔ̀ ɗyoo, ù rì lɛ ù sàmsàm ɓi rìɗyaŋ ɗi bàn ìnɛn ì ɗyaŋi, rì mìni ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n, rì ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan girig, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à rɔ̀ŋi kìɓan kin yɛ̀ɛ à pɔnɔsii yɔ̀. 
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kìtèetèɗ ki ŋwaà-fìtom ki pɛsìghà gɔ̀g ìnɛ ì ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ coo rikem ɗi kipɛn, à pìg yɔ̀ ɓi rìɓày à kìkòn di a kpaakpaa lɛ: Fɛlɛ nnɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì pìigh coo bàn ì Baɓilon fɛlɛ azi ri ìtèɗ, ɓum ɓaa ghɛɛ̀dii gɛ tì ɓi yɔ̀. 
Ɓɛ ri wogtii gɛ ɓi gom ì ɓɛ̀ɓoògh-fìloŋ, rì ɓɛ̀ɓoògh-ɓyom, rì ɓɛ̀rɔŋì-zàro, rì ɓɛ̀rɔŋì-mam a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ. Ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki tanɛn ti ŋwaànɛ à yii rìkì ɗi rikuu ɗi kisay ɗiɗɛŋ nsoò ɗìfog; ɓɛ wogtii gɛ ɓi gom ì rìkem ɗi kipɛn foo, 
kìtɛɛtɛn ki lamɓà kaa ghɛnɛɛ gɛ tì ɓi foo, ɓɛ ki wogtii gɛ ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ǹwɔlì giɓ rì gil foo. Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-dùne ɓɔɔ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, rì tì lɛ, ù yègsìghà ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm rì mɛ̀ghèy mɔɔ mɛ kifuu, 
rì tì lɛ, ɓɛ tanɛ̀ngà lɛ rì bwaɓ yi ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì yi ɓɛgherɛ̀n, rì yi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ cuusìghà ɓi ziinɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɔɔ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn ǹwokà coo jɛ̀ɛ̀, ì pisɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì coo kituu ki ɓum kɛɛ ri ɓi ɗyoo ɓi ɗùm ki kpaakpàà lɛ: Alèluyà! Gòri, rìkem, rì ìtèɗ, ɓi ri ɓyom ɓi Bɛ̀ll wìs. 
Ɓisuulɛ rìren ɗii ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ri miì, ɗi ki ɓa lɛ saaɗ. Àa m̀pɔnɔsii coo giɓ a rìɓàmɓà ànɛ àa n-yooyògsì zi ri rìɓàmɓà ɗii, à ki rɔ̀ŋ bwaɓ yi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ à wowòlà. 
Nni ɓɛ ɓiìtìghà tì kìkpaà lɛ: Alèluyà. Fɔɔnnɛ fìsilì fi fyɛɛ̀ ɗiighɗigsì bàn ìnɛn, fyɛɛ̀ syoosyoo fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ ritin ɗì ɓɛnin, ɗì nyàm yi kinìn, ɓɛ ɓakà mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Ààmɛ̀n Alèluyà!
Nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì faŋìghày ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì lɛ: Ɓɔgsiina Bɛ̀ll wìs, mìni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm, mìni ɓɛ ɓì ti ɓì risàg nyi lɛ rì ɓɔɓti rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ di yɛɛ̀ wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì coo kituu ki ɓum, ì pisɛ̀n ɗì gom ì ɓyoo ɓikus ɓi riɓày, nsoò lɛ gom ì baàbàn ìnɛ yɛɛ̀ ɓoɓog ri ìtèɗ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìncèm ì kpaakpàà lɛ: Alèluyà! Lɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm à mɛ rèsi kilàmì kii. 
Ti nyààrɛɛna, tì sàmsàm, tì fafà nyi rìkem ɓisuulɛ tìcàɓ ti ɓi rìwɛy ɗi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ti kpaŋi, gil a mɛ ki pègsɛ̀n. 
Ɓɛ nfaa nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ a waàtɛn syeesyee à kìrimitì ànɛ a lònlòm, à ki ɓa ntɛnɛn. Syeesyee à kìrimitì ànɛn yɛɛ ri ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ ti ɓɛ kilàg. 
Nni ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ̀n à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ kàna lɛ: Mààgh rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀lààghrakɛn a dinà ì rìwɛy ɗi Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀; fɔɔnnɛ à kpatìghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi, yi ri ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll. 
Nni ǹkpìghà nyi a mɛ̀kòò lɛ mɓɔgsi nyi kìɓan kifog, à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ fèèghrɛn ki kìi com kidɛŋ fɔlɔɔ; mɛ̀ ǹɗì lɛ mɛ̀ reŋkàŋ wɔ̀ɔ̀ a kìsay, ǹki ɓa ti reŋkàŋ à ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛ ɓɛ tekà ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus à tɛɛ̀zìghà. Bɛ̀ll innɛ ɓɔgsi, lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus à rèsìghà ɓyɛɛ ri ǹghay ànɛ à ti à rèsàg ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, com ki ɓɛɛ kpaà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà ɗyoo ɗìnɛmɓɛn ǹghɛn zòm i kìmɓɛ̀rɛ̀ ì mpuɓ, ŋwaànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi zòm inɛ̀n aɗyoo, à ɓaghà ɗii lɛ, Ŋwaà-ǹtyweeyi, rì wusìnɛ̀ɗ à kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, a yɔ̀myɔm ɓiɓan, à ki ɗùùɗuu wɛ̀y ɓi ɓɛ̀saaɗ. 
Mis mii mɛ ri ǹɗòò wu ɗuu; ɓɛ̀tàm ɓɛ rikem ɓɛ ɓa nyi ɓi nto kìtuu; à rì ɗii ɗì kànɛn ɓi nyoo, ɗi ŋwaàdɛŋ à yii ɓi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ nyimiɗ, 
à rì ǹwaatɛn rìga ànɛ à rì bwaɓ ri bwaɓ, à ki rì ɗii lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll. 
Mɛ̀raŋ mɛ ɓɛsujàà ɓɛ aɗyoo mɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀tìghà nyi ɓi zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ yi puɓ, ɓɛ waatàg ɓìsyeesyee ɓi ɓɛkìrimitì ɓɛ puɓ, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn. 
Gàfàg ì mpooyɛn i kpaŋ yì nyi ɓi ŋwɔm lɛ a ɓog ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ri yɔ̀; à rì ɓyɔ ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ̀sii ri ǹkpas wu bɔŋ, à ki saɓ ɓiɗùn ɓi viìnyɛ̀ ɓi wayɗ wu mɛrɔ̀g mɛ coo bim i Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm. 
Ɓi rìga wìì rì ɓi ɓɛ̀y wii, ɗii ɗi ri miì ɗì kànɛn lɛ rìfòm ɗi mɛfòm, rì Kan ànɛ a ɓɛ̀kan.
Nni ǹghɛngà ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ di à rɛrɛlii ɓi ŋwos; à làmɓɛ̀ngà tììlì tìcèm ti ti lɛŋlɛ̀ŋgà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Yùunay, ɓi taŋzɛn ɓi coo dinà ì Bɛ̀ll, 
lɛ di ɓi ɗi lɛ rì mɛ̀mùù mɛ mɛfòm, rì ɓɛ̀kɔ̀mɛ̀n ɓɛ̀sujàà, rì ɓìtèetèɗ ɓi ɓum, rì mɛ zòm yi kimbɛ̀rɛ̀ rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi zòm yiǹ aɗyoo, rì mɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm lɛ, rì ɓɛ̀kpàn rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛkpàn, rì ɓɔɓti rì ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà lɛ rì nyàm (ì mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀), rì mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ, rì mɛ̀raŋ maa mɛ ɓɛsujàà, ɓɛ̀taŋzɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗuu wɛ̀y ɗi roànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi zòm i mpuɓ aɗyoo, rì nɗaŋ wii wu ɓɛsujàà. 
Nni ɓɛ ɓangà nyàm ìnɛn nɗaŋ ri ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà ànɛ à kìkìghà dàm yi yi syogà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì kìrèmzɛnà ki nyàm, ɓɛ ki ɓɔɔɓɔgsì kìfèèghrɛnà ki nyàm ìncèm. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà ɓyom ɓi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓiǹ cem ɓi kìràà ki ɗuu, ki ǹdùsi a lɔŋlɔŋ miì. 
Gàfàg ìnɛ ì kpagày ɓi ŋwɔm wu roànɛ à ɓaghà ɓi zòm aɗyoo, ì cuusìghà ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛm̀bog; fɔɔnnɛ tììlì tìcèm ti ɗighà mɛ̀mùù maa, ti wuràg.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà di ŋwaà-fìtom adɛŋ a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, à ɓanɓàn lɛ rì fìɗìɓà fi riɓee ɗi rimɛn, rì coo nsɛ̀ŋi ɓi càg. 
À ɓangà kìnààgɔ̀n ki ki ri lɛ fìɗyàɓ fi nyoo fi lɛ nɗèm, rì Satàn, à kàŋ kɔ bɛn lɛ kɛɛ kɔri fɔlɔɔ bèg tɔɔsìm. 
Nni à pìkà kɔ ɓi coo riɓee ɗi rim, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɗyɔ kìsìmi, à ki roŋ ɗyɔ, lɛ kìnààgɔ̀n kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yègsi ti ɓìlɔ̀ŋ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ tɔɔsìm à bèg ànɛn à rì ɓiì ronì. Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ka càɗ kɔ ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n.
Nni ǹghɛngà mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛ rilàmì, ɓɛ faghà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ kɔràkà ɓi mɛ̀kɔ̀ɔ̀ mɛǹ ìtèɗ wu yɔ̀myɔmɛn ɓiɓan; fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛɛ̀dìghà mɛ̀ghay mɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓɛ wowòlà ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ɓɔgsìghà ɓi nyàm ì mɛ̀to taàɓɛ̀ɛ̀, nsoò lɛ kìfèèghrɛnà ki yɔ̀, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa ri kìrèmzɛnà ki nyàm ìnɛn ɓisu nsoò lɛ ɓi càg. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghemɓɛ̀ngà, ɓɛ ki làmi nɗaŋ ɗi Kiris bèg tɔɔsìm. 
Ɓìloŋ ɓimbog ɓi ghemɓɛ̀ngà ɓi à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ bèg tɔɔsìm yiǹ yi ghaghìghà. Rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ ɗi ǹtonto ɗyɛɛ ri lɔɔ. 
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì gàɓ ɓi rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ ɗi ǹtonto, ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀mààghmaagh, ɓɛ ki ɓa ɓɛtɛnɛn; rìwu ɗi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi yiìdi ri ìtèɗ ɓi ɓɔ; ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɓaà ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll rì ɓɛ Kiris, ɓɛ ki làmi nɗaŋ ɗi nyi bèg tɔɔsìm.
Yɛ̀ɛ bèg yi ri ghaagh fɔlɔɔ tɔɔsìm, ɓɛ kpaŋzì Satàn ɓi naà-zày yìì, 
fɔɔnnɛ à ri kɛ̀n kiyègsii ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓìlànà ɓinin lɛ rì Gɔ̀g rì Magɔ̀g, lɛ di a taŋzɛn ɓyɔ ɓisuu wɛ̀y. Bàlì ì ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓiǹ ì rì yɛ̀ɛ sɛɛ̀sɛɛ a rìɓày à kìkòn.
Nni ɓɛ riɓìghà zi bimiɗ, ɓɛ ghegsɛ̀n bàn ì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ìnɛ ì rì bàn ìnɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à keesàg; kìɓan kifog ɗuu ɗi sɛngày aɗyoo, ɗi ɓugsì ɓɔ. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà Satàn anɛ à yègsìghà ɓɔ ɓi kìràà ki ɗuu rì ǹdùsi, jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ri lɛ, rì nyàm rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɓɛpwàà. Ɓɛ ri wowoogh gɛ mɛ̀tɔɓ yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nni ǹghɛngà ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu puɓ, ɗì roànɛ à kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà miì. Zi rì ɗyoo ɓi ghɛŋìghà ɓi mis mii ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti ri ìkɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà ɓìloŋ lɛ rì ɓi ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn rì ɓi ɓɔɓti, di ɓi rɛrɛlii asu wu ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì. Ɓɛ ŋwaɗkà ɓɛ̀kaàtà, ɓɛ ŋwaɗtì kaàtà àdɛŋ ànɛ à rì kaàtà à cɛɓ. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yɔmgà ɓìloŋ ɓiǹ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kìkìì maa mɛ ɓaghà, lèg ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓaghà kì kànɛn ɓi ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛǹ. 
Rìɓày à kìkòn à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓìloŋ ɓi à ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ, rìwu rì tɛ̀ɛ̀, ɓi fa ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓyɔɔ ɓaghà rì ɓyɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yɔmgà mum bimiɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀kìkìì mii mɛ ɓaghà. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pikà lɛ rì rìwu, rì tɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓi kìràà ki ɗuu; kìràà ki ɗuu kìn kɛɛ ri rìwu ɗi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀. 
Nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɗii ɗii ɗi ɓaghà ɓi ɗikànɛn ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ, ɓɛ pikà nyi ɓi kìràà ki ɗuù.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹghɛngà nyɔɔnyɔn à ɗyoo rì nyɔɔnyɔn à zi, lɛ ɗyoo ɗi ǹtonto rì zi i ǹtonto ɓi silìghà, nsoò rìɓày à kìkòn kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ti. 
Nni ǹghɛngà bàn ì ǹtɛnɛn, nyɔɔnyɔn à Yorisalɛm, m̀pègsɛn yɛ̀ɛ gurà ànɛ à rɛ̀ŋɗɛɛ ɓisuu yii wiì, di a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, di à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì jàŋbog rì Bɛ̀ll. 
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹwokà di coo jɛ̀ɛ̀ ki riì ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì, ki kpaakpàà lɛ: Kìnuugh ki Bɛ̀ll kɛɛ̀ki, ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓum ɓii; à rì ɓiì kɔ̀rii nɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ, ɓɔɔ ɓa kìlɔ̀ŋ kii; fɔɔnnɛ Bɛ̀ll nyimiɗ a rì ɓiì ɓaà ǹɗaŋ ɗi ɓɔ. 
À ɓiì tɔ̀saagh misì mɛ̀cèm mɛ ɓɔ ɓi mis; fɔɔnnɛ rìwu ɗyaa ɓa ti ɓi nsoò ɓìlɛ̀ɓì, ǹsoò ɓìkiŋ, nsoò rìkɛŋ, ɗyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti, ɓisuulɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹtonto ɓìn ɓi mɛ ghaàgh.
Fɔɔnnɛ roànɛ à ɓaghà ǹkɔ̀kɔriyɛn ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì à kpaaghà lɛ: Ɓyom ɓìcèm ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓi m̀pɛ̀ɛ̀zii lɛ nyɔn; à ki kpaa lɛ: Kàna! ɓisuulɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi yi ri miì, yi ki ɓa saaɗ. 
Nni à kpaghà mɛ̀ lɛ ki leègh. Ǹɗì Alfà rì Òmegà, rìtumɛ̀n ɗì rìsugtɛ̀n. Ŋwaànɛ a wowog kinɔli, nnɛ ǹɗì ɓiì faà ǹsim à mɛ̀nig mɛ cɛɓ zɛy rì zɛy, kɛ̀ɛ kòòsɛn. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì yagsaagh nnyɛɛ ri ɓiì fɔ̀ni mɛwus mɛǹ, ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà Bɛ̀ll wìì, nyii ɓa mɛ̀ man. 
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓɛ̀riris, rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn, rì ɓɛ̀wolì ɓum, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-majìg, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìnùn, rì ɓɛ̀pwààpwaà ɓɛ̀cèm, gàɓ yàà i ɓaa gɛ ɓi kìràà ki ɗuu ɗi ghɛ̀g-ghɛ̀g rì ǹdùsi, kɛɛ ri rìwu ɗi kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìbog ki ɓi ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà rì ɓɛ̀ɓeŋ ɓɛ̀ rongakɛn ɗi mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ kitaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ siitòn, ki yughà mɛ̀ kìkpaa lɛ: Yu nɗesi wɔ̀ gurà, gili Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ à tekà mɛ̀ ɓi nghay, à kɛ̀n ɗì mɛ̀ ɓi coo kiteŋtèèŋ ki dòn aɗyoo, nni à rèsìghà mɛ̀ bàn ì ǹtɛnɛn inɛ lɛ Yorisalɛm, di yɛɛ̀ sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo, di ì pɛ̀sɛɛ yì jàŋbog rì Bɛ̀ll. 
Kìtɛɛtɛn ki rigwey ɗi Bɛ̀ll ki lonlòmgà ɓi bàn ìnɛn; rìlòm ɗi ì lònlòmgà ɗi ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g ì ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim, ɗi ɓa tì yɛ̀ɛ gɔ̀g ìnɛ lɛ zyaspɛ̀ ìnɛ yɛɛ̀ lònlom yɛ̀ɛ kìpɛsà ki ŋwii. 
Bàn ìnɛn ì ɓaghà rì coo kiteŋtèèŋ ki gari ki ki ceŋzɛ̀ngà yɔ̀; gari inɛ̀n ì ɓaghà mɛ̀suunaa ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì mɛɓɛɛ̀, ɓum ɓɛ titom ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ a mɛ̀suunaa mɛ̀n. Mii mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀kàngakɛn a mɛ̀suunaa, mii mɛ̀n mɛ ɓaghà mii mɛ mɛpwìɗ ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì mɛɓɛɛ̀ mɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ Isirayɛl. 
Mɛ̀suunaa mɛ̀n mɛ ɓaghà lɛ, mɛraa a rìkpagì ɗi ŋwos, mɛraa ǹkòkwey, mɛraa duŋzi, mɛraa a rìnɔ̀ŋɗàg ɗi ŋwos. 
Bàŋbàŋ yi gari i bàn yi ɓalàkà yì toŋɛn ɓi ɓyoo gɔ̀g ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì ɓiɓɛɛ̀ aɗyoo, mii mɛ ɓɛkɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, mɛ ɓalàkà mɛ̀kànɛn ɓi gɔ̀g yiǹ.
Roànɛ à tòtòkà rì mɛ̀ à ɓaghà rì kìsyòŋ ki gol ɓi sìg à vèg, lɛ a feg lɛ rì bàn, rì mɛ̀suunaa mɛ gari, rì bàŋbàŋ yi ɓi gari inɛ̀n. 
Bàn ì ɓaghà yɛ̀ɛ fookɔnà, rìràɓ ɗi yɔ̀ ɗì rìfùùrɛ̀n ɗi yɔ̀, ɓi ɓaghà com kìfog. Fɔɔnnɛ à fèkà yɔ̀ ri kìsyòŋ kiǹ, ì kpaŋ ɓɛ̀kilòmɛɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ tɔɔsìm bog rì ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi rìràɓ; rìràɓ, ɗì yɔ̀ ɗì rìfùùrɛ̀n ɗi yɔ̀ ɗì rìteŋmɛ̀n ɓi ɓaghà com kìfog. 
À fèkàkà girig gari, ì kpaŋ ɓɛ̀mità mɛ̀tin mɛraa rì ɓɛ̀mità ɓɛtaǹ; vèg ìnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a ɓaghà rì yɔ̀, ì rì vèg ì ɓum.
Bàŋbàŋ yi gari i bàn ìnɛn yi ɓaghà yìtoŋɛn ɗi gɔ̀g ìnɛ lɛ zyaspɛ̀ fɔɔnnɛ bàn yɔ̀miɗ i ɓaghà ǹtoŋɛn ɗi gol ì ghaàghaŋì, ì lònlòm yɛ̀ɛ ŋwii. 
Ɓyoo gɔ̀g ɓi bàŋbàŋ yi gari ì bàn yi ɓalàkà miì yìtoŋɛn aɗyoo, yi ɓaghà yì rɛ̀gakɛn ɗi gɔ̀g yi ŋwèrim-ŋwèrim mɛ̀kuu mɛ̀cèm; coo gɔ̀g ì ǹtonto ìnɛ ɓi gɔ̀g yiǹ ì ɓaghà ǹɗɛ̀ŋɛn ɗi zyaspɛ̀, ì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ǹɗɛ̀ŋɛn ri sàfiir, ì kìraa rì kàlsèdwan, ì kìnìn rì èmèroòdɛ̀, 
ì kìtaǹ rì sàrdonis, ì kìtaàfog rì sàrìdwan, ì kìtaàɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ri kìrìzòlit, ì kìtaàraa rì bèril, ì kìtaànìn rì tòpaàzɛ̀, ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ɗi kìrìzòpìraàzɛ̀, ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ɗì bog rì ìyàsɛŋtɛ̀, ì kìntɛ̀ɗ ɗì yiɓɛɛ̀ rì àmètis. 
Mɛ̀suunaa mɛ kintɛ̀ɗ rì mɛɓɛɛ̀ mɛ ɓaghà tìcaka ntɛ̀ɗ rì tiɓɛɛ̀, ìsuunaa wùcèm wu ɓalàkà fìcaka fifog; ǹlɛmɓog wu Bàn wu ɓaghà wù kìyɛn ɗi gol ì ghaàghaŋì lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ŋwii à ǹghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n lɛ kpeŋkpèŋ̀ŋ̀.
Ǹghɛngà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll wɔɔ ɓisuulɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll à ìtèɗ wucèm rì Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɔ yɛɛ ri naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ wɔɔ. 
Bàn ìnɛn ì yin ɓiì tɔtɔgh lɛ ŋwos nsoò lɛ ŋwii ɓyɛɛ kpeŋzi yɔ̀ ɓisuulɛ rìkem ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗyɛɛ̀ kpeekpeŋzì yɔ̀, Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à ki ɓa lamɓà à bàn ìnɛn. 
Ɓìlɔ̀ŋ ɓi ɓi ziinɛ ɓi ri kɛ̀ɛ̀ghii gɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn ki bàn ìnɛn, mɛ̀fòm mɛ ɓi ziinɛ mɛ ki yùu gɛ wɔɔ ri ìkum waa. 
Mɛ̀suunaa mɛ bàn ìnɛn maa sìmɓɛɛ gɛ ɓi ri ŋwos ɓisuulɛ ìru waa ɓatii gɛ ɓi wɔɔ. 
Ɓɛ ri yùu gɛ wɔɔ lɛ rì gol rì ìkum wu ɓilɔ̀ŋ. 
Com ki ki ri rì tìfin kaa ɗiŋi ɓi wɔɔ, nsoò ŋwaànɛ à ti à kìlàg ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll, rì ɓɛ̀pwàà, lɔŋ ɓumɓɛ mii maa mɛ ri mɛ̀kànɛn ɓi kaàtà à cɛɓ à Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛɛ ri ɗiŋi ɓi bàn ìnɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaà-fìtom a rèsìghà mɛ̀ rìɓày à mɛ̀nig mɛ cɛɓ, ànɛ à ɓaghà lɛ saŋì-saŋì yɛ̀ɛ kìpɛsà ki ŋwii; rìɓày ànɛn à kpaŋkpàŋgày ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll rì wu Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀. 
Ɓi nyìinyìm à ǹlɛmɓog wu bàn rì ɓi mɛ̀wɔŋì mɛ riɓày mɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀, innɛ kìte ki cɛɓ ki ri; kìte kiǹ ki ti ki wumgì gɛ̀n ǹtɛ̀ɗ ɗì yiɓɛɛ̀ ɓi bèg, ŋwii bimiɗ, ki wum gɛ̀n bog. Tyɛn ti kite kiǹ tyɛɛ̀ti ɓɛ ti ɓɛ wɔɔ̀zàg ɓumɓɛ ɓi ɓìlɔ̀ŋ rì tyɔ. 
Ǹcɛ̀m àa ɓa ti ɓi. Ikɔ̀ɔ̀ wu rilàmì wu Bɛ̀ll rì wu Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ wu ri ɓa ɓi bàn ìnɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ri ɓɔɔɓɔgsì nyi. 
Ɓɛ ki ghɛn ìsu wii, ɗii ɗìì ɗi ɓa ɗìkànɛn ɓi mɛ̀su maa. 
Ìru waa ɓati ɓi, ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓati ri zày ì kìtɛɛtɛn ki lamɓà, nsoò ki ŋwos ɓisuulɛ Kan Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓɔ ɓiì kpeekpeŋzì rì kìtɛɛtɛn kii, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ɓiì làmii fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nni à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi yi ri miì, yi ki ɓa saaɗ. Kan Bɛ̀ll ànɛ ǹghay wìì a kɛ̀ɛ̀sag ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, nnyɛɛ nɗomiì mum wiì à fìtom lɛ a resi ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ di maa cààmɛ̀n à ghaghii. 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ tiì lɔɔ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki. Mààgh rì ŋwaànɛ à ɓèŋi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi kaàtà ànɛ; yi ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaŋzì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll.
Mɛ̀ Zyaŋ, ǹkìghà lɛ ǹwog, ǹki ghɛn ɓiɓan ɓiǹ. Nni yɛ̀ɛ ǹwokà ɓyɔ ǹki ghɛn, nni ǹkpìghà a mɛ̀kòò mɛ ŋwaà-fìtom anɛ à rèrèsìghà mɛ̀ ɓyɔ lɛ mɓɔgsi nyi. 
Kìɓan kifog à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ, kɔ̀ɔ fèghrɛn ki kìi com kidɛŋ fɔlɔɔ! Ǹɗì lɛ, mɛ̀ reŋkàŋ wɔ̀ɔ̀ a kìsay, ǹki ɓati reŋkàŋ à ɓɛ̀goni ɓɛ lɛ ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓèŋɓeŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi ɓi kaàtà ànɛ, Bɛ̀ll innɛ ɓɔgsi.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ nyam jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi ɓi kaàtà ànɛ yi yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaŋzì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n ki ti jàŋbog. 
Ŋwaànɛ à rì kìɓeɓtàg ki mum, a kɛnkɛn lɔŋ ɗi rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn asu, ŋwaànɛ à rì ǹtɔɓɓakɛn, a tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɓɓɛ̀n lɔŋ, wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì syeesyee à mum a kɛnkɛn asu ɗì rìkìkì ɗi ɓiɓan ɓi syeesyee, roànɛ à rì ǹtɛnɛn, a kaà lɔŋ lɛ a ɓa ti ntɛnɛn. 
Ghɛna, mɛ̀ yɛɛ̀ yùyuiy lɔɔ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, nki yùyuiy rì mɛ̀lèɓ mɛm̀ lɛ nleɓ mum bimiɗ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ rìkì ɗii ɗi ri. 
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Alfà rì Òmegà, ŋwaà ǹtonto rì ŋwaà siitòn, rìtumɛ̀n ɗì rìsugtɛ̀n. 
Mààgh rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ soò ɓɛ̀kàɓà ɓaa lɛ di ɓɛɛ fa ɓɔ ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi kìte ki cɛɓ, ɓɛ ki ɗiŋi ɓi mɛ̀suunaa mɛ gari lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ ɓi bàn.
Ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìɓan ɓi ɓeɓtɛn rì ɓɛ̀kìì-majìg, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, rì ɓɛ̀wolì-ɓum, rì ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìnùn, rì mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ti à keesàg rìkì ɗi ɓɛpwàà, ɓɛ ri ɓiì rɔ̀ɓi ɓi dan, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗiŋi ɓi bàn ìnɛn. 
Mɛ̀ Yeesus, mɛ̀ yɛɛ nɗomiì mum wɛm̀ à fìtom lɛ a yu mìni kì rèsii ɓiɓan ɓiǹ, ɓi ɓìseŋi ɓyɛ̀m. Ǹɗì maa dòòridoòrì ànɛ ɓi boo ì mum ì Davit, ǹki ɓati fyɛy fi fyɛɛ̀ lònlom sariwa.
Ǹghay rì gurà ɓyɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Yuiy. Ŋwaànɛ à woogh kìɓan kiǹ à kpaa girig lɛ yuiy. Ŋwaànɛ a wowog kinɔli, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì yùu, ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀ni, à teɗ mɛ̀nig mɛ cɛɓ zɛy, kɛ̀ɛ kòòsɛn.
Ǹkalii mum ǹcèm ànɛ à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaŋzì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll, yi yi ri ɓi kaàtà ànɛ lɛ yi ri saaɗ; i ŋwaà foŋdii com kidɛŋ miì, Bɛ̀ll à foŋdii gɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n miì mɛ̀tɔɓ mɛ kaàtà ànɛ a kpaakpàà. 
I mum à ki pisii ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi kaàtà ànɛ a kpaakpaŋzì ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ, Bɛ̀ll à pisii gɛ gàɓ yìì inɛ ɓi kìte ki cɛɓ rì ɓi bàn ì ntɛnɛn ɓi ɓɛ kalii, ɓi kaàtà ànɛ.
Roànɛ a kalag lɛ ɓiɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ri saaɗ a kpaaghi lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀! Mɛ̀ yɛɛ̀ yùyuiy lɔɔ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki. Ààmɛ̀n! Yuiy ɓà, Kan Yeesus!
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan Yeesus yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm!
